bible.bible: Makonde Shimakonde (Ibibiliya mu Shimakonde Imbodi Yaambi na dimbande dya Imbodi Yakala)

chapter.verse: Ali ni lishauma lyamaimyo lyavanakuluvake Yesu Klistu ndukulugwe Daudi na jojo ndukulugwe Abulaamu.
Napanelo Abulaamu ammaleké Ishaki, Ishaki kummaleka Yakobo, Yakobo kummaleka Yuda pamo na vakuluvake na vanung'unuvake.
Yuda kummaleka Peleshi namu Shelaa, ava, jujugwave kuva Tamali. Peleshi kummaleka Eshiloni, Eshiloni kummaleka Alamu,
Alamu kummaleka Aminadabi, Aminadabi kummaleka Naashoni, Naashoni kummaleka Shalamoni,
Shalamoni kummaleka Buwashi, aju, anyoke kuva Laabe. Buwashi kummaleka Obedi, aju, anyoke kuva Luti. Obedi kummaleka Yeshe,
kutwala Yeshe kummaleka Umu Daudi. Napanelo Umu Daudi kummaleka Shalomoni, aju, anyoke kuva ndyagwe Uliyashi.
Shalomoni kummaleka Loboamu, Loboamu kummaleka Abiyashi, Abiyashi kummaleka Asha,
Asha kummaleka Yoshapati, Yoshapati kummaleka Yolamu, Yolamu kummaleka Ushiyashi,
Ushiyashi kummaleka Yotamu, Yotamu kummaleka Akashi, Akashi kummaleka Eshekiyashi,
Eshekiyashi kummaleka Manasheshe, Manasheshe kummaleka Amomu, Amomu kummaleka Yoshiyashi,
Yoshiyashi kummaleka Yekoniyashi pamo na vanung'unuvake. Awo uvele wakati wavavakamulénge vanaishilaeli kuvaukanavo ku Babiloni.
Napanelo ling'oto lyavanaishilaeli kukamuligwa kuka ku Babiloni, Yekoniyashi anímmaleka Shalatiyeli, Shalatiyeli kummaleka Shelubabeli,
Shelubabeli kummaleka Abiude, Abiude kummaleka Eliyakimu, Eliyakimu kummaleka Asholi,
Asholi kummaleka Shadoke, Shadoke kummaleka Akimu, Akimu kummaleka Eliyude,
Eliyude kummaleka Eleashali, Eleashali kummaleka Matani, Matani kummaleka Yakobo,
kutwala Yakobo kummaleka Yoshe ntwagwe Maliya, Maliya jojo ámmaleke Yesu wavanshema Klistu.

Nadoni kutunduvangila Abulaamu mpaka Daudi dindípagwa dimbula dyavanu kumi na nsheshe, kutunduvangila Daudi mpaka pavakamuligwe vanaishilaeli kuka ku Babiloni yadavo dindípagwa dimbula kumi na nsheshe na kutunduvangila pavapagwíte vanaishilaeli ku Babiloni mpaka Klistu dindípagwa momo dimbula kumi na nsheshe.
Napanelo Yesu Klistu aju, kuvalekwa kwake kuvele doni. Jujumunu Maliya wantamadíle Yoshe pakulota kunnomba kanji vakanava kulambana, Maliya andíimita kwaindila ya Imumu Wanashwe.
Bai Yoshe alivikíle kunnomba Maliya kwoda avele munu waishaliya na halatíle kuntaa dyoni nkongwe jo, andyámuwa muntima mwake kunneka shipiipii.

Akuno apanga nnugu wake au, njelo wake Umu andímwidila mwindoti ndamwaulila kushidoni, “Yoshe ndukulugwe Daudi, haunajope yakumpwashalela Maliya kuva ndyavo mwaa nae andiimita kwaindila ya Imumu Wanashwe.
Nae anammaleka mwana nnume na wako undamupa lina lya Yesu mwaa alota kuvaposha venentete vake kwamadambi ave.”
Vinu avi uti vinditandeka pakulota liwikile popo lilove lyatangwéle Umu kwaindila yankúlava wake aashidoni,
“Mwenu, mwali ntete anammaleka mwana nnume. Mwana ajo vananshema lina lya Emanuweli,” kwakuvalangangila mana ake, Nnungu ankupagwa namu wetu.
Bai Yoshe pashishwike andítandela momo mwamwaulidile njelo wake Umu, nae anímpwashalela Maliya kuva nkongwe ndyagwe.
Napanelo haléle na ndyagwe mpaka pammaleke mwana kutwala nae mwana jo kumupa lina lya Yesu.
Napanelo Yesu pavalakwadidye mulikaja lya Beteleemu kulijimbo lya Yudeya muwakati washilangalela Umu Elode, vandíwika pa Yelusalemu vakumanya-dinondo vakwalakela kwalyaloka liduva
kutwala kudya, “Da aijá ávalakwadidye Umu Wavayuda avelé kwashi? Wetu tugwene inondo yake nkono wakwalyalakela liduva, twidilé ndalipudya kwake.”
Bai Umu Elode pamo na vanu uti váshinama pa Yelusalemu pavaigwite malove alo, vandyángaikanga.
Nae andívalalika vanang'olo vavakulangalalela-shadaka pamo na vamwalimu vadishaliya vavayuda kuvaudya, “Da Klistu vammalangenge kuvalakwedya kwashi?”
Vanavo kushidoni, “Mulikaja lya Beteleemu mulijimbo lya Yudeya mwaa kwaindila yankúlava yandikigwé doni,

“ ‘Wako Beteleemu úvele mushilambo sha Yuda, mwiko haunava shinu undikidiki pakati pavananangalaledi vavayuda mwaa kwako wako andaumililila nanangalaledi álota kuvashunga venentete vangu vanaishilaeli.’ ”
Napanelo Elode andívashema kwashipii avalá vakumanya-dinondo kuvaudyangidya wakati wavagwanalele inondo
kutwala kuvaulila vauke ku Beteleemu avalaililila kushidoni, “Mwenu wena mukamanyange shana ing'ano ya nunu ajo, mukankodya ida mungumanyiye pakulota nanangu nguke ndikalipudye.”
Vanavo vakaigwe malaililo amwe umu, vandyúmananga kuka. Mwe! Ailá inondo yavagwéne nkono wakwalyalakela liduva indívalangalalela mpaka ndaimila lyutu lyavéle nunu.
Nadoni vanavo pavagwene inondo yo ìmidile, vandímamodya kupuwanga.
Pavainjilenge nng'ande vandímwona nunu jo pamo na jujumunu Maliya, vanavo kunguguvalila kulipudya kutwala kuutukulanga vituvi vyave kumupa dinudyo adi: shaabu, ubani na mila.
Napanelo pavalinguligwe mwindoti pakulota havanaujile kumwe Elode, vanavo vandyúka kwave vapitila indila inji.

Vakumanya-dinondo avalá vakauke, andímuumililila Yoshe mwindoti njelo wake Umu kutwala kushidoni, “Takatuka! Ntwale nunu pamo na anyoke utukutile ku Mishili. Koko ko, ikala mpaka pangulota kukumanyiya uje mwaa Elode alota kunnambela nunu ammyae.”
Yoshe kutakatuka kuntwala nunu jo pamo na anyoke kuma shilo shosho kuka ku Mishili.
Koko ko, nae andíikala mpaka papadile Elode. Vinu avi vinditandeka pakulota liwikile popo lilove lyatangwéle Umu kwaindila yankúlava doni, “Ku Mishili, ninshema mwanangu.”

Napanelo Elode pamanyite doni vakumanya-dinondo vaninduwanga, nae andíshimwa namene akalamulila vavabyange vana valume uti va pa Beteleemu pamo na vammakaja anyenjemwake, vana avo vavyaka vivili kwida mwina kwodana na wakati wapatilile dyabali na vakumanya-dinondo.
Nadoni vindíwikila popo avilá vyatangwéle nkúlava Yelemiya aashidoni,
“Ku Lamaa lindiigwinika lidi, shililo na kutangadikanga kukumene. Ajo ni Lakeli ávalilila vanavake, nae ankwita kupambadyangigwa, mwaa uti vandibyaigwa.”
Napanelo ling'oto lyakupela Elode, andímuumililila Yoshe ku Mishili mwindoti njelo wake Umu
ndamwaulila doni, “Takatuka, ntwale mwana jo pamo na anyoke uke kushilambo sha ku Ishilaeli mwaa avalá váshilota kwovya shingumi shamwana, vandipalanga.”
Bai nae andítakatuka kuntwala mwana pamo na anyoke kuka kushilambo sha ku Ishilaeli.
Yoshe napane paigwite doni Alikalau ankulangalalela ku Yudeya adiva lyutu lyatatamunu Elode, nae andíjopa kuka kwanavo. Palinguligwe mwindoti andyúka kwisemu ya ku Galileya
ndaikala panjini umo wavashema Nashaleti pakulota liwikile popo lilove litangaléke kwaindila yavakulava doni, “Vananshema kuva Nnashaleti.”
Napanelo mumaduva alo andyúmilila Nshuwau Wakubatisha kushimbweshe sha ku Yudeya alaililila
aashidoni, “Lijugulange mwaa utawala wakuwa undivandika.”
Aju ni jo wammalangénge nkúlava Ishaiya doni, “Lidi linkwigwinika kushimbweshe, ‘Kandyanga indila yake Umu aalowa mwalota kupita.’ ”
Jo Nshuwau aju ashigwala dinguvo dyavakandyénge na magwimbu angamila, kulyunga nkanda waligwogwe na shakulya shake kuva madalombwe na ushi wakunundu.
Napanelo koko ko, vashindamuukila vayelusalemu, vammakaja uti a ku Yudeya na vamudisemu uti dyananyenje mwake lundi lwa Yudani.
Vanavo vashindabatishigwa namu nae mulundi lwa Yudani akuno valivalanganga madambi ave.
Napanelo pavagwene mapalishayo na mashadukayo voe vaida ndapata ubatisho kwake, nae kushidoni, “Mmana mmadinyoka dyaishumu mwe! Anyinyitidilé nyani kutila shaushanga shake Nnungu shída?
Lodya vyepo vilódya kulijugulanga.
Hamunakumbukile kutangola vila muntima, ‘Tatagwetu wetu Abulaamu.’ Ninkumwaulila doni, lo majanga ala Nnungu ankuulula kundyuwidya Abulaamu vana.
Imbedo vandilumika palindi lwannandi tayali. Kula nnandi úkapa vyepo vyambone, vandálumula kujela pamoto.

“Nangu mwenu apa, ninkumbatisha na medi kulodya kulijugulanga. Napane ling'oto lyangu nangu ankwida munu wadimongo kungupunda nangu wandikavaidile nangu kumuulanga vilatu vyake. Nae mwenu po, anambatisha na Imumu Wanashwe na moto.
Ankuvanavo shombo shakupatangila vyakulya mmakono mwake; andakandyanga palugwa pake kuntwala ngano jo kuntaa mushidimbi kanji makadakada lo, andataa moto úkadimika.”
Napanelo Yesu ankuma pa Galileya kuka ku Yudani akapate ubatisho kumwe Nshuwau.
Nshuwau napane ankulingangila kunneya, “Nangu ni ngúvaikidile wako ungubatishe. Napanelo uma dashi wako kungwidila nangu?”
Yesu kutwala kunjang'ula kushidoni, “Kwaambi apa leka ive yadavo mwaa indituvaikila tuwishe popo ishaliya uti.” Nshuwau kwitikila.
Nadoni po papatile ubatisho, Yesu andyúma mmedi mo kutwala muwakati wowo, mwe! Pamevo pake kuwa kushimuka, nae kumwona Imumu wake Nnungu wakuva mwang'unda ashuluka kwida ndamwikala.
Bai lidi lyakwalakela kuwa kushidoni, “Aju ni mwanangu wakunagwaleka, kwamwaa wake nae ninkupuwanga namene.”
Napanelo Imumu aníntwala Yesu kumuukanavo kushimbweshe pakulota atubigwe namu Ndamoni.
Nae akaunga maduva alubaini shilo na mui na ikankola indala.
Bai nkútubya andímwidila ndamwaulila, “Wako ukava umwanagwe Nnungu, lamulila majanga ala ajalukange ave magung'u!”
Yesu napane kushidoni, “Um! Indyandikigwa doni, ‘Munu hananama ligung'u gweka kanji andánama kwakula lilove lyúma nkanywa mwa Nnungu.’ ”
Ndamoni kuntwala Yesu kumuukanavo mpaka kunjini wakwilimyanga nammika panantutuvilo waing'ande ya Nnungu

kutwala kumwaulila doni, “Wako ukava umwanagwe Nnungu, daloka apa ukagwilile pai mwaa indyandikgwa doni, “ ‘Nnungu andavalamulila vanjelo vake, kwamwaa wako wako. Vanavo vandakudong'a, pakulota haunalijajede palijanga.’ ”
Yesu napane kushidoni, “Namomo indyandikigwa doni, ‘Haunanninge ntima Umu Nnungu wako.’ ”
Ndamoni kuntwala kavili Yesu kumuukanavo pashanya lishinga lyakulepa nannodya utawala uti wamushilambo shapai na kunnodya lishangelo lyake
kumwaulila doni, “Ukanguguguvalila na kulipudya kwangu nangu, uti avi ndakupa.”
Yesu napane kushidoni, “Kuka apa Shatwani! Mwaa indyandikigwa doni, ‘Lipudye kumwe Umu Nnungu wako na untumikile jojo bai.’ ”
Bai Ndamoni anínneka. Mwe! Vanjelo kwida nantumika.
Napanelo Yesu paigwite doni Nshuwau andyungwa, nae andyúja kuka ku Galileya.
Akanyema pa Nashaleti kuka ndaikala ku Kapalanaumu njini uvéle nanyenje litanda kwisemu ya ku Shebuluni namu Naputali
pakulota liwikile popo lilove litangaléke kwaindila yankúlava Ishaiya kushidoni,
“Shilambo sha Shebuluni na shilambo sha Naputali, kulodya nkono wakulitanda, mwangu unji walundi lwa Yudani, Galileya shilambo shavamidi,
Venentete váshinama mushii, vandyona lilangadyo likumene vila ali, vanu váshinama mushilambo shashimbedi shiídanavo kupela, lindivamulikila lilangadyo.”
Napanelo kutunduvangila muwakati wowo wo, Yesu andítunduvanga kulaililila aashidoni, “Lijugulange mwaa utawala wakuwa undivandika.”

Napanelo Yesu apita awena nanyenje litanda lya Galileya, andívona vanung'unumunu vavili, Simoni wavanshema Patulu pamo na nkulumunu Andaleya vateja dingau dyave mulitanda. Vovo vo, shimadengo shave shivele shakwaka dyomba.
Nae kuvaulila kushidoni, “Ngwoda! Nangu nantenda muve mmanu mmakuvaka vanu.”
Vanavo kulakenneu dingau dyave, kumwoda.
Paukile mushu padyoko kuvona vanung'unumunu vanji vavili, Tiyagu na nung'unumunu Nshuwau vanavake Shebedeu vatataliyanga dingau dyave mwingalava pamo na tatagwave, nae kuvashema.
Vanavo kunnakenneu tatagwave na ingalava yo, kumwoda.
Napanelo Yesu ashindatanela makaja a ku Galileya apita apundisha muvitala vyave vyakulipudidya avalanganga ntenga wambone wautawala, aponia vilwele na mauvilo uti kwavenentete.

Nadoni shimbili shake shindyúmanikanga mushilambo uti sha Shiliya, venentete vashindavaidanavo kwake nae vanu vavénavo mauvilo akuvilingananga na malwele, vamajini, vashalala na vakulamala kutwala nae kuvaponia.
Nae dishindamwoda dimbumba dyoe dya ku Galileya, dya ku Dekapolishi, dya ku Yelusalemu, dya ku Yudeya na dyakumwangu unji wa Yudani.
Napanelo Yesu akone dimbumba adilá, andíkwela palishinga kwikala. Vakwoda vake pavammandike,
andítunduvanga kuvapundisha aashidoni,
“Vandyalaligwa avalá vamashikini mwimumu, mwaa vanavo utawala wakuwa wàve.
Vandyalaligwa avalá valíla, mwaa vanavo vandapambadyangigwa.
Vandyalaligwa avalá valishapéya, mwaa vanavo vandapata shilambo kuva shave.
Vandyalaligwa avalá vavénavo indala na inyota yaishaliya, mwaa vanavo vandaikuta.
Vandyalaligwa avalá vavénavo shididi, mwaa vanavo vandaanangiligwa shididi.
Vandyalaligwa avalá vavénavo mitima víkave ushapu, mwaa Nnungu, vanavo vandamwona.
Vandyalaligwa avalá vatandédya amani, mwaa vanavo vandashamegwa vana vake Nnungu.
Vandyalaligwa avalá vapapatígwa kwamwaa waishaliya, mwaa vanavo utawala wakuwa wàve.
“Mundyalaligwa mwenu pavantukananga, pavampapata, pavantangalela vinu uti vyakunyata, vanambilila kwamwaa wangu nangu.
Litamange na puwangila mwaa inudyo yenu kuwa ko ing'umene. Amo nimomo mwavavatandalele vakulava mwenu mukanava.
“Mwenu ni munyu wamushilambo, napane munyu ukadalala ulota kunogwa dashi kavili? Wanavo haunavanavo kavili madengo ila pavanajaa vanu ni kuluvatanga tu.
Mwenu ni lilangadyo lyamushilambo na njini uvéle pashanya lishinga, haunapiika.
Namomo hapali ánakaledya itaa kuvika nshilongo ila vavika pashinu pakwaneka pakulota ivamulikile vanu uti vapagwíte nng'ande amo.
Nadoni inimmaikila lilangadyo lyenu limulike pakati pavanu pakulota vone matendo enu ashalowa na vamupe lishangelo Tatagwenu ávele kuwa.
“Hamunakumbukile kenga ngwidilé ndamalidya Lilamulo na Vakulava. Hangwidile ndamalidya, ngwidilé ndatadya viwikile popo vinu avyo.
Ninkumwaulila mwiu doni, shilambo shakuwa na shapai vikanava kupita, hashipali shilóta kwapuka nkati mu Lilamulo ata palukavéle lutembo kwali lukweu ludikidiki vela, vindapagwa mpaka uti vitandeke.

Woewoe álota kwiludyanga lilamulo lidikidiki pakati pamalamulo ala kutwala kuvapundisha vanu vanji vatandele momo, ajo kuutawala wakuwa, vananshema kuva ndyoko. Napane aijá álota kutandedya malamulo ala na kuvapundisha vanu vanji kutandela momo, kuutwala wakuwa ko, nae vananshema kuva nang'olo.
Napavedoni ninkumwaulila mwiu, ishaliya yenu ikanapunda yavamwalimu vadishaliya na mapalishayo, mwiko muutawala wakuwa hamwinjila.
“Mwenu mundigwa ashilá shavavaulidile vanyakala doni, ‘Haunammyae munu na woewoe álota kubyaa, vandamuukanavo paukumu.’

Napane nangu jo ninkumwaulila doni, kula munu álota kunshunalila nung'unumunu vandamuukanavo paukumu. Namomo álota kuntukana nung'unumunu, vandamuukanavo kwikamati, nakavili, ámwaulila nung'unumunu do, ‘Hauvé ding'ano!’ vandamuukanavo kumoto wakushena.
Napane ukauka ndaumya shadaka ku alutali, popo ukumbukila doni, apali nung'unumunu ávenavo mwaa namu wako,
bai shinantandi leka yakumya yo uke ukaigwanenavo nung'unumunu jo, ling'oto uje wide umye shadaka shako.
Igwania shipajelo namu waukashenienavo akuno muka kulibengi pakulota hanakupalakedye kumwe nkúukumu, nkúukumu nanae jo kukupalakedya kumwe nkúshunga kutwala nae kukujela nkalaboshi.
Ninkukwaulila mwiu doni, kushinu ako wako hauma shinu ukanava kulipanga mpaka ishingo yamwisho.
“Mwenu mundigwa ashilá shavavaulidile vanyakala doni, ‘Hamunalavalave.’
Napane nangu jo ninkumwaulila doni, kula munu álota kunnola nkongwe ang'unuka, muntima mwake mo, andilavalava tayali kwankongwe ajo.
Ikava kenga liu lyako lyakunkanakono linkukutadya utege, usha ujae kushu ko. Kudyanga ikwove imbandi imo yamili wako kuliko mili wako uti wakulinganana kujela kushena.
Ikava kenga nkanakono wako ukakutadya kutega, lumula ujae kushu ko. Kudyanga ikwove imbandi imo yamili wako kuliko mili wako uti wakulinganana kujela kushena.
“Namomo vanditangola doni, woewoe ánneka ndyagwe inimmaikila amupe italaka.
Napane nangu jo, ninkumwaulila doni, kula munu ánneka ndyagwe paukavele mwaa waugoni, ajo ankuntadya nkongwe jo alavalave. Namomo woewoe álota kunnomba nkongwe wavannakile, ankulavalava.
“Namomo mwenu mundigwa ashilá shavavaulidile vanyakala doni, ‘Haunatimbange vyaulilapidile na tandedya uti avilá vyaulilapidile kumwe Umu.’
Napane nangu jo ninkumwaulila doni, hamunalilapile mwiko, mulilapila kuwa mwaa kwanavo ko ni shiteng'u shake Nnungu,
ata hamunalilapile shilambo shapai mwaa pai apa ni lyutu lyakupumudya madodo ake, na ata hamunalilapile ku Yelusalemu mwaa wanavo ni njini umwe Umu Nang'olo.
Namomo haunalilapile muti wako mwaa wako hauulula kujalulanga yuli yako kuva yakudimba na ugwimbu wakudimba kuva yuli.
Mwenu mukashidoni, ‘Elo’ ive mwiu elo, mukashidoni ‘Mene’ ive mwiu mene. Shinji shakupunda apo, shinkwalakela kumwe aijá nkalau.
“Mwenu mundigwa ashilá shavatangwele doni, ‘Átumbula liu nanae vantumbule. Átema lino nanae vanteme.’
Napane nangu jo ninkumwaulila doni, hamunammikile makukulu nkalau. Woewoe ákukoma lilatuma kunkanakono, nshiliulile kunshanda.
Ákukashali alota akupoke ikanju yako, likoti yadavo nnakele atwale.
Woewoe ákukanyilidya muwene shuuluta shimo, wako wenanavo vyuluta vivili.
Ákujugwa shinu, mupe na aijá álota akukope, haunamwime.
“Mwenu mundigwa ashilá shavatangwele doni, ‘Nnagwaledye nkwenu na mmangedye mmongo wako.’
Napane nangu jo ninkumwaulila doni, vanagwaledye vamongo venu na vashwalidye avalá vampapáta
pakulota muve mmana mmatatagwenu ávele kuwa. Mwaa nae vanu vakalau na vambone, liduva lyake ankuvavalila na vo vanu vaishaliya na vaungave-ishaliya vo, imbula ankuvatanyela.
Da mwenu mukavanagwaledya gweka avalá vannagwalédya mulota kupata inudyo shani? Da ata avalá vakukatisha-ukodi havanatandela momo?
Namomo mukavaudyanga vanung'unumunu gweka, munkutenda shinu shani shikumene shipundíle apo? Da i mo mwavatandela vamidi?
Napavedoni mwenu inimmaikila muve mmanu mmashalowa-uti kenga Tatagwenu wakuwa, nae washalowa-uti.
“Lishunge pakulota hamunatende vitendo vyenu vyaishaliya pamevo pavanu kwambangidya vyoneke. Mukatenda davo po, Tatagwenu ávele kuwa hamupa shinu inudyo.

Napavedoni paumya lipwashalelo haunaambele lipalapanda kenga mwavatandela vanu vamalambi muvitala vyakulipudidya na mudibalabala valota vapate lishangelo kwavanu. Ninkumwaulila mwiu doni vanavo tayali vandipata inudyo yave.
Wako paumya lipwashalelo, shitandéka kunkanakono kwako, nkono nshanda wo haunamanye
pakulota lipwashalelo lyako live lyashipii. Nadoni Tatamunu áona kwashipii, andakupa inudyo.

“Napanelo pamushwali hamunave kenga avalá vanu vamalambi. Vanavo kuvanagwela kushwali vaimidile muvitala vyakulipudidya na nanyenje dibalabala pakulota vaaneke kwavanu. Ninkumwaulila mwiu doni, vovo vo tayali vandipata inudyo yave.
Wako ukalota kushwali injila kushumba shako ushime nnango wo utwale ushwali unjugwe Tatako ávele mushipii. Nadoni Tatako áona kwashipii andakupa inudyo.
Pamushwali hamunaujidyeujidye malove kenga mwavatandela vamidi. Vanavo vandákumbukila doni pavaujidyaujidya kutangola, vyavajugwa avilá vindaigwinika.
Mwenu hamunave kenga vanavo! Tatagwenu, ata mukanava kunjugwa, nae andimanya kaladavo ashilá shamulóta.
Napenelo amu ni mwakushwalidya mwenu, “ ‘Atata wetu úvele kuwa, lina lyako liilimyangike,
utawala wako wide, malotelo ako atandeke, mushilambo shapai kenga kuwa.
Ligung'u lyetu lyakula liduva, tupa nelo.
Makosha etu, tulivaliva kenga mo mwatuvalivalivila wetu vatutagela.
Haunatuukenavo kukutubigwa kanji tuposha kumakono kumwe nkalau.’
“Mwaa mukavalivaliva vanu kupujungula kwave, nanae Tatagwenu ávele kuwa anannivaliva mwenu.
Napane mukanavalivaliva vanu, nanae Tatagwenu hannivaliva kupujungula kwenu.

“Napanelo pamunga hamunalilodye kuva mushipalodi kenga mwavatandela vanu vamalambi. Vanavo vandányadyanyadyanga kumevo valilodye kwavanu kenga vandyunga. Ninkumwaulila mwiu doni, vovo vo tayali vandipata inudyo yave.
Napane wako paunga, navanga medi kumevo mmuti mo, pakala mauta
pakulota vanu havanakumanye kenga undyunga. Akumanye gweka Tatamunu ávele mushipii na jo Tatamunu áona kwashipii, andakupa inudyo.
“Napanelo hamunalikandyedye mali mushilambo shapai mwavananganga vinu ushwa na umandi, mwavatutumula vakwiva kutwala kwiva.
Kondya mali enu kuwa, kwanavo ushwa na umandi havanaulula shinu kwanonga na kwavakatutumula vakwiva.
Po palota kupagwa mali ako ntima wako undapagwa popo.
“Liu ni shenje shamili. Liu lyako likava lingumi, mili uti lindaumbala lilangadyo.
Kanji liu lyako likava lilwele, mili wako uti shindaumbala shii. Napanelo lilangadyo mumili mwako likava shii, shii asho mwaa shani shilota kwilimyanga namene!
“Hapali munu wakuulula kuvatumikila vanang'olo vavili. Jumo anammangedya, junji jo kunnagwaledya; jumo kumwigwilila, junji jo kumwiludyanga. Mwenu hamuulula kuntumikila Nnungu akuno mutumikila mali.

“Napavedoni nangu ninkumwaulila hamunaangaikangile shingumi shenu kwa ashilá shamulota kulya kwali shamulota kukumbila na ata mili vyenu kwa ashilá shakulota kugwadya. Da shingumi i shinu shikumene kupunda shakulya na mili i shinu shamana kupunda dinguvo?
Lola vyuni vyulukánga kuniania. Vyanavo havinapanda, havinanang'ena na havivenavo vidimbi. Ata ivele davo Tatagwenu ávele kuwa ankulisha. Kushi mwenu po hamuvenavo mana namene kupunda vyuni?
Wakwashi pakati penu na kwangaikanga kwake ankuulula kwanjadyedya isaa imo vela yashingumi shake?
“Napanelo mwaa shani dinguvo dyo, munkwangaikila? Lola maukutu adinduva mumwitu mo mwakulumukila. Anavo madengo hanakola na hanalikandyangidya dinguvo.
Nangu ninkumwaulila kushidoni, ata jo Shalomoni jo na lishangelo lyake uti, hagwalidile kulinganana na anavo.
Napane ikava kenga maukutu amumwitu anáma jo nelo lunduno kujela pamoto Nnungu ankunnemya, kushi mwenu mmanu mmalikulupililo lidikidiki hannemya kupunda apo?
“Bai mwenu hamunaangaikange muushidoni, ‘Tulota kulya nyamani?’, ‘Tulota kukumbila nyamani?’, ‘Tulota kugwala nyamani?’
Doni, vinu avyo uti vamidi ni vaangaikangíla. Tatagwenu wakuwa ankumanya kenga uti avyo mwenu munkulota.
Mwenu kanji shitandi angaikangila utawala na ishaliya yake; vinu vinji vyo, vinanjadyeka.
Nadoni hamunangaikangile liduva lyalunduno mwaa vyalunduno, vyalunduno. Migagolo vyaliduva limo vinkutosha kwaliduva lyolyo.
“Hamunavaukumu vanu kwambangidya namwenu hamunaukumigwe na Nnungu.
Mwaa mo mwamulota kuvaukumila vavenu, namwenu Nnungu anamukumila momo. Shipimo shosho shamulota kuvapimila vavenu, namwenu Nnungu anampimila shosho.
Mwaa shani unkwona shikoko muliu lyanung'unumunu kutwala kwiludyanga likangolo livéle muliu mwako?
Umwaulila dashi nung'unumunu doni, ‘Leka ndikushe shikoko muliu mo,’ akuno muliu mwako lishingeme likangolo likumene?
Umunu washinankulaba davo gwe! Shitandi likangolo lishingéme muliu mwako mo, usha. Apo undalola shana kutwala kusha shikoko asho muliu lyanung'unumunu.
“Hamunavape vang'avanga vinu vyakwilimyanga na ata hamunavape vanguluve majanga amali. Vovo vo vankuulula kuluvatanga kutwala kumuujila mwemwe mmene kunshapwalanga.
“Jugwa mundapata, lambela mundona na taa odi vananshimulila.
Kula munu ánajugwa vandámupa, ánalambela andóna na ánataa odi vanánshimulila.
Wakwashi pakati penu ánatenda mwanagwe akanjugwa ligung'u nae kumupa lijanga?
Kwali akanjugwa yomba nae kumupa nyoka?
Ikava kenga mwenu pamo na ukalau wenu munkumanya kuvapa vanavenu vyambone, kushi Tatagwenu ávele kuwa hamamodya kuvapa vinu vyambone avalá vanjúgwa?
Napavedoni kula shinu shamulota mwenu vavenu vantandele, namwenu vanavo vatandele vyovyo mwaa lyolyo ali ni Lilamulo na Vakulava.
“Injilila pannango udikidiki mwaa indila na nnango uvaúkanavo vanu kukubamalegwa, ùkumene. Vainjilíla amo, vavelé voe.
Pakuva nnango wo, ùdikidiki na indila yo, ìdikidiki yúka kushingumi, vaanaléla nnango awo me vavé padyoko!
“Lishunge kwavakulava vakushang'apa. Vanavo vankumwidila mwenu vàgwalenge magwogwe adingandolo kanji mmitima myave vàvele mavinji akukalipa.
Vanavo mundavamanya kwadindila dyavyepo vyave. Da vandépa dyuwe mwinalala kwali kwepa nshambalau mulilonga?
Nadoni kula nnandi wakukonda upa vyepo vyambone napane úkakondile upa vyepo vyakunyalanyalanga.
Hainaulukika shinu nnandi wakukonda kupa vyepo vyakunyalanyalanga na úkakondile kupa vyepo vyambone.
Kula nnandi úkapa vyepo vyambone vandálumula kujela pamoto.
Napavedoni vanavo mundavamanya kwadindila dyavyepo vyave.
“I uti avalá vangwaulíla ‘Umu, Umu’ vandainjila muutawala wakuwa, ila aijá átandedya malotelo ake Atata ávele kuwa.
Muliduva alyo vanu voe vanangwaulila doni, ‘Umu, Umu! Da wetu palina lyako hatulavile, palina lyako hatukumulenge majini na palina lyako hatutandile vyamakango vyoe?’
Ni apo pangulota kuvaulila ngala doni, ‘Mwiko hanimmanyite. Ngunyema apa mwenu mútandedya ungave-lilamulo.’
“Napavedoni kula munu áigwilila malove angu na kutandedya mwalatangalakela, ankuva kenga munu wamang'amung'amu ádangile ing'ande yake pashanya lijanga lyakulitandika.
Medi kutonya, dyundi kuumbalanga, imepo kupunga yuka shalatoto na ing'ande ayo kanji ing'ande yo kugwa do mene mwaa wakudenga palijanga.
Napane kula munu áigwilila malove angu kanji mene kutandedya mwalatangalakela, ankuva kenga munu ákave ding'ano ádangile ing'ande yake palitimbwitimbwi.
Medi kutonya, dyundi kuumbalanga, imepo kupunga yuka shalatoto na ing'ande ayo kutwala ing'ande yo, kujiuka.”
Bai Yesu pamalidile kutangola malove alo, dimbumba dyavanu dindíshanga namene mapundisho ake
mwaa nae ashipundisha kenga munu ávenavo madalaka i kenga vamwalimu vave vadishaliya.
Napanelo Yesu pashulwike palishinga dimbumba dyavanu dindímwoda.
Mwe! Popo po kumwidila munu jumo wamalemba mumili kunguguvalila kutwala kushidoni, “Nang'olo, ukalota unkuulula kungutadya ngutakate!”
Yesu kunyalodya nkono wake kunkwaa kushidoni, “Elo ndilota, takata!” Malemba lo kulambalakenneu, mili wo kutakata.
Yesu kutwala kumwaulila kushidoni, “Wako, haunamwaulile munu ila wena ukalilodye kwankúlangalalela-shadaka, umye shadaka shalamulidile Musha pakulota uve ushuda kwavanavo.”
Napanelo Yesu ainjila nkaja mu Kapalanaumu andímwidila nang'olo jumo wavaing'ondo miya wavaloma nanjugwangila aashidoni,
“Nang'olo, ntumika wangu andididimanga magwangwa na nnwele namene.”
Yesu kushidoni, “Nangu ndaida namponia.”
Nang'olo wavaing'ondo do, “Nang'olo, nangu hanguvaikidile kungwidila wako kwing'ande kwangu. Wako tangola lilove limo tu, ntumika wangu andapona.

Mwaa ata nanangu momo ninkupagwa mwina madalaka na ninkuvanavo vaing'ondo vandivalamulila. Ndámwaulila jumo doni, ‘Wena!’ Nae kuukinneu. Kumwaulila junji doni, ‘Ida!’ Nae kwidinneu. Namomo ndámwaulila ntumika wangu, ‘Tenda ashi!’ Nae kutandenneu shosho.”
Yesu paigwite malove ala andíshanga na andívaulila avalá váshimwoda kushidoni, “Ninkumwaulila mwiu doni, ku Ishilaeli akuno hangunava kumwona munu walikulupililo kenga aju.
Nangu ninkumwaulila, vandaaloka vanu voe nkono wakwalyalakela liduva na wakwalyenda liduva kwida ndaikala namu Abulaamu, Ishaki namu Yakobo pandamu muutawala wakuwa
napane avalá vene utawala kujalegwa panda kushii. Kwanavo ko kundapagwa shililo na kutuka shulu nkanywa.”
Bai Yesu andímwaulila nang'olo wavaing'ondo aijá kushidoni, “Wena! Vitandeke kenga mo mwaukulupilidile.” Mwisaa yoyo, ntumika jo kuponneu.
Napanelo Yesu pawikile paing'ande imwe Patulu anínkodya nkwegwe Patulu àlele paigoli umpwateka mili
nae kunkwaa mmakono, mili wo kuponenneu kutakatuka kutunduvanga kuntumika.
Muwakati wayalyulo vanu kuvaidanavo kumwe Yesu vamajini voe. Nae majini lo, kwalilove lyake andíkumulanga namomo valwele uti andívaponia.
Napavedoni lindíwikila popo lilove lyatangwéle nkúlava Ishaiya doni, “Kudabadabanga kwetu, anditwala jo mwene, malwele etu, andilitika.”
Napanelo Yesu akone imbumba yavanu intang'anadidye andívalamulila vakwoda vake vaamboke vauke litanda nkono unji.
Mwalimu jumo wadishaliya anímmandika kumwaulila, “Mwalimu, nangu ndakwoda kwoekwoe kwaulota kuka.”
Yesu kushidoni, “Vanansheto vankuvanavo vivava, vyuni vyakuniania vinkuvanavo vyanda kanji Mwana Wamunu havé pashinu pakwijamidya muti wake.”
Nkwóda wake junji, “Nang'olo, nguleka shitandi nguke ndikanshike atata.”
Yesu kushido, “Ngwoda! Valeke vakupela vavashike vakupelamwave.”
Napanelo nae painjidile mwingalava vakwoda vake vandímwoda.
Mwe! Mulitanda mo kulipuka shimbunga shakujowa shíshitadya mawimbi kugang'ola-gang'ola ingalava, Yesu akuno àlele lwono.
Vakwoda vake kumuukila ndamwimulanga vaashidoni, “Nang'olo tuposha, wetu kupela aku!”
Nae kushidoni, “Mwenu mmanu mmalikulupililo lidikidiki mwaa shani munkujopa?” Nae kutakatuka apalá kutangalela shimbunga sho pamo na litanda, vyanavo kulimaladya do, kimyaa.
Bai vanavo vandíshanga vaashidoni, “Da munu aju avalalelé mwashi átenda ata mpaka imepo na litanda kumwigwilila?”
Yesu akawike litanda mwangu unji yani isemu yavagadalenu, vandímwidila vanu vavili vamajini váshaalakela kumakabuli. Vanavo vashindajowa namene mpaka kutadya indila ayo mene kupitika.
Mwe! Vanavo kukugwanga pashanya po vaashidoni, “Yesu mwanagwe Nnungu! Da wako ulota nyamani kumili kwetu wetu? Da widilé ndatupa shaushanga wakati wake ukanava kuwika?”
Napanelo mwakushu padyoko shindípagwa shipinga shikumene shavanguluve shíshipita shilya.
Alalá majini anínjugwangila Yesu aashidoni, “Pakuva unkutukumulanga, bai tulamulila tuke tukavainjile vanguluve avalá.”
Nae do, “Wenananga!” Mwe! Majini lo kuumananga kuka ndaviinjilanga vanguluve kutwala shipinga uti shavanguluve kwalalela mwibondi kuka ndalijalanga mulitanda kuwanga.
Avalá vakushunga-dinguluve vandyúma vatukuta kuka kukaja ndavalanganga uti vinu vitandéke na vivatandéke avalá vanu vamajini.
Mwe! Vanu uti vapalikaja alyo kumuukila Yesu. Vakankodye vanínjugwangila aume mushilambo shave.
Napanelo Yesu akakwele mwingalava, andyámboka litanda kuka kukaja kwake.

Mwe! Popo po, vanu kumwidanavo munu wakudidimanga mili vànadidye mwigoli. Yesu pagwene likulupililo lyave, andímwaulila wakudidimanga jo kushidoni, “Mwanangu lyunge ntima! Madambi ako andilivalivika.”
Mwe! Pakati pavamwalimu vadishaliya kutangadikanga shivenevene vaashidoni, “Aju ankukupulu.”
Yesu amanya makumbukililo ave andívaulila doni, “Mwaa shani munkukumbukila kunyata mmitima myenu?
Shakwashi shíkakamadyenge kutangola? Ni kushidoni, ‘Madambi ako andilivalivika,’ kwali kushidoni, ‘Takatuka twala mwanda uke’?
Napane pakulota mumanye doni, Mwana Wamunu ankuvanavo madalaka akulivalivila madambi mushilambo amu…” andímwaulila wakudidimanga jo kushidoni, “Takatuka! Twala igoli yako uke kwing'ande kwako.”
Nae kutakatuka kuka kwing'ande kwake.
Bai imbumba yavanu paigwene shitendo asho vandíjopa namene kutwala kumupa lishangelo Nnungu ávapele vanu madalaka ainamuna ai.
Napanelo Yesu paumile apo andímwona munu jumo walina Mateu àikele pashitala shaukodi. Nae kumwaulila doni, “Ngwoda!” Mateu kutakatuka kumwoda.
Yesu àvele nng'ande mwake Mateu alya na vakwoda vake, mwe! Kwida vakukatisha-ukodi voe na vakutega, nae kulyanavo.
Mapalishayo pavagwene davo kutwala kuvaudya vakwoda vake, “Mwaa shani mwalimu wenu alya na vakukatisha-ukodi pamo na vakutega?”
Yesu paigwite malove alo kushidoni, “Vangumi havanannambela nkúlaula. Vanánnambela nkúlaula, valwele.
Wena mukalipundishe mana amalove ala, ‘Shangulota ni shididi i shadaka.’ Nangu hangwidile ndavashema vaishaliya ila vakutega.”
Napanelo vakwoda vake Nshuwau vandímuukila Yesu ndamudya, “Wetu pamo na mapalishayo tundáunga, kushi vakwoda vako me havanaunga?”
Yesu kushidoni, “Ilota kuulukika dashi vanu vakulalikigwa pashitamu kuvanavo shipalodi mwene nkúlomba àpagwite popo? Undawika wakati wavalota kumumya nkúlomba pakati pave. Bai apo ni pavalota kunga.
Hapali ánatwala shipande shainguvo íkalikukutike kutenda shivamba mwinguvo yakala. Mwaa shosho sho shindalakananga na inguvo yakala kutwala lilanga lyo kumamodya.

Namomo havanataa ugwalwa wavinyu waambi muvitumba vyamagwogwe vyakala. Ukatenda davo vitumba vyo vindapapuka, ugwalwa wo kujaikanga, vitumba avyo kutwala kwanangeka. Mene, ugwalwa wavinyu waambi vataa muvitumba vyaambi undona vinu avyo uti, kushungika.”
Akuno atangola malove alo, mwe! Kuwika apalá nkútawala jumo kunguguvalila kutwala kushidoni, “Mwanangu mwali andipela ambi apa. Napane tuke ukammikile makono na nae andanama!”
Yesu kutakatuka pamo na vakwoda vake kumwoda nae.
Mwe! Nkongwe jumo e auwíle vyaka kumi na mbili ulwele úkavele wakumalala kutumila kummandika Yesu, kukwaa nkumbu waikanju yake.
Nae ashona doni, “Kona ngukwaa yo ikanju yake ai, ndapona.”
Yesu kushiliuka. Pangwene, kumwaulila kushidoni, “Lyunge ntima mwanangu. Likulupililo lyako lindikuponia.” Kutunduvangila muwakati wowo nkongwe jo kupona.
Yesu akawika paing'ande imwe nkútawala aijá, akavona vanu vamwomba kanyembe pashililo po na kwona imbumba yavanu ililanga.
Nae kutwala kushidoni, “Umananga, mwali jo hanapela shinu ankulala.” Vanavo kumweka.
Napane ling'oto lyakuvaumadyanga vanu nng'ande mo, Yesu andíinjila kunkamula mwali nkono, mwali jo kutakatuka.
Nadoni dyabali dyashitendo ashi dindyándavala mwisemu ayo uti.
Napanelo Yesu paumile apo, vandímwoda vakuputala mevo vavili vakugwa pashanya po vaashidoni, “Mwanagwe Daudi, twanangila shididi!”
Akainjila nng'ande, vakuputala mevo vo kummandika nae kuvaudya, “Mwenu munkukulupila mwiu kenga nangu ninkuulula kumwangangola?” Vanavo do, “Elo nang'olo.”
Yesu kuvakwaa mevo ave kushidoni, “Intandeke kulingana na likulupililo lyenu.”
Vanavo mevo ave andyújila kulola shana. Yesu kutwala kuvalaililila namene aashidoni, “Shitendo ashi hamunamwaulile munu.”
Napane vanavo vakaume apo ni kupita vaandadya dyabali adyo mwisemu ayo uti.
Vovo vo vauka, mwe! Vanu vakamwidanavo munu jumo bubu walijini.
Pavakumulenge lijini lyo, bubu jo kutangolenneu. Dimbumba dyavanu dindíshanga kutwala kushidoni, “Shitendo kenga ashi hashinava kwaneka akuno ku Ishilaeli!”
Mapalishayo kanji kushidoni, “Aju ankukumulanga majini kwadimongo dyake nang'olo wave majini.”
Napanelo Yesu ashindatanela minjini uti na makaja apita apundisha muvitala vyakulipudidya avalanganga ntenga wambone wautawala, aponia vilwele na mauvilo uti.
Nae akone dimbumba kwadimbumba dyavanu andyánangila shididi mwaa wakuvona kudabadabanga na kujaikanga kenga dingandolo díkave nkúshunga.
Napavedoni andívaulila vakwoda vake doni, “Mwiu mapuno avé oe napane vamadengo vavé padyoko.
Napavedoni mwenu njugwe mwene mapuno pakulota avatumidye vamadengo mumapuno ake.”
Napanelo Yesu akavashema vakwoda vake kumi na mbili kuvapa madalaka kwamajini mashapu, akuvakumulanga, akuponia vilwele na mauvilo uti.
Mena avamyombe avo kumi na mbili ni ala: ntandi, Simoni wavanshema Patulu pamo na nung'une walina Andaleya, kwatika Tiyagu mwanagwe Shebedeu pamo na nung'une walina Nshuwau,
kwida Pilipo namu Balutolomeu, naida Tome namu Mateu aijá nkúkatisha-ukodi, naatika Tiyagu mwanagwe Alupeu namu Tadeu,
kwida Simoni wa ku Kanaa, namalilila Yudashi Shikaliyote aijá e annimídye Yesu.
Napanelo Yesu andívatuma avalá kumi na mbili avalaililila doni, “Kwavamidi, hamunauke na ata minjini vyavashamaliya, hamunainjile
ila vaukile vanaishilaeli, vo vangandolo vajaikénge vo.
Mwamulota kupita mo, valanganga ntenga au, ‘Utawala wakuwa undivandika.’
Valwele vaponie, vakupela vadyuwe, vamalemba vatadye vatakate na majini kumulanga. Mwenu mupatilé monyo, namwenu momo jaula monyo.
Mmikaka myenu mo hamunanyukate njuluku woe kwali padyoko.
Hamunanyukate ikoba, dikanju mbili, vilatu na ata ipimbo. Mmádengo inimmaikila apate shakulya shake.
“Panjini woewoe kwali palikaja lyoelyoe lyamulota kwinjila, nnambele munu ávaikidile mutwale mwikale paing'ande pake mpaka muliduva lyamulota kutumuka.
Pamuwika paing'ande po, vaudyange vene ing'ande.
Ikava kenga vanu vaing'ande ayo vandivaikila, amani yenu ipagwe na vanavo. Ikanava davo, amani yo imuujile mmene.
Napanelo munu woewoe ákalota kumpwashalela kwali kumwigwilila malove enu, pamuma paing'ande po kwali panjini po, pumunanga litutunga mmadodo mwenu.
Ninkumwaulila mwiu doni, muliduva lyaukumu shilambo sha ku Shodoma na sha ku Gomola vindadyanga kuliko likaja alyo.
“Mwenu, nangu ninkuntumidya kenga mmangandolo shing'ati mavinji. Napavedoni ava mmajanja kenga dinyoka na múkavele makukulu kenga ding'unda.
Lilaledye kwavanu. Vanavo vanantwala mwenu kumuukanavo mudikamati na muvitala vyave vyakulipudidya, vananshapa viboko.
Vandamuukanavo kwavanang'olo vamajimbo na kwavaumu kwamwaa wangu nangu pakulota muve mmashuda vangu kwavanavo na kwavamidi.
Napane vakankamudya kwavanavo, hamunajugulange mukumbukila mwakutangalela kwali shakutangola. Shakutangola sho, mundapata muwakati wowo
mwaa hamunava shinu mwenu múlota kutangola ila ni Imumu watatagwenu átangola mmitima myenu.
“Nung'unumunu anannimya nung'unumunu pakulota vampedye. Tatamunu anannimya mwanamunu. Vana vandavatenda ing'ondo vatatamunu na kuvabyaa.
Vanu uti vanammangedya kwamwaa wangu nangu napane aijá álota kulipililila mpaka kumwisho andaambwalegwa.
Panjini umo vakampapata tukutila njini unji. Ninkumwaulila mwiu doni, hamumalila shinu minjini uti vya ku Ishilaeli Mwana Wamunu ákanava kwida.
“Nkwóda hanalangalela kumpunda mwalimu wake na ntumika hanalangalela kumpunda nang'olo wake.

Nkwóda akava kenga mwalimu wake panditosha na ntumika akava kenga nang'olo wake panditosha. Napanelo ikava kenga tatamunu wapaing'ande vaninshema kuva Beelishebuli, kushi avalá valikola vapaing'ande pake i nimpomo?
“Napavedoni vanavo hamunavajope. Hashipali shinu shilipiídye shíkaundukuka na hashipali shinu shashipii shíkaumilila kulangele.
Vyandimwaulila kushii tangalela kulangele na vyamwigwa kumatu valangangila panantutuvilo.
Hamunavajope avalá vabyáa mili vákaulula kubyaa ungumi ila njope jo áulula kubamola uti mili ungumi kushena.
Da hamunashumidya vyuni vivili kwaidoshi imo? Kanji vovo vo hapali ata jumo álota kugwa pai bila mwene Tatagwenu kuungila nkono.
Ata wo ugwimbu wammyuti vyenu Nnungu andimanya ishabu yake.
Napavedoni hamunajope mwaa mwenu ni múvenavo mana namene kuliko vyuni vité kwinjipa.
“Napanelo kula munu álota kunguvalanganga nangu pamevo pavanu, nanangu nammalanganga pamevo pake Atata ávele kuwa.
Napane aijá álota kungukana pamevo pavanu nanangu nankana pamevo pake Atata ávele kuwa.
“Hamunakumbukile kenga nangu ngwidinavo amani mushilambo amu. Hangwidinavo amani, ngwidinavo ing'ondo.
Nangu ngwidilé ndatadya, “ ‘Mwana nnume ammangedye tatamunu, mwana nkongwe ammangedye jujumunu, nannombwa ammangedye navyalamunu.
Vammongo vamunu vandava vo valikola vake jo mwene.’

“Aijá ánnagwaledya namene tatake kwali anyoke kuliko mwangunagwaladyedya nangu, ajo kwangu nangu havaikidile. Namomo aijá ánnagwaledya namene mwanagwe nnume kwali nkongwe kuliko mwangunagwaladyedya nangu, ajo momo kwangu nangu, havaikidile.
Munu ákalitika nshalaba wake kungwoda nangu, kwangu nangu havaikidile.
Aijá ánamatila shingumi shake andakatoka na aijá ákatoka shingumi shake kwamwaa wangu nangu andanamatila.
“Ámpwashalela mwenu, angupwashalela nangu na ángupwashalela nangu, ampwashalela aijá ángutumididye.
Aijá ámpwashalela nkúlava kwamwaa wakuva nkúlava andapata inudyo kenga nkúlava. Namomo ámpwashalela munu waishaliya kwamwaa wakuva waishaliya andapata inudyo kenga waishaliya.
Ninkumwaulila mwiu doni, munu álota kumupa luwene vela alu lwamedi akukumbila ndyoko jumo pakati pavadyoko ava kwamwaa wakuva nkwóda wangu nangu, ajo mwiko hakatoka inudyo yake.”
Napanelo Yesu pamalidile kuvapa malailililo vakwoda vake kumi na mbili avalá, andyúma kuka ndapundisha na ndavalanganga ntenga mumakaja aisemu ayo.
Nshuwau jo àvele nkalaboshi, paigwite uti vinu vyashitenda Klistu andívatuma vakwoda vake
vakamudye doni, “Da wako ni aijá úshilota kwida kwali tunnindile junji?”
Yesu kushidoni, “Wena mukamwaulile Nshuwau jo vyamwigwa na vyamwona avi.
Vakuputala mevo vankupata kulola, vakudidimanga madodo vankuwena, vamalemba vankuvatadya kutakata, vákaigwa vankwigwa, vakupela vankuvadyuwa na vamashikini vankuvalangangiligwa ntenga wambone.
Andijaligwa aijá ákangunyatila nangu.”

Napanelo vakwoda vake Nshuwau akuno vauma, Yesu andítunduvanga kumanyiya imbumba yavanu ing'ano imwe Nshuwau aashidoni, “Da mwenu muukile ndalola nyamani kushimbweshe akulá? Muukile ndalola udani úshipunga imepo?
Da muukile ndalola nyamani? Nannola munu ágwalidile dinguvo dyabei? Mwenu, vanu vagwalíla dinguvo dyabei vaikala muding'ande dyavaumu.
Kanji napanelo muukile ndalola nyamani? Muukile nannola nkúlava? Elo, ninkumwaulila doni, nae pankulava po, andipunda.
Aju ni aijá wavamwandike doni, “ ‘Mushu mwako, nannangaledya múntenga wangu, nae andakukandyangidya indila yako.’

“Ninkumwaulila mwiu doni, pakati pavanu vamushilambo shapai ashi, haumilidile nkúlava ámpundile Nshuwau Wakubatisha. Ata ive davo aijá ndikidiki muutawala wakuwa wo, nae ni nang'olo ámpundile Nshuwau jo.
Kutunduvangila wakati umwe Nshuwau Wakubatisha mpaka ambi apa, utawala wakuwa unkuka na dimongo na valikanyilídya vankwinjila.
Mwaa Vakulava uti pamo na Lilamulo vandilava mpaka Nshuwau
napane ikava kenga munkuulula kwamini, bai nae ni jojo Liyashi áshilindiligwa kwida.
Aijá ávenavo matu akwigwidya, aigwe.
“Napanelo vanu vaimbula ai ndivalinganiange na nyamani? Vanavo vavelé kenga vadyoko vaikalénge mumautu aumbala vaulanila doni,
“ ‘Tundimwambela magoma, mwenu hamuvinile. Tundimba dimu dyashililo, mwenu hamulidile.’
“Shapo lola, andida Nshuwau pakalya na pakakumbila, mwenu muushidoni, ‘Anintawala lijini ajo.’

Andida Mwana Wamunu alya na akumbila, mwenu muushidoni, ‘Nnole munu wakululuka na lilevi, njave vakukatisha-ukodi na vakutega.’ Kanji napane limanyilo lyake Nnungu linkulilodya kuva lyashaliya nkati muvitendo vyake.”
Yesu napane kutwala kutunduvanga kutangadikanga minjini vyatandile makango oe mwaa havalotíle kulijugulanga,
“Upambale wako Kolashimu! Upambale wako Beteshaida! Makango atandéke kwenu leka àtandeke ku Tilu namu ku Shidoni, vanavo doni vàlijugulenge tangu kala. Doni vàlitaenge maguni na vàpakalenge liu.
Nangu ninkumwaulila mwiu doni, muliduva lyaukumu vatilu namu vashidoni vandadyanga kuliko mwenu.
Nawako Kapalanaumu! Da ulota kulikwedya mpaka kuwa? Bai vandakupandamwalela kumoka. Makango atandéke kwako wako leka àtandeke ku Shodoma, njini awo ukandipagwa mpaka nelo.
Napane nangu ninkukwaulila mwiu doni, muliduva lyaukumu shilambo sha ku Shodoma shindadyanga kuliko mwenu.”
Napanelo muwakati awo Yesu andítangola kushidoni, “Ninkukulambwalela Atata, Umu wakuwa na pai, pakuvapiyanga vinu avi vanu valimanyilo na valipundishídye kuvalodya vanu vila.
Elo Atata, mwaa amu ni momo mwaulatalele umwene.
Vinu uti aningukamudya Atata. Hapali junji ámmanyite Mwana ila Atata na hapali ámmanyite Atata ila Mwana pamo namu aijá walota kunnodya mwene Mwana.
“Idananga kwangu mwenu uti díndabadabyenge dibasha, nangu nampumudya.
Lyunge likangoti lyangu na lipundishe kwangu. Nangu ni wakulimaladya na wantima wakulishapeya na mwenu mundapata kupumula kwaungumi wenu.
Mwaa likangoti lyangu halinapwateka shinu na ibasha yangu inkugaluka.”
Napanelo muwakati awo Yesu apita mulishamba lyangano muliduva lyakupumula, vakwoda vake indívakola indala kutwala kumpulula ngano kumamena.
Mapalishayo pavagwene davo vakaashidoni, “Wako, vakwoda vako vankutenda shinu shilaéka muliduva lyakupumula.”
Yesu kushidoni, “Da mwenu hamunava kushomya vyatandíle Daudi painkodíle indala pamo na avalá vavenavo?
Nae jo andíinjila nng'ande mwake Nnungu kulya alalá magung'u avashimuumidya Nnungu, magung'u áshilaeka kulya nae pamo na vavagwe ila gweka vakulangalalela-shadaka.
Kwali hamunava kushomya mu Lilamulo pavaandike doni, vakulangalalela-shadaka vankunyatyanga liduva lyakupumula nng'ande mwake Nnungu pavakavanavo makosha?
Bai nangu ninkumwalila doni, apa apali nang'olo kuliko ing'ande yake Nnungu.
Mwenu leka mumanyite mana amalove ala, ‘Shangulota ni shididi i shadaka,’ hamukanavaukumu vanu vákave makosha.
Mwaa kwaliduva lyakupumula, Mwana Wamunu, Umu.”
Paumile apo andyúka ndainjila mushitala shave shakulipudidya.
Mwe! Mo mushitala mo kupagwa munu jumo wakudidimanga nkono. Vanavo valota vapate shakunkanidyanga Yesu, vandímudya, “Da lilamulo linkutuleka kumponia munu muliduva lyakupumula?”
Yesu kushidoni, “Da wakwashi pakati penu álota kutenda akavanavo ngandolo wake, ngandolo ajo kulijela mulipondo muliduva lyakupumula kutwala nae mene kuka ndamumya?
Kushi munu jo i nimpomo kuvanavo mana makumene kuliko ngandolo. Napavedoni muliduva lyakupumula lyo, linkutuleka tutende wambone.”
Nae kutwala kumwaulila munu jo kushidoni, “Nyalodya nkono wako wo!” Nae kunyalodya kutwala nkono wo kupona kuva kenga mo mwauvalalele unji.
Bai mapalishayo pavaumanenge nshitala amulá, vandíikala shemba pakulota vammalidye.
Yesu pamanyite nnugu wave, mulyutu alyo andílyumadyanga kutwala imbumba ing'umene yavanu kumwoda, nae valwele uti kuvaponia.
Napanelo andívaduma havanatadye kummanya vanu
pakulota liwikile popo lilove litangaléke na nkúlava Ishaiya doni,
“Nnole ntumika wangu wanintandwele, nae ni wakunagwaleka wangulitamangila muungumi wangu. Nammika Imumu wangu, na nae andavalanganga kwavamidi ishaliya yangu.
Jojo jo hapwatana na munu na ata hakugwanga, hapagwa munu wakwigwa mudibalabala lidi lyake.
Nae lupambai lupwajikénge hatema, lutambi lututuma lyoi hadima, mpaka atadye ishaliya iteme.
Kwake nae vamidi vandavanavo lilindilililo.”
Napanelo vanu vandímwidanavo kumwe Yesu munu jumo walijini, wakuputala mevo na bubu nae kumponia, munu jo kutangola na kulola.
Imbumba uti yavanu indishanga iishidoni, “Da aju, ava jo mwanagwe Daudi?”
Kanji mapalishayo pavaigwite davo kushidoni, “Munu aju mwakumulangila majini ni kwaindila imwe Beelishebuli nang'olo wave majini.”

Yesu amanya makumbukililo avo andívaulila kushidoni, “Kula utawala ukalijavanianga ubyaananga shivenevene, utawala awo undatimbikanga. Haupali njini kwali likola lilijavaniánga kutandana ing'ondo shivenevene lilóta kulikukumula.
Shatwani akalikumulanga jo mwene, ankulijavanianga, napane utawala wake ulota kulikukumula dashi?
Ikava kenga nangu ninkukumulanga majini kwaindila imwe Beelishebuli, kushi vadyoko venu vakumulanga kwaindila imwe nyani? Bai vovo vandava vakuukumu venu.
Napane ikava kenga ninkukumulanga majini kwaindila ya Imumu wake Nnungu, bai manya doni utawala wa Nnungu mwenu po, undimwikila.
“Da mwashi munji mwakwinjilila nng'ande mwamunu wadimongo ndakuunganga vyang'ande mwake mukanave shitandi kumunga mwene ing'ande jo? Ni apo palota kuulula kukuunganga vyang'ande.
Aijá ákalyunganianga namu nangu, ankunguvangedya na aijá ákakungaila pamo namu nangu, ankumwadilanga.
Napavedoni ninkumwaulila, madambi na kukupulu uti kundalivalivigwa napane kunkupulu Imumu Wanashwe hakulivalivigwa.
Munu álota kuntangola kunyata Mwana Wamunu, analivalivigwa napane áija álota kuntangola kunyata Imumu Wanashwe, halivalivigwa ata muwakati au na ata muwakati ulóta kwida.
“Nnandi wakukonda upa vyepo vyambone, nnandi wakunyalanyalanga upa vyepo vyakunyalanyalanga. Kwaindila yavyepo vyake ni paulota kumanya nnandi awo.
Mmanu mmashinankulaba mmakunyata mitima mwe! Mwenu mulota kutangola dashi malove ambone akuno mùvele mmanu mmakunyata mitima? Munu atangola vimuumbéle muntima mwake.
Munu wakwalala ntima, mulipeta lyake lyambone aumya vinu vyambone. Munu wakunyata ntima, mulipeta lyake lyakunyata aumya vinu vyakunyata.
Nangu ninkumwaulila doni, muliduva lyaukumu vanu vandajang'ulanga malove uti akudidimanga.
Kwamalove ako undapata shaliya na kwa lo malove ako undaukumigwa.”
Napanelo pakati pamapalishayo na vamwalimu vadishaliya vandímwaulila Yesu, “Mwalimu, tulota wako ututandele shimanyikilo twone.”
Nae akavajang'ula kushidoni, “Ni imbula yaukalau na yakulavalava ijúgwa shimanyikilo. Havalodya munu shimanyikilo shinji ila ashilá shankúlava Janashi.
Mo mwapagwidídye Janashi munda mwasamaki maduva matatu shilo na mui, yadavo andapagwa Mwana Wamunu maduva matatu shilo na mui pai po muulongo.
Avalá vanenive paukumu vandatakatuka kwimila kuvaukumu vanu vaimbula ai. Vanenive vo, pavaigwite kuvalanganga kwantenga kumwe Janashi vandílijugulanga. Mwenu! Apa apali nang'olo kuliko Janashi.

Namomo paukumu andatakatuka umu nkongwe wakwina shilambo kwimila pakati pavanu vaimbula ai kuvaukumu. Nae pakulota kwigwilila limanyilo lyake Shalomoni, aaleké kumwisho shilambo. Mwenu! Apa apali nang'olo kuliko Shalomoni.
“Lijini nshapu panauma mumili mwamunu apita adumbadumba kushimbweshe alambela lyutu lyakupumulilila napane hanakodya,
kanji aashidoni, ‘Kudyanga nguujile kwing'ande kwangu kwangwaleke.’ Pawika ako akodya ing'ande yo akapali munu, vàpyailenge shana na vinu uti vàpangenge shana.

Nadoni nae andauja kuka ndavatwala majini anji saba akumamodya kubanga kumpunda nae kutwala kwinjilanga nng'ande mo kwikala. Bai shinamidyo shamunu ajo shindava shakumamodya kunyata kupunda shamwanda utandi. Nimumo momo mwailota kuvalela kwaimbula ai yaukalau.”
Napanelo Yesu akuno atangola na imbumba yavanu, mwe! Anyoke pamo na vanung'unuvake kwida panda ndajugwa vatangonavo.
Munu jumo kumwaulila Yesu, “Panda po, andida anyoko pamo na vanung'unuvako valota vatangole namu wako.”
Nae kushidoni, “Da ajala ni wakwashi na vanung'unuvangu ni vakwashi?”
Akanyalodya nkono kuvaalota vakwoda vake kutwala kushidoni, “Ajala na vanung'unuvangu ni ava apa.
Aijá átandedya mwalatela Atata ávele kuwa, ajo ni mwanetu, numbwangu na ajala.”
Muliduva lyolyo Yesu paumidile panda andyúka ndaikala nanyenje litanda.
Popo po dindyúmbalanila dimbumba dyavanu, kuntang'anedya mpaka kuntadya nae kukwela mwingalava kwikala kuvaleka vanu uti vàimidile kumwangu.
Nae andívaulila vinu vyoe kwamikong'o aashidoni, “Mwenu! Nkúpanda jumo andyúma kuka ndamwadilila imbeju.
Pashimwadilila kupagwa igwilidíle nanyenje indila vyuni kwida ndadadola.
Inji kugwilila padinyanga pauvéle ulongo padyoko kwodamwaa ulongo wo hauvele woe, yanavo kumalenneu.
Palikamadile liduva, milandi vyo kujuminneu mwaa dinyija hadilitavalakadíle.
Inji kugwilila padimiva, dimiva dyo kukulumuka kutwala kushinya milandi vyo.
Inji kavili kugwilila paulongo walutuba, yanavo kulundula vyepo; imo imiya, inji sitini na inji yo salasini.
Aijá ávenavo matu akwigwidya, aigwe.”
Napanelo vakwoda vake vanímmandika kumudya doni, “Mwaa shani unkutangola na venentete kwamikong'o?”
Yesu akavajang'ula kushidoni, “Mwaa mwenu vanintadya mumanye vipii vyautawala wakuwa kanji vanavo mene.
Kula munu ávenavo vandamwanjadyedya kuvanavo vyoe. Ákavenavo ata sho shavenavo sho, vanampoka.
Ni ashi shandivatangalela kwamikong'o mwaa, “ ‘Vanavo ata valola avi, havanona shinu, vaigwa avi, havanaigwa shinu ata havanamanya shinu shaambíka.’
Kwavanavo ankuwikila popo malove ankulava Ishaiya atédoni, “ ‘Mwenu ata mwigwa avi, mundaigwa kanji mwiko hamumanya shaambíka, mulola avi, mundona kanji mwiko hamwanalela.

Mitima vyavenentete ava vindinanopa, kwigwa vankwigwa kanji matu ave andidivana, na mevo ave andyulugwala. Leka ikavé davo vakandyona na mevo ave, vakandigwa na matu ave, kwanalela mmitima myave, kutwala kushiliuka na nangu ndikandivaponia.’
“Kanji mevo enu mwenu andijaligwa mwaa ankulola na matu enu mwaa ankwigwa.
Ninkumwaulila mwiu doni, vakulava na vaishaliya voe vashindalota vone vyamwona mwenu avi kanji havagwene na vaigwe vyamwigwa mwenu avi kanji havaigwite.
“Mwenu napanelo igwilila mana ankong'o wankúpanda.
Munu akaigwilila lilove lyámba utawala, akanaigwa shana, andáaloka nkalau kumpokenneu lilove lyavapandile muntima mwake. Aju ni imbeju igwilidíle nanyenje indila.
Imbeju igwilidíle padinyanga ni munu áigwilila lilove kutwala kupwashalela na lipuwilo.
Kwodamwaa havé dinyija, hanalikiniya. Kupata kwene mauvilo kwali kupapatigwa, kuujinneu kunyuma.
Imbeju igwilidíle padimiva ni munu áigwilila lilove kanji mangaikangilo awakati au pamo na lung'unuku lwamali, avyo vindáshinya lilove kutwala nae mene kupa vyepo.
Napanelo imbeju igwilidíle paulongo walutuba, aju ni aijá áigwilila lilove na kwigwa shana, álundula mwiu vyepo; munu jumo miya, junji sitini na junji jo salasini.”
Yesu kuvakang'ela nkong'o unji aashidoni, “Utawala wakuwa uvelé kenga munu ápandile imbeju yambone mulishamba mwake.
Napane shilo vanu vàlalenge lwono, mmongo kwida ndapanda imbeju yanashitani mo mmapondo angano kutwala kulyukila.
Bai ngano aijá kumela kukulumuka, nanae nashitani jo kumela.
Napanelo vatumika vake kuka ndamudya, ‘Nang'olo, da wako haupandile imbeju yambone mulishamba amulá? Kushi nashitani jo, aalakadilé kwashi?’
Nae kushidoni, ‘Vinu avyo atandilé mmongo.’ Vatumika do, ‘Napane unkulota tuke tukandabwalange?’
Nae kushidoni, ‘Mene! Mwaa mukandabola inkuulukika kumpambanianga na ngano.

Leka vikulumuke pamo mpaka muwakati wamapuno. Bai muwakati wowo ndavaulila vakupuna kushidoni, shitandi mwangange nashitani jo mumuungange vitinda muntae moto, mutwale mumwangange ngano muke mukammike mushidimbi mwangu.’ ”
Kutwala kuvakang'ela kavili nkong'o unji aashidoni, “Utawala wakuwa uvelé mwaimbeju yanshupi yatwete munu kuka ndapanda mulishamba mwake.
Imbeju ai idikidiki namene kuliko dimbeju dinji uti, napane paimela po undáuma nnandi ukumene wakupunda milandi vinji mpaka vyuni vyakuniania kwida ndadenga vyanda mudinavi dyake.”
Kavili kuvakang'ela nkong'o unji aashidoni, “Utawala wakuwa uvelé mwankukumuku watwete nkongwe kupiya mudipishi nnatu dyaunga wangano mpaka unga uti kukumuka.”
Vinu avi uti Yesu ashindaulila imbumba yavanu atumila mikong'o. Hashipali shashivaulila kwabila kutumila mikong'o
pakulota liwikile popo lilove litangaléke kwaindila yankúlava aashidoni, “Ndatangola ngutumila mikong'o, ndavalanganga vinu vilipiídye tangu kukandyangigwa shilambo.”
Napanelo Yesu palakile imbumba yavanu ailá, akauka ndainjila nng'ande. Vakwoda vake vakamuukila ndanjugwa, “Twaulila mana ankong'o wanashitani mulishamba.”
Nae akavajang'ula kushidoni, “Aijá ápandile imbeju yambone, Mwana Wamunu
na lishamba lyo, shilambo. Ailá imbeju yambone, avo ni vana vamuutawala, nashitani jo vanavake nkalau na
mmongo ámpandile nashitani ni Ndamoni. Kupuna ni mwisho wawakati, vakupuna kuva vanjelo.
Nadoni kenga mo mwavanankungailila nashitani kuntaa moto, nimomo mwaulota kuvalela mwisho wawakati.
Mwana Wamunu andavatuma vanjelo vake kutwala vanavo kukungailila pamo muutawala wake avilá uti vitádya lipagwe lidambi na avalá uti vatandédya ungave-lilamulo.
Vovo vo, vandavajela kulitungulu, kushinu kulota kupagwa shililo na kutuka shulu nkanywa.
Bai avalá vaishaliya vandashenga kenga liduva muutawala watatagwave. Aijá ávenavo matu akwigwidya, aigwe.

“Napanelo utawala wakuwa uvelé mwamali alipiídye mulishamba, aanaladíle munu jumo kutwala nae kupiya kavili. Napane kwamwaa wakumuumbala lipuwilo, andyúka nashulusha vinu vyake uti vyavénavo kuka ndashuma lishamba alyo.
“Namomo utawala wakuwa uvelé mwankushulusha jumo áshilambela majanga amali oe.
Nae pakadidye lijanga limo livénavo mali oe andyúka ndashulusha uti vyavénavo kuka ndashuma lijanga alyo.
“Namomo utawala wakuwa uvelé mwalungau lwavatajile mmedi kutwala kujola dyomba dyakula namuna.
Dyomba dikajole dyoe vene kuutidya lungau kumwangu kutwala kwikalanga, kutandola dyomba dyambone kujela muvikapu vyave dyomba kaligwa dyo, kujaa ako.
Amu nimomo mwailota kuvalela mwisho wawakati; vanjelo vandaida ndavaapula vakalau mushipinga shavanu vaishaliya.
Vakalau vo kuvajela kulitungulu kushinu kulota kupagwa shililo na kutuka shulu nkanywa.”
Napanelo Yesu andívaudya, “Da mundigwa shana vinu avi uti?” Vanavo do, “Elo tundigwa.”
Nae kuvaulila kushidoni, “Doni napanelo kula mwalimu álitandile nkwóda wautawala wakuwa ankuva mwatatamunu wapaing'ande áumya mulipeta mwake vinu vyaambi na vyakala.”
Napanelo Yesu pamalidile kukong'a mikong'o avyo andyúma palyutu alyo.
Akawika kwave kutunduvanga kuvapundisha venentete mushitala shave shakulipudidya. Vanavo kutwala kushanga, “Da limanyilo ali na makango ala apatilé kwashi?
Aju da i jo mwanagwe nkúveda aijá? Anyoke aju i Maliya? Vanung'unuvake i Tiyagu, Yoshe, Simoni, namu Yudashi?
Valumbuvake da i vo vatwikanavo wetu ava? Kushi napane vyatenda avi apatilé kwashi?”
Nadoni vanavo vashinammikila shitundi. Yesu kutwala kushidoni, “Nkúlava havanamwiludyanga ila mushilambo shake na pakaja pake.”
Bai palyutu alyo, Yesu hatandíle makango oe kwamwaa waungakulupila wave.
Napanelo mumaduva alo Elode nang'olo walijimbo andíigwanga dyabali dimwe Yesu.
Nae akaigwe dyabali adyo andívaulila vatumika vake kushidoni, “Ajo Nshuwau Wakubatisha ajo! Andidyuka pakati pavakupela. Ni ashi shitádya vyamakango avyo vipagwe namu nae.”
Ivé doni, jo Elode aju anínkamula Nshuwau kumunga mang'unyang'unya kutwala kunjela nkalaboshi kwamwaa umwe Elodiya ndyagwe Pilipo nung'une mwene.
Nshuwau aju ashinanshashulanga Elode aashidoni, “Haikuvaikidile wako kunnomba nkongwe aju.”
Jo Elode jo, ashindalota ammyae Nshuwau napane ashivajopa venentete kwamwaa vanavo vashinankulupila Nshuwau jo kuva nkúlava.
Napanelo muliduva lyashitenda Elode shikukulu shakumbukumbu yakuvalekwa kwake, mwana nkongwe umwe Elodiya andívina landa pamevo pavanu avalá. Elode kutwa kumwida lipuwilo lyoe
mpaka kuntadya kulivikila alilapila kujaula shinu shoeshoe shakajugwile.
Bai mwali jo kwading'ano dyapatíle kwanyoke akaashidoni, “Ngupa popo apa mushani muti umwe Nshuwau Wakubatisha.”
Umu kutwala kumwidila shipalodi, napane kwodamwaa andílilapa pamevo pavanu vavénavo pashikukulu apalá, andílamulila vamupe.
Nae akavatuma vamadengo vake vakanshinde Nshuwau kukalaboshi.
Vanavo muti wo kwidanavo mushani ndamupa mwali, mwali jo kuka ndamupa anyoke.
Vakwoda vake Nshuwau vakaida ndatwala mili wo kuka ndashika. Vakashike vandyúka nammalangangila Yesu dyabali adyo.
Yesu akaigwe dyabali dyo andyúma palyutu alyo kukwela mwingalava kuka kushimbweshe gweka yake. Napanelo dimbumba dyavanu pavamanyite dindyúmananga mmakaja mwave kuka vamwoda na madodo.
Yesu akashuluka mwingalava, nae kwona dimbumba dyavanu adilá, kwanangila shididi kutwala kuvaponia valwele uti pakati pave.

Napanelo wakati wayalyulo pauwikile po, vakwoda vake vanímmandika kumwaulila doni, “Pashinu apa panalugwangwa vila na wakati wo undipita. Vaulile venentete vaukanange mmakaja vakashume shakulya valye.”
Yesu kushidoni, “Hainabidi shinu vanavo kuukananga. Vape mwenu po shakulya.”
Vanavo do, “Um! Wetu apa hatuve shinu ila magung'u mwanu na dyomba mbili bai.”
Yesu kushidoni, “Idanavo.”

Nae akavalamulila venentete vaikalange muukoka, akatwala magung'u mwanu alalá na dyomba mbili adilá, akalola kuwa kutwala kwalaliya. Akamajaniange magung'u alalá andívapa vakwoda vake, vakwoda vake vo, kuvajavila venentete.
Nadoni vanu uti vandílya kwikuta. Vakalakatange makombo alalá, vandyúmbadya makalala kumi na mbili.
Vanu ve valíle vavele valume dyalupu mwanu kwabila kuvavalangilila vakongwe na vadyoko.
Yesu kutwala kuvakanyalidyangidyanneu vakwoda vake vakwalange mwingalava vauke valangalela litanda nkono unji vanneke nae alaila imbumba yavanu.
Akalaile imbumba ailá, andíkwela gweka yake palishinga kuka ndashwali. Liduva palidimbile, nae kupagwa gweka mulyutu alyo.
Napanelo muwakati wene wo ingalava ivele kushu na kumwangu mawimbi agang'olagang'ola mwaa ishilodya kwaishaalakela imepo.
Muwakati wamatingatinga kumanga kulangala nae kutwala kuvaukila vakwoda vake awena pashanya medi.
Vakwoda vake avalá pavangwene awena pashanya medi vanavo ni kujopa doni kutwala kushidoni, “Mwenu litailei!” Bai kwamwaa wakujopa vandíkugwanga.
Yesu kutangalenneu kushidoni, “Lyunge ntima! Ni nangu apa. Hamunajope.”
Patulu kushidoni, “Nang'olo, ikava kenga ni wako ngulamulila ngwide ko kwauvele wako nguwena pashanya medi.”
Yesu do, “Ida!” Patulu akashuluka mwingalava amulá kumuukila Yesu awena pashanya medi.
Pagwene napane imepo kupunga na dimongo nae kujopa. Akatunduvanga kutitimila kutwala kutangola pashanya po aashidoni, “Nang'olo nguposha!”
Yesu kunyaladyedyanneu nkono kunkamula kutwala kushidoni, “Umunu walikulupililo lidikidiki, mwaa shani undyambambidya?”
Napane vanavo vainjila mwingalava, imepo yo kulimaladya do, jii.
Bai vanu ve vavéle mwingalava amulá vandilipudya kumwe Yesu vaashidoni, “Mwiu, wako umwanagwe Nnungu.”
Ling'oto lyakwamboka litanda lyo vandíshiya ku Geneshaleti.
Bai vanu vashilambo asho vakammanye doni aju apa Yesu, vandyandadya dyabali mwisemu ayo uti. Napane vanu vandívaidanavo kwake nae valwele vave uti
kutwala vo valwele vo kunjugwangila pakulota vankwae munkumbu waikanju yake tu. Nadoni uti avalá vankwaídye, vandípona.
Napanelo Yesu vandímwidila mapalishayo pamo na vamwalimu vadishaliya vakwalakela ku Yelusalemu ndamudya,
“Mwaa shani vakwoda vako havanaodedya shinu yadi yavatulakalele vanyakala vetu? Mwaa vanavo pavalya, havananavanga shinu medi mmakono.”
Nae akavajang'ula kushidoni, “Mwaa shani namwenu na yadi yenu yo, hamunaodedya shinu malamulo ake Nnungu?
Mwaa Nnungu atédoni, ‘Mwishimu tatako na anyoko’ na ‘Aijá álota kumwiludyanga tatake kwali anyoke inimmaikila vammalidye.’
Kanji mwenu munkupundisha doni, ‘Munu woewoe akamwaulila tatake kwali anyoke kushidoni, Sho shangushilota ndikupe sho, ni shadaka shakumupa Nnungu,
bai munu ajo hainammaikila shinu kavili kumwishimu tatake kwali anyoke.’ Nadoni pamwodedya yadi yenu ai inkuntadya mwiludyange lilove lyake Nnungu.
Mmanu mmamalambi mwe, Ishaiya animmalanganga shana patédoni,
“ ‘Venentete ava po pakanywa apa vankungutumbyanga, ila ntima wave uvelé kushu namu nangu.
Vanavo vankulipudya bule, vapundisha kenga mapundisho shii malamulo avanu vene.’ ”
Bai andíshema imbumba yavanu kwaulila doni, “Igwilila na mumanye shaambíka.
Shinu shintáa munu ushapu i ashilá shinjilíla pakanywa ila ni ashilá shúma pakanywa. Asho mwiu shinkuntaa munu ushapu.”
Napanelo vakwoda vake vandímuukila ndamudya doni, “Da unkumanya kenga mapalishayo pavaigwite vyautangwele avilá indivanyatila?”
Nae kushidoni, “Kula nnandi wakapandile Atata wakuwa undabubuligwa.
Valeke, vanavo ni vananagalaledi vakuputala mevo vavalangalaléla vakuputalamwave. Munu wakuputala akannangalalela wakuputalamwagwe, vanu avo uti vandagwilangila mulipondo.”
Napanelo Patulu anínjugwa aashidoni, “Mana ankong'o au, twaulila.”
Yesu kushidoni, “Da namwenu momo hamunava kumanya?
Da hamumanyite kenga vinu uti vinjilíla pakanywa vyuka mmunda kutwala kuka nshoo?
Napane ashilá shúma nkanywa shaaloka muntima. Asho ni shintádya munu kuva nshapu.
Muntima mwamunu munkuma makumbukililo akunyata, kubyaa, kunama nankongwe waukannambile, kulavalava, kwiva, ushuda waushwang'a na kukupulu.
Vinu avi ni vintádya munu ave nshapu. Napane kulya ukanavenge medi mmakono mo hakunantadya munu kuva nshapu.”
Napanelo Yesu paumile palyutu alyo andyúka kwisemu ya ku Tilu na ya ku Shidoni.
Mwenu! Nkongwe jumo nkanaani waisemu ayo kumuukila akugwa pashanya po aashidoni, “ Umu, mwanagwe Daudi, ngwanangila shididi! Mwanangu nkongwe anintawala lijini kupunda apo.”
Yesu nae kulamana na kunjang'ula. Vakwoda vake vakamuukila nanjugwa, “Nkumulange auke, ankupita atwoda akuno anyakonya.”
Yesu do, “Nangu havangutumididye kwavanu vanji ila kwavangandolo vajaikenge va ku Ishilaeli bai.”
Bai nkongwe aijá kuwika kunguguvalila kushidoni, “ Umu, ngupwashela.”
Yesu, “Hashinava shambone kutwala ligung'u lyavana kuvajalela vang'avanga.”
Nkongwe jo doni, “ Umu, shinu asho mwiu! Napane ata vo vang'avanga vo vandálya dingalamwamwa digwilangíla mulyungu imesha yanakulugwave.”
Yesu kutwa kushidoni, “Ajaló, likulupililo lyako likumene namene! Nadoni vikutandeke kenga mo mwaulatadile.” Bai muwakati wowo mwanagwe jo kuponenneu.
Napanelo Yesu akaume apo andyúka mpaka nanyenje litanda lya Galileya kutwala kukwela palishinga kwikala.
Bai popo po kumwidila dimbumba kwadimbumba dyavanu vavaidanavo vakulamala, vakuputala mevo, vakukwava, vabubu na vanji vaté kwinjipa, kuvavika mmadodo mwake, nae kutwala kuvaponia.
Dimbumba dyavanu dikavone vabubu vatangola vakulamala vapona vakukwava vawena na vakuputala mevo valola, dyanavo dindímupa lishangelo Nnungu umwe Ishilaeli.

Yesu akavashema vakwoda vake kuvaulila, “Nangu ninkuvaanangila shididi vanu ava mwaa ankupita maduva matatu vàvele namu nangu na vovo vo havavé shakulya. Nadoni kulailananganavo vàdobile indala, hangutamwa ngwonadavo vandadilikanga ndila.”
Vakwoda kutwa kumudya, “Da pakulota kuvalisha vanu ava munu apata pashi magung'u akuvatosha panalugwangwa apa?”
Yesu, “Muvenavo magung'u mangapi?” Vanavo do, “Saba na dindemba padyoko do.”
Nae akavalamulila vanu uti vaikalange pai,
akatwala magung'u saba alalá na dindemba adilá akannambwalela Nnungu, kumajanianga kuvapa vakwoda vake vanavo kutwala kuvajavila venentete.
Vanu uti kulya mpaka kwikuta. Vakatwalange makombo, vandyúmbadya makalala saba.
Napanelo vanu ve valíle vavele valume dyalupu nsheshe kwabila kuvavalangila vakongwe na vadyoko.
Bai Yesu akavalaile venentete vo, andíkwela mwingalava kuka isemu ya ku Magadana.
Napanelo mapalishayo pamo na mashadukayo vandímuukila Yesu nanninga kunjugwa avalodye shimanyikilo shakwalakela kuwa.
Nae kushidoni, “Mwenu ukawika wakati wayalyulo pamunona kuwa ko maundi akunduvalenge muushidoni, ‘Imepo ilota kuva yambone.’

Namomo linyeiku muushidoni, ‘Nelo indatonya imbula mwaa maundi andikunduvala na lyundi lindidimbya.’ Mmanu mmamalambi mwe! Mwenu munkumanya kujavanianga vyamwona kumaundi napanelo munkutatakela kujavanianga vimanyikilo vyawakati.
Eti vanu vaimbula yakunyata mitima na yakulavalava vajugwa shimanyikilo! Bai hashipali shimanyikilo shavalota kwona ila shimwe nkúlava Janashi.” Bai nae andívaleka kutwala kulyumadyanga kuka.
Napanelo vakwoda vake pavaukile mwangu nkono unji walitanda, vandílivaliva kunyukata magung'u.
Yesu kuvaulila kushidoni, “Ava mevo na lishunge kwamwaa wankukumuku wamapalishayo na wamashadukayo.”
Vanavo vashindataukananga shivenevene vaashidoni, “Ni mwaa wetu wetu watukanyukete magung'u.”
Yesu amanya makumbukililo ave andívaulila kushidoni, “Mmanu mmalikulupililo lidikidiki, mwaa shani munkutaukananga ing'ano yakumwova magung'u?
Da mpaka ambi hamunava kumanya? Hamunakumbukila shinu magung'u mwanu alalá avalíle vanu dyalupu mwanu avalá? Makombo lo, muumbadidye makalala mangapi?
Kwali magung'u saba alalá avalíle vanu dyalupu nsheshe avalá? Makombo ake muumbadidye makalala mangapi?
Da mwaa shani hamunamanya shinu do nangu haninamba shinu magung'u? Napane lilaledye kwamwaa wankukumuku wamapalishayo na wamashadukayo.”
Bai vanavo vandímanya shana kenga nae hashamba nkukumuku wamagung'u; ashamba mapundisho amapalishayo na amashadukayo.
Napanelo Yesu akawika isemu ya ku Shashaleya imwe Pilipo, akavaudya vakwoda vake kushidoni, “Da vanu vamwona Mwana Wamunu kuva nyani?”
Vanavo do, “Vanji Nshuwau Wakubatisha, vanji Liyashi na vanji Yelemiya kwali nkúlava jumo pakati pavakulava vakala.”
Nae kuvaudya vanavo, “Kushi mwenu po, nangu mungwona kuva nyani?”
Simoni Patulu patwete kujang'ula akaashidoni, “Wako Klistu mwanagwe Nnungu mumi.”
Yesu akanjang'ula kushidoni, “Undijaligwa wako Simoni Bali-Janashi! Hanava shinu munu ákupundishidye vinu avi ila ni Atata ávele kuwa.
Namomo ninkukwaulila doni, wako Patulu na nangu pashanya lijanga lyolyo ali, ndadenga liganisha lyangu na liganisha alyo milango vyakumoka havyulula kutema.
Nangu ndakukamudya myungulilo vyautawala wakuwa; uti vyaulota kunga mushilambo shapai, kuwa momo vindaungigwa, shaulota kuungula mushilambo shapai, kuwa shindaunguligwa.”
Bai nae andívaduma vakwoda vake pakulota havanammalangange kwamunu woewoe.

Napanelo kutwala apo Yesu kutunduvanga kuvamanyiya ngala vakwoda vake doni, nae inimmaikila auke ku Yelusalemu, koko ko akapate mauvilo oe kwavanang'olo, kwavakulangalalela-shadaka vanang'olo na kwavamwalimu vadishaliya, apele na muliduva lyantatu lyake adyuke.
Patulu akanshamela Yesu kwagweka kutwala kunduma, “ Umu, ata padyoko! Shinu asho hashikutandeka.”
Yesu kushiliuka kushidoni, “Tumuka mushu mwangu Shatwani! Wako ni lijanga lyakungutadya ngulikuvale. Wako haunakumbukila shinu mwakumbukilila Nnungu, ukumbukila mwavakumbukilila vanu.”
Bai kutwala kuvaulila vakwoda vake doni, “Munu akalota kungwoda nangu, alishukulu jo mwene anyukate nshalaba wake angwode.
Mwaa woewoe álota aposhe shingumi shake andakatoka na woewoe álota akatoke shingumi shake kwamwaa wangu nangu, andaposha.
Da munu alota kupata wambone shani akapata shilambo ashi uti kutwala kukatoka shingumi shake sho? Kwali shinu shani shalota kuulula kumya munu abadilishe na shingumi shake?
Nadoni Mwana Wamunu andaida mulishangelo lyatatake pamo na vanjelo vake, napane apo anannipa kula munu kwodana na matendo ake.
Nangu ninkumwaulila mwiu doni, po pakati penu apa vanji mwiko havapela vakanava kumwona Mwana Wamunu aida muutawala wake.”
Napanelo akapite maduva sita, Yesu akantwala Patulu, Tiyagu namu Nshuwau nung'une Tiyagu kuvaukanavo gwekayavo ndakwela palishinga lyakulepa.
Popo po, nae kujalukanga pamevo pave, ing'ope yake kushenga kenga liduva, dinguvo dyake kung'ala kenga lilangadyo.
Mwenu! Popo po kwaneka Musha namu Liyashi vatangola namu nae.
Patulu kutwa kumwaulila Yesu kushidoni, “Nang'olo ni shambone kupagwa po papa. Napanelo ukalota, ngukandyange mautu matatu, limo lyako, linji Musha na linji lyo limwe Liyashi.”
Patulu akuno atangola, kuwa kwaloka lyundi lyakushenga kuvainikidya, mo mulyundi mo kwigwinika lidi liishidoni, “Aju ni mwanangu waninnagwaledya, ángupa lipuwilo, jojo jo, mwigwilile.”
Vakwoda vake pavaigwite malove alo vandígwanga ding'ope kutindya pai na kujopa doni.
Nae akavavandika apalá, kuvakwaa kutwa kushidoni, “Takatukanga, hamunajope.”
Vanavo pavang'amwile mevo vangwené gweka jo Yesu aju bai.
Pavashishuluka palishinga apalá Yesu andívaleya vakwoda vake vo doni, “Hamunamwaulile munu vyamugwene avilá mpaka padyuka Mwana Wamunu pakati pavakupela.”
Napanelo vakwoda vake vo kumudya, “Mwaa shani vamwalimu vadishaliya vaashidoni ivaikidile Liyashi ave ntandi kwida?”
Nae do, “Mwiu Liyashi andava ntandi kwida na andapanganianga vinu uti.
Bai ninkumwaulila doni, Liyashi jo andída ila vanavo havammanyite, vaníntenda uti vyavalatíle vantende. Nadoni momo Mwana Wamunu andauvauvanga mmakono mwave.”
Bai apo vakwoda vake vandímanya doni amwamba Nshuwau Wakubatisha.
Napanelo vakawika paimbumba yavanu munu jumo kumuukila Yesu kunguguvalila
kutwala kushidoni, “Nang'olo mwanangile shididi mwanangu, nae ankuvanavo ulwele washikoko na ankuvauvanga namene. Myanda vyoe andágwilila pamoto kwali mmedi.
Nangu ndimwidanavo kwavakwoda vako, vanavo havamuulwile kumponia.”
Yesu kutwala kushidoni, “Mmanu mmaimbula íkakulupila na yakudumbadumba! Da nangu ndapagwa namu mwenu mpaka duvani? Nannaga mwenu mpaka duvani? Mwidenavo apa ndyoko jo!”
Bai Yesu kushulanga lijini lyo, lyanavo kuma mundyoko mo kutwala muwakati wowo ndyoko jo kupona.
Napanelo vakwoda vake vakamuukila àvele kwagweka ndamudya, “Mwaa shani wetu hatuulwile kukumulanga lijini lyo?”

Nae kushidoni, “Ni kwamwaa walikulupililo lyenu lidikidiki. Ninkumwaulila mwiu doni, mukavanavo likulupililo kenga imbeju yanshupi mundalamulila lishinga ali do, ‘Tumuka apa wena apalá,’ lyanavo kuka. Hashipali shilóta kunkamadyangidya.”
Napanelo vàvele pamo ku Galileya, Yesu andívaulila vakwoda vake kushidoni, “Mwana Wamunu vanannimya kunkamudya kumakono kwavanu,
vanavo vanampedya napane muliduva lyantatu lyake andadyuka.” Bai vakwoda vake vandívanavo shipalodi shoe.
Yesu pamo na vakwoda vake vakawika pa Kapalanaumu. Napanelo vanu váshipwashalela ukodi wamwing'ande ya Nnungu vandímuukila Patulu ndamudya, “Da mwalimu wenu jo andáumya dishingo mbili dyo?”

Nae do, “Elo andáumya.” Bai Patulu po painjidile nng'ande akanava kutangola shinu, Yesu kumuudidyanneu, “Simoni, da wako po wona dashi? Vaumu vamushilambo vo vavatwalangila vananyanyi ada kwali ukodi? Vavatwalangila vanavave kwali vamidi?”
Patulu do, “Vamidi.” Yesu kutwa kushidoni, “Napavedoni vanavave vo vava muunaiti.

Kanji napanelo pakulota havanashimwe, wena kulitanda ukajele indawana mmedi. Yomba ntandi waulota kunkangola njamye ikanywa yo undakodya dishingo nsheshe utwale ungulipile nangu pamo namu wako umwene.”
Muwakati wowo vakwoda vake vandímuukila ndamudya kushidoni, “Nyani álota kuva nang'olo muutawala wakuwa?”
Yesu kunshema ndyoko ndikidiki, kunkamula kumwimidya shing'ati shave
kutwala kushidoni, “Ninkumwaulila mwiu doni, mwenu mukanaujiyanga mitima vyenu kulitenda kenga mmadyoko mmadikidiki, mwiko hamwinjila muutawala wakuwa.
Napavedoni woewoe álota kulishapeya kutwala kuva mwandyoko ndikidiki, aju andava nang'olo muutawala wakuwa.
Woewoe álota kumpwashalela ndyoko ndikidiki kenga aju palina lyangu munu ajo angupwashalela nangu.
Napane woewoe álota kuntadya kukuvala ndyoko jumo pakati pavadikidiki ava vangukulupíla nangu, kudyanga munu ajo kumuungangila lijanga lyakwidopa pang'ulo kuntitimidya mwimanga kumedi makumene.
Shipambale shilambo kwamwaa wavitendo vivatádya vanu vatege. Ngwengwe vyakunyata vivatádya vanu vatege vindaumilila napane apambale aijá álota kwidanavo vyakunyata avyo!

“Napanelo ikava kenga nkono wako kwali lidodo lyako vinu avyo vinkukutadya ukuvale, lumula ujae kushu ko. Kudyanga kwinjila mushingumi ùlamele kuliko kuvanavo makono uti mavili kwali madodo uti mavili kutwala kuka kushena kwauvele moto úkamalilika.
Namomo ikava kenga liu lyako linkukutadya ukuvale usha ujae kushu ko, kudyanga winjile mushingumi ùlamele kuliko kuvanavo mevo uti mavili kutwala kuka kumoto wakushena.
“Lilaledye kwambangidya hamunamwiludyange ata ndyoko jumo pakati pavadyoko ava! Nangu ninkumwaulila doni, vanjelo vave kuwa ko, ngwengwe vankwonana namu Atata ávele kuwa.
Da mwenu mwona dashi? Ikava kenga munu ankuvanavo dingandolo miya anjaika jumo, haleka adilá tisini na tisa ko kumashinga kuka annambela jumo ánjaike?
Akankodya, ninkumwaulila mwiu doni, anampuwangila namene kuliko adilá tisini na tisa dikanjaíke.
Nimumo momo Tatagwenu ávele kuwa hanalota shinu ata padyoko kunjaika ndyoko jumo pakati pavadyoko ava.
“Napanelo nung'unumunu akakutagela muukile ukandume mùvele mmavili yenu. Ikava kenga andakwigwilila, unimposha.
Kanji akanakwigwilila, ntwale munu jumo kwali vavili pakulota ‘likosha lyoelyoe vaakikishe vashuda vavili kwali vatatu.’
Ikava kenga havaigwilila vanu avo, mmalangange kuliganisha. Ikava kenga navanavo havaigwilila momo, bai mmalangile kuva mmidi kwali nkúkatisha-ukodi.
Ninkumwaulila mwiu doni, uti vyamulota kunga pai apa, kuwa momo vindaungigwa na avilá vyamulota kuungula pai apa, kuwa momo vindaunguligwa.
Namomo ninkumwaulila doni, vanu vavili pakati penu vakaigwania mushilambo amu kwashinu shoeshoe shakujugwa, Atata ávele kuwa andavapa.
Mwaa poepoe pavakadyanianga vanu vavili kwali vatatu palina lyangu nangu, nangu ngupali popo.”
Bai Patulu akamuukila ndamudya, “ Umu, da nung'unumunu akangutagela ninnivalive myanda mingapi? Myanda saba?”
Yesu kushidoni, “Mene, nakwaulila shinu kuva myanda saba ila myanda sabini kuujila myanda saba.
Nadoni utawala wakuwa wo uvelé mwaumu jumo áshilota atende shikonda na vatumika vake.
Patunduvenge kutenda shikonda sho, vandímwidanavo munu jumo e avénavo udeni wanjuluku woe.
Kwodamwaa havenavo shakunnipa nang'olo wake, nang'olo wake jo kulamulila vanshulushe nae, ndyagwe, vanavake na vinu uti vyavénavo pakulota udeni wo, amalidye.
Ntumika aijá kunguguvalila kulipudya aashidoni, ‘Nang'olo wangu ngwanangila shididi nangu ndakulipa uti udeni awo.’
Bai nang'olo wake andímwanangila shididi kutwala kunneka auke na udeni wo, kunnivaliva.
“Kanji napane ntumika aijá paumile apo anínkodya ntumikamwagwe washindai dinali miya. Nae apalá kunkamula, kunkaba kabali kutwa kushidoni, ‘Njuluku wangu wo, ngulipa popo apa!’
Muje jo kunguguvalila kunjugwangila aashidoni, ‘Ngwanangila shididi, nangu ndakulipa.’
Nae kwita kuntwala kuka nanjela nkalaboshi mpaka udeni wo, alipe.
Napanelo vatumikamwagwe vanji vakone shitendo asho, vandívanavo shipalodi shoe kutwala kuka nammanyiya nang'olo wave vinu uti vitandéke.
“Nang'olo wave akanshema kumwaulila doni, ‘Wako ni untumika wakubanga namene. Nangu udeni wako uti ndikulivaliva mwaa wako uningujugwangila.
Da napane hainaululike nawako kumwanangila mujo jo shididi kenga mo mwandikwanangilidile wako?’
Bai nang'olo wake jo àshimwidye namene anínkamudya kwavakushunga-kalaboshi mpaka udeni wo uti, alipe.
Napavedoni Atata wakuwa anantandela momo ikava kenga namwenu mmitima myenu mo, kula munu hannivaliva nung'unumunu.”
Yesu pamalidile kutangola malove alo, andyúma pa Galileya kuka kwisemu ya ku Yudeya mwangu unji wa Yudani.
Dimbumba dyavanu dindímwoda koko, nae kutwala kuvaponia.
Napanelo mapalishayo vandímwidila ndamudya vanninga vaashidoni, “Da lilamula linkutuleka munu kunneka ndyagwe kwamwaa waing'ano yoeyoe?”
Yesu kushidoni, “Da mwenu hamushamidye, ‘Namalunda, ko kunantandi ko avakandyengé vanu, nnume na nkongwe,’
na kavili, ‘Kwamwaa au, jo nnume jo ananneka tatake na anyoke kuka ndalyunganianga na nkongwe vavili ava kuva mili umo’?
Nadoni havava shinu kavili vanu vavili vandava mili umo. Napavedoni shaunganienge Nnungu hanapagwe wakwapukanianga.”
Vanavo kumudya, “Napane mwaa shani andilamulila Musha kumwandikila nkongwe italaka kutwala kunneka?”
Yesu kushidoni, “Musha jo andilamulila muvaleke vadyavenu mwaa mwenu mitima vyenu vyakunanopa kanji kunantandi ko, haivé mwanavo.
Nangu ninkumwaulila doni, munu woewoe álota kunneka ndyagwe paukava mwaa waugoni annomba nkongwe junji, munu ajo ankulavalava.”
Vakwoda vake kutwala kushidoni, “Ikava kenga ing'ano yannume na ndyagwe ive doni, kudyanga kwikala vila bila kulomba.”
Yesu kushidoni, “Havanava shinu vanu uti valóta kuulula kutandedya malove ala ila avalá vapatíle lyululilo alyo.

Mwaa vapali vákammilangila mata nkongwe tangu shivalakwelo shave, kupagwa vanji kwamwaa wakuunigwa na vanumwave na kupagwa vanji kavili valiténda vo vene kwamwaa wautawala wakuwa. Aijá áulula kutandedya malove ala, atandedye.”
Napanelo vanu vandívaidanavo vadyoko kumwe Yesu pakulota avavikile makono na avashwalidye, napane vakwoda vake kutwala kuvashulanga.
Yesu kushidoni, “Valeke vadyoko vaide kwangu, hamunavaleye! Utawala wakuwa wavanu kenga ava.”
Bai ling'oto lyakuvavikila makono, nae andyúma lyutu alyo.
Mwe! Munu jumo akamwidila Yesu ndamudya kushidoni, “Mwalimu ngutende shinu shani shambone ngupate shingumi shíkamalilika?”
Yesu kushidoni, “Mwaa shani ungudya ing'ano yashinu shambone? Wambone avelé jumo tu bai. Ukalota kwinjila mushingumi, igwilila malamulo.”
Nae kushidoni, “Malamulo shani?” Yesu kushidoni, “Haunabyae, haunalavalave, haunaive, haunaumye ushuda waushwang'a,
mwishimu tatako na anyoko na nnagwaledye mujo kenga wako umwene.”
Nnemba jo kushidoni, “Nangu malamulo ala ninkwigwilila, napane shakwashi shingubakidile?”
Yesu kushidoni, “Ukalota kuva umunu washalowa-uti wena ukashulushe vyauvenavo uti, njuluku wo uvajavile vákave pashinu. Apo undavanavo libadila kuwa ling'oto wide ungwode.”
Nnemba aijá paigwite malove alo andyúma na shipalodi mwaa avenavo mali oe namene.
Napanelo Yesu kutwala kuvaulila vakwoda vake kushidoni, “Ninkumwaulila mwiu doni, pandikamadyanga namene ntajili kwinjila muutawala wakuwa.
Ninkumwaulila kavili doni, shíkakamadyenge ni kupaleta ngamila palilanga lyakashinji kuliko kwinjila ntajili muutawala wa Nnungu.”
Bai vakwoda vake pavaigwite malove alo, vandíshanga namene kutwala kushidoni, “Ikava davo po aambwalegwa nyani?”
Yesu akashiliuka kuvalola kutwa kushidoni, “Kwavanu shindikamadyanga kanji Nnungu vinu uti ankuulula.”
Patulu kutwa kumudya Yesu, “Nang'olo! Wetu vyetu uti tundileka kukwoda wako, napane tulota kupata nyamani?”

Yesu kushidoni, “Nangu ninkumwaulila mwiu doni, mwenu múngwoda nangu muwakati wakudyuwangigwa vinu uti, Mwana Wamunu palota kwikala pashiteng'u shake shalishangelo, namwenu momo mundaikala muviteng'u kumi na mbili muukumu makola kumi na mbili avanaishilaeli.

Napanelo kula munu álakile ing'ande yake, vakuluvake, valumbuvake, tatake, anyoke, vanavake kwali mashamba kwamwaa wangu nangu, andapata vyoe vyakwanjadyeka myanda miya na shingumi shíkamalilika sho, andapata.
“Nadoni voe vatandi vandava vamwisho na voe vamwisho vandava vatandi.
“Mwaa ivé doni, utawala wakuwa uvelé mwatatamunu áumile paing'ande pake lyamba linyeiku kuka ndavalambela vamadengo vakulima mulishamba mwake.
Nae akaigwananavo kuvalipa dinali imo kutwala kuvatumidya kulishamba lyake.
Napanelo muwakati wasatatu yalyamba, nae akauma akavona vanu vanji vàimilenge vila pashiwanja
nae kutwa kushidoni, ‘Namwenu, wena kulishamba mukalime nangu nannipa njuluku uvaikidíle.’
Vanavo kuka. Muwakati wasasita na wasatisa akauma kutwala kutandela momo.
Muwakati wasakumi akauma kavili kuvakodya vanu vanji vàimilenge vila nae kuvaudya, ‘Mwaa shani mwimilengé vila apa tangu lyamba?’
Vanavo kushidoni, ‘Hapali munu átupele madengo.’ Nae do, ‘Namwenu, wena koko kulishamba ko mukalime.’
“Napanelo paiwikile yalyulo aijá mwene lishamba andímwaulila mmádengo wake áshikondya njuluku kushidoni, ‘Vashamange vamadengo uti uvalipe njuluku wave uvatunduvangila vamwisho uvamalilila vatandi.’
Vakawika avalá vasakumi kula munu kupata dinali imo imo.
Avalá vatandi pavawikile vashona kenga vandapata njuluku woe kanji navanavo kutwala kupata dinali imo imo tu.
Pavapatile vanavo vandítunduvanga kuntangadikanga tatamunu mwene lishamba aijá
vaashidoni, ‘Vanu ava vamwisho vakadilé madengo isaa imo, napane wako nang'olo mwaa shani uvalinganianga namu wetu túlipililidile madengo makumene na lítutimbile liduva?’
