“Nae kutwala kumwaulila munu jumo pakati pave kushidoni, ‘Mbwana nangu haninakwanela shinu. Da hatupakanidile ndikulipe dinali imo?
Twala vyako uke! Nangu ngulota ninnipe aju wamwisho kenga mo mwandikulipidile wako.
Da hanguvenavo shaliya yakutumila mali angu mwangulatela nimwene? Kwali uvénavo ing'ou mwaa nangu ni wambone?’
Nadoni vamwisho vandava vatandi na vatandi vandava vamwisho.”
Napanelo Yesu pashuka ku Yelusalemu andívashamela kwagweka vakwoda vake kumi na mbili kuvaulila kushidoni,
“Tunkuka ku Yelusalemu. Koko ko, Mwana Wamunu vanankamudya kumakono kwavanang'olo vavakulangalalela-shadaka na kwavamwalimu vadishaliya. Vovo vo, vandaumya ukumu yakumpedya
namomo vanankamudya kwavamidi vanniule, vanshape viboko, vankamele panshalaba napane muliduva lyatatu lyake nae andadyuka.”
Napanelo nkongwe jumo jujugwave vanavake Shebedeu andímuukila Yesu pamo na vanavake nanguguvalila kutwala kunjugwa amwangangole shinu shimo.
Yesu kutwala kumudya, “Ulota nyamani?” Nae doni, “Ninkukujugwa ulivikile kuvavika vanavangu vavili ava muutawala wako, jumo kunkanakono junji kunshanda.”
Yesu kushidoni, “Mwenu hamumanyite shamujugwa. Da mwenu mundaulula kukumbila luwene lwolwo lwangulota kukumbila nangu?” Vanavo do, “Tundaulula.”
Yesu kushidoni, “Mwiu mwenu mundakumbila luwene lwangu kanji yakwikala kunkanakoko kwali kunshanda kwangu, ayo hainava shinu yakujava nangu. Vene mautu alo ni avalá vavapanganiangididye mwene Atata.”
Bai avalá vakwoda vake vanji kumi pavaigwite davo, vandívashimwidya vanung'unumunu avalá vavili.
Yesu kuvashema vakwoda vake kutwala kuvaulila kushidoni, “Mwenu munkumanya kenga avalá vakutawala vavamidi vandálitumbudya kwavenentete na vakumene vave vandátumila madalaka kwavanavo.
Kwenu mwenu hainave davo. Aijá ágambela ave nang'olo pakati penu inimmaikila ave ntumika wenu
na aijá ágambela ave ntandi pakati penu ave ntumwa wenu.
Nimumo momo Mwana Wamunu haidile pakulota vantumike; nae aidilé ndatumika na kujaula shingumi shake shive lyambolelo lyavanu voe.”
Napanelo pavashuma pa Yeliko, ishindamwoda imbumba yavanu.
Mwenu! Vandípagwa vanu vavili vakuputala mevo ve vaikéle nanyenje indila. Vovo vo, pavaigwite kenga Yesu ankupita vanditangola pashanya po vaashidoni, “ Umu, mwanagwe Daudi, twanangila shididi!”
Imbumba yavanu kuvashulanga vavaulila vamalale kanji vanavo vashindamamodya kutangola pashanya po vaashidoni, “ Umu, mwanagwe Daudi, twanangila shididi!”
Yesu akaimila kutwala kuvashema kuvaudya, “Da mulota nintandele nyamani?”
Vanavo kushidoni, “ Umu, tulota mevo etu, alole!”
Yesu kuvaanangila shididi, kuvakwaa mevo ave, muwakati wowo vanavo kulalenneu kutwala kumwoda.
Vanavo vakavandika pa Yelusalemu. Napane vawika pa Betepashi, palishinga lyamilandi vya Ulivela, andívatuma vakwoda vake vavili avaulila kushidoni,
“Wena kulikaja livéle mushu. Pamwinjila nkaja mo, munankodya punda vàmuungangidile mwanagwe àvele popo, mwenu muungule muvaidenavo.
Ikava kenga andapagwa wakumudya shamumuungulila mwenu mwaulile doni, ‘ Umu ankuvalota, andavaujiya.’ ”
Vinu avi uti vinditandeka pakulota liwikile popo lilove litangaléke kwaindila yankúlava kushidoni,
“Mwaulile Shiyau, ‘Lola, Umu wako ankukwidila. Nae ni wakulishapeya na ankwadilé punda, punda ndikidiki, mwanagwe punda.’ ”
Namwiu vakwoda vake vakauka na vakatandela mo mwavalamulidile.
Vanavo kumwidanavo punda jo pamo na mwanagwe, kuvatandikanga dinguvo pashanya pave, Yesu kutwa kwikala pashanya po.
Napanelo imbumba yavanu ishindapita itandikanga dinguvo dyave nndila, vanji kupanyulanga dinavi kupita vatandikanga.
Imbumba íshuka mushu na íshimwoda, dishindatangola pashanya po diishidoni, “Kushibika kupagwe na mwanagwe Daudi. Aalaligwe aijá áida palina limwe Umu. Kushibika kupagwe kushanya-uti.”
Bai akainjila nkaja mu Yelusalemu, nkaja mo uti ni kupagwa shititimbu kutwala vanu kudya, “Da aju nyani?”
Imbumba yavanu kutwala kushidoni, “Aju ni aijá nkúlava, Yesu wa ku Nashaleti ya ku Galileya.”

Napanelo Yesu andíinjila mwing'ande ya Nnungu kutwala kuvakumulanga vanu uti nng'ande mo váshishumidya na váshishuma vinu, kugang'alanga dimesha dyavakushenji-njuluku na dikiti dyavakushumidya-ding'unda
kutwala kuvaulila doni, “Vandyandika doni, ‘Ing'ande yangu indashamegwa ing'ande yakushwalidya,’ napane mwenu munditenda kuva shivava shavakwiva.”
Mo mwing'ande ya Nnungu mo, kumwidila vakuputala mevo na vakulamala nae kuvaponia.

Napane vanang'olo vavakulangalalela-shadaka pamo na vamwalimu vadishaliya pavagwene vyamakango vyashitenda na pavavaigwite vadyoko mwing'ande ya Nnungu vatangola pashanya po vaashidoni, “Kushibika kupagwe na mwanagwe Daudi,” vanavo vandíshimwanga
kutwala kumudya, “Unkwigwa vyavatangola ava?” Nae kushidoni, “Elo! Da mwenu hamushamidye, ‘Mmakanywa avadyoko na avanunu undilipanganiangidya lutumbyango lwako’?”
Bai nae andívaleka kuma panjini po kuka ku Betaniya ndalala.
Lyamba linyeiku pashuja auka kunjini inínkola indala.
Bai akone nnandi uvéle mwankuju nanyenje indila nae kuukila mene kukodya shinu ila mamba gweka nae kushidoni, “Unnandi wako, mwiko haunape kavili.” Nnandi muwakati wowo wo, kujuminneu.
Vakwoda vake pavagwene shitendo asho vanavo kushanga kutwa kumudya, “Da nnandi wo ujumililé mwashi shipajelo?”

Yesu kushidoni, “Ninkumwaulila mwiu doni, mukavanavo likulupililo na mukanaambambidya, mundatenda i gweka vitandéke munnandi au. Ata lishinga ali apa mukalamulila doni, ‘Bubuka apa uke ukalijele mwimanga,’ vindatandakela momo.
Namomo shinu shamulota kujugwa kwaindila yakushwali, mukakulupila mundapata.”

Yesu akainjila mwing'ande ya Nnungu. Napanelo nae apundisha, kumwidila vanang'olo vavakulangalalela-shadaka pamo na vanang'olo vavenentete ndamudya, “Vinu avi utenda kwamadalaka shani na madalaka ene lo akupelé nyani?”
Nae kushidoni, “Nanangu momo ndamudya shinu shimo mukangwaulila, nanangu madalaka angutandela vinu avi, ndamwaulila.
Da ubatisho umwe Nshuwau walakadilé kwashi? Walakadilé kuwa kwali kwavanu?” Vanavo kwaulanila shivenevene vaashidoni, “Tukaashidoni, ‘Walakadilé kuwa,’ nae andatudya, ‘Mwaa shani hamunkulupidile?’
Ata tukaashidoni, ‘Walakadilé kwavanu,’ tuvajopa venentete mwaa vanavo uti vankumwamini Nshuwau kuva nkúlava.”
Bai vanínjang'ula doni, “Hatumanyite.” Yesu kutwa kushidoni, “Nanangu momo madalaka angutandela vinu avi, hanimwaulila.
“Napane da mwenu mwona dashi? Munu jumo andívanavo vanavake vavili. Nae akamuukila mwana ntandi ndamwaulila doni, ‘Mwanangu, wena ukakole madengo nelo kulishamba lyamilandi vyavinyu.’
Mwana jo kutwa kwita, ‘Hangutamwa,’ kanji ling'oto andílilingulanga muntima mwake kutwala kuka.
Tatamunu akamuukila mwana wambili ndamwaulila momo, mwana ajo kushidoni, ‘Ndauka nang'olo,’ kanji haukíle.

Napanelo pakati pavana ava vavili, wakwashi átandadidye malotelo atatamunu?” Vanavo do, “Jo ntandi jo.” Yesu kushidoni, “Bai ninkumwaulila mwiu doni, vakukatisha-ukodi namu vakulavalava vankulangalela kwinjila muutawala wa Nnungu kunneka mwenu.

Mwaa Nshuwau andímwidila mwenu nannodya indila yaishaliya kutwala mwenu me kunkulupila. Vakukatisha-ukodi na vakulavalava vo vaninkulupila, napane mwenu ata mwona avi, hamulijugulenge pakulota munkulupile.

“Napanelo igwilila nkong'o unji! Andípagwa ntajili jumo e alimíle lishamba lyake lyamilandi vyavinyu. Lishamba alyo nae andítang'anedya na lingongo kwimba shima shakuminyangila vinyu, kudenga libodo lyakulepa kutwala kuvakodisha vakulima mwene kutwala mwanda kuka.
Pauwikile wakati wamapuno nae kuvatumidya vatumika vake kwavakulima ko vakatwale isemu yake yavyepo.
Vakulima kuvakamula vatumika vo, jumo kunkoma, junji kummyaa na junji jo kumwamanga majanga.
Nae kuvatumidya vanji voe kupunda mwavalalele vatandi, navanavo kuvatandela momo.
Kumwisho kwake nae kuntumidya mwanagwe aashidoni, ‘Mwanangu aju vandamwishimu!’
Kanji avalá vakulima po pavangwene mwanagwe, vanavo vandyáulanila vaashidoni, ‘Aju ni walota kunkamudya vinu uti, idananga tummyae lishamba lyo live lyetu.’
Nadoni vanavo vanínkamula kumumya mulishamba mo, kumpedya.
“Napavedoni paida mwene lishamba alota kuvatandela mwashi vakulima avo?”
Vanavo kushidoni, “Andavamalidya uti kwaukalau kutwala lishamba lyo kuvakamudya vanji valóta kwidanavo vyepo ukawika wakati wake.”
Yesu kushidoni, “Da mwenu hamushamidye mmaandiko, “ ‘Vakudenga lijanga lyavaitile lyo, lindyuka ndava lijanga lyapalitununa. Átandile davo ni Umu, ni vyamakango kwetu wetu.’
“Napavedoni ninkumwaulila, utawala wa Nnungu mwenu vanampoka kuvapa venentete vanji valóta kulodya vyepo vyake.
Aijá álota kugwilila palijanga ali, andapandakanga na aijá walilota kungwilila, andatipulikanga.”
Bai vanang'olo vavakulangalalela-shadaka pamo na mapalishayo pavaigwite mikong'o avyo, vandímanyinneu do, avamba vanavo.
Vanavo vashindalambela dindila dyakumuungila kanji vashindavajopa venentete mwaa vanavo vashindamwamini nae kuva nkúlava.
Napanelo Yesu andítangolanavo kavili atumila mikong'o aashidoni,
“Utawala wakuwa uvelé mwaumu jumo e apanganiénge shitamo shamwanagwe.
Nae kuvatumidya vatumika vake vapite vavashema vakulalikigwa kanji vakulalikigwa vo, kwitananga.

“Nae kuvatuma kavili vatumika vanji avalaililila kushidoni, ‘Kavaulile vakulalikigwa doni, “Mwenu! Nangu ndipanganianaga tayali shitamo sho. Ding'ombe dyangu pamo na vanavave vakunyeta, ndishindanga. Nadoni vinu uti vivelé tayali. Idananga kushitamo akuno.” ’
Vanavo mene kutanana kutwa myanda kuka, jumo kundila kwake, junji kumipango vyake.
Napane vanji vo kuvakamula vatumika vo kuvakamanga na kuvabyaa.
Bai umu kutwala kushimwa. Nae akavatumidya vaing'ondo vake ndavabamola avalá vakubyaa na kutaa moto njini wave.
“Napanelo nae kuvaulila vatumika vake kushidoni, ‘Shitamo ashi mwiu shivelé tayali kanji napanelo vakulalikigwa havavaikidile.
Napavedoni wena mudibalabala, uti vamulota kuvakodya vo, valalike vaide kushitamo.’
Bai vatumika vakauka ndindila uti kupita vavakunganga vanu uti vavashivakodya, vakalau na vambone mpaka pashitamo po kuumbalanila vakulalikigwa.
“Napenelo umu akainjila nng'ande amulá kuvalola vakulalikigwa avalá pandamu kumwona munu jumo wavakangwadidye dinguvo dyashitamo.
Nae kutwala kumudya, ‘Mbwana, wako winjidilé dashi nng'ande amu bila kugwalila dinguvo dyashitamo?’ Nae kumalala vila.
Bai umu jo kuvaulila vatumika vake kushidoni, ‘Nkamule mumunge mmadodo pamo na mmakono mukanjele panda po kushii! Kushinu kulota kupagwa shililo na kutuka shulu nkanywa.’
Nadoni vanu voe vankulalikigwa ila vakutandalegwa vavelé padyoko.”
Napanelo mapalishayo vakaumananga apo kutwala kwikala nguguvale wakunteja ntego vampate mu lo malove ake.

Nadoni vankuvatumidya vakwoda vave na vanu vashipinga shimwe Elode kuka ndamudya, “Mwalimu, wetu tundimanya shana kenga wako ni umunu waumwiu na unkupundisha kwaumwiu indila yalota Nnungu úkatakigwa kupundishigwa na munu mwaa haunalola ing'ope yamunu.
Kanji napanelo twaulila, wako wona dashi? Ni shambone nkati mulilamulo lyetu kunnipa Shashali ukodi kwali mene?”
Yesu amanya vyakunyata vyave kutwala kushidoni, “Mwaa shani munkungulinga? Mmanu mmashinankulaba mwe!
Ngulodya akuno yela yamunalipa ukodi yo.” Vanavo kunnodya dinali imo
kutwala nae kuvaudya, “Da ing'ope ai na namakong'o aju mwene nyani?”
Vanavo do, “Shashali!” Nae kushidoni, “Bai vimwe Shashali mwing'e mwene Shashali na vimwe Nnungu mwing'e mwene Nnungu.”
Vanavo pavaigwite davo vandíshanga kutwala kunneka kuumananga kuka.
Napanelo muliduva lyolyo lyo Yesu vandímwidila mashadukayo vánataukanga kudyuka kwavakupela kutwala kumudya doni,
“Mwalimu, Musha atwaulidilé doni, nnume akapela bila kummalakela mwana ndyagwe, nung'une wawakujala inimmaikila ainjile ding'ande pakulota ammalakele vana wakujala.
Napanelo pakati petu vandípagwa vanung'unumunu saba. Ntandi jo kulomba kutwala kupela, kwodamwaa hamalakadíle mwana, nung'une jo andíinjila ding'ande.
Nanae wambili kuntandakela momo, wantatu mpaka namalilikila wasaba.
Kumwisho kwake nanae nkongwe jo kupela.
Napanelo kushi muliduva lyakudyuka vanu lyo, mwene namwili aju shana alota kuva wakwashi pakuva vanu saba ava uti vaninnomba?”
Yesu kushidoni, “Mwenu munkuduwangika mwaa me kumanya Maandiko na ata dimongo dyake Nnungu.
Muwakati wakudyuka vapadíle hakupali kulomba kwali kulombwa, valota kuva kenga vanjelo kuwa.
Da napane ing'ano ai yakudyuka vapadíle, hamushamidye mwatangaladile Nnungu?
Nae atédoni, ‘Nangu ni Nnungu umwe Abulaamu, Nnungu umwe Ishaki na Nnungu umwe Yakobo.’ Mwenu, Nnungu jo hanava shinu Nnungu wavakupela, nae ni Nnungu wavangumi.”
Bai dimbumba dyavanu pavaigwite davo vandíshanga namene mapundisho ake.
Napanelo mapalishayo vakaigwe kenga Yesu andivadima nshasholo mashadukayo, vandímwikalila shemba.
Bai pakati pave munu jumo, mwalimu wadishaliya andímudya Yesu anninga aashidoni,
“Mwalimu, lilamulo likumene nkati mu Lilamulo ni lyakwashi?”
Yesu kushidoni, “Nnagwaledye Umu, jo Nnungu wako na ntima wako uti, ungumi wako uti na ding'anong'ano dyako uti.
Ali ni lilamulo litandi na likumene.
Lyambili lilinganana na alyo ni ali, Nnagwaledye mujo kenga wako umwene.
Mumalamulo ala mavila ni mwalipandukanga Lilamulo uti na Vakulava.”
Bai mapalishayo vakadyaniénge, Yesu andívaudya,
“Mwenu, ing'ano imwe Klistu ai mwona dashi? Jojo jo mwanagwe nyani?” Vanavo do, “Mwanagwe Daudi.”
Yesu kushidoni, “Napanelo mwaa shani jo Daudi alangalalegwa na Imumu, aninshema kuva nang'olo wake? Mwaa nae atédoni,
“ Umu andimwaulila Nang'olo wangu doni, Ikala kunkanakono kwangu mpaka nangu ndivavike vamongo vako kumaulu kwako.”
“Napanelo ikava kenga Daudi jo ankunshema Nang'olo, ilota kuululika dashi kavili nae kuva mwanagwe?”
Bai hapagwíte munu wakujang'ula ata lilove limo na kutunduvangila muliduva alyo hapagwíte kavili munu wakulyalaveka kumudya shinu shoeshoe.
Napanelo Yesu andítangola na imbumba pamo na vakwoda vake kushidoni,
“Vamwalimu vadishaliya pamo na mapalishayo vandidiva lyutu lyake Musha.
Napavedoni igwilila na tandedya uti avilá vyavatangola ila hamunavajedye vyavatenda. Vanavo vyavatangola havanatandedya shinu.
Vandáunga dibasha dyakwidopa dikamadyánga mwakunyakatila kuvatika vanu vanji vene kulamana na kudabunya vela.
“Vovo vo kula shinu shavatenda, ava mandole kwavanu. Ni ashi shivatádya vatumbudye vidingo vyave vyavalyunga na valapeye mapepe adikanju dyave!
Muvikukulu kuvanagwela kwikala mumautu aishima na muvitala vyamikodyanio vaikale viteng'u vyamushu.
Vanavo mumautu aumbala kuvanagwela vavaudyange na ishima na vanu vavasheme ‘Labi.’
Kanji mwenu hanapagwe wakushamegwa ‘Labi’ mwaa mwalimu wenu avelé jumo bai. Mwenu apa uti mmanung'unumunu gweka.
Namomo mwenu mushilambo amu hanapagwe munu wakunshema ‘Atata’ mwaa Tatagwenu wakuwa avelé jumo bai.
Na ata hamunashamegwe ‘Mmanang'olo’ mwaa nang'olo wenu avelé jumo bai, nae ni Klistu.
Nadoni nang'olo pakati penu inimmaikila ave ntumika wenu.
Woewoe álitumbudya jo mwene, vanantaa dyoni na woewoe álishapeya, vanantumbudya.

“Napanelo mupambale mwenu mmamwalimu mmadishaliya na mmapalishayo. Mmanu mmashinankulaba mwe! Mushalangila maalati utawala wakuwa kwavanu! Mwenu mmene hamunainjila shinu na vainjíla avalá, munkuvaleya.

“Mupambale mwenu mmamwalimu mmadishaliya na mmapalishayo. Mmanu mmashinankulaba mwe! Mumalila imanga na mwangu pakulota mumpate wakuliinjidyanga jumo tu bai, mukampata munkumpindula kuva mwana wakushena kumpunda mmene.

“Mupambale mwenu mmananangalaledi múkalola muushidoni, ‘Woewoe álilapila ing'ande ya Nnungu, kulilapa ako hakuvé mana, napane aijá álilapila shaabu ivéle mwing'ande yake Nnungu, andyungigwa kwakulilapa ako.’
Mmanu mmakubanga na múkalola davo mwe! Na apa shikumene ni shakwashi, shaabu kwali ing'ande ya Nnungu itadídye shaabu sho shiilimyangike?
Namomo munkushidoni, ‘Woewoe álilapila alutali, kulilapa ako hakuvé mana, napane aijá álilapila shadaka shapashanya alutali, andyungigwa kwakulilapa ako.’
Mmanu mmakubanga na múkalola davo mwe! Na apa shikumene ni shakwashi, shadaka kwali alutali lutadídye shadaka sho shiilimyangike?
Napavedoni aijá álilapila alutali, alilapila lwo alutali na vinu uti vivéle pashanya pake.
Aijá álilapila ing'ande ya Nnungu alilapila kwaing'ande ayo na kwa aijá ánama amo.
Namomo aijá álilapila kuwa, alilapila kushiteng'u shake Nnungu na kwa aijá áikele pashiteng'u asho.

“Mupambale mwenu mmamwalimu mmadishaliya na mmapalishayo. Mmanu mmashinankulaba mwe! Mumya lipungu lyakumi lyamamba akunung'ila, linjano na inakilo kutwala vinu vikumene vya Lilamulo yani ishaliya, shididi na likulupililo, me kwodedya. Mwenu inimmaikila mwodedye vinu avi bila kwiludyanga vinji vyo.
Mmananangalaledi múkalola davo mwe! Mmanu múnanshinyina njanjema mmedi kutwala kummila ngamila.
“Mupambale mwenu mmamwalimu mmadishaliya na mapalishayo. Mmanu mmashinankulaba mwe! Munáukanga diwene pamo na vyani panda gweka nkati mo muumbele lung'unuku na ulavilavi.
Mmapalishayo múkalola davo mwe! Shitandi diwene pamo na vyani, ukanga nkati mo pakulota panda po napanavo, patakate.

“Mupambale mwenu mmamwalimu mmadishaliya na mmapalishayo. Mmanu mmashinankulaba mwe! Muvelé mwavyonga vyavapakenge lila. Panda apa mwiu kwaneka kuva vyakwalala, nkati mwake mo muumbele magwangwa na dinamuna uti dyaudagwa.
Ni kenga mwenu panda apa vanu vankumwona kuva mmanu mmaishaliya napane nkati mo, shindimuumbala shinankulaba na ungave-lilamulo.
“Mupambale mwenu mmamwalimu mmadishaliya na mmapalishayo. Mmanu mmashinankulaba mwe! Muumbila vyonga vyavakulava na kupita munemya vyonga vyavanu vaishaliya.
Mutangola doni, ‘Wetu leka tùpagwite muwakati wavanyakala vetu, hatunaliinjidyange na vanavo mukujaa myadi vyavakulava.’
Napavedoni munkulyumidya mwemwe mmene ushuda wakuva mmana va avalá vavabyénge vakulava.
Bai napanelo mwenu dududila madengo avatunduvenge vanyakalavenu.
“Mwenu mmanyoka, udukulu wadinyoka dyaishumu mwe! Mulota kutila dashi ukumu yakushena?

Napavedoni nangu ninkuntumididya mwenu vakulava, vanu valimanyilo na vamwalimu. Napane mwenu vovo vo, vanji mundavabyaa, vanji kuvapambilila, vanji muvitala vyenu vyakulipudidya kuvashapa viboko na vovo vo, kula likaja mundavalumbata.

Nadoni mwenu mundapakala makosha amyadi vijaíke muulongo vyavanu vaishaliya. Mundapakala kutunduvangila kumyadi vimwe Abeli munu waishaliya mpaka kumyadi vimwe Shakaliya mwanagwe Balakiya wamummyee pakatipakati akuno kwalutali ako kulyutu lyakujowa.
Ninkumwaulila mwiu doni, shaushanga ashi shindavawikila vanu vaimbula ai.

“Yelusalemu, wako Yelusalemu! Aijá ávabyaanga vakulava na kuvaamanga majanga uti avalá vanimpalakadedya. Myanda mingapi nangu vyangulingangidile kuvavika pamo vanavako kenga mwanavautamilila ng'uku vanavake, mwenu me kulota!
Mwenu! Likaja lyenu lindava lidembe.
Ninkumwaulila doni, mwiko hamungwona kavili mpaka muwakati wamulota kutangola kushidoni, ‘Aalaligwe aijá áida palina limwe Umu.’ ”
Yesu akauma mwing'ande ya Nnungu. Nae auka, vakwoda vake vandímuukila kutwala kunnangudyanga vashanga ding'ande adilá dyapaing'ande ya Nnungu.
Yesu kushidoni, “Mwenu munkwona uti vinu avi? Ninkumwaulila mwiu doni, mwiko haliikala lijanga pashanya lijangamwagwe palikabamolegwa.”

Nae akaikala palishinga lyamilandi vya Ulivela kutwala vakwoda vake kumuukila àve gweka ndamudya, “Twaulila! Da vinu avi vilota kutandeka duvani? Shimanyikilo shani shilóta kulilodya kwida kwako na mwisho wawakati?”
Nae kutwala kuvaulila kushidoni, “Lilaledye pakulota hanapagwe wakunduwanga.
Vandaida vanu voe vatumila lina lyangu vaashidoni, ‘Nangu Klistu,’ vovo vo vandavaduwanga vanu voe.
Mundaigwa ding'ondo na manyinyi ading'ondo, mwenu po, hamunajope. Vinu avyo vindivaikila vitandeke ila haunava shinu mwisho.
Venentete vandatandana ing'ondo na venentetemwave, utawala undatandana ing'ondo na utawalamwagwe. Indaumilila indala na shindangenda mumautu akuvilingananga.
Vinu avyo uti ni shitunduvangilo tu shamauvilo akushuluwa.
“Napanelo vanavo vanankamula kumuukanavo ndamuuvyanga na vanammyaa. Mwemwe mundavangadika kwavenentete uti kwamwaa walina lyangu.
Muwakati awo voe vandavainjidyanga mulidambi, vanji vandavalimya na vanji vandavangadika.
Vandaumilila vakulava voe vakushang'apa na vovo vo, vandavaduwanga voe.
Linagwaledyo lyavanu voe lindapunguka kwamwaa wakwanjadyeka ungave-lilamulo,
napane aijá álota kulipililila mpaka kumwisho, ajo andaambwalegwa.
Nadoni ntenga wambone wautawala undavalangangigwa mushilambo uti pakulota uve ushuda kwavenentete uti kutwala kuwika mwisho.
“Napanelo pamulota kwona shakudabukanga shiídanavo kubamola shávalangenge nkúlava Daniele shìimidile palyutu lyakwilimyanga, munu áshomya amanye mana ake.
Bai vavéle ku Yudeya vatukutile kumashinga.
Ávele panda apumula hanatakatuke kwinjila nng'ande ndatwala shinu shoeshoe.
Namomo ávele kumagwelu hanauje kuka ndatwala dinguvo dyake.
Vapambale vakongwe valóta kuvanavo vitumbo na valóta kujang'edya mumaduva alo.
Shwali pakulota hamunatile muwakati washipwepwe kwali muliduva lyakupumula.
Muwakati awo andapagwa mauvilo makumene ainamuna íkaumilidile tangu kukandyangigwa shilambo mpaka nelo apa na lolo lo, mwiko hapagwa shinu kavili.
Leka Umu akapungwile maduva alo hanapagwe ata munu jumo e akambwalégwe, napane kwamwaa wavakutandalegwa, maduva lo, andipungula.
“Napanelo munu akamwaulila doni, ‘Mwenu, Klistu aju apa,’ kwali, ‘Apali aju,’ hamunankulupile.
Mwaa vandaumilila vaklistu vakushang'apa na vakulava vakushang'apa. Vovo vandatenda vimanyikilo vikumene na vyakutikinikanga kwambangidya vavaashadyange ikaululika ata mpaka vakutandalegwa.
Ngwigwa! Vinu avi nimwaulila kaladavo.
“Napavedoni vanu vakamwaulila kushidoni, ‘Mwenu! Nae apali kushimbweshe akulá,’ hamunauke. Kwali vakaashidoni, ‘Apali nng'ande amulá,’ hamunakulupile.
Kenga mo mwakunatandela kumeta kúnalangadya kula kushinu kwamwanda umo ni momo mwailota kuvalela kwida kwa Mwana Wamunu.
Pauvele ntui, malembo andaumbalanila popo.
Po palota kumalilikinneu mauvilo amaduva alo, ‘Liduva lindadimba, mwedi hauvala, dinondo kuwa ko dindagwanga na vyadimongo vyakuniania vindating'inigwa.’
“Bai muwakati wowo kuwa shindaaneka shimanyikilo shake Mwana Wamunu kutwala makola uti amushilambo kutangadikanga. Vovo vo vandamwona Mwana Wamunu aaloka mumaundi na dimongo pamo na lishangelo lyoe.

Muwakati wowo nae andavatumidya vanjelo vake vaditalumbeta dyakuma namene vauke vakavatwalange vakutandalegwa vake mudisemu nsheshe dyamushilambo kutunduvangila nkono unji wakuwa ndamalilila nkono unji.
“Napanelo kwankungu lipundishe nkong'o au. Paunaipukila mwenu mumanyinneu doni, shipondo shindiwika.
Namomo mukona vinu avyo vitandeka, manyinneu doni, mwisho uwikile, uvé mo mmilango myenu.
Ninkumwaulila mwiu doni, vanu vaimbula ai havamalilika vinu avi vikanava kutandeka.
Kuwa na pai kundapita ila malove angu mwiko hapita.
“Napane liduva lyene lyo na isaa, hapali ámanyite, ata vanjelo kuwa havamanyite, ata Mwana hamanyite ila ámanyite ni Atata bai.
Kenga mo mwaivalaléle muwakati umwe Noe nimumo momo mwailota kuvalela kwida kwa Mwana Wamunu.
Ni kenga momo likanava kuwika livambwe, vanu vashindalya, vashindakumbila, vashindalomba na kulombwa mpaka muliduva lyainjidile Noe mwingalava
vanavo pavakamanya shinu kudabanga kwida vila livambwe ndavalya do kobo! Nadoni kwida kwake Mwana Wamunu kulota kuvalela momo.
Vanu vavili vàvele mulishamba, jumo andatwaligwa junji kulakegwa.
Vakongwe vavili vatipula, jumo andatwaligwa junji kulakegwa.
Napavedoni ava mevo mwaa hamumanyite liduva lyalota kwida Umu wenu.
Kanji napanelo manya doni, tatamunu wapaing'ande leka àmanyite wakati wakwida nkwíva, akandiikala mevo na hanaleke ing'ande yake vatutumula.
Napavedoni namwenu momo lipanganiange mwaa Mwana Wamunu andaida muwakati wamukalindila mwenu.
“Da ntumika shani wakukulupilika na wading'ano wammikile nang'olo wake kuva nanangalaledi wapaing'ande pake na kuvapa shakulya muwakati uvaikidíle?
Andijaligwa ntumika aijá walota kunkodya nang'olo wake pauja atandela momo.
Ninkumwaulila mwiu doni, anankamudya vyake uti.
Kanji napanelo ntumika aijá nkalau akatangola shintimatima doni, ‘Nang'olo wangu ankutima kuja,’
bai kutunduvanga kuvakamanga vatumikamwagwe, kulyanga gwamba na kukumbila pamo na vakwambalwa,
nang'olo wake andaida muliduva lyakalindila na wakati wakamanyite.
Nae anannumulanianga kutwala shingumi shake ndaanganianga na shavamalambi. Kushinu ako kundapagwa shililo na kutuka shulu nkanywa.
“Napanelo kuwika kwautawala wakuwa ko kulota kuva mwavali kumi vatwéte dikalaboi dyave kuka nannindila nkúlomba.
Pakati pave mwanu vavele vakupuwanikanga, vanji mwanu vo kuva vading'ano.
Vakupuwanikanga vo pavatwete dikalaboi dyave, havanyukéte mauta alibadila.
Napanelo avalá vading'ano, pavatwete dikalaboi dyave vandínyukatinneu mauta muvitumba vyave.
Bai nkúlomba patimile kuwika, uti vali vo vandíindila mpaka kuukila mulwono.
Napane shilo shing'ati panda po kwigwinika kukugwanga kwavanu vaashidoni, ‘Nkúlomba ankwida, wena munkanshinge.’
Bai uti vali avalá kutakatukanga kupanganianga dikalaboi dyave.
Avalá vakupuwanikanga kuvaulila vading'ano doni, ‘Tumajela mauta enu dikalaboi dyetu mauta andimalilika!’
Vading'ano vo kushidoni, ‘Hatutamwa! Twonadavo mauto lo, hatutosha wetu namu mwenu. Wena ko kwavanashumidya ko, mukashume.’
Vanavo pavaukile kukushuma mauta, kunyuma akuno nkúlomba kuwika. Bai avalá ve valipanganiénge vandíinjila namu nkúlomba pashitamo kutwala ing'ande yo kugalola.
Ling'oto, vali vanji vo kuwika kutwala kushema, ‘Nang'olo, nang'olo wako, tushimulila!’
Nae kushidoni, ‘Ninkumwaulila mwiu doni, nangu mwenu po hanimmanyite.’
Napavedoni ava mevo mwaa liduva lyene lyo na isaa, hamumanyite.
“Namomo ilota kuva kenga munu átenda shimwanda kutwala kuvashema vatumika vake kuvakamudya mali ake.
Jumo kumupa ditalendu mwanu, junji kumupa mbili kutwala wantatu jo kumupa imo, yani kwodana na lyululilo lyakula munu mwene jo kuma kuka.
Bai akauma aijá ápatile ditalendu mwanu, nae akatenda nshulusho mpaka kwanjadyedya dinji mwanu.
Aijá ápatile mbili, nanae kwanjadyedya dinji mbili.
Napane aijá ápatile italendu imo, akauma kuka ndaimbila pai kutwala wo njuluku wo wanang'olo wake wo, kupiya.
“Ukapite wakati woe, nang'olo wave ankuja na ankutenda shikonda na vanavo.
Bai akaida apalá aijá ápatile ditalendu mwanu, kumya ditalendu dinji mwanu aashidoni, ‘Nang'olo, uníngukamudya ditalendu mwanu. Lola napane nindyanjadyedya dinji mwanu.’
Nang'olo wake kushidoni, ‘Shambone namene! Wako ni untumika shii na wakukulupilika! Undikulupilika kwavinu padiki napavedoni ndakukamudya vinu vyoe. Bai ida upuwange na nang'olo wako.’
Akaida aijá waditalendu mbili nanae kushidoni, ‘Nang'olo, uníngukamudya ditalendu mbili. Lola napane nindyanjadyedya dinji mbili.’
Nang'olo jo kushidoni, ‘Shambone namene! Wako ni untumika shii na wakukulupilika. Undikulupilika kwavinu padiki napavedoni ndakukamudya vinu vyoe. Bai ida upuwange na nang'olo wako.’
“Kumwisho akaida aijá ápatile italendu imo kutwala kushidoni, ‘Nang'olo, nangu ndíkumanya kenga wako ni umunu wakunanapanga, únapuna paukalimile na únalimangila paukapandile.
Napanelo kwamwaa wakukujopa, ndítwala italendu yako yo kuka ndapiya pai. Lola, shako sho, ashi.’
Nang'olo wake kushidoni, ‘Wako ni untumika nkalau na umwondo! Da undímanya kenga nangu ni nimunu ngúnapuna pandikalimile na ngúnalimangila pandikapandile?
Bai ukanditwala njuluku wangu kuka ndavika kulibengi pakulota nimwene pandikaujite ngukodye shangu namu ashilá shaanjadyeke.
Bai mpoke njuluku wo mumupe ávenavo ditalendu kumi jo.
Kula ávenavo vandamupa na andavanavo kupunda apo. Napane aijá ákavenavo, ata sho shavenavo sho, vanampoka.
Bai ntumika aju wakubanga ntwale munjele panda kushii ko! Kushinu ako kundapagwa shililo na kutuka shulu nkanywa.’
“Mwana Wamunu palota kwida mulishangelo lyake pamo na vanjelo vake andaikala pashiteng'u shake shalishangelo.
Venentete uti vandaumbalanila pamevo pake, nae kuvaapukanianga kenga mo mwanavaapukaniangidya nkúshunga-dinyama vambudi na vangandolo
kutwala vangandolo kuvavika kunkanakono kwake, vambudi kuvavika kunshanda.
Napane jo Umu jo andavaulila avalá vakunkanakono kwake kushidoni, ‘Idananga mwenu mwalaligwe namu atata! Pwashalela utawala wavankandyangididye tangu kukandyangigwa kwashilambo.
Mwaa paingukodíle indala shakulya muningupa, paingukodíle inyota medi muningupa, panguvéle ninjeni muningupwashalela,
panguvé na uwou muningugwadya, panguvé ninnwele muningutumika na panguungwídye, mwenu muningulola!’
“Napanelo avalá vaishaliya kumudya, ‘Nang'olo, da duvani patukugwene ìkukodile indala kutwala wetu kukulisha, ìkukodile inyota wetu kukupa medi,
ùvele unjeni wetu kukupwashalela, ùvenavo uwou wetu kukugwadya,
ùvele unnwele wetu kukutumika na ùungwidye, wetu kwida ndakulola?’
Umu kutwa kushidoni, ‘Ninkumwaulila mwiu doni, kula shinu shamuntandalele ndikidiki-uti pakati pavanung'uvangu ava, mungutandalelé nangu.’
“Bai napanelo andavaulila avalá vavé kunshanda kwake kushidoni, ‘Tumukanga apa mwenu mmanu mmadilana! Kuka kushena, kumoto úkamalilika wavankandyangididye Ndamoni pamo na vanjelo vake.
Mwaa paingukodíle indala shakulya hamungupele, paingukodíle inyota medi hamungupele, panguvé ninjeni hamungupwashaladile,
panguvé na uwou hamungugwadidye, panguvé ninnwele hamungutumikidile na panguungwídye, mwenu hamungulodile!’
Namomo navanavo vandajang'ula, ‘Nang'olo, da duvani patukugwene wako ìkukodile indala kwali inyota, ùvele unjeni kwali na uwou, ùvele unnwele kwali ùungwidye kutwala wetu mene kukutumikila?’
Nae kutwa kuvajang'ula kushidoni, ‘Ninkumwaulila mwiu doni, kula mwanda wamukantandadile ndikidiki-uti pakati pa ava, hamungutandadile nangu.’
Bai ava vandauka kushaushanga shíkamalilika, avalá vaishaliya kuka kushingumi shíkamalilika.”
Napanelo Yesu akamalile kutangola malove ala uti, andívaulila vakwoda vake kushidoni,
“Mwenu mundimanya kenga andibakila maduva mavili pakulota kuwika Pasaka. Mwana Wamunu vanankamudya kwavanu pakulota vankamele panshalaba.”
Napanelo vanang'olo vavakulangalalela-shadaka namu vanang'olo vavenentete vandíkadyania paing'ande imwe nkúlangalalela-shadaka nkumene aijá wavanshema Kaipashi
kutwala kwikala nguguvale wakuteja ntego vankamule na vammyae.
Napane vovo vo vashishidoni, “Haunave wakati washikukulu mwaa inkuulukika venentete kutenda mandamano akupinga.”
Napanelo Yesu àvele ku Betaniya paing'ande imwe Simoni wamalemba
àikele pandamu, popo po kuwika nkongwe jumo ànyukete ishupa yamauta akunung'angila auka njuluku woe kutwala kummiminangila mmuti.
Vakwoda vake pavagwene shitendo asho kuvanyatila, vanavo do, “Da asala ai uti yanyamani?
Mauta ala vakandishumidya na njuluku woe namene kutwala kuvapa vákave pashinu.”
Yesu amanya makumbukililo ave andítangola kushidoni, “Mwaa shani nkongwe jo munkumwangaishanga? Nae aningutandela shinu shambone.
Vákave pashinu vo, ngwengwe mundapagwanavo napane nangu, hangupagwa ngwengwe namu mwenu.
Nae andimiminangila mauta mumili mwangu pakulota angupanganiange yakungushika.
Ninkumwaulila mwiu doni, kula kushinu kwavalota kuvalanganga ntenga wambone mushilambo amu, namomo vinu vyatandile nkongwe aju vandavalanganga kenga kumbukumbu kwake nae.”
Napanelo jumo pakati pa avalá kumi na mbili, aijá walina Yudashi Shikaliyote, andívaukila vanang'olo vavakulangalalela-shadaka
ndavaudya doni, “Mulota kungulipa nyamani nangu ndikankamudya mwenu Yesu jo?” Vanavo kutwala kunnipa dishingo salasini dyalyava.
Bai kutunduvangila apo, Yudashi ashindalambela litala lyakunkamudidya kwavanavo.
Napanelo muliduva litandi lyashikukulu shamagung'u ákave nkukumuku, Yesu vandímuukila vakwoda vake ndamudya doni, “Da Pasaka ai, ulota tukakupanganiangidye pashi ulye?”
Nae kushidoni, “Wena kunjini ko mukatangole na munu jumo kushidoni, ‘Mwalimu atédoni, “Wakati wangu undivandika, nadoni paing'ande pako apa ndatandela Pasaka na vakwoda vangu.” ’ ”
Mwiu vakwoda vake kutenda kenga mo mwavatumidile; vanavo vandípanganianga Pasaka ayo.
Pauwikile wakati wayalyulo Yesu kwikala pandamu na vakwoda vake.
Akuno valya kutwala kuvaulila doni, “Ninkumwaulila mwiu doni, pakati penu jumo anangulimya.”
Vakwoda vake kutwala kuvaida shipalodi shoe namene na kutunduvanga kudya vaashidoni, “Nang'olo, da nangu apa?”
Nae kushidoni, “Aijá álidya pandamu namu nangu ni jojo álota kungulimya.
Mwana Wamunu andapalela kenga mo mwavandikidile vamwamba nae napane apambale aijá álota kunnimya Mwana Wamunu jo! Munu ajo kudyanga hanavalekwe.”
Kutwala Yudashi aijá nannimya kumudya, “Labi, da nangu apa?” Yesu kushidoni, “Wako ni úvalanganga.”
Muwakati wavashilya, Yesu akatwala ligung'u kwalaliya kutwala kumajanianga kuvapa vakwoda vake aashidoni, “Twala mulye! Au ni mili wangu.”
Namomo akatwala shikombe akalambwalela kutwala kuvapa vakwoda vake aashidoni, “Kumbilanga uti mwenu apa.
Avi apa ni myadi vyangu, myadi vyaimbodi vivajaikíla voe kwakulivalivigwa kwamadambi.
Ninkumwaulila doni, mwiko hangukumbila kavili ugwalwa au wavyepo mpaka muliduva alyo lyangulota kukumbila ugwalwa waambi namu mwenu muutawala umwe Atata.”
Vakaimba lwimu kutwala kuumananga kuka kulishinga lyamilandi vya Ulivela.
Napanelo Yesu ankuvaulila kushidoni, “Mwenu uti shilo sho shanelo ashi munangwambukanga mwaa indyandikigwa doni, “ ‘Nammyaa nkúshunga kutwala dingandolo dyamushipinga asho kumwadilikananga.’
Napane pangudyuka po, nangu ndalangalela kuka ku Galileya.”
Patulu kutwala kushidoni, “Ata ikava kenga vavangu ava uti vandakuleka, nangu mwiko handikuleka!”
Yesu kushidoni, “Ninkukwaulila mwiu doni, shilo sho shanelo ashi ng'uku akanava kukangavela unangukana myanda mitatu.”
Patulu do, “Ata ikava yakupela namu wako, nangu mwiko handikukana.” Kutwala vakwoda vake vanji uti kutangalela momo.
Napanelo Yesu ankuka pamo na vakwoda vake kulyutu lyavashema Geteshemani na ankuvaulila kushidoni, “Ikalanga apa! Nangu nguka mushu amulá ndashwali.”
Nae kuntwala Patulu namu vanavake Shebedeu vavili. Bai kutunduvanga kumwida shipalodi na kumwida kwangaikanga
kutwala kushidoni, “Ungumi wangu unkuvanavo shipalodi shakutadya kupela. Mwenu ikalanga popo apa, mupimile namu nangu.”
Nae akauka mushu padyoko kugwa ing'ope kutindya pai kutwala kushwali aashidoni, “Atata, ikaululika nyemya pamili pangu luwene alu ila haunatende mwangulatela nangu, tenda mwaulatela wako umwene.”
Bai nae ankuja, ankuvakodya vakwoda vake vàvele mulwono kutwala kumudya Patulu, “Shasho! Da mwenu po hamuvé dimongo dyakupimila namu nangu ata isaa imo vela ai?
Pimila na shwali pakulota hamunainjile mukutubigwa! Imumu mwiu inkuva tayali, mili ni udabadabénge.”
Nae akauka kavili mwanda wambili kutwala kushwali aashidoni, “Atata, ikava kenga hayululika luwene alu kunyema bila kukumbila nangu, bai ive mo mwaulatela wako umwene.”
Akauja kavili kuvakodya vàlalenge mwaa mevo ave andidapelwa na lwono.
Nae akavaleka kuka kavili ndashwali mwanda wantatu aujidya malove lolo matandi.
Bai ankuujila kwavakwoda vake kutwala kushidoni, “Da mpaka ambi munkulala? Doni po munkupumula? Mwenu, undiwika wakati wavalota kunkamudya Mwana Wamunu kumakono kwavakutega.
Takatukanga tuke! Wakungulimya jo, andivandika!”

Napanelo Yesu akuno atangola kwidinneu Yudashi jumo pakati pa avalá kumi na mbili pamo na imbumba yavanu vànyukatenge maambila na dilungu. Vanu avo, vandítumigwa na vanang'olo vavakulangalalela-shadaka na vanang'olo vavenentete.
Jo wakunnimya jo andívapa shimanyikilo aashidoni, “Munu jo wangulota kumwambatila ni jojo, mwenu nkamulinneu.”
Nae kukinneu kumwe Yesu ndaashidoni, “Labi, umumi?” Bai kutwala kumwambatila.
Yesu kushidoni, “Mbwana, tenda shawidilile.” Bai avalá vavé namu nae vakamuukila Yesu kunkamula kumunga.
Napanelo mwe! Jumo pakati pa avalá vavé namu Yesu akakamula lyambila lyake, kwalamola, kummyaa ntumika wake nkúlangalalela-shadaka nkumene kutwala kunnumula lyatu lyake.
Yesu kushidoni, “Jela lyambila lyako mwishavi! Uti avalá vakulupíla maambila andavapedya lo maambila.
Da nangu naulule kunjugwangila Atata kutwala nae kutumididyanneu dimbumba dyavanjelo vaing'ondo dyakupunda kumi na mbili?
Na davo po alota kuwikila dashi popo Maandiko atédoni, ‘Indivaikila itandakele momo’?”

Muwakati wowo Yesu kutangalela imbumba kushidoni, “Kenga nkalau shamwida na maambila na dilungu kwida nangukamula? Kula liduva ngushindapagwa mwing'ande ya Nnungu ngwìkele ngupundisha ata hamunguungile.
Uti avi vinkutandeka pakulota awikile popo Maandiko avakulava.” Bai vakwoda vake uti vanínneka kutwala kutukutanga.
Napanelo avalá vankamwíle Yesu vandímuukanavo kwing'ande imwe Kaipashi nkúlangalalela-shadaka nkumene kulyutu lyavakadyaniénge vamwalimu vadishaliya pamo na vanang'olo.
Patulu ashindamwoda Yesu kwakushu mpaka mulugwani lwankúlangalalela-shadaka nkumene jo. Nae akainjila kutwala kwikala pamo na vakushunga pakulota aone ashilá shilóta kutandeka.
Bai vanang'olo vavakulangalalela-shadaka pamo na ikamati uti vashindalambela ushuda waushwang'a pakulota vammalidye,
napane havapatíle ata ikava kenga vandípatikananga vashuda voe. Kudabanga vila kwida vanu vavili
naashidoni, “Aju apa ashitangola doni, ‘Nangu ninkuulula kubamalanga ing'ande yake Nnungu kutwala kudenga kwamaduva matatu kumalila.’ ”
Bai nkúlangalalela-shadaka nkumene kutakatuka kutwa kushidoni, “Da hashipali shakujang'ula vyavakutambudyanga avi?”
Yesu kumalala. Nkúlangalalela nkumene jo do, “Palina lya Nnungu mumi, twaulila ikava kenga wako ni Klistu aijá mwanagwe Nnungu!”
Yesu kushidoni, “Wako ni útangola. Leka apo kutunduvangila ambi apa mundamwona Mwana Wamunu àikele kunkanakono kwake Wadimongo-uti na aida mumaundi kuwa.”
Bai nkúlangalalela-shadaka nkumene aijá andípapulanga dinguvo dyake aashidoni, “Andikupulu! Napane tulambela ushuda shani kavili? Mwenu mundigwa kukupulu aku.
Napanelo mwona dashi?” Vanavo do, “Inimmaikila apele.”
Bai vanavo kunshunangila mata kumevo, kunkanyola na kunkoma malatuma
vaashidoni, “Wako Klistu, tuvalangangila akukanywelé nyani?”
Napanelo Patulu andíikala mulugwani kutwala ntumika jumo mwali kumuukila ndamwaulila doni, “Nawako uvele pamo namu Yesu wa ku Galileya.”
Nae kukana vanu uti vamwigwa aashidoni, “Shawamba wako sho nangu hangunamanya shinu.”
Bai pashuumila pannango walugwani, ntumika junji nkongwe kumwona kutwala kuvaulila vanu vavéle apo kushidoni, “Munu aju avele pamo namu Yesu wa ku Nashaleti.”
Patulu kukana alilapa mwanda unji aashidoni, “Nangu munu ajo hanimmanyite.”
Muwakati padyoko vanu vavéle mulyutu alyo vandímuukila ndamwaulila kushidoni, “Wako mwiu wamushipinga shosho tunkukumanyila shitangodi shako.”
Nae kutunduvanga kulitaa dilana na kulilapa, “Nangu munu ajo hanimmanyite!” Ng'uku kutwala kukangavalenneu.
Patulu kukumbukilinneu malove atangwéle Yesu kushidoni, “Ng'uku akanava kukangavela wako unangukana myanda mitatu.” Nadoni nae andyúmila panda ndatumbula ing'uto.
Napanelo lyamba linyeiku, vanang'olo uti vavakulangalalela-shadaka pamo na vanang'olo vavenentete vandíikala nguguvale kutwala kuunganila vammyae Yesu.
Nadoni vanavo vakamunga kumuukanavo kumwe Pilatu nang'olo walijimbo.
Napanelo Yudashi aijá annimídye Yesu, pamanyite doni Yesu andyukumigwa andílilingulanga kutwala kuujiya dishingo salasini adilá dyalyava kwavanang'olo vavakulangalalela-shadaka na kwavanang'olo
aashidoni, “Nditega. Nditadya vijaike myadi víkave makosha.” Vanavo kushidoni, “Wetu shetu nyamani? Mwaa awo wako wako umwene.”
Bai nae akajaa dishingo adilá mwing'ande ya Nnungu mwene kuka ndalipambilila.

Napanelo vanang'olo vavakulangalalela-shadaka vakatwala dishingo adilá kutwa kushidoni, “Lilamulo linkutuleya njuluku au kuvika mulishanduku lyanjuluku waing'ande ya Nnungu mwaa upatikanenge mumyadi.”
Bai vanavo kupakanila njuluku awo vashume lishamba limwe pundi jumo wakumba ulongo pakulota live lyutu lyakuvashika vakwaloka.
Ni ashi shavashamela mpaka nelo lina lya Lishamba Lyamyadi.
Napavedoni andíwikila popo malove atangaléke kwaindila yankúlava Yelemiya doni, “Vanditwala dishingo salasini dyalyava, shilinga shavagwene vanaishilaeli kutosha kunshumidya nae.
Vanavo njuluku awo kushuma lishamba limwe pundi wakumba ulongo, kenga mo mwangulamulidile Umu ngutende.”
Napanelo Yesu vandímwimidya pamevo pake nang'olo walijimbo nae kutwala kumudya, “Da wako ni umu wavayuda?” Yesu kushidoni, “Wako ni úvalanganga.”
Bai vanang'olo vavakulangalalela-shadaka pamo na vanang'olo pavashinkashali, nae hashijang'ula.
Pilatu kutwala kumudya, “Da vinu vyoe vyavakukashali avi haunaigwa shinu?”
Yesu kulamana na kujang'ula ata lilove limo mpaka nang'olo walijimbo kushanga.
Napanelo kula pashishiwika shikukulu, Pilatu ashindavaungulila nkúngwa jumo wavashinjugwa venentete.
Andípagwa nkúngwa jumo wakumanyika namene walina Yesu Balabashi.
Bai vanu vàumbalanidile Pilatu kuvaudya, “Wakwashi wamulota nimuungulile, Yesu Balabashi kwali Yesu wavanshema Klistu?”
Andyúdya davo mwaa andímanya kenga vandimuukanavo kwake nae kwamwaa waing'ou.
Namomo Pilatu àikele palibengi, ndyagwe kumpalakadyedya ntenga wakushidoni, “Haunaliinjidyange mumwaa wamunu ajo waishaliya. Nangu nelo nindyuvauvanga namene ngulatanga kwamwaa wake nae.”
Kanji vanang'olo vavakulangalalela-shadaka pamo na vanang'olo vandívatumbilikanga venentete pakulota vanjugwe avaungulile Balabashi, Yesu jo vammalidye.
Kutwala nang'olo walijimbo kudya kavili, “Pakati pavanu ava vavili, wakwashi wamulota nimuungulile?” Vanavo do, “Balabashi!”
Nae, “Napane kushi Yesu wavanshema Klistu nintandele mwashi?” Vanavo uti do, “Nkamele panshalaba!”
Nae kudya kavili, “Da nae po atandilé shaukalau shani?” Vanavo kumamodya kukugwanga pashanya po, vaashidoni, “Nkamele panshalaba!”

Napanelo Pilatu pamanyite doni hashipali shuululika na shititimbu shinkutunduvanga, andítwala medi kunavanga mmakono pamevo pavanu uti aashidoni, “Kujaika kwamyadi vyamunu aju, nangu hanguve makosha. Ing'ano ayo yenu mmene.”
Venentete uti kushidoni, “Makosha akujaika myadi avyo atupate wetu pamo na udukulu wetu.”
Bai Pilatu andívaungulila Balabashi, Yesu jo kunshapa viboko na kuvaing'a vakankamele panshalaba.
Vaing'ondo vake nang'olo walijimbo vakantwala Yesu kumuukanavo kwing'ande yanang'olo wave kushema shipinga uti shavaing'ondo kuntang'anedya.
Vanavo vakamulanga dinguvo dyake kungwadya ikanju yanauvi.
Vakadinga lidaka lyamiva kungwadya mmuti, mmakono mwake kunkamudya nkungulandi, kunguguvalila mushu mwake akuno vantanila vaashidoni, “Shikamu Umu wavayuda!”
Vanínshunangila mata kutwala kumpoka nkungulandi wo kunkanyalela jo mwene mmuti.
Vakantanile, vandímula ailá ikanju yanauvi kungwadya dinguvo dyake kumuukanavo nankamela panshalaba.
Napanelo pavashuma nkaja mo vanínkodya munu jumo wa ku Shilene walina Simoni, vanavo kutwala kumuungila alitike nshalaba umwe Yesu.
Vakawika palyutu lyavashema Gologota, yani lyutu lyashivanga,
vanavo kumupa ugwalwa wavinyu wavanganiénge na shinu shakukalala nae akalinge andíta kukumbila.
Vakankamela panshalaba kutwala dinguvo dyake kujavananga kwaindila yakujalanga gudugudu
na vàikalenge popo vashinannaledya.
Napanelo pamuti pake vandíkamela shibau shavaandike nkanidyo umwámba nae doni, “Aju Yesu, Umu Wavayuda.”
Popo po, vandívakamela vakwiva vavili pamo namu nae, jumo kunkanakono junji kunshanda.
Bai vanu váshipita apo vashindamwabalanga Yesu akuno vapukunianga myuti
vaashidoni, “Wako únabamola ing'ande ya Nnungu na kudenga kwamaduva matatu, bai liposhe gwegwe umwene! Shuluka panshalaba po ukava umwanangwe Nnungu!”
Na yadavo vanang'olo vavakulangalalela-shadaka pamo na vamwalimu vadishaliya na vanang'olo vashinanniulanga vaashidoni,
“Vanji andivaposha kanji kuliposha mwene hanaulula shinu. Ashii aju, Umu wa ku Ishilaeli! Bai ashuluke ambi popa panshalaba po pakulota tunkulupile.
Aju apa ashinankulupila Nnungu bai Nnungu jo aide amposhe ikava kenga ankunnagwaledya mwaa ashishidoni, ‘Nangu nimwanagwe Nnungu.’ ”
Nimumo momo vakwiva avalá vavakamadíle pamo namu nae navanavo vashinanniulanga.
Napanelo kutunduvangila wakati wasasita mpaka satisa shilambo uti shindida shii.
Paiwikile satisa, Yesu kukugwa pashanya po aashidoni, “Eloi, Eloi, lama sabakitani?” yani “Nnungu wangu, Nnungu wangu, mwaa shani uningwambukanga?”
Bai pakati pavanu ve vapagwíte apo vanji vo pavaigwite, vanavo kushidoni, “Anshema Liyashi ajo.”
Munu jumo pakati pave kutukutinneu ndatwala shipande shaivonu kushuvika muulimu, kupambya munkungulandi kuka ndamupa Yesu akumbile.
Vanu vanji kushidoni, “Nneke! Leka tulole ikava kenga Liyashi jo andaida namposha.”
Bai Yesu andíkugwa kavili pashanya po kutwala kujaa imumu.
Mwe! Inguvo ailá yamwing'ande ya Nnungu kupapuka kuma kushanya mpaka mwina, shilambo kundangenda na majanga kutumbukanga.
Vyonga kushimukanga, mili vyoe vyavakwilimyanga vapadíle, kudyuka.
Vanavo pavaumanenge muvyonga ling'oto lyakudyuka Yesu, vandíinjila munjini wakwilimyanga vanu voe kutwala kuvona.

Napane nang'olo wavaing'ondo pamo na avalá vavénavo váshinshunga Yesu, pavagwene shilambo shindangenda na vinu vinji víshitandeka, vanavo kujopa kutwala kushidoni, “Munu aju mwiu avele mwanagwe Nnungu.”
Popo po vandíimilanga vakongwe voe kwakushu valola, vakongwe avo ni vovo ve vamwodíle Yesu kuma ku Galileya vapita vantumika.
Pakati pavakongwe avo, andípagwa Maliya wa ku Magadalena, Maliya anyoke Tiyagu namu Yoshe na kupagwa jujugwave vanavake Shebedeu.
Napanelo paiwikile yalyulo kuwika munu jumo ntajili wa ku Alimateya walina Yoshe, nanae ashiva nkwóda wake Yesu.
Bai nae andyúka kumwe Pilatu ndajugwa mili wake Yesu, Pilatu kulamulila vamupe.
Nae kutwala mili aulá kukulunganga mwinguvo yakutakata yakunamikanga
kuka ndashika mushonga shake shaambi shatumidídye vapakeye mulijanga. Nae kwingiliya lijanga likumene kudiva pannango, mwene kuka.
Po pashonga po, andíikala Maliya wa ku Magadalena namu aijá Maliya junji.
Napanelo palyamba lyake, yani liduva lyakupumula, vanang'olo vavakulangalalela-shadaka pamo na mapalishayo, vandímuukila Pilatu
ndamwaulila kushidoni, “Nang'olo, wetu tunkukumbukila doni aijá munu nshwang'a àvele mumi ashishidoni, ‘Akapita maduva matatu, nangu ndadyuka.’

Napavedoni lamulila vashunge namene shonga shake mpaka muliduva lyantatu pakulota vakwoda vake havanaide ndamwiva shilo kutwala kuvaulila venentete doni, ‘Andidyuka pakati pavakupela.’ Nadoni kushang'apa aku kulota kuva kwakumamodya kupunda kutandi.”
Pilatu kutwala kushidoni, “Munkuvanavo vaing'ondo, wena mukashunge mwamuululila mmene.”
Bai vanavo vandyúka ndashunga shonga sho kwaindila yakuvika shimanyikilo palijanga po na kuvavika vakulaledya.
Napanelo likapite liduva lyakupumula, palishitunduvanga liduva litandi lyaishumana, Maliya wa ku Magadalena namu Maliyamwagwe vandyúka ndalola shonga.
Mwe! Kwashingangala kuumilila shindangenda shakujowa, kuwa ko kwaloka njelo wake Umu kwida ndagang'ola lijanga kutwala kwikalila.
Njelo jojo jo, avele wakumalameta, dinguvo dyake divele dyakushwalela kenga lila.
Vaing'ondo váshishunga shonga sho vandítatamela kwamwaa wakujopa mpaka kwaneka kenga vandipalanga.
Napane njelo jo kuvaulila vakongwe vo kushidoni, “Hamunajope! Nangu ndimanya kenga mwenu munnambela Yesu wavankamadile panshalaba.
Nae apa hapali. Andidyuka kwodana na kenga mo mwatangaladíle. Ida mulole davo palyutu lyaléle.
Wena shipajelo mukavaulile vakwoda vake doni, nae po andidyuka pakati pavakupela. Nadoni ankuka alangalela ku Galileya, koko ko mwenu mundamwona. Lola, nangu apa nimmanyiya tayali.”
Vakongwe avalá vakaumananga shipajelo shosho vatukuta akuno vàvenavo kujopa na lipuwilo likumene, vandyúka ndavamanyiya vakwoda vake.
Kwashingangala Yesu kuvaumililila kutwala kushidoni, “Mmangumi!” Vanavo kumuukila, kumwambatila mmadodo mwake kutwala kulipudya.
Bai Yesu andívaulila kushidoni, “Hamunajope! Wena mukavaulile vanung'unuvangu vauke ku Galileya, koko ko vanangwona.”
Vakongwe vauka, mwe! Vaing'ondo vanji váshishunga shonga vandyúja kuka kukaja ndavavalangangila vanang'olo vavakulangalalela-shadaka vinu uti vitandéke.
Napane vanang'olo vavakulangalalela-shadaka vo pavaikele nguguvale pamo na vanang'olo vandyúnganila kuvapa vaing'ondo njuluku woe kutwala kuvalaililila doni,
“Mwenu valanganga doni, ‘Shilo wetu tulele lwono, vandída vakwoda vake ndaiva mili.’
Napanelo ing'ano ai ikawika kwanang'olo walijimbo, wetu tunantumbilikanga kwambangidya mwenu hamunapate shaushanga.”
Vanavo vakapwashalela njuluku kutwala kutandedya kenga momo mwavapakanidile. Bai lilove alyo kutwala kwandavala pakati pavayuda uti mpaka nelo.
Napanelo vakwoda vake Yesu kumi na moja vandyúka ku Galileya mpaka ndawika kulishinga lyavalatadíle Yesu.
Vanavo vakamwone, vandílipudya ila vanji pakati pave po, vashindamwambambidya.
Yesu kutwala kuvavandika kuvaulila kushidoni, “Vaningukamudya madalaka uti kuwa na pai.
Napavedoni wena mukavatadye vanu vave vakwoda vangu muvenentete uti muvabatisha palina lya Tata, lya Mwana na lya Imumu Wanashwe
na muvapundisha kutandedya uti avilá vyaninnamulidile. Nadoni nangu ninkupagwa namu mwenu mumaduva uti mpaka mwisho wawakati.”
Shitunduvangilo shantenga wambone ummalangánga Yesu Klistu Mwana wa Nnungu.
Kwodana na avilá vyandikíke mulibuku lyake nkúlava Ishaiya, “Wako, mushu mwako ninkuntumidya múntenga wangu, nae andakukandyangidya indila yako.”
“Lidi linkwigwinika kushimbweshe liishidoni, ‘Kandyanga indila yake Umu aalowa mwalota kupita.’ ”
Nadoni andyúmilila Nshuwau na andípagwa avapa vanu ubatisho kushimbweshe alaililila ubatisho wakulijugulanga kwakulivalivigwa kwamadambi.
Vashindamuukila vanu vakuma mudisemu uti dya ku Yudeya pamo na vanu uti va pa Yelusalemu, vashindapata ubatisho kwake nae kulundi lwa Yudani valijugulanga madambi ave.
Nae ashigwala dinguvo dyavakandyenge na magwimbu angamila, ashilyunga nkanda waligwogwe lyangandolo, shakulya shake shishiva madalombwe na ushi wakunundu
na ashindavalanganga ntenga wakushidoni, “Kunyuma kwangu nangu, ankwida munu walyululilo lyoe kungupunda nangu; ata pakulota ngutepe nimulange vilatu vyake, hanguvaikidile ata padyoko vela.
Nangu ninkumbatisha mwenu na medi; nae po, anambatisha na Imumu Wanashwe.”
Napanelo mumaduva lolo lo, Yesu andyúma pa Nashaleti, akulá ku Galileya kwida ndabatishwa namu Nshuwau mu Yudani.
Bai Yesu paumile mmedi amulá kwona kuwa kujavanwike na anshulukila Imumu wakuva kenga ng'unda
kutwala kuwa kwigwinika lidi litédoni, “Wako ni umwanangu wanikunagwaledya, gwegwe unkwidanavo lipuwilo kwangu.”
Bai napanelo Imumu kuntwala Yesu kumuukanavo kushimbweshe;
koko ko kwikala maduva alubaini atubigwa namu Shatwani anama pamo na vanyama vakunundu kutwala vanjelo kutunduvanga kuntumikila.
Napanelo muwakati aulá waungwídye Nshuwau Yesu andyúja kuka ku Galileya apita avalanganga ntenga wambone wa Nnungu
aashidoni, “Undiwika wakati, utawala wa Nnungu undivandika nadoni lijugulange madambi enu na kulupila ntenga wambone wa Nnungu.”
Bai Yesu apita awanawananga nanyenje litanda lya Galileya amulá anímwona Simoni avele namu nkulumunu Andaleya vateja dingau mmedi mwaa vovo vo shimadengo shave shivele shakwaka dyomba.
Napanelo nae kuvaulila, “Ngwoda nangu pakulota nangu nintende muve mmanu mmakuvaka vanu.”
Bai vanavo kuleka dingau dyave kutwala kumwoda.
Paumile apo, mushu mwake kunkodya Tiyagu mwanagwe Shebedeu avele pamo na nung'unumunu Nshuwau vatataliyanga dingau dyave mwingalava.
Bai kuvashema vanavo kutwala kumwoda kunneka tatagwave pamo na vamadengo vashibalugwa amulá mwingalava.
Napanelo Yesu pamo namu vanavo vandyúka mpaka pa Kapalanaumu. Muliduva lyakupumula, bai Yesu kuka kushitala shakulipudidya ndapundisha
kutwala vanu kushanga mapundisho ake mwaa ashindavapundisha kenga munu ávenavo madalaka i kenga vamwalimu vadishaliya.
Bai apalá pashitala kwaneka munu e avénavo lijini nshapu; jojo jo kutwala kukugwa pashanya po,
“Wako Yesu wa ku Nashaleti, da wetu namu wako shako nyamani? Widilé ndatumalidya? Nangu ndikumanya, wako ni wakwilimyanga wake Nnungu.”
Yesu kunshulanga aashidoni, “Malala na uma mumili mwamunu mo!”
Mwiu lijini nshapu aijá kungang'ola munu jo na akuno akugwa pashanya po kutwala kuma mumili mo kuka.

Vanu uti ni kushanga doni na kutunduvanga kuudyania vaashidoni, “Da shinu ashi nyamani? Mapundisho aambi! Mapundisho avénavo madalaka! Mpaka nae ata majini mashapu ankulamulilila kutwala anavo kumwigwilila.”
Bai shimbili shake kuumanginneu kwisemu uti ya ku Galileya.
Napanelo vakaumanange mushitala amulá, Yesu aníntwala Tiyagu namu Nshuwau kuka mpaka paing'ande yashiikala Simoni na nkulumunu Andaleya.
Popo nkwegwe Simoni andílala avele nnwele kutwala vanavo bai kummanyiya Yesu ing'ano ayo.
Nae kumuukila aijá nnwele kunkamula nkono, kuntakatuwa, nnwele jo kupona kutwala kutunduvanga kuvatumikila.
Napanelo muwakati wayalyulo liduva lìdimbile, vanu vandívaukanavo kumwe Yesu valwele uti na vanu vamajini.
Likaja alyo uti vanu kuka naumbalanila paing'ande apo
kutwala nae kuvaponia valwele voe vavilwele vyakuvilingananga na majini kukumulanga; majini lo kuleya hanatangole mwaa anavo ashinammanya shalowa.
Napanelo palyamba lyake, linyeiku, Yesu andítakatuka kuma kuka kulyutu lyakwagweka; koko ko nae ashindashwali
kutwala Simoni pamo na vavagwe kupita vannambela.
Vakankodye, vanavo kumwaulila doni, “Vanu vankukulambela akulá!”
Yesu kushidoni, “Tuke kunji kumakaja ashitanono pakulota nakwanavo ndikavalangange ntenga mwaa ashi ni shingutadídye ngwide.”
Yesu kutwala kupita mumakaja uti a ku Galileya avalanganga ntenga muvitala vyave vyakulipudidya na akumulanga majini.
Napanelo Yesu andímwidila munu jumo ávenavo malemba mumili, jojo jo kutwala kunguguvalila kunjugwangila kushidoni, “Ukalota, unkuulula kungutadya ngutakate.”
Nae andímwanangila shididi shoe namene na andínyalodya nkono wake kutwala kunkwaa kumwaulila doni, “Elo ndilota, takata!”
Bai munu jo malemba kunnambalakanga kutwala nae jo kutakata.
Yesu kunkumulanga na kunneya namene uti

kushidoni, “Wako, ngwigwa shana, hashinapagwe shakuvalanganga kwamunu ila wena ukalilodye kwankúlangalalela-shadaka ukaumye kwakuushaniangigwa kwako ushapu kenga mo mwalamulidile Musha pakulota uve ushuda kwavanavo.”

Munu aijá kanji paumile apalá ni kupita avalanganga na aandadya vinu uti vintandéke mpaka kuntadya Yesu mene kuulula kuka mushu ainjila ngala mumakaja; nae kuva munu wakwikala kushimbweshe na koko ko vanu vammakaja uti vashindamuukila nae.
Napanelo akapite maduva apitile, Yesu andyúja kuka ndainjila kavili pa Kapalanaumu na andímanyika doni andiwika paing'ande.
Vanu voe vandyúmbalanila paing'ande po ata pakushunila mata mene kwaneka na nae ashindavavalangangila ntenga wa Nnungu.
Popo po kuwika vanu nsheshe vannyukete munu adidiménge madodo.

Ikavakamadyangidye kummandika Yesu mwaa wakuumbalanila vanu, vandíkwela pashanya ing'ande kubamola ulungu shalatoto namu pavéle Yesu kutwala kupata lilanga lyakupalaedya nng'ande ligadolo lyaléle munu ajo.
Bai Yesu pavagwene vanu avo kuvanavo likulupililo, andímwaulila wakudidimanga madodo jo kushidoni, “Mwanangu, madambi ako andilivalivika.”
Napanelo mulyutu lyolyo vandíikalanga vamwalimu vadishaliya vatangadikanga shintimatima kushidoni,
“Da munu aju mwaa shani ankutangola davo? Aju ankukupulu! Ánaulula kulivaliva madambi ni gweka Nnungu bai.”
Yesu muntima mwake andímanya ashilá shavashitangadikanga vanavo nadoni andívaudya, “Mwaa shani mwenu munkuvanavo matangadikilo alo mmitima myenu?
Munu aju shakwashi shamwona kuva shíkakamadyanga kumwaulila? Ni kumwaulila doni, ‘Madambi ako andilivalivika’ kwali kumwaulila doni, ‘Takatuka utwale ligadolo uwene’?
Bai pakulota mumanye doni Mwana Wamunu ankuvanavo mushilambo amu madalaka akulivaliva madambi,” andímwaulila wakudidimanga madodo jo,
“Ninkukwaulila wako apa doni, takatuka, twala ligadolo lyako na wena kwing'ande kwako.”
Bai nae kutakatuka kutwala ligadolo lyake kuma vanu uti vamwona kutwala vovo vo kushanga na kumupa lishangelo Nnungu vaashidoni, “Wetu shinu ashi, mwiko hatunava kwona.”
Yesu akauke kavili nanyenje litanda, imbumba yavanu indímuukila koko na nae ashindavapundisha.
Pashipita awena, andímwona Lawi mwanagwe Alupeu àikele nshitala shaukodi kutwala Yesu kushidoni, “Ngwoda!” Nae kutakatuka kumwoda.
Napanelo Yesu andíikala alya shakulya paing'ande imwe Lawi pamo na vakukatisha-ukodi, vakutega pamo na vakwoda vake; popo po vandyúmbalanila mwaa vashindamwoda vanu voe.

Napanelo pakati pavamwalimu vadishaliya vamapalishayo, vakamanye doni nae ankulyanavo vakutega pamo na vakukatisha-ukodi, vandívaudya vakwoda vake kushidoni, “Mwaa shani nae alyanavo vakukatisha-ukodi pamo na vakutega?”

Bai Yesu akaigwe malove alo, andívajang'ula vamwalimu vo kushidoni, “Munu mumi hanannambela nkúlaula, ánannambela ava nnwele. Nangu apa hangwidile ndavashema vaishaliya, ngwidilé ndavashema vakutega.”
Napanelo vakwoda vake Nshuwau namu mapalishayo vàungile, vanu vandyúka ndamudya Yesu, “Mwaa shani vakwoda vake Nshuwau pamo na vamapalishayo vankunga, vakwoda vako wako havanaunga shinu?”
Nae kushidoni, “Da inkuululika vambodi valalikígwe pashitamo kunga mwene nkúlomba àpagwite popo? Muwakati nkúlomba àpagwite namu vanavo hainaululika shinu kunga.
Undawika wakati, wakati wavalota kumumya nkúlomba pakati pave; ni wakati au wavalota vanavo kunga.
Hapali munu ánatwala shipande shainguvo yaambi kutenda shivamba mwinguvo yakala; ukatenda davo shivamba sho shindalikukutika kutwala inguvo yakala yo kumamodya kupapuka.

Namomo hapali ánataa ugwalwa wavyepo waambi muvitumba vyamagwogwe vyakala; ukatenda davo, ugwalwa pawaa po, undapapulanga vitumba kutwala ugwalwa kujaikanga na vitumba vyo, kwanangeka. Vatwala ugwalwa waambi kutaa muvitumba vyambi.”
Napanelo muliduva limo lyakupumula Yesu apita mulyala limo lyangano vakwoda vake mwavashipita, vashindatamanga mai angano kuting'inda kumamena.
Kutwala mapalishayo kumudya, “Wako, mwaa shani vakwoda vako vankutenda shinu shilaéka na lilamulo kutenda muliduva lyakupumula?”
Nae kushidoni, “Da hamunava kushomya vyatandile Umu Daudi muwakati washangíle na wainkodíle indala nae pamo na avalá vavénavo?

Bai mumaduva áshikola madengo Abiyatali nkúlangalalela-shadaka nkumene, Daudi andíinjila mwing'ande ya Nnungu kutwala magung'u ashadaka shakumupa Nnungu kulya; magung'u áshilaeka na lilamulo kulya munu vila, avashilya gweka bai vakulangalalela-shadaka. Kanji nae andílya, tuleke apo anji andívapa vavagwe.”
Kutwala kavili kushidoni, “Munu hakandyangigwe kwamwaa waliduva lyakupumula, liduva lyakupumula ni likandyangígwe kwamwaa wamunu.
Napavedoni Mwana Wamunu nae ni Umu ata mpaka muliduva lyakupumula.”
Napanelo Yesu andíinjila kavili mushitala shakulipudidya na momo mo andípagwa munu jumo wakudidimanga nkono.
Mo mushitala mo, vashinannaledya namene valota vamwone ikava kenga anamponia munu ajo muliduva lyakupumula pakulota vapate nkanidyo wakunkashalidya.
Bai Yesu andímwaulila munu wakudidimanga nkono jo kushidoni, “Imila shing'ati ashi!”
Kutwala kuvaudya kushidoni, “Da muliduva lyakupumula lilamulo linkutuleka tutandedye vyambone kwali vyakunyata? Kuposha shingumi kwali kumalidya?” Vanavo kumalalanga do, vii!

Akavalole vanu uti vantang'anadídye avalá kwashitundi akuno àvenavo shipalodi shoe kwamwaa wakunanopa mitima vyave, nae kumwaulila munu jo doni, “Nyalodya nkono wako!” Nae kunyalodya kutwala nkono kuujila kuva ungumi.
Bai mapalishayo vandyúmananga kuka ndalyunganianga namu vashipinga shimwe Elode kumulya shemba Yesu valambela dindila dyakummalididya.
Napanelo Yesu andínyema pamo na vakwoda vake kuka kulitanda na imbumba yavagalileya indímwoda koko pamo na
vanu voe vakwaloka ku Yudeya, ku Yelusalemu, ku Idumeya, vakwalakela nkono unji wa Yudani na nanyenje likaja lya Tilu namu Shidoni; kumwoda mwaa wakwigwinikanga vinu uti vyashitenda nae.
Kwamwaa wakuumbalanila vanu, Yesu kuvaulila vakwoda vake vampanganiangidye ingalava pakulota vanu vo havananshinye
mwaa akavaponie vanu voe valwele vanji vashindagang'alananga vakanyilidya avakwae.
Vanu vamajini mashapu ngwengwe pavashimwona Yesu, majini lo ashindanguguvalila kutwala kukugwa pashanya po aashidoni, “Wako Umwana wa Nnungu.”
Kanji Yesu ashindashulanga namene majini pakulota hanamwaulange ngala.
Napanelo Yesu andíkwela palishinga limo kutwala kuvashema vanu vavalatile mwene, vanavo kumwidila.
Nae kuvatandola kumi na mbili vovo vo kuvavika kuva vamyombe pakulota vapagwe namu nae na avatume vapite vavalanganga ntenga wa Nnungu
na vavenavo madalaka akukumulangila majini.
Vanu kumi na mbili avo vavele ava: Simoni wampéle nae lina linji lya Patulu
kwatika Tiyagu na nkulumunu Nshuwau vanavake Shebedeu vavapéle nae lina linji lya Bowanelisheshi yani vanaing'uva
kwida Andaleya, Pilipo, Balutolomeu, Mateu, Tome, kwatika Tiyagu mwanagwe Alupeu kwida Tadeu ndaida Simoni wa ku Kanaa
kumalilila Yudashi Shikaliyote jojo ánnimidye Yesu.
Napanelo Yesu andíinjila nng'ande mwake kutwala kuumbalanila kavili imbumba yavanu mpaka popo Yesu na vakwoda vake ata litala lyakulyela shinu mene kuvapagwidya.
Valikola vake pavaigwite vandímuukila vakankamule vamuukenavo kukaja mwaa vashitangola doni, “Nae andipungukanga.”
Vamwalimu vadishaliya vaalakadíle ku Yelusalemu vashindatangola doni, “Munu aju anintawala Beelishebuli; jojo ankukumulanga majini kwalilamulo limwe jo nang'olo wave majini jo, Beelishebuli.”
Napavedoni Yesu andívashema kutwala kutangonavo kwamikong'o aashidoni, “Ilota kuululika dashi Shatwani kulikumulanga jo mwene?
Utawala woewoe ukalijavanienge kutwala kubyaananga shivenevene, utawala awo hamunapagwe munji ni kutimbikanga tu bai.
Vanalikola vakalijavanienge kutwala kutandana ing'ondo shivenevene, likola alyo hamunapagwe munji ni kutimbikanga tu bai.
Napavedoni Shatwani akalijavanienge kutwala kulitenda ing'ondo jo mwene, nae hamunampagwidye mwakuka mushu apagwa, akanditimbikanga.
I mwanavo! Da apali munu wakwinjila gwamba nng'ande mwamunu wadimongo pakulota kwiva mali ake? Mene, shitandi antuntila dimbuu mwene jo kutwala kukunga uti vyanng'ande.
Ninkumwaulila mwiu uti doni, vanu vandalivalivigwa madambi ave pamo na kukupulu kwave uti
kanji munu álota kunkupulu Imumu Wanashwe halivalivigwa, nae andavanavo likosha lyashimadambi shíkamalilika.”
Bai Yesu andítangola davo mwaa vashitangola doni, “Munu aju ankuvanavo lijini nshapu.”
Napanelo anyoke pamo na vanung'unuvake vandíwika mulyutu alyo; vavele po panda po vandítuma vavashamele.
Mo nng'ande mo, vandíikalanga vanu voe vantang'anedidye kutwala vanu kumwaulila doni, “Nang'olo, anyoko, vanung'unuvako pamo na valumbuvako vapali panda po, vandákulota.”
Nae kuvaudya, “Ajala na vanung'unuvangu ni vakwashi?”
Bai akavalole vanu vantang'anedídye nae kushidoni, “Mwenu, ajala na vanung'unuvangu ni ava vavéle apa
mwaa munu woewoe átenda mwalatela Nnungu, munu aju ankwitika kuva mwanetu, numbwangu na ni ajala.”

Napanelo mumwanda unji kavili Yesu andítunduvanga kupundisha àvele nanyenje litanda. Popo po, imbumba ing'umene yavanu iníntang'anedya mpaka kuntadya nae kukwela mwingalava kwikala kunyamela padyoko kumedi kuleka imbumba yavanu ìvele kumwangu.
Nae ashindavapundisha vinu vyoe kwadindila dyamikong'o kenga avi,
“Tela matu mwigwe! Nkúlima jumo andyúka ndamwadilila imbeju yake yaulende.
Pashimwadilila, kupagwa igwilidile nanyenje indila kutwala vyuni kwida ndadadalanga.
Inji kugwilila paulongo wapashanya lijanga lyakulitandika kutwala kumalenneu mwaa ulongo wo hauvéle woe.
Likakamele liduva nnandi wo kunyala kutwala kujuma mwaa dinyija hadilitavalakadíle.
Inji kavili kugwilila paulongo wanashilanga, paimadile nanae nashilanga akamele nnandi wo kubyaika kutwala mene kupa vyepo.
Napanelo imbeju inji kugwilila paulongo walutuba, yanavo yo kukonda kukulumuka kutwala kupa vyepo, lipata limo salasini, linji sitini na linji lyo miya.”
Kutwala kavili kuvaulila doni, “Munu akavanavo matu akwigwidya, aigwe!”
Napanelo Yesu àvele gweka yake, vakwoda pamo na avalá kumi na mbili vandímuudyangidya mana amikong'o avyo.
Nae kushidoni, “Mwenu apa vanintadya mumanye vipii vyautawala wa Nnungu, vanu vanji vákapagwite nkati, vanavo kula lilove linkuvaidila kwamikong'o
pakulota “ ‘Valola avi, vandona kanji havaanalela, vaigwa avi, vandaigwa kanji havamanya shaambíka Leka ikave davo vakandishiliuka kutwala kulivalivigwa madambi ave.’ ”
Kutwala Yesu kuvaudya, “Da mwenu hamunamanya shinu mana ankong'o au? Ikava davo po mulota kumanya dashi mana amikong'o vinji uti?
Bai nkúlima, apanda lilove lya Nnungu.
Imbeju kugwilila nanyenje indila, vankuva vanu vapwashaléla lilove lipandígwa; vanavo muwakati wowo wavaigwa lilove, Shatwani kwidinneu ndaukula lilove lyavapandile mmitima myave.
Namomo imbeju kugwilila paulongo wapashanya lijanga lyakulitandika, vankuva vanu vaigwilíla lilove lya Nnungu kutwala kupwashalalenneu na lipuwilo
kanji kwamwaa úkave wakuvanavo dinyija, lilove lyo lipagwa muwakati padyoko mwaa vikavakodya vyamapipili kwali kupapatigwa kwamwaa walilove, vanavo vandájaika.
Vanji ni vapandígwa munashilanga. Vanavo ni avalá vaigwilíla lilove
kanji mangaikangilo awakati au, lung'unuku lwamali na lwavinu vinji, avyo vindáinjila ndashinya lilove mpaka kutadya mene kupa vyepo.
Napanelo imbeju kugwilila paulongo walutuba, vankuva vanu vaigwilíla lilove kupwashalela kutwala kupa vyepo salasini, sitini na miya.”
Yesu kutwala kuvaudya doni, “Da itaa vanákaledya kutwala likalala kwinikidya kwali kuukanavo mulyungu igoli ndavika? Mene! Vakaledya pakulota vavike pashinu pakwaneka.
Hashipali shinu shashipii shíkavele shakulota kwaulika na hashipali shinu shilipiídye shíkavele shakulota kuumilila kulangele.
Munu akavanavo matu akwigwidya, aigwe.”
Kutwala kuvaulila doni, “Vikila kuntima vinu vyamwigwa avi! Shipimo shosho shamulalyangidya mwenu vinu vyamwigwa, namwenu shipimo shosho vanannalyangidya na yadavo vanamwanjadyedya
mwaa munu ávenavo vanamwanjadyedya na aijá ákavenavo ata sho shavenavo sho, vanampoka.”
Yesu kavili kushidoni, “Utawala wa Nnungu unkulinganana na kenga munu panamwadilila imbeju muulongo;
mui kwali shilo kulala kwali kutakatuka imbeju ako kumela na kukulumuka. Mwavitandakela mwene bila kumanya
mwaa wo wene ulongo wo ni útandedya vinu vipe; shinantandi kwipukila mamba kwatika mai kutwala mai lo kutandeka.
Po pavitandakanga po, munu jo atwalinneu shipula shake kupita aenga mwaa wakati wamapuno undiwika.”
Kutwala kavili kushidoni, “Utawala wa Nnungu tulandaniange na nyamani kwali tutumile nkong'o shani pakulota tuvalangange shana?
Uvelé kenga imbeju yanshupi; pavapanda idikidiki kupunda dimbeju uti dipandíka muulongo
kanji vakapanda yanavo kumela kukulumuka kutwala kuva nnandi ukumene kupunda milandi vinji kulijava dinavi shana na vyuni vyakuniania kudenga vyanda vyave mulyuku mo.”
Bai nae atumila mikong'o vyoe kenga avyo ashindapundisha lilove lya Nnungu kwodana na mo mwavashuululila kwigwilila.
Hashitangola na vanu bila kutumila mikong'o kanji pashipagwa na vakwoda vake gweka uti ashindavavalangangila mana ake.
Napanelo muliduva lyolyo liduva lyenda kukudimba Yesu andívaulila vakwoda vake kushidoni, “Twamboke tuke litanda nkono unji.”
Vanavo kuleka dimbumba dyavanu popo kuka ndainjila mwingalava yavéle Yesu kumuukanavo; namomo dingalava dinji dinímpalakela.
Bai mo mulitanda ni kulipuka shimbunga, napanelo mawimbi ankwinjila mwingalava na medi mwingalava mo kuumbala.
Yesu avele kunyuma ingalava andílala lwono àijamidile litandiko lyakumuti. Bai vanavo kumwimulanga kutwala kushidoni, “Mwalimu, da kupela aku kwatupalanga tuvanu, haunajugulanga shinu?”
Nae akatakatuka kushulanga shimbunga na kutangalela litanda lyo kushidoni, “Limaladye! Haunapikitange!” Imepo kumalala kutwala pashinu po kumalalika do, kimyaa!
Nae kuvaudya vakwoda vake kushidoni, “Mwaa shani mwenu munkujopa namene? Da hamunava kuvanavo likulupililo?”
Bai vanavo vandíjopa doni kutwala kuudyania shivenevene vaashidoni, “Da aju nyani átenda ata mpaka imepo na litanda kumwigwilila?”
Bai vanavo vakaamboka vakawika litanda nkono unji lijimbo lyavagelasha.
Napanelo Yesu pashulwike mwingalava, kumakabuli ko kwalakenneu munu jumo walijini nshapu kumwidila.
Nae ashinama ko kumakabuli na jojo jo, ata kwaupingo hapali munu áshuulula kumunga kavili.
Myanda vyoe vashindamunga upingo mmadodo na mmakono; mang'unyang'unya lo, ashindalundumulanga, vitali vyake kulumulanga na hapali áshimuulula kundabyadabyanga.
Shilo na mui ngwengwe ashindapita akugwanga-kugwanga kumakabuli na kumashinga alibyaanga-byaanga majanga mumili.
Napanelo nae apalá pangwene Yesu kwakushu kuntukutila kuka ndanguguvalila mushu mwake
kutwala kutangola pashanya po aashidoni, “Wako Yesu mwanagwe Nnungu Wapashanya-uti, da wako namu nangu shako nyamani? Ninkukujugwa pamevo a Nnungu, haunangupe shaushanga.”
Andíjugwa davo mwaa Yesu anínnamulila lijini jo doni, “Wako lijini nshapu, mumili mwamunu ajo, kuma!”
Bai Yesu kumudya, “Lina lyako nyani?” Nae kushidoni, “Lina lyangu Imbumba mwaa tuvelé tuvoe.”
Kutwala kunjugwangila Yesu pakulota hanavakumulange mulijimbo alyo.
Napanelo popo po, indípagwa iminga yadinguluve íshilya palishinga.
Uti alalá majini anínjugwangila Yesu, “Tulamulila tuke kwavanguluve akulá tukavainjile!”
Yesu kulamulilinneu, majini mashapu anavo kuumananga kuka ndaviinjilanga vanguluve; iminga yadinguluve íshiwikila shilinga shadyalupu mbili yo kupandamokela mwibondi kuka ndatitimilanga mmedi.
Bai vanu váshishunga dinguluve adyo vandítukutanga kuka ndavalanganga kunjini na mmagwelu kutwala vanu kuumananga kuka ndalola shitendo asho shuumidíle.
Pavavandike pavele Yesu kumwona aijá munu wamajini e avénavo imbumba yamajini àikele, àgwete inguvo, àvenavo ding'ano dyashimunu kutwala vanavo kujopa.
Avalá vanu vagwéne vene shitendo asho, kuvavalangangila vanji shinu shintandéke aijá wamajini na kuvalanganga shivatandéke vanguluve
kutwala vanavo kutunduvanga kunjugwangila Yesu aume mushilambo shave.
Napanelo Yesu pashiinjila mwingalava aijá e avénavo majini ashinanjugwangila pakulota anneke vauke pamo.
Yesu kwita kumwaulila doni, “Wena kukaja mpaka kwavakwenu; koko ko, vavalangangile vinu uti vyakutandalele Umu na mwakwanangilidile shididi.”
Bai nae andyúka kutwala kutunduvanga kuvalanganga ku Dekapolishi vinu uti vyatandile Yesu na vanu uti vashindashanga.
Napanelo Yesu akakwela kavili mwingalava kwambokela litanda nkono unji. Popo po, iníntang'anedya imbumba yavanu apalá pavéle nanyenje litanda.
Mwenu! Kuwika apalá nanangalaledi washitala shakulipudidya walina Yailu. Nae pamwene Yesu andínguguvalila mmadodo mwake
kunjugwangila namene aashidoni, “Mwanangu nkongwe ndikidiki nnwele, ninkunnalela po pantima apa! Nadoni ninkukujugwa tuke ukammikile makono kwambangidya apone na ave mumi.”
Yesu kutwala kuka namu nae. Napanelo yo imbumba yavanu yo ishindamwoda na inshinya.
Popo po, andípagwa nkongwe jumo auwíle vyaka kumi na mbili ulwele úkavele wakumalala kutumila.
Nae andípita mmakono mwavamitela voe na kujanga vyake uti kanji haulwíle kupona; mauvilo andyúka mushu amamodya.
Bai kwoda andígwa shimbili shimwe Yesu, andyúka ndalijalanianga mwimbumba yavanu kumuukila Yesu kunyuma kwake kutwala kukwaa ikanju yake
mwaa ashikumbukila doni, “Wona ngukwaa padyoko vela ikanju yake ndapona.”
Bai nae myadi kuma ko kumalalinneu, kulyona mumili mwake mauvilo alalá kumalilika.
Yesu kumanyinneu kenga mo mumili mwake dipali dimongo dyumíle kutwala kushiliuka kulola imbumba kudya doni, “Nyani ákwaidye ikanju yangu?”
Vakwoda vake do, “Wako unkwona imbumba yavanu indikushinya, unnambela dashi munu ákukwaidye?”
Kanji nae ashindamyangamyanga tu nnyenje mwake alota amwone munu átandile shitendo asho.
Nkongwe jo àmanyite ashilá shintandéke akuno ajopa na atatamela, anímmandika Yesu kuguguvala mushu mwake kutwala kummalangangila umwiu uti.
Yesu kutwala kushidoni, “Mwanangu, likulupililo lyako lindikuposha, wena kwaamani na pona shilwele shako!”

Napanelo Yesu akuno ankutangola, avalá vanu vake aijá nanangalaledi washitala shakulipudidya vandiwika kumwaulila nang'olo wave kushidoni, “Mwanavo jo andipela! Haunauke mushu undingadinga mwalimu jo.”
Yesu bila kutanana malove alo, amwaulidilé nanangalaledi jo kushidoni, “Haunajope, ila kulupila.”
Nae andíleya kumwoda munu woewoe ila antwete Patulu, Tiyagu namu Nshuwau nung'une Tiyagu.
Pawikile paing'ande kwona shijungulima shavanu na kuvona vanu valila namene na vatangadikanga.
Nae andiinjila nng'ande amulá kuvaudya, “Mwaa shani munkujungulikanga na munkulila? Mwana aju hanapela shinu alelé vila.”
Vanu apalá vakamwakanga. Napanelo nae kuvaumadyanga vanu uti nng'ande amulá kuntwala tatamunu, jujumunu pamo na avalá váalekenavo kuka mpaka pavéle mwana.
Nae aninkamula kutwala kushidoni, “Talita kumi!” mana ake doni, “Ndyoko, nangu ninkukulamulila, takatuka!”
Ndyoko ávenavo vyaka kumi na mbili vyaulinga jo, kutakatukinneu kutunduvanga kuwena kutwala vanu kushanga namene-uti.
Yesu kuvaleya namene pakulota havanammanyie munu kutwala kuvalamulila vamupe ndyoko jo shakulya.
Napanelo Yesu akauma palyutu alyo kuka mpaka kwave; vakwoda vake vashindamwoda.

Likawike liduva lyakupumula andyúka kushitala shakulipudidya kutwala kutunduvanga kupundisha; vanu voe váshimwigwilila vandíshanga kutwala kushidoni, “Na aju vitendo avi apatilé kwashi? Limanyilo ali lyavampele na aju livé dashi na makango ala atenda nae ankutandela mwashi?
Na aju i jo nkúveda mwanagwe Maliya, nkulugwe Tiyagu, Yoshe, Yudashi namu Simoni? Da valumbuvake i ava vavéle namu wetu apa?” Vanavo mwaa wake nae ishindavanyatila.
Yesu kushidoni, “Hapali nkúlava ákaishimika ila mushilambo shake kwavavele vatatavake na valikola vake ni kwakanaishimika.”
Nae popo po haimmaikidile kutenda makango ila andívavikila makono valwele padyoko kutwala kuvaponia.
Nadoni nae andíshanga kwamwaa waungakulupila wave. Napanelo nae kuma kupita apundisha mumakaja ashitanono.
Andívashema avalá kumi na mbili kutwala kuvatuma vavili-vavili na kuvapa madalaka akulamulilila majini mashapu.
Andívaleya kunyukata shinu shoeshoe mushimwanda shave ila vanyukate ipimbo bai; shakulya mene, lipeta mene na dishingo mene.
Vagwale vilatu tu; dikanju mbili havanagwale.
Andívaulila kavili kushidoni, “Paing'ande yoeyoe yamulota kuwikila, ikalanga popo mpaka pamulota kuma likaja alyo.
Palyutu lyoelyoe vakanampwashalela na vakanalota kumwigwilila, pamuma po, lipumunange litutunga mmadodo mwenu pakulota uve ushuda kwave vanavo.”
Bai vanavo vandyúma kupita vavalangangila vanu valijugulange madambi ave.
Majini oe vashindakumulanga na valwele voe vashindavapaka mauta kutwala valwele vo vashindavaponia.

Napanelo umu Elode andígwa vinu avyo víshitandeka kwodamwaa shimbili shimwe Yesu shindyúmanikanga kula kushinu. Vanu vashindatangola kushidoni, “Nshuwau Wakubatisha andidyuka pakati pavakupela ni ashi shitádya vyamakango avyo vipagwe namu nae.”
Vanji doni, “Liyashi ajo.” Vanji, “Aju nkúlava, avelé kenga nkúlava jumo pakati pavakulava vakala.”
Kanji Elode paigwite malove alo nae kushidoni, “Nshuwau ajo; jo waninnamulidile nangu vanshinde, apo jojo jo, andidyuka.”
Jo Elode jo, kala po andílamulila vamunge Nshuwau vanjele nkalaboshi mwaa nae aníntwala Elodiya nkongwe washinnomba nung'une mwene walina Pilipo kutwala kunnomba.
Napanelo Nshuwau ashinanduma Elode kushidoni, “Haikuvaikidile unnombe nkongwe ndyagwe nung'uno.”
Napavedoni Elodiya ashinammikila shitundi Nshuwau, ashindalota ammyae kanji haishuulukika

mwaa Elode ashinanjopa Nshuwau. Nae ashinanshilidyanga pakuva anímmanya kenga avele munu waishaliya na wakwilimyanga wake Nnungu. Ishinannagwela kumwigwilila Nshuwau ata ikava kenga pashimwigwilila po, ashinampuwanianga.

Napanelo muliduva lyashitenda Elode shikukulu shakumbukumbu yakuvalekwa kwake lindípatikana litala kumwe Elodiya lyakutandela amulá mwashilota. Muliduva alyo Elode andívapa shakulya vananangalaledi vakumene vaishilikali yake, vananangalaledi vavaing'ondo na vananangalaledi vakumene vakwaloka ku Galileya.

Bai mwanagwe Elodiya nkongwe kwinjila mulyutu lyo kuvina landa kutwala Elode pamo na vakulalikigwa kuvanagwela namene. Umu jo ikannagwele, andímwaulila mwali kushidoni, “Ngujugwa shinu shoeshoe nangu ndakupa!”
Nae kulilapila kushidoni, “Ngujugwa shoeshoe shaulota, ata paikavele inushu yautawala wangu, ndakupa.”
Mwali kuma kuka ndamudya anyoke, “Ngujugwe nyamani?” Anyoke kushidoni, “Kanjugwe muti umwe Nshuwau Wakubatisha.”
Mwali kuukinneu kumwe umu ndamwaulila kushidoni, “Ninkulota ungupe ambi popa mushani muti umwe Nshuwau Wakubatisha.”
Umu shindímwidila shipalodi shoe namene napane kwodamwaa andílilapa pamevo pa avalá vakulalikigwa, halatíle kumwitila.
Umu kutwala kuntuma mwing'ondo akaidenavo muti wo. Nae kuka kukalaboshi nanshinda Nshuwau
kutwala muti wo kwidanavo àvikile mushani ndamupa mwali, mwali kutwala kuka ndamupa anyoke.
Vakwoda vake Nshuwau vakaigwe dyabali adyo vandyúka ndatwala mili wo ndashika.
Napanelo avalá vamyombe vandyúja kuka kumwe Yesu kutwala kummalangangila vinu uti vyavatandile na vyavapundishidye.

Yesu kutwala kuvaulila kushidoni, “Mwenu, tuke kushimbweshe tukapumule padyoko kwagweka.” Mwaa pashinu apo vandípagwa vanu voe váshida na váshuma váshitadya mpaka vanavo litala lyakulyela shinu mene kuvapagwidya.
Vanavo kwinjilanga mwingalava gweka yave kuka kushimbweshe.
Napanelo vanu voe vakavona vauma na vamanya kwavashuka, vanu vakwalakela mminjini uti kutukuta namadodo kulitandya vanavo kuwika.
Yesu pashulwike mwingalava, kwona imbumba yavanu nae kwanangila shididi mwaa ishiva kenga imbumba yadingandolo díkavenavo nkúshunga kutwala kutunduvanga kuvapundisha vinu vyoe.
Liduva napanelo liinjila mmamba, vakwoda vake vanímmandika kutwala kumwaulila doni, “Pashinu apa panalugwangwa vila na wakati wo undipita.
Vaulile venentete vaukanange mmala na mmakaja akuvandika vakashume shinu valye.”
Yesu kutwala kuvajang'ula kushidoni, “Shinu sho, vape mwenu po!” Vanavo kushidoni, “Shosho sho shilotegwa dinali dimiya mbili! Napanelo indivaikila tuvape kulya tujanga njuluku au?”
Nae kushidoni, “Da mwenu po muvénavo magung'u mangapi? Wena mukalole!” Pavaukile ndalola vakamwaulila doni, “Apagwité magung'u mwanu na dyomba mbili.”
Napanelo Yesu andívalamulila vakwoda vake vavikadyange venentete muukoka kwamapungu.
Venentete vo kwikalanga mapungu avanu miya-miya na avanu amusini-amusini.
Yesu kutwala alalá magung'u mwanu pamo na adilá dyomba mbili kulola kuwa kwalaliya kumajanianga magung'u kuvapa vakwoda vake vavajavile namomo kuvajavila adilá dyomba mbili vanu uti.
Vanavo uti kulya mpaka kwikuta.
Vakwoda vake vakatwalange makombo amagung'u pamo na adyomba vandyúmbadya makalala kumi na mbili.
Vanu ve valíle magung'u alo vavele valume dyalupu mwanu.
Yesu kutwala kuvakanyalidyangidyanneu vakwoda vake vakwalange mwingalava vauke valangalela litanda nkono unji yani ku Beteshaida vanneke nae alaila imbumba yavanu.
Akalaile imbumba, andyúka kulishinga ndashwali.
Pauwikile wakati wayalyulo ingalava kuwika shing'ati litanda nae avelé gweka kumwangu.
Napanelo nae avona vakwoda vake kuvauvanga pavashandesha ingalava mwaa imepo ishaaloka mushu mwave, muwakati walyamba kumanga kulangala, nae kuvaukila awena pashanya medi. Alota avapite mushu mwave,
vanavo pavangwene awena pashanya medi, vashona doni, “Ali litailei,” kutwala vanavo kukugwanga.
Vanavo uti vakamwone vanínjopa, nae kutangalenneu kushidoni, “Lyunge ntima! Ni nangu apa. Hamunajope!”
Yesu kukwela mwingalava amulá kupagwa pamo namu vanavo kutwala imepo yo kumalala do, jii! Vanavo kushanga
mwaa ata lo makango amagung'u alalá, mana ake havamanyíte; mitima vyave vandítadya vinanope.
Napanelo vakaamboke litanda lyo vandíwika shilambo sha ku Geneshaleti kushiya ingalava yave kutwala kuungangila.
Vanavo pavaumanenge mwingalava venentete kummanyinneu Yesu.
Bai venentete kuumananga kupita vatukuta mumakaja aisemu ayo vapita vavanyukata valwele mudigoli kuvaukanavo kulyutu lyavashiigwanga kenga Yesu avelé kwanavo.

Kulyutu lyoelyoe kwashuka nae, mminjini mmakaja madikidiki kwali mmagwelu, vanu vashindavatwala valwele kuvaladya mumautu aumbala kutwala kunjugwangila avaleke valwele vankwae padyoko vela munkumbu waikanju yake. Uti avalá váshinkwaa, vashindapona.
Napanelo Yesu vandímwidila mapalishayo pamo na vamwalimu vanji pakati pavamwalimu vadishaliya vakwalakela ku Yelusalemu
kutwala vovo vo kuvona vakwoda vanji vamwe Yesu valya na makono mashapu kwamwaa mene kunavanga medi kwayadi yave.
Mapalishayo pamo na vayuda uti havanalya bila kunavanga medi kwayadi yave, vanavo vananawanga nyamani, yadi yavanyakala.
Pavanauja kumautu aumbala vakananavanga medi kwayadi yave, havanalya shinu. Namomo vankunanawanga diyadi dinji dyoe kenga mwakuukangila diwene, vitumba na vyombo vinji vyavitali.
Napanelo mapalishayo avalá na vamwalimu vadishaliya vandímudya Yesu kushidoni, “Mwaa shani vakwoda vako havanaodedya shinu yadi yavanyakala, vankulya mmakono mùvenavo ushapu?”
Yesu kushidoni, “Nkúlava Ishaiya andivalanganga shana vyamushu amwamba mwenu mmanu mmamalambi aashidoni, “ ‘Venentete ava vangwishimu po pakanywa apa, ila ntima wave uvelé kushu namu nangu.
Kwangu nangu vanavo vankulipudya bule, vapundisha kenga mapundisho shii malamulo avanu vene.’
Mwenu munkuleka lilamulo lya Nnungu munanawanga nyamani, yadi yavanu.”
Kutwala kavili kushidoni, “Mwenu ngwengwe munkulambela dinamuna dyambone dyakukwapela lilamulo lya Nnungu mwambangidya munanawange yadi yenu.
