Musha anditangola kushidoni, ‘Mwishimu tatako na anyoko,’ na ‘Munu woewoe álota kumwiludyanga tatake na anyoke, vampedye,’
kanji mwenu munkukwepa. Munkwona kenga munu akamwaulila tatake kwali anyoke doni, ‘Inudyo yoeyoe yanishilota nimwing'e ailá, ayo ni Kolibaa’ (Kolibaa, mana ake inudyo),
bai mwenu munkunneya munu ajo kuntandela shinu shoeshoe tatake kwali anyoke.
Amu ni mwamuputangila mwenu lilove lyake Nnungu kanji kwamwaa wayadi yenu yamupundishania. Namomo munkutenda vinu vinji vyoe vyakuva kenga avi.”
Napanelo Yesu andíshema kavili imbumba yavanu kutwala kushidoni, “Mwenu uti ngwigwilila na ngwigwa shana.
Hashipali shinu shalakéla panda kumwinjila munu shuulúla kuntaa ushapu ila shintáa ushapu ni ashilá shúma mumunu.
Munu ávenavo matu akwigwidya, aigwe.”
Napanelo akanyeme paimbumba apalá, painjidile nng'ande, kwamwaa wankong'o aulá vakwoda vake kumudya.
Nae kushidoni, “Da namwenu momo hamunamanya shinu? Da hamunamanya shinu kenga shinu shapanda shiinjíla mumili mwamunu hashuulula kuntaa ushapu?
Hashinantaa ushapu mwaa hashinamwinjila muntima, shanavo shuka muliu kutwala ling'oto kunya.” Yesu patangwele davo ashimanyiya kenga vyakulya uti hashipali shivénavo ushapu.
Nae kuka mushu aashidoni, “Ashilá shúma mumunu ni shintáa ushapu.
Ni muntima wamunu múma makumbukililo akunyata; kulavalava, kwiva, kubyaa, kulanavo nkongwe ákavele wako,
liu, ukalau, ushwang'a, kutaduka, ing'ou, kwabola, kulyona na imbeve.
Vyaukalau avi uti vyuma muntima mwamunu; ni vyovyo vintáa ushapu.”
Napanelo Yesu andyúma palyutu alyo kuka kwisemu yananyenje mwake likaja lya Tilu. Koko ko, nae awika paing'ande imo ashilota alipiyange kanji haiyululíke.
Bai nkongwe jumo ávenavo mwanagwe namako, namako jo ávenavo lijini nshapu, akaigwe vantambulanga Yesu, nae kumuukila kungwilangila mmadodo mwake.
Nkongwe jo avele mmidi wa ku Shilopoinike; napanelo anínjugwa Yesu pakulota ankumulange lijini mumili mwamwanagwe.
Yesu kumwaulila doni, “Shitandi valeke vana valye mpaka vaikute mwaa hashinava shambone kutwala shakulya shavana kuvajalela vang'avanga.”
Nkongwe jo kushidoni, “Elo Umu kanji ata vo vang'avanga vo, vandálya dingalamwamwa dyashakulya shavana digwilangíla mwina imesha.”
Yesu kushidoni, “Po paujang'wile davo po, twala mwanda uke, lijini jo, tayali andyuma mumili mwamwanavo mo.”
Bai nkongwe pawikile kukaja kunkodya mwanagwe àlele paigoli, lijini jo àmuumile tayali.
Napanelo Yesu andyúma mwisemu ayo yananyenje mwake likaja lya Tilu kupita ku Shidoni kuka mpaka kulitanda lya Galileya apitila shilambo sha Dekapolishi.
Vanu vankumwidanavo kumwe Yesu munu jumo ákaigwa na walutata vankunjugwangila ammikile makono.
Nae pamuumidye mwimbumba yavanu, andímuukanavao kwagweka kunjela vyala kumatu na kunkamulangila mata mululimi.
Paladile kuwa, andísha ntima aashidoni, “Epataa!” Yani, “Shimuka!”
Kumatu ko kudiuka, lulimi lyo kungaluka na kutunduvanginneu kutangola shana.
Yesu andívaleya havanammalangangile munu kanji kila mwashivalaedya vanavo vashindamamodya kummalanganga.
Vashindashanga kupunda apo vaashidoni, “Uti vinu ankutenda shana, ankutadya mpaka vákaigwa vaigwe na vabubu vatangole.”
Napanelo mumaduva lolo lo, imbumba yavanu yùmbalanidile kavili na paikavanavo shakulya, Yesu kuvashema vakwoda vake kuvaulila doni,
“Vanu ava ninkuvaanangila shididi mwaa vankutwala maduva matatu vavelé namu nangu na havave shakulya.
Napavedoni ndikavaulila vaukanange kuding'ande kwave vàdobile indala, inkuululika kudilikanga shing'ati indila mwaa vanji vo vaaleke kushu.”
Vakwoda vake kushidoni, “Vanu ava pakulota kuvalisha munu apata pashi magung'u panalugwangwa apa?”
Yesu kuvaudya, “Muvénavo magung'u mangapi?” Vanavo do, “Saba.”
Yesu ankuvalamulila venentete vaikalange pai. Nae patwete magung'u saba alalá kunnambwalela Nnungu kumajanianga, andívapa vakwoda vake pakulota vavajavile venentete, vanavo kutandela momo.
Namomo dindípagwa dindemba padyoko do, nae paalalidye andívaulila doni, “Nadyanavo, java.”
Vanu uti kulya mpaka kwikuta. Makombo lo avele oe, makalala saba.
Palyutu alyo vanu vavele dyalupu nsheshe, bai nae andívalaila.
Napanelo nae andíkwelenneu mwingalava pamo na vakwoda vake kuka kwisemu ya ku Dalamanuta.
Mapalishayo vandímwidila Yesu kutunduvanga kujunganavo vanninga ntima vanjugwa alodye shimanyikilo shakwalakela kuwa.
Nae akaisha ntima namene kutwala kushidoni, “Mwaa shani vanu vaimbula ai vangujugwa shimanyikilo? Ninkumwaulila mwiu doni, vanu vaimbula ai havalodya munu shimanyikilo shoeshoe.”
Napanelo nae pavalakile, andíkwela mwingalava kuka litanda nkono unji.
Vakwoda vake vandílivaliva kunyukata magung'u, mwingalava mo vavénavo ali, limo bai.
Napanelo ashindavaduma aashidoni, “Lilaledye! Lishunge kwaing'ano yankukumuku wamapalishayo na umwe Elode!”
Vanavo kutaukananga shivenevene vaashidoni, “Shamumwona kutangola davo po, mwaa wetu hatunyukete magung'u.”
Yesu amanya shivéle mmitima myave kushidoni, “Mwaa shani munkutaukananga ing'ano yakumwova magung'u? Da hamunava kwigwa na kwanalela? Mitima vyenu vindinanopa?
Mevo mwenu munkuvanavo kanji hamunalola shinu; matu munkuvanavo kanji hamunaigwa shinu. Da hamunakumbukila shinu?
Pandivajavidile vanu dyelupu tano magung'u mwanu apalá, makombo muumbadidye makalala mangapi?” Vanavo do, “Kumi na mbili.”
“Kushi pandivajavidile vanu dyalupu nsheshe magung'u saba apalá, makombo lo muumbadidye makalala mangapi?” Vanavo do, “Saba.”
Kutwala Yesu kushidoni, “Napanelo hamunava kwanalela?”
Vanavo vakauka ndawika pa Beteshaida. Pavawikile, vankumwidanavo kumwe Yesu munu jumo wakuputala mevo kunjugwangila ammikile makono.
Nae pankamwile nkono munu jo andímuukanavo kunyenje likaja, kunshunila mata mmevo, kummika makono kumudya, “Dashi unkwona shinu shoeshoe?”
Munu aijá pang'amwile mevo kushidoni, “Ninkuvona vanu vilinga-vilinga kenga milandi vinkuwena doni.”
Yesu kummika kavili makono kumevo nae akuno alola ndoo! Munu jo kupona vinu uti kwona shana.
Bai Yesu anínnamulila auke akapumule pang'ande pake amwaulila doni, “Nkaja mo, haunamwaulile munu.”
Napanelo Yesu pamo na vakwoda vake vandyúma kuka kumakaja a ku Shashaleya imwe Pilipo. Vàvele ndila nae andívaudya vakwoda vake kushidoni, “Da vanu vanguvalanganga nangu kuva nyani?”
Vanavo do, “Nshuwau Wakubatisha, vanji Liyashi, vanji kavili do nkúlava jumo pakati pavakulava.”
Nae kuvaudya vanavo, “Kushi na mwenu po, mulota kunguvalanganga nangu kuva nyani?” Patulu patwete kujang'ula kushidoni, “Wako Klistu.”
Nae kutwala kuvaduma pakulota havanammalangange kwavanu.

Napanelo Yesu andítunduvanga kuvapundisha vakwoda vake aashidoni, “Mwana Wamunu inimmaikila apate mauvilo oe; inimmaikila vamwite vanang'olo, vakulangalalela-shadaka vanang'olo pamo na vamwalimu vadishaliya, apele na muliduva lyantatu lyake adyuke.”
Malove alo nae ashitangola ngala kutwala Patulu kunshamela Yesu kwagweka kuntangalela.
Yesu pashiliwike kuvalola vakwoda vake, aníntangalela Patulu doni, “Tumuka mushu mwangu Shatwani! Wako haunakumbukila shinu mwakumbukilila Nnungu, ukumbukila mwavakumbukilila vanu.”
Bai nae kushema imbumba yavanu pamo na vakwoda vake kuvaulila kushidoni, “Munu akalota kungwoda nangu, alishukulu jo mwene anyukate nshalaba wake angwode.
Mwaa woewoe álota aposhe shingumi shake, andakatoka kanji woewoe álota akatoke shingumi shake mwaa wangu nangu na kwamwaa wantenga wambone, andaposha.
Da munu alota kupata wambone shani akapata shilambo uti kutwala kukatoka shingumi shake?
Da shinu shani shalota kuulula kumya munu abadilishe na shingumi shake?

Munu woewoe waimbula ai yakulavalava na yakutega akangwanangila nangu dyoni na kwanangila malove angu, Mwana Wamunu momo andamwanangila dyoni paida mulishangelo lyatatake àvele pamo na vanjelo vakwilimyanga.”
Kutwala kavili kushidoni, “Ninkumwaulila mwiu doni vapali vanu vanji popo apa, vanavo mwiko havapela vakanava kwona utawala wa Nnungu wida na dimongo.”
Akapite maduva sita, Yesu akantwala Patulu, Tiyagu namu Nshuwau kuvaukanavo kushinu kwagweka kulishinga lyakukulumuka. Koko ko, nae kujalukanga pamevo pave;
dinguvo dyake kuva dyanashwe na dyakushenga namene, kushwalela kwákaulula nkúshapa woewoe wamushilambo ashi kuwisha shilinga asho.
Popo po kwaneka Liyashi, Musha vatangola namu Yesu.
Patulu kutwala kumwaulila Yesu kushidoni, “Labi, ni shambone mwatupagwididye pashinu apa, leka tukandyange mautu matatu akwikala limo lyako, linji limwe Musha na linji live limwe Liyashi.”
Nae hashimanya shashitangola mwaa vovo vo vashindajopa.
Bai kutwala kushuluka lyundi kuwa kuvainikidya, mo mulyundi mo kwigwinika lidi litédoni, “Aju ni mwanangu waninnagwaledya! Jojo jo mwigwilile!”
Kwashingangala vakalalyange nyenje mwave vanu vo vavagwene vyo, ngwee kumwona jo Yesu aju gweka na vanavo.
Napanelo pavashishuluka mulishinga Yesu andívaleya havanammalangangile munu vinu vyavagwene mpaka palota kudyuka Mwana Wamunu pakati pavakupela.
Bai vanavo vandípiyanga ing'ano ayo vaudyania shivenevene mana akudyuka aku pakati pavakupela.
Nadoni vakwoda vake vandímudya, “Mwaa shani vamwalimu vadishaliya vankushidoni, ‘Ivaikidilé Liyashi ave ntandi kwida?’ ”
Yesu do, “Mwiu paida Liyashi, andapanganianga vinu uti. Kanji mwaa shani indyandikigwa imwamba Mwana Wamunu doni, ‘Inimmaikila auvauvange vinu vyoe na ailudyangigwe’?
Nangu apa ninkumwaulila doni, Liyashi jo andida na jojo jo, vanintenda uti vyavalatile kwodamwaa indyandikigwa imwamba nae.”
Napanelo vanavo pavawikile pavavéle avalá vakwoda vanji vandyóna imbumba ing'umene yavanu ivatang'anadidye na vamwalimu vadishaliya vataukananganavo.
Imbumba po paingwene Yesu indyángaikanga kutwala kuntukutila kuka ndamuudyanga.
Nae kuvaudya vamwalimu vadishaliya, “Da mwenu mutaukananganavo nyamani?”
Munu jumo mwimbumba mo patwete kulijang'ulidya kushidoni, “Mwalimu, ndimwidanavo mwanangu kwako wako, nae ankuvanavo lijini ántaa ububu.

Lijini aju pashinu poepoe panankodya, anángwiidya pai, nkanywa mo kutuka shulu akuno akwishakwishanga meno na andájuma do, go. Ndivajugwa vakwoda vako pakulota vankumulange kanji vanavo vanintatakela.”
Yesu do, “Shasho! Mwenu mmanu mmaimbula íkakulupila! Da nangu ndapagwa namu mwenu mpaka duvani? Nannaga mwenu mpaka duvani? Bai pane mwidenavo akuno ndyoko jo!”
Vanavo kumwidanavo. Napanelo lijini po pangwene Yesu aníntainneu shalala ndyoko jo, ndyoko kugwa kunneka agalagata pai na atuka shulu nkanywa.
Yesu kumudya tatake mwana, “Shitendo ashi shinditwala wakati woe tangu shintunduvange?” Tatamunu kushidoni, “Tangu shidyoko shake.
Nomomo myanda vyoe anánjela pamoto na mmedi alota ammyae. Napanelo ukaulula kutenda shinu shoeshoe, twanangila shididi, tupwashela!”
Yesu kushidoni, “Ukaulula? Vinu uti vinkuululika kwa aijá ákulupila.”
Tatamunu kutangalenneu pashanya po aashidoni, “Nangu ninkukulupila ila ngupwashela kutema ungakulupila wangu.”
Napanelo Yesu pagwene iminga yavanu yumbalanila anínshulanga lijini nshapu jo kushidoni, “Wako lijini bubu na úkaigwa, nangu ninkukulamulila kuma mumili mwandyoko aju na haunainjile kavili!”
Lijini akuno akuta kungwiya ndyoko jo na dimongo kuma kunneka ndyoko àlele kenga andipela mpaka kuvatadya vanu kushidoni, “Alo, andipela!”
Yesu kanji kunkamula ndyoko jo nkono kuntakatuwa kutwala ndyoko jo kwimila.
Bai Yesu painjidile nng'ande vàvele gweka vakwoda vake vandímudya doni, “Da mwaa shani wetu hatuulwile kunkumulanga lijini jo?”
Nae kushidoni, “Lijini wakuva doni ankuululika kukumulangigwa kwaindila yakushwali bai.”
Vanavo vandyúma palyutu alyo kupitila ku Galileya. Napanelo Yesu hashilota vanu vammanye pavele
mwaa ashindavapundisha vakwoda vake kushidoni, “Mwana Wamunu vanannimya kunkamudya kumakono kwavanu, vanavo vanampedya, ling'oto lyakupela, muliduva lyantatu lyake andadyuka.”
Vakwoda vake havashigwa shashamba vanavo vashindajopa kumudya.
Bai vanavo vandíwika ku Kapalanaumu. Napanelo àvele paing'ande andívaudya vakwoda vake kushidoni, “Da mwenu ndila amulá mushitaukananga nyamani?”
Vanavo kummalalanga mwaa vashipita vataukananga vammanye nyani nang'olo pakati pave.
Yesu kwikala kuvashema avalá kumi na mbili kuvaulila doni, “Munu akang'ang'anikila ave ntandi andava wamwisho na andava ntumika wavanu uti.”
Nae antwete ndyoko ndikidiki kumwimidya shing'ati shave kunkamula kushidoni,
“Munu woewoe ámpwashalela mwana ndikidiki kenga aju palina lyangu nangu, angupwashalela nangu; woewoe ángupwashalela nangu i do angupwashalela nangu gweka, ankumpwashalela momo aijá ángutumididye.”
Napanelo Nshuwau andítangola kushidoni, “Mwalimu, tungwené munu akumulanga majini palina lyako, wetu kunneya mwaa nae hashitwoda wetu.”
Yesu kushidoni, “Mene, mukananneye. Hapali munu álota kutenda makango palina lyangu, jojo jo kuulula kungutangalenneu kunyata
mwaa munu ákatuvangedya ankupagwa upande wetu.
Ninkumwaulila mwiu doni, aijá álota kumupa luwene lwamedi mukumbila palina lyangu nangu kwamwaa wakuva mwenu mmake Klistu, mwiko munu ajo hakatoka shinu kupata lidaka lyake.
“Munu woewoe akantadya kukuvala ndyoko jumo pakati pavadikidiki ava vangukulupila nangu, kudyanga munu ajo kumuungila lijanga lyakwidopa pang'ulo kutwala kunjela mwimanga.
“Nkono wako ukakutadya ukuvale, lumula. Kudyanga kwinjila mushingumi ùlamele kuliko kuvanavo makono uti mavili kutwala kuka kushena kumoto úkadimika.
Lidodo lyako likakutadya ukuvale, lumula. Kudyanga kwinjila mushingumi ùlamele kuliko kuvanavo madodo uti mavili kutwala kukujela kushena.
Liu lyako likakutadya ukuvale, usha. Kudyanga kwinjila muutawala wa Nnungu na liu limo kuliko kuvanavo mevo uti mavili kutwala kukujela kushena,
kushinu “ ‘kwákawa shong'o wave na moto úkadimika.’
Mumanye kenga kula munu vanantakila munyu na moto.
Munyu, wambone kanji ukadalala ulota kuujidya dashi kavili kuva munyu? Mwenu avanavo munyu mmili myenu na avanavo amani munu na munumwagwe.”
Yesu paumile apo, andyúka kulijimbo lya Yudeya mpaka mwangu unji wa Yudani. Bai imbumba yavanu indímwidila kavili na nae kenga lidyavalelo lyake ashindavapundisha.
Napanelo mapalishayo vandímuukila kumudya doni, “Da lilamulo linkutuleka munu kunneka ndyagwe?” Vovo vo, vashinanninga.
Nae kushidoni, “Da Musha annamulidilé dashi?”
Vanavo, “Musha atulamulidilé munu amwandikile italaka nkongwe atwale anneke.”
Nae kutwala kushidoni, “Musha andimwandikila lilamulo alyo mwaa mwenu mitima vyenu vyakunanopa.
Kanji tangu kunantandi kukandyanga Nnungu shilambo, ‘nae ankandyengé nnume na nkongwe.’
‘Nadoni nnume andalyumadyanga patatake na panyoke kuka ndalyunganianga na nkongwe ndyagwe
kutwala vanu vavili ava kuva mili umo.’ Nadoni vanu vavili ava havanava shinu vavili; ni mili umo bai.
Napavedoni shaunganienge Nnungu, munu hanapukaniange.”
Napanelo vavele kavili paing'ande, vakwoda vake vandímuudyangidya ing'ano ayo.
Yesu kutwala kuvajang'ula kushidoni, “Munu woewoe ánneka ndyagwe kuka nannomba nkongwe junji, munu ajo ankulavalava na ankuntagela ndyagwe ntandi.
Namomo nkongwe ánneka ntwagwe kuka ndalombwa na nnume junji, nkongwe ajo ankulavalava.”
Napanelo vanu vashindavaidanavo vadyoko kumwe Yesu avavikile makono kutwala vakwoda vake kuvashulanga.
Yesu pagwene shitendo asho inínnyatila kutwala kushidoni, “Valeke vadyoko vaide kwangu, hamunavaleye mwaa utawala wa Nnungu wavanu vavéle mwavadyoko.
Ninkumwaulila mwiu doni, aijá ákapwashalela utawala wa Nnungu kenga ndyoko, ajo mwiko hainjila shinu muutawala awo.”
Bai nae andívatwala vadyoko vo kuvavikila makono na kuvaalaliya.

Napanelo Yesu pashuukanavo kavili mushu na shimwanda shake, munu jumo aníntukutila kuka ndaguguvala mushu mwake ndaashidoni, “Mwalimu wambone, ngutandelé mwashi pakulota ngupate shingumi shíkamalilika?”
Nae kushidoni, “Mwaa shani ungushema kuva wambone? Hapali munu wambone; wambone ni gweka Nnungu bai.
Wako unkumanya malamulo, ‘Haunabyae, Haunalavalave, Haunaive, Haunaumye ushuda waushwang'a, Haunatindinganiange na Mwishimu tatako na anyoko.’ ”
Nnemba jo kushidoni, “Mwalimu, nangu malamulo ala ninkwodedya tangu shidyoko shangu.”
Yesu pannadile aninnagwaledya kutwala kushidoni, “Shindikubakila shinu shimo. Uti vyauvenavo wena ukashulushe, njuluku wo uvape vákave pashinu. Undavanavo libadila kuwa; ling'oto, ida ungwode.”
Nnemba aijá paigwite lilove alyo andítangadikanga shintimatima na andívanavo shipalodi shoe mwaa avenavo vinu vyoe.
Yesu kushiliuka kulalyanga nnyenje mwake kuvaulila vakwoda vake kushidoni, “Pandikamadyanga namene vatajili kwinjila muutawala wa Nnungu!”
Vakwoda vake vandíshanga malove alo kanji nae kavili kushidoni, “Mmanavangu, me pandikamadyanga namene kwinjila muutawala wa Nnungu.
Shíkakamadyenge ni kupaleta ngamila mulilanga lyakashinji kuliko kwinjila ntajili muutawala wa Nnungu.”
Vanavo kumamodya namene kushanga kutwala kudyania shivenevene vaashidoni, “Ikava davo po, aambwalegwa nyani?”
Yesu kuvalola kutwala kushidoni, “Kwavanu shinu ashi hashinaululika shinu kanji kwa Nnungu i mwanavo mwaa Nnungu vinu uti ankuulula.”
Napanelo Patulu kushidoni, “Wetu tundileka vyetu uti kukwoda wako.”

Yesu kushidoni, “Ninkumwaulila mwiu kenga, kula munu álakile ing'ande yake, ávalakile vanung'unuvake kwali vakuluvake, ávalakile valumbuvake, ánnakile tatake kwali anyoke, ánnakile ndyagwe kwali vanavake, álakile mashamba kwamwaa wangu nangu na kwamwaa wantenga wambone,

munu aju muwakati wowo au, kwakwanjadyeka myanda miya andapata ding'ande adyo, vanung'unumunu avo, valumbumunu avo, vajujumunu avo, vana avo na mashamba alo pamo na kupapatigwa. Namomo muwakati wída, munu ajo andapata shingumi shíkamalilika.
Kanji manya kenga vanu voe vatandi vandava vamwisho na vamwisho vandava vatandi.”

Napanelo vanavo vauka mushu na shimwanda shave sha ku Yelusalemu, Yesu àlangaladile vakwoda vake vandímwoda kunyuma akuno vashanga shimwanda asho na vanu vanji váshivoda vashindajopa. Nae ni pavashamadile kavili kwagweka avalá kumi na mbili kuvaulila vinu uti vilóta kuntandeka aashidoni,

“Mwenu, tunkuka ku Yelusalemu. Koko ko, Mwana Wamunu vanannimya kunkamudya kumakono kwavanang'olo vavakulangalalela-shadaka na kwavamwalimu vadishaliya. Vovo vo, vandamuukumu apele na vanankamudya kumakono kwavamidi.
Vanavo vandamwiludyanga, kunshunangila mata, kunshapa viboko na vanampedya. Kanji muliduva lyantatu lyake andadyuka.”
Napanelo Tiyagu namu Nshuwau vanavake Shebedeu vandímuukila Yesu ndamwaulila doni, “Mwalimu, wetu tulota utwangangole shoeshoe shatulota kukujugwa.”
Nae, “Mulota nimwangangole nyamani?”
Vanavo do, “Paulota kupagwa mulishangelo lyako, tupa litala lyakwikala, jumo kunkanakono junji kunshanda kwako.”
Nae kushidoni, “Hamunamanya shinu shakujugwa. Da mwenu munkuulula kukumbila luwene lwangukumbila nangu kwali kupata ubatisho wangupata nangu?”
Vanavo, “Elo, tunkuulula.” Yesu kushidoni, “Luwene lwangukumbila nangu, mundakumbila. Ubatisho wangupata nangu, mundapata
kanji yakwikala kunkanakono kwali kunshanda kwangu, ayo hainava shinu yakujava nangu. Vene mautu alo ni avalá vavapanganiangididye.”
Bai vanji kumi vo vakaigwe malove alo, vanímmikila shitundi Tiyagu namu Nshuwau.
Yesu kuvashema kuvaulila doni, “Mwenu munkumanya kenga avalá vánavavika kuva vakutawala vavamidi vandálitumbudya kwavenentete na vakumene vave vandátumila madalaka kwavanavo.
Kwaupande wenu mwenu hainave davo. Aijá álota ave nang'olo pakati penu inimmaikila ave ntumika.
Namomo aijá álota ave ntandi, inimmaikila ave ntumwa wenu mwenu uti.
Ata jo Mwana Wamunu aju haidile vantumike; nae aidilé ndatumika na kujaula shingumi shake shive lyambolelo lyavanu voe.”

Bai Yesu pamo na vakwoda vake vandíwika pa Yeliko. Napanelo pavashuma nkaja mo nae na vakwoda vake pamo na imbumba yavanu, ndila mo andíikala munu jumo nkújugwajugwa wakuputala mevo walina Balitimeu mwanagwe Timeu.
Nae paigwite kenga Yesu wa ku Nashaleti ankupita mulyutu alyo andítunduvanga kushema pashanya po aashidoni, “Mwanagwe Daudi, Yesu wako, ngwanangila shididi.”
Vanu kunshulanga vamwaulila amalale kanji nae kuka mushu tu ashema pashanya po, “Mwanagwe Daudi, ngwanangila shididi!”
Yesu kwimila kutwala kushidoni, “Nsheme!” Vanavo kunshema aijá wakuputala mevo kumwaulila doni, “Lyunge ntima! Takatuka, ankukushema.”
Nae kutwala ikanju yake kujela ako, kudaloka kwimila kutwala kumuukila.
Yesu kumudya, “Da ulota ndikutandele nyamani?” Nae doni, “Mwalimu, ngulota nguujile kulola.”
Yesu kushidoni, “Wena, likulupililo lyako lindikuposha.” Muwakati wowo munu jo kulalenneu kutwala kupita amwoda Yesu mwashuka.
Napanelo vanavo pavavandike pa Yelusalemu vàvele pa Betepashi na Betaniya, palishinga lyamilandi Vyaulivela Yesu andívatuma vakwoda vake vavili
kutwala kuvaulila doni, “Wena palikaja livéle mushu mo. Pamwinjila munankodya mwana wapunda ákanava kunkwela munu vamuungangidile. Mwenu muungule mumwidenavo.
Akamudya munu kushidoni, ‘Da punda jo mumuungulila nyamani?’ Mwaulile doni, ‘ Umu ankunnota, ling'oto andamuujiya.’ ”
Vanavo kuka nankodya mwana wapunda vamuungangidile pannango nanyenje ibalabala kutwala kumuungula.
Napanelo pakati pavanu ve vapagwíte apo kuvaudya, “Mumuungulila nyamani punda jo?”
Vanavo kuvajang'ula kenga mo mwavaulidile Yesu, vanu vo kuvaleka vauke.
Bai vanavo kumwidanavo punda jo kumwe Yesu kuntandikanga dinguvo, Yesu kunkwela.
Vanu voe kupita vatandikanga dinguvo dyave mwindila, vanji kwanganga dinavi dyamilandi kupita valadyanga ndila.
Vanu váshuka mushu na váshaloka panyuma vashindapita vatangola pashanya po vaashidoni, “Ashibike!” “Aalaligwe áida palina limwe Umu!”
“Walaligwe utawala wída watatagwetu Daudi!” “Kushibika kupagwe kushanya-uti!”
Bai Yesu andíinjila pa Yelusalemu kukinneu ndainjila nng'ande ya Nnungu. Nae andílalyanga shana kula shinu kanji kwodamwaa wakati undípita andyúma namu avalá kumi na mbili kuka ku Betaniya.
Palyamba lyake pavashuma pa Betaniya Yesu kunkola indala.
Akone kwakushu nnandi uvéle mwankuju ùvele na mamba ake, nae kuka ndalola nakapanji andona shinu shoeshoe. Pavandike hagwene shinu ila akodidye mamba mwaa hauvele wakati wakupa vyepo.
Bai nae andítangalela nnandi awo kushidoni, “Kwako wako mwiko, halya munu kavili vyepo.” Malove alo, vakwoda vake vashindaigwa.

Vanavo vankuwika pa Yelusalemu. Yesu painjidile mwing'ande ya Nnungu andítunduvanga kuvakumulanga vanu váshishumidyanga na váshishumanga vinu, kugang'alanga dimesha dyavakushenji-njuluku na dikiti dyavanu váshishumidyanga ding'unda.
Nae ashindaleya munu kunyukata shinu shanshulushu mwing'ande ya Nnungu
na ashindapundisha aashidoni, “Da havaandike, ‘Ing'ande yangu indashamegwa ing'ande yakushwalidya venentete uti’? Kanji mwenu munditenda kuva shivava shavakwiva.”

Malove alo, vanang'olo vavakulangalalela-shadaka pamo na vamwalimu vadishaliya vashindaigwa. Vanavo vashindalambela dindila dyakummalididya mwaa vashinanjopa kwoda vanu uti vashindashanga mapundisho ake.
Pauwikile wakati wayalyulo vanavo vandyúma panjini po.
Napanelo lyamba lyake vapita pannandi po ndakodya ujumile kutunduvangila dinyija.
Patulu kukumbukila kutwala kumwaulila Yesu, “Labi, lola nnandi wautaile dilana wo, undijuma.”
Yesu kushidoni, “Mwenu, Nnungu nkulupile.

Ninkumwaulila mwiu kenga munu woewoe átangalela lishinga ali doni, ‘Bubuka apa uke ukalijele mwimanga,’ atangola bila kwambambidyanga muntima mwake, akulupila kenga vyatangwele vindátandeka, vindatandakela mo mwatangaladile.
Napavedoni ninkumwaulila, uti vyamulota kujugwa kwaindila yakushwali kulupila kenga mundipata nadoni vindakutandakela momo.
Pamushwali, shikapagwa shinu muntima mwako na munumwavo, nnivalive pakulota Tatagwenu ávele kuwa nanae annivalive kupujungula kwenu.”
Vanavo vankwinjila kavili pa Yelusalemu. Napanelo Yesu apita awanawananga mwing'ande ya Nnungu, vandímwidila vanang'olo vavakulangalalela-shadaka, vamwalimu vadishaliya pamo na vanang'olo
kutwala kumudya, “Vinu avi unkutenda kwamadalaka shani? Da madalaka ene lo autandela vinu avi akupelé nyani?”
Yesu kushidoni, “Nanangu ndamudya shinu shimo mukangujang'ula, nanangu madalaka angutandela vinu avi, ndamwaulila.
Da ubatisho umwe Nshuwau walakadilé kuwa kwali kwavanu? Ngujang'ula!”
Vanavo kwaulanila shivenevene vaashidoni, “Tukaashidoni, ‘Walakadilé kuwa,’ nae andatudya, ‘Mwaa shani hamunkulupidile?’
Ata tukaashidoni, ‘Walakadilé kwavanu…’ ” Vanavo vashindavajopa venentete mwaa venentete vashindamwamini Nshuwau kuva nkúlava.
Bai vanínjang'ula, “Wetu hatumanyite.” Yesu kutwa kushidoni, “Ata nanangu momo hanimwaulila madalaka angutandela vinu avi.”

Napanelo Yesu andítunduvanga kutangola na vanavo atumila mikong'o aashidoni, “Munu jumo andílima lishamba lyamilandi vyavinyu kutwala kudangela lingongo, kwimba shima shakuminyangila vyepo na kudenga libodo lyakulepa; kuvakodisha vakulima mwene kutwala mwanda kuka.
Pauwikile wakati wakupuna, nae kuntumidya ntumika jumo kwavakulima vo akatwale isemu yavyepo vyamulishamba lyake.
Vanavo kunkamula, kunkanyalanga, kunneka auka makonodavo.
Nae kuntumidya ntumika junji; vanavo kumbandulanga mmuti na kuntukananga.
Kuntumidya kavili junji; ajo vanavo kumpedya. Nae kuvatumidya vanji voe; vanavo, vanji kuvakamanga, vanji vo kuvapedya.
“Napanelo andíijalila munu jumo e avele mwanagwe washinnagwaledya mwene. Bai kumwisho kwake aníntumidya jojo jo aashidoni, ‘Apa mwanangu aju vandamwishimu!’
Kanji avalá vakulima vandyáulanila shivenevene vaashidoni, ‘Aju ni jojo walota kunkamudya lishamba. Idananga akuno tummalidye kwambangidya lishamba live lyetu.’
Nadoni vanavo vanínkamula kumpedya kutwala kunjela kunyenje lishamba.
Napanelo mwene lishamba jo alota kutandela mwashi? Nae andaida ndavabyanga uti vakulima avo kutwala lishamba lyo kuvapa vanu vanji.
Da mwenu hamushamidye Maandiko ala, “ ‘Vakudenga lijanga lyavaitile lyo, lindyuka ndava lijanga lyapalitununa.
Átandile davo ni Umu, ni vinu vyamakango kwetu wetu.’ ”
Napavedoni vanavo vashindalambela dindila dyakunkamulila mwaa vandímanya kenga nkong'o awo, ashivakang'ela vanavo. Kanji kwodamwaa vashindajopa imbumba yavenentete, vanínneka kutwala kuukananga.
Napanelo vandívatuma mapalishayo vanji pamo na vanu vashipinga shimwe Elode vauke vakampatikaniange mumalove ake.

Vanavo kumuukila kutwala kushidoni, “Mwalimu, wetu tundimanya shana kenga wako ni umunu waumwiu úkananapela mumaoni avanu mwaa haunalola ing'ope yamunu kanji unkupundisha kwaumwiu indila yalota Nnungu. Napanelo ni shambone nkati mulilamulo lyetu kunnipa Shashali ukodi kwali mene? Wetu po, tunkuulula kulipa kwali mene?”
Nae amanya avi shinankulaba shave, andívajang'ula kushidoni, “Mwaa shani munkungulinga? Ngupa yela imo ngulole!”
Vanavo kwidanavo ndamupa kutwala nae kuvaudya, “Da ing'ope ai imwe nyani na namakong'o aju umwe nyani?” Vanavo kushidoni, “Shashali.”
Kutwala Yesu kushidoni, “Vimwe Shashali, mwing'e mwene Shashali na vimwe Nnungu, mwing'e mwene Nnungu.” Bai vanavo vashinanshanga.
Napanelo mashadukayo, vanu vánaashidoni hakupali kudyuka kwavakupela, vanímmandika Yesu kutwala kumudya,
“Mwalimu, Musha atwandikidilé doni, nkulumunu akapela anneka namwili bila kummalakela mwana, nung'unumunu ainjile ding'ande pakulota ammalakele vana wakujala.
Nadoni vandípagwa vanung'unumunu saba vashitumbo shimo. Ntandi jo kulomba kutwala kupela kwabila kummaleka mwana.
Kwida wambili kwinjila ding'ande nanae kupela bila kummalekela nkongwe jo mwana. Kwatika wantantu nanae kutandakela momo.
Vanung'umunu ava uti saba hapali hammaleke mwana. Kumwisho kwake nanae nkongwe jo kupela.
Napanelo kushi muliduva lyakudyuka vanu lyo nkongwe ajo mwene alota kuva wakwashi pakati pavalume avo? Mwaa vanu avo uti vaninnomba!”
Kutwala Yesu kushidoni, “Shitadídye mwenu muduwangike da i mwaa mwenu me kumanya Maandiko na ata dimongo dyake Nnungu?
Mwenu, pavalota kudyuka vanu mukupela, hakupali kulomba na kulombwa kanji uti valota kuva kenga vanjelo kuwa.
Kwamwaa wakudyuka vanu, da hamushamidye mulibuku limwe Musha pavele palyukutu? Popo po, Nnungu atédoni, ‘Nangu ni Nnungu umwe Abulaamu, Nnungu umwe Ishaki na Nnungu umwe Yakobo.’
Nadoni nae hanava shinu Nnungu wavakupela, ni Nnungu wavangumi. Mwenu mundiduwangika namene!”

Napanelo mwalimu jumo pakati pavamwalimu vadishaliya andívandika kwigwilila shavashitaukananga. Bai nae pagwene kenga Yesu andivajang'ula shana, andímudya kushidoni, “Pakati pamalamulo uti, lilamulo shani likumene lipundíle anji uti?”
Yesu kushidoni, “Lilamulo likumene lipundíle anji ni ali, ‘Igwa wako Ishilaeli! Umu Nnungu wetu, nae ni jumo tu bai!
Nnagwaledye Umu Nnungu wako na ntima wako uti, ungumi wako uti, ding'anong'ano dyako uti na dimongo dyako uti.’
Lyambili ni ali, ‘Nnagwaledye mujo kenga mo mwaulinagwaladyedya wako umwene.’ Hapali malamulo anji makumene akupunda ala mavili.”
Munu jo kutwala kushidoni, “Shambone namene Mwalimu! Unditangola viu pautédoni, Nnungu avelé jumo bai hapali junji kavili wakumpunda nae.

Namwiu kunnagwaledya Nnungu na ntima wako uti, makumbukililo ako uti, dimongo dyako uti na kunnagwaledya mujo kenga mo mwaulinagwaladyedya wako umwene kunkuvanavo mana makumene kuliko vyadaka na vyadaka vyakutikinyuki-uti.”
Bai Yesu pangwene munu jo kujang'ula na limanyilo andímwaulila kushidoni, “Wako hauvé kushu na utawala wa Nnungu.” Nadoni kutunduvangila apo hapali munu áshilyalaveka kumudya shinu shoeshoe.
Napanelo Yesu akajang'ule, akuno apundisha mwing'ande ya Nnungu andyúdya doni, “Ivenavo mana shani vamwalimu vadishaliya pavaashidoni, ‘Klistu, mwanagwe Daudi?’
Jo mwene Daudi alangalalegwa na Imumu Wanashwe atédoni, “ Umu andimwaulila Nang'olo wangu doni, ‘Ikala kunkanakono kwangu mpaka nangu ndivavike vamongo vako kumaulu kwako.’
Napanelo ikava kenga jo mwene Daudi ankunshema Klistu kuva Nang'olo wake, ilota kuululika dashi kavili nae kuva mwanagwe?” Nadoni imbumba ing'umene yavanu ailá ishimwigwilila na lipuwilo.
Yesu pashipundisha ashitangola doni, “Lilaledye na vamwalimu vadishaliya! Vanavo kuvanagwela namene kugwala mikwakwala muumbala vaudyangigwe na ishima,
muvitala vyakulipudidya kwikala muviteng'u vyamushu na muvikukulu kuvanagwela mumautu aishima.
Vanavo vyavanamwili vankulyanga na mukushwali mo, vandátima do jii kanji ni kulikulukuwa tu bai. Vovo vo vandapata ukumu yakujowa kupunda apo.”
Napanelo Yesu andíikala mushu lishanduku lyashadaka. Nae ashilola imbumba yavanu mwavashijalela njuluku mulishanduku na kuvona vatajili voe vajela njuluku woe.
Bai popo po, kwida namwili jumo ákave pashinu ndajela dishingo mbili dyakunyambikanga.
Nae kuvashema vakwoda vake kuvaulila kushidoni, “Ninkumwaulila mwiu doni, namwili aju ákave pashinu, nae ni ájadile poe mulishanduku lyashadaka kuvapunda vanu vanji uti.
Vanu vanji vo vaumidyé padyumbele, nae aumidyé paungapata wake kujela uti shavenavo na kujela uti shingumi shake.”
Napanelo Yesu pashuma mwing'ande ya Nnungu nkwóda wake jumo andímwaulila kushidoni, “Mwalimu, lola majanga alalá mwamanyikangidile na ding'ande adilá kumanyikanga doni!”
Yesu kushidoni, “Unkwona ding'ande adi ding'umene adi? Bai haliikala lijanga pashanya lijangamwagwe palikabamalegwa.”
Yesu akaikala pashanya lishinga lyamilandi vya Ulivela livéle shalatoto naing'ande ya Nnungu, Patulu, Tiyagu, Nshuwau namu Andaleya kumudya kwagweka kushidoni,
“Twaulila, vinu avi vilota kutandeka duvani? Shimanyikilo shani shilota kulilodya vinu avyo uti vivelé pepi na kuwikila popo?”
Nae kutwala kutunduvanga kuvaulila doni, “Lilaledye pakulota hanapagwe wakunduwanga.
Vandaida vanu voe vatumila lina lyangu vaashidoni, ‘Nangu ni nene!’ Vovo vo, vandavaduwanga vanu voe.
Mukaigwa ding'ondo na manyinyi ading'ondo mwenu hamunajope. Vinu avyo vindivaikila vitandeke kanji haunava shinu mwisho.

Venentete vandatandana ing'ondo na venentetemwave, shilambo shindatandana ing'ondo na shilambomwagwe. Shindaumilila shindangenda mumautu akuvilingananga namomo indaumilila indala. Vinu avi uti ni shitunduvangilo tu shamauvilo akushuluwa.
“Mwenu lilaledye! Vanu vandamuukanavo mudikamati na muvitala vyakulipudidya vananshapa viboko. Kwamwaa wangu nangu mundaimila mushu mwavananangalaledi vamajimbo na mwavaumu kenga ushuda kwavanavo.
Napanelo ukanava kuwika mwisho indivaikila ntenga wambone uvalangangigwe kwavenentete uti.
Vakantwala vamuukanavo nankamudya, hamunangaikange mulambela mwakujang'ulila. Sho shilóta kumwidila muwakati awo mwenu tangola shosho mwaa i mwenu múlota kutangola ila ni Imumu Wanashwe.
Nkulumunu anankamudya nung'unumunu vampedye na tatamunu anatandela momo kwamwanamunu. Vana vandavavangedya vatatavave na vandavapedya.
Mwenu mundavangadika na vanu uti kwamwaa wangu nangu kanji aijá álota kulipililila mpaka kumwisho, ajo andaambolegwa.
“Mukona shakudabukanga shiídanavo kubamola shìimidile palyutu líkavaikidile, munu áshomya amanye mana ake, napane avalá vavéle ku Yudeya vatukutile kumashinga.
Ávele panda apumula hanatakatuke kwinjila nng'ande ndatwala shinu shoeshoe.
Ávele kundila hanauje kuka kukaja ndatwala ikanju yake.
Vapambale vakongwe valóta kuvanavo vitumbo na valóta kujang'edya mumaduva alo.
Shwali pakulota vinu avyo havinatandeke muwakati washipwepwe.
Mwaa mumaduva alo andapagwa mauvilo ainamuna íkanava kwaneka tangu kunantandi kukandyanga Nnungu shilambo mpaka nelo na haipagwa kavili.
Leka Umu akapungwile maduva alo hanapagwe ata munu jumo akambwalegwe kanji kwamwaa wavakutandalegwa vavatandwele nae, maduva lo, andipungula.
Bai munu akamwaulila doni, ‘Mwenu, Klistu aju apa,’ kwali, ‘Avelé akulá,’ hamunankulupile.
Mwaa vandaumilila vaklistu vakushang'apa pamo na vakulava vakushang'apa. Vovo vo, vandatenda vimanyikilo na vyakutikinikanga kwambangidya vavaashadyange ikaulukika vakutandalegwa.
Napavedoni mwenu lilaledye! Nangu ninnaililidile kaladavo kwamwaa wavinu uti.
“Kanji napanelo mumaduva alo amwisho, ling'oto lyamauvilo lo, liduva lindadimba, mwedi hauvala,
dinondo kuwa ko dindagwanga na vyadimongo vyakuniania vindating'inigwa.
Bai apo vandamwona Mwana Wamunu aaloka mumaundi na dimongo dyoe pamo na lishangelo.
Kutwala nae andavatuma vanjelo avalá vauke vakavatwalange vakutandalegwa vake mudisemu nsheshe dyamushilambo kutunduvangila kumwisho kwake shilambo shapai mpaka kumwisho kwake shilambo shakuwa.
“Napanelo kwankungu lipundishe nkong'o au, paunaipukila mwenu mumanyinneu doni, shipondo shindiwika.
Namomo mukona vinu avyo vitandeka manyinneu doni, mwisho undiwika, uvé mo mmilango myenu.
Ninkumwaulila mwiu doni, vanu vaimbula ai havamalilika vinu avi vikanava kutandeka.
Kuwa na pai kundapita ila malove angu mwiko hapita.
“Napane liduva lyene lyo na isaa, hapali ámanyite, ata vanjelo kuwa havamanyite, ata Mwana hamanyite ila ámanyite ni Atata bai.
Lilaledye, ava mevo! Mwenu hamumanyite wakati wamwisho duvani paulota kuwika.
Inkulinganana na munu ávenavo mwanda. Panauma pang'ande pake avapele madalaka vatumika vake kula munu na madengo ake anánnamulila nkúshunga-nnango ave mevo.
Napavedoni namwenu ava mevo mwaa hamumanyite wakati walota kuja nang'olo mwene ing'ande; inkuulukika kwali kuva lyulo, shilo shing'ati, kumatingatinga kwali lyamba.
Doni, ava mevo, akaida shingangala hanankodye mulele.
Vyanimwaulila mwenu avi, ninkuvaulila vanu uti kushidoni, ava mevo!”

Akuno àbakidile maduva mavili pakulota kuwika Pasaka na shikukulu shamagung'u ákavele nkukumuku, vanang'olo vavakulangalalela-shadaka na vamwalimu vadishaliya vashindalambela dindila dyakushang'apa pakulota vankamule Yesu vammyae.
Vanavo vashindatangola vaashidoni, “Haunave wakati washikukulu mwaa inkuulukika venentete kutenda mandamano akupinga.”

Bai nae àvele ku Betaniya, àikele pandamu nng'ande mwake Simoni aijá wamangundula, kuwika nkongwe jumo ànyukete ishupa yamauta akunung'angila ambone-uti aúka njuluku woe. Nkongwe ishupa yo kutumbula kutwala kumiminila mauta mmuti mwake Yesu.
Napanelo vanji ve vapagwíte mulyutu alyo vandíshanga, “Mauta ala mwaa shani ankujaikanga pashikapali?
Akandyululika kushulushika kupunda dinali dimiya nnatu kuvajavila vákavele pashinu.” Nadoni vanavo vashinantangadikanga.
Kanji napanelo Yesu kushidoni, “Nneke. Mwaa shani munkumwangaishanga? Nae aningutandela shinu shambone.
Mwenu ngwengwe munkupagwa pamo na vákavele pashinu; mukalota munkuulula kuvatandela wambone wakati woewoe. Napane nangu hangupagwa ngwengwe namu mwenu.
Nae atandilé shaulwile. Apakilé kaladavo mauta mumili wangu apanganianga mashiko angu.
Ninkumwaulila mwiu doni, kula kushinu kwavalota kuvalanganga ntenga wambone mushilambo amu, namomo vinu vyatandile nkongwe aju vandavalanganga kenga kumbukumbu kwake nae.”
Kutwala Yudashi Shikaliyote, jumo pakati pa avalá kumi na mbili kuvaukila vanang'olo vavakulangalalela-shadaka pakulota avakamudye Yesu.
Bai vanavo vakamwigwe, vandípuwanga namene kutwala kulivika kunnipa njuluku. Nadoni nae andítunduvanga kulambela dindila dyakuvakamudidya.
Napanelo muliduva litandi lyashikukulu shamagung'u ákavele nkukumuku pavashinshinda ngandolo wa Pasaka, vakwoda vake Yesu vandímudya kushidoni, “Ulota Pasaka ai tukakupanganiangidye kwashi ulye?”
Yesu kutwala kuvatuma vakwoda vake vavili kuvaulila kushidoni, “Wena kunjini. Koko ko mundakadyania na munu jumo ànyukete shilongo shamedi, mwode
mpaka paing'ande yalota kwinjila. Mwenu mwaulile mwene ing'ande jo doni, ‘Mwalimu ankudya, “Shumba shangu shangulota kulyela Pasaka na vakwoda vangu shakwashi?” ’
Nae anannangudya nshana wakulyandaula shana úvenavo vyombo uti, bai mwenu panganianga popo po.”
Napanelo vakwoda vake vakauke nkaja mo vandíkadyedya kenga mo mwavaulidile. Bai vanavo vandípanganianga Pasaka.
Pauwikile wakati wayalyulo, Yesu andyúka pamo na vakwoda vake kumi na mbili.
Napanelo vàvele pandamu valya, Yesu andítangola kushidoni, “Ninkumwaulila mwiu doni, munu jumo pakati penu álya namu nangu, anangulimya.”
Vanavo vandítunduvanga kuvanavo shipalodi kula munu amudya nae doni, “Da nangu?”
Kutwala Yesu kushidoni, “Ni jumo pakati penu mwenu kumi na mbili, munu álidya pamo namu nangu mundamu.
Ninkumwaulila mwiu doni, Mwana Wamunu andaukila kenga mo mwavaandikidile vamwamba nae, napane aijá munu álota kunnimya Mwana Wamunu, munu ajo apambale! Kudyanga jojo jo, hanavalekwe.”
Napanelo pavashilya, Yesu andítwala ligung'u kwalaliya kumajanianga kuvapa vakwoda vake aashidoni, “Twala mulye. Au ni mili wangu.”
Namomo andítwala luwene kunnambwalela Nnungu kuvapa vakwoda vake vanavo uti kukumbila.
Kutwala kushidoni, “Avi ni myadi vyangu, myadi vyaimbodi vilóta kuvajaikila vanu voe.
Ninkumwaulila mwiu uti doni, mwiko hangukumbila kavili ugwalwa au wavyepo mpaka muliduva alyo lyangulota kukumbila muutawala wa Nnungu.”
Bai vakamalile kwimba lwimu vandyúmananga kuka kulishinga lyamilandi vya Ulivela.
Napanelo Yesu andívaulila vakwoda vake kushidoni, “Mwenu uti munangwambukanga mwaa vandyandika doni, “ ‘Nammyaa nkúshunga kutwala dingandolo kumwadilikananga.’
Napane pangudyuka po, ndalangalela kuka ku Galileya.”
Patulu kutwala kushidoni, “Ata ikava kenga vavangu uti vandakwambukanga, nangu mene!”
Yesu kushidoni, “Ninkukwaulila mwiu doni, shilo sho shanelo ashi, ng'uku akanava kukangavela myanda mivili, wako unangukana myanda mitatu.”
Patulu nae kulitaukanga na dimongo aashidoni, “Ata ikaulukika kupela namu wako, mwiko handikukana.” Namomo vanji avalá uti kutangalela momo.
Napanelo vanavo vankuwika palyutu lyavashema Geteshemani. Yesu ankuvaulila vakwoda vake kushidoni, “Mwenu ikalanga apa nangu mwanda ndashwali.”
Nae ankuntwala Patulu, Tiyagu namu Nshuwau kutunduvanga kwangaikanga na kumwida matuva
kutwala kushidoni, “Ungumi wangu unkuvanavo shipalodi shakutadya kupela. Mwenu ikalanga popo apa na mupimile.”
Nae kuka mushu padiki doni, kugwa kuunama pai kutwala kushwali pakulota wakati wída, ikaululika kwake nae haunamwike.
Napane kushidoni, “Aba, Atata, vinu uti wako unkuulula. Nyemya luwene alu pamili pangu ila haunatende mwangulatela nangu, tenda mwaulatela wako umwene.”
Bai Yesu kuujila kwavakwoda vake ndavakodya vàlalenge lwono kutwala kumwaulila Patulu kushidoni, “Simoni, da unkulala? Hauvé dimongo dyakupimila ata isaa imo?
Pimila na shwali pakulota hamunainjile mukutubigwa. Mwiu imumu inkuva tayali, mili ni udabadabenge.”
Nae kutwala kuka kavili ndashwali aujidya malove lolo matandi.
Paujite kuvakodya kavili vàlalenge mwaa mevo ave andíidapelwa na lwono na havashimanya shakunjang'ula.
Paidile mwanda wantatu kuvaulila kushidoni, “Munkulala na munkupumula mpaka ambi? Panditosha! Napanelo wakati undiwika. Mwenu! Mwana Wamunu vaninnimya vankamudya kumakono kwavakutega.
Takatukanga tuke! Mwenu, aijá wakungulimya jo ankwida!”

Napanelo Yesu akuno atangola, Yudashi aijá wamushipinga sha avalá kumi na mbili kwidinneu na imbumba yavanu vànyukatenge maambila na dilungu. Vanavo vatumigwidye na vanang'olo vavakulangalalela-shadaka, vamwalimu vadishaliya na vanang'olo.
Nadoni nannimya andívapa shimanyikilo aashidoni, “Aijá wangulota kumwambatila ni jojo, nkamulinneu mumukenavo munshunga.”
Yudashi pawikile kukinneu kumwe Yesu ndaashidoni, “Labi!” Kutwala kumwambatila.
Bai vanu avalá vanínkamula Yesu kumunga.
Napanelo munu jumo e aimidíle popo, kwalamolenneu lyambila lyake kumyaa ntumika wake nkúlangalalela-shadaka nkumene kunnumula lyatu.
Yesu kutwala kushidoni, “Kenga nkalau shamwida na maambila pamo na dilungu kwida nangukamula?
Kula liduva ngushipagwa namu mwenu mwing'ande ya Nnungu ngupundisha, ata hamunguungile. Napane avi uti ni pakulota Maandiko awikile popo.”
Bai vakwoda vake uti vanínneka kutwala kutukutanga.
Napanelo popo po, andípagwa nnemba jumo áshipita amwoda Yesu àjambele likuba tu. Vanavo kunkamula,
nae kujaa likuba lyo kutukuta matakudavo kuka.
Napanelo Yesu vandímuukanavo kumwe nkúlangalalela-shadaka nkumene kulyutu lyavakadyaniénge vanang'olo vavakulangalalela-shadaka, vanang'olo pamo na vamwalimu vadishaliya.
Patulu andímwoda Yesu kwakushu mpaka ndainjila mulugwani lumwe nkúlangalalela nkumene kutwala kwikala pamo na vakushunga kujota moto.
Bai vanang'olo vavakulangalalela-shadaka pamo na ikamati uti, vashindalambela ushuda wakulota kummalididye Yesu kanji havapatíle.
Vanu voe vashindaumya ushuda waushwang'a vammalanganga Yesu kanji ata wo ushuda wave, haushigwiníka.
Bai vanji vandítakatuka kumya ushuda waushwang'a vaashidoni,
“Wetu tundimwigwa munu aju aashidoni, ‘Nangu ndabamola ing'ande ai ya Nnungu yavadangile na makono kutwala nangu kudenga inji kwamaduva matatu kanji i namakono.’ ”
Ata kwaushuda awo, haushigwiníka.
Napanelo nkúlangalalela-shadaka nkumene andítakatuka kumudya Yesu kushidoni, “Da hashipali shakujang'ula vyavakutambudyanga avi?”
Nae kumalala. Halipali lilove ata limo lyajang'wíle kutwala nkúlangalalela nkumene kumudya kavili, “Da wako Klistu, aijá Mwanagwe Wakwalaligwa?”
Nae kushidoni, “Elo, nangu ni nene. Bai mwenu mundamwona Mwana Wamunu àikele kunkanakono kwake Wadimongo-uti aida mumaundi kuwa.”
Nkúlangalalela nkumene kutwala kupapulanga dinguvo dyake kushidoni, “Shapo tulambela ushuda shani kavili?
Da mwenu shi mundimwigwa akupulu, napane mwona dashi?” Vanu uti vandimuukumu kenga inimmaikila apele.
Vanji pakati pave kutunduvanga kunshunangila mata, kumwinikidya kumevo, kunkoma kutwala kumudya, “Valanga, akukanywelé nyani?” Nadoni vakushunga vaníntwala kupita vankanyola malatuma.
Napanelo Patulu àikele mulugwani pai, ntumika jumo mwali umwe nkúlangalalela-shadaka nkumene kuwika.
Pangwene Patulu ajota moto, anínnola kutwala kushidoni, “Nawako momo undípagwa pamo namu Nnashaleti Yesu.”
Patulu kutwala kukana aashidoni, “Nangu nammanya shinu. Ata sho shautangola sho, hangumanyite.” Bai nae kutumuka kuka ndaimila pannango.
Napanelo jo ntumika aijá andímwona kavili Patulu, nae kuvaulila vanu vapagwíte apo kushidoni, “Aju nanae, wamushipinga shosho.”
Patulu nae kukana kavili. Bai muwakati padyoko vanu vapagwíte apo, vandímwaulila kavili kushidoni, “Mwiu uti, wako wamushipinga shosho mwaa gwegwe, ungalileya.”
Napane Patulu kutunduvanga kulitaa dilana na kulilapa aashidoni, “Nangu nammanya shinu munu aju wamumwamba mwenu aju.”

Ng'uku kukangavalenneu mwanda wambili kutwala Patulu kukumbukila malove e amwaulidíle Yesu doni, “Akanava ng'uku kukangavela myanda mivili, wako unangukana myanda mitatu.” Bai Patulu andíkamulila kumuti kulila.
Napanelo lyamba linyeiku vanang'olo vavakulangalalela-shadaka, vanang'olo, vamwalimu vadishaliya pamo na ikamati uti yavayuda vandíikala nguguvale kutwala kumunga Yesu kumuukanavo kumwe Pilatu.
Pilatu kumudya Yesu, “Wako umu wavayuda?” Yesu kushidoni, “Wako ni úvalanganga.”
Bai vanang'olo vavakulangalalela-shadaka vashinantambudyanga vinu vyoe namene.
Pilatu kumudya kavili mwanda unji, “Haunajang'ula shinu? Lola vinu vyoe vyavakutambudyanga.”
Yesu nae hashipali shajang'wíle kuntadya Pilatu jo kushanga.
Napanelo kula pashishiwika shikukulu, Pilatu ashindavaungulila nkúngwa jumo wavashinjugwa venentete.
Bai andípagwa nkúngwa jumo walina Balabashi aungwídye pamo na vakalaumwagwe ve vavabyée vanu pamandamano akupinga.
Nadoni imbumba yavenentete indímuukila Pilatu nanjugwa avatandele kenga mo mwanamaduva.
Pilatu kutwala kuvaudya, “Mulota nimuungulile umu wavayuda?”
Nae ashindamanya kenga vanang'olo vavakulangalalela-shadaka vaninkamudya Yesu kwake kwamwaa waing'ou.
Kanji napane vanang'olo vavakulangalalela-shadaka vo vandíkang'ela imbumba yavanu pakulota vanjugwe Pilatu avaungulile Balabashi.
Pilatu kutangola navanavo kavili avaudya, “Napanelo mulota nintandele mwashi munu aju wamunshema umu wavayuda?”
Vanavo kujunga pashanya po vaashidoni, “Nkamele panshalaba!”
Pilatu nae kushidoni, “Mwaa wanyamani? Da shaukalau shani shatandile?” Kanji vanavo vashindamamodya kujunga pashanya po vaashidoni, “Nkamele panshalaba!”
Bai Pilatu alota atendedye imbumba yavanu ivanagwele, andívaungulila Balabashi na akanshape Yesu viboko anínjaula vankamele panshalaba.
Napanelo vaing'ondo vaníntwala Yesu kumuukanavo nng'ande mwananangalaledi walijimbo na popo po, vandívaimang'anianga vaing'ondo uti.
Vanavo apalá vankungwadya ikanju yailangi yanshambalau, vankukandyanga lidaka lyamiva kungwadya mmuti
kutwala kutunduvanga kumuudyanga vaashidoni, “Shikamu umu wavayuda.”
Vashinankanyola mmuti na nkungulandi, vashinanshunila mata na vashinanguguvalila kutwala kulipudya kwake.
Ling'oto lyakumwiludyanga, vandímula ikanju yanshambalau yo kutwala kungwadya dinguvo dyake. Bai vaníntwala kumuukanavo panda likaja nankamela panshalaba.
Napanelo munu jumo wa ku Shilene walina Simoni tatake Alishandale namu Lupu ashipita apo aaloka kwaludeya, vanavo vanínnamulila anyukate nshalaba.
Bai vanavo vaníntwala Yesu kumuukanavo palyutu lya Gologota kwakuvalangangila mana ake lyutu lyashivanga.
Napanelo vandímupa vinyu yavataíle mila kanji nae hakumbidíle.
Vanavo apalá vankunkamela panshalaba, vankujavananga dinguvo dyake vatenda shimwavi pakulota vamanye shakupata kula munu.
Napane indíwika satatu yalyamba, vanavo kunkamela panshalaba.
Pamuti pake vandyándika malove ankanidyo amwamba nae doni, “Umu Wavayuda.”
Vandívakamela vakwiva vavili pamo namu nae, jumo kunkanakono junji kunshanda.
Vanu váshipita apo vashindamwabalanga vaapukunianga myuti vaashidoni, “Wako únabamola ing'ande ya Nnungu kutwala kudenga mumaduva matatu,
liposhe gwegwe umwene na shuluka panshalaba po bai.”
Namomo vanang'olo vavakulangalalela-shadaka pamo na vamwalimu vadishaliya vashindamwabwalanga vatangola shivenevene vaashidoni, “Vanji andivaposha kanji kuliposha mwene hanaulula shinu!
Ashi aju, Klistu, Umu Wavanaishilaeli! Bai ashuluke panshalaba pakulota twone na tukulupile.” Namomo avalá vavakamadíle pamo namu nae vashinantukana.
Napanelo kutunduvangila sasita yamui mpaka satisa yalyulo, shilambo uti shindíinjila shii.
Bai paiwikile satisa Yesu andíkugwa pashanya po aashidoni, “Eloi, Eloi, lama sabakitani?” mana ake, “Nnungu wangu, Nnungu wangu, mwaa shani uningwambukanga?”
Napanelo vanu vanji ve vapagwíte apo, pavamwigwite atangola davo vanavo kushidoni, “Mwigwilile! Anshema Liyashi.”

Munu jumo pakati pave kutukuta kuka ndashuvika shipande shaivonu muulimu kutwala kupambya munkungulandi kuka nankumbidya Yesu akune atangola doni, “Nneke! Leka tulole ikava kenga Liyashi jo andaida nanshuluwa panshalaba.”
Bai Yesu patangwele pashanya po andíjaa shingumi
kutwala inguvo yamwing'ande ya Nnungu ailá kupapuka kuma kushanya mpaka pai.
Napanelo nang'olo wavaing'ondo e aimidíle mushu mwake Yesu, paigwite shikutilo na mwajaidile shingumi Yesu, andítangola kushidoni, “Munu aju mwiu avele mwanagwe Nnungu.”
Namomo popo po, vandípagwa vakongwe vàimilenge kushu valola. Pakati pave vanji vo vavele ava: Maliya wa ku Magadalena, Maliya anyoke nnemba ndikidiki Tiyagu namu Yoshe pamo namu Shalome.
Yesu àvele ku Galileya vakongwe ava vashindamwoda na vashinantumika. Namomo vakongwe vanji voe ve vaukíle namu nae ku Yelusalemu vandípagwa mulyutu alyo.
Napanelo liduva lilota lidimbe, kwoda livele liduva lyakulipanganianga pakulota liwike liduva lyakupumula,
Yoshe wa ku Alimateya munu wakwishimika mwikamati yavayuda kanji nanae momo ashindalindila utawala wa Nnungu, andímuukila Pilatu pakajugulanga shinu nanjugwa mili umwe Yesu.
Pilatu kutwala kushushukanga paigwite kenga Yesu andijaa tayali shingumi. Nae kunshema nang'olo wavaing'ondo kumudya ikava kenga mwiu Yesu andíjaa tayali shingumi.
Pilatu paigwite shana malove amwe nang'olo wavaing'ondo, nae anínnamulila Yoshe akatwale mili wake Yesu.

Bai Yoshe andíshuma ishanda yakunamikanga kusha mili umwe Yesu panshalaba kwavilidyanga na ishanda yo kutwala kuka ndavika mushonga shavapakaídye mulijanga. Akavike, andíingiliya lijanga kuka ndadiva pannango washonga.
Napanelo Maliya wa ku Magadalena pamo namu Maliya anyoke Yoshe vandyóna lyutu alyo lyavavikíle mili umwe Yesu.
Bai likadimbe liduva lyakupumula, Maliya wa ku Magadalena, Maliya anyoke Tiyagu pamo namu Shalome vandíshuma mauta akunung'angila pakulota vauke vakapake mili wake Yesu.
Napanelo liduva litandi lyaishumana, lyamba linyeiku, kumanga kulangala, vanavo kuka kushonga.
Pavashuka vashindaudyania vaashidoni, “Da lijanga livéle pannango pashonga apalá, atugang'alela nyani?”
Napane pavaladile kwona lijanga vàgang'aladidye nnyenje, lijanga lyolyo lyo livele likumene namene.
Vanavo vakainjila mushonga kutwala kumwona nnemba jumo àikele kunkanakono, àgwete ikanju yanashwe, vanavo kushushukanga doni.
Nnemba jo kushidoni, “Hamunajope! Mwenu munnambela Yesu wa ku Nashaleti wavankamadile panshalaba. Nae andidyuka, apa hapali. Lola palyutu lyavannadídye.
Kanji napane, wena mukavaulile vakwoda vake pamo namu Patulu kenga nae ankuka alangalela ku Galileya. Koko ko, mundamwona kenga mo mwamwaulidíle.”
Bai vanavo vandyúma apalá pashonga vatukuta akuno vatatamela na kushanga. Vovo vo, havammalangidíle munu woewoe, vashindajopa. [
Yesu akadyuke liduva litandi lyaishumana lyamba linyeiku, munu ntandi kumuumililila avele Maliya wa ku Magadalena aijá wamuumídye majini saba.
Jojo akauma kuka ndavavalangangila váshoodananavo, vanavo vàpagwite mushipalodi na mushililo.
Bai vanavo vakaigwe kenga Yesu mumi, nae andimwona, havakulupidíle.
Napanelo ling'oto lyavinu avyo Yesu andívaumilila vakwoda vake vavili àvalalele munji vanavo vauka kwaludeya.
Kutwala vanavo kuja kuka ndavavalangangila vavave, ata ive davo havakulupidíle.
Muwakati unji kavili Yesu kuvaumilila avalá kumi na moja uti vàikalenge valya. Nae kutwala kuvashulanga kwamwaa waungakulupila wave na kunanopa kwamitima mwaa vo vangwéne àdyukile, havavakulupidíle.
Napanelo Yesu andívaulila doni, “Wena mushilambo uti mupita mummalangangila kula munu ntenga wambone.
Aijá álota kukulupila na kubatishwa, andaambwalegwa kanji ákakulupila, andaukumigwa.
Avalá valota kukulupila vandavanavo vimanyikilo avi: kwamwaa wangu nangu vandakumulanga majini, vandatangola dinangodi dyaambi,
vandakamula dinyoka kwali vakakumbila ishumu, hashipali shilota kuvatandeka, vandavavikila makono valwele kutwala vanavo kupona.”
Napanelo Umu Yesu akamalile kutangola namu vanavo, nae po kutanduligwa kuka kuwa ndaikala kunkanakono kwake Nnungu.
Bai vakwoda vake vandyúmananga kuka vavalanganga ntenga wambone mumautu uti, Umu avapwashela na alodya ntenga awo kuva wiu kwamwaa wavimanyikilo víshoodana na ntenga awo.]
Nang'olo Teopilo, vanu voe vandívanavo ntima wakwimyanga shana namene vinu vitandéke pakati petu
kenga mwavatuvalangangidile avalá vo vavéle kutunduvangila kunantandi mashuda vagwéne vene na vatumika valilove.
Napanelo nanangu yadavo, pangulambadile kumanya shana vinu uti kutunduvangila kunantandi, ininguvaila ngwandike nikupangila shana
kwambangidya uvenavo uwakika kwavinu vyavakupundishidye.

Muwakati umwe Elode umu wa ku Yudeya, andípagwa nkúlangalalela-shadaka jumo walina Shakaliya wamushipinga shavakulangalalela shavanaabiyashi. Ndyagwe Shakaliya nanae avele wamushipinga shaudukulu umwe Aloni, lina lyake Lishabeti.
Bai vanu vavili ava uti vavele vaishaliya pamevo pake Nnungu. Vanavo vashindanama bila makosha mumalailililo uti na malamulo ake Umu.
Kanji vanu vovo vo havavenavo vana mwaa Lishabeti avele nkongwe ákavaleka na uti ava vandíkangapalanga.
Muliduva limo Shakaliya andípagwa akola madengo kenga nkúlangalalela-shadaka paing'ande ya Nnungu mwaa ivele ishumana yashipinga shake.
Napanelo kenga lidyavalelo lyavakulangalalela-shadaka vandítenda nningo wakuntandola munu; nningo au kungwilila Shakaliya ainjile mwing'ande imwe Umu akatutumidye lubani.
Pauwikile wakati wakututumidya lubani, imbumba yavanu uti ivele panda ishwali.
Nng'ande mo Shakaliya andímwona njelo wake Umu àimidile kunkanakono kwake alutali lwavashitutumyangidya lubani.
Nae akamwone njelo aijá andíshushukanga na kujopa namene.
Kanji njelo andímwaulila kushidoni, “Shakaliya, haunajope! Myembe vyako vindiigwinika. Napavedoni jo ndyavo Lishabeti jo, anammaleka mwana nnume na wako unanshema lina lya Nshuwau.
Wako indakunagwela namene na undapuwanga namomo vanu voe vandapuwanga pakuvalekwa mwana ajo
mwaa jojo jo, Umu anankulupila namene. Nae hakumbila shinu ugwalwa wakuma muvyepo na ata shinu shoeshoe shakwambalwisha. Imumu Wanashwe andapagwa namu nae kutunduvangila ata mo mmunda mwanyoke.
Jojo jo andavatadya vanaishilaeli voe vamuujile Umu, Nnungu wave.

Nae andauka mushu mwake nkati mwimumu na kwadimongo dimwe Liyashi ndashinjiulila mitima vyavatatamunu kuvana, kuvashinjiulila vákaligwa kwalimanyilo lyavaishaliya kwambangidya avapanganiange venentete vakumpwashalela shana Umu.”
Kutwala Shakaliya kumudya njelo kushidoni, “Ata nangu malove ako lo ndakulupila? Shapo ngwona nangu pamo na ndyangu uti tundikangapalanga!”
Njelo kushidoni, “Wako! Nangu Gabuliyeli ngúpagwa pamo na Nnungu, unkwigwa? Nditumigwa ngwide ngutangole namu wako ndikuvalangangila ntenga wambone vila au.
Bai hautangola, undava ububu mpaka muliduva lyavilota kutandeka vinu avi mwaa haukulupidile vinu vyanguvalenge vilóta kutandeka muwakati uvaikidíle.”
Napanelo venentete ve vavéle panda vanninda Shakaliya aume mwing'ande ya Nnungu amulá, vakamwone kutima vanavo kushanga.
Nae paumidile panda hashuulula kutangola na munu. Vanavo kumanyinneu doni, mo nng'ande mo, shipali shagwene. Nae ashitangola vila na makono na andyúka mushu ava vi bubu.
Bai akamalilike maduva ake akutumika, nae andyújila kwing'ande yake.
Napanelo upitilé wakati padyoko tu, Lishabeti nkongwe ndya Shakaliya kwimita. Akaimite, kutwala kwikala nng'ande myedi mwanu alipiyapiyanga aashidoni,
“Vinu avi angutandilé Umu. Nae maduvano aningutanana kwambangidya anguushaniange dyoni kwavanu.”
Napanelo vikapite myedi sita, njelo Gabuliyeli Nnungu kuntuma auke kunjini umo wa ku Galileya wavashishema Nashaleti
kwamwali jumo ntete we wantamadíle nnemba jumo kunnomba walina Yoshe walikola limwe Daudi. Mwali aju vashinshema Maliya.
Múntenga akawike pavele nkongwe aijá atédoni, “Mashala ako wako útananigwidye. Umu avelé namu wako!”
Maliya akaigwe malove alo, andíitukanga namene kutwala kulyudya shintimatima kushidoni, “Shuudyangidi ashi shuudyangidi shani?”
Kanji njelo kushidoni, “Maliya, haunajope! Wako Nnungu andikutanana.
Lola! Undaimita kummaleka mwana nnume kutwala kumupa lina lya Yesu.
Jojo jo andava nang'olo. Vananshema mwanagwe Wapashanya-uti. Mwana ajo, Umu Nnungu anantakatuwidya shiumu shanakulumunu Daudi.
Andavatawala venentete vake Yakobo muvyaka víkamalilika; utawala wake hauva na mwisho.”
Maliya kunjang'ula njelo jo doni, “Da shinu ashi shilota kuvalela mwashi nangu nikanava kummanya nnume?”
Njelo do, “Andakushulukila Imumu Wanashwe na dimongo dyake Wapashanya-uti dindakwinikidya. Nadoni jo mwana waulota kummaleka jo, vananshema Wakwilimyanga, Mwana wa Nnungu.
Lola! Ata jo nkuluvo Lishabeti àkangapele avi, andiimita shitumbo shamwana nnume. Jo wavashinshema ákavaleka jo, ambi apa ankuvanavo shitumbo shamyedi avi, sita.
Mwaa Nnungu pake po, hashipali shinkamadyangídya.”
Kutwala Maliya kushidoni, “Elo, ntumwa nkongwe umwe Umu, apali apa; vingutandeke kenga mo mwautangaladile mo.” Bai nae akatangole davo, njelo andínyema.
Napanelo mumaduva lolo Maliya andítakatuka kuka shipajelo kumashinga panjini umo wa ku Yuda.
Akawike, andíinjila nng'ande mwake Shakaliya kutwala kumuudyanga Lishabeti.
Lishabeti paigwite lidi lyake Maliya, mmunda mwake mwana kupikita namene, Lishabeti kunnangalalela Imumu Wanashwe
kutwala kwatuka kutangola aashidoni, “Wako ni wakwalaligwa pakati pavakongwe na waulota kummaleka momo, andyalaligwa.
Da yaleké dashi anyoke Umu wangu kwida nangulola nangu?
Undimanya? Nangu pangwigwite lidi lyako unguudyanga, mwana mmunda mwangu amu andipikitinneu mwaa wakupuwanga.
Undijaligwa mwaa wako undikulupila vyavakwaulidile vilóta kutandeka vyalakela kumwe Umu.”
Napanelo Maliya kushidoni, “Ungumi wangu unkuntumbyanga Umu,
imumi yangu kulitamangila Umu Nnungu mwamboli wangu.
Nae andyona kwiludyangika kwankongwe ntumwa wake. Mwenu! Kutunduvangila ambi apa, vanu vadimbula uti vanangushema wakwalaligwa
mwaa Wadimongo-Uti aningutandela vikumene; lina lyake lindiilimyanga.
Ankuvaanangila shididi avalá vanjópa, vanu vaimbula ai kwida imbula ai.
Nae anditenda vikumene na nkono wake; andivamwadilikanianga vaimbeve mumakumbukililo ammitima vyave.
Andivashuluwa vakutawala muviteng'u, kuvakwedya vakavalangigwa.
Andiviikutiya vyambone vákave pashinu, vatajili kuvakumulanga shing'alang'ala.
Animpwashela Ishilaeli ntumika wake akumbukila shididi shake
kenga mo mwalivikidile kwatatagwetu Abulaamu pamo na udukulu wake wamushu uti.”
Bai Maliya andíikanavo Lishabeti kenga myedi mitatu doni kutwala kuujila kwave.
Napanelo Lishabeti likamwikile liduva lyake lyakushuluwa, anímmaleka mwana nnume.
Vashitanonomwagwe pamo na vakwave vakaigwe doni Umu andimwanangila shididi Lishabeti, vandípuwanganavo namene.
Muliduva lyanane vanavo kuntwala mwana aijá kuka nankumula likumbi. Napanelo valota vansheme lina lya Shakaliya lina lyolyo lyatatake,
jujumunu kushidoni, “Mene! Mwana aju lina lyake Nshuwau.”
Vanavo, “Aba! Nkwenu shani walina ali?”
Kutwala kumudya tatamunu vatangola na makono lina linnagwadíle vansheme mwanagwe.
Tatamunu kujugwa libau kwandika doni, “Lina lyake Nshuwau.” Vanu uti kushanga.
Muwakati wowo ikanywa imwe Shakaliya kuunguka, lulimi kungaluka kutangola antumbyanga Nnungu.
Kutwala vashitanonomwagwe uti kujopa. Dyabali adi, dindíigwinika mushilambo uti shamashinga sha ku Yudeya.
Vanu uti váshiigwanga dyabali adyo vashindakumbukila mmitima vyave vaashidoni, “Mwana aju alota kuva kenga nyani?” Mwaa mwiu vashindona doni dimongo dimwe Umu dipali namu nae.
Napanelo tatamunu Shakaliya alangalalegwa na Imumu Wanashwe andyáulanga ntenga wake Nnungu aashidoni,
Atumbyangilike Umu Nnungu wa ku Ishilaeli mwaa andida na andivaambola venentete vake.
Nkati muudukulu umwe Daudi ntumika wake, andimuumidya wadimongo wakuposha wetu wetu
kenga mo mwatangaladile kwaindila yavakulava vakwilimyanga vakala
kwida ndatwambola kwavamongo vetu na kumakono kwauti avalá vatunyatíla.
Nadoni andilodya shididi shake shalivikile kwavatatavetu, andikumbukila imbodi yake yakwilimyanga
yakulilapa kwalilapile kwatatagwetu Abulaamu
kwambangidya tùvele mukuposhegwa kumakono kwavamongo vetu, tuntumikile patukajopa
tunama pamevo pake mukwilimyanga na mwishaliya mumaduva uti ashingumi shetu.
Napanelo unnemba wako undashamegwa unkúlava wake Wapashanya-uti mwaa undalangalela upita unkandyangidya Umu dindila dyake.
Undavatadya venentete vake vamanye kwambola kwaindila yakulivalivigwa madambi ave
kwamwaa washididi shalilotelo lyamuntima limwe Nnungu wetu shitwidíla paituvalila Yana yúma kushanya
ivalangadye avalá vapágwa mushii na mukupela na itulangalalele mwindila yaamani.
Bai mwana jo andíkulumuka na kunanopa mwimumu. Ashindanama mulilangalanga lyashimbweshe mpaka muliduva lyalyumilididye kwavanaishilaeli.
Napanelo mumaduva alo Shashali Agustu andyúmya lilamulo lyakulota vanu uti vavilambo víshilangalalegwa na Loma valyandikishe.
Shaandika ashi shivele shitandi; shosho sho shitandeke muwakati wavele Kilinu gavana wa ku Shiliya.
Nadoni vanu uti vandyúka ndalyandika kanji kula munu ashuka ndalyandika kwave.
Napanelo Yoshe dadavo andyúma ku Galileya palikaja lya pa Nashaleti kwambokela ku Yudeya kuka kwavo Daudi ku Beteleemu mwaa Yoshe avele washipinga shaudukulu umwe Daudi.
Ako nae aukile kukulyandikisha; andyúka pamo namu Maliya nkongwe wantamadíle kunnomba, jo Maliya aju àvele na shitumbo.
Vàvele ko ku Beteleemu, Maliya kumwikila liduva lyakushuluwa
kutwala kummaleka mwana nnume wakulijedya. Nae kunkulunganga mwinguvo kunnadya mushombo shakulyela vanyama mwaa shumba shavajeni havapatíle lyutu lyakulala.
Napanelo koko ko vandípagwa vakushunga-dinyama váshishunga vipinga vyave shilo kwilanga.
Bai akaaneka apalá njelo wa Nnungu, lishangelo limwe Umu kuvatang'anedya vanavo ni kujopa doni.
Kanji njelo kushidoni, “Mwenu, hamunajope! Ngwigwa, nangu ngwidinavo ntenga wambone vila au ulóta kwidanavo lipuwilo likumene kwavenentete ava uti.
Nelo apa kwavo Daudi andivalekwa mwamboli kwamwaa wenu mwenu; Klistu, Umu.
Ashi shindava shimanyikilo shenu: pamuka, munankodya mwana vànkulungenge mwinguvo na vànnadidye mushombo shakulyela vanyama.”
Kwashingangala kwanakenneu imbumba yavakuwa ìlyunganienge namu njelo jo vantumbyanga Nnungu kushidoni,
“Lishangelo livelé namu Nnungu kushanya-uti; amani namu vanu mushilambo, vanu vovo vavatanene mwene Nnungu.”
Vanjelo avalá vakanyamange kuka kuwa, vakushunga-dinyama vandyáulanila kushidoni, “Takatukanga tuke ku Beteleemu tukalole vitandéke vyatwaulidile Umu avi.”
Vanavo shipajelo kuka kunkodya Maliya namu Yoshe, mwana àlele mushombo shakulyela vanyama.
Vakamwone, vandyáulanga dyabali dyamwana ajo dyavapatíle.
Vanu uti váshigwa vyavashivalanganga vakushunga-dinyama, vashindashanga
kanji Maliya vinu avyo ashindavika muntima na ashindakumbukila.
Bai avalá vakushunga-dinyama vandyúja vamupa lishangelo na vanshiba Nnungu mwaa wavinu uti vyavaigwite na vyavagwene kwodana na mo mwavaigwididye.
Paliwikile liduva lyanane, liduva lyakunkumula mwana vanavo vandímupa lina lya Yesu, lina lyampéle njelo wa Nnungu anyoke akanava kunnyakulila.
Napanelo Maliya namu Yoshe, ukavawikile wakati wakulyushanianga ushapu kwodana na Lilamulo lyake Musha, vanavo vandímuukanavo mwana ku Yelusalemu nankamudya Umu.
Vanavo vanínkamudya Umu kwodana na Lilamulo lyake Umu liishidoni, “Kula mwana nnume ntandi kuvalekwa, mwapulile Umu.”
Namomo vandyúka ndatenda shadaka shilamulilígwa mu Lilamulo lyake Umu liishidoni, “makanda mavili amadeya nnume na nkongwe kwali makanda mavili avang'unda nnume na nkongwe.”

Napanelo ku Yelusalemu ko, andípagwa nang'olo jumo wavashinshema Shimiyau; nang'olo aju avele munu waishaliya na wakunjopa Nnungu. Nae ashindalindila kupambadyangigwa kwavanaishilaeli na Imumu Wanashwe andípagwa namu nae.
Jo Imumu Wanashwe andímwaulila Shimiyau doni, hapela akanava kumwona Klistu wake Umu kuntumidya.
Napanelo muliduva limo, Shimiyau alangalalegwa na Imumu Wanashwe andyúka kwing'ande ya Nnungu kutwala vatatamunu pavamwidinavo nunu Yesu vantende shivaikidíle vantende kwodana na Lilamulo,
Shimiyau anínnyukata nunu mmakono kuntumbyanga Nnungu aashidoni,
“ Umu, uninneka ntumika wako aukilé mu amani kenga mwautangaladile.
Mwaa nangu ndyona kwambola kwako
kwaupanganienge pamevo pavanu uti;
lilangadyo lilóta kuvalangadya vamidi na lyakuvapa lishangelo venentete vako vanaishilaeli.”
Tatamunu namu jujumunu kutwala kushanga mwaa wamalove áshitangaleka amwamba mwana.

Bai Shimiyau andívaalaliya na kumwaulila jujumunu Maliya kushidoni, “Mwana aju alota kuva shambyombyo shakuvatadya vanaishilaeli vanji vagwe, vanji vatakatuke; alota kuva shimanyikilo shilóta kunyatilika na vanu.
Kwaupande wako wako lyambila lindakupulinganianga muungumi. Andatadya makumbukililo avo alipiídye alilodye ngala.”
Napanelo andípagwa nkúlava jumo nkongwe walina Ana mwanagwe Panuweli walikola lyavanaasheli. Nkongwe aju andíkangapala. Mushali shake andílombwa vyaka saba kutwala ntwagwe kupela
kunneka nae mushinamwili. Jojo jo avele liputa wavyaka samanini na nsheshe vyashingumi na hashuma mwing'ande ya Nnungu antumikila shilo na mui nkati mukunga na kushwali.
Napanelo nkongwe aju muwakati wowo, nae kulyumilidya kutwala kunnambwalela Nnungu na kutunduvanga kuvalanganga ing'ano yamwana ajo kwavanu uti váshilindila kwambolegwa kwa Yelusalemu.
Maliya namu Yoshe pavamalidile kutandedya uti kwodananavo Lilamulo lyake Umu, vandyújila ku Galileya kuka mpaka kwavo ku Nashaleti.
Bai mwana jo ashindakulumuka, ashindang'amukanga avanavo limanyilo lyoe na litananilo lyake Nnungu lishandapagwa kwake nae.
Bai tatamunu na jujumunu kula mwaka vashindauka kushikukulu sha Pasaka ku Yelusalemu.
Napanelo mwana jo akawishe vyaka kumi na mbili vyashingumi, muwakati wa Pasaka kenga mwanamaduva vanavo vandyúka ku Yelusalemu.
Shikukulu shikapite, vanavo pavashuja ndyoko jo andíikala koko kanji vanavo havashimanya
vona kenga nae apali mumwanda muvipinga vyavanu vanji, vandíwena mwanda waliduva limo kutwala kutunduvanga kunnambela mwavalikola na mwavanedi.
Kwodamwaa havangwéne, vanavo vandyújila ku Yelusalemu kuka nannambela.
Napanelo akapite maduva matatu, vanavo vanínkodya àikele mwing'ande ya Nnungu shing'ati vamwalimu avaigwilila vyavashitangola na avaudya vyakuvaudya.
Vanu uti váshimwigwilila, vashindashanga ding'ano dyake na mwavashivajang'ulila.
Tatake na anyoke pavangwene, vandíshanga kutwala jujumunu kushidoni, “Mwanangu, mwaa shani unditutenda davo? Shapo lola, nangu pamo na tatako tundidumbadumba tukulambela.”
Nae kushidoni, “Mushingulambalela eshi? Hamunamanya shinu doni nangu ininguvaikila ngupagwe mwing'ande imwe Atata?”
Kanji vanavo havashigwa shana shashivatangalela.
Nae andyúja shalumo namu vanavo kuka ku Nashaleti; tatamunu namu jujumunu nae ashindavaishimu. Napanelo jujumunu vinu avi uti ashindavika muntima.
Bai Yesu ashindakulumuka mulimanyilo, mulitananilo lyake Nnungu na lyavanu.

Mushaka shakumi na tano shautawala umwe Umu Nang'olo Tibeliu Shashali, ku Yudeya alangalalela Ponji Pilatu, ku Galileya alangalalela Elode nung'une wavashinshema Pilipo alangalalela ku Ituleya pamo na ku Talakoniti, ku Abileni alangalalela Lishaniya,
vakulangalalela-shadaka vakumene vàvele Anashi namu Kaipashi, Nnungu andítangola lilove lyake namu Nshuwau mwanagwe Shakaliya kushimbweshe
kutwala nae kupita awena muvilambo uti vivéle nanyenje Yudani alaililila ubatisho wakulijugulanga kwakulivalivigwa kwamadambi.
Avyo ni vyavaandike mulibuku lyamalove ake nkúlava Ishaiya doni, “Lidi lyamunu linkwigwinika kushimbweshe liishidoni, ‘Kandyanga indila yake Umu, aalowa mwalota kupita.
Makabakobo uti andaivililika, mashinga na dindunda uti vindagwalalila, dindila dyakudingukanga dindauduka, dyakwimbikanga dindakandyangigwa
kutwala vanu uti kwona kwambola kwake Nnungu.’ ”
Nadoni Nshuwau andyáulila imbumba yavanu imwidilíle avape ubatisho kushidoni, “Mmana mmadinyoka dyaishumu mwe! Anyinyitidilé nyani kutila shaushanga shake Nnungu shida?
Lodya vyepo vilódya kulijugulanga. Hamunaashidoni, ‘Tatagwetu wetu Abulaamu.’ Mwaa nangu ninkummanyiya ngala doni, ata majanga lolo ala, Nnungu ankuulula kundyuwidya Abulaamu vana.
Imbedo tayali vandilumika mulushija lwannandi. Kula nnandi úkapa vyepo vyambone vandálumula kujela pamoto.”
Imbumba yavanu yo kutwala kumudya kushidoni, “Shapo na wetu po tutandelé mwashi?”
Nae kushidoni, “Ávenavo mikogo mivili, unji wo anjaulile aijá ákavenavo na ávenavo shakulya atandele momo.”
Kuwika shipinga shavakukatisha-ukodi valota avape ubatisho, navanavo kumudya, “Mwalimu, wetu apa tutandele mwashi?”
Nae kushidoni, “Ukodi wakupunda shilinga shavannamulidile mutwale, hamunantwalile munu.”
Vaing'ondo vanji navanavo kumudya, “Kushi wetu tutandele mwashi?” Nae kushidoni, “Hamunankwinyange munu woewoe shinu shake, hamunantambudyange munu shákatandile kanji puwangila nshala wenu wamupata.”
Bai venentete vashindaangaikanga na kula munu ashindalyudya muntima mwake ikava kenga Nshuwau ni Klistu

kutwala nae kuviigwiniya kushidoni, “Nangu ninkumwing'a mwenu ubatisho ngutumila medi kanji aijá áida kunyuma kwangu; nae avelé na dimongo kungupunda nangu wandikavaidile nangu kumuungulanga vilatu vyake. Jojo jo andamwing'a mwenu ubatisho wa Imumu Wanashwe pamo na moto.
Ankuvanavo shombo shakupatangila vyakulya mmakono mwake pakulota akandyange palugwa pake antwale ngano akankondye mushidimbi shake kanji makadakada lo, andataa moto úkadimika.”
Bai Nshuwau ashindavalaililila vanu ntenga wambone atumila malove ala na malailililo anji.
Kanji kwodamwaa Nshuwau anínshashulanga Elode mwaa wakunnomba ndyagwe nung'une mwene walina Elodiya na mwaa wakunshashulanga vinu vinji vyakunyata vyashitenda,
bai Elode akatwale myaa vyakala avilá kupambanianga na mwaa au ni pantwete Nshuwau kunjela nkalaboshi.
Napanelo vanu uti pavashuka ndapata ubatisho, nanae Yesu andyúka ndapata. Pashishwali kuwa kundíshimuka;

kukashimuke, Imumu Wanashwe wakwaneka shana wakuva mwang'unda kushuluka kuntulila mumili kutwala kuwa kwigwinika lidi lishishidoni, “Wako ni umwanangu wapantima, ninkukunnagwaledya namene; kwamwaa wako wako nangu ninkupuwanga namene.”
Napanelo Yesu patunduvenge shimadengo shake àvenavo vyaka salasini vyaulinga vammanya kuva mwanagwe Yoshe kenga mwavashikumbukilila, Yoshe aju kuva mwanagwe Yeli,
Yeli kuva mwanagwe Matati, Matati kuva mwanagwe Lawi, Lawi kuva mwanagwe Meliki, Meliki kuva mwanagwe Yanai, Yanai kuva mwanagwe Yoshe,
Yoshe kuva mwanagwe Matatiya, Matatiya kuva mwanagwe Amoshi, Amoshi kuva mwanagwe Naumu, Naumu kuva mwanagwe Eshili, Eshili kuva mwanagwe Nagai,
Nagai kuva mwanagwe Maati, Maati kuva mwanagwe Matatiya, Matatiya kuva mwanagwe Shemei, Shemei kuva mwanagwe Yosheki, Yosheki kuva mwanagwe Yoda,
Yoda kuva mwanagwe Yowanani, Yowanani kuva mwanagwe Lesha, Lesha kuva mwanagwe Shelubabeli, Shelubabeli kuva mwanagwe Shalatiyeli, Shalatiyeli kuva mwanagwe Neli,
Neli kuva mwanagwe Meliki, Meliki kuva mwanagwe Adi, Adi kuva mwanagwe Koshamu, Koshamu kuva mwanagwe Elimudamu, Elimudamu kuva mwanagwe Eli,
Eli kuva mwanagwe Yoshuwa, Yoshuwa kuva mwanagwe Eliyesheli, Eliyesheli kuva mwanagwe Yolimu, Yolimu kuva mwanagwe Matati, Matati kuva mwanagwe Lawi,
Lawi kuva mwanagwe Shimiyau, Shimiyau kuva mwanagwe Yuda, Yuda kuva mwanagwe Yoshe, Yoshe kuva mwanagwe Yonamu, Yonamu kuva mwanagwe Eliyakimu,
Eliyakimu kuva mwanagwe Meleya, Meleya kuva mwanagwe Mena, Mena kuva mwanagwe Matata, Matata kuva mwanagwe Natani, Natani kuva mwanagwe Daudi,
Daudi kuva mwanagwe Yeshe, Yeshe kuva mwanagwe Obedi, Obedi kuva mwanagwe Buwashi, Buwashi kuva mwanagwe Shalamoni, Shalamoni kuva mwanagwe Naashoni,
Naashoni kuva mwanagwe Aminadabi, Aminadabi kuva mwanagwe Adimini, Adimini kuva mwanagwe Aluni, Aluni kuva mwanagwe Eshiloni, Eshiloni kuva mwanagwe Peleshi, Peleshi kuva mwanagwe Yuda,
Yuda kuva mwanagwe Yakobo, Yakobo kuva mwanagwe Ishaki, Ishaki kuva mwanagwe Abulaamu, Abulaamu kuva mwanagwe Tela, Tela kuva mwanagwe Nakole,
Nakole kuva mwanagwe Shelushi, Shelushi kuva mwanagwe Lagau, Lagau kuva mwanagwe Pelegi, Pelegi kuva mwanagwe Ebeli, Ebeli kuva mwanagwe Shala,
Shala kuva mwanagwe Kainani, Kainani kuva mwanagwe Alipashadi, Alipashadi kuva mwanagwe Shemu, Shemu kuva mwanagwe Noe, Noe kuva mwanagwe Lameki,
Lameki kuva mwanagwe Metushala, Metushala kuva mwanagwe Enoki, Enoki kuva mwanagwe Yaledi, Yaledi kuva mwanagwe Malaleeli, Malaleeli kuva mwanagwe Kainani,
Kainani kuva mwanagwe Enoshi, Enoshi kuva mwanagwe Sheti, Sheti kuva mwanagwe Adamu kutwala Adamu aju kuva mwanagwe Nnungu.
Bai Yesu kuja kulundi akulá àmuumbele Imumu Wanashwe. Imumu jojo jo anínnangalalela Yesu
kushimbweshe mumaduva alubaini Ndamoni antubya. Mumaduva alo uti nae andíikala pakalya shinu; kumwisho nae kunkola indala
kutwala Ndamoni kushidoni, “Wako ukava umwanagwe Nnungu, dyuwa lijanga ali live ligung'u.”
Yesu kushidoni, “Um! Indyandikigwa doni, ‘Munu hananama ligung'u gweka.’ ”
Ndamoni kuntwala kumuukanavo pashanya, muwakati ungwipi kunnodya viteng'u uti vitawála mushilambo shapai
kutwala kumwaulila doni, “Wako nangu ndakupa madalaka aviteng'u avi uti pamo na lishangelo lyake mwaa nangu vaningukamudya, nene ninkuulula kumupa aijá waninnota.
Napavedoni wako ukalipudya kwangu nangu, avi uti vindava vyako.”
Yesu kushidoni, “Um! Indyandikigwa doni, ‘Lipudye kumwe Umu, jo Nnungu wako na untumikile jojo bai.’ ”
Ndamoni kuntwala kavili kumuukanavo ku Yelusalemu nammika panantutuvilo waing'ande ya Nnungu kutwala kumwaulila doni, “Wako ukava umwanagwe Nnungu, daloka apa
mwaa indyandikigwa doni, ‘Nnungu andakukamudya kwavanjelo vake vakushililidye,’
vanavo vandakudong'a pakulota haunalijajede palijanga.”
Yesu kushidoni, “Mene wako! Vatédoni, ‘Haunanninge ntima Umu, jo Nnungu wako.’ ”
Bai Ndamoni akamalile vyakutubya vyake uti, andínyema padyoko mpaka muwakati uvaikidíle.
Napanelo Yesu andyúja na dimongo dya Imumu Wanashwe kuka ku Galileya. Bai dyabali dyake dindyúmanga uti muvilambo vyashitanono namu Galileya.
Nae ashindavapundisha muvitala vyavo vyakulipudidya na vanavo uti vashindamupa lishangelo.

Napanelo andíwika palikaja lyake lyakulumukidile pa Nashaleti; akawike apo, muliduva lyakupumula nae mwalidyavalelo lyake, andíinjila mushitala shakulipudidya. Akainjile, andítakatuka pakulota ashomye;
vanavo kumupa shidingo shalyamba shamalove ake nkúlava Ishaiya. Nae kudingulanga mpaka pashinu pavaandike doni,

“Imumu wake Umu aningushulukila mwaa aningupaka mauta pakulota ndivavalangangile vamashikini ntenga wambone, kungutuma ngwide ngwaule kuvaambola kwavakungwa, vákalola nivape kulola, vakutawaligwa nivape unaiti
na nguvalangange doni, au ni wakati walitananilo lyake Umu.”
Akashomye, andídinga kumuujidya ntumika mwene kuliikalila. Akaikale, vanu uti vapagwíte mushitala mo, mevo ave uti kumwe Yesu do, jenje.
Vakannole, nae kushidoni, “Nelo pamevo penu Maandiko ala andiwikila popo.”
Vanu uti vashindamwimyanga na vashinanshanga vyambone vyashitangola kutwala kushidoni, “Da aju i jo mwanagwe Yoshe aju?”
Nae kushidoni, “Panikaambambidya mwenu mundatangola nkong'o uushidoni, ‘Nkúlaula alilaule mwene!’ Nadoni mundatangola, ‘Vinu uti vyatwigwenge, vyautandile ku Kapalanaumu napenu apa momo tandedya!’ ”
Kutwala kavili kushidoni, “Ninkumwaulila mwiu doni, hapali nkúlava ápwashalalegwa mushilambo shake.
Kwakutangola mwiu muwakati umwe Liyashi, ko ku Ishilaeli akuno vandípagwa vanamwili voe namene; muwakati wowo muvyaka vitatu na nusu, kuwa kundishimigwa kutwala mushilambo uti kwinjila mpwapwa.
Napanelo Nnungu hantumíle Liyashi kuvaukila vanamwili ava kanji antumile pa Shalapeta bai, kushilambo sha Shidoni akulá kwankongwe namwili washilambo asho.
Namomo muwakati umwe nkúlava Elisheu, ko ku Ishilaeli akuno vandyúmbala vamalemba. Napanelo pakati pave, hapali áukile ndatakata ila Naamani tu munu wa ku Shiliya!”
Bai vanu uti mushitala amulá vakaigwe malove alo ni kushimwa doni,
kutakatukanga kunkumulanga nkaja amulá, kuntwala kumuukanavo pashanya lishinga lyavadangíle kaja yavo vakangang'aledye pai.
Kanji nae andyúma shing'ati shave kuvativaniva kuma.
Napanelo Yesu andyálalela ku Kapalanaumu njini umo wa ku Galileya. Koko ko muliduva lyakupumula nae ashindavapundisha venentete
kutwala vanavo kushanga namene mapundisho ake mwaa lilove lyake lindívanavo madalaka.
Napanelo kupagwa munu jumo mushitala ávenavo imumu yalijini nshapu mumili mwake. Jo lijini jo, andíkuta namene
aashidoni, “Iya! Yesu wa ku Nashaleti, da wetu po tukukawadidyé nyamani? Widilé ndatubamola? Nangu ndikumanya shana wako jo. Wako ni Wakwilimyanga wake Nnungu.”
Yesu kunshulanga, “Malalila kushu ko gwe! Uma mumili mo!” Lijini kungwidya pai munu jo shing'ati shave kutwala kuma pakantenda shaushanga shoeshoe.
Vanu uti kushanga kutwala kwaulanila vaashidoni, “Jii, lilove ali, lilove shani? Nae ankuvanavo madalaka mwiu, ankulamulila na dimongo majini mashapu, vanavo kutwala kuma!”
Bai dyabali dyake dishindaandavala mumautu uti alilanga alyo.
Yesu kutakatuka kuma mushitala amulá kutwala kuwika paing'ande imwe Simoni; nkwegwe jo Simoni aju, ushínampwateka namene mili. Yesu akawike, vanavo kunjugwa amponie.
Yesu kutapela apalá pavele nnwele kutwala kutangalela shilwele ashilá; shilwele sho do, jii. Nnwele apalá kutakatuka kutwala kuvaatumikinneu.
Napanelo liduva palishwele vanu uti ve vavénavo valwele vavilwele vyakuvilingananga vashindavaidanavo kumwe Yesu. Nae ashinammikila mikono kula munu kutwala kuvaponia.
Namomo majini ashindaumananga mumili mwavanu voe akuta aashidoni, “Wako, umwana wa Nnungu!” Nae ashindavashulanga, hashivaleka vatangola mwaa vanavo vanímmanya doni, nae avele Klistu.
Palyamba lyake, linyeiku, Yesu kuma kuka kulyutu lyakunamagweka kanji imbumba yavanu ni kunnambela mpaka kunkodya. Vakankodye, vashinammandikanga namene valota hanavanyeme
kanji nae andívaulila kushidoni, “Ininguvaikila nangu nguvalangange ntenga wambone wautawala wa Nnungu mumakaja anji momo mwaa ni shosho shavangutumidile.”
Bai nae andyúka mushu avalanganga ntenga muvitala vya ku Yudeya.
Muliduva limo Yesu àvele nanyenje litanda lya Geneshaleti, imbumba yavanu inshinya ilota kwigwa ntenga wa Nnungu,
nae andyóna dingalava mbili dìvele panshiko vene vakwaka vàshulwike vashapushanga dingau.
Yesu kwinjila mwingalava imo ye ivéle imwe Simoni kutwala kunjugwa amwangaladyedye anyeme padyoko kumwangu. Nae kwikala mwingalava mo kutwala kuvapundisha venentete.
Napanelo akamalile kutangola andímwaulila Simoni kushidoni, “Wena kumedi makumene mukajele lungau lwenu mwake.”
Simoni kushidoni, “Mwalimu, wetu tundikukula shashilo shoe ashi, hatupatile shinu. Kanji kwodamwaa utangwelé wako, nangu ndajela lungau mmedi.”
Bai vakatandele momo mo, vandípata dyomba dyoe namene mpaka lwo lungau lwo kulota kupapuka.
Vasimoni kuvapyalika vavave vavéle mwingalava inji vauke vakavapwashele. Vanavo kuka kutwala dingalava mbili adi uti kuumbadyanga dyomba mpaka dyo dingalava dyo, kulota kutitimila.
Simoni Patulu akone davo andyúka ndakola maulu kumwe Yesu aashidoni, “Nang'olo wangu, ngunyema; nangu ni nimunu wakutega.”
Mwaa nae andíshanga pamo na vanu uti vavénavo kwamwaa wadyomba dyoe dyavapatíle pashako asho
namomo vanavake Shebedeu, Tiyagu namu Nshuwau vavagwe Simoni, navanavo vandíshanga. Kanji Yesu kumwaulila Simoni kushidoni, “Haunajope, kutunduvangila ambi apa wako undava umunu wakuvaka vanu.”
Bai vanavo vakaukenavo dingalava dyavo kumwangu, vandílakanga vinu vyavo uti popo po; vene tota kuka vamwoda Yesu.
Napanelo Yesu àvele palikaja limo munu jumo wamalemba apalá kuumilila! Akamwone Yesu kutapela pai kutwala kushidoni, “Nang'olo wangu, ukalota unkuulula kungutadya ngutakate.”
Yesu kunyalodya nkono kunkamula kushidoni, “Ndilota, takata!” Munu aijá muwakati wowo malemba kumuuminneu.

Napanelo Yesu kunnamulila hanamwaulile munu junji kanji andímwaulila kushidoni, “Wena ukalilodye kwankúlangalalela-shadaka, utwale umye shadaka kwakuushaniangigwa kwako ushapu kenga mo mwalamulidile Musha pakulota uve ushuda kwavanavo.”
Kanji dyabali dimwe Yesu dindímamodya kwandavala na dimbumba dyavanu voe dindíkadyanianga valota vamwigwilile na avaponie vilwele vyave.
Yesu kanji ashindavanyema auka kushimbweshe. Koko ko, ashindashwali.

Muliduva limo lyapagwíte Yesu apundisha, popo po vandípagwa mapalishayo pamo na vamwalimu vadishaliya ve vaalakénge mumakaja uti a ku Galileya, ku Yudeya na ku Yelusalemu. Napanelo dimongo dyake Umu dyakuponedya dindípagwa namu Yesu.
Mwenu, muwakati wowo vanu vannyukéte munu wakudidimanga madodo apalá kuumilila. Vanavo kulambela litala lyakumwishidya pavele Yesu
kanji vakatatakele mwaa waumbala wavanu, vandíkwela pashanya ing'ande kuvambulanga kutwala kumpaleya munu aijá pamo na igoli yake mpaka mushu mwake Yesu shing'ati vanu.
Yesu akone likulupililo lyave, andímwaulila nnwele jo kushidoni, “Wako madambi ako andilivalivika.”

Napanelo vamwalimu vadishaliya pamo na mapalishayo vandyánjanga kuudyania shivenevene vaashidoni, “Aju avelé kenga nyani, átangola malove akukupulu aju? Tukanneka Nnungu, nyani junji áulula kulivaliva madambi amunu?”
Yesu nae akamanye makumbukililo ave, andívajang'ula kushidoni, “Mutangadikanga nyamani mmitima myenu mo?
Popo apa shikamadyénge namene ni nyamani? Kushidoni ‘Madambi ako andilivalivika,’ kwali kushidoni ‘Takatuka uwene’?
