Bai pakulota mumanye doni, Mwana Wamunu mushilambo amu andivanavo madalaka akulivaliva madambi…” Nae andímwaulila munu wakudidimanga madodo, “Ninkukwaulila takatuka utwale igoli yako uke kwenu.”
Munu kutakatukinneu kutwala igoli yaléle kuka kwave amupa lishangelo Nnungu.
Bai vanu ni kushanga doni, vandímupa lishangelo Nnungu na kundívaida kujopa kutwala kushidoni, “Nelo tundyona vyamakango.”
Kutwala apo Yesu andyúma apalá; akaume nae andímwona munu jumo nkúkatisha-ukodi walina Lawi àikele pashitala shaukodi, Yesu kumwaulila kushidoni, “Ngwoda!”
Nae apalá andíleka vinu vyake uti popo po, mwene tota kuka amwoda Yesu.
Napanelo Lawi kwing'ande kwake, andítalakanga shakulya shoe shakumpuwangila Yesu. Po pavashilya po, shindípagwa shipinga shikumene shavakukatisha-ukodi pamo na vanji.
Napanelo mapalishayo pamo na vamwalimu vave vadishaliya vashindavatangadikanga vakwoda vake Yesu vaashidoni, “Mwaa shani munkulyanavo vakukatisha-ukodi na vakutega?”
Yesu kushidoni, “Vanu vangumi havanannambela nkúlaula kanji vánannambela nkúlaula vava valwele.
Nangu handivaidilile vaishaliya kanji ndivaidilile vakutega pakulota valijugulange.”
Vanavo napane kushidoni, “Vakwoda vake Nshuwau pamo na vamapalishayo dimindi dyoe vankunga na vankushwali; napanelo mwaa shani vako wako vankulya na vankupuwanga?”
Yesu kushidoni, “Da mwenu, vanu vavalalike pashitamo mwene nkúlomba àpagwite namu vanavo, nyani álota kuvatenda vaunge?
Undawika wakati wavalota kumumya nkúlomba pakati pave; ni wakati au wavalota vanavo kunga.”

Kutwala kutangola kavili nkong'o au, “Hapali munu ánapapula inguvo yaambi kutenda shilaka mwinguvo yakala; ukatenda davo inguvo yaambi yo unaanonga na leka apo, shilaka shosho sho hashivaila mwinguvo yakala mo.
Namomo hapali munu ánataa ugwalwa wavyepo muvitumba vyamagwogwe vyakala; ukatenda davo ugwalwa waambi wo undapapula vitumba; ugwalwa kujaikanga kutwala vitumba vyo, kwanangeka.
Vatwala ugwalwa waambi kutaa muvitumba vyambi.
Napanelo namomo hapali munu ánatenda akakumbila ugwalwa wakala kulota akumbile ugwalwa waambi mwaa ona doni, ‘ugwalwa wakala ni wamana.’ ”
Muliduva limo lyakupumula, Yesu apita mulyala lyangano, vakwoda vake vandítamanga mai angano kuting'inda, kumamena.
Kanji mapalishayo vanji kuvatangalangila vaashidoni, “Mwaa shani mwenu munkutenda shinu shilaéka na lilamulo kutenda muliduva lyakupumula?”
Yesu kuvajang'ula kushidoni, “Da hamunava kushomya vyatandíle Umu Daudi painkadíle indala nae pamo na avalá vavénavo?

Mwainjilidile mwing'ande ya Nnungu kutwala magung'u ashimadengo sha Nnungu kulya; magung'u áshilaeka na lilamulo kulya munu vila ila gweka vakulangalalela-shadaka. Kanji nae andílya anji kuvapa vavagwe.”
Kutwala kavili kushidoni, “Mwene liduva lyakupumula lyo ni Mwana Wamunu.”
Muliduva linji lyakupumula akainjile mushitala shakulipudidya, momo mo andípagwa munu jumo wakudidimanga nkanakono.
Napanelo vamwalimu vadishaliya pamo na mapalishayo vashinannumbata valota vamanye ikava kenga ankuponia muliduva lyakupumula kwambangidya vapate nkanidyo.
Kanji nae amanya makumbukililo ave, andímwaulila munu wakudidimanga nkono kushidoni, “Takatuka wimile shing'ati!” Nae kutakatuka kwimila.
Yesu kushidoni, “Nangu ninkumudya mwenu po, da muliduva lyakupumula lilamulo linkutuleka tutandedye vyambone kwali vyakunyata? Kuposha shingumi kwali kwanonga?”
Andívalola vanu uti vantang'anadídye avalá kutwala kumwaulila kushidoni, “Nyalodya nkono wako!” Nae kutandela momo, nkono kuva kenga patandi.
Bai vanavo shindívatindimbukanga shitundi kutwala kupakanila mwakuntandela Yesu.
Mumaduva lolo lo, liduva limo Yesu andyámbwakela kumashinga ndashwali; shilo uti andíshwedya anjugwa Nnungu.
Palyamba lyake andívashema vakwoda vake kuvatandola kumi na mbili pakati pave; ava kuvashema Vamyombe.
Vanu avo vavele ava: Simoni washilota kumupa Yesu lina lya Patulu, Andaleya nung'une jo Patulu, Tiyagu namu Nshuwau, Pilipo, Balutolomeu,
Mateu, Tome, Tiyagu mwanagwe Alupeu, Simoni wavashinshema Shelote,
Yuda mwanagwe Tiyagu namu Yudashi Shikaliyote áukile ndava nannimya.

Yesu andyálenavo vamyombe avalá kuka ndaikalanga pantadala. Popo po, shindípagwa shipinga shikumene shavakwoda vake na kupagwa imbumba yavenentete vakwalakela mumautu uti ashilambo sha ku Yudeya, vakwalakela ku Yelusalemu, vanji vakwalakela nanyenje imanga ya ku Tilu na ku Shidoni.
Vanu ava vaidilile kumwigwilila na kuvaponia vilwele vyave; avalá váshangaishangigwa na majini mashapu kutwala kupona.
Kula munu ashindalota ankwae Yesu mwaa mumili mwake mushindauma dimongo na nae vanu ava uti andívaponia.
Napanelo Yesu andíng'amula mevo ake kuvalola vakwoda vake kuvaulila kushidoni, “Mundyalaligwa mwenu mmamashikini, utawala wa Nnungu, wènu.
Mundyalaligwa mwenu múvele na indala ambi apa, mundaikuta. Mundyalaligwa mwenu múlila ambi apa, mundeka.
“Mundyalaligwa mwenu pavannyatila vanu, kumwambukanga, kuntukana na kumumya shimbili shakunyata mwaa wa Mwana Wamunu.
Muliduva alyo, mwenu litamange na puwanga mwaa mwe! Kuwa ko, inudyo yenu ikumene. Ata vanyakala vave vashivatandela momo vakulava.
“Kanji mupambale mwenu mmatajili mwaa mundipata tayali kupambadyangigwa kwenu.
Mupambale mwenu mwíkwite mwaa inankola indala. Mupambale mwenu mwéka mwaa mundalamadika na mundalila.
“Mupambale mwenu pavamwing'a shimbili vanu uti mwaa vanyakala vave vashivatandela momo vakulava vakushang'apa.
“Kanji nangu ninkumwaulila mwenu múngwigwilila ambi apa doni, vanagwaledye vamongo venu, vatanane vannyatíla,
vaalaliye vannikíta na vashwalidye vamuuvyánga.
Aijá álota kukukanyola utung'u umo, nshiliulile unji. Álota kukula likoti, lishati momo nnakele.
Munu woewoe akakujugwa shinu, mupe; aijá álota kutwala shinu shako haunandai.
Ashilá shinnagwéla mwenu vantandele, namwenu dadavo vatandele navanavo.
Shapo mwenu mukavanagwaledya avalá vannagwalédya, inkupagwa paida shani kwenu? Ata vakutega tu momo vandávanagwaledya avalá vánavanagwaledya vanavo.
Namomo mwenu mukavatandela wambone avalá vantandéla, inkupagwa paida shani kwenu? Ata vakutega tu dadavo, vandátandela momo.
Na mukavakapesha vamuvenavo lilindilililo lyakupata, inkupagwa paida shani kwenu? Ata vakutega tu vandákapashania pakulota kupata kavili shilinga shosho.

Bai vanagwaledye vamongo venu, tandedya wambone, kapesha pamukalindila kupata shinu shoeshoe. Mukatenda doni, inudyo yenu indava ikumene na mwiu mundava mmanavake Wapashanya-uti. Mwaa nae andávatanana vakanalambwalela na vakalau.
“Ava mmashididi kenga Tatagwenu nanae ni washididi.
“Hamunamuukumu munu namwenu Nnungu hamuukumu. Hamunamunge munu namwenu Nnungu hamunga. Valivalive vankawédya namwenu Nnungu anannivaliva.
Nadoni mukajaula namwenu Nnungu andamupa; andatwala shipimo shambone, shakwinyila, shakuumbala, shakupakatika kumwing'a. Doni, mo mwamuvapela vavenu, namwenu Nnungu anampela momo.”
Kutwala kuvaulila nkong'o au, “Inkuululika munu ákalola kunkamula nnandi ákalolamwagwe? Da vanu vavili ava uti havagwilila mulipondo?
Nkwóda hanamanya mpaka kumpunda aijá ámpundisha kanji nkwóda woewoe akalipundisha shana ava kenga jo mwene ámpundisha.
“Mwaa shani unkwona shikoko shivéle muliu lyanung'unumunu kuleka kwona likangolo livéle muliu mwako?

Ùmwaulila dashi nung'unumunu, ‘Shate nikushe shikoko shivéle muliu mwako,’ wako likangolo livéle muliu mwako, ùkaulula kwona? Umunu wamalambi davo gwe! Shitandi usha likangolo livéle muliu mwako kutwala apo undalola shana pakulota ushe shikoko shivéle muliu lyanung'unumunu.
“Haupali nnandi wakukonda úpa vyepo vyakunyambikanga na haupali nnandi wakujumajumanga úpa vyepo vyambone.
Ivelé doni, kula nnandi umanyika mwaa wavyepo vyake; havanepa malalange mwinalala na havanepa nshambalau mulilonga.

Munu wakwalala ntima mwaa wavyambone vipagwíte muntima mwake, nae aumadyanga vinu vyambone kanji munu wakunyata ntima mwaa wavyakunyata vipagwíte muntima mwake, nae aumadyanga vinu vyakunyata. Kula munu atangola kwodana na vimuumbéle muntima mwake.
“Mwaa shani mungushema ‘Nang'olo, Nang'olo’ na mwenu shanimwaulila nangu hamunatandeya shinu?
Munu woewoe áida kwangu nangu áigwilila malove angu na átandedya, nangu ndamwaulila walinganenenavo.

Munu ajo avelé mwamunu ádangile ing'ande yake; andimba mapondo akukadaleka mpaka kundonda mulijanga kutwala kudenga. Livambwe likaide, medi kukanyola ing'ande yo kanji ing'ande yo, kulamana na kuting'ina mwaa wakudenga shana.

Kanji aijá áigwilila malove angu kanji mene kutandedya, avelé mwamunu ádangile ing'ande yake pashanya ulongo kwabila kukadaleya mapondo; livambwe kugang'ola ing'ande yo kutwala ing'ande nneu do, jiu, kujiuka.”
Napanelo Yesu akamalile mapundisho ake pamevo pavenentete, andyúka ku Kapalanaumu.
Palikaja lyolyo, andípagwa nang'olo jumo wavaing'ondo miya wavaloma. Nae andívanavo ntumika wake washintanana namene e avéle nnwele wakuleka indaja.
Nang'olo ajo akaigwe vantambulanga Yesu, andívatuma vanang'olo vavayuda kuka nanjugwa Yesu auke akamponie ntumika wake.
Vanavo vakawike pavele Yesu vanínjugwangila namene vaashidoni, “Nang'olo ajo, wako indikuvaikila umpwashele
mwaa nae ankuvanagwaledya namene venentete vetu na ni jojo átudangalele shitala shakulipudidya.”

Kutwala Yesu kuka namu vanang'olo avo; pavavandike paing'ande, nang'olo kuvatuma vavagwe kuka ndamwaulila Yesu kushidoni, “Nang'olo, haunashumbukange mwaa nangu hanguvaikidile kungwidila wako kwing'ande kwangu.
Ni ashi shingutadídye kulyona kunyambikanga kwida nangu nimwene ndatangola namu wako. Kanji ukatangola lilove limo tu, ntumika wangu andapona.

Mwaa nangu ni nimunu ngúvele mwina madalaka na ninkuvanavo vaing'ondo vandivalamulila. Nikannamulila jumo, ‘Wena!’ Nae kukinneu. Junji, ‘Ida!’ Kwidinneu. Nikannamulila ntumika wangu, ‘Tenda ashi!’ Nae kutandenneu shosho.”

Yesu akaigwe malove ala, anínshanga munu ajo; nae kushiliuka kutwala kwaulila imbumba yavanu íshimwoda kushidoni, “Ninkummanyiya ngala doni, ata mo muvanaishilaeli, hangunava kukodya likulupililo kenga ali.”
Bai vanu vavatumíle avalá pavaujidile kukaja, vanínkodya ntumika jo àponile.
Napanelo ling'oto lyawakati padyoko, nae andyúka kulikaja limo lyavashema Naimu; vakwoda vake vandyúka namu nae pamo na imbumba yavanu vanji.
Akawike pashengo likaja, mwe! Vanu kwaloka vànyukete maiti; maiti ala avele amwana nnume avéle jumo jojo. Mwene nkúvaleka avele nkongwe namwili na imbumba yavanu vapalikaja ishinampalakela.
Umu akamwone namwili jo andímwanangila shididi kutwala kushidoni, “Haunalile.”
Nae kuvandika, kukamula igoli yavanyukatidíle maiti ailá, vanu vanyukéte igoli kwimila nae kushidoni, “Nnemba! Ninkukwaulila, takatuka!”
Maiti apalá takatuku, ngoo, kutunduvanginneu kutangola nae kuntwala kumwing'a mwene anyoke.
Vanu uti kuvainjila kujopa kutwala kumupa lishangelo Nnungu vaashidoni, “Pakati petu andyumilila nkúlava nkumene namene!” Vanavo kavili kushidoni, “Nnungu andida ndavaangangola venentete vake!”
Bai dyabali adyo dimwe Yesu dindíigwinika ku Yudeya na muvilambo uti vyashitanono.
Napanelo vakwoda vake Nshuwau vanímmalangangila Nshuwau vinu avyo uti.
Nshuwau akaigwe, andívashema vakwoda vake vavili kuvatuma kumwe Umu vakamudye doni, “Da wako ni gwegwe watukulindila kwida kwali tunnindile junji?”
Bai vakawike pavele Yesu vanavo kushidoni, “Nshuwau Wakubatisha anditutuma twide tukudye doni, ‘Da wako ni gwegwe watukulindila kwida kwali tunnindile junji?’ ”
Muwakati wowo Yesu andívaponia valwele voe vavilwele vyakuvilingananga, vamauvilo na vamajini aukalau. Na yadavo vákalola andívatadya kupata kulola.

Yesu napane andívajang'ula vanu avalá kushidoni, “Wena mukammalangangile Nshuwau vyamugwene na vyamwigwite. Kamwaulile doni, vákalola vankupata kulola, vakudidimanga madodo vankuwena, vamalemba vankutakata, vákaigwa vankwigwa, vakupela vankuvadyuwa na vamashikini vankuvalangangiligwa ntenga wambone.
Andijaligwa munu ákangunyatila nangu.”

Napanelo avalá vaidíle na ntenga umwe Nshuwau vakatumuke mulyutu alyo Yesu andítunduvanga kutangola ing'ano imwe Nshuwau avaulila vanu vapagwíte apo kushidoni, “Da kushimbweshe muukile ndalola nyamani? Muukile ndalola udani úshipunga imepo?
Kanji muukile ndalola nyamani? Muukile nannola munu ágwalangidile shana? Mwenu! Vagwalangidíle dinguvo dyakushenga na vanáma mukupuwanga, vaikalanga muding'ande dyavaumu.
Kanji shana muukile ndalola nyamani? Muukile nannola nkúlava? Elo nkúlava kanji nangu ninkumwaulila doni, nae pankulava po, andipunda;
ni jojo aijá wavamwandike doni, ‘Lola, nannangaledya njelo wangu apite akukandyangidya indila yako umwene úkanava kupita.’
Nangu ninkumwaulila ngala doni, pakati pavanu vamushilambo shapai haumilidile nkúlava ámpundile Nshuwau. Kanji aijá ndikidiki muutawala wa Nnungu aju ni nang'olo ámpundile nae.
Vanu uti na ata vakukatisha-ukodi vamwigwilidíle Nshuwau, vandímupa ishaliya Nnungu mwaa wakuvapa ubatisho Nshuwau
kanji mapalishayo namu vamwalimu vadishaliya pakwita kuvapa ubatisho Nshuwau, vandiludyanga malotelo a Nnungu pamili pavo.
“Vanu vaimbula ai ndivalinganiange na nyamani? Vanu ava vavele mwanyamani?
Leka ndivalinganiange na vadyoko vaikalénge mumautu aumbala vatangalanila doni, “ ‘Tundimwambela magoma, mwenu hamuvinile. Tundimba dimu dyashililo, mwenu hamulidile.’
Shapo lo, andida Nshuwau Wakubatisha munu ákashilya na ákashikumbila ugwalwa wavyepo mwenu kushidoni, ‘Anintawala lijini ajo.’
Kwida Mwana Wamunu álya na ákumbila mwenu muushidoni, ‘Nnole munu wakululuka, lilevi, njave vakukatisha-ukodi na vakutega.’
Kanji napane limanyilo lyake Nnungu linkulilodya kuva lyaishaliya kwa avilá vyavatenda vaitikidíle.”
Napanelo mpalishayo jumo anínnalika Yesu kwing'ande yake akalye shakulya; Yesu kwinjila nng'ande amulá kutwala nanae kwikala pandamu.
Mwe! Nkongwe jumo nkútega wapalikaja lyolyo akamanye doni Yesu avelé nng'ande mwake mpalishayo alya shakulya, nae andítwala ishupa yake yamauta akunung'angila
kuka ndamwimila Yesu pamadodo pake, kulila, myodi kugwilila mmadodo mwake Yesu kutwala ugwimbu wake kupukutanga myodi mmadodo mo, kupalapata na kupakanga mauta.
Napanelo mpalishayo aijá annalike Yesu akone davo, andítangola shintimatima aashidoni, “She! Aju leka àvele nkúlava mwiu, shi akanimmanya nkongwe ánkamulanga aju; nkongwe aju, nkùtega!”
Kanji Yesu andímwaulila kushidoni, “Simoni! Shipali shinu shangulota kukwaulila wako.” Simoni, “Shinu shani mwalimu?”
“Munu jumo ntajili ashindavadai vanu vavili njuluku wake. Jumo ashindai dinali dimiya mwanu, junji kundai amushini.
Kanji vanu vavili ava uti kwodamwaa havavenavo njuluku wakunnipa, nae andívalivalivila uti. Napanelo pakati pavanu vavili ava, wakwashi álota kunnagwaledya namene mwene njuluku?”
Simoni kushidoni, “Nangu ngwona jo wannivalidile poe jo.” Yesu kushidoni, “Undyamuwa shana.”

Nae kushiliuka kunnola nkongwe kutwala kumudya Simoni kushidoni, “Unkumwona nkongwe aju? Nangu ndiinjila nng'ande mwako, wako haungupele medi akunavanga mmadodo kanji nkongwe aju, aningunavyanga madodo myodi kutwala kungwanyalanga na ugwimbu wake.
Haungukumbatidile kanji nkongwe aju, te ndikainjile hanapumula shinu kungupalapata mmadodo.
Haungupakile mauta mmuti kanji nkongwe aju, aningupaka mauta akunung'ila mmadodo.

Nadoni ninkukwaulila ngala doni, madambi ake avéle oe, andilivalivika; ni ashi shalodya linagwaledyo likumene. Kanji kwaupande wako wako, nangu nikwaulila doni, munu ánalodya linagwaledyo lidikidiki, Nnungu annivaliva padyoko madambi ake.”
Kutwala apo andímwaulila nkongwe aijá kushidoni, “Madambi ako mwiu andilivalivika.”
Bai avalá vanu vapagwíte pavashilya apalá vandyúdyanianga vaashidoni, “Da aju avelé kenga nyani áulula kuvalivaliva vanu madambi?”
Kanji Yesu andímwaulila nkongwe jo kushidoni, “Likulupililo lyako lindikuposha, wena kwaamani.”
Vinu avyo vikapite, Yesu ashindapita atanela makaja makumene na madikidiki alailila na avalanganga ntenga wambone wautawala wa Nnungu. Vamyombe kumi na mbili avalá vandímwoda pamo na
vakongwe vavaponídye majini aukalau na vilwele vinji. Vakongwe avo vavele ava: Maliya wavashinshema Maliya wa ku Magadalena nkongwe jojo wamuumídye Yesu majini saba,
Shuwana ndyagwe Kusha ndyoko wake Elode, Susana pamo na vakongwe vanji váshintumikila na mali ave.
Napanelo vanu vaaloka mmakaja uti vamwidila Yesu na dimbumba dyavanu dìkadyanienge, nae andítangola nkong'o au,
“Munu jumo andyúka ndamwadilila imbeju yake yaulende. Pashimwadilila, indípagwa igwilidíle nanyenje indila; vanu kuluvatanga kutwala vyuni vyakuniania kudadalanga.
Inji kugwilila padinyanga; paimadile, kujuma mwaa haupagwíte ntalolo.
Inji kugwilila panashilanga; paimadile na nashilanga momo pamadile, kubyaa.
Kanji inji kugwilila paulongo wambone, kumela, kupa vyepo vyoe namene vyakuwikila imiya kula lutavi.” Akamalile kutangola nkong'o au andílailila aashidoni, “Avé na matu, aigwe.”
Vakwoda kutwala kumudya, “Da nkong'o au wamba nyamani?”

Nae kushidoni, “Mwenu jo vanintadya mumanye vipii vyautawala wa Nnungu kanji vanji vo, ‘vipii avi vandavavalangangila kwamikong'o kwambangidya valola avi, havanone shinu na vaigwilila avi, havanamanye shinu.’
“Napanelo mana ankong'o au ni ala: imbeju yo ni lilove lya Nnungu;
igwilidíle ndila ailá inkwitika kuva vanu vaigwilíla lilove lya Nnungu kutwala Ndamoni kwida ndausha lilove alyo mmitima mwave pakulota havanakulupile na havanambwalegwe.
Igwilidíle padinyanga inkwitika kuva vanu vánatenda pavaigwilila lilove lya Nnungu, kupwashalela na lipuwilo kanji mwaa úkave wakulitalalakela, vakulupila kwawakati kutwala akavakodya malingo kutila.
Igwilidíle panashilanga inkwitika kuva vanu vaigwilíla lilove lya Nnungu kanji vakaikalanga, mangaiko, mali na ditama dyashinamilo kuvatita dimumu kutwala vyepo vyavo mene kukamala.
Kanji imbeju igwilidíle paulongo wambone inkwitika kuva vanu vánatenda vakaigwa lilove lya Nnungu kuvikila kuntima wiu na kupa vyepo kwaindila yakulipililila.
“Hapali munu ánatenda akakaledya itaa kwinikidya kwali kuvika mulyungu igoli kanji avika pashinu pakwaneka pakulota vanu vainjíla nng'ande mo, vone kulangala.
Ivelé doni, hashipali shinu shilipiídye shilóta hashinaundukuke na ata hashipali shinu shíkamanyika shilóta hashinamanyike.
Igwilila shana vyanimwaulila mwaa munu ávenavo, Nnungu andamwanjadyedya na aijá ákavenavo, sho padyoko shalyona kuvanavo sho, Nnungu anampoka.”
Napanelo anyoke na vanung'unuvake vandímuukila kanji havaulwíle kummandika mwaa waimbumba yavanu.
Vanu kumwaulila, “Anyoko pamo na vanung'unuvako vapali panda po, valota wonanenavo.”
Kanji nae kushidoni, “Ajala na vanung'unuvangu ni avalá vaigwilíla lilove lya Nnungu na kuvikila mmitendo.”
Muliduva limo Yesu andívaulila vakwoda vake doni, “Twamboke tuke litanda nkono unji,” vanavo kwinjila mwingalava kutwala mwanda.
Vàvele mmedi vauka, Yesu kulala kuukila mulwono. Mulitanda mo ni kwida shimbunga; ingalava kuteka medi, vanu kupagwa mushijoidyo.
Vanavo kumwimulanga Yesu, “Mwalimu, mwalimu! Wetu po kupela!” Nae kutakatuka, kutangalela shimbunga pamo na mawimbi akujowa alalá; bai shimbunga pamo na mawimbi kulimaladya kutwala kuva shana.
Nae kuvaulila vakwoda vake, “Da likulupililo lyenu livé pashi?” Kanji vanavo vandíjopa na vandyúdyania vashanga, “Da munu aju átangalela imepo na medi kutwala kumwigwilila, avalalelé mwashi?”
Kutwala apo vanavo vandíwika kushilambo sha ku Gelasha shivéle shalatoto litanda nkono unji na pa Galileya.
Yesu pashulwike mwingalava munu jumo wamajini wapalikaja lya Gelasha lyo, andímwidila. Munu aju andínama vyaka vyoe awena matakodavo na hashiikala nkaja; ashiikala kuvyonga bai.

Nae akamwone Yesu andíkutakutanga kugwilangila mmadodo mwake kutwala kutangola pashanya po aashidoni, “Yesu mwanagwe Nnungu Wapashanya-uti, da wako shako nyamani kumili kwangu? Ninkukujugwangila haunanguvyauvyange!”

Nae andíjugwa davo mwaa Yesu anínnamulila lijini nshapu aijá aume mumili mwamunu ajo. Lijini jojo jo, myanda vyoe aníntawala munu aju; ata vakammika pashinu vàmuungile mang'unyang'unya avitali mmakono na mmadodo, nae ashindalundumula lijini kuntwala kumuukanavo kunundu.
Napanelo Yesu andímudya, “Da wako lina lyako nyani?” Nae kushidoni, “Imbumba,” mwaa nae avele na majini oe namene.
Napanelo majini alalá anínjugwangila Yesu hanavajele kulitavaleva.
Pakati popo, shindípagwa shipinga shikumene shavanguluve shíshipita shilya pashanya lishinga. Nadoni majini anínnamadikila Yesu avalamulile vauke vakavainjile vanguluve vovo nae kuvalamulila.
Bai majini alalá andímuumananga munu aijá kuka ndavainjilanga vanguluve kutwala vanguluve vo uti kwalela shipajelo kulijalangila mulitanda, kuwanga.
Napanelo vanu váshilanga dinguluve avalá vakone vitandeke avilá, vandítukuta kuka ndavalanganga kukaja na mumakaja ashitanono.

Vanu kuka ndalola vitandéke avilá; pavawikile pavéle Yesu, vanínkodya munu wamuumile majini aijá àikele pavéle Yesu na ding'ano dyake dìmwikalenge shana na àgwalangidile. Vanavo vakamwone, vandíjopa namene.
Avalá vagwéne vene vandívavalangangila vanu avo mwaukile ndaponela munu aijá wamajini.
Kutwala vanu uti vashilambo sha ku Gelasha sho kunjugwa Yesu avanyeme mwaa vashindajopa namene. Bai Yesu kwinjila mwingalava pakulota auje.
Napanelo munu wamuumile majini aijá kujugwa auke namu Yesu kanji Yesu kushidoni,
“Mene! Uja uke kwenu ukavalangange vitendo vikumene uti vyakutandelele Nnungu.” Bai nae andyúka adingula likaja uti avalanganga vitendo vikumene uti vyantandalele Yesu.
Napanelo Yesu akauje, imbumba yavanu inímpwashalela mwaa vanu uti vandíikala vannindila.
Mwe! Kuwikinneu munu jumo wavashinshema Yailu avele nkútawala wapashitala shakulipudidya. Pawikile pavéle Yesu nae andíshidika kunjugwangila Yesu auke kwing'ande kwake
mwaa ko kwing'ande kwake ko, mwanagwe nkongwe ávele jumo jojo na wavyaka kumi na mbili avele nnwele wakuleka indaja. Bai Yesu pashuka, vanu vashinanshinya namene.
Napanelo andípagwa nkongwe jumo ávenavo shilwele shampapa shauwile vyaka kumi na mbili; nkongwe aju andímalila vyake uti avapa vakulaula kanji hapali nkúlaula áulwile kumponia.
Nkongwe ajo andívandika kunyuma kwake Yesu kunkwaa munkumbu waikanju; akankwae, myadi vyo kumalalinneu.
Yesu kudya, “Nyani ángukwaidye?” Vanu uti kukana. Vakakane, Patulu kushidoni, “Mwalimu! Vanu vandikutang'anedya na vandikushinya namene!”
Yesu, “Mene, apali ángukwaidye mwaa nimwene ndimanya shana, mumili mwangu amu dimongo dindikola madengo.”

Napanelo nkongwe aijá akone doni hayululika kuligwadyagwadyanga, anímmandika Yesu atatamela kutwala kushidika; akashidike, andílivalanganga pamevo avanu uti shintadídye ankwae na kulivalanganga mwaponedinneu.
Kanji Yesu kushidoni, “Namwana, likulupililo lyako lindikuponia; wena kwaamani.”
Akune Yesu atangola, kwaloka munu jumo wapaing'ande yankútawala wapashitala kwida ndamwaulila nang'olo wake kushidoni, “Haunanshimbuwange mwalimu jo, mwanavo andipela.”
Kanji Yesu akaigwe nae kushidoni, “Haunajope; kulupila tu. Mwanavo andapona.”
Yesu akainjile nng'ande amulá, halatíle amwode munu woewoe ila bai Patulu, Tiyagu, Nshuwau, tatake mwana pamo na anyoke.
Pashinu apo vanu uti vashindalilanga na vashinannamadikila kanji Yesu kushidoni, “Hamunalile! Hanapela shinu, ona lwono.”
Vanu uti kumweludyanga mwaa vandímanya doni, andipela.
Kanji nae anínkamula; akankamule kushidoni, “Mwali, takatuka!”
Mwali kumuujila imumu kutwala kutakatuka, Yesu kulamulila vamupe shakulya.
Bai vatatavake vandíshanga namene kanji Yesu andívaulila havanamwaulile munu.
Napanelo Yesu andívashema avalá kumi na mbili kuvapa dimongo na madalaka akulamulilila majini uti na akuponedya vilwele
kutwala kuvatuma vauke vavalanganga ntenga wautawala wa Nnungu na vaponia vilwele.
Andívaulila doni, “Mushimwanda shenu hamunanyukate shinu; ipimbo mene, lipeta lyashakulya mene, njuluku mene na ata dinguvo mbili mene.
Mukawika palikaja, paing'ande yoeyoe yamulota kuwikila, ikalanga popo mpaka muliduva lyakuma.
Palikaja lyoelyoe vakamwita kumpwashalela, pamuma po pumunanga litutunga mmadodo mwenu pakulota uve ushuda kumili kwave.”
Bai vanavo vandyúma kuka vatanela mmakaja vavalanganga ntenga wambone na vavaponia valwele kula pashinu.
Napanelo umu Elode andígwa uti víshitandeka kutwala kummilinganianga ding'ano mwaa vandípagwa váshishidoni, “Nshuwau jo, andidyuka,”
vanji doni, “Mene, Liyashi andyuja,” vanji doni, “Mene, andidyuka nkúlava jumo wakala.”
Kanji Elode kushidoni, “Nshuwau, nangu ndilamulila kunnumula ukoti! Kushi wanimwigwanga kutenda vinu avi aju, nyani kavili?” Bai Elode ashinannambela munu ajo amwone.
Napanelo vamyombe vake avalá pavaujite vanímmalangangila uti vinu vyavatandile. Kutwala apo Yesu andívaukanavo nkono wakunjini wa Beteshaida vanyema padyoko.
Kanji imbumba yavanu ikammanye mwawanalele, indímwoda. Nae kuvapwashalela kutwala kutangonavo ing'ano yautawala wa Nnungu na kuvaponia vilwele vanu váshibidi kuvaponia.

Liduva lyuka mmamba, vamyombe vake Yesu kumi na mbili avalá vandímwidila Yesu ndamwaulila doni, “Vaapukaniange vanu vauke mmala na mmakaja avandíke vakapate shamoto na vakapumule. Mwaa patuvele apa panalugwangwa vila.”

Kanji Yesu kushidoni, “Vape mwenu po shakulya sho!” Vanavo kushidoni, “Wetu hatuve shakulya! Tuvenavo magung'u mwanu na dyomba mbili bai. Kwali tuke wewe apa tukashume shakulya shakuvatosha vanu ava uti.”
Ashii pashinu popo po, vandípagwa valume dyalupu mwanu. Napanelo nae andívaulila vakwoda vake kushidoni, “Vaikadyange vanu vo muvipinga vyavanu amusini-amusini.”
Vanavo kutandela momo, kuvaikadyanga vanu uti.
Yesu kutwala magung'u mwanu alalá pamo na dyomba mbili adilá kulola kuwa kwalaliya kutwala kuvapa vakwoda vake vavajavile venentete.
Bai vanu vo vandílya na uti vandípuwanga; pavatwalenge makombo vandyúmbadya makalala kumi na mbili.
Muliduva limo Yesu àvele gweka ashwali, vakwoda vake vanímmandika nae kuvaudya kushidoni, “Da vanu vangwona nangu kuva nyani?”
Vanavo kushidoni, “Vakwona kuva Nshuwau Wakubatisha, vanji Liyashi, vanji nkúlava jumo wakala andidyuka.”
Yesu kuvaudya kavili, “Kushi mwenu mungwona kuva nyani?” Patulu kushidoni, “Wako Klistu wake Nnungu.”
Nae kuvaduma havanammanyiye munu

na kutangola kavili doni, “Mwana Wamunu inimmaikila auvauvange namene; vanang'olo, vakulangalalela-shadaka vanang'olo pamo na vamwalimu vadishaliya, vanavo vandamwita. Indimmaikila vamyae kanji muliduva lyantatu andadyuka.”
Namomo andívaulila vanu uti doni, “Munu akalota kungwoda nangu, alishukulu; kula liduva anyukate nshalaba wake angwode.
Mwaa woewoe álota aposhe shingumi shake andakatoka kanji woewoe álota akatoke shingumi shake mwaa wakungunagwaledya nangu, andaposha.
Da munu alota kupata wambone shani akapata shilambo uti kanji alijaa jo mwene kwali alivikila jo mwene?

Munu woewoe akangwanangila nangu dyoni na kwanangila dyoni malove angu, muliduva lyakwida Mwana Wamunu na lishangelo lyake, mulishangelo lyolyo lyatatake na lyavanjelo vakwilimyanga, nanae munu ajo andamwanangila dyoni.
Ninkumwaulila mwiu doni, vapali vanu popo apa, vanavo havapela vakanava kwona utawala wa Nnungu.”
Napanelo akatangole malove alo, ling'oto lyakupita ishumana imo, nae aníntwala Patulu, Nshuwau namu Tiyagu kuvaukanavo kulishinga ndashwali.
Pashishwali ing'ope yake indíjalukanga na ikanju yake kuva yakushenga kubidanga mevo.
Mwe! Kwaneka apalá na lishangelo vanu vavili, Musha namu Liyashi vatangonavo.
Vanavo vandyámbangila mwaa ing'ano yakupela kwake Yesu ku Yelusalemu atandedya malotelo ake Nnungu.
Napanelo Patulu pamo na vavagwe vandílala lwono; vakashishuke, vandyóna lishangelo lyake Yesu na kuvona vanu vavili vavéle namu Yesu avalá.

Vanu avo vakatumuke pavéle Yesu, Patulu kumwaulila Yesu kushidoni, “Mwalimu! Ni shambone mwatupagwididye pashinu apa, leka tukandyange mautu matatu akwikala; limo lyako, linji Musha na linji lyo live limwe Liyashi.” Nae atangwele pakamanya shamba.
Pashitangola lindívainikidya lyundi; likavinikidye, vanavo ni kujopa doni.
Mo mulyundi mo lindyúma lidi líshishidoni, “Aju ni mwanangu, wakutandalegwa wangu, jojo jo mwigwilile!”
Lidi alilá likamalale, Yesu vangwené àvele gweka. Bai vanavo vandímalala na mumaduva lolo, havammalangidíle munu avilá vyavagwéne.
Napanelo palyamba lyake vanavo vakaalele palishinga apalá, imbumba yavanu indímuukila Yesu.
Mwe! Munu jumo wamwimbumba kunjugwa doni, “Mwalimu! Ninkukujugwa unnole mwanangu mwaa avelé jojo aju bai.
Lipali lijini línantenda amwinjila; akamwinjila, ndyoko kukugwanginneu, kungalagayanga mpaka kumuumadyanga shulu nkanywa. Ukashimwona anneka mpaka ankajang'alange.
Nangu ndivajugwa vakwoda vako vankumulange lijini ajo kanji havaulwile.”
Yesu kushidoni, “Shasho! Mwenu ni mmanu múkakulupila na múkamanyikanga! Da nangu ndapagwa namu mwenu ninnaga mpaka duvani? Mwidenavo akuno mwanavo jo.”
Mwana amuukila Yesu, lijini liníngwiidya pai kungalagayanga kanji Yesu anínshulanga lijini nshapu jo, kumponia mwana nae kuntwala kumwing'a mwene tatake.
Bai vanu uti vandíshanga shiumu shalishangelo lyake Nnungu. Pavishivashangania vinu vyashitenda Yesu, nae andívaulila vakwoda vake kushidoni,
“Tela matu enu mwigwe avi! Mwana Wamunu andakamuligwa kumakono kwavanu.”
Kanji vakwoda vake avalá, havashimanya shashamba mwaa shindílipiya nadoni vanavo havaigwíte na vandíjopa kumuudyangidya shashamba.
Napanelo pakati pavakwoda, undyúmilila ntau wakudyania nyani nang'olo pakati pave.
Kanji Yesu amanya makumbukililo ammitima vyave, aníntwala ndyoko kumwimidya pepi na mwene

kutwala kuvaulila kushidoni, “Woewoe álota kumpwashalela ndyoko kenga aju palina lyangu, angupwashalela nangu na woewoe álota kungupwashalela nangu, ampwashalela aijá ángutumididye. Jo álota kuva ndyoko pakati penu mwenu uti, bai jojo andava nang'olo.”
Nshuwau kushidoni, “Mwalimu! Tundimwona munu áshivinganga majini palina lyako, wetu kunneya mwaa nae havéle mushipinga shetu shikwóda wako.”
Kanji Yesu kushidoni, “Hamunaneye! Mwaa woewoe ákavele mmongo wetu, ajo wètu.”
Napanelo Yesu maduva ake akupwashalalegwa kuwa akavandikange, andyámuwa kumalidya mwanda kuka ku Yelusalemu.
Nae kuvalangaledya vanu; vanu ava vandíinjila palikaja lya pa Shamaliya vakapanganiange kuwika kwake.
Kanji vene kaja ayo, havalotíle kumpwashalela mwaa vandímanya shana doni, nae auka ku Yelusalemu.
Kutwala vakwoda vake, Tiyagu namu Nshuwau pavagwene davo, vanavo kushidoni, “Nang'olo, da shii tushamele moto kuwa uvashulukile vapyange?”
Yesu kanji andívaujila vo vene kuvashulanga.
Bai vanavo vandyúma kuka likaja linji.
Napanelo vàvele mushimwanda, munu jumo andímwaulila Yesu kushidoni, “Nang'olo, nangu ndakwoda kwoekwoe kwaulota kuka.”
Yesu kushidoni, “Vanansheto vankuvanavo vivava, vyuni vyakuniania vinkuvanavo vyanda kanji Mwana Wamunu have pashinu pakwijamya muti wake.”
Yesu kutwala kumwaulila munu junji kushidoni, “Ngwoda!” Kanji nae kushidoni, “Nang'olo, shitandi nguleka nguke ndikanshunge atata mpaka papela ninshike.”
Yesu, “Valeke vakupela vashikane shivenevene kanji wako apa, wena uvalanganga utawala wa Nnungu.”
Munu junji kavili kushidoni, “Nang'olo, nangu ndakwoda kanji shitandi nguleka nguke ndikavajugwe valikola vangu.”
Yesu kushidoni, “Munu ánalima akuno alola kunyuma, hanakulupilika muutawala wa Nnungu.”
Vikapite avyo, Umu andívaalota vakwoda vanji sabini kuvatuma vavili vavili vauke valangalela mmakaja uti ashilota kupita nae
kuvaulila kushidoni, “Mapuno avelé oe napane vamadengo vavelé padyoko nadoni njugwe mwene mapuno avatumidye vamadengo vanji mumapuno ake.
Wenananga! Kanji lola, ninkuntumidya kenga mmangandolo shing'ati mavinji.
Hamunanyukate iposhi, hamunanyukate lipeta, hamunanyukate vilatu na ndila mo, hamunatimatimange muntaa munu nandele.
Paing'ande yoeyoe yamulota kuwikila, shitandi tangola doni, ‘Amani ipagwe paing'ande apa.’
Paing'ande apo, akapagwa munu ávenavo amani, amani ayo inampata nae kanji akanapagwa, amani ai indamuujila mmene.
Hamunapite mutanela ding'ande. Ikalanga paing'ande imo yoyo mulya na mukumbila ashilá shavalota kumupa vene mwaa mmádengo inimmaikila apate nshala.
“Mulikaja lyoelyoe lyamuwika vanavo vampwashalela, shakulya shoeshoe shavamupa lyaa,
valwele vaponie na muvaulile vanu doni, ‘Utawala wa Nnungu undimwikila.’
Kanji pamuwika palikaja vanavo vaita kumpwashalela, wena mudyengo muushidoni,
‘Litutunga lyankaja amu litunamatidíle mmadodo ali, tunkumpumunila mmene. Ikala mumanya doni, utawala wa Nnungu undiwika.’
Ninkumwaulila doni, muliduva lyaukumu venentete va ku Shodoma vandapata shaushanga shaangolo kuvapunda vanu valikaja alyo.

Upambale wako Kolashimu! Upambale wako Beteshaida! Leka ku Tilu namu ku Shidoni àtandeke makango atandéke kwenu mwenu, vanavo doni vàlijugulenge kaladavo, valitaanga maguni, kulipakanga liu valilodya kulijugulanga kwamadambi ave.
Napavedoni, vatilu namu vashidoni paukumu vandavang'unulangila padiki mevo kumpunda mwenu.
Kushi wako Kapalanaumu, ulota ulikwedye mpaka kuwa? Bai vandakupandamwalela kumoka.
“Munu ámwigwilila mwenu angwigwilila nangu, ámwita mwenu angwita nangu na ángwita nangu, amwita aijá ángutumididye.”
Bai avalá sabini vandyúja na lipuwilo vaashidoni, “Nang'olo, palina lyako majini ni kutwishimu doni.”
Yesu kushidoni, “Nangu ndimwona Shatwani agwa kuwa mwainaa yamoto.
Lola, nangu ndimupa mwenu madalaka akuluvatila dinyoka, vinila na kumupa dimongo dyakutimbangila dimongo dyavamongo pashikantandeka shinu.
Mwenu hamunapuwange mwaa majini kumwishimu kanji puwanga mwaa mena enu andyandikigwa kuwa.”

Muwakati wowo, Yesu andípuwanga namene kwaindila ya Imumu Wanashwe kutwala kushidoni, “Ninkukulambwalela Atata, Umu wakuwa na pai úpiidye vinu kwavanu vakumanya na vamang'amung'amu kutwala kuvalodya vanu vila. Ninkukulambwalela mwaa wako Atata utandalelé mwaulotalele.
Atata aningukamudya vinu uti. Hapali munu junji ámmanyite Mwana pakavele Atata na hapali ámmanyite Atata pakavele Mwana pamo namu aijá walota kummalangangila Mwana.”
Kutwala kuvashiliukila vakwoda vake kuvaulila vanavo gweka kushidoni, “Andijaligwa mevo aóna vinu vyamwona mwenu.
Ninkumwaulila doni, vakulava voe pamo na vaumu vashindalota vone vyamwona mwenu avi kanji havagwene na vashindalota vaigwe vyamwigwa mwenu avi kanji havaigwite.”
Mwe! Mwalimu jumo wadishaliya kutakatuka kunninga Yesu aashidoni, “Mwalimu, Ngutendé nyamani pakulota ngupate shingumi shíkamalilika?”
Yesu kushidoni, “Da mu Lilamulo mo, vaandiké nyamani? Paunashomya po wigwa dashi?”
Nae kushidoni, “Nnagwaledye Umu Nnungu wako na ntima wako uti, ungumi wako uti, dimongo dyako uti, ding'anong'ano dyako uti na nnagwaledye mujo kenga mo mwaulinagwaladyedya umwene.”
Yesu kutwala kushidoni, “Undijang'ula shana. Tandedya vyovyo vyo, uname.”
Kanji mwalimu wadishaliya pakulota alilodye kuvanavo ishaliya andímudya Yesu doni, “Shapo na nyangu jo ni wakwashi kavili?”
Yesu kushidoni, “Munu jumo andyúma pa Yelusalemu kwalalela ku Yeliko; nindila kukodyanianavo vakwiva, vanavo kumuulanga uti vyagwéte, kunkanyalanga kuka kunneka àdilike.
Kwakulolowananga nkúlangalalela-shadaka jumo kwalalela indila yoyo; akamwone munu aijá, nae nanyenje, shembe, shembe, ajo áuka jo.
Namomo mulawi jumo pawikile palyutu alilá akamwone, nanae, vee, kulyukila.
Kanji nshamaliya jumo áshuka kwashuka, pawikile palyutu lyavéle munu aijá, akamwone andímwanangila shididi.
Anímmandika kumuukanga makana atanga mauta na ugwalwa wavyepo, kunkwedya mupunda wake kumuukanavo paing'ande yavajeni kutwala kumwangangalanga.
Palyamba lyake, andyúmya njuluku kumupa mwene ing'ande kumwaulila doni, ‘Mwangaikangile munu aju nimwene panguja shinu shoeshoe shalota kutumila, nangu ndakuujidya.’
Dashi, pakati pavanu ava vatatu, wakwashi waumwona kulilodya kuva muje munu wavankanyalénge vakwiva avo?”
Nae kushidoni, “Jo ámwanangidile shididi jo.” Kutwala Yesu kushidoni, “Bai wena ukatandele momo.”
Napanelo Yesu andyúkanavo mushu shimwanda shake pamo na vakwoda vake. Pavawikile palikaja limo, nkongwe jumo wavashinshema Malita kumpwashalela kwing'ande yake.
Jo Malita aju, andívanavo nung'une wavashinshema Maliya. Nae andíikala pepi na pamadodo amwe Umu amwigwilila shashitangola.
Kanji Malita ashinangaikangila mukutumika poe; nae kuka pavele Yesu ndamwaulila doni, “Nang'olo! Da inkukunagwela mwanetu kunguleka nangu ngukola madengo gweka? Mwaulile angupwashele!”
Umu kushidoni, “Malita, Malita, shapo wako muntima mo unkwangaikangila vinu vyoe
kanji shilatégwa ni shinu shimo. Ni Maliya átandwele shinu asho shambone, hayululika kumpoka.”
Napanelo Yesu àpagwite mulyutu limo ashwali; painwike, nkwóda wake jumo andímwaulila kushidoni, “Nang'olo, tupundisha kushwali kenga mwavapundishididye Nshuwau vakwoda vake mo.”
Yesu kushidoni, “Mukalota kushwali, kaashidoni, “ ‘Atata, lina lyako liilimyangike. Utawala wako wide.
Tupa shakulya shetu shanelo.
Tulivaliva madambi etu mwaa nawetu tunánnivaliva woewoe átutagela. Haunatulangalalele mukutubigwa.’ ”
Nae kavili kushidoni, “Tuke tulole, munu jumo pakati penu kuvanavo mbwadigwe; napanelo munu aju kumuukila mbwadigwe ajo shilo shing'ati ndamwaulila doni, ‘Nyagwe, ngukapesha magung'u matatu
mwaa aninguwikila njeni kwing'ande kwangu na nangu hanguvenavo shakulya shakumupa,’

kutwala mbwadigwe jo kunjang'ula àvele mo nng'ande doni, ‘Haunangudingadinge. Nangu ing'ande ndijela nkong'o. Panguvele apa ndilala na vanavangu; hanguulula kutakatuka kwida ndakupa magung'u lo.’ Dashi inkuululika kunjang'ula davo?
Mene, ninkumwaulila doni, ata akanatakatuke kuka ndamupa mwaa wakuva mbwadigwe kanji mwaa wakulota hanapate dyoni, andatakatuka kuka ndamupa kula shinu shalota.
“Napavedoni nangu ninkumwaulila doni, “Jugwa mundapata, lambela mundona, taa odi mundapita;
kula munu ájugwa anápata, álambela anóna na átaa odi, anápita.
Da tatamunu shani apa, ánatenda mwanagwe akanjugwa ligung'u nae kumupa lijanga, akanjugwa yomba nae kumupa nyoka
kwali akanjugwa lii nae kumupa shinila?
Bai ikava kenga mwenu mmanu mmakalau munkumanya kujaula vinu vyambone kuvapa vanavenu, Atata nimpomo nae kuwa ko, ananjaula Imumu Wanashwe kuvapa avalá vanjúgwa.”
Napanelo Yesu anínkumulanga lijini bubu mumili mwamunu jumo. Lijini jo paumile bubu kutunduvanga kutangola, imbumba yavanu ni kushanga doni.
Kanji vanu vanji pakati pave kushidoni, “Aju ankukumulanga majini kwalilamulo limwe Beelishebuli nang'olo wave majini.”
Vanji pakulota kunninga vanínjugwa alodye shimanyikilo shakwalakela kuwa.
Kanji Yesu amanya makumbukililo ave, andívaulila kushidoni, “Shilambo shoeshoe shavabyaananga shivenevene, shinábamoka na valikola vapwatána shivenevene, likola lyave linátimbikanga.
Shatwani akalitenda ing'ondo jo mwene, utawala wake ulota kuka dashi mushu? Ninkutangola davo mwaa mwenu po munkushidoni nangu ninkukumulanga majini kwalilamulo limwe Beelishebuli!
Kanji napane ikava kenga nangu ninkukumulanga majini kwalilamulo limwe Beelishebuli, kushi vakwoda venu vankukumulanga kwalilamulo limwe nyani? Ikava davo mwenu vovo vo, vandava vakuukumu venu.
Kanji ikava kenga nangu ninkukumulanga majini kwadimongo dyake Nnungu, bai utawala wa Nnungu unimpata bai.
Munu wadimongo, wakulipanganianga shana na mabyanilo ake, akalaledya vinu vyapaing'ande pake; vinu avyo, vipagwa mu amani.
Kanji akamwidila munu junji wadimongo wakumpunda nae antenda ing'ondo antema, anámpoka mabyanilo ashilikulupilila na kunteka mateka.
Nadoni woewoe ákalyunganienge namu nangu, ankunguvangedya na woewoe ákakungaila namu nangu, ankumwadila.
“Mwenu, lijini nshapu akauma mumili mwamunu, anápita adumbadumba kushimbweshe alambela pashinu pakwikala. Akanakodya aashidoni, ‘Leka nguujile kwing'ande yangu kwangumile.’
Pawika, anákodya ing'ande yo vàpyailenge na vinu vàvikenge shana;

nae kuja kuka ndavashema majini anji saba akumamodya kubanga kumpunda nae. Vanavo kuka ndamwinjila munu ajo kwikalanga kutwala shinamilo shamunu aju muwakati awo, kuva shakumamodya kunyata kupunda shitandi.”
Bai nae akatangole malove ala, nkongwe jumo wamwimbumba kutangola namene kushidoni, “Andijaligwa nkongwe ákuvaleke na kukujang'edya.”
Kanji Yesu kushidoni, “Vamamodye namene kujaligwa avalá vaigwilíla lilove lya Nnungu na kuvikila kuntima.”

Napanelo imbumba nnyenje mwake Yesu ishindaanjadyeka kutwala nae kavili kushidoni, “Vanu vaimbula ai vakalau. Ashii vajugwa shimanyikilo shakwalakela kuwa! Kanji havona shimanyikilo ila shimwe Janashi bai.
Mo mwavalalele Janashi shimanyikilo kwavanenive, nanae Mwana Wamunu andava shimanyikilo kwavanu vaimbula ai.

Paukumu umu nkongwe wakwina shilambo andatakatuka pakati pavanu ava kuvavalanganga kenga vankuvanavo makosha. Nae andyáloka kushinu kushu kwida ndaigwilila mapundisho ake Shalomoni kanji mwenu, ápagwite apa aju ni nang'olo namene kumpunda Shalomoni.

Vanenive yadavo paukumu vandatakatuka pakati pavanu vaimbula ai kutwala kuvaukumu mwaa pavaigwite kuvalanganga kwantenga kumwe Janashi vanavo vandíjugulanga. Mwenu, ápagwite apa aju ni nang'olo namene kumpunda Janashi.
“Hapali munu ánatenda akakaledya itaa kwinikidya kwali kuvika pashinu pakulipiya kanji avika pashinu pakwaneka kwambangidya vanu vainjila nng'ande mo vone kulangala.
Kwaupande wenu mwenu, liu ni itaa iinjídya lilangadyo mumili wenu. Liu likanava lingumi, mili uti undávanavo shii; likava lingumi, mili uti undávanavao lilangadyo.
Napavedoni lalyanga shana ikava kenga lilangadyo livéle mumili wenu halinava shinu shii.
Ikava kenga mili wenu uti unkuvanavo lilangadyo paukavanavo shii nkono unji, popo po mili awo uti undávanavo lilangadyo kenga painammulikila mwenu itaa lilangadyo lyake.”
Napanelo Yesu akuno atangola kwaloka mpalishayo jumo kunnalika kwing'ande kwake akalye shakulya. Nae kuka kwinjila nng'ande kwikala pandamu.
Mpalishayo kutwala kushanga namene mwaa wakumwona Yesu pakanavanga medi pandamu paikéle.
Kanji Umu kushidoni, “Mwenu mmapalishayo muukanga diwene na midamu panda gweka kanji nkati mo mundyumbalanga kushonda na ukalau.
Mmanu mmakupuwanikanga davo mwe! Da ákandyenge panda havele jojo ákandyenge nkati?
Laledya shana vinu vyammitima vyenu kenga mo mwamunanaliyangidya shadaka shakuvapa vamashikini, mundona mwiu mundava mmakutakata.

“Mupambale mwenu mmapalishayo! Mwenu mumya likumi lyavinu uti vyakulunganga dimbogwa kuleka linagwaledyo kwa Nnungu na kutandedya vyaishaliya. Kudyanga pamukatandadidye vinu avi pamukailudyanga vinji.
Mupambale mwenu mmapalishayo! Mwenu múnagwaledya kwikala mumautu akulikwedya amuvitala vyakulipudidya na múnagwaledya namene kumuudyanga na ishima ing'umene muumbala.
Mupambale mwenu! Mwenu múvele kenga vyonga vigwalalidíle vanu kupita valuvatanga pashanya pavakamanya shipagwíte mulyutu alyo.”
Kutwala mwalimu jumo pakati pavamwalimu vadishaliya kushidoni, “Mwalimu, pautangola davo po nawetu unkutuliula.”
Yesu kushidoni, “Mupambale namwenu mmamwalimu vadishaliya! Mwenu múvalamulila vanu valitike vyambumba víkaululika kulitika, mmene pamukadabunya ata padiki.
Mupambale mwenu! Múpita muumbanga vyonga vyavakulava vavabyénge vanakuluvenu.
Mwenu ni mmashuda múungidile nkono vitendo vyavanakuluvenu; vanavo vandibyaa mwenu kuumbila vyonga.
Nimomo mwalitangaladile Limanyilo lya Nnungu doni, ‘Ndavapalakadyedya vakulava na vamyombe, vanji vandavabyaa vanji vo kuvapapata,’
kwambangidya vanu vaimbula ai vadaigwe myadi vyavakulava vyavajénge kutunduvangila kunantandi shilambo.

Vandadaigwa kutunduvangila myadi vimwe Abeli mpaka myadi vimwe Shakaliya wavamyaidile mwing'ande ya Nnungu pakatipakati akuno ku alutali ako kulyutu lya Nnungu. Ninkumwaulila ngala doni, myadi avyo Nnungu andavadai vanu vaimbula ai.
Mupambale mwenu mmamwalimu vadishaliya! Múpiidye mungulilo walimanyilo; mmene hamwinjidile na ata avalá váshilota kwinjila, mundivadivilila.”
Bai Yesu akamalile kutangola malove alo, vamwalimu vadishaliya namu mapalishayo vashinannyatila na vashinanshinya
vannumbata vapate nkanidyo kumili kwake.

Napanelo pavishitandeka vinu avyo, vanu makumi manga vandyúmbalanila mpaka kutadya kuluvatananga kutwala Yesu kuvashiliukila vakwoda vake kuvaulila kushidoni, “Lilaledye! Hamunapakalange nkukumuku wamapalishayo yani shinankulaba.
Hashipali shinu shavapiidye shilóta hashinaumilile kulangele na hashipali shinu shavagwadyagwadyenge shilóta hashinamanyike.
Shinu shoeshoe shaulota kutangalela pashii vanu vandaigwa mui liduva livala na shaulota kunyinyitila kushumba shindavalangangigwa panantutuvilo.
“Nangu mwenu mmavangu ninkumwaulila doni, hamunanjope munu ábyaa mili kutwala mene kuvanavo munji mwakuntandela
kanji ninkumwaulila nyani ávaikidile munjope; njope aijá ávenavo madalaka ánatenda akampedya munu kuntwala kunjela kushena. Mwiu jojo jo, njope!
Da vanu havanashumidya vyuni mwanu na dishingo mbili? Bai Nnungu vovo vo, hapali ata jumo wannivaliva.
Ata wo ugwimbu wammyuti vyenu wo, Nnungu andimanya ishabu yake. Mwenu hamunajope mwaa munkuvanavo mana makumene kupunda vyuni vyoe!
“Ninkumwaulila doni, munu woewoe álota kulivalanganga kuva wangu pamevo pavanu, Mwana Wamunu momo anammalanga kuva wake pamevo avanjelo vake Nnungu.
Kanji aijá álota kungukana pamevo avanu, nanangu nankana pamevo avanjelo vake Nnungu.
Munu álota kuntangola kunyata Mwana Wamunu, analivalivigwa; kanji álota kunkupulu Imumu Wanashwe, halivalivigwa ata padyoko vela.
Mwenu vakamuukanavo kuvitala vyakulipudidya, kwavakutawala na kwavamadalaka, hamunangaikange mulambela mwakulishililididya na mwakutangalela
mwaa muwakati wowo, Imumu Wanashwe anampundisha mwakutangalela.”
Napanelo munu jumo pakati paimbumba yavanu andímwaulila Yesu kushidoni, “Mwalimu, mwaulile nkulwangu angujavile vinu uti vyalakile atata papadile.”
Yesu kushidoni, “Wako! Da nangu angwalweté nyani kuva nkúukumu kwali nkújavanianga pakati penu?”
Kutwala kwaulila imbumba yavanu kushidoni, “Lilaledye! Lishunge kwaing'ano yaliu mwaa shingumi shamunu hashivele muumbala wavinu.”
Akavakang'ela apalá nkong'o au, “Munu jumo ntajili andílagwedya namene mulyala lyake.
Nae, ‘Nduu, ngutandelé mwashi? Ngutae pashi vilyo vyangu?’
Kutwala kushidoni, ‘Idavo, ndimanya mwakutandela. Ndaadulanga makuta angu ala, ngudenge anji makumene ngutae vilyo uti na vinji vyangu vyambone.
Ling'oto ndaulila ungumi wangu doni, “Wako Ungumi! Napanelo undivanavo vyambone vyakutosha kutumila vyaka vyoe. Napavedoni pumula, lyaa, kumbila na puwanga.” ’
Kanji Nnungu kushidoni, ‘Wako undipungukanga! Shilo sho shanelo ashi ndakupoka ungumi wako! Panikupoka po, kushi vinu vyaukandyenge vyo, vyanyamani?’
Shinu ashi shinkulandananga na munu álikungailila mali kanji akavele ntajili pamevo a Nnungu.”
Yesu kutwala kuvaulila vakwoda vake kushidoni, “Hamunaangaikangile shingumi shenu kwa ashilá shamulota kulya na ata mili vyenu kwa ashilá shakulota kugwadya.
Mwaa shingumi ni shinu shikumene kupunda shakulya na mili ni shinu shamana kupunda dinguvo.
Valole shana vanashove vo; vanavo havanapanda ata havananang'ena, havavenavo makuta ata vidimbi kanji Nnungu ankuvalisha. Kushi mwenu, hamuvenavo mana makumene kupunda vyuni?
Apali munu pakati penu ánaulula kwangangola kula shinu, ávele tayali kwanjadyedya padyoko vela shingumi shake?
Ikava kenga vinu vidikidiki nyenda avi vinkunnema kutandedya, mwaa shani munkwangaikangila vinji?
Lola shana maukutu adinduva mwakulumukila mo; vyanavo havinakola madengo, havinalikandyangidya dinguvo kanji ninkumwaulila doni, Shalomoni na lishangelo lyake uti hagwalidile kupunda vyanavo.
Kanji ikava kenga Nnungu ankunemya maukutu amadíle mumwitu alindíla muliduva lyake kujalegwa pamoto; kushi mwenu, mmanu mmalikulupililo lidikidiki, Nnungu annemya kupunda apo?
Mwenu hamunalambele shakulya na ata shakukumbila. Hamunajugulange.
Venentete uti vamushilambo vankwangaika valambela vinu avyo namwenu momo Tatagwenu andimanya kenga vinu avyo, munkulota.
Shitandi kanji angaikangila utawala wa Nnungu; vinu avyo uti momo Nnungu andamupa.
“Hamunajope mwenu mmakwoda vangu mwaa Tatagwetu ininnagwela kumupa utawala wake.
Shulushanga uti vyamuvenavo njuluku wo, muvape vamashikini! Likandyangidye mapeta ákapapukanga na mali ákapunguka kuwa; kwanavo nkwíva hanapita na ushwa haupali.
Po panapagwa mali enu, ntima wenu upagwa popo.
“Likunjangile dinguvo dyenu na kaledya ditaa dyenu.
Tenda kenga mwavanatandela vanu vánaikala mevo vannindila nang'olo wave áukile kushikukulu shashitamo pakulota pauja ako kutaa kwene odi, vanavo vanshimulilinneu.
Vandijaligwa vatumika avo valóta kuvakodya nang'olo wave vàvele mevo pauja. Nangu ninkumwaulila mwiu doni, nae andagwalangila pakulota avatumike kutwala kuvaikadyanga pandamu kwida ndavatumika.
Nang'olo wave akawika shilo shing'ati kwali kumatingatinga, vandijaligwa vatumika avo valota kuvakodya vàvele mevo!
Manya doni, tatamunu mwene ing'ande leka àmanyite wakati walota kwida nkwíva, akananneke nkwíva ajo atema ing'ande.
Nadoni ikalanga mevo mwaa Mwana Wamunu andaida shingangala.”
Kutwala Patulu kumudya, “Nang'olo, nkong'o au utukang'alele wetu gweka kwali watuvanu uti?”
Umu kushidoni, “Da wakwashi wavankamudidye wakukulupilika na wading'ano wammikile nang'olo wake kuva nanangalaledi wapaing'ande pake wakuvapa vamadengomwagwe shakulya muwakati uvaikidíle?
Andijaligwa ntumika walota kunkodya nang'olo paida atandedya momo.
Ninkumwaulila mwiu doni jojo jo, nang'olo anammika kuva munu wakulaledya vyake uti.
Kanji ntumika jojo akaashidoni, ‘Nang'olo wangu ankutima kuja,’ kutwala kuvakamanga vatumikamwagwe valume na vakongwe, kutunduvanga kulyanga gwamba na kwambalwa,
nang'olo wake ntumika jo andaida muliduva na muwakati wakalindila kutwala kumupa shaushanga shikumene ampambanianga mushipinga shavanu vákakulupila.
“Napanelo ntumika ámanyite malotelo anang'olo wake kanji aikala vila na pakatandedya vilotéka, vananshapa viboko vyoe namene.

Kanji aijá ákashimanya malotelo anang'olo wake kanji akowa likosha livaikidíle vanshape, vananshapa viboko padyoko. Nadoni munu woewoe wavampele vinu vyoe, vanandai vyoe na wavankamudidye vinu vyoe, vanandai vyakupunda apo.
“Nangu ngwidilé ndakong'a moto mushilambo shapai. Kwalala dashi kwona moto awo utumbulwike tayali!
Ninkuvanavo ubatisho unguvaikidíle ngubatishwe, napane kutumbula dashi vingushanona muntima ata mpaka utandeke.
Da mwenu mwona kenga nangu ngwidinavo amani mushilambo? Um! Mene, ninkumwaulila ngala doni, ngwidinavo umongo.
Kutunduvangila ambi apa, vanu mwanu vapaing'ande imo vandaapukananga, vatatu vandaungana kuvilingananganavo vavili na vavili vandaungana kuvilingananganavo vatatu.
Tatamunu na mwanagwe nnume vandavilingananga, jujumunu na mwanagwe nkongwe vandavilingananga, navyalamunu na navyalagwe vandavilingananga.”
Kutwala momo kwaulila imbumba yavanu kushidoni, “Pamunona lyundi lyalakela kwalyenda liduva lidimbya mwenu mutangalenneu kushidoni ‘Andatonya medi,’ namwiu kutonya.
Namomo pamunona imepo yakwalakela kwina shilambo ipunga mwenu muushidoni, ‘lilota kwida litukuta,’ namwiu kutandakela momo.
Mmanu mmashinankulaba mwe! Mwenu munkumanya kwaulangila vimanyikilo vyamushilambo na vyakuwa kanji mwaa shani hamunaulula shinu kwaulangila wakati au watuvele?
“Mwaa shani hamunaamuwa shinu mwemwe mmene avilá vivaikidíle kutenda?

Akuno uka namu waukashenienavo kumwe nkútawala, likanyalidye kwigwanianavo shing'ati indila. Ikanava davo andakuutangidya kumwe nkúukumu, nkúukumu jo kukuwisha kumwe nkúshunga na nkúshunga kukujela nkalaboshi.
Ninkukumanyiya ngala doni, nkalaboshi amo hauma ng'odo paukanava kulipanga njuluku mpaka idoshi.”
Muwakati wowo, vandípagwa vanu vammalangangidíle Yesu ing'ano yavagalileya; vagalileya avo Pilatu andívabyaa vatenda shadaka shakutaa moto, myadi vyavo kwanganikana namu myadi vyavanyama vashadaka.
Kutwala Yesu kushidoni, “Da mwenu mwona kenga vagalileya avo pakupela davo vavele vakutega kuvapunda vagalileya vanji uti?
Bai mene! Kanji mwenu mukanalijugulanga madambi enu mundapalela mo mwavapalalele vanavo.
Ata avalá vanu kumi na nane livagwalaléle libodo lya ku Shilowamu kutwala kupalanga, mwona kenga vavele vakutega vakumamodya kuvapunda vayelusalemu vanji uti?
Bai mene! Kanji mwenu mukanalijugulanga madambi enu mundapalela mo mwavapalalele vanavo.”
Kutwala kulunda kukong'a nkong'o au, “Undípagwa nkungu wapandíle munu jumo mulishamba lyake lyamilandi vyavyepo; paukile ndalola vyepo, hakadidye shepo ata shimo.
Nae kumwaulila munu áshilaledya lyala alyo kushidoni, ‘Wako, ndiilanianga vyaka vitatu ngwida ndalola vyepo munnandi au kanji hangunakodya. Lumula. Mwaa shani udive lyutu muulongo amu?’
Nkúlaledya kushidoni, ‘Nang'olo lindila mwaka au yadavo pakulota nangu ngwimbange nanyenje yake ngutaange mboleya.
Ukapa vyepo, mwambone kanji ukanapa, undalamulila valumule.’ ”
Muliduva limo lyakupumula, Yesu andípagwa apundisha mushitala shakulipudidya.
Mwe! Mo mushitala mo kupagwa nkongwe avénavo lijini lyauwíle vyaka kumi na nane ákashuuduka.
Yesu akamwone anínshema kutwala kushidoni, “Namwana, undyambolegwa mushilwele shako!”
Anímmikila makono, nkongwe jo kuudukinneu kutwala kumupa lishangelo Nnungu.

Nanangalaledi wamushitala ashanga mwaa wakuponia Yesu muliduva lyakupumula, nae andyáulila imbumba yavanu kushidoni, “Apali maduva sita avaikidíle kukola madengo; mumaduva lolo lo, idananga vamponie kanji muliduva lyakupumula ali, um, mene.”
Umu kutwala kushidoni, “Mmanu mmashinankulaba mwe! Apali munu pakati penu ákananshimulila ng'ombe wake kwali punda wake muliduva lyakupumula kuka nankumbidya medi?
Kushi nkongwe aju mwanagwe Abulaamu wamuungile Shatwani vyaka kumi na nane, haimmaikidile kumwambola mukungwa muliduva lyakupumula?”
Yesu akatangole doni, andívataa dyoni vamongo vake uti kanji venentete vandípuwanga mwaa wavitendo vyalishangelo vyashitandedya nae.
Kutwala Yesu kavili kushidoni, “Utawala wa Nnungu ngulandaniange na nyamani na uvelé mwanyamani?
Uvelé mwaimbeju yanshupi yapandile munu mulyala lyake; yanavo kumela, kukulumuka, kulijava dinavi kutwala vyuni vyakuniania kudenga vyanda mudinavi dyake.”
Kavili kushidoni, “Utawala wa Nnungu ngulinganiange na nyamani?
Uvelé mwankukumuku watwete nkongwe jumo kutaa mudipishi nnatu dyaunga kutwala unga uti kukukumuka.”
Yesu andyúka mushu na shimwanda sha ku Yelusalemu apita atanela mmakaja makumene na madikidiki apundisha.
Kutwala munu jumo kumudya Yesu kushidoni, “Da nang'olo, vanu vakupwashegwa valota kuva padyoko?” Nae kushidoni,
“Likanyilidye kwambangidya mwinjilile pannango udikidiki mwaa ninkumwaulila doni, vanu voe vandalota vainjile kanji havaulula.

Tatamunu mwene ing'ande palota kutakatuka kushima nnango, mwenu mundapagwa panda na mundatunduvanga kutaa odi muushidoni, ‘Nang'olo, nang'olo, tushimulila!’ Nae ananjang'ula doni, ‘Nangu mwenu hanimmanyite kwamwaloka.’
Kutwala mwenu kulingangila kushidoni, ‘Shasho! Wetu tundilya na kukumbila shalumo namu wako na kavili gwegwe undipita upundisha mudyengo dyetu.’
Kanji nae andatangola doni, ‘Ngwigwa, nangu hanimmanyite kwamwaloka! Ngunyema apa mwenu uti mútenda vinu vyakunyata.’
Pamumwona Abulaamu, Ishaki, Yakobo namu vakulava uti vàvele kuutawala wa Nnungu, mwenu vàngang'aladidye panda, popo po mundalila na mundatuka shulu.
Vandaaloka vanu kwalyuma liduva, kwalyuka liduva, kushanya na kwina shilambo kutwala kupata mautu pandamu muutawala wa Nnungu.
Igwa shana, pakati pavamwisho vanji vandava vatandi na pakati pavatandi vanji vandava vamwisho.”
Muwakati wowo atangola vandíwika mapalishayo kumwaulila kushidoni, “Tila uke! Mwaa Elode ankukupapata akubyae.”
Yesu kushidoni, “Wena mukamwaulile nansheto ajo doni, ‘Nangu apa, nelo na lunduno ninkukumulanga majini na kuvaponia valwele; ntondo kwinuka.
Kanji ata ikava davo ininguvaikila nelo, lunduno mpaka ntondo nguwene nguka ku Yelusalemu mwaa nkúlava haimmaikidile apalele panda Yelusalemu.’

Boo, Yelusalemu! Yelusalemu! Wako úvabyaanga vakulava na úvaamanga majanga avalá vavakutumididya! Dimindi dyoe ndilingangila kuvautamila vanavako kenga mwanavautamililila ng'uku vanavake kanji mwenu mene kulota.
Lola, ing'ande yenu indava lidembe na nangu ninkumwaulila doni, hamungwona kavili mpaka muwakati wamulota kutangola doni, ‘Aalaligwe aijá áida palina limwe Umu.’ ”
Napanelo muliduva limo lyakupumula, Yesu akauke kwing'ande yanang'olo wamapalishayo ndalya shakulya, vanavo vashinannaledya pepi-pepi.
Mwe! Popo po, kuwika mushu mwake Yesu munu jumo avénavo shilwele shakuvimbanga mili.
Kutwala Yesu kuvaudya vamwalimu vadishaliya namu mapalishayo kushidoni, “Lipali lilamulo lyakumponia munu muliduva lyakupumula?”
Vanavo kumalalanga. Yesu kunkamula munu aijá kumponia kutwala kumwaulila auke.
Yesu kuvaudya kavili, “Apali munu pakati penu álota kunneka pakamumya ng'ombe wake kwali punda wake àgwilidile mulipondo muliduva lyakupumula?”
Vanu uti do, vii.
Napanelo Yesu akavone vakulalikigwa vanji vatandola mautu akulitandya, nae andívakang'ela nkong'o aashidoni,
“Munu akakulalika kushikukulu, haunaikale mulyutu lyakulitandya mwaa inkuululika kulalikigwa munu junji waishima wakukupunda wako.
Kutwala mwene ánnalike mwenu mmanu mmavili kwida ndakwaulila wako po doni, ‘Tumuka apo umpishe aju!’ Undaumila kudyoni kuka ndaikala kunyuma-uti.

Kanji vakakulalika, ikala lyutu lyakunyuma-uti kwambangidya mwene ákulalike paida po, akwaulile doni, ‘Nyangu, apa tumuka ukaikale mushu amulá.’ Davo po wako undapata lishangelo pamevo avanu uti valota kupagwa mulyutu alyo.
Mwaa, munu woewoe álitumbudya vanantaa dyoni na aijá álijandya vanantumbudya.”

Kutwala kumwaulila aijá mwene ánnalike ndalya shakulya kushidoni, “Ukapanganianga shakulya kwali shikukulu, haunavalalike vabwadivako, vanung'unuvako kwali vakuluvako, valikola vako na ata vavavo vatajili; mwaa inkuululika vanavo kukuujidya vilava kutwala nshala wako kuva wowo.
Kanji ukapanganianga shikukulu, valalike vamashikini, vakulamala, vákalola,
undona undajaligwa mwaa vanavo havavenavo shakukuujidya vilava. Wako vandakulipa muliduva lyakudyuka vaishaliya.”
Napanelo munu jumo aikéle namu Yesu akaigwe malove alo, nae kushidoni, “Andijaligwa munu álota kupata lyutu pandamu muutawala wa Nnungu.”
Kanji Yesu kushidoni, “Munu jumo andítenda shikukulu kutwala kuvalalika vanu voe namene.
Paliwikile liduva lyakulya shikukulu, nae kuntuma ntumika wake auke akavaulile vakulalikigwa kushidoni, ‘Vinu akulá uti vivele tayali, tuke!’
Vanavo kula munu kutangola shake. Ntandi aju kushidoni, ‘Nangu ndishuma inundu ngulota nguke ndikalole; ninkujugwa samani!’
Junji kushidoni, ‘Nangu ngushumilé ambi apa ding'ombe mwanu ngulota nguke ndikavalingangile kulima; ninkujugwa samani!’
Kutwala junji kavili kushidoni, ‘Nangu ngulombilé ambi apa, ako hangwida.’

Ntumika kuja, kummalangangila nang'olo wake malove ala uti; tatamunu mwene ing'ande jo àshimwidye andímwaulila ntumika wake kushidoni, ‘Uma shipajelo upite uwena mudibalabala na mudindila dyapalikaja upita uvatwalanga vamashikini, vakulamala namu vákalola uvaidenavo.’
Ntumika kuja kumwaulila nang'olo wake kushidoni, ‘Nangu vyaungutumile vyo, nditandedya kanji mautu andiijalila.’
Nang'olo kumwaulila kavili ntumika wake kushidoni, ‘Wena mudibalabala na mudindila dyanyenje likaja upite uvakamulanga vanu uvaidenavo vaumbalanile
mwaa nangu ninkumwaulila doni, vanu vatuvalalike avalá hapali álota kwida ndalya shikukulu ashi.’ ”
Napanelo Yesu, imbumba yavanu ipita impalakela, nae andíshiliuka kwaulila doni,

“Munu akaida kwangu alota kungwoda nangu kanji akanamwiludyanga tatake, anyoke, ndyagwe, vanavake, vakuluvake kwali vanung'unuvake, valumbuvake na ata kwiludyanga shingumi shake, hava shinu nkwóda wangu.
Namomo munu ákanyukata nshalaba wake kutwala kungwoda, hava shinu nkwóda wangu.
Da nyani pakati penu akalota kudenga, ákanaikala shitandi kukumbukila vyalota kutumila pakulota amanye kenga vindatosha kwali mene?
Akanatenda davo, po palota kutunduvanga kudenga, akanamalila vanu uti pavamwona vandamweka
vaashidoni, ‘Munu aju andítunduvanga shana kudenga kanji gwo, mwenu, atatakadile.’

Da umu shani ánatenda akalota kuntenda ing'ondo umumwagwe ávenavo vaing'ondo voe vakuwikila dyalupu ishilini vakuvapunda vake dyalupu kumi, ákanaikala shitandi kulalyanga shipinga shake akanava kuka kwing'ondo?
Akalalyanga, aanalela vyakunanopa, vamongo vàvele kushu avatuminneu vadyoko vake kuka ndapakanila ipagwe amani.
Napavedoni munu woewoe pakati penu ákalota kuleka vinu vyavenavo uti, hava shinu nkwóda wangu.
Munyu wo, wambone. Kanji wo munyu ukadalala ulota kutakila nyamani?
Wanavo haunamanyikanga muulongo na ata kwakutenda mboleya, vatwala vila kujaa bai. Aijá ávenavo matu, aigwe.”
Napanelo vakukatisha-ukodi uti namu vanu vanji vakutega vandímuukila valota vamwigwilile.
Kanji mapalishayo pamo namu vamwalimu vadishaliya kuntangadikanga vaashidoni, “Kumanya dashi, munu aju kuvapwashalela vakutega na kulyanavo!”
Nadoni Yesu andívakang'ela nkong'o au,
“Apali munu pakati penu ávenavo dingandolo miya álota kutenda akanjaika jumo mene kuvaleka tisini na tisa mwilanga kutwala kupita annambela jumo ájaike mpaka kumpata?
Akampata, anantwala kunnyukata palivala na lipuwilo lyoe namene.
Pawika kukaja kuvashema vabwadivake na vavagwe vavandikanengenavo kutwala kuvaulila doni, ‘Puwanga namu nangu mwaa ngandolo wangu e ajaíke, ndimwona.’
Kulandana na shitendo asho ninkumwaulila doni, kuwa lindapagwa lipuwilo lyoe mwaa wankútega jumo álijugulanga madambi ake kuliko vaishaliya tisini na tisa vákalota kulijugulanga.
“Kwali nkongwe shani ávenavo dishingo kumi álota kutenda ikanjaika imo mene kukaledya itaa kutwala shipyai kupyaila uti nng'ande alambela shanashana mpaka kwona?
Akona, andavashema vabwadivake vakongwe na vanu vavandikanengenavo kutwala kushidoni, ‘Puwanga namu nangu mwaa ishingo yangu ingujaíke, ndilakota.’
Kulandana na shitendo asho ninkumwaulila doni, kwavanjelo vake Nnungu lindapagwa lipuwilo lyoe namene mwaa wankútega jumo álijugulanga madambi ake.”
Kutwala kavili kushidoni, “Munu jumo andívanavo vanavake vavili.
Ndyoko aju andímwaulila tatake kushidoni, ‘Atata, ngupa lipungu lyangu lyamali lyangushilota ngupate paulota kupela!’ Tatamunu kuvajavanidya uti vavili.
Akapite maduva padyoko, ndyoko aju kukunga vyake uti kuma kuka kushilambo shakushu namene. Koko ko, nae andíjanga vinu uti vyavénavo mushinamilo shaupuju.
Akajange uti vyavénavo, mushilambo asho kuumilila indala ing'umene namene, ndyoko kutunduvanga kuvauvanga.
Nae kumuukila munu jumo mwene shilambo asho; munu ajo kumwaulila ndyoko jo auke akanshungile dinguluve dyake kwilanga.
Ndyoko aju ashindavanavo malotelo akulya shakulya shakukalala shavashilya vanguluve kwilanga kanji hashuluula na yadavo hapali munu áshimwing'a shinu shoeshoe.
Ndyoko padimwidile ding'ano kutwala kushidoni, ‘Atata ankuvanavo vamadengo voe vashibalugwa valya mpaka kwikuta; kushi nangu apa ngupalela eshi?
Kudyanga ngume nimuukile atata ndikamwaulile doni, “Atata, nangu nditega kuwa na nditega kwako.
Nadoni hanguvaikidile kungushema nimwanavo kanji nguvika mulikundi lyavamadengo vako vashibalugwa.”
“Nae kutakatuka kuujila kwatatake. Akanava kuwika paing'ande àvele mwakushu padyoko, tatake kumwona. Akamwone, tatamunu andímwanangila shididi kutwala kutukuta kuka ndamwambatila.
Mwana kumwaulila tatamunu kushidoni, ‘Atata, nangu nditega kuwa na nditega kwako. Nadoni hanguvaikidile kungushema nimwanavo.’
Kanji tatamunu kuvaulila vatumika vake kushidoni, ‘Idanavo shipajelo dinguvo dyamana, ipete na vilatu mungwadye.
Namomo ntwale mbudi nannume na wakunyeta shanashana munshinde tummamene, tupuwange;
jo mwanangu aju, andípela kanji andídyuka, andíjaika kanji andyaneka.’ Bai vanavo vandítunduvanga kupuwanga.
“Napanelo mwanagwe nang'olo avele kumala. Auja àvele pepi na paing'ande, andígwa mwimbo na magoma.
Nae kunshema ntumika jumo kumudya nyamani shíshitandeka pakaja.
Ndyoko kushidoni, ‘Nung'uno jo, andyuja. Nadoni tatako aninshinda mbudi wakunyeta shanashana mwaa mwanagwe andyuja àvele mumi.’
Bai mwana nang'olo andíshimwa na hashindaita kuwika paing'ande. Tatamunu kuma kuka nampambadyanga
kanji mwana anínjang'ula tatake doni, ‘Shasho! Nangu ndikutumika vyaka vyoe pandikapujungula mwiko lilamulo lyako, wako haungupele ata liduva limo mbudi wakuka nammamena na vavangu tupuwanga.
Nelo apa pauja mwanavo aju, munu ámalilidile vyako kumalaja, wako unshindila mbudi nannume na wakunyeta!’
Kutwala tatamunu kushidoni, ‘Mwanangu! Wako ngwengwe upali namu nangu na vinu vyangu uti, vyàko.
Apa, hampagwite munji! Indívaikila wetu tupuwange; nung'uno aju, andípela kanji mumi, andíjaika kanji andyaneka.’ ”

Namomo Yesu andívaulila vakwoda vake kushidoni, “Andípagwa munu jumo ntajili namene avénavo munu jumo wankamudídye vinu vyake. Napanelo ntajili jo, vandímwaulila kushidoni, ‘Munu wako jo, vyako kujaanga.’
Nae kunshema wankamudidye aijá kumudya, ‘Da vyandikwigwanga avi kushidashi? Ngupa ishabu yakushunga kwako mwaa wako hauva shinu kavili wakukamulila vyangu.’
Wankamudidye aijá do nduu, ‘Ngutandelé mwashi? Nang'olo wangu ankungumya mukushunga; kulima hanguulula, kupita ngujugwajugwa ngwona dyoni!
Idavo, ndimanya shakutenda pakulota vakangumya mukushunga ngupate pakuwikila.’
Nae kuvashema jumo-jumo vanu vavénavo madeni kwanang'olo wake kutwala kumudya ntandi, ‘Wako nang'olo wangu akudai nyamani?’
Munu jo kushidoni, ‘Mangandingo miya amauta akulya.’ Mmádengo kutwala kushidoni, ‘Twala sheti shako shaudeni, shipajelo wandike amusini.’
Kumudya junji, ‘Wako akudai nyamani?’ Nae kushidoni, ‘Maguni miya angano.’ Mmádengo kushidoni, ‘Twala sheti shako wandike samanini.’

Kutwala nang'olo aijá kuntumbyanga wankamudidye aijá waungave-shaliya mwaa waujanja wake. Bai amu ni momo, vanu vawakati au vankuvanavo ujanja washinamidyo shave kuvapunda vanu valilangadyo mushinamidyo shave.
“Nangu ninkumwaulila doni, panga dimbodi kuwa mutumila mali aungave-ishaliya pakulota mushu mo akamalilika, vanavo kuwa ko, vampwashalele.
Ánakulupilika muvinu vidikidiki anákulupilika muvinu vikumene; waungave-ishaliya muvinu vidikidiki hanava waishaliya muvinu vikumene.
Shapo pakushi mwenu hamunakulupilika shinu mumali aungave-ishaliya, nyani álota kunkulupila muumwiu?
Ikava kenga hamunakulupilika shinu muvinu víkave vyenu, nyani álota kumupa vyenu mmene?
Hapali ntumika áulula kuvatumikila vanang'olo vavili, inkuululika kunnyatila jumo kunnagwaledya junji kwali kuntumbyanga jumo kumwiludyanga junji. Hayululika kuntumika Nnungu na kutumikila mali.”
Bai mapalishayo vanu vakunagwaledya njuluku pavaigwite malove ala, vandímwiludyanga.
Yesu kutwala kushidoni, “Mwenu ni mmanu múlivika kuva vaishaliya kwavanu kanji Nnungu andimanya mitima vyenu. Vinu vyavona vanu kuva vyamana, Nnungu pake po ona kuva vyakudabukanga.
Lilamulo na Vakulava vindyaloka vitawala mpaka wakati umwe Nshuwau. Kutunduvangila apo, ntenga wambone wautawala wa Nnungu unkuvalangangigwa na kula munu álikanyilidya ankwinjila.
Mwenu kanji shinu shíkakamadyenge ni kulambaleka kuwa na pai kuliko kulambaleka lumbalukila lwa Lilamulo.
“Kula munu ánneka ndyange kutwala kunnomba nkongwe junji munu aju ankulavalava; ata aijá ánnomba nkongwe wavannakile ankulavalava.
“Andípagwa munu jumo ntajli áshigwalanga dinguvo dyamana; munu aju kula liduva ashindalya na ashindaikuta go-go-go.
Pannango pake ashindapagwa munu mmashikini walina Lashalu wavilonda vyoe mumili.
Nae ashindalota alye dyangenga díshigwilangila pai pandamu wantajili, ata vang'avanga vashinannamba muvilonda.
Napanelo mmashikini aju kupela, vanjelo vake Nnungu kuntwala kumuukanavo kumwe Abulaamu; nanae ntajili kupela kutwala kunshika.
Ntajili àvele kumoka andíng'amula mevo akuno auvauvanga kumwona Abulaamu kushu, Lashalu àvele namu nae.
Ntajili kutwala kushema, ‘Atata Abulaamu, ngwanangila shididi! Ntume Lashalu jo adabidye shala mmedi aide angudidimidye mululimi mwaa ninkupata mauvilo makumene namene mmoto mwanguvele amu.’

Kanji Abulaamu kushidoni, ‘Mwanangu, kumbukila mushingumi shako undipata vinu vyambone kenga momo Lashalu mushingumi shake kupata vyakunyata. Ambi apa Lashalu ankupagwa mukupambadyangigwa, wako kupagwa mumauvilo.
Tuleke apo, kwatuvele wetu na kwamuvele mwenu pakati apa pavele lipondo likumene namene líkaululika kupita munu wakuno kwida ako na wako kwida akuno.’
Ntajili kushidoni, ‘Ikava davo, bai ninkukujugwa untume auke kwing'ande imwe atata.
Ninkuvanavo vanung'unuvangu mwanu vangulota auke akavaumidye ushuda kwambangidya vanavo havanaide momo mulyutu ali lyamauvilo.’
Abulaamu kushidoni, ‘Ako apali Musha na Vakulava; valeke vaigwilile vyovyo vyo.’
Ntajili kushidoni, ‘Mene wako atata Abulaamu. Leka àukile munu ádyukile pavakupela ndatangonavo, vanavo vakandilijugulanga.’
Kanji Abulaamu kushidoni, ‘Vakanamwigwilila Musha na Vakulava ata pakaukile munu ádyukile pavakupela, havashambegwa.’ ”
Yesu kutwala kuvaulila vakwoda vake kushidoni, “Vyakunyata vitádya vanu kutega ngwengwe vindaumilila kanji apambale aijá álota kwidanavo vyakunyata avyo!
Kudyanga munu ajo kumuungangila lijanga lyakwidopa paukoti kunjela mwimanga kuliko kuntadya kunkuvadya ndyoko ata pakavele jumo pakati pavadyoko ava.
Shungana! Nung'unumunu akatega, ntangalele! Akalyambila, nnivalive.
Akakutagela dimindi saba muliduva limo lyolyo, jojo jo akwidila dimindi saba aashidoni, ‘Ninkulyambila,’ nnivalive.”
Vamyombe kutwala kumwaulila Umu kushidoni, “Twanjadyedya likulupililo!”
Umu kushidoni, “Leka mùvenavo likulupililo lidikidiki vela mwaimbeju yanshupi, mukanditangalela nnandi wankwedu kushidoni, ‘Bubuka apa uke ukalipandikile kwimanga,’ wanavo kumwigwilila.
“Wakwashi pakati penu ávenavo ntumika wake ánalimanga mala kwali ánashunga ding'ombe álota kutenda ntumika ajo akauja kundila kumwaulila doni, ‘Idinneu akuno tulye’?
Da shitandi hanamwaulila doni, ‘Ngukandyangidya shakulya, likunjangile, ngutumikila pangulya, nikaikuta ling'oto ulye wako’?
Da inkuululika nang'olo ajo kunnambwalela ntumika aju mwaa wakutandedya uti avilá vyantumile? Hayululika.
Ata namwenu momo, mukatandedya avilá vyavantuma tangola doni, ‘Wetu tuvatumika vila túkave pashinu tutandadidyé vyo vivaikidíle tutandedye avi bai.’ ”
Napanelo Yesu pashuka ku Yelusalemu andípita pakati-pakati vilambo avi: Shamaliya namu Galileya.
Akawike palikaja limo, vandímuukila vanu kumi vamalemba. Vanavo kwimilanga kushu
kutangola pashanya po vashema vaashidoni, “Yesu, Nang'olo, twanangila shididi.”
Yesu akavone, andívaulila doni, “Wenananga mukalilodye kwavakulangalalela-shadaka.” Bai vanavo vauka, mili vyave vyo, kutakata.
Napanelo munu jumo pakati pave akalyone mili wake kutakata, andyúja atangola pashanya po amupa lishangelo Nnungu.
Kutwala kugwilangila pamadodo pake Yesu annambwalela. Napanelo munu jojo jo, avele nshamaliya.
Yesu kutwala kumudya, “Da hamutakete mmanu kumi? Kushi mwanu na nsheshe vo vavelé kwashi?
Hapagwite ata jumo wakwida ndamupa lishangelo Nnungu ila jo mmidi aju bai?”
Kutwala kumwaulila doni, “Takatuka uke likulupililo lyako, lindikuposha.”
Napanelo mapalishayo vamudya liduva lilóta kuwika utawala wa Nnungu, nae kujang'ula, “Utawala wa Nnungu haunaida na vimanyikilo vyakwaneka
na ata hamwalota doni, ‘Au apa,’ kwali, ‘Aulá,’ mwaa wo utawala wa Nnungu wo, upali po pakati penu apa.”
Nae kutwala kuvaulila vakwoda vake kushidoni, “Unkwida wakati wamulota kunnagwela mwone kananga liduva limo vela pakati pamaduva a Mwana Wamunu kanji hamwona.
Vandamwaulila doni, ‘Alilá akulá,’ kwali ‘Ali apa,’ kanji hamunatumuke na hamunavode.
Mwaa mo mwamunanela kumeta kulangadya kuwa nkono au mpaka nkono unji, bai ni momo mwalota kuvalela Mwana Wamunu muliduva lyake.
Kanji shitandi inímmaikila auvauvange namene, aitigwe na vanu vaimbula ai.
“Mo mwavitandakalele mumaduva ake Noe, mumaduva ake Mwana Wamunu vindatandakela momo.
Mumaduva alo vanu vashindalya na vashindakumbila, vashindalombana na vashindaunga vitamo mpaka muliduva lyainjidile Noe mwingalava kutwala livambwe kwida kuvalya vanu uti.
Ilota kutandakela mo mwavitandakalele muwakati umwe Loti; vanu vashindalya na vashindakumbila, vashindashuma na vashindashulusha, vashindapanda na vashindadenga
kanji muliduva lyaumile Loti ku Shodoma, moto wakwalakela kuwa undíshuluka na lyoi lyakulakila lyoe momo lindíshuluka kutwala kuvalya vanu uti.
Muliduva lyalota kulilodya Mwana Wamunu ilota kutandakela momo.
Muliduva alyo munu akava panda, vinu vyake vìvele nng'ande, hanainjile kuka ndatwala na akava kumala, hanaujile kukaja.
Nkumbukile ndya Loti jo.
Munu woewoe álota kugambela kuukanavo mushu shingumi shake andakatoka na álota kukatoka shingumi shake andaukanavo mushu.
Ninkumwaulila doni, muliduva alyo vanu vavili vàlele paigoli imo, jumo vanantwala junji kunneka.
Vanu vavili vandapagwa vatipula, jumo vanantwala junji kunneka.”
Kutwala vanavo kumudya, “Nang'olo, vilota kutandakela kwashi?” Nae kushidoni, “Po paulota kupagwa ntui, malembo andaumbalanila popo.”
Napanelo nae andíkong'a nkong'o avamanyiya vakwoda vake vashwalye ngwengwe pavakaujila kunyuma
aashidoni, “Palikaja limo andípagwa nkúukumu ákashinjopa Nnungu na ákashimwishimu munu woewoe.
Palikaja lyolyo momo kupagwa nkongwe jumo namwili; nkongwe ajo ngwengwe ashindamuukila nkúukumu nankanyilidya aashidoni, ‘Ngupa ishaliya kumili kwamongo wangu.’
Nkúukumu andítwala wakati aita kumwangangola kanji mushu mwake andíkumbukila doni, ‘Ata ikava kenga nanjopa Nnungu na ata namwishimu munu
kanji mwaa nkongwe aju ankungudingadinga namene, ndamupa ishaliya pakulota hanangutimbange kwida kwaida ngwengwe aku.’ ”
Umu kavili kushidoni, “Dashi, mundigwa mwatandalele nkúukumu waungave-shaliya aju?
Kushi Nnungu vakutandalegwa vake vannamadikíla shilo na mui vo, havapa ishaliya? Mwona kenga andatimatimanga kwavanavo?
Ninkumwaulila ngala doni, nae andavapa ishaliya shipajelo kanji kushi Mwana Wamunu paida po, andakodya likulupililo mushilambo?”
Nae kavili kukong'a nkong'o avaulila vanu váshilikulupila vo vene valyona kuva vaishaliya vavailudyanga vanu vanji:
“Vanu vavili vandyúka kukushwali kwing'ande ya Nnungu. Jumo aju avele mpalishayo junji jo kuva nkúkatisha-ukodi.

Mpalishayo aju andíimila kutwala kushwali shintimatima doni, ‘Nnungu, ninkukulambwalela mwaa hanguvele kenga vanji; vakwiva, vakushonda, vaungave-ishaliya, vakulavalava na ata hanguvele kenga munu aju nkúkatisha-ukodi aju.
Ndáunga dimindi mbili mwishumana na ndákupa likumi lyavinu uti vyangupata.’
Kanji nkúkatisha-ukodi andíimila kushu na pakanyanyulila shilaka kuwa; nae ashindalikanyalanga pantima aashidoni, ‘Nnungu, ngwanangila shididi nangu ninkutega.’
Ninkumwaulila doni, nkúkatisha-ukodi jo andyúja kuka kukaja Nnungu àmpele ishaliya kanji mpalishayo jo, ng'odo. Mwenu, munu álitumbudya, Nnungu anantaa dyoni kanji álijandya, Nnngu anantumbudya.”
Vanu vashindavaukanavo vana vadikidiki kumwe Yesu pakulota avavikile makono; vakwoda vake vakavone vandívashulanga
kanji Yesu kuvashamela kutwala kushidoni, “Valeke vadyoko vaide, hamunavaleye mwaa utawala wa Nnungu wavanu vavéle mwavadyoko.
Ninkumwaulila mwiu doni, munu ákapwashalela utawala wa Nnungu kenga ndyoko, hainjila mwiko muutawala awo.”
Kutwala nkútawala jumo muyuda kumudya Yesu kushidoni, “Mwalimu Wambone, ngutandelé mwashi pakulota ngupate shingumi shíkamalilika?”
Yesu kumudya, “Mwaa shani ungushema wambone? Hapali wambone junji ni gweka Nnungu tu bai.
Wako undimanya malamulo ala: haunalavalave, haunabyae, haunaive, haunaumye ushuda waushwang'a na mwishimu tatako na anyoko.”
Nae kushidoni, “Nangu malamulo ala ngutandandidyé kutunduvangila kushidyoko shangu.”
Yesu paigwite malove alo andímwaulila doni, “Shindikwijalila shinu shimo. Shulusha vyauvenavo uti, njuluku wo uvajavile vamashikini; undavanavo mali kuwa na wide ungwode.”
Kanji nae paigwite davo andívanavo shipalodi namene mwaa avele ntajiili nkumene.
Yesu pangwene munu ajo kuvanavo shipalodi shoe andítangola kushidoni, “Pandikamadyanga namene ntajili kwinjila muutawala wa Nnungu.
Shíkakamadyenge ni kupaleta ngamila palilanga lyakashinji kuliko kwinjila ntajili muutawala wa Nnungu.”
Kutwala vanu vaigwíte malove ala kushidoni, “Ikava davo nyani álota kwambolegwa?”
Kanji Yesu kushidoni, “Shinu shákaulula munu, Nnungu ankuulula.”
Patulu kushidoni, “Lola, wetu apa tundileka vyetu uti kutwala kukwoda.”
Yesu kushidoni, “Nangu ninkumwaulila mwiu doni, munu áleka vyake kwali ndyagwe kwali vanung'unuvake na vakuluvake kwali tatake kwali vanavake mwaa wautawala wa Nnungu,
aju andapata vyoe muwakati au na muwakati wída, kupata shingumi shíkamalilika.”
Napanelo Yesu andívatwala avalá kumi na mbili kuvaulila kushidoni, “Mwenu, apa tunkwamboka kuka ku Yelusalemu; koko ko, vindatandeka vinu uti vyavaandike vakulava vimwámba Mwana Wamunu
kenga, vanankamudya kwavamidi kutwala vanavo kuntukananga, kumuvyanga, kunshunangila mata,
kunshapa viboko, vanampedya na muliduva lyantatu andadyuka.”
Kanji vamyombe havashimwigwa shana shashamba, mana amalove alo andílipiya; havashimanya shashilota kwamba Yesu.
Napanelo pavandike pa Yeliko, munu jumo wakuputala mevo andíikala nanyenje indila ajugwajugwa.
Nae akaigwe imbumba yavanu ipita, andyúdya víshitandeka
kutwala vanu kumwaulila doni, “Yesu wa ku Nashaleti ankupita.”
Napanelo nae kutangola pashanya po ashema aashidoni, “Yesu, Mwanagwe Daudi! Ngwanangila shididi!”
Kutwala vanu valangaladíle kunshulanga vamwaulila amalale kanji nae kuka tu mushu amamodya kutangola pashanya po, “Mwanagwe Daudi wako! Ngwanangila shididi!”
Yesu kwimila, kutuma vamwidenavo munu aijá. Akavandike, Yesu andímudya,
“Da ulota ndikutandele mwashi?” Nae kushidoni, “Nang'olo, ngulota ngulole.”
Yesu kushidoni, “Lola! Likulupililo lyako lindikuponia.”
Munu jo muwakati wowo kulalenneu kutwala kumwoda Yesu apita amupa lishangelo Nnungu. Bai vanu uti vakone shitendo asho vaníntumbyanga Nnungu.
Yesu nkaja mu Yeliko apitile vila ndila.
Napanelo mulikaja lyolyo lyo, andípagwa munu jumo wavashinshema Shakeu. Nae avele nanangalaledi wavakukatisha-ukodi na avele ntajili.
Jojo jo, ashindalota amwone Yesu mwavalalele kanji haishululika kumwona mwaa andíipika na vanu vandíinjipa.
Bai nae andítukutila mushu ndakwela munnandi pakulota amwone Yesu mwaa Yesu ashuka shalatoto lyutu lyolyo.
Yesu pawikile apalá paladile muwa andímwona Shakeu nae kushidoni, “Shakeu! Shuluka shipajelo mwaa nelo ininguvaikila ngupumulilile paing'ande pako.”
Shakeu kushulukinneu kumpwashalela Yesu na lipuwilo lyoe.
Kutwala vanu uti pavagwene davo kutangadikanga vaashidoni, “Kumanya dashi kulitenda shijeni kwankútega!”

Kanji Shakeu andítakatuka kumwaulila Yesu kushidoni, “Nang'olo ngwigwa, nangu ndatwala inushu yamali angu ndivape vamashikini; ata akapagwa munu wanimwividile shake, ndamuujidya nimwanjadyedya myanda nsheshe.”
Yesu kushidoni, “Nelo paing'ande apa kundimwikila kwambolegwa mwaa munu aju momo avelé mushipinga shaudukulu umwe Abulaamu.
Mwaa Mwana Wamunu aidilé ndavalambela na ndavaposha vajaíke.”
Napanelo vanu vamwigwilila pashitangola, Yesu andíjilika avakang'ela nkong'o mwaa wakuvandika pa Yelusalemu na vanu vashona kenga utawala wa Nnungu undawikinneu.
Nadoni andítangola kushidoni, “Andípagwa munu jumo walikola lyashiumu atwéte mwanda kuka kushilambo shakushu vakankamudye shiumu ling'oto auje.
Akanava kuka, nae andívashema vatumika vake kumi kuvajavila njuluku kutwala kuvaulila doni, ‘Tandela mishulushu mpaka panguja.’
Kanji vanu vakushilambo shake vashinannyatila. Nadoni vandívatuma vanu vamuukile vakatangole doni, ‘Hatutamwa kututawala munu aju.’
Bai munu aijá paujite ling'oto lyakunkamudya shiumu, andítuma vanshamele vatumika vavapéle njuluku avalá pakulota amanye shapatile kula munu munshulushu wake.
Kumwidila ntandi kushidoni, ‘Nang'olo, njuluku wako waungupéle, undyanjadyeka dimindi kumi.’
Nae kushidoni, ‘Shambone namene! Wako ni untumika shii. Ikava kenga undikulupilika kuvinu vidikidiki, undavanavo madalaka amakaja makumene kumi.’
Kwida wambili kushidoni, ‘Nang'olo, njuluku wako undyanjadyeka dimindi mwanu.’
Ajo kumwaulila kushidoni, ‘Wako undavanavo madalaka amakaja mwanu.’
Kwida wantatu kushidoni, ‘Nang'olo njuluku wako wo au, twala, nangu ndyútika mulilesho;
nishindakujopa mwaa wako ni umunu wakudingadinga, undátwala shinu shaukakandidye na undánang'ena paukapandile.’

Kanji nang'olo kushidoni, ‘Wako ni untumika wakubanga namene! Ndakuukumu kwodananavo avilá vyauvalangenge wako umwene. Namwiu, wako undímanya shana doni nangu ni nimunu wakudingadinga, walukwinnyango na ngunanang'ena pandikapandile.
Kanji napanelo mwaa shani hauvikile njuluku wangu kubengi pakulota nimwene panguja ngutwale njuluku wangu na ashilá shanjadyéke?’
Nae kuvatuma vanu vapagwíte apo kushidoni, ‘Tendi ako, mpoke njuluku wavenavo wo mumupe áanjadidye dimindi kumi jo.’
Kanji vanavo kushidoni, ‘Aba! Nang'olo, nae ankuvanavo dyela dyanjadyéke dimindi kumi.’
Nae kushidoni, ‘Ninkumwaulila doni, munu ávenavo vanamwanjadyedya kanji ákavenavo ata sho shavénavo padyoko sho, vanampoka.
Napanelo vamongo vangu vákashilota nangu nguve ni umu wave vo, vaidenavo apa muvatanalange nangu nivona.’ ”
Yesu akatangole malove ala nae andyúkanavo mushu mwanda aamboka alodya ku Yelusalemu.
Pavandike pa Betepashi na pa Betaniya, palishinga lyavashema Lyamilandi Vyaulivela, andívatuma vakwoda vake vavili
kushidoni, “Wena kulikaja livéle mushu! Pamwinjila nkaja mo, munankodya mwana wapunda akanava kunkwela munu vàmuungangidile; mwenu muungule mumwidenavo!
