Munu woewoe akamudya shamumuungulila, mwenu mwaulile doni, ‘Nang'olo ankunnota.’ ”
Vakwoda vakauke, vandíkodya mo mwatangaladile Yesu.
Napanelo pavashimuungula mwana wapunda aijá vene kuvaudya, “Da nnyama jo mumuungulila eshi?”
Vanavo kushidoni, “Nang'olo ankunnota.”
Bai vanavo vaníntwala kumuukanavo kumwe Yesu. Pavawikinavo, vaníntandikanga dinguvo dyave pashanya kuntwala Yesu kunkwedya.
Napanelo Yesu pashuka vanu vashindatwala dinguvo dyave kutandika mwindila.
Pavavandike pa Yelusalemu, paibondi ya Lishinga Lyamilandi Vyaulivela, imbumba yavakwoda vake ishindapuwanga na ishinantumbyanga Nnungu vajunga pashanya po mwaa wamakango uti avagwene na
vashindatangola doni, “Aalaligwe Umu áida palina limwe Umu! Amani ipali kuwa, lishangelo kushanya-uti!”
Napanelo mapalishayo vanji valijalaniénge mwimbumba vandímwaulila Yesu kushidoni, “Mwalimu, vatangalele vakwoda vako!”
Nae kushidoni, “Ninkumwaulila doni, ata ava vakamalala kanji majanga lo andanyonya.”
Napanelo pawikile pashengo, bai pagwene likaja alilá andílilangila
aashidoni, “Ajaa shonde! Wako Yelusalemu, kwalala dashi leka nawako ùmanyite padyoko vela shinu shilóta kukupa amani nelo apa! Kanji gwo, bai, shindilipiya.
Undakuwikila wakati wavalota vamongo vako kukutang'anedya kukudangela lingongo kutwala kukushinya kula kushinu.
Vanavo vandakubamola pamo na vanavako vauvénavo nkaja mwako; havakulakela lijanga lìikele pashanya lijangamwagwe mwaa wako haumanyite wakati wakwidilile Nnungu.”
Napanelo Yesu akainjile mwing'ande ya Nnungu andívakumulanga vanu váshishumidyanga vinu nng'ande amo
avaulila doni, “Indyandikigwa doni, ‘Ing'ande yangu nangu ni ing'ande yakushwalidya,’ kanji mwenu mundipindulanga kutenda shivava shavakwiva!”
Kula liduva nae ashindapundisha mwing'ande ya Nnungu. Napanelo vanang'olo vavakulangalalela-shadaka, vamwalimu vadishaliya pamo na vanang'olo vavenentete vashindalambela mwakummyaila
kanji havashipata dindila dyakummyaila mwaa venentete uti vandítitimila mukumwigwilila.

Napanelo muliduva limo Yesu àvele mwing'ande ya Nnungu avapundisha venentete na avavalangangila ntenga wambone, vandímwidila vanang'olo vavakulangalalela-shadaka, vamwalimu vadishaliya pamo na vanang'olo
ndamudya doni, “Twaulila ako! Wako vinu avi utenda kwamadalaka shani kwali madalaka ene akupelé nyani?”
Nae kushidoni, “Nanangu ndamudya. Ngwaulila,
ubatisho umwe Nshuwau walakadilé kuwa kwali kwavanu?”
Vanavo kutangola shivenevene vaashidoni, “Tukaashidoni walakadilé kuwa, nae andaashidoni, ‘Kanji mwaa shani hamunkulupidile?’
Namomo tukaashidoni, ‘Walakadilé kwavanu,’ venentete uti vandatwamanga majanga mwaa vanavo vaninkulupila Nshuwau kuva nkúlava.”
Bai vanavo vanínjang'ula kushidoni, “Hatumanyite kwawalakadile ubatisho awo.”
Kutwala Yesu kushidoni, “Bai nanangu hanimwaulila madalaka angutandela vinu avi.”
Napavedoni Yesu andívakang'ela venentete nkong'o au, “Munu jumo andílima lishamba lyake lyamilandi vyavyepo kutwala kuvakodisha vakulima, mwene kuka kushilambo shinji ndaikala maduva oe namene.
Pauwikile wakati wakupuna, mwene lishamba aníntumidya ntumika wake kwavakulima akatwale lipungu lyake lyavyepo vyamulishamba kanji vakulima munu ajo kunkanyalanga kunkumulanga makonodavo.
Nae kuntuma ntumika junji, vanavo kunkanyalanga, kuntukananga na kunkumulanga makonodavo.
Kuntuma wantatu nanae ajo vanavo kummyaa kutwala kunkumulanga yadavo.
Napanelo mwene lishamba, ‘Nduu! Ngutandelé mwashi? Idavo, leka nintumidye mwanangu wapantima na waninnagwaledya namene nakapanji nae pavamwona, vandamwishimu.’
Kanji vakulima po pavangwene, vandyáulanila kushidoni, ‘Aju ni jojo wavalota kunkamudya lyala ali. Mmanemba! Idananga akuno tummalidye kwambangidya lyala ali live lyetu.’
Bai vanavo vandíngang'alangila kunyenje lishamba kutwala kummalidya. Napanelo mwene lishamba alota kuvatandela mwashi vanu avo?
Nae andavaukila vanu avo ndavatanalanga kutwala lishamba lyo, kuvapa vanu vanji.” Bai venentete pavaigwite malove alo kutwala kushidoni, “Shonde hainave davo.”
Kanji Yesu andívalola ndoo! Kutwala kushidoni, “Da shavaandikidile doni ni nyamani, ‘Lijanga lyavaitile vakudenga, lyolyo lyo lindyuka ndava lijanga shii lyakudangela’?
Munu woewoe álota kugwilila palijanga alyo, andatamakanga na walilota kungwilila jo, andakandikanga.”
Napanelo vamwalimu vadishaliya na vanang'olo vavakulangalalela-shadaka vashindalota vamwinjilinneu mwaa vandímanya shalowa kenga nkong'o awo ushivakumbyanga vanavo kanji vashindavajopa venentete.

Napavedoni vanavo vandítunduvanga kumwodaoda. Vandívatumidya vanu valitende kenga vanu shii kumbe vàvele vyaleko pakulota vampatikaniange mulilove lyakuma nkanywa mwake vakankamudye kumadalaka na utawala umwe gavana.

Nadoni vanavo vandímudya kushidoni, “Mwalimu, wetu tundimanya shana kenga wako unkutangola vinu viu na unkupundisha shana; haunatangola shinu ulola ing'ope kanji unkupundisha kwaumwiu indila yalota Nnungu.
Napanelo twaulila! Ni shambone nkati mulilamulo lyetu kunnipa Shashali ukodi kwali mene?”
Nae amanya avi shinankulaba shave andívajang'ula kushidoni,
“Ngulodya dinali imo. Da muyela ai ipisha na namakong'o vimwe nyani?” Vanavo kushidoni, “Vimwe Shashali.”
Yesu kutwala kushidoni, “Bai vimwe Shashali, mwing'e mwene Shashali na vimwe Nnungu, mwing'e mwene Nnungu.”
Napavedoni vanavo havapatíle lilove lyakunkanidyanga pamevo avenentete, vandíshanga majang'ulidi ake na vandímalalanga.
Kutwala shipinga shamashadukayo vanu vánaashidoni hakupali kudyuka kwavakupela kwida ndamudya Yesu
kushidoni, “Mwalimu, Musha anditulakela lilamulo lyandike doni, nkulumunu akapela anneka ndyagwe ákave mwana, nung'unumunu ainjile ding'ande pakulota ammalakele vana wakujala.
Napanelo vandípagwa vanung'unumunu saba vashitumbo shimo; ntandi kulomba kutwala kupela akanava kummaleka mwana.
Kwida wambili kwinjila ding'ande,
kwatika wantatu mpaka kumalilika uti vanung'umunu saba avalá vainjila ding'ande kanji uti kupalanga pavakammaleka mwana na namwili ajo
kutwala kumwisho kwake nanae namwili jo kupela.
Napanelo kushi muliduva lyakudyuka vanu lyo, mwene namwili aju shana alota kuva wakwashi ikava kenga vanu saba ava uti vaninnomba?”
Yesu kushidoni, “Vanu vawakati au ni valombána
kanji avalá vavóna Nnungu kuvaikila vapate mautu muwakati wída na mukudyuka pakati pavakupela, vanavo havalombana.
Vovo vo, havapela kavili valota kuva kenga vanjelo vake Nnungu ni vanavake Nnungu, vana valóta kwalakela mukudyuka kwavakupela.
Ata jo Musha jo, mwing'ano ailá yapagwíte nae palyukutu líshikalela moto, panshamile Umu kuva Nnungu umwe Abulaamu, Nnungu umwe Ishaki na Nnungu umwe Yakobo, andilodya doni vakupela vankudyuka.
Mwenu, Nnungu aju hanava shinu Nnungu wavakupela kanji wavangumi mwaa kwake nae vanu ava uti vangumi.”
Kutwala vamwalimu vanji vadishaliya kushidoni, “Mwalimu, undijang'ula shana.”
Nadoni vanavo havavenavo ntima wakumudya kavili shinu shinji.
Napanelo Yesu andívaudya kushidoni, “Inkuululika dashi vanu kutangola doni, Klistu mwanagwe Daudi?
Da shi Daudi anditangola mulibuku lyake lya Dimu aashidoni, ‘ Umu andimwaulila Nang'olo wangu doni, “Ikala kunkanakono kwangu
mpaka nangu ndivavike vamongo vako vave likukwa lyakuvika madodo ako.” ’
Napanelo ikava kenga Daudi nae po anshema kuva Nang'olo wake, ilota kuva dashi kavili kuva mwanagwe?”
Akuno venentete vamwigwilila, Yesu andívaulila vakwoda vake kushidoni,

“Lilaledye namene na vamwalimu vadishaliya ivanagwéla kupita vawena vàgwete mikwakwala, ivanagwéla vavaudyange na ishima ing'umene namene muumbala, ivanagwéla kwikala muviteng'u vitandi muvitala vyakulipudidya, ivanagwéla kwikala mumautu shii mmikukulu
na vapita vavalyangila vanamwili vyavo valishang'apila kuva vanu shii vatenda delee, pakushwali. Vovo vo, vandapata ukumu yakujowa kupunda apo.”
Napanelo Yesu andílalyanga kutwala kuvona vatajili vajela njuluku mulishanduku lyashadaka,
namomo kumwona namwili ákave pashinu nanae ajela njuluku wake padyoko namene mulishanduku lyolyo.
Yesu kutwala kushidoni, “Mwiu, nkongwe aju ni ájadile poe kuvapunda vanu avalá uti
mwaa vanu vanji uti vajadilé vatwala padyumbele kanji nkongwe aju muungave-pashinu wake aumididyé uti vyavénavo.”
Napanelo vanji valambwalela ing'ande ya Nnungu mwavadangadile na majanga akumanyikanga na mwavanamadidye na vinu vyashadaka vyavashimuumidya Nnungu, Yesu andívaulila doni,
“Uti vyamwona avi, lindawika liduva lyakubamalegwa pavakaleka lijanga lìikele pashanya lijangamwagwe.”
Vanavo kumudya, “Mwalimu! Da vinu vyene vyo vilota kutandeka duvani na pavilota kutandeka po, shilota kulilodya shimanyikilo shani?”
Yesu kushidoni, “Lilaledye! Hanapagwe wakunduwanga mwaa vandaida vanu voe vatumila lina lyangu vaashidoni, ‘Nangu ni Masiya’ na kushidoni, ‘Wakati undiwika’ kanji hamunavode.
Mukona ding'ondo na vijungulima, mwenu hamunaitukange mwaa vinu avi shitandi vindivaikila vitandeke kanji hauva shinu wakati wamwisho.”
Kutwala kavili kushidoni, “Venentete vandatandana ing'ondo shivenevene na utawala umo undatandana ing'ondo na utawala unji.
Mumautu akuvilingananga mundaumilila vindangenda vyakujowa, shivanga, vilwele, vinu vyakwituwanga na kuwa kundalilodya vimanyikilo vikumene namene.

“Kanji vinu avyo uti vikanava kutandeka, kwamwaa walina lyangu mwenu vanankamula kumuuvyauvyanga, vamuukanavo kuvitala vyakulipudidya, vanjela mudikalaboshi na vamuukanavo kwavaumu na kwavananangalaledi vashilikali.
Napanelo lyolyo lyo, lindava litala lyakulota mwenu kunguumidya nangu ushuda.
Napavedoni mmitima mwenu amuwa kaladavo kuleka kulipundisha mwakulishililididya.
Nangu apa nantadya mutangole malove alimanyilo; malove alo, vamongo venu havapinga ata kutaukanga hakupagwa.
Napanelo mwenu ata vatatavenu, vakuluvenu na vanung'unuvenu, vakwenu, vabwadivenu vanannimya na pakati penu vanji vandabyaigwa.
Vanu uti vanammangedya mwaa wangu nangu
kanji mmyuti mwenu mo, haukulika ugwimbu ata ukava umo.
Ni mwaa wakulipililila kwenu kwamulota kupata ungumi wenu.
“Napanelo mukavona vaing'ondo vàtang'anadidye Yelusalemu, manyinneu doni wakati wakubamalegwa likaja alyo undiwika.
Napavedoni vanu valóta kupagwa ku Yudeya vatilile kumashinga, vapanjini vaume na valóta kupagwa kumala, havanaujile kukaja.
Mumaduva alo shindaumilila shaushanga vitandeka vinu uti vyandikíke.
Shonde vakongwe vílota kuvakodya vinu avyo vàimitenge na vílota kuvakodya vajang'edya mwaa mushilambo ashi andaida mauvilo makumene; Nnungu andavang'unulangila mevo venentete ava.
Vanu voe vandavabyaa maambila, vanji kuvakamula mikole kuvaukanavo muvilambo uti vyavamidi na Yelusalemu vamidi vandatimbanga mpaka wakati wave uvamalilikile.
“Liduva, mwedi na dinondo vinu avi vyakuwa vindavanavo vimanyikilo; mushilambo venentete vandalijugulanga kwamwaa washilindimu shamawimbi shilóta kulindimuka mwimanga.
Vanu vandadilikanga matuva vakumbukila vinu vilóta kutandeka mushilambo mwaa vyadimongo vyakuniania vindating'inigwa.
Apo vandamwona Mwana Wamunu aaloka mulyundi na dimongo pamo na lishangelo lyoe.
Pavilota kutandeka vinu avyo, mwenu takatukanga mwimilange munyanyulile vilaka kuwa mwaa kwambolegwa kundivandika.”
Napanelo Yesu andívakang'ela nkong'o au, “Lola nkungu na milandi vinji uti.
Pamunona viipukila, mwemwe mmene mundamanyinneu doni shipondo shiwikile.
Nadoni pamwona vinu avi vitandeka, momo manyinneu doni utawala wa Nnungu undivandika.
Ninkumwaulila mwiu doni, vanu vaimbula ai havamalilika vinu avi vikanava kuumilila.
Shilambo shakuwa na shapai, vindapita kanji malove angu mwiko hapita.
“Lishunge! Hamunaleke mitima vyenu viidapelwa kwambalwa na ulevi na mangaikangilo ashinamidyo ashi kutwala liduva alyo kunkodya shingangala kenga ntego
mwaa liduva alyo, vanu uti ndyoko na nkulu mushilambo uti, lindavawikila.
Ngwengwe muve mevo mujugwa mupate dimongo kwambangidya vilóta kutandeka vyo vinkowe na mwimile bila kujagajega pamevo pake Mwana Wamunu.”
Yesu kula liduva, mui ashindapagwa mwing'ande ya Nnungu apundisha, shilo kuka ndaikala kulishinga lyavashema Lyamilandi Vyaulivela.
Lyamba linyeiku, vanu uti vashindauka kwing'ande ya Nnungu ndamwigwilila.
Napanelo shikukulu shamagung'u ákave nkukumuku shavashishema Pasaka, shishindavandikanga.
Nadoni vanang'olo vavakulangalalela-shadaka pamo na vamwalimu vadishaliya vashindalambela dindila dyakummalididya Yesu mwaa vashindavajopa venentete.
Napanelo Shatwani andímwinjila Yudashi wavashinshema Shikaliyote munu wamushipinga shavakwoda vake Yesu kumi na mbili avalá.
Kutwala Yudashi kuka ndalya shemba na vanang'olo vavakulangalalela-shadaka pamo na vanang'olo vavakushunga-ing'ande ya Nnungu avalodya mwakunnimidya nae Yesu kwavanavo.
Kutwala vanavo kupuwanga na kulivika kunnipa njuluku.
Bai Yudashi andívaungila nkono na andílambela dindila dyakuvakamudidya Yesu shipiipii.
Napanelo liduva lyashikukulu shamagung'u ákave nkukumuku livaikidíle vayuda kunshinda ngandolo wapasaka lindíwika.
Likawike, Yesu aníntuma Patulu namu Nshuwau aashidoni, “Wena mukapanganiange shikukulu sha Pasaka tulye.”
Vanavo kumudya, “Ulota tuke tukapanganiange kwashi?”
Yesu kushidoni, “Lola, pamwinjila nkaja mundashingananavo munu jumo ànyukete shilongo shamedi; mwenu mwode mpaka paing'ande yalota kwinjila
mutwale mumwaulile mwene ing'ande ayo doni, ‘Mwalimu andákudya, Shumba shani shalota kulyela shikukulu sha Pasaka na vakwoda vake?’
Nae anannangudya lyutu lyakulyandaula shana livenavo vinu uti; mwenu panganianga popo.”
Vanavo pavaukile vandyánela mo mwavaulilidile Yesu; bai vanavo vandípanganianga Pasaka ayo.
Wakati pauwikile, Yesu andíikala pandamu pamo na vamyombe vake
kutwala kuvaulila doni, “Iningunagwela namene kulya shikukulu sha Pasaka ashi namu mwenu nikanava kuuvauvanga.
Ninkumwaulila doni, hangulya kavili shikukulu sha Pasaka shinji namu mwenu mpaka pashilota kutandeka shiilanianga mana ake uti muutawala wa Nnungu.”
Muwakati wowo Yesu andítwala shikombe kunnambwalela Nnungu kutwala kushidoni, “Twala mulakalanile.
Ninkumwaulila doni, hangukumbila kavili ugwalwa wavinyu mpaka pawida utawala wa Nnungu.”
Namomo andítwala ligung'u kunnambwalela Nnungu, kumajanianga kuvapa vakwoda vake aashidoni, “Au ni mili wangu ujaulíka mwaa wenu mwenu. Tenda shinu ashi mungukumbukila nangu.”
Pavamalidile kulya, andítwala shikombe kutandela momo aashidoni, “Shikombe ashi ni imbodi yaambi yamyadi vyangu vijaíka mwaa wenu mwenu.
“Kanji mwe! Namalimya álota kungulimya nangu, apali namu nangu po pandamu apa.
Kutangola mwiu, Mwana Wamunu ankuukila mo mwampangilidile Nnungu kanji shonde munu álota kunnimya jo!”
Bai vanavo vandyúdyania, “Apali apa wakutenda shitendo asho?”
Napanelo pakati pavakwoda undyúmilila ntau valota vammanye nyani áshivaikila kuva nang'olo pakati pave.
Yesu kutwala kushidoni, “Vaumu vashilambo ashi vankulitumbudya kwavenentete vave na avalá vakamulidíle madalaka vankulivika kuva vanu vakutandedya wambone kwavenentete.
Kanji mwenu hamunave davo; nang'olo pakati penu alitende kuva kenga ndyoko uti na nanangalaledi ave kenga ntumika.

Mwenu! Da nang'olo shana ava aijá ánaikala pandamu kwali aijá ánavatumikila vaikalénge pandamu? Da hanava aijá ánaikala pandamu? Kanji napanelo nangu pakati penu nguvelé kenga aijá ánavaangaikangila vanu pandamu.
“Mwenu ni múnapagwa ngwengwe namu nangu mumauvilo angu.
Napavedoni ninkunkamudya utawala kenga mo mwangukamudididye nangu Atata
pakulota mulye na mukumbile pandamu wangu muutawala wangu na mwikale muviteng'u muukumu makola kumi na mbili amwe Ishilaeli.”
Yesu kavili kushidoni, “Simoni, Simoni, ngwigwa. Shatwani andijugwa ampate mwenu pakulota ampete kenga ngano.
Kanji nangu ndikujugwila kwambangidya likulupililo lyako halinajaike. Napanelo wako paunguujila po, vanonowange vanung'unumunu.”
Patulu kushidoni, “Nang'olo, nangu nguvelé tayali kwinjila namu wako nkalaboshi na kupela namu wako.”
Umu kutwala kushidoni, “Patulu, ninkukwaulila doni, nelo ng'uku ntandi akanava kukangavela wako unangukana myanda mitatu.”
Kutangola kavili kushidoni, “Panintumile pamukanyukata njuluku, lipeta kwali vilatu, dashi shindípagwa shimwovíte?” Vanavo do, “Hashipagwite.”
Yesu kushidoni, “Napanelo aijá ávenavo njuluku na ávenavo lipeta anyukate. Ákave na lyambila, ashulushe likoti lyake ashume lyambila.
Ninkumwaulila doni, ambi apa vilota kutandeka avilá vyandikíke doni, ‘Vanimpambanianga mushipinga shavaungave-lilamulo.’ Mwaa uti vyavaandike vingwamba nangu, mwiu vindatandeka.”
Vanavo, “Nang'olo, lola! Apa tunkuvanavo maambila mavili.” Nae kushidoni, “Ing'ano ai tuleke.”
Napanelo Yesu andyúma kuka kenga lidyavalelo lyake ku Lishinga Lyamilandi Vyaulivela, vakwoda vake kumwoda.
Pawikile palyutu, andívaulila vakwoda vake kushidoni, “Shwali kwambangidya hamunainjile mukutubigwa.”
Nae kuvaleka kuka shitamba shamadodo salasini doni ndaguguvala kushwali
aashidoni, “Atata! Ukalota nyemya pamili pangu luwene alu ila hainave mwangulatela nangu, ive mwaulatela wako umwene.” [
Popo po, andyúmilila njelo wakwalakela kuwa kwida nannonowanga.
Yesu nkati mukuvauvanga kwake, andíshwali na dimongo namene na lyuduku lyashuma ligwilangila pai kuva kenga matweni makumene amyadi.]
Patakatwike pashishwali akauke kwavakwoda vake, andívakodya vàlalenge mwaa wamatuva
kutwala nae kuvaudya, “Mwaa shani mundilalanga? Takatukanga mushwali pakulota hamunainjile mukutubigwa.”
Napanelo Yesu akuno atangola kuwika imbumba yavanu wakulangalela kuva Yudashi munu wamushipinga sha avalá kumi na mbili; nae andyúka mpaka pavéle Yesu nankumbatila.
Yesu kanji kushidoni, “Yudashi, unnimya Mwana Wamunu kwaindila yakumwambatila?”
Napanelo avalá vavéle namu Yesu vakamanye víshilota kutandeka avilá vandímudya, “Nang'olo, tuvabyae maambila?”
Munu jumo pakati pave kumwangenneu lyatu lyankanakono ntumika wake nkúlangalalela-shadaka nkumene.
Yesu napane kushidoni, “Bai, leka.” Nae kukamula lyatu alilá kumponia.

Kutwala apo, andívaudya vanang'olo vavakulangalalela-shadaka, vanang'olo vavakushunga-ing'ande ya Nnungu pamo na vanang'olo vamuukidíle nankamula avalá kushidoni, “Kenga nkalau shamwida na maambila pamo na dilungu?
Nangu panishipagwa ngwengwe namu mwenu mwing'ande ya Nnungu, mwenu hamunguungile. Kanji au ni wakati wenu, wakati wamadalaka akushii.”
Bai vanavo vanínkamula kumuukanavo kwing'ande yankúlangalalela-shadaka nkumene; Patulu andyúka amwoda mwakushu.
Vanavo vandíkong'a moto wave shing'ati lugwani vene kwikalanga nanae Patulu kuka ndaikala popo.
Napanelo ntumika jumo mwali anínnola Patulu ndoo kutwala kushidoni, “Munu aju momo andípagwa namu Yesu.”
Patulu doni, “Gwee! Nangu munu ajo hanimmanyite.”
Kutima padyoko munu junji pakati pave kunnola Patulu nanae kushidoni, “Nawako momo uvelé mpinga wowo.” Patulu do, “Wako! Nangu nkati mo, hangupali.”
Ikapite isaa kenga imo doni munu junji anímmalanganga kavili aashidoni, “Mwiu, munu aju momo andípagwa mpinga wowo mwaa nanae aju, ngalileya.”
Nae do, “Jii! Nangu shautangola wako sho, hangumanyite.” Bai Patulu akuno atangola, ng'uku kukangavalenneu
kutwala Umu kushiliuka kunnola Patulu, Patulu kukumbukilinneu malove ake Umu amwaulidíle kushidoni, “Nelo ng'uku ntandi akanava kukangavela wako unangukana myanda mitatu.”
Bai Patulu andyúmila panda ndatumbula ing'uto.
Napanelo vanu váshinnaledya Yesu vaníntukana, vanínkanyola
namomo vandímunga lilesho kumevo vamudya, “Valanga, akukanywelé nyani?”
Vovo vo vashinantangalela malove anji oe akumwabolanga.

Napanelo wiku paushwenge, nkodyanio wavanang'olo vavenentete kutunduvangila vanang'olo vavakulangalalela-shadaka pamo na vamwalimu vadishaliya vandíikala nguguvale kuntwala Yesu kumwimidya paikamati yave.
Vanavo kumudya, “Wako ukava Klistu, twaulila!” Kanji nae kushidoni, “Ndikamwaulila ata hamukulupila
na ndikamudya hamungujang'ula ata padyoko.
Kanji kutunduvangila ambi apa Mwana Wamunu andaikala kunkanakono kwake Nnungu Wadimongo-uti.”
Vanavo uti kumudya, “Da napanelo wako po umwanagwe Nnungu?” Nae kushidoni, “Mwenu ni múnguvalanganga.”
Vanavo do, “Shapo tulambela ushuda shani kavili? Da i tundimwigwa tuvene vyatangwele?”
Bai vanang'olo uti vaikamati avalá vandítakatukanga kuntwala Yesu kumuukanavo kumwe Pilatu.

Vanavo vandítunduvanga kuntambudyanga vinu vaashidoni, “Munu aju tuninkadyedya avatindinganianga venentete vetu aleya kunnipa Shashali ukodi wakunnodya nae kuva umu wetu na kavili jojo kulivika jo mwene kuva Klistu yani umu.”
Pilatu kumudya, “Wako ni umu wavayuda?” Yesu kushidoni, “Wako ni úvalanganga.”
Napanelo Pilatu andívaulila vanang'olo vavakulangalalela-shadaka na venentete uti kushidoni, “Nangu munu aju namwona shinu likosha.”
Kanji vanavo vashindang'ang'anikila vaashidoni, “Aju ankupita avatubya venentete na mapundisho ake ku Yudeya akuno uti kutunduvanga ku Galileya mpaka nkaja amu.”
Napanelo Pilatu paigwite vatambulanga ku Galileya, nae andyúdya, “Da munu aju ngalileya?”
Bai Pilatu pamanyite doni Yesu avele munu ávele mwina madalaka amwe Elode, nae andílamulila vamuukenavo kumwe Elode mwaa mumaduva lolo nae andípagwa po pa Yelusalemu.

Napanelo Elode pangwene Yesu andípuwanga namene mwaa andíikala maduva oe ava na mweshe wakumwona pakuva ashindaigwa vantambulanga. Nae ashindavanavo lilindilililo lyakumwona atenda shimanyikilo shoeshoe.
Nadoni Elode andímuudyangidya vinu vyoe namene kanji nae hashijang'ula.
Vanang'olo vavakulangalalela-shadaka pamo na vamwalimu vadishaliya pashinu apo, vashinantambudyanga na dimongo vinu vyoe.
Bai Elode pamo na vaing'ondo vake vaníntanila na vandímwiludyanga, kungwadya ikanju yashiumu kutwala kumuujidya kumwe Pilatu.
Napanelo Elode namu Pilatu vanu vákashiigwania muwakati wapanyuma, muliduva alyo vandípangana imbodi.
Kutwala apo Pilatu andívashema vanang'olo vavakulangalalela-shadaka, vakutawala pamo na venentete kuvaulila doni,

“Mwenu muningupalakadyedya munu aju na munimmalanganga kenga ankuvatindinganianga venentete. Kanji lola, nangu paninnalyenge nae pamevo penu, haningwene likosha lyoelyoe pakati pavinu uti vyamumwaulenge
na ata Elode momo mwaa nae andimuujidya kwetu wetu. Mwenu! Munu aju hashipali shatandile shakulota apalele.
Nangu ndalamulila vanshape viboko ngutwale ninneke.” [
Jo Pilatu aju ashindalamuliligwa avaungulile venentete nkúngwa jumo pashikukulu sha pasaka.]
Kanji imbumba yavanu inditangola kwaunapamo ijunga iishidoni, “Munu ajo atuntamwa, tuungulila Balabashi,”
eti munu wavanjadíle nkalaboshi mwaa wakuvalangalalela venentete kupinga shilikali na kumyaa munu!
Napanelo Pilatu andítangonavo kavili alota amuungule Yesu.
Kanji vanavo vandíjunga vaashidoni, “Nkamele panshalaba! Nkamele panshalaba!”
Pilatu kutangola kavili mwanda wantatu kushidoni, “Da munu aju atandilé shakunyata shani? Nangu namwona likosha lyakupalela nae; ndalamulila vanshape viboko ngutwale ninneke.”
Kanji vanavo vashindang'ang'anikila vajunga pashanya po valota Yesu vankamele panshalaba. Bai kujunga koko ko kundítema.
Nadoni Pilatu andyámuwa kutandela momo mwavashilatela vanavo.
Andímuungula munu wavanjadíle nkalaboshi mwaa wakupinga shilikali na kubyaa kuntwala Yesu kunneka nkati mumalotelo ave.
Napanelo pavashimuukanavo, vanínkamula munu jumo walina Simoni wa ku Shilene aaloka kuludeya, vanavo kuntika nshalaba apite amwoda Yesu.
Ishindamwoda imbumba yavenentete, nkati mwake vandípagwa vakongwe váshipita vatangadikanga vannilila.
Kanji Yesu andívashiliukila kutwala kuvaulila doni, “Mmakongwe mmayelusalemu! Hamunangulilile nangu! Lililile mmene na valilile vanavenu.
Mwaa mwe! Undawika wakati wavalota kutangola doni, ‘Vandijaligwa vakongwe vákaimite, vákavaleke na vákajang'adidye.’
Muwakati awo vanu vandatangalela mashinga doni, ‘Tameka mutunyanyakedye na mutubulikidye!’
Shapo vanu pavatenda doni nnandi umbii, kushi kwamwenu milandi vyakujuma ilota kuva dashi?”
Namomo vandívatwala vanu vavili vanji vavele vakalau kuvaukanavo ndavapedya pamo namu Yesu.
Pavawikile palyutu lyavashema Pashivanga, Yesu vanínkamela panshalaba pamo na vakalau vavili avalá; jumo kunkanakono junji kunshanda.
Kanji Yesu kushidoni, “Atata, valivalive mwaa havanamanya shinu shavatenda.” Bai vanavo vandíjalanga gudugudu kwambangidya vajavanange dinguvo dyake.
Venentete vandíimilanga pepi valola na vakutawala vashinantanila vaashidoni, “Andivaposha vanji ambi apa aliposhe mwene ikava kenga nae ni Klistu wake Nnungu na Wakutandalegwa.”
Namomo vaing'ondo vashinammandika vantanila vatwala ugwalwa vamupa
vaashidoni, “Wako ukava mwiu umu wavayuda, liposhe gwegwe umwene.”
Na yadavo pamuti pake vandíkamela shibau shavaandike doni, “Aju ni Umu Wavayuda.”
Napanelo nkalau jumo wavankamadíle palyutu lyolyo ashindamwabalanga Yesu aashidoni, “Da wako i Klistu? Bai liposhe gwegwe umwene na utuposhe nawetu!”
Kanji nkalau junji anínshulanga muje aashidoni, “Da wako mpaka ambi haunanjopa shinu Nnungu ata padyoko muwakati nawako unkupata ukumu yoyo?
Wetu apa tunkupata mauvilo ala kwashaliya mwaa tunkuukumigwa kwodana na vitendo vyetu. Kanji aju apa hashipali shakunyata shatandile.”
Kutwala kumwaulila Yesu doni, “Yesu, ngukumbukila paulota kwida na utawala wako.”
Yesu kushidoni, “Ngwigwa, wako jo nelo aju mwiu undapagwa namu nangu kulyutu lyalipuwilo.”
Wakati awo uvele wakati wasasita kutwala mushilambo uti kwida shii mpaka muwakati wasatisa,
liduva lìdimbile. Mwing'ande ya Nnungu inguvo íshidivilikidya lyutu Lyanashwe-uti, indípapuka shing'ati kuma kushanya mpaka mwina.
Bai Yesu andíkuta pashanya po aashidoni, “Atata, mmakono mwako ninkukamudya imumu yangu.” Patangwele davo, nae kujaa shingumi.
Napanelo nang'olo wavaing'ondo pagwene vinu vitandéke avilá, andímupa lishangelo Nnungu aashidoni, “Munu aju mwiu avele waishaliya.”
Kutwala imbumba yavanu vakodyaniénge palyutu alyo pakulota valole shitendo asho, pavagwene avilá vitandéke, vandyújila kumakaja valikanyalanga pashuva.
Vavagwe Yesu pamo na vakongwe váshimwoda kutunduvangila ku Galileya, vandíimilanga kushu valola víshitandeka.
Napanelo munu jumo walina Yoshe wamushipinga shaikamati, munu wambone doni na waishaliya,
haungidile nkono vitendo vyavavagwe. Nae avele wa pa Alimateya likaja lya ku Yudeya na ashilindila utawala wa Nnungu.
Munu aju andímuukila Pilatu nanjugwa mili wake Yesu.
Bai Yoshe andíshuluwa mili aulá, kwavilidyanga mushanda kuka ndashika muntupa wamulijanga wavakanava kunshika munu.
Liduva alyo livele liduva lyakulipanganianga na wakati wakutunduvanga liduva lyakupumula ushindavandikanga.
Napanelo vakongwe avalá vaaléke namu Yesu ku Galileya, vandímwoda Yoshe, vandyóna shonga ashilá na mwavaladyadidye mili.
Bai vanavo vandyújananga kutwala kupanganianga vinu vyakunung'angila vyakutaa mumili na mauta akunung'ila. Muliduva lyakupumula vanavo vandípumula kwodana na lilamulo.
Kanji muliduva litandi lyaishumana linyeiku, vakongwe avalá vandítwala vyakunung'angila vyavapanganiénge avilá kuukanavo kushonga.
Pavawikile, vandíkodya lijanga lyavadivíle pantupa vàgang'aladile nnyenje.
Vakainjile, mili wake Umu Yesu, havakodidye.
Napanelo vanavo vàshangile shitendo asho, kwashingangala vandyúmilila vanu vavili vagwalenge dinguvo dyakumalameta.
Vakongwe na kujopa kwave kutapangila pai kutwala vanu vavili vo kushidoni, “Mwaa shani munkunnambela munu mumi pakati pavakupela?
Nae apa hapali, vanindyuwa. Mwenu kumbukila avilá vyamwaulidíle àvele ku Galileya
doni, indivaikila Mwana Wamunu vakankamudye kumakono kwavalume vakutega, vankamele panshalaba na muliduva lyantatu adyuke.”
Nadoni vanavo vandíkumbukilinneu malove ake.
Napanelo pavaumile pashonga kuka kukaja, vandívalanganga avilá vyavagwéne uti kwa avalá kumi na moja na kwavakwoda vanji.
Napanelo vakongwe vaidínavo dyabali adyo kwavamyombe vavele ava: Maliya wa ku Magadalena, Shuwana, Maliya anyoke Tiyagu pamo na vakongwe vanji vavéle mushipinga shosho.
Bai vanavo malove avavalangenge vakongwe havakulupidíle vagwene kuva akudidimanga.
Kanji Patulu andyúka atukuta kushonga; akatepe kupandalela nkati amulá agwene ishanda gweka kutwala nae kuujila kukaja ashanga ashilá shitandéke.
Muliduva lyolyo lyo, vakwoda vavili vauka kulikaja lya Emau livéle mushitamba shavyuluta kenga kumi doni ukauma pa Yelusalemu,
vashindapita vaulanila vinu uti vitandéke.
Napanelo pavashuka vomba mwaa wave na vaudyania, jo mwene Yesu jo kuwika kulijalanianga mushipinga shave kuka shalumo
kanji vanavo havashimmanya ata padyoko.
Napanelo nae andívaudya, “Da mupita mwaulanila nyamani niindila amu akuno muwena?” Vanavo kwimilanga vàvele na shipalodi.
Kutwala munu jumo pakati pave walina Kalaupashi kushidoni, “Da wako po ni unjeni gweka yako ku Yelusalemu akuno úkamanya vipitíle mumaduva matatu ala?”
Nae kushidoni, “Vyakwashi?” Vanavo kushidoni, “Vintandéke Yesu wa ku Nashaleti munu avéle nkúlava, avénavo vitendo na malove adimongo pamevo pa Nnungu na pamevo pavanu uti.
Nae vanang'olo vavakulangalalela-shadaka na vakutawala vetu vaninjaula pakulota vamupe ukumu yakupela; nadoni, vaninkamela panshalaba.
Kanji wetu tundívanavo lilindilililo lyakuva nae munu wakulota kwambola Ishilaeli; napanelo tangu kutandeka vinu avi nelo apa tunkutenda maduva matatu.
Kanji napanelo, vakongwe vanji vamushipinga shetu nelo vanditujujuwanga. Vanavo vandyúka lyamba linyeiku kushonga
kanji mili havakodidye. Vanavo kuja kwida ndavalanganga kenga na ata momo vandívona vanjelo vake Nnungu vavili valilodya kwavanavo kutwala vovo vo kwaulanga kenga Yesu mumi.
Kutwala vavetu vanji vamushipinga shetu kuka koko, navanavo kukadyedya momo mwavaulidile vakongwe kanji Yesu nae havangwene.”
Napanelo Yesu kushidoni, “Shasho! Mwenu mmajinga namene na mmakukakova mmitima pakulota kukulupila uti vyavatangwele vakulava!
Da haimmaikidile Klistu auvauvange atwale ainjile mulishangelo lyake?”
Bai nae mumaandiko uti andíviigwiniya kutunduvangila kumwe Musha na kwavakulava vinu vimwámba nae.
Pavawikile pashengo likaja lyavashuka, Yesu andílivika kenga munu áuka mushu na shimwanda shake
kanji vanavo vanínkanyilidya aikale vaashidoni, “Pagwa namu wetu popo apa mwaa liduva lindishwa.” Bai Yesu andíinjila nkaja kutwala kwikanavo.
Napanelo pavaikalenge kulya shakulya, nae andítwala ligung'u kwalaliya kumajanianga kutwala kuvapa.
Muwakati wowo vanavo kung'amukanga kutwala kummanya kanji nae andívalambaleka.
Bai vanavo vandyáulanila, “Da mitima vyetu havishitubuka pashitutangalela niindila atwigwiniya Maandiko?”
Kutwala vanavo muwakati wowo kutakatukanginneu kuujila ku Yelusalemu; ako vandívakodya kumi na moja avalá na vanu vanji vàkadyanienge pashinu pamo
vaashidoni, “Mwenu, Umu andidyuka mwiu! Simoni jo andimwona shana mwene.”
Namomo avalá vakwoda vavili, navanavo vandívalanganga vivatandéke niindila na kuvalanganga kenga vanímmanya kwaindila yashimajanidyo shaligung'u.
Vanavo vavalanganga vinu avi, jo mwene Yesu vangwené vila àimidile shing'ati shave kutwala kuvaulila doni, “Amani ipagwe namu mwenu.”
Kanji vanavo vandíshushukanga na vandíjopa mwaa vashimwona kenga lyoka
kutwala nae kushidoni, “Mwaa shani munkushanga namene na munkuvanavo makumbukililo alo mmitima vyenu?
Lola manda angu na madodo angu; nangu ninene. Ngukamulanga mwamini mwaa lyoka halinavanavo mili na magwangwa kenga mwamungwanela nangu.”
Akatangole davo, andívalodya manda na madodo ake.
Kanji vanavo pavakakulupila mwaa walipuwilo na vashanga, Yesu andívaudya, “Da mundivanavo shinu shoeshoe shakulya?”
Vanavo kumupa shipande shayomba wakunjanikila
nae kumamena vanavo vannola.

Kutwala kuvaulila doni, “Vitandéke avi ni avilá vyanishipita nimmalangangila mwenu tùvele shalumo kenga indivaikila vinu uti vyandikígwe mu Lilamulo lyake Musha, mu Vakulava na mu Dimu vingwámba nangu, vitandeke.”
Bai andívaungula myuti pakulota vaigwe shana Maandiko
kutwala kuvaulila doni, “Vandyandika doni, indivaikila Klistu apele kutwala muliduva lyantatu adyuke pakati pavakupela
na palina lyake, uvalangangigwe ntenga wakulijugulanga na wakulivalivigwa kwamadambi muvenentete uti kutunduvangila ku Yelusalemu.
Vinu vyovyo avi mwenu ni mmashuda.
Mwenu! Nangu nampalakadyedya shalivikile Atata kanji mwenu pagwa po pa Yelusalemu apa mpaka mupate dimongo dyakwaloka kushanya.”
Kutwala apo andívaukanavo ku Betaniya kutwala kuvanyaladyedya makono kuvaalaliya.
Avaalaliya nae andívanyema kutanduligwa kuka kuwa.
Vanavo mulyutu alyo vandílipudya kwake nae kutwala kuujila ku Yelusalemu vapuwanga namene.
Vanavo ngwengwe vashindapagwa mwing'ande ya Nnungu vantumbyanga Nnungu.
Kunantandi avele Lilove, jo Lilove andípagwa namu Nnungu na Lilove aju kuva Nnungu.
Nae kunantandi apagwite namu Nnungu.
Vinu uti vikandyangiké kwaindila yake, hashipali shikandyangíke ata shinu shimo bila nae.
Nae ni avele ntipu washingumi na sho shingumi ashi ni lilangadyo kwavanu.
Lilangadyo linkumulikila mushii na shii hashuulwile kutema lilangadyo.
Napanelo andípagwa munu jumo wantumidídye Nnungu walina Nshuwau.
Nae aidilé ndava nshuda wakuumidya ushuda lilangadyo pakulota kwaindila yake nae vanu uti vakulupile.
Nae po havéle lilangadyo ila aidilé ndaumidya ushuda lilangadyo.
Lilangadyo liu limmulikíla kula munu lindída mushilambo.
Nae andípagwa mushilambo na kwaindila yake nae shilambo shindikandyangigwa kanji sho shilambo sho, shiníntikinanga.
Andída kwave kanji vakwave havampwashaladile.
Napane uti avalá vampwashaladíle, vo vakulupidíle lina lyake, nae andivapa aki yakutandegwa kuva vana va Nnungu.
Vanavo, vana va Nnungu i kwaindila yaudukulu ata i kwashimunu kwali kwamalotelo antwamunu ila kwamalotelo ake jo mwene Nnungu.
Jo Lilove jo andyúka ndava mili kutwala kunama namu wetu. Wetu tundyona lishangelo lyake, lishangelo lyakuva Mwana jumo jojo wakwalakela kwa Tatamunu, lyolyo lyumbéle umonyo na umwiu.

Kwake nae, Nshuwau andyumya ushuda na anditangola pashanya po aashidoni, “Aju ni jojo aijá wanishimmalanganga nangu nguushidoni, ‘Ling'oto lyangu nangu ankwida munu wakungupunda nangu mwaa ata nangu nikanava kupagwa, nae andípagwa.’ ”
Doni, mukuumbaligwa kwake, wetu uti tundipata umonyo kuleka umonyo
mwaa Lilamulo lindipatikananga kwaindila imwe Musha; umonyo na umwiu kwida kwaindila imwe Yesu Klistu.
Nnungu, hapali munu ata jumo ángwene ila jumo wagweka, àvele Nnungu, jo áijeme pashuva sha Tatamunu ni átutadidye tummanye.
Napanelo au ni ushuda waumidye Nshuwau vayuda pavavatumile pa Yelusalemu vakulangalalela-shadaka pamo na valawi ndamudya doni, “Da wako unyani?”
Nae pakalipiyapiyanga andílivalanganga ngala, “Nangu hangunava shinu Klistu.”
Vanavo kumudya, “Pane, wako po unyani? Wako po, Liyashi?” Nae do, “Mene, nangu hangunava shinu nae.” Vanavo, “Da wako po, unkúlava watushikulindila wide mushilambo?” Nae kushidoni, “Mene.”
Vanavo kutwala kumudya kavili, “Kanji napanelo wako po unyani? Livalangange ako, tuukenavo majibu kwa avalá vatutumíle.”
Nshuwau kushidoni, “Nangu ni lidi likúgwa kushimbweshe, ‘Alowa indila yake Umu,’ ni sho shitangodi ashilá shimwe nkúlava Ishaiya.”
Napanelo pakati pavanu ve vatumigwídye vandípagwa mapalishayo.
Vanavo vakaudya kushidoni, “Ikava kenga wako haunava shinu Klistu, haunava Liyashi na ata haunava shinu aijá nkúlava, mwaa shani vanu unkuvapa ubatisho?”
Nshuwau kushidoni, “Nangu ninkuvapa vanu ubatisho mmedi; pakati penu po napanelo apali wamukammanyite.
Nae ni aijá áaloka panyuma pangu ákavaikidile nangu kumuulanga vilatu vyake.”
Vinu avi vitandeke ku Betaniya mwangu unji walundi lwa Yudani palyutu lyashivapela Nshuwau vanu ubatisho.
Palyamba lyake Nshuwau andímwona Yesu amwidila kutwala kushidoni, “Mwenu! Ngandolo wa Nnungu aijá áusha lidambi lyashilambo.
Aju ni jojo wanishimmalanganga nguushidoni, ‘Ling'oto lyangu nangu ankwida munu wakungupunda nangu mwaa ata nangu nikanava kupagwa, nae andípagwa.’
Munu ajo ata nene hanishimmanya kanji shingutadídye nangu ngwide nivape vanu ubatisho mmedi ni pakulota nae amanyike kwavanaishilaeli.”
Nshuwau akaumya ushuda aashidoni, “Nangu ndimwona Imumu ashuluka kenga ng'unda kwalakela kuwa kwida ndaikala namu nae.

Nangu munu ajo haninammanye leka aijá ángutumile nivape vanu ubatisho mmedi akangwaulidile doni, ‘Munu waulota kumwona Imumu ashuluka kwida ndaikala namu nae, ajo ni jojo álota kuvapa vanu ubatisho mu Imumu Wanashwe.’
Nangu ndimwona na ninkumya ushuda, aju ni Mwana wa Nnungu.”
Palyamba lyake Nshuwau andípagwa kavili pamo na vakwoda vake vavili.
Pamwonite Yesu apita andítangola doni, “Mwenu! Ngandolo wa Nnungu aju.”
Vakwoda vavili avalá pavaigwite malove alo vandímwoda Yesu.
Yesu akavona vakwoda vake Nshuwau avalá vamwoda nae kuvaudya, “Mulambela nyamani?” Vanavo, “Labi,” (Labi, kwakuvalangangila, Mwalimu), “da uwikidilé kwashi?”
Nae do, “Ida mulole!” Bai vanavo vandyúka na vandyóna lyutu lyawikidíle kutwala kwikanavo mpaka kudimba liduva. Wakati wene wo uvele wakati wasakumi yalyulo.
Pakati pavanu avo vavili vamwigwíte Nshuwau atangola na vamwodíle Yesu, jumo avele Andaleya nung'une Simoni Patulu.
Jojo jo shitandi ankuka ndakadyania na nkulumunu Simoni, ankumwaulila doni, “Tunimpata Masiya” (Masiya, kwakuvalangangila, Klistu).

Bai Andaleya akantwala Simoni kumuukanavo kumwe Yesu. Yesu akannola Simoni ndoo, akamwaulila kushidoni, “Wako lina lyako Simoni mwanagwe Nshuwau. Napane kutunduvangila ambi apa vandakushema Kepashi” (Kepashi kwakuvalangangila kunji, Patulu).
Palyamba lyake Yesu andyámuwa kuujila ku Galileya. Napanelo ankumwona Pilipo ankumwaulila doni, “Ngwoda!”
Pilipo avele mwenentete wa pa Beteshaida likaja limwe Andaleya namu Patulu.
Jo Pilipo jo ankunkodya Nataniyele ankumwaulila doni, “Tunimpata munu wamwandike Musha mu Lilamulo na yadavo Vakulava, Yesu wa ku Nashaleti, mwanagwe Yoshe.”
Kutwala Nataniyele kumudya Pilipo doni, “Ku Nashaleti kunkuululika kwaloka shinu shambone?” Pilipo kushidoni, “Ida ulole.”
Yesu kumwona Nataniyele amwidila kutwala kushidoni, “Mwenu! Aju ni mwishilaeli mmwiu ákave malambi.”
Nataniyele kumudya, “Ungumanyidilé kwashi?” Yesu kushidoni, “Ata Pilipo akanava kukushema, wako ùvele mwina nkungu, nangu ndíkwona.”
Nataniyele kunjang'ula, “Labi, wako Mwana wa Nnungu, kwavanaishilaeli wako ni umu.”
Yesu akanjang'ula kushidoni, “Da kwamwaa wakukwaulila ndikugwene ùvele mwina nkungu, ni paukulupila? Bai undona vinu vikumene kupunda avi.”
Nae kuka mushu aashidoni, “Ninkumwaulila mwiu uti doni, mundona kuwa kùshimwike na vanjelo va Nnungu vakwela na vashuluka mu Mwana Wamunu.”
Muliduva lyantatu shindítandeka shikukulu shashitamo ku Kanaa ya ku Galileya na koko ko, andípagwa anyoke Yesu.
Pashikukulu asho yadavo vanínnalika Yesu pamo na vakwoda vake.
Napanelo ugwalwa wavinyu ukamalilike, jujumunu anímwaulila Yesu kushidoni, “Vinyu vindimalilika.”
Yesu kutwa kushidoni, “Da wako namu nangu shako nyamani? Wakati wangu haunava kuwika.”
Bai jujumunu andívaulila avalá vatumika vapaing'ande doni, “Vinu uti vyalota kumwaulila, mwenu tandedya.”
Napanelo popo po, vindípagwa vilongo sita vyamajanga vyavashitaa medi kwakwodananavo kulyushanianga ushapu kwavayuda. Kula shilongo shishindainjila malitulu akuwikila kenga miya doni.
Yesu kuvaulila avalá vatumika vapaing'ande kushidoni, “Takangila medi mmilongo muumbadyange.” Vanavo kuumbadyanga uti do, jalele!
Yesu kuvaulila doni, “Napane teka mukamupe nanangalaledi washikukulu.” Vanavo kuteka kuukanavo.
Nanangalaledi palingile medi ajalukénge kuva ugwalwa wavinyu pakamanya kwawalakadile kanji vatumika vapaing'ande ve vatakangidíle medi mmilongo vàmanyite kwawalakadile, nae anínshema nkúlomba
kutwala kumwaulila doni, “Kula munu shitandi avapa vanu vinyu shii, ling'oto lyavanavo kukumbila shana-shana ni panatwala víkave mana kuvapa. Kanji wako po undikondya vinyu shii mpaka muwakati au!”
Ashi ni shimanyikilo shitandi shatandile Yesu ku Kanaa ya ku Galileya. Amu ni mwalaladidye lishangelo lyake kutwala vakwoda vake kunkulupila.
Ling'oto lyavinu avyo andyálela kuka ku Kapalanaumu pamo na anyoke, vanung'unuvake na vakwoda vake. Koko ko, vandíikala maduva avaikalénge.
Napanelo shìvandikenge shikukulu sha Pasaka shavayuda, Yesu andyámboka kuka ku Yelusalemu.
Koko ko, paing'ande ya Nnungu andívakodya avalá vakushulusha-ding'ombe, dingandolo, ding'unda na vakushenji-njuluku vàikalenge vakola madengo ave.

Bai Yesu akakandyanga mishasha vyadimbuu kutwala kuvakumulanga uti vanu avo apalá paing'ande ya Nnungu pamo na ding'ombe, dingandolo; vakushenji-njuluku vo, nae dishingo dyave kumwadilanga na dimesha dyo, kupindulanga.
Avalá vakushulusha-ding'unda kuvaulila doni, “Uti vinu vyenu apa ushanianga! Hamunatende ing'ande imwe Atata kuva yakushulushidya!”
Bai vakwoda vake vandíkumbukila Maandiko alalá avaandike doni, “Dukuduku yaing'ande yako inangwoma muntima.”
Napanelo vayuda vakanjang'ula kushidoni, “Pakuva unkutenda vinu avi, napane ulota kutulodya shimanyikilo shani?”
Nae kushidoni, “Bamalanga ing'ande ya Nnungu ai, nangu ndadenga mumaduva matatu kumalila.”
Vayuda kutwa kushidoni, “Ing'ande ai inditwala vyaka alubaini na sita idangeka! Napanelo wako ulota udenge mumaduva matatu bai?”
Kanji nae ing'ande yashamba, ashamba wo mili wake.
Napavedoni akadyuke pakati pavakupela, vakwoda vake vandíkumbukila kenga nae andítangola vinu avyo. Nadoni vanavo vandíkulupila Maandiko na lilove lyatangwéle Yesu.
Yesu pavéle pa Yelusalemu pashikukulu sha Pasaka, vanu voe vakone vimanyikilo vyake vyashitenda, vandíkulupila lina lyake
ila mwene jo hashilikulupidya vanu avo mwaa wakuvamanya shana vanu uti.
Nae hashilota munu aumye ushuda wamunu mwaa andimanya shivéle muntima wamunu.
Napanelo andípagwa mpalishayo walina Nikodemu nkútawala jumo wavayuda.

Munu aju andímuukila Yesu shilo ndamwaulila doni, “Labi, wetu tundimanya shana kenga wako apa walakadilé kwa Nnungu, gwegwe umwalimu. Vimanyikilo vyautenda wako avi, hapali munu wakuulula kutenda bila Nnungu kupagwa pepi-pepi namu nae.”
Yesu akanjang'ula kushidoni, “Ninkukwaulila mwiu mwiu, munu akanavalekwa kwakuwa haulula shinu kwona utawala wa Nnungu.”
Nikodemu kutwala kushidoni, “Da munu alota kuvalekwa dashi àvele nang'olo? Da ankuulula kwinjila kwamwanda wambili mmunda mwanyoke kutwala kuvalekwa?”
Yesu kunjang'ula, “Ninkukwaulila mwiu mwiu, munu akanavalekwa kwamedi na Imumu haulula kwinjila muutawala wa Nnungu.
Doni, shivalékwa kwamili, mili na shivalékwa kwa Imumu, imumu.
Haunashange mwaa wakukwaulila doni, inimmaikila muvalekwe kwakuwa.
Imepo indápunga palyutu lyoelyoe lyailota yene; wako kwigwa kunyonya kwake kanji haunamanya kwaipandukanga na kwayenda. Nimumo momo kwakula munu ávalekwa kwa Imumu.”
Nikodemu akajang'ula, “Na doni po inkuululika dashi?”
Yesu akanjang'ula kushidoni, “Wako umwalimu wavanaishilaeli, napane haunamanya shinu vinu avi?
Ninkukwaulila mwiu mwiu, shatumanyite ni shatutangola, shatugwene ni shatumya ushuda kanji ushuda wetu hamunakulupila shinu.
Ikava kenga nditangola vyamushilambo mwenu hamukulupidile, napane nikatangola vyakuwa mulota kukulupila dashi?
Hapali munu ákwadile kuwa ila ni aijá áalweke kuwa, Mwana Wamunu.
Ni kenga momo mwannyanyulidile Musha nyoka munnandi kushimbweshe nanae Mwana Wamunu inimmaikila anyanyuligwe
pakulota vanu uti vankulupíla nae vavenavo shingumi shíkamalilika.
“Amu ni mwanagwaladidye Nnungu shilambo, ata mpaka nae kumumya mwanagwe ávele jumo jojo pakulota uti vankulupíla nae havanajaike kanji vavenavo shingumi shíkamalilika.
Mwaa Nnungu hantumididye mwanagwe mushilambo aukumu shilambo kanji shilambo sho shambwalegwe kwaindila yake nae.
Aijá ánkulupila nae hanaukumigwa shinu, aijá napane ákankulupila andyukumigwa tayali kwamwaa úkave wakukulupila lina lya Mwana wa Nnungu, mwana jo ávele jumo jojo.
Ukumu yo ni ai: lilangadyo lindida mushilambo kutwala vanu kunagwaledya shii kuleka lilangadyo mwaa vitendo vyave vivele vyakunyata.
Kula munu ánatenda vyakunyata andávangedya lilangadyo na hanavandika kulilangadyo pakulota vitendo vyake vyo havinalale panda.
Napane aijá ánatenda vyaumwiu aida kulilangadyo pakulota vitendo vyake vyaneke kuva vitendo vitandéke mu Nnungu.”
Ling'oto lyavinu avyo Yesu andyúma panjini pamo na vakwoda vake kuka mushilambo shosho sha Yudeya. Ako nae andípagwa na vanavo avapa vanu ubatisho.
Nanae Nshuwau momo ku Enoni pepi na pa Salimu ashindavapa vanu ubatisho mwaa kwanavo ko wakupagwa medi oe, napane vanu vashindamuukila na vashindabatishwa.
Doni, wakati awo Nshuwau vakanava kunjela nkalaboshi.
Napanelo vakwoda vake Nshuwau vandítaukananganavo munu jumo muyuda kwaing'ano yakulyushanianga ushapu.

Vanavo vandyúka ndatangola namu Nshuwau kushidoni, “Labi, munu avéle namu wako mwangu unji wa Yudani, waumidye ushuda ummalanganga nae, gwe, aijá apalá ankuvapa vanu ubatisho na vanu uti vankumuukila.”
Nshuwau akajang'ula kushidoni, “Munu haulula kupata shinu, shinu asho pakapatile kuwa.
Ata mwemwe mmene ni mmashuda kwa ashilá shangutangwele, ‘Nangu apa hangunava shinu Klistu, nangu ni aijá ngútumigwe kulangalela.’

Mwene nkúlombwa ni nkúlomba. Napane mbwadigwe wapantima wankúlomba ni aijá ánannindila nkúlomba. Panamwigwa, nae andápuwanga namene mwaa wakwigwa lidi lyake. Nadoni lipuwilo lyangu ali lindiwikila popo.
Nae ni ávaikidile aanjadyeke nangu ngupungulike.
“Aijá áalakela kushanya avelé pashanya pavanu uti. Aijá wamushilambo, wamushilambo na jojo jo atangola vyamushilambo. Napane jo áalakela kuwa jo avelé pashanya pavanu uti.
Nae ankumya ushuda wavinu vyagwene na vyaigwite kanji hapali munu áitikila ushuda wake.
Aijá áitikila ushuda wake ankuntaa namakong'o kenga Nnungu ni ávenavo umwiu.
Aijá wantumididye Nnungu atangola malove ake Nnungu mwaa nae andimupa Imumu íkave shipimo.
Tatamunu ankunnagwaledya Mwana na vinu uti aninkamudya.
Aijá ánkulupila Mwana ankuva na shingumi shíkamalilika kanji aijá áita kunkukulupila Mwana, shingumi sho alota kwigwa lyatu na shitundi shake Nnungu shinkupagwa pamili pake.”
Napanelo Yesu akaigwe kenga mapalishayo vandígwa doni, Yesu ankuvatenda vanu kuva vakwoda vake na kuvapa ubatisho kumpunda Nshuwau,
ata ikava kenga jo mwene Yesu hashivapa vanu ubatisho ila vakwoda vake,
bai nae andyúma pa Yudeya kuujila kavili ku Galileya.
Mushimwanda shake inímmaikila apitile ku Shamaliya.
Ko ku Shamaliya ko ankwinjila palikaja lyavashema Shikali livéle pepi na palyutu lyajawíle Yakobo kumupa mwanamunu Yoshe.
Popo po shindípagwa shima shimwe Yakobo. Napanelo kwodamwaa Yesu andídabadabanga na shimwanda, andíikala pepi na pashima asho. Wakati wene uvele waliduva pamuti.
Popo po ankwida nkongwe nshamaliya ndateka medi, Yesu kumwaulila doni, “Ngupa medi ngukumbile,”
vakwoda vake muwakati wene wo vaukile kunjini ndashuma shakulya.
Napanelo aijá nkongwe nshamaliya aijá kumudya, “Ivelé dashi wako ùvele umuyuda kungujugwa nangu medi ninkongwe nshamaliya?” Mwaa havashilyanila vayuda na vashamaliya.
Yesu akanjang'ula kushidoni, “Wako leka ùmanyite inudyo ya Nnungu na ùmmanyite aijá átangola doni, ‘Ngupa medi ngukumbile,’ ukaninjugwa nae na nae akandikupa medi ashingumi.”
Nkongwe aijá do, “Nang'olo, wako hauvé shombo shakutakela na shima shindikadaleka, napane medi ashingumi lo, ulota kupata kwashi?
Da wako po ùnang'olo kumpunda nakulugwetu Yakobo átupele muto au wakumbidile mwene, vanavake pamo na vanyama vake?”
Yesu akanjang'ula kushidoni, “Kula munu álota kukumbila medi ala inankola kavili inyota

kanji aijá álota kukumbila medi angulota kumupa nangu mwiko hainkola shinu kavili inyota. Medi angulota kumupa nangu lo andatadya nkati mwake mupandukange libububu lyamedi akumukanga auka kushingumi shíkamalilika.”
Nkongwe kutwa kushidoni, “Bai nang'olo ngupa medi lolo lo kwambangidya hainangukole kavili inyota na hangunaide kavili apa ndateka medi.”
Yesu kutwala kushidoni, “Wena ukansheme ntwavo, wide.”
Nkongwe akajang'ula kushidoni, “Hanguve ntwangu.” Yesu do, “Unditangola shana paulivalangenge kenga ‘Hanguve ntwangu,’
mwaa undívanavo vatavako mwanu na aju waunamanavo ambi apa, nanae hanava ntwavo. Mwiu, unditangola shinu shiu.”
Nkongwe kutwala kushidoni, “Nang'olo ninkukwona wako kuva unkúlava.
Vanakuluvetu wetu vashilipudya palishinga ali. Mwenu napane muushidoni, palyutu pavaikidíle kulipudidya ni pa Yelusalemu.”
Yesu kushidoni, “Ajala ngukulupila, unkwida wakati wamulota kulipudya kwa Tatamunu i palishinga ali na ata ku Yelusalemu.
Mwenu po munkulipudya kwa aijá wamukammanyite; wetu tunkulipudya kwa aijá watummanyite mwaa kwambola kunkwalakela kwavayuda.
Kanji napane unkuwika wakati na wakati wene wo uwikile wavalota vakulipudya vaiu kulipudya kumwe Tatamunu mwimumu na kwaumwiu. Ni vovo vavalambela Tatamunu valipudye kwake.
Nnungu ni imumu; avalá valipúdya kwake vandivaikila valipudye mwimumu na kwaumwiu.”
Nkongwe kushidoni, “Nangu ndimanya kenga Masiya ankwida, aijá wavanshema Klistu. Pawika andatuvalangangila vinu uti.”
Yesu, “Ni nene nangu, ngútangola namu wako.”

Bai muwakati wowo kutwala kuwika vakwoda vake. Vanavo vandíshanga namene kwamwaa wakumwona atangola na nkongwe kanji hapagwíte wakumudya doni, “Da ulambela nyamani?” kwali, “Mwaa shani unkutangola namu nae?”
Nkongwe jo kuleka shilongo shake popo kutwala kuka kulikaja, koko ko andívaulila vanu doni,
“Ida munnole munu ánguvalangenge vinu uti vyangutandile kanji kwali Klistu?”
Vanu vandyúma palikaja apalá kumuukila koko kwavéle.
Napanelo pavishitandeka avyo vakwoda vake vashinankanyilidya, “Labi, lyaa!”
Kanji Yesu kushidoni, “Nangu ninkuvanavo shakulya shamukamanyite mwenu.”
Vakwoda vake kutwa kuudyania, “Da apali munu áidile ndamupa shakulya?”
Yesu kuvaulila doni, “Shakulya shangu ni kutandedya malotelo ake aijá ángutumididye na kulinganianga shimadengo shake.
Da shi vanu vandátangola doni, ‘Vibakidile myedi nsheshe kuwika wakati wamapuno’? Napane mwenu, nangu ninkumwaulila doni, ng'amula mevo enu, mulole mmagwelu mo! Vinu vinditandeka pakulota kupunigwa.
Ata mpaka ambi apa ápuna ankupata nshala wake na ankukushania mapuno áuka kushingumi shíkamalilika kwambangidya ápanda na ápuna uti kwaunapamo vave na lipuwilo.
Kwaing'ano ai shitangaléka sho shiu, ‘Nkúpanda junji na nkúpuna junji.’
Nangu nintumidya mwenu mukapune shamukaumidile lyuduku; vanji ni vaudukidíle kutwala mwenu kupata paida yalyuduku lyave.”
Bai vashamaliya voe vapalikaja alyo vanínkulupila kwamwaa waushuda waumídye nkongwe doni, “Aninguvalanganga vinu uti vyangutandile.”
Napanelo pavamuukidile Yesu vashamaliya avalá, vanínjugwa vaikalenavo, nae kwikala kwanavo maduva mavili
kutwala vanji voe kunkulupila kwamwaa wamalove ake.
Vanavo vanímwaulila nkongwe kushidoni, “Munu aju wetu hatunankulupila shinu kwamwaa wamalove ako wako mwaa ata wewe tuvene tundimwigwa na tunkumanya kenga aju mwiu ni Mwamboli wamushilambo.”
Akapite maduva mavili alalá, Yesu andyúma palyutu alyo kutwala kuukanavo mushu shimwanda shake shakuka ku Galileya.
Napane jo mwene Yesu andyúmya ushuda kenga nkúlava hanaishimika mushilambo shake.
Napavedoni akawike ku Galileya, vagalileya vanímpwashalela kanji kwamwaa wakwona vinu vyatandíle ku Yelusalemu pashikukulu kwoda navanavo po pashikukulu po vandípagwa.
Yesu napanelo kutwala kuka kavili ku Kanaa ya ku Galileya kulyutu lyajalulénge medi kuva vinyu. Koko ko andípagwa ndyoko jumo umwe umu e avénavo mwana nnwele ku Kapalanaumu.
Jojo jo akaigwe kenga Yesu andiwika pa Galileya aalakela ku Yudeya, anímuukila na anínkanyilidya auke akamponie mwanagwe mwaa mwana jo avele nnwele matapata.
Yesu kutwala kushidoni, “Yani mwenu apa mukanona vimanyikilo na vyakutikinikanga mwiko hamunakulupila.”
Nanangalaledi jo kushidoni, “Nang'olo, tuke mwanangu akanava kupela.”
Yesu do, “Wena! Mwanavo jo mumi,” kutwala munu aijá kukulupila lilove lyatangwéle Yesu, nae kuka.
Pashaalela auka, andíkadyania na vatumika vake shing'ati indila vamwidila kutwala vanavo kumwaulila doni, “Mwanavo mumi.”
Nae kuvaudya, “Da aponilé wakati shani?” Vanavo do, “Shilwele aponilé lido muwakati wasasaba yamui.”
Bai tatamunu andíkumbukilinneu kenga uvele wakati wowo wasasaba wamwaulidile Yesu kushidoni, “Mwanavo mumi.” Nadoni nae pamo na vanu uti vapaing'ande pake kutwala kukulupila.
Ashi ni shimanyikilo shambili shatandíle Yesu, shosho sho atandile paujite ku Yudeya kuka ku Galileya.
Ling'oto lyavinu avyo, shindípagwa shikukulu shavayuda na Yesu andyámboka kuka ku Yelusalemu.
Napanelo ko ku Yelusalemu ko, pepi na Nnango Wavangandolo, lindípagwa litangi likumene, mushibalaniya vashishema Beteshada. Nnyenje mwake litangi lyolyo lyo, vindípagwa vitala mwanu.
Muvitala vyovyo vyo, vashindalalanga valwele voe, vakuputala mevo, vakulamala na vakudidimanga madodo.
Napanelo popo po, andípagwa munu jumo wakudidimanga madodo auvauvénge vyaka salasini na nane.
Yesu akamwone àlele na nae àmanyite kenga munu ajo andyuvauvanga muwakati woe, andyúdya kushidoni, “Da unkulota upone?”
Wakudidimanga madodo jo kushidoni, “Nang'olo, hanguvé munu wakungutwala kungujela mmedi patindimbukanga. Kula wakati wangulingangila nangu kwinjila mmedi ninkodya junji àinjidile.”
Yesu kushidoni, “Takatuka, twala litandiko lyako utwale mwanda uke!”
Muwakati wowo munu jo kuponenneu na kutwala litandiko lyake kuka. Liduva lyene lyo livele liduva lyakupumula.
Vayuda napane vanímwaulila aijá munu wavamponídye kushidoni, “Nelo liduva lyakupumula, nkati mulilamulo haivaikidile wako kunyukata litandiko lyo.”
Munu jo kushidoni, “Munu ánguponidye jo ni ángwaulidile doni, ‘Nyukata litandiko lyako uke.’ ”
Vayuda kumudya, “Da munu ajo ákwaulidile wako doni, ‘Twala litandiko lyako uke,’ ni nyani?”
Munu wakupona aijá kanji nae hashimmanya nyani ámponidye mwaa Yesu andítivaniva mulyutu alyo kutwala kuma kwamwaa wakupagwa imbumba yoe yavanu.
Ling'oto lya apo, Yesu anínkodya munu wamponídye aijá mwing'ande ya Nnungu kutwala kumwaulila doni, “Wako! Wako apa undipona, nadoni haunatege kavili pakulota hashinakuumililile shakupunda ashi.”
Bai munu aijá andyúka ndavavalangangila vayuda kenga, Yesu ni ámponidye.
Napavedoni vayuda vandítunduvanga kumpapata Yesu mwaa ashindatenda vinu avyo muliduva lyakupumula.
Napane Yesu kuvaulila doni, “Atata ankukola madengo mpaka ambi, nadoni nanangu momo ninkukola.”

Bai kwamwaa wamalove ala vayuda vashindamamodya kulambela mwakummalididya Yesu, i kwamwaa wakutimbanga liduva lyakupumula gweka kanji namomo yakunshema Nnungu tatake alilinganianga jo mwene na Nnungu.

Yesu akavajang'ula kushidoni, “Nangu ninkumwaulila mwiu mwiu doni, Mwana hanaulula kutenda shinu shoeshoe shakubuni jo mwene ila ashilá shamwona Tatake atenda. Kula shinu shatenda Tatamunu nanae Mwana ankutenda shosho.
Mwaa Tatamunu ankunnagwaledya Mwanamunu na ankunnodya kula shinu shatenda jo mwene, ata mpaka anannodya vinu vyakupunda avi pakulota mwenu po mushange.
Doni, mo mwavadyuwidya Tatamunu vakupela kuvapa shingumi, nimumo momo avalá vávalota Mwana, ankuvapa shingumi.
Ata jo Tatamunu hanamuukumu munu ila ukumu uti ankamudidyé Mwana
kwambangidya vanu uti vamwishimu Mwana kenga mwavamwishimila Tatamunu. Ákamwishimu Mwana hanamwishimu shinu Tatamunu, aijá ántumididye.

“Nangu ninkumwaulila mwiu mwiu doni, aijá áigwilila lilove lyangu na kunkulupila aijá ángutumididye, ankuvanavo shingumi shíkamalilika. Munu aju hanaukumigwa shinu, tayali vandimumya mukupela kummika mushingumi.
Nangu ninkumwaulila mwiu mwiu doni, wakati unkuwika na wakati wene ni wowo au wavalota vakupela kwigwa lidi lya Mwana wa Nnungu na avalá vaígwa vo, vandanama.
Doni, mo mwavalelenavo Atata shingumi shimpandukánga jo mwene, anintadya Mwanamunu momo avenavo shingumi shimpandukánga jo mwene
na andimupa madalaka akuukumu mwaa nae ni Mwana Wamunu.
“Malove ala mwenu hamunashange mwaa unkwida wakati wavalota vanu uti vavéle muvyonga kwigwa lidi lyake
kutwala kuma; avalá vatandadídye wambone mukudyuka kwashingumi, avalá vatandadídye vyakunyata mukudyuka kwaukumu.

“Nangu hangunaulula kutenda shinu shoeshoe shakubuni nene nimwene. Mwangwigwidya nangu ni mwanguukumila na kuukumu kwangu kunkuvanavo shaliya mwaa hangunatenda shinu mwangulatela nimwene ila ninkutenda mwalatela aijá ángutumididye.
“Ikava kenga nangu apa ninkulivalanganga nene nimwene, bai ushuda au haunava wiu.
Napane kanji apali junji ánguvalanganga nangu na nangu ninkumanya kenga ushuda waumya nae anguvalanganga nangu, wìu.
Mwenu mundivatuma vanu kumwe Nshuwau, nae kutwala kumya ushuda waumwiu.
Nangu napane hangunagambela shinu ushuda wamunu ila vinu avi ninkutangola kwambangidya mwenu mwambolegwe.
Nae jo avele ikalaboi íshikalela na íshilangadya; mwenu muwakati padyoko, mundyámuwa kupuwanga mulilangadyo alyo.
Kanji napane ushuda wangu nangu unkupunda aulá umwe Nshuwau mwaa madengo angupele Atata ngumalile, madengo ala angutenda ankunguvalanganga kenga nditumigwa namu Atata.
Atata ángutumididye jo, nae andyumya ushuda anguvalanganga nangu. Mwenu ata lidi lyake hamwigwite, ata mwavalalele mo, hamumwanite
na lilove lyake nae halinaikala shinu mmitima myenu mwaa aijá wantumididye, jojo aju, mwenu hamunkulupidile.
Mwenu munkulambela mumaandiko mwaa nkati mwake mo mwona doni mundivanavo shingumi shíkamalilika; lolo lo ankunguumidya nangu ushuda,
napane mwenu munkwita kwida kwangu nangu pakulota shingumi sho, mupate.
“Nangu lishangelo kwavanu nagambela shinu
kanji nangu ninkummanya shana mwenu kenga linagwaledyo kwa Nnungu hamuvenavo.
Nangu ngwídile palina limwe Atata, hamunangupwashalela shinu. Akaida junji palina lyake jo mwene, ajo munampwashalela.
Mwenu mulota kukulupila dashi ikava kenga munkuupana lishangelo shivenevene na lishangelo lyalakéla kwa Nnungu ávele jumo jojo, hamunalambela shinu?
“Hamunakumbukile kenga nangu nanshitaki kumwe Atata. Apali jumo ánshitaki mwenu, ni jo Musha kwamuvikile mwenu lilindilililo.
Mwenu leka munkulupidile Musha, mukaningukulupila nangu momo mwaa nae andyandika vingwamba nangu.
Napane ikava kenga hamunakulupila shinu vyandike Musha, mulota kukulupila dashi malove angu?”
Ling'oto lyavinu avyo Yesu andyámboka litanda lya Galileya, kwali lya Tibeliyade, kuka mwangu unji
kutwala imbumba yavanu kupita imwoda mwaa vashindalaledya vimanyikilo vyashitenda muvalwele.
Yesu kutwala kukwela palishinga pamo na vakwoda vake ndaikalanga.
Napanelo shikukulu sha Pasaka shavayuda shishindavandikanga.
Yesu pamyangamyenge akona imbumba yavanu immandika nae kumudya Pilipo, “Tushuma kwashi magung'u akuvatosha vanu ava valye?”
Andímudya davo anninga ila mwene àmanyite avi shashilota kutenda.
Pilipo kujang'ula doni, “Ata magung'u adinali dimiya mbili hayulukika kuvatosha vanu ava, kula munu apate kadonji.”
Nkwóda junji Andaleya, nung'une Simoni Patulu akaashidoni,
“Apali apa nnemba jumo ávenavo magung'u mwanu autani na dyomba mbili. Kanji na vinu avi vilota kuntosha nyani?”

Yesu kutwala kushidoni, “Valamulile vanu vaikalange.” Palyutu lyolyo lyo undípagwa ukoka woe namene, bai vanu uti vandíikalanga. Pakati pavanu vovo vo, vandípagwa valume vakuwikila shikonda shadyalupu mwanu doni.
Yesu akatwala magung'u alalá kunnambwalela Nnungu, kuvajavila avalá vaikalénge na dyomba adilá kutandela momo kwodana na kenga mo mwashilatela kula munu.
Bai vanu vakaikutange, Yesu andívaulila vakwoda vake doni, “Kushania makombo uti, hamunaleke ata ingalamwamwa ijaika.”
Vakakushanie makombo avalakíle mumagung'u mwanu alalá, vandyúmbadya makalala kumi na mbili.
Napanelo vanu pavagwene shimanyikilo shatandile Yesu vandítangola kushidoni, “Aju mwiu ni jo nkúlava watushinnindila aide mushilambo.”
Yesu akamanye kenga vankwida nantwala kwadimongo vauke vakankamudye shiumu, nae andítila kavili kuka gweka kumashinga.
Napanelo pauwikile wakati wayalyulo, vakwoda vake vandyálela mpaka kulitanda.
Vakainjila mwingalava kutwala mwanda kulodya ku Kapalanaumu. Muwakati awo liduva lindídimba na Yesu avele akanava kuwika mulyutu alyo.
Napanelo mo mulitanda mo, andílipuka mawimbi kwamwaa waimepo íshipunga na dimongo.
Bai vanavo vakatukushe na ding'wau shitamba shavyuluta mwanu kwali sita doni, vanímwona Yesu awena pashanya medi avandikila paingalava kutwala vanavo kujopa namene.
Yesu napane kuvaulila kushidoni, “Ni nangu, hamunajope!”
Bai vanavo vanímpwashalela mwingalava amulá na muwakati wowo ingalava indíwikinneu kumwangu kwavashuka.

Palyamba lyake imbumba yavanu ibakidíle mwangu unji walitanda aulá vandímanya kenga palyutu alyo ìpagwite ingalava imo bai na pavakwadile vakwoda vake mwingalava ayo kuka, Yesu haukíle pamo na vanavo.
Napanelo dingalava dinji dyakwalalakela ku Tibeliyade dindívandika palyutu lyavavéle venentete na lyavalyaladíle magung'u ling'oto limwe Umu kunnambwalela Nnungu.
Bai imbumba yavanu ikone kenga Yesu pamo na vakwoda vake havapagwite mulyutu alyo, vanavo vandíinjilanga mudingalava kuka ku Kapalanaumu vannambela.
Napanelo vanavo vakamwone mwangu unji walitanda, vandímudya, “Labi, da wako akuno ko widilé duvani?”
Yesu akavajang'ula kushidoni, “Nangu ninkumwaulila mwiu mwiu doni, mwenu munkungulambela i kwamwaa wakwona vimanyikilo ila mwaa wakulya magung'u mpaka kwikuta.

Hamunakole madengo kwamwaa washakulya shúnda kanji kola kwamwaa washakulya shipágwa mukwing'a shingumi shíkamalilika. Shakulya asho Mwana Wamunu andamupa mwaa jojo jo, Nnungu Atata anintaa namakong'o.”
Vanavo napane kumudya, “Napanelo wetu tutende nyamani pakulota tutandedye shimadengo sha Nnungu?”
Yesu akavajang'ula kushidoni, “Shimadengo shalota Nnungu munkalele ni kunkulupila aijá wantumididye.”
Vanavo kutwala kumudya, “Wako po ulota kutenda shimanyikilo shani pakulota wetu tukukulupile? Ulota kutenda nyamani?
Vanakuluvetu, shakulya shamanaa vashindalya kushimbweshe kwakulinganana kenga mwavaandikidile doni, ‘Ligung'u lyakwalakela kuwa, andivapa valye.’ ”
Yesu kutwala kuvaulila doni, “Ninkumwaulila mwiu mwiu doni, Musha i ámpele mwenu ligung'u lyakwalakela kuwa kanji Atata ni ámupa mwenu ligung'u liu lyakwalakela kuwa
mwaa ligung'u lyake Nnungu ni aijá áalakadile kuwa kwing'a shilambo shingumi.”
Vanavo kutwa kumwaulila, “Nang'olo, ligung'u lyo, bai twing'a ngwengwe!”
Yesu kushidoni, “Nangu ni Ligung'u Lyashingumi. Aijá áida kwangu, hainkola shinu kavili indala na aijá ángukulupila nangu, mwiko hainkola shinu kavili inyota.
Kanji napane ndimwaulila doni, mwenu muningwona na hamunakulupila shinu.
Kula munu wangupa Atata andaida kwangu na aijá áida kwangu nangu, mwiko haninkumulanga.
Nidoni, ngwaleké kuwa i kwida ndatandedya malotelo angu ila ngwidilé ndatandedya malotelo ake aijá ángutumididye.
Napanelo malotelo amwe aijá ángutumididye ni ala, vanu uti vangupele, hanapagwe ata jumo wakungujaika kanji muliduva lyamwisho, ndivadyuwe.
Mwaa malotelo amwe Atata ni ala, kula munu ámwona Mwana na kunkulupila apate shingumi shíkamalilika na nangu nandyuwa muliduva lyamwisho.”
Napanelo vayuda vaníntangadikanga shintimatima mwaa wakutangola nae doni, “Nangu ni ligung'u lyalakadíle kuwa.”
Vanavo vandítangola vaashidoni, “Da aju i Yesu mwanagwe Yoshe? Tatake na anyoke, wetu tundivamanya. Napanelo atangola dashi doni, ‘Ngwaleké kuwa’?”
Yesu akavajang'ula kushidoni, “Hamunatangole shivenevene mungutangadikanga nangu!
Hapali munu wakuulula kwida kwangu bila Atata ángutumididye kunnangalalela aide kwangu. Nangu munu ajo, nandyuwa muliduva lyamwisho.
Mumabuku avakulava vandyandika doni, ‘Vanavo uti vandava vakupundishigwa na Nnungu.’ Nadoni kula munu ámwigwite Atata na álipundishidye kwake nae ankwida kwangu nangu.
I kenga apali munu ángwene Tatamunu ila aijá áaleke kwa Nnungu, aju ni ángwene Tatamunu.
Nangu ninkumwaulila mwiu mwiu doni, aijá ákulupila ankuvanavo shingumi shíkamalilika.
Nangu ni ligung'u lyashingumi.
Lo manaa alalá, vanakuluvenu vandilya kushimbweshe kutwala kupela.
Ali ni ligung'u lyalóka kuwa kwambangidya woewoe alye na hanapele.
Nangu ni ligung'u lingumi lyalakadíle kuwa. Munu woewoe akalya ligung'u ali andanama ngwengwe. Ligung'u lyene lyo ni wo mili wangu au wangulota kujaula pakulota shilambo shipate shingumi.”
Napanelo vayuda vandítunduvanga kutaukananga shivenevene vaashidoni, “Ilota kuva dashi nae kutupa mili wake tumamene?”
Yesu kutwala kuvaulila doni, “Ninkumwaulila mwiu mwiu doni, mwenu mukanamamena mili wa Mwana Wamunu na kukumbila myadi vyake hamuvanavo shingumi nkati mwenu.
Aijá álota kumamena mili wangu na kukumbila myadi vyangu ankuvanavo shingumi shíkamalilika. Nangu munu ajo, nandyuwa muliduva lyamwisho.
Mwaa mili wangu ni shakulya shiu na myadi vyangu ni shakukumbila shiu.
Aijá ámamena mili wangu na kukumbila myadi vyangu, ajo ankunama nkati mwangu na nangu kunama nkati mwake.
Ni kenga momo Atata mumi aningutumidya na nangu ninkunama kwamwaa wake nae, nimumo momo aijá ángumamena nangu, ajo andanama kwamwaa wangu nangu.
Mwenu! Ali ni ligung'u lyalakadíle kuwa. I kenga mwavalyalalele vanakuluvenu kutwala kupela; aijá álya ligung'u ali andanama ngwengwe.”
Vinu avi Yesu atangwele ku Kapalanaumu apundisha mushitala shakulipudidya.
Napanelo vakwoda vake voe vakaigwe vinu avyo vandítangola kushidoni, “Lilove ali lindikamadyanga. Alota kuulula nyani kulyunga ntima kwigwilila?”
Yesu amanya shintimatima kenga vakwoda vake vankutangadikanga kwamwaa wavinu avyo, andívaudya, “Da vinu avi vinkunnyatila?
Ilota kuva dashi mukamwona Mwana Wamunu akwela auka kulyutu lyavéle patandi?
Imumu ni átadya shinu shivenavo shingumi, mili hashipali shatenda. Malove animwaulidile ni imumu na ni shingumi.
Kanji vapali vanu pakati penu vákakulupila.” Yesu andívamanya tangu kunantandi avalá vákakulupila na kummanya aijá wakunnimya nae
kutwala kushidoni, “Ni ashi shitadídye nangu nimwaulile mwenu doni, hapali wakuulula kwida kwangu Atata akampele litala.”
Kutunduvangila apo vakwoda vake voe vandyújila kunyuma, havashimwoda kavili.
Napanelo Yesu andívaudya avalá kumi na mbili kushidoni, “Da namwenu momo mulota mungwambukange?”
Simoni Patulu kutwala kunjang'ula aashidoni, “Nang'olo, wetu tuka kumwe nyani? Wako ni úvenavo malove ashingumi shíkamalilika.
Wetu tundikulupila na tundimanya kenga wako ni Wakwilimyanga wake Nnungu.”
Yesu kuvajang'ula kushidoni, “Da nangu hanintandwele mwenu kumi na mbili? Bai munu jumo pakati penu ankuva Ndamoni.”
Yesu pashitangola davo ashimwamba Yudashi mwanagwe Simoni Shikaliyote mwaa jojo jo, avele jumo pakati pa avalá kumi na mbili, ni jojo akaukíle nannimya Yesu mushumwake.
Ling'oto lyavinu avyo Yesu ashipita awena mumakaja a ku Galileya bai. Nae hashilota kupita awena mumakaja a ku Yudeya mwaa vayuda vashindalambela dindila dyakulota kummalididya.
Napanelo Shikukulu Shamakuta shavayuda shishindavandikanga
kutwala vanung'unuvake kumwaulila doni, “Twala mwanda uke ku Yudeya pakulota vakwoda vako vone shimadengo shako shautenda.
Hapali ánatenda vinu kwashipii ikava kenga ankulota amanyike ngala. Napane ikava kenga unkutenda vinu avi, bai kalilodye kwashilambo.”
Mwenu, ata vo vanung'unuvake ava, havashinkulupila.
Yesu napane kuvaulila doni, “Isaa yangu hainava kunguwikila ila mwenu isaa yenu yakutenda vyenu ngwengwe ivelé tayali.
Shilambo, mwenu mwiko hashimmangedya ila nangu shinkunguvangedya mwaa nangu ninkumya ushuda nguvalanganga kenga vitendo vyake, vindinyata.
Wena mwenu po kushikukulu ko. Nangu apa, kushikukulu ashi, hanguka mwaa wakati wangu haunava kunguwikila.”
Bai nae akatangole malove alo andíikala ku Galileya.
Napane vanung'unuvake vakauke kushikulu ko, nanae andyúka kanji haukíle ngala, aukile shipiipii.
Po pashikukulu po, vananangalaledi vavayuda vashinannambela Yesu vaashidoni, “Da munu wene avelé kwashi?”
Pakati paimbumba yavanu andípagwa manyinyi oe. Vanji vashishidoni, “Munu aju, wambone.” Vanji do, “Ata padyoko, aju ankuvaashadyanga venentete.”
Kanji napane hapali áshitangola ngala mwaa wakuvajopa vananangalaledi vavayuda.
Napanelo shikukulu shìvele shing'ati, Yesu andíinjila mulugwani lwaing'ande ya Nnungu kutwala kutunduvanga kupundisha.
Bai vayuda vandíshanga vaashidoni, “Munu aju amanyité dashi Maandiko ákapundishigwe?”
Yesu akavajang'ula kushidoni, “Mapundisho ángumya nangu, hanava shinu angu nimwene; amwe aijá ángutumididye.
Munu woewoe akalota kutandedya malotelo ake jo mwene, andamanya kenga mapundisho ala, a Nnungu kwali ninkutangola yangu nimwene.
Munu ánatangola yake jo mwene, alambela alipatile lishangelo jo mwene kanji aijá ánalambela lishangelo kwa aijá ántumididye, aju ni munu waumwiu na jojo jo nkati mwake, ushwang'a haupali.
Da mwenu Musha hampele Lilamulo? Pakati penu Lilamulo alyo, hapali ata jumo átandedya. Mwaa shani munkulota mungumalidye?”
Venentete kutwala kushidoni, “Wako majini andikudulumbuwa! Da wakwashi apa álota kukumalidya?”
Yesu akavajang'ula kushidoni, “Nangu ngutandilé lidengo limo kutwala mwenu kushanga.
Musha andyumya lilamulo lyalikumbi, ata ikava kenga lilamulo ali halyalakadile kwake nae, lyaleke kwavanyakala. Na kwamwaa au mwenu munkunkumula munu likumbi muliduva lyakupumula.

Ikava kenga munkunkumula mwana likumbi muliduva lyakupumula pakulota Lilamulo lyake Musha halinatimbikange, mwaa shani munkunguvikila shitundi mwaa wakumponia nangu munu mili wake uti muliduva lyakupumula?
Leka kuukumu kwakupamapama kanji ukumu mutumila ishaliya.”
Vayelusalemu vanji kutwala kushidoni, “Da aju i jojo wavannambela vammalidye?
Alo! I aju apa átangola ngala, vanavo me havanatangola shinu? Da vakutawala vankumanya kenga munu aju mwiu ni jo Klistu?
Kanji aju wetu tunimmanya kwalakadile. Napane Klistu jo, palota kwida hapali munu álota kummanya kwalakela.”

Napanelo Yesu apundisha mwing'ande ya Nnungu, andítangola pashanya po, “Elo, mwenu muningumanya na kwetu mundimanya. Kanji nangu hangubunidye nimwene kwida akuno ila aijá ángutumididye ni waumwiu. Mwenu nae hamummanyite,
napane nangu nimmanya mwaa ngwalakadilé kwake na jojo ni ángutumididye.”
Vanavo napane kulota vankamule kanji hapali alyalavéke kundabunya mwaa wakati wake uvele ukanava kuwika.
Ata ivé davo, vanu voe pakati paimbumba vanínkulupila vaashidoni, “Da na Klistu palota kwida po, andalodya vimanyikilo vinji vyakupunda vyatenda aju avi?”
Napanelo mapalishayo vakaigwe imbumba ing'ung'ulanga vantambulanga Yesu, vanavo pamo na vanang'olo vavakulangalalela-shadaka vandívatuma vakushunga vauke vakankamule.
Yesu kutwala kuvaulila doni, “Ndapagwa kavili namu mwenu muwakati padyoko, kutwala apo ndauma kuujila kumwe aijá ángutumididye.
Mwenu munangulambela kanji hamungupata na apalá pangulota kupagwa nangu, mwenu po hamuulula kwida.”
Venentete kutwala kuudyania shivenevene, “Da munu aju alota kuka kwashi kwatukalota wetu kumpata ko? Alota kuka kwavayuda vavé kwavamidi ndavapundisha vamidi?
Amba nyamani patangola doni, ‘Munangulambela kanji hamungupata na apalá pangulota kupagwa nangu mwenu po, hamuulula kwida’?”
Napanelo muliduva lyashidududu, liduva likumene lyakumalilanga shikukulu, Yesu andítakatuka kwimila kutwala kutangola pashanya po aashidoni, “Akapagwa ínkadile inyota, aide kwangu akumbile.
Aijá ángukulupila nangu, munu ajo Maandiko ankummalanganga doni, ‘Muntima mwake dindapandukanga dyundi dyamedi ashingumi.’ ”
Napane nae ashimwamba Imumu áshilota vampate avalá vankulupidíle mwaa muwakati awo Imumu jo vavele vakanava kumpata kwoda Yesu avele akanava kupata lishangelo.
Nadoni vanu vanji pakati paimbumba vakaigwe malove alo vandítangola vaashidoni, “Aju mwiu ni nkúlava watushinnindila aide.”
Vanji vashishidoni, “Aju ni Klistu!” Napane vanji kushidoni, “Mene. Klistu jo, inkuululika nae kwalakela ku Galileya?
Da Maandiko hatangwele aashidoni, muudukulu umwe Daudi na mulikaja lya Beteleemu, likaja lyake Daudi, andaalakela Klistu?”
Napavedoni kwamwaa wake nae kundípagwa kujavanikana.
Vanji pakati pave vashindalota vankamule kanji hapagwíte wakulyalaveka kundabunya.
Kudabanga vila avalá vakushunga kuujila kwavanang'olo vavakulangalalela-shadaka na kwamapalishayo kutwala vanavo kuvaudya, “Mwaa shani hamumwidinavo?”
Vakushunga kushidoni, “Mwiko, hapali wakumanya kutangola kenga munu aijá.”
Mapalishayo kushidoni, “Da namwenu mundiduwangika?
Da apali nkútawala jumo kwali mpalishayo ánkulupidile nae?
Bai vanu ava vákamanyite Lilamulo, vandilanika.”
Napanelo Nikodemu aijá e amuukidíle Yesu, munu wamushipinga shosho shavananangalaledi, andítangola aashidoni,
“Da mulilamulo lyetu inkupagwa aki yakumuukumu munu ukanava kumwigwa na kumanya shatandile?”
Vanavo vakanjang'ula doni, “Da nawako momo ungalileya? Wena ukalalyange shana mumaandiko; undaanalalela kenga ku Galileya, mwiko hanaaloka nkúlava ata jumo.” [
Bai kula munu andyúka kwing'ande yake.
Yesu napane kuka ku Lishinga lya Milandi vya Ulivela.
Palyamba lyake, lyamba linyeiku andyúka kavili kwing'ande ya Nnungu. Venentete uti vaníntang'anedya, nae kwikala kuvapundisha.
Napanelo vamwalimu vadishaliya pamo na mapalishayo vandímwidanavo nkongwe wavankamwíle ugoni kumwimidya shing'ati shave
kutwala kumwaulila Yesu doni, “Mwalimu, nkongwe aju tuninkamula ugoni.
Napanelo mu Lilamulo, Musha anditulamulila vakongwe vantindo au kuvaamanga majanga mpaka vapele! Kushi wako po, uushidashi?”
Vandímudya davo vantela ntego pakulota vapate lilove lyakunkanidyanga. Yesu apalá akatepa kutwala kutunduvanga kwandika na shala pai.
Bai kwodamwaa vashindauka mushu vamudya, nae andítakatuka kuvajang'ula doni, “Pakati penu, aijá ákave lidambi ave ntandi kuntumbula nkongwe aju lijanga.”
Akatepa kavili kuka mushu aandika pai.
Vanavo vakaigwe malove alo vandítunduvanga kuma jumo jumo kutunduvangila vanang'olo. Pashinu apo kubaki Yesu pamo na aijá nkongwe wavamwimidídye shing'ati shipinga.
Yesu akatakatuka kutwala kumudya nkongwe jo kushidoni, “Wako, vanu avalá vavelé kwashi? Andibakila jumo wakulota kukuukumu?”
Nkongwe jo do, “Nang'olo, hapali ata jumo.” Yesu kushidoni, “Ata nanangu handikuukumu. Wena na haunatege kavili.”]
Yesu andítangola kavili na vanavo kushidoni, “Nangu ni Lilangadyo Lyashilambo. Munu woewoe ángwoda nangu hawena shinu mwiko mushii, ngwengwe andavanavo lilangadyo lyashingumi.”
Mapalishayo kutwa kushidoni, “Wako unkumya ushuda ulivalanganga gwegwe umwene; ushuda wako haunava wiu.”

Yesu akavajang'ula kushidoni, “Ata ikava kenga nangu ninkumya ushuda ngulivalanganga nene nimwene ushuda wangu wìu mwaa nangu ndimanya kwangwalakadile na kwanguka. Mwenu kanji hamumanyite kwangalakadile na ata kwanguka.
Mwenu muukumu shimunumunu, nangu namuukumu shinu munu davo.
Ata ikava kenga nangu ninkuukumu, kuukumu kwangu kwìu mwaa nangu hangunava shinu gweka, ninkuva namu Atata ángutumididye.
Na ata mo mu Lilamulo lyenu vandyandika doni, ushuda wavanu vavili ni ushuda wiu.
Napanelo nangu ni nimunu ngumya ushuda ngulivalanganga nene nimwene na junji áumya ushuda anguvalanganga nangu ni Atata ángutumididye.”
Vanavo kutwala kumudya, “Tatako jo avelé kwashi?” Yesu kushidoni, “Mwenu nangu hamungumanyite na ata Atata hamummanyite momo. Leka mùngumanyite ata Atata mukanimmanya.”

Malove alo Yesu atangwele àvele pepi na pamashanduku avashitenda vajela njuluku washadaka akuno apundisha mulugwani lwamwing'ande ya Nnungu. Napane hapali munu ankamwíle mwaa wakati wake uvele ukanava kuwika.
Napanelo Yesu andítangola mumwanda wambili aashidoni, “Nangu ninkulyumadyanga, mwenu munangulambela kanji mundapalanga mumadambi enu. Kwanguka nangu apa mwenu po hamuulula kwida.”
Vayuda do, “Patangola doni, ‘Kwanguka nangu mwenu hamuulula kwida,’ da alota kulibyaa mwene?”
Yesu, “Mwenu po mmashilambo ashi, nangu apa kwetu kuwa. Mwenu mmashilambo sho shapai ashi, nangu hangunava shinu washilambo ashi.
Ni ashi shitadídye nimwaulile kenga mundapalanga mumadambi enu. Mwaa mukanakulupila kenga Nangu ni Nene, mundapalanga mumadambi enu.”
Vanavo kutwala kushidoni, “Wako unyani?” Yesu do, “Nangu ni Nene vyangulivalangenge kunantandi.
Nindivanavo vyoe vyakutangola na vyakumuukumu mwenu; napane i nangu gweka, aijá ángutumididye ni waumwiu na ashilá shanimwigwite nae ni shosho shanguvalangangila shilambo.”
Vanavo havashimanya kenga pashivaulila davo ashimwamba Tatamunu.

Yesu kutwala kuvaulila kushidoni, “Pamulota kunnyanyula Mwana Wamunu ni pamulota kungumanya kenga Nangu ni Nene. Nangu hangunatenda shinu vinu vyakubuni nene nimwene; ninkutangola avilá vyangupundishidye Atata bai.
Aijá ángutumididye ankupagwa pamo namu nangu. Nae hananguleka shinu gweka mwaa avilá vinnagwéla, ngwengwe ninkutandedya.”
Bai akatangole malove alo uti, vanu voe vanínkulupila.
Napanelo Yesu andívaulila vayuda váshinkulupila nae kushidoni, “Mwenu mukauka mushu mwigwilila mapundisho angu mundava mwiu mmakwoda vangu.
Mundamanya umwiu na wo umwiu wo, unamwambola.”
Vanavo vakanjang'ula kushidoni, “Wetu apa ni tuvanu tuvamuudukulu umwe Abulaamu. Mwiko hatunava kutandegwa tuvatumwa vamunu woewoe. Napanelo mwaa shani unkutangola doni, ‘Mundava mmamuunaiti’?”
Yesu akavajang'ula, “Ninkumwaulila mwiu mwiu doni, aijá átega, mulidambi mo, ajo ntumwa.
Mwenu! Ntumwa hanapagwa ngwengwe paing'ande; mwana ni ánapagwa ngwengwe paing'ande.
Nadoni Mwana akamwambola, mwenu mwiu mundava mmamuunaiti.
Ndimanya kenga mwenu ni mmanu mmamuudukulu umwe Abulaamu kanji munkulota mungubyae mwaa lilove lyangu halinavanavo shinu litala nkati mwenu.
Avilá vyangugwene nangu kumwe Atata ni vyanguvalanganga; napane vyamwigwite mwenu kwatatagwenu, ni vyovyo vyamutenda.”
Vanavo vakajang'ula, “Tatagwetu wetu ni Abulaamu.” Yesu kushidoni, “Mwenu leka mùvele mmanavake Abulaamu mukanditenda vyatandile nae.
Napane munkulambela mungubyae, nimunu nímwaulidile umwiu, wowo wangwigwite kwa Nnungu. Avi Abulaamu hatandile!
Mwenu mutenda vyatandile tatagwenu.” Kutwala vanavo kushidoni, “Hatunava shinu wetu tuvana vakuvaiva. Wetu tunkuvanavo Tatagwetu jumo, Nnungu.”
Yesu kuvaulila doni, “Nnungu leka àvele tatagwenu mukaningunagwaledya nangu mwaa nangu ngwaleké kwa Nnungu na ndida kwamwaa wake. Hangwidile kwakubuni nimwene, nae ni ángutumididye.
Da mwenu mwaa shani hamunaigwa shinu vyangutangola? Ni mwaa wamukaulula kwigwa lilove lyangu.

Mwenu tatagwenu Ndamoni na malotelo atatagwenu jo, ni amulota mutandedye. Nae tangu kala ni nkúbyaa, nkati muumwiu, hapali mwaa jojo jo umwiu pamili pake havenavo. Panatangola vyaushwang'a alilodya mavalelo ake mwaa nae ni nkúshang'apa na ni lipata lyaushwang'a.
Doni, kwoda nangu ninkutangola umwiu, mwenu hamungukulupila.
Kwaupande washimadambi, wakwashi pakati penu wakunguundukula? Napanelo ikava nangu umwiu ninkutangola, mwaa shani hamunangukulupila shinu?
Aijá wa Nnungu, vyatangola Nnungu anáigwa. Nadoni mwenu hamunaigwa shinu mwaa hamuvele vake Nnungu.”
Vayuda vakanjang'ula, “Da wetu hatuvenavo ishaliya patukwaulidile doni, ‘Wako unshamaliya na majini andikudulumbuwa’?”
Yesu kuvajang'ula, “Nangu majini hanguvenavo ila Atata ninkumwishimu na mwenu nangu, munkungwiludyanga.
Nangu hangunalilambalela shinu lishangelo nene nimwene. Lishangelo alyo, apali álambela; ni jojo áukumu.
Ninkumwaulila mwiu mwiu doni, munu áigwilila lilove lyangu, kupela ko mwiko, haona shinu ngwengwe.”

Vayuda kutwala kushidoni, “Napanelo tundikwanalela kenga mwiu unkuvanavo majini. Abulaamu tu andipela na vakulava momo vandipalanga. Napanelo wako utangola kenga álota kwigwilila lilove lyangu, kupela ko mwiko, halinga ngwengwe!
Da wako unkulivika kuva unang'olo namene kumpunda tatagwetu wetu Abulaamu? Nae andipela na ata vakulava momo vandipela. Kushi wako, ulivika kuva unyani?”
Yesu kushidoni, “Ikava kenga ninkuling'a nene nimwene lishangelo, lishangelo alyo kwangu halive mana. Ángupa nangu lishangelo ni Atata, aijá wamumwamba mwenu doni, ‘Nnungu wetu.’
Mwenu nae hamummanyite, napane nangu ni nímmanyite. Leka ngùtangwele doni hanimmanyite, ndikandiva ninshwang'a kenga mwenu. Nangu kanji nimmanya na lilove lyake, ninkwigwilila.
Tatagwenu Abulaamu íshinannagwela namene aone liduva lyangu; liduva ali andyóna na andípuwanga.”
Vayuda kutwala kushidoni, “Wako haunava kuwisha vyaka amusini vyaulinga. Napanelo uushidoni undimwona Abulaamu?”
Yesu kushidoni, “Ninkumwaulila mwiu mwiu doni, Abulaamu akanava kuvalekwa, Nangu ni Nene.”
Napavedoni vayuda vandílakatanga majanga pakulota vamwamange, Yesu kanji kutivaniva kutwala kuma mwing'ande ya Nnungu.
Napanelo Yesu apita awena andímwona munu jumo wakuputala mevo tangu shing'ang'eng'e.
Vakwoda vake kutwala kumudya, “Labi, da lidambi lintadídye munu aju aputale mevo atagilé mwene kwali atagilé tatake na anyoke?”
Yesu kushidoni, “Munu aju hatagile na ata tatake na anyoke momo havatagile. Shitadídye avalekwe àputele ni pakulota vitendo vya Nnungu vililodye kwa ashilá shilóta kuntandeka.
Indituvaikila tukole madengo amwe aijá ángutumididye uvé wo mui au. Shilo shinkwida pakaulula munu kukola madengo.
Pangupagwite mushilambo, nangu ni lilangadyo lyashilambo.”
Akatangole malove ala, andíshunila mata pai, kukanda ulongo padyoko kumpaka wakuputala mevo muding'wikwi
kutwala kumwaulila doni, “Wena ukanavange medi kulitangi lya Shilowamu,” Shilowamu mana ake wakutumigwa. Bai munu wakuputala mevo aijá andyúka ndanavanga medi kutwala kuja alola.
Napanelo vashitanonomwagwe pamo na vanji váshimwona anama kujugwa, vashindatangola vaashidoni, “Da aju i jojo áshiikala vila ajugwajugwa?”
Vanji kushidoni, “Ni jojo!” Vanji kavili kushidoni, “Hanava shinu nae, ila vandilandana.” Kanji jo mwene kutwala kulivalanga shana kushidoni, “Mwenu nangu ni nene.”
Vanavo kutwala kumudya, “Kanji napanelo upatilé dashi kulola?”

Nae kushidoni, “Munu jo wavanshema Yesu andikanda ulongo, kungupaka muding'wikwi kutwala kungwaulila doni, ‘Wena ku Shilowamu ukanavange medi.’ Nangu kuka ndanavanga kutwala popo po, nangu kulalenneu.”
