Vanavo kumudya, “Napanelo munu wene avelé kwashi?” Nae kushidoni, “Nangu namanya shinu.”
Bai vanavo vaníntwala munu e avéle wakuputala mevo kumuukanavo kwamapalishayo.
Napanelo liduva lyene lyakandíle Yesu ulongo na lyantadídye alole, livele liduva lyakupumula.
Mapalishayo navanavo kutwala kumudya mwapatidile kulola. Nae jo kuvaulila doni, “Angupakilé ulongo muding'wikwi, nangu kunavanga medi na ambi apa ninkulola.”

Mapalishayo vanji kutwala kushidoni, “Munu aju hanaaloka shinu kwa Nnungu mwaa ankutimbanga liduva lyakupumula.” Vanji kushidoni, “Kanji ilota kuululika dashi munu wakutega kulodya vimanyikilo kenga avi?” Bai pakati pave kundípagwa kuvilingananga.
Vanavo vandímudya kavili aijá e aputéle kushidoni, “Pakuva munu ajo andikuponia, napanelo wako umwona kuva kenga nyani?” Nae kushidoni, “Nkúlava.”
Vananangalaledi vavayuda, vanavo havashikulupila kenga kala po munu ajo andíputala mevo kutwala ambi apa kulola mpaka vandyúka ndavashema vatatavake
kuvaudya, “Da aju i jo mwanagwenu wamummalanganga kenga avalakwadidyé àputele mevo? Napanelo apatilé dashi kulola?”
Vatatavake kushidoni, “Aju tunimmanya kuva mwanagwetu na avalakwadidyé àputele mevo.
Napane mwapatidile kulola mo, hatumanyite na aijá ántadidye alole, hatummanyite. Mudye jo mwene jo andikulumuka jo, ankuulula kulivalanganga.”

Vatatavake vo vandíjang'ula davo mwaa wakuvajopa vananangalaledi vavayuda. Doni, vananangalaledi vo vandípakanila pakulota munu woewoe álota kummalanganga Yesu kuva Klistu vammingange pashitala shakulipudidya.
Ni ashi shitadídye vatatavake vatangole doni, “Mudye jo mwene jo andikulumuka ajo.”
Vanavo vakanshema kavili munu aijá e aputéle mevo kutwala kumwaulila doni, “Mupe Nnungu lishangelo! Wetu tundimanya kenga munu wene jo, nkùtega.”
Nae kushidoni, “Yakuva nae munu wakutega hangunamanya shinu. Shangumanyite ni ashi: kala po hanishilola, ambi apa ninkulola.”
Vanavo kumudya kavili, “Akutandilé nyamani? Akutandalelé mwashi mpaka wako kupata kulola?”
Nae kushidoni, “Nangu nimwaulila kanji mwenu hamunangwigwilila shinu. Napanelo mwaa shani munkulota nimmalangile kavili? Da namwenu momo mulota muve mmakwoda vake?”
Bai vanavo vanínniula vaashidoni, “Nkwóda wamunu wako ni gwegwe umwene. Wetu tuvakwoda vake Musha.
Wetu tundimanya shana kenga Nnungu anditangola shalowa namu Musha kanji munu ajo kwalakadile, hatumanyite.”
Munu jo kuvajang'ula doni, “Kulava mwenu! Mwenu ata mukanamanye kwalakadile kanji ni jojo ángutadidye nangu ngulole.
Wetu tundimanya kenga Nnungu hanamwigwa nkútega kanji aijá ámwishimu na átandedya malotelo ake, ajo nae ankumwigwa.
Tangu kunantandi hainava kwigwinika do, munu woewoe anintadya kulola wakuputala mevo shing'ang'eng'e.
Aju leka àkaalakadile kwa Nnungu hanaulule kutenda ata shidikidiki nyenda.”
Vayuda kutwala kushidoni, “Wako uvalakwididyé uti mmadambi; napanelo ulota utupundishe wetu?” Bai vanímminganga mushitala shakulipudidya.
Napanelo Yesu akaigwa do, munu wampatiidye kulola aijá vanimminganga mushitala shakulipudidya. Akankodye andímudya, “Da wako unkunkulupila Mwana Wamunu?”
Munu jo kushidoni, “Nang'olo, da munu wene jo wakwashi kwambangidya nangu ninkulupile?”
Yesu kushidoni, “Wako undimwona. Ni jojo átangola namu wako po.”
Munu kushidoni, “Nang'olo ninkukulupila.” Bai nae kutwala kulipudya kumili kwake.
Yesu kushidoni, “Shangwidilidile mushilambo amu ni kwamwaa wakuukumu pakulota avalá vákalola vapate kulola na avalá valóla, vaputale.”
Napanelo mapalishayo vanji vapagwíte pepi namu pavéle Yesu vakaigwe malove alo vandímudya, “Da wetu po momo tundiputala?”
Yesu kushidoni, “Mwenu leka mùputele mevo, mukanave na lidambi. Kanji kwodamwaa munkushidoni, ‘Tunkulola,’ lidambi lyenu lyo, linkupagwa.”
“Ninkumwaulila mwiu mwiu doni, aijá ákainjilila pannango walingongo lyavangandolo ila áinjilila akwela lingongo, ajo nkwíva na nkúbyaa.
Napane áinjilila pannango nae ni nkúshunga wiu wavangandolo.
Aijá munu wapannango, anánshimulila nnango kutwala vangandolo kwigwa lidi lyake. Napane vangandolo vake vo, kula ngandolo nae anánshema na lina lyake kutwala kuvaumidya panda kuvalangalalela.
Nae panavaumya panda avalá vangandolo vake uti, mwene andálangalela kutwala vangandolo vake vo kumwoda mwaa lidi lyake vankumanya.
Vangandolo, mwiko havanamwoda munu nnangadavo, vanavo vanantukuta mwaa madi avanu valangadavo, havamanyite.”
Yesu andívakang'ela nkong'o awo kanji vanavo ashilá shashivaulila, mana ake havashimanya.
Napavedoni Yesu andítangola kavili aashidoni, “Ninkumwaulila mwiu mwiu doni, nangu ni Nnango Wavangandolo.
Vanu uti valitandyénge kwida nangu nikanava, vanavo uti vàkwiva na vàkubyaa; vovo vo vangandolo havavaigwilidile.
Nangu ni nnango; munu woewoe akainjilila kwangu, andaambwalegwa. Nae andainjila, andauma na andakodya udani wambone.
Nkwíva aidila bai kwiva, kubyaa na kubamola; nangu jo ngwidilé pakulota vanavo vapate shingumi na shingumi shene vavenavo shoe namene.
“Nangu ni Nkúshunga Wambone. Nkúshunga Wambone, nae anájaula shingumi shake kwamwaa wavangandolo.
Munu washibalugwa, ákavele nkúshunga na ákavele mwene vangandolo, nae kumwona kwene livinji tu, andávaleka vangandolo kutukuta kuka kutwala livinji jo kuvainjilila, vanavo uti do, pwii.
Napane amu ni mwanatandela munu washibalugwa, nae hanavatanana vangandolo.
“Nangu ni Nkúshunga Wambone; vangandolo vangu ninkuvamanya na vo vangu vo, vankungumanya
kenga mo mwangumanyila nangu Atata, nanangu momo Atata ninkummanya. Nadoni ninkujaula shingumi shangu kwamwaa wavangandolo.
Ninkuvanavo vangandolo vanji vákavele vamulingongo ali; vovo vo ininguvaikila ndivatwale, vanavo lidi lyangu vandaigwa, vandapagwa shipinga shimo na nkúshunga jumo.
Ni ashi shitádya Atata angunagwaledye mwaa nangu ninkujaula shingumi shangu pakulota ngupate kavili.
Shingumi shangu sho, hapali wakungupoka; nangu ninkujaula nene nimwene. Ninkuvanavo madalaka akujaula na akupata kavili. Lilamulo ali ngupatilé kumwe Atata.”
Napavedoni kwamwaa wamalove alo kundyúmilila kavili kujavanikana pakati pavajuda.
Voe pakati pave vashishidoni, “Munu aju animwinjila majini; jojo aju, ankudulumbuka. Napane mwaa shani munkumwigwilila?”
Vanji kushidoni, “Mwenu! Malove ala hanava shinu amunu wamajini. Hainatoshe lijini ankuulula kuntadya munu ákalola kulola?”
Napanelo pa Yelusalemu shindípagwa Shikukulu Shakwapula. Wakati wene wo uvele washipwepwe.
Napanelo Yesu àvele mwing'ande ya Nnungu ashindapita awanawananga mulukoma lwashitala shimwe Shalomoni.
Vayuda vaníntang'anedya kutwala kumudya, “Ulota kutuleka mudiwashiwashi mpaka duvani? Ikava kenga wako ni Klistu, twaulila ngala.”
Yesu kuvajang'ula, “Nangu nimwaulila kanji mwenu hamunakulupila shinu. Vitendo vyangutenda nangu palina limwe Atata ni vyovyo vinguumidya nangu ushuda.
Mwenu po hamunakulupila shinu mwaa hamunava shinu mmangandolo vangu.
Vangandolo vangu nangu, vankwigwa lidi lyangu; nangu ndivamanya vanavo na vanavo vankungwoda.
Avalá vangwóda nangu, ninkuvapa shingumi shíkamalilika, vovo vo mwiko havajaika na hapali wakungupoka mmakono mwangu.
Atata ángupele vanavo ankuvapunda vanu uti na hapali munu wakuulula kumpoka vanu avo mmakono mwake.
Nangu namu Atata tunkuva shinu shimo.”
Bai vayuda vandílakatanga kavili majanga pakulota vamwamange.
Yesu kushidoni, “Nditenda vinu vyoe vyambone vyakwalakela kumwe Atata pamevo penu. Napanelo pakati pavinu avyo, shakwashi shamulota mungwamangile majanga?”
Vayuda kushidoni, “Wetu hatunalota shinu kukwamanga majanga kwamwaa washinu shoeshoe shambone shautandile, ni kwamwaa wakukupulu. Wako umunu, napane unkulivika kuva Nnungu.”
Yesu kushidoni, “Da mu Lilamulo lyenu havaandike doni, ‘Nangu nditangola doni, Mwenu po, mmannungu?’
Ikava kenga avalá vapatíle ntenga wake Nnungu, andivashema kuva vannungu, napane Maandiko hapali wakuulula kuputanga,
kushi aijá walyapulidile Atata jo kuntumidya mushilambo? Mwaa shani munkutangola doni, ‘Unkukupulu, pangulivalanga doni, Nangu ni Mwana wa Nnungu?’
Ikava kenga nangu hangunatandedya shinu vinu vimwe Atata bai hamunangukulupile
kanji ikava ninkutandedya, ata mukanangukulupila nangu, bai kulupila kwavinu vyangutenda vyo pakulota mumanye na muke mushu mumanya kenga Atata ankupagwa nkati mwangu na nangu nkati mumwe Atata.”
Bai vayuda vandílingangila kavili kunkamula kanji nae andívativaniva.
Yesu andyúma kavili kuka mwangu unji wa Yudani kulyutu alilá lyashivabatishidya Nshuwau vanu, nae kutwala kwikala koko.
Napanelo vanu voe vashindamwidila na vashindatangola shivenevene vaashidoni, “Nshuwau hatandile shimanyikilo kanji uti vyashimmalanganga munu aju, vìu.”
Bai mulyutu alyo vanu voe vanínkulupila Yesu.
Napanelo andípagwa munu jumo Lashalu áshipagwa mushilwele wapalikaja lya Betaniya, likaja lyolyo lyashinama Maliya na nkulumunu Malita.
Avele Maliya aijá ampakénge Umu mauta na ampukuténge mmadodo atumila ugwimbu wake e avénavo numbumunu nnwele, Lashalu.
Napanelo valumbumunu avalá vandítuma vakamwaulile Yesu doni, “Nang'olo, mujo waunnagwaledya namene wako aijá, nnwele.”

Yesu akaigwe, andítangola kushidoni, “Shilwele asho hashinava shinu shakuka ndamalilikila mukupela kanji shilota kulodya lishangelo lyake Nnungu pakulota kwaindila yashilwele asho, Mwana wa Nnungu apate lishangelo.”
Yesu ashinannagwaledya namene Malita na nung'une pamo na numbugwave Lashalu.
Napavedoni nae àigwite avi kenga Lashalu nnwele, andíikala maduva mavili mulyutu lyavéle
kutwala apo andívaulila vakwoda vake kushidoni, “Tuke kavili ku Yudeya.”
Vakwoda vo kushidoni, “Labi, madudi-madudi apa vananangalaledi vashilota vakwamange majanga; napanelo ulota uke koko kavili?”
Yesu kushidoni, “Da liduva halivenavo disaa kumi na mbili? Munu akawena mui hanalikuvala mwaa nae andóna lilangadyo lyashilambo.
Kanji áwena shilo andálikuvala mwaa lilangadyo nkati mwake halipali.”
Malove ala nae andítangola naling'oto andítangola kavili aashidoni, “Njetu Lashalu andilala, nangu ninkuka ndamwimulanga.”
Vakwoda vake kushidoni, “Nang'olo ikava kenga alelé lwono, bai andapona.”
Yesu pashitangola davo ashivalanga kupela kumwe Lashalu kanji vakwoda vashikumbukila kenga nae ashamba kulala kwalwono.
Napavedoni Yesu andívaulila ngala kushidoni, “Lashalu andipela.
Nangu ninkupuwanga kwamwaa wenu mwenu mwaa kwanavo nangu hangupagwite pakulota mwenu mukulupile. Kanji leka tuke tukannole.”
Napanelo Tome, aijá áshimanyika Didimu, andívaulila vavagwe kushidoni, “Leka tuke tukapalange pamo namu nae.”
Yesu pawikile ànkadidye Lashalu àtwete maduva nsheshe mushonga.
Napanelo kuma pa Yelusalemu mpaka pa Betaniya shivele shitamba shavyuluta vitatu.
Napavedoni vanu voe pakati pavayuda vandyúka nannidya Malita namu Maliya kwamwaa wanumbugwave.
Malita paigwite kenga Yesu ankwida, andyúka anshinga. Maliya andíbaki pakaja.
Malita kumwaulila Yesu, “Nang'olo, wako leka ùpagwite apa numbwangu hanapele.
Ata ambi apa ninkumanya kenga shoeshoe shaulota kunjugwa Nnungu, Nnungu andakupa.”
Yesu kutwala kumwaulila doni, “Numbuvo andadyuka.”
Malita, “Nangu ninkumanya kenga nae andadyuka mukudyuka kwamuliduva lyamwisho.”
Yesu doni, “Nangu ni Kudyuka na Shingumi. Aijá ángukulupila nangu, ata akapela andavanavo shingumi.
Kula munu ánama na ángukulupila nangu, mwiko hapela. Dashi wako unkukulupila malove ala?”
Malita kushidoni, “Elo nang'olo. Nangu ndikulupila kenga wako ni Klistu, Mwana wa Nnungu aijá úshilota kwida mushilambo amu.”
Akamalile kutangola malove alo andyúka kwanung'unumunu Maliya nannyinyitila doni, “Mwalimu jo andiwika, andákushema.”
Maliya akaigwe, andítakatukinneu kumuukila Yesu
pakuva Yesu avele akanava kwinjila nkaja àvele palyutu lyolyo lyankodídye Malita.
Napanelo vayuda vapagwíte namu Maliya paing'ande pake vannidya, vakamwone atakatuka na auma shipajelo vandímwoda vakumbukila doni, auka kuvyonga ndalila.
Bai Maliya akawike pavele Yesu, pangwene andíguguvala mmadodo mwake aashidoni, “Nang'olo, wako leka ùpagwite apa numbwangu hanapele.”
Yesu pangwene Maliya alila na vayuda vamwodíle navanavo momo valila, unímmeta ntima wake na vyakunkodya muntima mwake viníntindinganianga.
Kutwala kudya, “Da munshikilé pashi?” Vanavo kushidoni, “Nang'olo, ida ulole.”
Yesu andyúmadyanga myodi.
Vayuda do, “Munkwona mwashinnagwaladyedya nae munu aju!”
Vanu vanji pakati pave kushidoni, “Da aju i jojo ántadidye munu aijá wakuputala mevo kulola? Napane hainaululike kuntadya munu aju hanapele?”
Napanelo Yesu akuno ummeta ntima wake kavili, andyúka kulikabuli. Likabuli alyo livele ntupa na vandídiva lijanga.
Yesu kutwala kushidoni, “Usha lijanga lyo!” Malita numbugwe wakujala do, “Nang'olo, ambi apa ankunung'a mwaa andipita maduva nsheshe.”
Yesu, “Da nangu handikwaulidile doni, ukakulupila undona lishangelo lyake Nnungu?”
Bai vanavo vandyúsha lijanga lyo Yesu kunyanyula shilaka kutwala kushido, “Atata, ninkukulambwalela mwaa uningwigwilila.
Ninkumanya kenga wako ngwengwe unkungwigwa kanji nditangola davo pakulota vanu vangutang'anadídye vakulupile kenga wako po, ni úngutumididye.”
Akatangole malove ala andítangola pashanya po aashidoni, “Lashalu, umila panda apa!”
Munu e apadíle aijá kuma apalá, makono na madodo vàntavilidyenge shanda, ing'ope vàungangidile lilesho. Yesu kushidoni, “Muungulange munneke auke.”
Kutwala vanu voe pakati pavayuda ve vamwidilíle Maliya pavagwene avilá vyatandile Yesu vanínkulupila.
Napane vyovyo vyo, vanji vandyúka ndavalanganga kwamapalishayo.
Vanang'olo vavakulangalalela-shadaka pamo na mapalishayo vandíikala nguguvale kutwala kushido, “Na wetu apa shipali shatwamba? Munu aju ankulodya vimanyikilo vyoe namene.
Tukanneka auka mushu atandedya, vanu uti vanankulupila. Valoma vandaida ndatupoka lyutu lyetu pamo na venentete vetu.”
Napanelo Kaipashi, munu jumo wamushipinga shosho, avéle nkúlangalalela-shadaka nkumene mumwaka awo, andívaulila, “Mwenu hashipali shamumanya!
Hamunaanalela shinu kenga ni shambone kupela munu jumo kwamwaa walikola kuliko kumalilika venentete uti?”
Malove ake Kaipashi havele gweka akubuni jo mwene. Ni kwamwaa wakuva nkúlangalalela-shadaka nkumene mumwaka awo ni shintadídye avalangange kenga Yesu andapela kwamwaa wavenentete
na ata i gweka venentete avo, namomo kwamwaa wavana va Nnungu vamwadilikanénge pakulota vanavo, nae avaunganiange vave shipinga shimo.
Bai kutunduvangila muliduva alyo, vandyámuwa kummalidya.
Kwaing'ano ayo, Yesu hashiwena kavili ngala pakati pavayuda ila andyúma kuka isemu ívele pepi na kushimbweshe palikaja lyavashema Epulaimu. Pashinu apo, nae andíikala na vakwoda vake.
Napanelo Pasaka yavayuda ishindavandikanga. Vanu voe vaisemu ayo, Pasaka ikanava kuwika vandyúka ku Yelusalemu ndalyushanianga ushapu.
Vanavo vashinannambela Yesu na vàimilenge mwing'ande ya Nnungu vashindaudyania doni, “Mwenu mwona dashi? Mwiu, jojo jo andaida pashikukulu apa?”
Doni, vanang'olo vavakulangalalela-shadaka pamo na mapalishayo vandyúmya lilamulo lyakulota munu ámanyite lyutu lyavele Yesu, avalangange kwambangidya vakankamule.
Napanelo àbakidile maduva sita kuwika Pasaka, Yesu andíwika pa Betaniya likaja lyashinama Lashalu aijá wandyuwídye pakati pavakupela.
Koko ko vanínkandyangidya shakulya shalyulo; Malita ashindamwangaikangila pashilya akuno Lashalu àikele pandamu namu nae.

Napanelo Maliya andítwala ishupa yamauta akunung'angila ambone-uti aúka njuluku woe kumpaka mmadodo mwake Yesu, kupukutanga mmadodo mo atumila ugwimbu wake. Kunung'angila kwamauta alo, kundyánela uti nng'ande mo.
Napanelo Yudashi Shikaliyote, jumo pakati pavakwoda vake aijá álota kunnimya, andítangola doni,
“Mwaa shani mauta ala havashumididye, njuluku wo kuvapa vamashikini? Dikandipatikananga dinali dimiya nnatu.”
Nae andítangola davo i kwamwaa wakuvatanana vamashikini kanji mwaa wakuva nkwíva. Lipeta lyanjuluku lishiikala namu nae; njuluku úshiinjila amo, nae ashindadadamola.
Yesu kushidoni, “Nneke, nae atandilé davo pakulota alikandyedye muliduva lyamashiko angu.
Vamashikini vo mundapagwanavo ngwengwe, napane nangu namu mwenu ngwengwe hangupagwa.”
Napanelo imbumba yavayuda paimanyite doni, Yesu apali ku Betaniya, indyúka koko i yakunnola Yesu gweka, yadavo ivele yakunnola Lashalu aijá wandyuwídye pakati pavakupela.
Nadoni vanang'olo vavakulangalalela-shadaka vandípanga nnugu pakulota vammalidye yadavo Lashalu
mwaa, kwamwaa wake, vanu voe vashindavaambukanga vayuda kutwala kunkulupila Yesu.
Napane palyamba pake po, imbumba yavanu ye iidíle pashikukulu, paiigwite doni, Yesu ankwida pa Yelusalemu,
vanavo vandínyakatanga maalati amalala kuka nanshinga vajunga pashanya po vaashidoni, “Ashibike! Aalaligwe aijá áida palina limwe Umu! Aalaligwe Umu wa ku Ishilaeli!”
Yesu anímpata mwana wapunda kutwala kunkwela kenga mwavaandikidile,
“Mmanashiyau, hamunajope! Mwenu, Umu wenu ankwida ànkwadile mwana wapunda.”
Kunantandi vakwoda vake havashimanya vinu avi, napane paukile ndapata Yesu lishangelo ni pavakumbukidile doni, vinu avi vindyandikigwa vimwamba nae na vyovyo vyo, vanintenda.
Napanelo imbumba ye ipagwíte namu Yesu muwakati wanshamíle Lashalu mushonga na kundyuwa pakati pavakupela, indyúka mushu yumya ushuda.
Ni mwaa wakwigwa kenga Yesu andítenda shimanyikilo asho shitadídye imbumba ya pa Yelusalemu yuke ikampwashalele.
Nadoni mapalishayo vandyaulanila shivenevene kushidoni, “Wetu apa hashipali shatwamba! Shapo lola, shilambo uti shindimwoda nae!”
Napanelo pakati pavanu ve vaukíle ndalipudya kwa Nnungu pashikukulu sha Pasaka, vanji vo vavele vagalegu.
Vovo vo, vandímuukila Pilipo munu wa ku Beteshaida ya ku Galileya nanjugwa doni, “Nang'olo, wetu tulota tumwone Yesu.”
Pilipo ankuka ndamwaulila Andaleya kutwala uti vavili, vankuka ndamwaulila Yesu.
Yesu ankuvajang'ula doni, “Wakati wakupata Mwana Wamunu lishangelo, undiwika.
Ninkumwaulila mwiu mwiu doni, imbeju yangano painagwilila pai ikanawa, ivalela momo. Napane ikawa, indápa vyepo vyoe.
Aijá ánagwaledya shingumi shake andakatoka na aijá ányatila shingumi shake mushilambo ashi, andakondya mushingumi shíkamalilika.
Aijá ángutumika, inimmaikila angwode. Pangulota kupagwa nangu, ntumika wangu momo andapagwa popo. Munu akangutumika, Atata andamupa ishima.
“Napanelo ambi apa ungumi wangu unkwangaikanga. Da ngushi dashi? ‘Atata, muwakati au ngwambola’? Mene, shangwidilile muwakati au ni shosho ashi.
Atata, ing'a lishangelo lina lyako!” Bai lindíigwinika lidi lyakwalakela kuwa líishidoni, “Lishangelo tayali nding'a na yadavo ndaing'a kavili.”
Imbumba ye ipagwíte mulyutu alyo ikaigwe lidi alyo, indítangola doni, “Ayo, ing'uva.” Vanji do, “Njelo anditangola namu nae.”
Yesu akajang'ula kushidoni, “Lidi ali haliidile kwamwaa wangu nangu, liidilé mwaa wenu.
Wakati wakuukumigwa shilambo ashi undiwika. Ambi apa, andavingigwa nkútawala washilambo ashi.
Napane nangu pavalota kungunyanyulidya kushanya mushilambo amu, vanu uti ndavashombela kwangu.”
Nae andítangola malove ala avalanganga inamuna yashipaledi yalota kuvauvanga.
Imbumba kutwala kujang'ula, “Lilamulo linkutupundisha kenga, ‘Klistu ngwengwe andanama,’ napane utangola dashi, ‘Mwana Wamunu inimmaikila vannyanyule’? Da ‘Mwana Wamunu jo’ ni wakwashi?”
Yesu kushidoni, “Muwakati padyoko lilangadyo lindapagwa pakati penu. Nadoni wena po pamuvenavo lilangadyo apa kwambangidya shii hashinanshushuwange. Aijá ánawena mushii, hanamanya kwashi kwauka.
Po pauvenavo lilangadyo apa, kulupila lyo lilangadyo lyo pakulota muve mmana mmalilangadyo.” Yesu akamalile kutangola, andyúma kutwala kuvativaniva.
Napanelo ata ikava kenga Yesu anditenda vimanyikilo pakati pave, vanavo havashinkulupila.
Avi vinditandeka pakulota viwikile popo avilá vyatangwéle nkúlava Ishaiya doni, “ Umu, ntenga wetu akulupidilé nyani na dililadidyé pamili pamwe nyani dimongo dyake Umu?”
Ni mwaa au utadídye vanavo havanaulule kukulupila. Doni, Ishaiya anditangola kavili kushidoni,
“Mevo ave andivaputadya, mitima vyave andivananopya, pakulota havanalole na mevo na ata mmitima vyave havanaananalele kutwala kushiliuka na nangu kuvaponia.”
Ishaiya anditangola malove ala mwaa andyóna lishangelo lyake Yesu na anditangola amwamba nae.
Kanji napane ata po pakati pavakutawala po, voe vanínkulupila Yesu kanji kwamwaa wamapalishayo havashilivalanganga likulupililo lyave vajopa kuvingigwa muvitala vyakulipudidya.
Vovo vo, lishindavanagwela lishangelo lyakwalakela kwavanu kuliko lishangelo lyakwalakela kwa Nnungu.
Napanelo Yesu andítangola pashanya po aashidoni, “Aijá ángukulupila nangu, hanangukulupila shinu nangu, ankunkulupila aijá ángutumididye.
Ángwona nangu, ankumwona aijá ángutumididye.
Nangu ni Lilangadyo ngwídile mushilambo pakulota kula munu ángukulupila nangu, hanapagwe mushii.
Munu akaigwa malove angu na mene kutandedya, nangu namuukumu shinu. Nangu hangwidile ndaukumu shilambo, ngwidilé ndaambola.
Munu ángwita nangu na mene kwitikila malove angu, apali wakumuukumu. Lyo lyene lilove lyanguvalanganga ni lilóta kumuukumu muliduva lyamwisho.
Doni, hangutangwele vyangu nimwene; Atata ángutumididye ni nae ángulamulidile ngutangole nyamani na nguvalangange nyamani.
Nangu ninkumanya kenga lyo lilamulo lyake ali ni shingumi shíkamalilika. Napavedoni, mo mwangwaulidile Atata, nimomo mwangutangalalela nangu.”

Napanelo shikukulu sha Pasaka shikanava kuwika, Yesu àmanyite kenga wakati wake wakuma mushilambo ashi kuka kwatatake undiwika, namomo pakuva andívanagwaledya vake mushilambo, andívanagwaledya mpaka kumwisho.
Napane valya shakulya shalyulo, Ndamoni àvikile muntima umwe Yudashi mwanagwe Simoni Shikaliyote shabaa yakunnimya
na Yesu àmanyite kenga Tatamunu aninkamudya vinu uti mmakono mwake, namomo àalakadile kwa Nnungu na ankuujila kwa Nnungu,
andítakatuka pandamu apalá, kula likoti lyake kutwala itaulu kulyungila mwinono.
Nae ankutwala medi kutaa mushuniya kutunduvanga kuvanavyanga vakwoda vake mmadodo na kuvaanyalanga na itaulu yalyungidíle mwinono.
Ankuwika pamwe Simoni Patulu, Patulu jo ankushidoni, “Nang'olo, wako ulota kunavyanga madodo angu?”
Yesu kushidoni, “Wako ambi apa haumanya shandikutenda ila mushu mo, undamanya.”
Patulu do, “Mene. Wako madodo angu, mwiko haunavyanga!” Yesu akanjang'ula, “Ndikanakunavyanga, haupagwa nkati mwangu.”
Simoni Patulu kushidoni, “Bai nang'olo, hanave madodo gweka kanji makono na muti wangu uti momo.”
Yesu do, “Munu áliingile medi, iloteka anavange mmadodo gweka mwaa mili wake uti unditakata. Mwenu munditakata kanji i uti.”
Nae anímmanya aijá áshilota kunnimya; ni ashi shintadídye atangole doni, “I uti mútakete.”
Pamalidile kuvanavyanga medi mmadodo, andítwala kavili likoti lyake kugwala, kuujila palyutu lyake kwikala kutwala kuvaudya, “Da shanintandile ashi, mana ake munkumanya?
Mwenu munkungushema nangu Mwalimu na Nang'olo, munkuvanavo shaliya mwaa ni shosho shanguvele.
Napane ikava kenga nangu ngúvele Nang'olo na Mwalimu ninnavyanga mwenu medi mmadodo, bai namwenu momo inimmaikila munavyanie.
Doni, nimpelé kenga mpano pakulota mo mwanintandalele mwenu, namwenu mutandele momo.
Nangu ninkumwaulila mwiu mwiu doni, ntumika hanampunda nang'olo wake na ata wavantumile kumpunda aijá ántumile.
Napane ikava kenga mundimanya vinu avi, mundaalaligwa mukatandedya.
“Nangu namwamba shinu mwenu uti; ndivamanya avalá vandivatandwele kanji ni pakulota awikile popo Maandiko, ‘Aijá áshilya namu nangu andijalukanga kuva mmongo wangu.’
Ninkumwaulila kaladavo vikanava kutandeka pakulota pavitandeka po, mwenu mukulupile kenga Nangu ni Nene.
Ninkumwaulila mwiu mwiu doni, álota kumpwashalela aijá wanintumidya nangu, angupwashalela nangu na aijá ángupwashalela nangu, ampwashalela aijá ángutumididye.”
Bai akatangole malove alo, ntima wake uníntindinganianga kutwala kumya ushuda aashidoni, “Ninkumwaulila mwiu mwiu, pakati penu apali álota kungulimya.”
Vakwoda vake vandílalana shivenevene vaambabidyania nyani washimwamba.
Napane andíikala pepi-pepi namu nae po pandamu nkwóda wake jumo aijá washinnagwaledya namene Yesu.
Simoni Patulu kunkwidula, “Mudye wamwamba jo.”
Nkwóda aijá akatepa kutwala kumudya, “Nang'olo, da wakwashi?”
Yesu kushidoni, “Aijá wangulota kumupa shibadu shaligung'u shangulota kulidya mundamu, ni jojo.” Bai akalidya shibadu shaligung'u kumupa Yudashi Shikaliyote mwanagwe Simoni.
Nae akalye shibadu ashilá, Shatwani kumwinjilinneu. Yesu kutwala kumwaulila, “Shaulota kutenda sho, tenda shipajelo.”
Napane vanu ve vapagwíte pandamu apalá havamanyíte mwaa shani andímwaulila davo.
Kwoda Yudashi avele munu áshiwenanavo lipeta lyanjuluku, vanji vashona kenga amwaulila auke akashume vinu vilotéka pashikukulu kwali auke akavajavile vinu vákalyulula.
Doni, Yudashi palile ligung'u alilá andyúminneu. Wakati wene wo, uvele washilo.
Ling'oto lyakuma Yudashi, Yesu andítangola doni, “Ambi apa Mwana Wamunu ankupata lishangelo na Nnungu ankupata lishangelo nkati mwake.
Ikava kenga Nnungu nkati mwake ankupata lishangelo, nanae Nnungu momo andamupa lishangelo Mwana nkati mwake na lyo lishangelo lyo, anampenneu.
“Mmanavangu, undibakila wakati padyoko wakupagwa namu mwenu. Munangulambela napane kenga mo mwandivaulidile vayuda, ambi apa ninkumwaulila mwenu, ‘Kwanguka nangu mwenu hamuulula kuka.’
Ninkumupa lilamulo lyaambi; nagwaladyania. Mo mwaninnagwaladidye nangu mwenu, namwenu momo nagwaladyania.
Amu ni mwavalota kummanyila vanu kenga mwenu ni mmakwoda vangu, mukanagwaladyania.”
Simoni Patulu kutwala kumudya, “Da Nang'olo, ulota kuka kwashi?” Yesu kushidoni, “Kwanguka nangu, ambi apa mwenu hamuulula kungwoda ila mushu mo, munangwoda.”
Patulu kushidoni, “Nang'olo mwaa shani nakwode ambi apa? Kwamwaa wako wako, nangu ndajaa shingumi shangu.”
Yesu, “Wako undajaa shingumi shako kwamwaa wangu nangu? Ninkukwaulila mwiu mwiu doni, ng'uku hakangavela wako ukanava kungukana myanda mitatu.
“Hamunaushaushange mitima vyenu. Nkulupile Nnungu; ngukulupila nangu momo.
Kukaja kumwe Atata apali mautu oe namene. Leka ikavele davo, nikanimwaulila. Doni, ninkuka nampanganiyangidya mautu.
Nikauka nampanganiangidya mautu, ninkwida kavili nantwala pakulota apalá panguve nangu namwenu mupagwe popo.
Kwanguka nangu, mwenu mundimanya indila.”
Tome kushidoni, “Nang'olo, wetu kwauka wako ko, hatumanyite. Napane indila ayo, tulota kumanya dashi?”
Yesu kushidoni, “Nangu ni Indila, Umwiu na Shingumi. Hapali wakwida kumwe Atata pakapitila kwangu nangu.
Ikava kenga muningumanya, Atata momo munammanya. Kutunduvangila ambi apa munimmanya na munimwona.”
Pilipo kushidoni, “Nang'olo, Tatamunu jo, bai tulodya itunagwele.”
Yesu kutwala kushidoni, “Nangu ndiikala namu mwenu muwakati woe, mpaka ambi haunava kungumanya Pilipo? Munu ángugwene nangu, animwona Atata. Napanelo wako utangola dashi doni, ‘Ngulodya Tatamunu’?

Da wako po haunakulupila shinu kenga nangu ninkupagwa nkati mumwe Atata na Atata kupagwa nkati mwangu nangu? Malove animmalangangila hanava shinu akubuni nene nimwene; Atata ápagwa nkati mwangu ni átandedya vinu vyake avi.
Ngukulupila kenga ninkupagwa nkati mumwe Atata na Atata kupagwa nkati mwangu, kwali mene, kwamwaa wa vyo vinu vyene, kulupila.
Ninkumwaulila mwiu mwiu doni, aijá ángukulupila nangu, vyangutenda avi nanae momo andatenda na vyakwanjadyeka kupunda avi, nae andatenda mwaa nangu mwanda kumwe Atata.
Kula shinu shamulota kujugwa palina lyangu, nangu ndatandedya kwambangidya Atata apate lishangelo nkati mu Mwana.
Mukangujugwa shoeshoe palina lyangu, nangu ndatandedya.
“Mukangunagwaledya, malamulo angu mundaigwilila
na nangu nanjugwa Atata na nae andamupa nkúpambadyanga junji aikale namu mwenu ngwengwe,
aijá Imumu Waumwiu. Nae shilambo hashuulula kumpwashalela mwaa hashinamwona shinu na hashinammanya shinu. Mwenu munimmanya mwaa ankunama namu mwenu na andapagwa nkati mwenu.
Haninneka muushiva, namwidila kavili.
Undiijalila wakati padyoko shilambo hashingwona ila mwenu munangwona. Kwoda nangu ninkunama, namwenu momo mundanama.
Muliduva alyo mwenu mundamanya kenga nkati mumwe Atata ngupali nangu, nkati mwangu mwenu mupali na nkati mwenu, ngupali nangu.
Munu ávenavo malamulo angu na áigwilila, ajo ni ángunagwaledya. Jo ángunagwaledya nangu jo, Atata anannagwaledya na nangu nannagwaledya kutwala kulilodya kwake.”
Napanelo Yudashi kanji i aijá Shikaliyote kushidoni, “Nang'olo, ilota kuululika dashi wako kulilodya kwetu wetu gweka bila shilambo?”
Yesu kunjang'ula doni, “Woewoe akangunagwaledya andaigwilila malove angu, Atata anannagwaledya na wetu tundamwidila kutwala kutenda lyutu pamo namu nae.
Aijá ákangunagwaledya, malove angu hanaigwilila. Mwenu! Malove amwigwite, hanava shinu angu; amwe Atata ángutumididye.
“Vinu avi nangu nimwaulila panishipagwa namu mwenu
napane nkúpambadyanga, aijá Imumu Wanashwe walota kuntumidya Atata palina lyangu, nae anampundisha mwenu kula shinu na anankumbuwanga uti vyanimwaulidile nangu.
Ninkunnakela amani; amani yangu ninkumupa. Hangunamupa shinu kenga mwaijaulila shilambo. Hamunaushaushange mitima vyenu na hamunajope.
Mundigwa vyanimwaulidile kenga ninkuka na namwidila kavili. Leka mùngunagwaladidye, mukandipuwangila ing'ano yakuka nangu kumwe Atata mwaa nae ni nang'olo kungupunda nangu.
Vinu avi ninkumwaulila kaladavo vikanava kutandeka pakulota pavitandeka po, mukulupile.
Hangutangola shinu kavili vinu vyoe namu mwenu mwaa nkútawala washilambo ashi ankwida. Nae kwangu nangu hatenda shinu
kanji pakulota shilambo shimanye doni, nangu ninkunnagwaledya Atata, nadoni avilá vyangulamulidile nae ngutende, ninkutandedya. Bai takatukanga, tume apa.
“Nangu ni nnandi wiu wavyepo na Atata ni nkúlima.
Kula lutavi lúkapa vyepo nkati mwangu nae andausha na kula lutavi lúpa vyepo, andapangulangila pakulota lupe namene.
Mwenu tayali munditakata kwalilove lyanimmalangangidile.
Pagwa nkati mwangu na nangu ngupagwe nkati mwenu. Mo mwalukapela lutavi vyepo lwolwene kwabila kupagwa munnandi, namwenu ni momo mukanapagwa nkati mwangu.
“Nangu ni nnandi wavyepo, mwenu po dinavi. Aijá ápagwa nkati mwangu, nangu kupagwa nkati mwake nae, ajo andápa vyepo vyoe. Doni, bila nangu mwenu hashipali shamulota kuulula kutenda.
Leka munu akapagwa nkati mwangu, munu ajo akandijalegwa ako kenga lutavi kutwala kujuma. Dinavi adyo vandalakota, kujela pamoto kutwa kupya.
Mwenu mukapagwa nkati mwangu, malove angu kupagwa nkati mwenu, shoeshoe shamulota, jugwa na vinantandakela momo.
Ni amu mwapatila Atata lishangelo; mwenu mukapa vyepo vyoe mukalilodya kuva mmakwoda vangu.
“Mo mwangunagwaladyedya Atata nangu ninkunnagwaledya mwenu; pagwa mulinagwaledyo lyangu.
Mwenu mukaigwilila malamulo angu mundapagwa mulinagwaledyo lyangu kenga nangu malamulo amwe Atata ndiigwililila na ninkupagwa mulinagwaledyo lyake.
Nangu nimmalangangila vinu avi pakulota lipuwilo lyangu lipagwe nkati mwenu na lipuwilo lyenu, liwikile popo.
Lilamulo lyangu ni ali: nagwaladyania kenga mo mwaninnagwaladyedya nangu.
Hapali ávenavo linagwaledyo likumene lyakupunda ali, lyakujaula munu shingumi shake kwamwaa wavavagwe.
Mwenu ni mmavangu mukatandedya avilá vyaninnamulila nangu.
Haninshema kavili kuva mmatumika mwaa ntumika hanamanya shatenda nang'olo wake; mwenu napane ninkunshema kuva mmavangu mwaa uti vyangwigwite kumwe Atata, nintadya mumanye.
I mwenu múngutandwele, ila ni nangu níntandwele mwenu na kuntenda muke mukape vyepo na vyepo vyovyo vyo, havinaunde pakulota shoeshoe shamulota kunjugwa Atata palina lyangu, nae amupe.
Ali ni lilamulo lyangu: nagwaladyania!
“Napanelo shilambo shikammangedya, manya kenga shitandi shinguvangadidyé nangu.
Leka mùvele mmashilambo, shilambo shikaninnagwaledya pakuva mmake. Doni, pakuva mwenu po hamunava shinu mmashilambo kanji nangu mushilambo amu nintandola, ni ashi shitádya shilambo shimmangedye.

Kumbukila malove animwaulidile, ‘Ntumika hanampunda nang'olo wake.’ Ikava kenga vaningupapata, namwenu momo vanampapata na ikava kenga vandiigwilila lilove lyangu, namwenu momo lyenu lyo, vandaigwilila.
Vanavo mwenu vanantenda davo kwamwaa walina lyangu pakuva havammanyite aijá ángutumididye.
Leka ndikaidile ndatangola na vanavo, vakanavenavo madambi. Napane ambi apa, madambi ave hampali mwakwinikidyangidya.
Ánguvangedya nangu, ankummangedya Atata.
Leka ndikatandile vinu vyakanava kutenda munu woewoe pakati pave, vakanavenavo madambi. Kanji napane vanavo vandyona kutwala kunguvangedya nangu namomo kummangedya Atata.
Napane avi uti vinditandeka pakulota shiwikile popo ashilá shaandikíke mu Lilamulo lyave doni, ‘Vaninguvangedya pashikapali.’
“Napanelo palota kwida aijá nkúpambadyanga wangulota kuntumidya kwaloka kumwe Atata, Imumu Waumwiu áalakela kumwe Atata, nae jo andaumya ushuda wangu nangu.
Namwenu momo mundaumya ushuda wangu mwaa mwenu mundípagwa namu nangu tangu kunantandi.
“Nangu ninkumwaulila uti avi kwambangidya hamunalikuvale.
Mwenu mundavingigwa muvitala vyakulipudidya; leka apo, wakati unkuwika umwe aijá álota kummyaa mwenu andona kenga alipudya kwa Nnungu.
Vinu avi vandatenda mwaa havammanyite Atata na ata nangu momo havangumanyite.
Kanji napane vyovyo vyo, ninkumwaulila kaladavo pakulota pavitandeka po, mukumbukilinneu vyanimmanyiya. “Vyanavo kunantandi hanimwaulidile mwaa nangu ndípagwa namu mwenu.
Napane ambi apa panguka kumwe aijá ángutumididye, pakati penu hapali ata jumo wakungudya, ‘Da wenda kwashi?’
Doni, kwoda nimwaulila davo, mmitima myenu mo shinimuumbala shipalodi.
Kanji napane ninkumwaulila mwiu uti doni, kudyanga nangu nguke mwaa ndikanauka, nkúpambadyanga jo hamwidila; nangu ndikauka, nantumidya nae.
Palota kwida po, nae jo andaundukula shilambo kwamwaa wamadambi, ishaliya na ukumu;
kwamadambi mwaa havangukulupidile nangu;
kwaishaliya mwaa nangu ninkuka kumwe Atata na mwenu hamungwona kavili;
kwaukumu mwaa nkútawala washilambo ashi andyukumigwa.
“Nangu ninkuvanavo vinji vyoe vyakulota kummanyiya ila ambi apa, hamulipililila.
Napane palota kwida aijá Imumu Waumwiu anannangalalela mwenu uti muumwiu mwaa nae halivalanganga shinu jo mwene, ila andavalanganga vyalota kwigwa na anammalangangila vilóta kwida.
Nae po anangupa nangu lishangelo mwaa alota kupata ashilá shangu nangu kutwala kummalangangila mwenu.
Uti vyavenavo Atata, vyàngu. Ni ashi shitadídye nguushidoni, vyangu nangu nae andapata kutwala kummalangangila mwenu.
“Muwakati padyoko hamungwona; muwakati padyoko kavili, munangwona.”
Napanelo pakati pavakwoda vake vanji vandyáulanila doni, “Da shosho sho amba nyamani paashidoni, ‘Muwakati padyoko hamungwona; muwakati padyoko kavili, munangwona,’ na, ‘Mwaa ninkuka kumwe Atata’?”
Nadoni vashindaudyania, “Da amba nyamani paashidoni, ‘Wakati padyoko’? Wetu hatunamwigwa shámba.”
Yesu andívamanya kenga vashilota kumudya, nae kutwala kuvaudya, “Da muudyania malove lo angutangwele doni, ‘Muwakati padyoko hamungwona; muwakati padyoko kavili, munangwona?’
Ninkumwaulila mwiu mwiu doni, mwenu mundalila na mundatangadikanga kanji shilambo shipuwanga. Mundavanavo shipalodi ila shipalodi shenu sho shindava lipuwilo.
Nkongwe ukamwikila wakati wake wakuvaleka, andávanavo shipalodi mwaa wakati wamauvilo undimwikila. Napane pammaleka mwana, nae andálivaliva mauvilo uti kwamwaa walipuwilo lyakwida munu mushilambo.
Doni, mwenu ambi apa munkuvanavo shipalodi kanji nangu ndamwona kavili na mitima vyenu vindapuwanga, lipuwilo alyo hapali wakumpoka.
Muliduva alyo hashipali shamulota kungudya. Nangu ninkumwaulila mwiu doni, shoeshoe shamunjugwa Atata palina lyangu, nae andamupa.
Mpaka ambi apa hashipali shamunjugwile palina lyangu nangu. Jugwa mundapata kwambangidya lipuwilo lyenu liwikile popo.
“Vinu avi nditangola kwamikong'o; undawika wakati wandikatangola ngutumila mikong'o, napane kwamwaa umwe Atata nammalangangila ngala.
Muliduva alyo mundajugwa palina lyangu. Hangunatangola shinu kenga nangu nanjugwila kumwe Atata
mwaa jo mwene Atata aju ankunnagwaledya mwenu kwoda mwenu muningunagwaledya nangu na muningukulupila kenga ngwaleké kumwe Nnungu.
Nangu ngwaleké kumwe Atata kutwala kwida mushilambo shapai, napane ninkuma mushilambo amu kuujila kumwe Atata.”
Vakwoda vake kutwala kushidoni, “Napanelo unkutangola ngala haunatumila shinu mikong'o.
Wetu napane ambi tunkumanya kenga wako undimanya kula shinu na haunalindila shinu vanu vakuudyangidye. Napavedoni tunkukulupila kenga walakadilé kumwe Nnungu.”
Yesu kutwala kushidoni, “Da napane munkukulupila?
Mwenu! Wakati unkuwika na wakati wene ni wowo au wavalota kummwadilikanianga kula munu kuka kwing'ande yake. Munanguleka gweka yangu kanji hangunava shinu gweka, Atata apali pamo namu nangu.
Vinu avi nangu nimwaulila pakulota nkati mwangu, mwenu muvenavo amani. Mushilambo mundapata mauvilo kanji lyunge ntima; nangu nditema shilambo.”
Yesu akatangole davo andínyanyula shilaka kulola kuwa kutwala kushidoni, “Atata, wakati undiwika! Mupe mwanavo lishangelo pakulota nanae akupe lishangelo
kenga mo mwaumpalale wako madalaka pashanya pavanu uti pakulota avape shingumi shíkamalilika avalá vaunkamudidye.
Shingumi shíkamalilika sho ni ashi, vakumanye wako kuva Nnungu wiu úvele jumo jojo na vammanye aijá wauntumididye, Yesu Klistu.
Nangu ndikupa lishangelo mushilambo pangumalidile shimadengo uti shaungukamudidye ngutende.
Nadoni napanelo Atata ngupa lishangelo pamevo pako, lishangelo lyolyo lyanguvénavo pamo namu wako shilambo shikanava kukandyangigwa.
“Nangu nditadya lina lyako limanyike kwa avalá vaungupele mushilambo amu. Vovo vo, vavelé vako kutwala wako kungupa nangu na vanavo vankwigwilila lilove lyako.
Ambi apa vanavo vandimanya kenga uti vyaungupele vyàlakadile kwako
mwaa lilove lyaungupele, nangu ndivapa na vanavo vandipwashalela; vandimanya mwiu kenga nangu ngwalakadilé kwako na vandikulupila kenga wako uningutumidya.
“Nangu ninkuvajugwila vanavo; hangunavajugwila shinu vashilambo, ila avalá vaungupele mwaa vàko wako umwene.
Uti vyanguvenavo vyàko na uti vyauvenavo vyàngu, nadoni nangu ndipata lishangelo kwaindila yavanavo.

Hangupagwa shinu kavili mushilambo amu ila vanavo vandapagwa mushilambo; nangu ninkwida kwako. Atata Wakwilimyanga, vashunge mulina lyako, lina ali lyaungupele pakulota vave shinu shimo kenga mwatuvalalele wetu.
Nangu pangushipagwa namu vanavo, ndivashunga mulina lyako, lina lyo lyaungupele. Ndivalaledya, hapali ata jumo ájaike. Ajaiké aijá wavampangidile kubamalegwa kwambangidya awikile popo Maandiko.
“Napanelo ambi apa ninkwida kwako; vinu avi ninkutangola ngùvele mushilambo pakulota mmitima myave lyumbale likulupililo lyangu.
Nangu ndivapa lilove lyako kutwala vashilambo kuvavangedya mwaa havanava shinu vashilambo; vanavo vavelé mo mwanguvalalele nangu ndikave washilambo.
Hangunajugwa shinu uvaumye mushilambo ila uvashunge kwa aijá nkalau.
Vanavo havanava shinu vashilambo kenga mo mwanguvalalele nangu ndikave washilambo.
Lyapulile nkati muumwiu; lilove lyako ni umwiu.
Mo mwaungutumididye wako mushilambo, nanangu ndivatumidya mushilambo.
Kwamwaa wavanavo nangu ninkulyapulila pakulota navanavo momo valyapulile nkati muumwiu.
“Nangu navajugwila shinu gweka vanavo; ninkuvajugwila momo uti avalá valóta kungukulupila nangu kwaindila yantenga wave.
Vanavo uti vave shinu shimo kenga mo mwaupagwididye wako Atata nkati mwangu na nangu kupagwa nkati mwako. Navanavo momo vave nkati mwetu pakulota shilambo shikulupile kenga wako uningutumidya.
Lishangelo lyolyo lyaungupele, nanangu ndivapa pakulota navanavo vave shinu shimo kenga mo mwatuvalalele wetu;
nangu ngupagwe nkati mwave, wako upagwe nkati mwangu; vadyavalele muupamo kwambangidya shilambo shimanye doni, wako uningutumidya na unkuvanagwaledya kenga mo mwaungunagwaladyedya nangu.
“Atata, vaungupele vo, ninkulota vapagwe po panguvele nangu vone lishangelo; lishangelo lyo lyaungupele mwaa uningunagwaledya shilambo shikanava kukandyangigwa.
Atata Waishaliya, ata ikava kenga shilambo hashikumanyite, nangu ndikumanya na vavéle namu nangu ava, vandimanya kenga wako uningutumidya.
Nangu ndivatadya vamanye lina lyako namomo ndauka mushu ndivatadya vakumanye pakulota linagwaledyo lyauvenavo kwangu nangu lipagwe nkati mwave na nangu ngupagwe nkati mwave.”
Napanelo pamalidile kushwali, andyúma pamo na vakwoda vake kuka mwangu unji walundi lwa Kedeloni. Mwangu unji walundi alwo, lindípagwa liteka, nae akainjila na vakwoda vake.
Napane Yudashi aijá namalimya wakunnimya Yesu andímanya lyutu alyo mwaa myanda vyoe Yesu ashindauka na vakwoda vake mulyutu alyo.
Jo Yudashi jo andyúka kuliteka àvenavo shipinga shavaing'odo pamo na vakushunga vakwalakela kwavanang'olo vakulangalalela-shadaka na mapalishayo vànyukatenge vyenje, ditoshi na dyuti.
Yesu àmanyite avi uti víshilota kuntandeka, andílyumilidya kutwala kuvaudya, “Munnambela nyani?”
Vanavo, “Yesu wa ku Nashaleti.” Yesu kushidoni, “Ni nangu apa.” Bai Yudashi aijá namalimya andípagwa pamo na vanavo.
Napanelo Yesu pavaulidile doni, “Ni nangu apa,” vanavo vandyújila kunyuma kutwa kugwanginneu.
Nae kuvaudya kavili, “Da munnambela nyani?” Vanavo doni, “Yesu wa ku Nashaleti.”
Yesu kushidoni, “Nangu nimwaulila, ni nangu apa. Napane ikava kenga mwenu mungulambela nangu, valeke ava vauke.”
Vinu avi vinditandeka pakulota liwikile popo lilove lyatangwéle jo mwene doni, “Vaungupele uti, hapali ata jumo ángujaike.”
Napanelo Simoni Patulu e anyukéte lyambila, andyálamola kutwala kupanyula lyatu lyakunkanakono lyantumika wake nkúlangalalela-shadaka nkumene. Lina lyantumika ajo, livele Maluku.
Yesu napane kumwaulila Patulu doni, “Kondya lyambila! Da hangunakumbile shikombe shangupele Atata?”
Nadoni shipinga shavaing'ondo pamo namu nanangalaledi wave na vakushunga vavayuda vakankamula Yesu vakamunga.
Shitandi vakamuukanavo kumwe Anashi nkwegwe Kaipashi e avéle nkúlangalalela-shadaka nkumene mumwaka awo.
Kaipashi aju ni jojo aijá e avaulidíle vayuda doni, ni shambone kuvapalela venentete munu jumo bai.
Napanelo Yesu vashindamwoda Simoni Patulu pamo na nkwóda junji. Nkwóda aju, pakuva vandímanyana namu nkúlangalalela-shadaka nkumene, nae andíinjila pamo namu Yesu mpaka mulugwani lwanang'olo ajo.
Patulu napane andíimila panda pannango alindila. Nkwóda aijá e amanyíke na nkúlangalalela-shadaka nkumene, andyúja kuka ndatangola namu mwali nkúshunga-nnango kutwala kumwidanavo Patulu nkati.
Mwali jo kumudya Patulu, “Da wako i unkwóda pakati pavakwoda vake munu aju?” Nae kushidoni, “Mene, hangunava nangu.”
Ishindadidima imepo, vatumika pamo na vakushunga vandítang'anedya moto wavakang'íle pakulota vajote. Patulu nanae andípagwa na vanavo àimidile ajota moto.
Napanelo nkúlangalalela-shadaka nkumene andímuudyangidya Yesu yavakwoda vake na mapundisho ake.
Yesu kutwala kushidoni, “Nangu nditangola ngala na shilambo; ndipundisha ngwengwe muvitala vyakulipudidya na mwing'ande ya Nnungu mwavakadyania uti vayuda. Hashipali shangutangwele kwashipii.
Napane mwaa shani munkungudya? Vaudye avalá vangwigwíte. Vanavo vandimanya shana ashilá shangushitangola.”
Akajang'ule davo, nkúshunga jumo e ammandíke, anínkanyola lilatuma aashidoni, “Wako unjang'ula davo nkúlangalalela nkumene?”
Yesu kushidoni, “Ikava kenga nangu nditangola kunyata, umya ushuda wakunyata wene wo! Kanji ikava kenga nditangola viu mwaa shani unangukanyola?”
Bai Anashi aníntumidya Yesu vàmuungile mmakono kumwe Kaipashi, aijá nkúlangalalela-shadaka nkumene.
Napanelo Simoni Patulu akuno àimidile ajota moto, vanavo vandímudya, “Da wako momo i unkwoda pakati pavakwoda vake?” Nae kukana aashidoni, “Mene, hangunava nangu.”
Ntumika jumo umwe nkúlangalalela nkumene, mulikola wake aijá wannumwíle Patulu lyatu kutwala kushidoni, “Da nangu handikugwene ùvele namu nae paliteka apalá?”
Patulu kukana kavili. Bai muwakati wowo ng'uku kukangavalenneu.

Kavili vayuda vandímumya Yesu paing'ande imwe Kaipashi kumuukanavo kumwe gavana. Wakati wene wo uvele lyamba linyeiku, napane vanavo pavakalota kulitaa udagwa, havainjidíle nng'ande vajopa pakulota vaulule kulya Pasaka.
Nadoni Pilatu andyúma kuka ndatangola na vanavo kutwala kuvaudya, “Munu aju mummalanganga makosha shani?”
Vanavo vakanjang'ula kushidoni, “Nae leka akavele nkalau, hatunamwidenavo ndakukamudya wako.”
Pilatu kushidoni, “Ntwale mmene mukamuukumu kenga mwalitangalela lilamulo lyenu.” Vayuda kushidoni, “Wetu hatuvenavo lilamulo lyakumpambilila munu woewoe.”
Avyo vindítandeka pakulota liwikile popo lilove lyatangwéle Yesu avalanganga inamuna yalota kupela nae.
Pilatu andíinjila kavili nng'ande kutwala kunshema Yesu kumudya, “Wako ni umu wavayuda?”
Yesu kushidoni, “Da kudya aku kwàko wako umwene kwali vapali vakwaulidíle yangu?”
Pilatu akajang'ula, “Da nangu po ni muyuda? Vakwenu pamo na vanang'olo vavakulangalalela-shadaka ni vakutumidídye kwangu nangu. Da ukashidyé nyamani?”

Yesu kushidoni, “Utawala wangu haunava shinu washilambo ashi. Leka ùvele washilambo ashi, vatumika vangu vakanditenda ing'ondo vangushililidya pakulota nangu hangunakamuligwe na vayuda. Kanji napanelo utawala wangu haunava shinu washilambo ashi.”

Pilatu kutwala kushidoni, “Bai wako po, umu!” Yesu akajang'ula, “Wako ni úvalanganga. Kwakutangola mwiu ndivalekwa kwamwaa au na kwamwaa wowo ndida mushilambo amu pakulota ngumye ushuda kwaumwiu. Uti avalá vaumwiu, vankwigwa lidi lyangu.”
Pilatu kumudya, “Da umwiu ni nyamani?” Nae akatangole malove ala andyújila kwavayuda kutwala kushidoni, “Munu aju nangu hangunamwona makosha.
Nadoni mwenu mundivanavo lidyavalelo lyakumuungulilila nkúngwa jumo muwakati wa Pasaka. Napane mulota nimuungulilile ‘umu wavayuda’?”
Vanavo kwakujang'ula kwave, vandíjunga vaashidoni, “Mene, nae mene! Tunnota Balabashi!” Mwenu, Balabashi aju avele nkalau.
Bai Pilatu andílamulila Yesu vanshape viboko.
Vaing'ondo vakakandyanga lidaka lyadimiva kutwala kungwadya mmuti. Vaníngwadya ikanju yailangi yanshambalau
kutwala kummandika kumwaulila kushidoni, “Shikamu, umu wavayuda!” Namomo vashinankanyola malatuma.
Mwanda unji kavili Pilatu andyúmilila panda kutwala kuvaulila vayuda doni, “Mwenu! Ninkumwidanavo munu aju kwenu pakulota mumanye doni, nangu hangunamwona makosha.”
Bai Yesu andyúmila panda àgwete lidaka lyadimiva mmuti na ikanju yailangi yanshambalau. Pilatu kutwa kuvaulila kushidoni, “Mwenu! Munu jo, aju.”

Vanang'olo vavakulangalalela-shadaka pamo na vakushunga pavangwene vandíjunga vaashidoni, “Mpambilile! Mpambilile!” Pilatu kutwala kushidoni, “Ntwale mwenu po, mukampambilile. Nangu, hangunamwona makosha.”
Vayuda vandíjang'ula, “Wetu tunkuvanavo lilamulo na kwodananavo lilamulo ali, nae inimmaikila apele mwaa andilivalanga kuva Mwana wa Nnungu.”
Paigwite malove alo, Pilatu andímamodya kujopa
kutwala kuujila kavili nng'ande. Napane andímudya Yesu doni, “Da wako kwenu kwashi?” Kanji Yesu hanjang'wíle.
Pilatu kushidoni, “Hautamwa kungujang'ula? Da haunamanya shinu kenga ninkuvanavo madalaka akukuleka wako kuka kwali akukukamela panshalaba?”
Yesu kushidoni, “Wako haunavenavo madalaka kwangu nangu leka madalaka alo akaalakadile kuwa. Nadoni aijá ángukamudidye kwako wako ni ávenavo madambi akumamodya.”

Kutunduvangila apo Pilatu ashindalambela mwakumuungulila Yesu kanji vayuda vashindajunga vaashidoni, “Ukamuungula munu aju, wako haunava shinu umuje Shashali. Mwaa woewoe álivika kuva umu, ankumpinga Shashali.”
Paigwite malove alo, Pilatu andímwidanavo Yesu panda kutwala kwikala paikiti yake yaukumu lyutu lyavashema shimbambanda shamajanga, mushibalaniya Gabata.
Napanelo uve wakati waliduva pamuti liduva lyaishumana yakulipanganianga Pasaka. Pilatu andívaulila vayuda kushidoni, “Mwenu! Umu wenu jo ajo!”

Napane vanavo vandíjunga vaashidoni, “Mmalidye! Mmalidye! Mpambilile panshalaba.” Pilatu kuvaudya, “Da mulota nimpambilile panshalaba umu wenu?” Vanang'olo vavakulangalalela-shadaka kutwala kushidoni, “Hatuvé umu junji ila Shashali tu bai.”
Kumwisho kwake Pilatu andívapa pakulota vauke vakampambilile panshalaba. Nadoni vanavo vakantwala Yesu.
Nae ànyukete nshalaba wake, andyúma kuka pashinu pavashema Lyutu lya Shivanga, alilá lishaméka mushibalaniya Gologota.
Popo po vanímpambilila panshalaba pamo namu nae vanu vanji vavili, junji nkono au, junji nkono au, Yesu pakati.
Napanelo Pilatu kwandika malove mulibau kuka ndakamela panshalaba; malove alo aandike doni, “Yesu Nnashaleti, Umu Wavayuda.”
Vayuda voe vandíshomya shavaandíke mulibau alyo mwaa palyutu lyavampambilidíle Yesu, lindívandika na panjini namomo libau alyo vaandike mushibalaniya, mushilatini na mushigalegu.
Vanang'olo vavakulangalalela-shadaka vavayuda vanímpinga Pilatu vaashidoni, “Haunaandike doni, ‘Umu Wavayuda,’ ila, ‘Aju atédoni, Nangu Umu Wavayuda.’ ”
Pilatu kushidoni, “Shangwandike, ndyandika!”

Napanelo Yesu vakampambilile, vaing'ondo vandítwalanga dinguvo dyake kujavanianga mapungu nsheshe, kula mwing'ondo kupata lipungu lyake kutwala kubakila ikanju. Ikanju yo havatatíle ivele vila kuma kushanya mpaka pai.

Nadoni vaing'ondo vandyáulanila doni, “Ikanju ai hatunapapulange. Leka tuntende gudugudu pakulota tummanye nyani álota kupata.” Avi vindítandeka pakulota awikile popo Maandiko aashidoni, “Vandijavananga dinguvo dyangu na ikanju yangu, vanditandela gudugudu.” Ashi ni shavatandile vaing'ondo.
Napanelo pepi na panshalaba umwe Yesu andípagwa anyoke, nkulugwe anyoke, Maliya ndyagwe Kolopashi namu Maliya wa ku Magadalena.
Yesu napane pangwene anyoke pamo na nkwóda wake aijá washinnagwaledya vàvele pamo, andímwaulila anyoke doni, “Mwanavo ajo apo,”
kutwala kumwaulila nkwóda jo kushidoni, “Anyoko ajo apo.” Kutunduvangila muwakati wowo wo, nkwóda aijá anímpwashalela kutwala kumuukanavo kwing'ande kwake.
Ling'oto lya avyo Yesu amanya kenga uti vindimalilika na pakulota Maandiko awikile popo, nae andítangola kushidoni, “Inangukola inyota.”
Popo po shindípagwa shitumba shavaumbadídye medi aulimu. Bai vandítwala shipande shaivonu, kupambya munkungulandi, kushuvika mmedi aulimu amulá kuka nampaka pakanywa.
Nae akalinge medi alalá, andítangola kushidoni, “Vindiwikila popo.” Bai andítepya muti wake kutwala kujaa imumu.

Nadoni pakuva livele liduva lyakulipanganianga liduva lyakupumula na pakuva liduva lyakupumula alyo livele likumene namene, bai pakulota mili avilá havinapagwe panshalaba muliduva lyakupumula, vayuda vanínjugwa Pilatu doni, madodo avanu avalá vatamange na mili vyo, vaushe.
Vaing'odo kutwala kuka ndatamanga madodo amunu ntandi na wambili ve vavapambilidíle pamo namu Yesu.
Kanji pavawikile pamwe Yesu, vakamwone àpadile nae po madodo havantaménge.
Napane mwing'ondo jumo aníntalola Yesu nkushi ndimbau kutwala kuuminneu myadi na medi.
Aijá ágwene vinu avi andyumya ushuda na ushuda wake ni waumwiu. Nae andimanya kenga ankuvalanganga umwiu; ankuvalanganga pakulota namwenu momo mukulupile.
Vinu avyo vitandeke pakulota awikile popo Maandiko aashidoni, “Halipagwa ligwangwa lyake ata limo lilóta kutameka,”
na kavili kenga mwatangalela Maandiko anji doni, “Vanannola aijá wavantalwele nkushi.”

Napanelo vikapite vinu avyo, Yoshe wa ku Alimateya, nkwóda wake Yesu kanji shipiipii kwamwaa wakuvavajopa vayuda, nae anínjugwa Pilatu mili umwe Yesu. Pilatu kulamulila, nae kutwala kuka ndausha mili aulá kuukanavo.
Namomo Nikodemu aijá amuukidíle kunantandi Yesu shilo nanae andyúka ànyukete mauta akunung'angila na ubani shilinga shadikilu salasini.
Vanavo pavatwete mili umwe Yesu aulá, vandyávilidyanga mushanda yakunamikanga kutwala kuminyangila mauta akunung'angila kwodana na madyavalelo avayuda nkati mukushika.
Palyutu lyavampambilidíle Yesu lindípagwa liteka; mo muliteka mo lindípagwa likabuli lyaambi lyavakanava kunshika munu.
Napane pakuva livele liduva lyakulipanganianga lyavayuda; namomo kwoda likabuli alyo livele pepi, vanavo vanínshika Yesu mulikabuli alyo.
Napanelo muliduva litandi lyaishumana lyamba linyeiku padimbile vila, Maliya wa ku Magadalena ankuka kushonga, ankukodya lijanga lyavadivíle pashonga apalá, vàushidye.
Nadoni nae ankutukuta, ankumuukila Simoni Patulu na nkwóda junji aijá washinnagwaledya namene Yesu, ankuvaulila doni, “ Umu mushonga mo, vandimumya. Hatunamanya shinu kwavaukile nammika.”
Patulu pamo na nkwóda junji jo kuuminneu kuka kushonga.
Vanavo uti vavili vashindauka vatukuta pamo kanji nkwóda junji aijá andítukuta shipajelo kuliko Patulu kutwala kuva ntandi kuwika kushonga.
Akapandalele mushonga amulá, agwené vila ishanda yakunamikanga ailá ìvele pai kanji hainjidíle.
Simoni Patulu áshimwoda panyuma, nanae kuwika kutwala kwinjila, kwona vila ishanda yakunamikanga ìvele pai
pamo na alilá lilesho lyavamuungíle Yesu mmuti. Lyanavo lindípindigwa kuvikigwa isemu inji kwapukanianga na ishanda yakunamikanga.
Napanelo aijá nkwóda junji ntandi kuwika pashonga apalá, nanae kwinjila, kwona kutwala kukulupila.
Napane vovo vo, ve vakanava kumanya Maandiko aashidoni, “Inímmaikila adyuke pakati pavakupela.”
Bai vakwoda avalá vandyúja kuka kukaja.
Napane Maliya andíimila pepi na pashonga alila. Akuno alila, andíshiliuka kupandalela mushonga
kutwala kuvona vanjelo vavili vàgwete dinguvo dyanashwe, vàikalenge palyutu lyauvéle mili wake Yesu, jumo àikele kumuti, junji kumadodo.
Vanavo kutwala kumudya, “Ajala, mwaa shani unkulila?” Nae kushidoni, “Ninkulila mwaa Umu wangu vanintwala na hangunamanya shinu kwavaukile nammika.”
Bai nae andíshiliuka kulola panyuma kutwala kumwona Yesu àimidile kanji hashimmanya.

Yesu kutwala kushidoni, “Ajala, mwaa shani unkulila? Da unnambela nyani?” Nkongwe ona kenga munu ajo ni nkúkandyanga liteka, andímudya kushidoni, “Nang'olo, ikava kenga wako unintwala ngwaulila paummikile po, nintwale.”
Yesu kushidoni, “Maliya!” Nae kushiliuka kutwala kumwaulila mushibalaniya doni, “Laboni,” mana ake Mwalimu.

Yesu kushidoni, “Haunangukamule mwaa hangunava kukwela kuka kumwe Atata. Napane wena kwavanung'unumunu ukavaulile doni, ‘Ninkukwela kuka kumwe Atata, jo Tatagwenu; kwa Nnungu wangu, jo Nnungu wenu.’ ”
Maliya wa ku Magadalena ankuka ndavavalangangila vakwoda, “Ndimwona Umu!” Namomo ankuvalanganga avilá vyamalangangidile.

Napanelo paiwikile yalyulo muliduva lyolyo litandi lyaishumana, vakwoda vake pavavéle po nnango vàshimile kwamwaa wakuvajopa vayuda, Yesu andíinjila kwimila shing'ati shave kutwala kushidoni, “Amani ipagwe namu mwenu!”
Akatangole davo andívalodya manda ake na mulumbau. Bai vakwoda vandípuwanga namene pavangwene Umu.
Napanelo Yesu andívaulila kavili kushidoni, “Amani ipagwe namu mwenu! Kenga mo mwangutumidididye nangu Atata, nanangu ninkuntumidya mwenu.”
Napavedoni, andívavaedya Imumu kutwala kushidoni, “Pwashalela Imumu Wanashwe!
Mukannivaliva munu madambi ake, munu ajo madambi ake andalivalivigwa. Napane mukanannivaliva munu madambi ake, munu ajo madambi ake halivalivigwa.”
Napanelo Tome aijá áshimanyika Didimu, nkwóda jumo pakati pa avalá kumi na mbili, hapagwíte mulyutu alyo muwakati wavaumilidíle Yesu vavagwe.

Vavagwe kutwala kumwaulila doni, “Tundimwona Umu!” Kanji nae kushidoni, “Nangu ndikanona makwanda amishumali mmakono mwake, ndikanajela shala shangu pavankamadile mishumali na ndikanajela lyanda lyangu mulumbau, hangukulupila.”
Ishumana imo ikapite, vakwoda vake vandípagwa kavili pamo; nanae Tome kupagwa popo. Ata ikava kenga milango vandígalola, Yesu andílyumilidya pakati pave kutwala kushidoni, “Amani ipagwe namu mwenu.”
Napane Yesu andímwaulila Tome kushidoni, “Jela shala shako apa, lola manda angu. Nyalodya nkono utwale ujele ndimbau. Haunauke mushu muungakulupila kanji kulupila.”
Tome kushidoni, “ Umu wangu na Nnungu wangu!”
Yesu kutwala kumwaulila doni, “Ukulupila mwaa wakungwona? Vaalaligwe avalá vákagwene kanji vandikulupila.”
Yesu andítenda vimanyikilo vinji vyoe pamevo pavakwoda vake víkaandikigwe mulibuku ali.
Avi vindyandikigwa pakulota mwenu mukulupile doni, Yesu ni Klistu Mwanagwe Nnungu na kwakunkulupila, mupate shingumi palina lyake.
Vikapite avyo, Yesu andílilodya kavili kwavakwoda vake nanyenje litanda lya Tibeliyade. Kulilodya kwake ko kuvé doni,
mulyutu alyo vandípagwa pamo Simoni Patulu, Tome áshimanyika Didimu, Nataniyele wa ku Kanaa ya ku Galileya, vanavake Shebedeu na vakwoda vanji vavili.
Simoni Patulu kutwala kuvaulila doni, “Mwanda ndaaka dyomba.” Vanavo kushidoni, “Tuke pamo.” Bai vakauka ndainjilanga mwingalava kanji ushilo uti havapatíle shinu shoeshoe.
Paushwenge wiko, Yesu andípagwa nanyenje litanda ila vakwoda havashimmanya kenga aju Yesu.
Nae kutwala kuvaudya, “Mmanavangu, hamuvenavo dyomba?” Vanavo do, “Um, mene.”
Nae kushidoni, “Jalangila lungau kunkanakono ko, mundapata dyomba.” Vanavo pavautile lungau lwo, havaulwíle kumya kwamwaa wakujola dyomba dyoe namene.

Napanelo nkwóda aijá áshinagwaleka namene namu Yesu andímwaulila Patulu kushidoni, “Aju Umu!” Bai Simoni Patulu paigwite davo, nae andítwala inguvo yake kugwala mwaa avele matakodavo kutwala kulijela mmedi.
Vakwoda vanji vandyúka na ingalava vautanga lungau lùumbele dyomba mwaa havavéle kushu na kumwangu shivele shitamba shakuwikila kenga madodo tisini doni.
Pavashulukangidile kumwangu, vandyona moto na yomba jumo vànjanikidile pamakala na shibadu shaligung'u popo.
Yesu kutwala kushidoni, “Idanavo dyomba dinji dyamubyee ambi dyo!”
Bai Simoni Patulu andíinjila mwingalava kutwala kuutila lungau kumwangu. Lwanavo lundyúmbala dyomba ding'umene miya imo na amusini na tatu. Ata ikave davo lungau halupapwíke.
Yesu kushidoni, “Idananga mulye!” Hapagwíte ata nkwóda jumo e alyalavéke kumudya do, “Da wako unyani?” mwaa vandímanya kenga avele Umu.
Yesu andívavandika kutwala ligung'u alilá kuvaing'a na yomba yo, kutandela momo.
Au uvele mwanda wantatu avaumililila vakwoda vake ling'oto lyakudyuka pakati pavakupela.

Vakamalile kulya, Yesu andímudya Simoni Patulu, “Simoni mwanagwe Nshuwau, da wako unkungunagwaledya namene kuvapunda ava?” Nae doni, “Elo Umu, wako unkumanya kenga ninkukunagwaledya.” Yesu kushidoni, “Valishe vangandolo vangu.”
Kavili Yesu kushidoni, “Simoni mwanagwe Nshuwau, da wako unkungunagwaledya?” Nae doni, “Elo Umu, wako unkumanya kenga ninkunkunagwaledya.” Yesu kushidoni, “Vashunge vangandolo vangu.”

Kutwala kumudya mwanda wantatu, “Simoni mwanagwe Nshuwau, da wako unkungunagwaledya?” Patulu shindímwida shipalodi kwamwaa wakumudya mwanda wantatu doni, “Da wako unkungunagwaledya?” Napanelo anínjang'ula do, “ Umu, wako undimanya vinu uti na undimanya kenga nangu ninkukunagwaledya.” Yesu kushidoni, “Valishe vangandolo vangu.

Ninkukwaulila mwiu mwiu doni, wako pauvele unnemba ushindalyunga inguvo yako na kuka kwoekwoe kwaulota; napane paulota kuva unang'olo po, unanyalodya makono ako kutwala munu junji kukunga na kukuukanavo kwaukalatile.”
Yesu andítangola davo amba inamuna yashipalelo shake Patulu mwalota kumpela Nnungu lishangelo. Patangwele doni, animwaulila, “Ngwoda.”

Napanelo Patulu akashiliuka kutwala kumwona aijá nkwóda washinnagwaledya namene Yesu amwoda. Aju avele aijá e atapíle muwakati wavashilya shakulya shashilo na amuudídye Umu doni, “Nyani álota kukulimya?”
Patulu pangwene andyúdya, “ Umu, kushi aju?”
Yesu kushidoni, “Ikava kenga nangu ninkulota nae apagwe mpaka pangulota kwida, wako shako nyamani? Wako po, ngwoda!”

Ni ashi shitadídye dyandavale dyabali pakati pavanung'unumunu dyakushidoni, “Nkwóda aju, mwiko hapela.” Kanji hamwaulidíle doni, “Nae po, hapela,” ila amwaulidile doni, “Ikava kenga nangu ninkulota nae apagwe mpaka pangulota kwida, wako shako nyamani?”
Aju ni nkwóda jojo áumya ushuda wavinu avi na áandike. Wetu tunkumanya kenga ushuda wake wo, wìu.
Vipali vinji vyoe vyatandile Yesu. Leka kula shinu shàandikike, ngwona kenga mushilambo uti hainapagwe inapashi yakutosha kuvika mabuku akaandikíke.
Nang'olo Teopilo! Mulibuku lyangu litandi kwandika, ndivalanganga vinu uti vyatandile Yesu na vyapundishidye kutunduvangila kunantandi
mpaka muliduva lyaukile ndatanduligwa kuka kuwa ling'oto lyakumya malailililo na dimongo dya Imumu Wanashwe kuvapa vamyombe vake vavatandwele.

Ling'oto lyakupela nae andidyuka na andililodya myanda vyoe kumili kwave na vimanyikilo víkave ntau vyakulilodya nae kuva mumi. Vanavo vandyonanavo muwakati wamaduva alubaini avavalangangila ing'ano yautawala wa Nnungu.
Pakati pamaduva alo, muliduva limo vàvele pamo, andívaanyalela lilamulo aashidoni, “Hamunatumuke pa Yelusalemu apa; lindila ashilá shalivikile Atata shamungwigwite nimmalangangila.
Mwiu Nshuwau andibatisha na medi kanji mwenu mundabatishwa na Imumu Wanashwe muwakati wakuvandika.”
Napanelo vakwoda vake vakaimang'anange vandímudya, “ Umu, undadyuwangidya kavili ambi apa utawala kwavanaishilaeli?”
Nae kushidoni, “Mwenu haimmaikidile kumanya wakati na maiko ávikile Atata kwamadalaka ake jo mwene
kanji mwenu mundapata dimongo dya Imumu Wanashwe álota kumwidila na mwemwe mundava mmashuda vangu kutunduvangila pa Yelusalemu, ku Yudeya, ku Shamaliya mpaka mwisho washilambo.”
Akatangole malove alo, nae kutanduligwa vanavo vamwona kwinjila mulyundi kutwala kugwalagwala pavakamwona kavili.
Vanavo valola kuwa ndoo, nae àukile, mwe! Popo po kwaneka vanu vavili vadikanju dyanashwe
kutwala kushidoni, “Mmagalileya, mulalela nyamani kuwa? Jo Yesu wavamuumidye pakati penu kuka kuwa, andaaloka kenga mo mwamumwanalele auka kuwa.”
Napanelo vanavo vandyúma palishinga lyamilandi vyaulivela livéle pepi na pa Yelusalemu kuka ku Yelusalemu; lyutu ali lishitwala shitamba shamwanda waliduva lyakupumula.

Vanu avo, yani Patulu, Nshuwau, Tiyagu namu Andaleya, kwida Pilipo, Tome, Balutolomeu namu Mateu, kwatika Tiyagu mwanagwe Alupeu, Simoni aijá Shelote namu Yudashi mwanagwe Tiyagu, pavawikile nkaja amulá vandyúka ndainjila mushumba shavawikidíle shapashanya ulungu.
Bai vanavo uti kwaunapamo vashindashwali; vashindashwalinavo Maliya anyoke Yesu na vanung'unuvake Yesu pamo na vakongwe vanji.
Napanelo muwakati awo muliduva limo vandíkadyanianga vanung'unumunu vakuwikila kenga imiya imo na ishilini kutwala Patulu kutakatuka pakati pave kutangola doni,
“Mmanung'unumunu, Maandiko atangwele kala Imumu Wanashwe kwaindila imwe Daudi andivaikila awikile popo; Maandiko lo amwamba Yudashi, nannimya wakulangalalela shipinga shinkamwíle Yesu
mwaa nae avele munu wamushipinga shetu na jojo jo, vanínjavila imbandi muutumika au.”
Mwenu, munu aju andíshuma lyutu kwapaida yashitendo shaungave-shaliya; palyutu lyolyo lyo, nae andígwanga kutwala kutumbuka utumbu kupushuka.
Shitendo asho vayelusalemu uti vandígwa; ni ashi shitadídye mwinangodi yave lyutu alyo vasheme Akelidama yani lyutu lyamyadi.

Patulu andyúka mushu aashidoni, “Mulibuku lya Dimu vandyandika doni, “ ‘Ing'ande yake ive lidembe hanapagwe munu wakwikala kavili mulyutu alyo.’ Kutwala kavili kushidoni, “ ‘Shinang'olo shake akamule junji.’
Napavedoni jumo pakati pavalume valyunganiénge namu wetu muwakati uti washitupamba Umu Yesu
kutunduvangila paubatisho umwe Nshuwau mpaka muliduva lyavantandwile Umu Yesu pakati petu kuka kuwa, jumo pakati pavalume avo ave nshudamwetu wakudyuka kwake Yesu.”
Bai vandívalodya vanu vavili: Yoshe áshimanyika kwalina lya Balishabashi na lya Yustu na kunnodya Matiyashi.
Kutwala apo vandíshwali vaashidoni, “ Umu, wako úmanyite mitima vyavanu uti tulodya wauntandwele pakati pavanu vavili ava
wakutenda imbandi muutumika au waumyombe wo waukile ndaashela Yudashi kuka lyutu limmaikidíle.”
Vakatende shimwavi shinínkalela Matiyashi; nadoni nae vanímpambanianga mushipinga shavamyombe kumi na moja avalá.
Napanelo liduva lya Pentekoste likawike vakwoda vake Yesu uti vandípagwa pashinu pamo.
Kwashingangala, kuwa kwaloka lidi lyakuuluta kenga kupunga kwaimepo yadimongo kutwala kwanela uti nng'ande mwavaikalénge.
Kutwala apo, vindyáneka vinu mwadindimi dyamoto dyakujavanikana na kula shinu shìtulidile pamuti pakula munu
kutwala vanu avo uti kuvaumbala Imumu Wanashwe na kwatuka kutangola dinangodi dyakuvilingananga kwodana na lyululilo lyavapéle Imumu.
Napanelo ku Yelusalemu vashindaikala vayuda vanu vakulipudya ngwengwe kwa Nnungu ve vaalakadíle muvenentete uti vamushilambo shapai.
Kuuluta akulá kukaigwinike, imbumba yavanu indíkadyania kutwala vovo vo kushanga mwaa kula munu vanu avo ashivaigwa vatangola mwinangodi yake mwene.
Bai vanavo vàshangile na dìvapulugike ding'ano vandyúdyania, “Da vanu ava uti vatangalánga apa ava i vagalileya ava?
Kanji mwaa shani wetu apa uti pavatangola vanavo kula munu pakati petu ankuvaigwa mwinangodi yake yashing'ang'eng'e?
Apa tupali tuvalipaliti, tuvamedi, tuvaelami, twálakadile ku Meshapotamiya, ku Kapadokiya, ku Pontu, ku Ashiya, tuva ku Yudeya akuno,
twálakadile ku Piligiya, ku Pampiliya, ku Mishili, twálakela ku Libiya twíkala pepi na pa Kulene, twálakela kunjini wa Loma,

tuvanji tuvayuda na kavili tuvanji túliinjidyenge, twálakadile ku Kaleta na tuvanji kwavaalabu; kanji wetu apa vanavo pavatangola vavalanga vitendo vyakujowa vya Nnungu tunkuvaigwa mudinangodi dyetu tuvene dyashing'ang'eng'e!”
Bai vanavo vàshangile na vàdubwele vashindaudyania, “Da shitendo ashi shilodya nyamani?”
Vanji pakati pave kuvakajola vaashidoni, “Vandyambalwanga ugwalwa avo.”

Napanelo Patulu andítakatuka pakati pavavagwe kumi na moja avalá kutwala kutangola pashanya po, amanyiya imbumba kushidoni, “Mmayudeyamwangu pamo na mwenu múnama pa Yelusalemu, tela matu enu mwigwe vyangulota kummalangangila.
Mwankumbukilila mwenu mo, i mwanavo. Vanu ava vaambalwidye dashi na ashi ni satatu!
Doni, ashi ni ashilá shitangaléke kwaindila yankúlava Yoweli aashidoni,
“ ‘Mumaduva amwisho, atangola Nnungu, vanu uti ndavamiminila Imumu wangu. Vanavenu valume na vakongwe vandalava, vanemba venu vandaona maono, vanang'olo venu vandalatanga dindoti.
Ata kwavatumwa vangu valume na vakongwe, mumaduva lolo lo, ndavamiminila Imumu wangu na vandalava.
Kuwa kumaundi ndalodya vyakutikinikanga, mushilambo shapai ndalodya vimanyikilo, vindaaneka myadi, moto na lyoi lyakutita dimumu.
Liduva lindava shii, mwedi kuva myadi, liduva limwe Umu, liduva lyo likumene na lyalishangelo, likanava kuwika.
Napane ilota kuva doni, woewoe átambulanga lina limwe Umu, andaambwalegwa.’ ”

Patulu kutwala kuka mushu aashidoni, “Mmanaishilaeli ngwigwa! Yesu nnashaleti, munu áakikishigwe pamevo penu kwavyamakango, vyakutikinikanga na vimanyikilo vyatandile Nnungu kwenu mwenu kwaindila yake nae kwodananavo mwamumanyilile mwemwe mmene,
munu aju vaninkamudya kwaishabaa na imanyika kaladavo na Nnungu, mwenu jojo jo, kwalipwashalelo lyavaungave-lilamulo muninkamela panshalaba kutwala kumpedya.
Kanji napane jojo jo, Nnungu anindyuwa pakati pavakupela amposha mumauvilo akupela mwaa haishuulukika kupela kundingile.
Ing'ano yo yake nae ai Daudi atédoni, “ ‘Ngushindamwona Umu wangu ngwengwe pamevo pangu mwaa nae ankupagwa kunkanakono kwangu kwambangidya hangunajagajege.
Ni ashi shitadídye ntima wangu upuwange, lulimi lwangu lulitamange na ata mili wangu undapagwa mulilindilililo.
Mwaa wako hawambukanga ungumi wangu kumoka na ata haunneka Nkwílimyanga wako alinge kunda.
Wako uningulangudya dindila dyashingumi, unanguumbadya lipuwilo kwakupagwa kwako.’
“Mmakwetu leka nimwaulile shana doni, nakulugwetu Daudi andipela namomo vaninshika na shonga shake shipali mpaka nelo apa.
Napane jo Daudi jo, avele nkúlava na amanya doni Nnungu andilivikila kwakulilapa kenga jumo wamuudukulu wake andadiva pashiumu shake,
nae andyóna kaladavo na kutangola yakudyuka kumwe Klistu kenga havamwambukenge kumoka na ata mili wake haulingile kunda.
Jo Yesu aju, Nnungu anindyuwa na wetu apa uti ni tuvashuda vashitendo asho.
Nae pavankwadidye vammika kunkanakono kwake Nnungu na pampatile Imumu Wanashwe walivikidile Tatamunu, andimiminila uti avi vyamwona na vyamwigwa.
Mwenu, Daudi hakwadile kuwa kanji jojo jo atédoni, “ ‘ Umu andimwaulila Umu wangu, Ikala kunkanakono kwangu
mpaka nangu vamongo vako, ndivatende kuva lyutu lyakuluvatila.’
Napanelo mmaishilaeli uti ikala mumanya shalowa doni, Yesu jo, jo wamunkamadile panshalaba jo, Nnungu anintenda kuva Umu na kuva Klistu.”
Bai vanavo vakaigwe malove ala, vindívabuka mitima kutwala kumudya Patulu pamo na vamyombe vanji kushidoni, “Mmanung'unumunu, napanelo wetu po tutandelé mwashi?”
Patulu kushidoni, “Lijugulange na kula munu apate ubatisho palina limwe Yesu Klistu kwakulivalivigwa kwamadambi enu na mundapata inudyo ya Imumu Wanashwe.
Mwaa kulivikila aku ni kwenu mwenu, kwaudukulu wenu na kwauti vavelé kushu; uti avalá vashamégwa namu Umu, jo Nnungu wetu.”
Napane kwamalove anji oe ashindaumya ushuda na auka mushu avajugwangila kushidoni, “Liposhe mushaushanga shiidíla udukulu au wantau.”
Napanelo vanu avalá vapakadíle lilove lyake vandípata ubatisho; muliduva alyo vandílyunganianga kwavakwoda vanu vakuwikila shikonda shavanu dyalupu nnatu.
Napanelo vanavo vashindangaikangila mapundisho avamyombe, upamo, kumajananga ligung'u na kushwali.
Bai vishindatandeka vyakutikinikanga na vimanyikilo kwaindila yavamyombe, nadoni mmitima vyavanu uti mushindapagwa kujopa.
Napanelo uti avalá váshikulupila shavo shishiva shimo na vinu uti vishiva vyaupamo;
vashindashumidya vinu vyave kutwala njuluku kuukanavo ndajavananga vamupa kula munu kwodananavo víshimwova pamili pake.
Liduva kwaliduva vakadyania mwing'ande ya Nnungu, vamajananga ligung'u muding'ande, vashindamajananga kula munu na muje kwamitima vyalipuwilo na vyakujaulanga,
vantumbyanga Nnungu na vavanavo litananilo kwavenentete uti. Bai liduva kwaliduva Umu ashindavaanjadyedya vanu vakwambolegwa.
Muliduva limo muwakati wasatisa wakati wakushwali, Patulu namu Nshuwau vauka shalumo kwing'ande ya Nnungu.

Koko ko, vanu vanínnyukata munu wakudidimanga madodo tangu mmunda mwanyoke, munu wavashimmika kula liduva pannango waing'ande ya Nnungu wavashishema Nnango-wakwalala atende avajugwajugwa njuluku vanu váshiinjilila apo.
Munu aju akamwone Patulu namu Nshuwau vainjila mwing'ande ya Nnungu nae andívajugwa.
Patulu na muje kunnola ndoo, kutwala kushidoni, “Tulola wetu apa!”
Nae apalá, ng'amung'amu, kuvalola ona kenga andapata shinu shoeshoe.
Kanji Patulu kushidoni, “Hanguve njuluku kanji sho shanguvenavo sho ndakupa; palina limwe Yesu Klistu wa ku Nashaleti, takatuka uwene!”
Patulu kunkamula nkanakono kumwimidya kutwala munu jo madodo ake na malundi, kuliimiliyangidyanneu.
Nae kudaloka kutunduvanga kuwena, kwinjila shalumo namu vanavo mwing'ande ya Nnungu awena, adalakanga na antumbyanga Nnungu.
Vanu uti kutwala kumwona awena na antumbyanga Nnungu
na vandímanya kenga ni munu jojo áshiikala ajugwajugwa pa Nnango-wakwalala waing'ande ya Nnungu. Bai vanavo vandítikinanga na vandíshanga shitendo asho.
Napanelo munu aijá ànamatidile kumili kwake Patulu namu Nshuwau mulukoma lwake Shalomoni, vanu uti vandítukutila koko vàshangile.

Patulu pagwene davo, andívaulila vanu avo kushidoni, “Mmanaishilaeli! Mwaa shani munkushanga shitendo ashi na mwaa shani munkutulola namene? Da mwona kenga munu aju tumwanaidyé kwadimongo dyetu wetu kwali kwaunnungu wetu wetu tuvene?

Nnungu umwe Abulaamu, umwe Ishaki, umwe Yakobo, Nnungu jojo wavanakuluvetu aninkwedya amupa lishangelo Yesu ntumika wake, jo wamunkamudidye mwenu na kumwita pamevo pamwe Pilatu paukile ndaamuwa nae amuungule.
Kanji mwenu mundimwita Wakwilimyanga na Waishaliya kutwala kujugwa vamuungulile nkúbyaa.
Napavedoni, mwenu munimpedya mwene shingumi kanji napane Nnungu, jojo jo, anindyuwa mushipinga shavakupela na wetu nelo tuvashuda vashitendo asho.

Napanelo dimongo dyalina limwe Yesu dinintadya munu aju wamumwona na wamummanyite, aliimiliyange. Andiliimiliyanga mwaa wakukulupila lina limwe Yesu; likulupililo lyolyo linditadya aju aponele uti kenga mwenu uti munkwona.
Mmanung'unumunu, nangu ndimanya kenga mwenu pamo na vakutawala venu munditenda shinu ashi pamukamanya shamutenda.
Kanji napavedoni, Nnungu anditandedya ashilá shatangwéle kala kwaindila yavakulava vake uti kenga Klistu wake inimmaikila auvauvange.
Nadoni lijugulange na nshiliukile pakulota madambi enu alivalivigwe
na wakati wakuliimiliyanga umwikile mwenu walakela pamevo pake Umu na kwambangidya ampalakadyedye Klistu wampangidile tangu kala, aijá Yesu.
Jo Yesu jo inimmaikila apagwe kuwa mpaka muwakati ulóta kukandyangigwa vinu uti, wakati wowo wavalangenge Nnungu tangu kala kwaindila yavakulava vakwilimyanga.
Mwenu, Musha atédoni, ‘ Umu, jo Nnungu wenu anantakatuwa pakati pavanung'unumunu venu nkúlava jumo kenga nangu. Nkúlava ajo, kula shinu shalota kutangola, mwigwilile.
Munu akanamwigwilila nkúlava ajo, andaapuligwa mushipinga shavenentete na andabamolegwa.’
“Vakulava uti kutunduvangila Samuwele na vanji uti vamwatíke nae vandivalanganga vitendo vyamaduva ala.

Mwenu munkupata vyalivikile Nnungu kwavakulava na munkupata avilá vyalivikile pavapangile imbodi vanakuluvenu pamwaulidile Abulaamu doni, ‘Kutunduvangila kuudukulu wako makola uti amushilambo shapai andaalaligwa.’
Nnungu pantakatuwidye ntumika wake, ampalakadidyé shitandi kwenu mwenu pakulota amwalaliye anshinjiula kula munu mushinamilo shake shakunyata.”
Napanelo Patulu namu Nshuwau vatangola na venentete mwing'ande ya Nnungu, vandívaidila vakulangalalela-shadaka, nang'olo wavakushunga-ing'ande ya Nnungu namu mashadukayo
akuno ivapwateka namene mmitima mwaa vanavo vashindapundisha vavalanganga doni, nkati mumwe Yesu kunkupagwa kudyuka kwavakupela.
Nadoni vandívakamula kuvajalenneu nkalaboshi mwaa wakuva lyulo kulindila wiko ulangale.
Kanji vanu voe pakati pave vaigwíte lilove, vandíkulupila. Vanu avo vandíwikila shikonda shavalume kenga dyalupu mwanu doni.
Napanelo palyamba lyake vakutawala vave pamo na vanang'olo na vamwalimu vadishaliya vandíkadyania pa Yelusalemu.
Popo po, andípagwa Anashi nkúlangalalela-shadaka nkumene, Kaipashi, Nshuwau, Alishandele na kupagwa vanu uti valikola alyo lyankúlangalalela-shadaka nkumene.
Vanavo kuvatwala vapatulu kuvaimidya pakati kutwala kushidoni, “Mwenu mumponidyé dashi munu aju? Kwadimongo shani na palina limwe nyani munkutenda vinu avi?”
Patulu pamuumbele Imumu Wanashwe andívajang'ula kushidoni, “Mmakutawala vavenentete na mmanang'olo!
Ikava kenga nelo tunkulalyangigwa kwaing'ano yashitendo ashi shambone shintandéke munu aju e avéle wakudidimanga madodo mwaponedile,

bai mwenu apa na mmanaishilaeli uti ikala mumanya kenga ni palina lyake Yesu Klistu wa ku Nashaleti wamunkamadile mwenu panshalaba kutwala Nnungu kundyuwa pakati pavanu vapadíle, kwadimongo dyake nae munu aju áimidile mushu mwenu andípata kupona.
Nae ni, “ ‘lijanga lyamwiludyenge mwenu mmakudenga kanji lyolyo lyo, lindiva lijanga shii lyavavikile palitununa.’
Hakunapagwa shinu kwambolegwa kwaindila yamunu junji mwaa mushilambo shapai, halipali lina linji lyajawile Nnungu kuvapa vanu kulota livaambole.”
Napanelo vakone ntima shii umwe Patulu namu Nshuwau vamanya kenga vavele vanu vákashamidye na vanu vila tu, vandíshanga namene kutwala kwanalela kenga vovo vo, vandinama namu Yesu.
Kanji mwaa wakumwona munu wavamponidye vàvenavo shalumo, vanavo vandídubwala.
Nadoni vandívakumulanga vapatulu palyutu lyanguguvale kutwala vene kwikala valya shemba
vaashidoni, “Da vanu ava apa tuvatandele mwashi? Mwaa kula muyelusalemu andimanya ngala kenga shimanyikilo ashi shakushanganiya, vatandadidyé vanavo na ata wetu shitendo ashi hatukania.
Kanji pakulota shitendo ashi hashinauke mushu shiigwinika kwavenentete leka tuvatishange kwambangidya havanavalangange kavili lina ali kwamunu woewoe.”
Napavedoni vandívashema vapatulu kuvaulila doni, “Tunkunneya, hatutamwa ata padyoko vela kumwigwa kavili muvalanganga na muvapundisha vanu palina limwe Yesu.”
Kanji Patulu namu Nshuwau kuvajang'ula kushidoni, “Da ni shambone pamevo pake Nnungu kumwigwilila mwenu kwali kumwigwilila Nnungu? Amuwa mwemwe mmene!
Mwaa wetu apa, vyatwona na vyatwigwa hatuulula kuleka kutambulanga.”
Nadoni vakavatishange kavili vandívaleka, havapatíle indila yakuvapela shaushanga kwamwaa wavenentete mwaa uti vashindamupa lishangelo Nnungu kwamwaa washitendo asho.
Doni, munu jo washintandeke shimanyikilo ashi shakuponia, andívanavo ulinga wavyaka vyakupunda alubaini doni.
Napanelo pavaukile ndaunguligwa, vandyúka kwavavave ndavavalangangila vyavavatangaladile vanang'olo vavakulangalalela-shadaka pamo na vanang'olo.
Vavave pavaigwite malove alo, kwaunapamo vandyúmya lidi vatangola na Nnungu vaashidoni, “ Umu Wadimongo-uti úkandyenge kuwa na pai, imanga pamo na vinu uti vipagwíte amo
útangwele kwa Imumu Wanashwe kwaindila yaikanywa yanakulugwetu Daudi ntumika wako uushidoni, “ ‘Mwaa shani vamidi vankushimwa na venentete kupanga milugu bule?
Vaumu vamushilambo vandinyanyamala vakutawala vandikadyanianga uti vampinge Umu, vampinge Wakupakigwa wake.’
Namwiu, Elode, Ponji Pilatu, vamidi pamo na vanaishilaeli vandíkadyanianga nkaja amu pakulota vapange milugu vyakummyaa ntumika wakwilimyanga áalakadile kwako, Yesu waumpakile mauta.
Vandíkadyanianga pakulota vitandeke avilá vyaupangidile tangu kunantandi kwadimongo dyako na malotelo ako.
Napanelo Umu, lola mevo mavili mitisho vyave utupe dimongo tuvatumika vako pakulota tuvalangange lilove lyako patukajugulanga shinu
akuno unyalodya nkono wako kwakuponia, kwavimanyikilo na kwavyakutikinikanga palina lyantumika wako wakwilimyanga, Yesu.”
Bai pavamalidile kushwali, palyutu lyavakadyaniénge pandíndangenda, vanavo uti kuvaumbala Imumu Wanashwe na vashindavalanganga lilove lya Nnungu pavakajugulanga shinu.
Napanelo imbumba ya avalá váshikulupila, ntima wavo uvele umo wowo; hapali munu ashona kenga ashilá shavenavo shàke mwene gweka kanji kula shinu shishiva shaupamo.
Vamyombe vashindataa ushuda na dimongo namene ing'ano yakudyuka kwake Umu Yesu na umonyo ukumene ushindapagwa na vanavo.
Pakati pave hashipagwa áshuuvauvangila shinu mwaa avalá vashivanavo mushinu kwali ding'ande vashindashumidya,
njuluku wo kuvakamudya vamyombe, vamyombe kunjavila kula munu kwodana na avilá víshimwova pamili pake.
Nadoni pakati pavanu avo, mulawi Yoshe munu wa ku Kupulu wavashinshema vamyombe Balinaba kwakuvalangangila mana ake nkúnonowanga,
andíshumidya lishamba lyake lyavenavo njuluku wo, kuka ndavakamudya vamyombe.
Kanji napanelo, munu junji wavashinshema Ananiya pamo na ndyagwe Shapila, momo vandíshumidya pashinu pave.
Njuluku wo nae unji kutitikulila, ndyagwe shitendo asho kuungila nkono kutwala unji kuka ndavakamudya vamyombe.
Patulu kutwala kumudya, “Ananiya, mwaa shani uninneka Shatwani akuumbala muntima ata mpaka kunshang'apila Imumu Wanashwe na kutitikulila njuluku unji walishamba lyaushumididye?

Lishamba lyo ukanava kushumidya livele lyako na ata paushumididye apa njuluku wo mwiu wàko wakulota wako kutumila mwaulatela umwene. Kanji mwaa shani unditunga ding'ano adi muntima mwako? Bai manya kenga haunduwenge munu, unduwengé Nnungu.”
Ananiya po paigwite malove ala, andíjanguka àpadile. Vanu uti vaigwíte shitendo asho vandíjopa namene.
Bai vanemba vakantatela mwishanda vakanyukata kuka nanshika.
Napanelo dikapite disaa kenga nnatu doni, ndyagwe pakamanya shitandéke akainjila nng'ande amulá,
Patulu kumudya, “Da njuluku walishamba lyamushumididye na ntwavo ni wowo au bai?” Nae kushidoni, “Elo, ni wowo wo bai.”
Patulu kutwala kushidoni, “Ivelé dashi mwenu kuunganila kunninga Imumu umwe Umu? Lola, vanemba vavéle pannango vo, vauja kukunshika ntwavo, nawako vandakunyukata momo.”
Shapila apalá kugwenneu àpadile kugwilila mushu mwake Patulu. Vanemba paviinjidile nng'ande amulá vanínkodya àpadile; vanavo kunnyukata kuka nanshika pavanshikile ntwagwe.
Nadoni kujopa kukumene kundiidila liganisha pamo na uti vaigwíte dyabali dyavitendo avyo.
Bai kwaindila yavamyombe, vishindatandeka vimanyikilo na vyakutikinikanga pakati pavenentete na vakwoda uti vashindakadyania kwaunapamo mulukoma lwake Shalomoni.
Napanelo mulyutu alyo vanu vákavele vakwoda hapali áshilyalaveka kulyunganianga namu vanavo, ata ikava kenga venentete uti vashindavashibanga namene vakwoda.
Bai dimbumba dyavalume na dyavakongwe díshinkulupila Umu dishindaanjadyeka namene.
Kwodana na vitendo avyo, venentete vashindavaumya valwele muding'ande kuka ndavaladya mudigoli na mmakande kulangele pakulota Patulu papita kananga shimbedi vela ashi shiviinikidye.
Na ata dimbumba dyavanu dyakwaloka mumakaja ashitanono, vashindaumbalanila pa Yelusalemu na valwelwe vave pamo na vanu váshuuvauvanga na majini mashapu uti vashindapona.
Napanelo nkúlangalalela-shadaka nkumene pamo na vavagwe uti vàvele vamushipinga shamashadukayo, vandítunduvanga kuvaanangila ing'ou vamyombe.
Nadoni vandívakamula vamyombe kuka ndavajela nkalaboshi yankaja amo.
Kanji shilo shake liduva alyo njelo wake Umu akashimulanga milango vyakalaboshi, akavaumidya panda kutwala kuvaulila doni,
“Wena mukalilodye kwing'ande ya Nnungu mukavape venentete malove a Shingumi ashi.”

Bai vamyombe vakaigwilile malove alo; lyamba linyeiku vandyúma kuka kwing'ande ya Nnungu ndavapundisha venentete. Napanelo nkúlangalalela-shadaka nkumene pamo na vavagwe vandívanavo nguguvale wavananangalaledi vamakaja va ku Ishilaeli. Vanavo kutwala kuvatuma vakulaledya vauke vakavatwale vamyombe kukalaboshi.
Vakushunga vakauke kukalaboshi, vamyombe havavakodidye kutwala kuja kuka ndavalanganga kwavanang'olo
kushidoni, “Mwe! Wetu tundyuka mpaka kukalaboshi; wetu kukodya milango uti vàgagowidye shana, vakulaledya vàimilenge panda vashunga kanji patushimwile, nkati kukodya vyo, ngwe!”
