Bai nang'olo wavakushunga-ing'ande ya Nnungu pamo na vanang'olo vavakulangalalela-shadaka pavaigwite dyabali adi vandítikinanga kutwala kushidoni, “Ing'ano ai ilota kuva dashi!”
Napanelo popo po, andíwika munu jumo kutwala kushidoni, “Mwenu, vanu vamuvajadile nkalaboshi vo, avalá paing'ande ya Nnungu po, vankuvapundisha venentete.”
Bai nang'olo wavakulaledya pamo na vakushunga vakauke vandívatwala vamyombe kwasiyasa vavajopa venentete kuvaamanga majanga.
Napanelo vakavaidenavo vandívaimidya shing'ati nguguvale kutwala nkúlangalalela-shadaka nkumene kuvanyika
aashidoni, “Da mwenu wetu hatunnaidye ngala kupundisha palina lyamunu ajo? Shapo lola, nkaja mu Yelusalemu amu malove enu andyaandavala uti na ata mpaka mulota twitikange yamyadi vyamunu aju.”
Kanji Patulu pamo na vamyombe kujang'ula doni, “Kudyanga kumwigwilila Nnungu kuliko kuvaigwilila vanu.
Nnungu wavanakuluvetu anindyuwa Yesu, munu wamummyee mwenu kwaindila yakunkamela panshalaba.
Jojo jo, Nnungu animmika palyutu lyashimbili kunkanakono kwake antenda kuva Nang'olo na Mwamboli kwambangidya avape vanaishilaeli kulijugulanga na kulivalivigwa kwamadambi.
Wetu apa pamo na Imumu Wanashwe wanjawile Nnungu kuvapa vanu vamwigwilíla ni tuvashuda vavitendo avyo.”
Napane vanavo pavaigwite malove alo, vandínyanyamukanga kulota kulamulila kuvovya shingumi.
Kanji munu jumo mpalishayo wavashinshema Gamaliyele mwalimu wadishaliya na wavashimwishimu namene venentete, andíimila panguguvale kulamulila vavaumidye padyoko panda vamyombe
kutwala kushidoni, “Mmanaishilaeli! Lilaledye na vitendo vyamulota kuvatenda vanu ava.

Muvyaka vyapanyuma padyoko, andyúmilila Teudashi munu áshilivika kuva wakwishimika; vandílyunganianga namu nae vanu vakuwikila shikonda kenga shadimiya nsheshe doni. Kanji pavamwovidye shingumi, avalá uti váshinkulupila vandímwadilikananga kutwala ing'ano ayo kumalilikila popo.
Kutwala apo, muwakati washaandika shavenentete andyúmilila Yudashi wa ku Galileya; nae andívashomba vanu voe kanji vakampedye, avalá uti váshinkulupila vandíjaikananga.
Napavedoni kwaing'ano ai ninkumwaulila doni, vanu ava hamunavaavalele mwaa ivelé doni, nnugu au na shitendo ashi vikava vyakubuni vanu, vindatimbikanga
kanji vikava vya Nnungu hamuvaulula kuvatema na ata inkuululika mwenu kupagwa mukumpinga Nnungu.” Bai vanavo vandyúngila nkono.
Nadoni vakavashema vamyombe avalá vakavashapa viboko kutwala kuvaduma havanatangole palina limwe Yesu na kuvaleka vauke.
Vamyombe vandyúma panguguvale awo vapuwanga pakuva vandivalangiligwa aki yakunyambikanga kwamwaa wa Lina ali.
Bai vanavo kula liduva mwing'ande ya Nnungu na muding'ande dyavanu, havashilakela kunyuma kupundisha na kummalanganga Yesu kuva Klistu.
Napanelo muwakati washishaanjadyeka shipinga shavakwoda, avalá váshitangola shigalegu vashindavatangadikanga vabalaniya mwaa vanamwili vave vashindalivalivigwa mulipwashalelo lyakula liduva.
Bai vamyombe kumi na mbili avalá vandíshema imbumba yavakwoda uti kutwala kushidoni, “Hashinava shambone wetu kuleka kuvalanganga lilove lya Nnungu pakulota tutumike pandamu.”
Napavedoni mmanung'unumunu vatandole vanu saba pakati penu vaushuda wambone, vakuvaumbala Imumu Wanashwe, valimanyilo tuvakamudye shimadengo ashi
pakulota wetu apa ngwengwe tupagwe mukushwali na mukutumikila lilove.

Malove ala imbumba yavakwoda uti andívanagwela. Nadoni vandívatandola vanu ava: Shiteva munu walikulupililo lyoe na wakumuumbala Imumu Wanashwe, kwatika Pilipo, Polokolo, Nikanoli, Timoni, Palamena namu Nikolau munu wa ku Antiyokiya e aliinjidyénge mwidini yavayuda.
Kutwala apo, imbumba indívalodya vanu avo kwavamyombe kutwala vamyombe kushwali na kuvavikila makono.
Nadoni lilove lya Nnungu lishindaandavala; pa Yelusalemu vakwoda vashindaanjandyeka na vakulangalalela-shadaka voe vashindaigwilila likulupililo.
Napanelo Shiteva àumbaligwidye umonyo na dimongo ashindatenda vyakutikinikanga vikumene na vimanyikilo pakati pavenentete.
Napavedoni vanu vapashitala shakulipudidya shavashishema “Shavanu vamuunaiti” pamo na vaalakadíle ku Shilene, ku Alishandaliya, ku Kilikiya na ku Ashiya vandíbuwa ntau namu Shiteva
kanji havashuulula kutauka limanyilo na Imumu Wanashwe áshinnangalalela nae mukutangola.
Napanelo vandívonga vanu pakulota vankanidyange Shiteva kenga vandimwigwa ankupulu Musha na ankupulu Nnungu.
Nadoni vandívakang'ela venentete, vanang'olo pamo na vamwalimu vadishaliya kutwala kuka kwashingangala nankamula Shiteva kumuukanavo kunguguvale.
Po panguguvale po, vandívaidanavo vashuda vakushang'apa váshishidoni, “Munu aju ngwengwe ankwabwalanga lyutu ali lyakwilimyanga na ankwiludyanga Lilamulo.
Wetu tundimwigwa atangola kenga ashii Yesu wa ku Nashaleti andabamola lyutu ali na kupindikulanga yadi yatulakadile Musha.”
Bai vanu uti ve vaikalénge panguguvale awo, vakannole ndoo Shiteva, vandyóna ing'ope yake kuva kenga yanjelo.
Kutwala apo, nkúlangalalela-shadaka nkumene andímudya Shiteva kushidoni, “Da vyavakwaula avi vìu?”
Shiteva kushidoni, “Mmanung'unumunu pamo na mmatatamunu, ngwigwa! Nnungu walishangelo andímuumililila nakulugwetu Abulaamu ku Meshapotamiya akanava kwikala ku Alani
kutwala kumwaulila doni, ‘Leka shilambo shako, leka likola lyako uke kushilambo shangulota kukulangudya.’
Nae kuma kushilambo shavakaladeu kuka ndaikala ku Alani. Papadile tatake, Nnungu anínnangalalela kwida mushilambo shamwikala mwenu ashi.
Mushilambo shosho ashi, Nnungu Abulaamu hampele ata shitamba shalidodo limo shaulongo kanji andílivikila kumupa shive shake pamo na udukulu wake ata akanava kumpata mwana.
“Napanelo Nnungu andímwaulila Abulaamu kushidoni, ‘Vanu vamuudukulu wako vandava vamidi mushilambo shavene, vandavatenda vatumwa na vandavatenda vyaukalau muvyaka dimiya nsheshe.’
Nnungu nae do, ‘Kanji nanangu ndavaukumu venentete vavatumikila vanavo kenga vatumwa. Kutwala apo, vandauma mushilambo asho kwida ndalipudya kumili kwangu mulyutu ali.’

Nnungu kutwala kumpanga imbodi Abulaamu na anínnamulila likumbi live shimanyikilo shaimbodi ayo. Nadoni Abulaamu akammaleke Ishaki anínkumula likumbi muliduva lyanane kutwala nanae Ishaki kummaleka Yakobo, Yakobo kuvavaleka vana kumi na mbili vaukile ndava vatatavetu.
“Napanelo vatatavetu vakammikila ing'ou nung'unugwave Yoshe kutwala kunshumidya akave ntumwa ku Mishili kanji Nnungu andípagwa namu nae.
Anímposha mumauvilo ake uti, aníntadya Palao antanane na amwone kuvanavo limanyilo lyoe mpaka jo Palao umu wa ku Mishili kummika kuva nang'olo washilambo shake na wapaing'ande pake.
Kutwala apo, mushilambo sha Mishili na sha Kanaani lindíinjila lipungu liidínavo mauvilo oe mpaka vanakuluvetu kukunakuna mwaa washakulya.
Napanelo Yakobo paigwite doni ku Mishili shipali shakulya, andívatumidya vanakuluvetu mumwanda utandi ku Mishili.
Mumwanda wambili Yoshe kulivalanganga kwavakuluvake nanae Palao andívamanya valikola vake Yoshe.
Napanelo Yoshe andítuma vanshamele tatamunu Yakobo pamo na valikola vake; vanu vakuwikila shikonda shavanu sabini na tano.
Bai Yakobo andyálela kuka ku Mishili kutwala koko ko, nae pamo na vatatavetu kupalanga
mili vyave kwidanavo pa Shikemu ndashika muntupa washumíle Abulaamu na njuluku kumakono kwavanavake Amoli tatamunu wa pa Shikemu.
“Napanelo pauvandikenge wakati wakutandedya Nnungu avilá vyalivikidíle kumwe Abulaamu, vakwetu vandívalakananga poe mushilambo sha Mishili
mpaka muwakati watunduvenge kulangalalela umu junji ákammanyite Yoshe.
Nae andítumila ujanja kuvauvyauvyanga valikola vetu mpaka nae kuvalamulila vatatamunu vavajange vana vakuvalekwa ambi kwambangidya vapalange.
Mumaduva lolo kuvalekwa Musha mwana wakunagwaleka pamevo pake Nnungu kutwala vatatavake kunshunga mwing'ande myedi mitatu.
Vatatavake vakanjae, mwanagwe Palao nkongwe anínnakota kuka nannela kenga mwanagwe mwene.
Bai Musha andípundishigwa ding'anong'ano dyashinamidyo shashimishili uti; nadoni, malove ake na vitendo vyake vivele vyadimongo.
“Napanelo Musha pawishidye vyaka alubaini vyashilinga andyámuwa muntima mwake kuka ndavalola vakwave, vo vanaishilaeli.
Kwanavo Musha akamwone mmishili jumo amwanela mwishilaeli nae anínshililidya mwishilaeli jo kutwala kulipilila ammalidya mmishili
aona kenga vakwave vandamanya kenga Nnungu andavaambola kwaindila yake kanji havashimanya.
Palyamba lyake nae kuvona vanaishilaeli vavili vakamanana kutwala kuvaunganianga ipagwe amani aashidoni, ‘Shasho da mwenu i mmanung'unumunu? Napanelo mwaa shani munkwanalanila?’
Napane áshimwanela muje aijá aníngang'ola Musha kutwala kushidoni, ‘Áshikutandola nyani kuva nkútawala na nkúukumu wetu wetu?
Da ulota nanangu ungupedye kenga mwaumpadyadidye mmishili lido?’
Bai Musha paigwite malove alo andítukuta ku Mishili kuka ndaikala kushilambo shavene sha ku Midiyani; koko ko nae andívapata vana vavili.
“Ling'oto lyavyaka alubaini Musha àvele kushimbweshe pepi na palishinga lya Shinai njelo andímuumililila mulilamba lyamoto úshikalela mulyukutu.
Musha pagwene shitendo asho andíshanga namene. Pavandike alota alole shana, andígwa lidi lyake Umu limwaulila doni,
‘Nangu ni Nnungu wavanakuluvako; Nnungu jojo umwe Abulaamu, umwe Ishaki na umwe Yakobo.’ Bai Musha andítatamela mwaa wakujopa na halingangidíle ata padyoko vela kulola shinu shene.
Umu kutwala kushidoni, ‘Ulanga vilatu vyo mwaa lyutu lyawimidile ali ni ulongo wakwilimyanga.
Nangu apa kwamwaa wakwona shana mauvilo autumwa avapata venentete vangu ku Mishili na kwigwa kutangadikanga kwave, ndishuluka kwida ndavaposha; napavedoni, ninkukutuma uke ko ku Mishili ko.’

“Napanelo Musha jo wavamwitíle vaashidoni, ‘Áshikutandola nyani kuva nkútawala na nkúukumu wetu wetu’ jojo jo, Nnungu aníntandola kuva nkútawala na nkwámbola kwaindila yanjelo e amuumilidíle mulilamba lyamoto úshikalela mulyukutu.
Aju ni ávaumidye vanakuluvetu ku Mishili atenda vyakutikinikanga na vimanyikilo mushilambo asho, mu Imanga Yanauvi na muvyaka alubaini mushimbweshe.
Jo Musha aju e avaulidíle vanaishilaeli, ‘Nnungu anantakatuwa pakati pavanung'unumunu venu nkúlava jumo kenga nangu.’
Ni jo Musha apagwíte mushipinga shavanakuluvetu kushimbweshe na njelo andítangola namu nae pamo na vanakuluvetu palishinga lya Shinai; nae ni ápwashaladile malove mangumi akutupa wetu.
Kanji vanakuluvetu jojo jo, havashilota kumwigwilila; kupunda apo vanavo vandímwita na mitima vyave uti kuujila ku Mishili
vamwaulila Aloni doni, ‘Tukandyangidya vannungu vatulangalalele mwaa Musha munu átumidye kushilambo sha ku Mishili hatumanyite shintandéke.’
Bai vandíkandyanga lishinamu lyakuva mwamwana wang'ombe nannume kutwala kushindanga dinyama dyakuntandela shadaka na kutenda shikukulu shakutumbyanga lishinamu lyavakandyénge.

Nnungu napane andívaambukanga pakulota avaleke valipudye kudinondo na kuvinu vinji vivéle kumaundi. Ni kuvalela momo mwavaandikidile mulibuku lyavakulava doni, “ ‘Mmanaishilaeli! Da vanyama vamuvashindenge kushimbweshe kuvatenda shadaka muwakati wavyaka alubaini, shadaka asho mungutandalelé nangu?

Mundivilinganianga! Munyuketé yema yakulipudidya imwe nnungu Moloki na lishinamu lyainondo Lepani, nnungu wenu. Mundilipudya kumashinamu amukandyenge mwenu mmene. Nadoni nankumulanga muke kushilambo shakushu kupunda ku Babiloni.’
“Kushimbweshe akulá vanakuluvetu vandívanavo yema yaushuda ye yakandyénge Musha kenga mwannamulilidíle átangwele namu nae na kwodana na ntindo wagwene.

Vanakuluvetu vakapate yema ayo kwalakela kwavanyakalavave, muwakati wavaukile namu Yoshuwa ndateka vilambo Nnungu avapukusha venentete váshiikala vilambo avyo vanavo vona, yema yoyo vandínyukata. Yoyo indípagwa pamo na vanavo mpaka muwakati umwe Daudi,
jo ápatile litananilo lyake Nnungu na ájugwile pakulota akandyange lyutu lyakunama Nnungu umwe Yakobo
kanji ándangadile ing'ande ni Shalomoni.
Kanji napane, Nnungu Wapashanya-uti hanaikala muding'ande dyavadangile vanu kenga mwatangaladile nkúlava,
“ ‘Kuwa ni shiteng'u shangu, shilambo ni pakuvika madodo angu. Mwenu mundaulula kungudangela nangu ing'ande? Avi atangola Umu. Da lipali lyutu livaikidíle nangu ngupumulilile?
Da vinu uti vyamwona avi hangukandyenge nangu?’ ”
Kukumalilila Shiteva kushidoni, “Mmanu mmaimbeve, múkakumuligwe mmitima na kumatu, múmpinga ngwengwe Imumu Wanashwe. Kenga mo mwavatandalele vanyakalavenu, namwenu momo munkutandela momo.
Shapo nkúlava shani wávakampapete vanyakalavenu? Vanavo vandivabyaanga vakulava vake Nnungu váshivalanganga kwida aijá Waishaliya umwe Nnungu na mwenu jojo muninnimya na munimpedya.
Mwemwe mundipwashalela Lilamulo kwaindila yavanjelo kanji hamwigwilidile.”
Bai avalá vanang'olo vapanguguvale vakaigwe davo shindívalipuka shitundi mmitima mwave kutwala kushimwa mpaka kutuka shulu.
Kanji Shiteva pamuumbele Imumu Wanashwe, andílola kuwa ndoo kutwala kwona lishangelo lyake Nnungu na kumwona Yesu àimidile kunkanakono kwake Nnungu.
Nae kutwala kushidoni, “Mwe! Ninkwona kuwa kushimwike na kumwona Mwana Wamunu àimidile kunkanakono kwake Nnungu.”
Vanavo vakadivanga kumatu akuno vajunga pashanya po na kwaunapamo vanímwinjila
kungang'alangidya kunyenje likaja kutwala kumwamanga majanga. Vashuda vapagwíte apo, vandyúlanga makoti ave kunkamudya nnemba jumo walina Saulu.
Shiteva akuno vamwamanga majanga, nae ashindakugwa aashidoni, “ Umu Yesu pwashalela imumu yangu!”
Bai andíguguvala kutwala kukuta pashanya po, aashidoni, “ Umu haunavaukumu mwaa walidambi ali.” Patangwele malove ala, nae kujaa shingumi.

Bai Saulu andyúngila nkono ing'ano yakumpedya kwake. Napanelo kutunduvangila muliduva lyolyo, shindyúmilila shititimbu shakupapatigwa liganisha, yani shipinga shavakwoda váshipagwa pa Yelusalemu. Nadoni vakwoda vandívamwadikanianga pa Yelusalemu vanavo kutukutila mumakaja a ku Yudeya na a ku Shamaliya kanji vamyombe vandíijalila pa Yelusalemu.
Vanu vakunjopa Nnungu vandítwala mili umwe Shiteva kuka ndashika na vanínnilila namene.
Napanelo Saulu alota kumalidya liganisha, ashindainjila muding'ande uti dyavakwoda apita avakamula valume na vakongwe auka ndavajela nkalaboshi.
Napanelo avalá vamwadilikanénge vashindauka vavalanganga lilove.
Pilipo nae paalaladile kunjini wa ku Shamaliya ashindavavalangangila venentete Klistu.
Dimbumba dyavanu kwaunapamo dishindamwishimu Pilipo mwaa vashindamwigwa shana namene vyashitangola na vashindona vimanyikilo vyashitenda
mwaa vanu vavénavo majini mashapu, anavo ashindauma mumili mwave akuta namene na vakudidimanga madodo pamo na vakukwava vashindapona.
Nadoni panjini awo lishindapagwa lipuwilo lyoe namene.
Napanelo panjini wowo, andípagwa munu jumo walina Simoni. Munu aju muwakati wapanyuma pake ashindatandedya vinu vyashaviavi vyashivatikiniyanga vashamaliya na kulitenda kuva munu wakujowa.
Simoni vanu uti va ku Shamaliya bila kumpambula munu vashindamwishimu namene na vashindatangola doni, “Munu aju ni dimongo dya Nnungu dishamégwa ‘Ding'umene.’ ”
Nae vashamaliya vashindamwishimu namene mwaa dimindi dyoe ashindavatikiniyanga na vitendo vyake vyashaviavi.
Kanji Pilipo pavalangenge ntenga wambone wautawala wa Nnungu na yalina limwe Yesu Klistu, valume na vakongwe vashindapata ubatisho.
Ata mpaka jo mwene Simoni momo andíkulupila kutwala nanae kupata ubatisho na ngwengwe ashindamwoda Pilipo alaledya shana vimanyikilo na vyamakango vikumene víshitandeka kutwala nae kushanga doni.
Napanelo vyamyombe vapagwíte pa Yelusalemu pavigwite doni ku Shamaliya vanu vandiitikila lilove lya Nnungu, vaníntumidya Patulu namu Nshuwau koko.
Vakawike pa Shamaliya vandívashwalidya pakulota vampate Imumu Wanashwe
mwaa Imumu Wanashwe avele akanava kunshulukila munu ata jumo pakati pave ila vandípata ubatisho palina limwe Umu Yesu.
Bai vanavo vandívavikila makono kutwala kumpata Imumu Wanashwe.
Napanelo Simoni akone doni, Imumu ankuvashulukila vanu kwaindila yavamyombe kuvavikila makono, nae andyúmya njuluku avape vamyombe
aashidoni, “Nanangu ngupa madalaka lolo kwambangidya nikammikila munu woewoe makono ampate Imumu Wanashwe.”
Kanji Patulu kushidoni, “Jaikila kushena na njuluku wako wo. Da wako wona kenga inudyo ya Nnungu vashuma na njuluku?
Wako haunapagwa shinu ata padyoko nkati mushimadengo ashi mwaa ntima wako haunava shinu washalowa pamevo pake Nnungu.
Lijugulange, leka nnugu wakunyata wauvenavo! Njugwe Umu nakapanji andakulivaliva shabaa yamuntima wako.
Nangu ninkukwona wako kuva umunu wakukubyaa liu lyakupunda apo na ungave-shaliya undikutawala.”
Kutwala Simoni kushidoni, “Shonde, mwenu nangu ngujugwila kumwe Umu kwambangidya vyamutangola hashinapagwe shakungutandeka.”
Bai vamyombe vakaumye ushuda na vakatangole lilove lyake Umu, vandyújila ku Yelusalemu kupita vavalanganga ntenga wambone mumakaja oe avashamaliya.
Napanelo njelo wake Umu andímwaulila Pilipo kushidoni, “Panganika uke nkono wakwina shilambo utumila indila yúma pa Yelusalemu kwalalela ku Gasha.” Ayo ivelé kushimbweshe.

Pilipo kutwalinneu mwanda. Mwe! Nae kumwona munu jumo wavamuníle avele nanangalaledi nkumene umwe umu nkongwe wa ku Etiyopiya walina Kandaki munu áshaangangalanga mali uti amwe umu ajo. Nae aukile ku Yelusalemu ndalipudya kwa Nnungu.
Pashuja àikele mulingishi lyake ashindashomya shidingo shalyamba shimwe nkúlava Ishaiya.
Bai Imumu Wanashwe andímwaulila Pilipo kushidoni, “Vandika lingishi lyo upite woda!”
Pilipo kutumanuma mpaka palingishi kutwala kumwigwa munu jo ashomya shidingo shalyamba shimwe nkúlava Ishaiya Pilipo kumudya, “Da vyaushomya vyo unkumanya shana mana ake?”
Mwitiyope kushidoni, “Ngulota kumanya dashi akapali munu ánguvalangangila?” Bai nae apalá anínjugwangila Pilipo akwele mulingishi vaikale pamo.

Napanelo lipungu lyamaandiko lyashishomya lishishidoni, “Vanintwala kenga mwavanantwalila ngandolo wavamuukanavo kukunshinda, mo mwanamalalila ngandolo pavankaja magwimbu, nanae momo hajamwile ikanywa.
Vanintanila na havampele shaliya, halakile udukulu, mwaa shingumi shake vandyovya mushilambo.”
Bai mwitiyope andímudya Pilipo, “Ninkukujugwa, da nkúlava malove ala apa amwamba nyani? Alyamba jo mwene kwali amwamba munu junji?”
Napanelo Pilipo kutunduvangila mulipungu alyo lyamaandiko andyúka ammalangangila munu ajo ntenga wambone umwe Yesu.
Vauka mushu na shimwanda shave, vandíwika pashinu pavéle medi kutwala mwitiyope kumwaulila Pilipo doni, “Wako, medi ala apa. Da shipali shinu shingudingadínga shakungutadya napate ubatisho?”
Mwitiyope andílamulila kwimidya lingishi alilá, Pilipo namu nae kushulukanga kuukananga mmedi Pilipo kutwala kumbatisha.
Pavaumanenge mmedi, Imumu wake Umu aníntwala Pilipo; bai mwitiyope hangwene kavili kanji andyúka mushu na shimwanda shake apuwanga.
Bai Pilipo andílyona àvele panjini wa Ashoto. Nae ashindapita avalanganga ntenga wambone mumakaja uti mwashipita auka ku Shashaleya.
Napanelo Saulu amamodya mitisho yakuvabyaanga vakwoda vake Umu andímuukila nkúlangalalela-shadaka nkumene
nanjugwa shitambulisho shakuka ndalodya muvitala vyamikodyanio vya ku Damashiko kwambangidya akavakodya váshinama mushinamidyo shake Umu valume na vakongwe, avakamule avaidenavo pa Yelusalemu.
Napanelo pashuka àvandike palikaja lya Damashiko, kwashingangala Saulu kuntang'anedya lilangadyo lyakushenga lyakwalakela kuwa.
Nae pashinu apo kugwa kugwilila pai na kwigwa lidi líishidoni, “Saulu, wako Saulu! Mwaa shani unkungupapata?”
Saulu kushidoni, “Nang'olo, da wako unyani?” Lidi lyo kushidoni, “Nangu Yesu, jo waumpapata wako jo.
Napavedoni takatuka winjile nkaja mo! Mo nkaja mo, vandakwaulila shilotéka utende.”
Napanelo vanu vaadanénge namu Saulu vandíimilanga vàkakatele vaigwa lidi kwabila kumwona munu.
Saulu vaníntakatuwa pai apalá, pang'amwile mevo kulamana na kwona shinu; vavagwe vavénavo kunkamula nkono kumwinjidya nkaja mu Damashiko.
Bai Saulu andíikala maduva matatu àputele pakalya na pakakumbila shinu.
Napanelo po pa Damashiko po, andípagwa nkwóda jumo walina Ananiya; jo Ananiya aju Umu anínshema mwindoti aashidoni, “Ananiya!” Nae doni, “Nangu Umu!”
Umu kutwala kushidoni, “Panganika uke na ibalabala yavashema Yakwaloka mpaka paing'ande imwe Yudashi; pauwika, muudyangidye munu jumo walina Saulu wa ku Talashishi; nae ankupagwa mukushwali
na mwindoti ninnodya munu walina Ananiya amwidila nammikila makono anshwalidya pakulota aujile kulola.”
Ananiya do, “ Umu, nangu munu aju ndivaigwanga vanu voe vammalanganga ukalau wake wavatandile nae vakwilimyanga vako ku Yelusalemu.
Nae vanang'olo vavakulangalalela-shadaka vandimupa madalaka akwidila apa ndavakamula uti vatambulánga lina lyako.”
Umu kutwala kushidoni, “Wena! Mwaa munu ajo ni shombo shangu shakutandalegwa pakulota aumaniange lina lyangu kwavamidi, kwavaumu, kwavanaishilaeli na
nene nimwene nannodya mauvilo oe álota kumpata kwamwaa walina lyangu.”

Nadoni Ananiya andyúka paing'ande apo kwinjila nng'ande kutwala kummikila makono Saulu aashidoni, “Nung'unumunu Saulu, Umu Yesu ákuumililidile niindila wida akuno, aningutumidya kwako wako pakulota uujile kulola na uumbaligwe na Imumu Wanashwe.”
Bai mmevo mwake Saulu vindígwanga vinu kenga makakamba kutwala muwakati wowo nae kutunduvanginneu kulola kavili; andítakatuka kuka ndabatishwa
na akalye, andípata dimongo. Bai Saulu andítwala maduva aikala pamo na vakwoda váshipagwa pa Damashiko.
Nae kutunduvanginneu kwinjila muvitala vyamikodyanio apita ammalanganga Yesu doni, “Nae ni Mwana wa Nnungu.”

Napanelo vanu uti váshimwigwa vashinanshanga na vashindaudyania, “Da munu aju i jo ávatandile ing'ondo avalá vatambulánga lina ali ku Yelusalemu? Nae akuno aidilé kukuvakamula vanu avaukenavo kwavanang'olo vavakulangalalela-shadaka?”
Saulu napane ashindauka mushu dimwanjadyeka dimongo na ashindavavilinganianga vayuda váshiikala ku Damashiko aakikisha kenga Yesu aju ni Klistu.
Napanelo akapite maduva oe namene, vayuda vandyúnganila vamyae Saulu
kanji Saulu vanímmanyia nnugu wave. Vanavo shilo na mui vashindalaledya milango vyakwinjilila panjini valota vammyae Saulu.
Vakwoda vake napane vakantwala Saulu shilo kunjela mulitenga kunshuluwidya panda lishiti lyalikaja.
Napanelo Saulu pawikile ku Yelusalemu, andílingangila kulyunganianga na vakwoda kanji vanavo uti vanínjopa mwaa havashinkulupila kuva nkwódamwave.

Napane Balinaba aníntwala kumuukanavo kwavamyombe ndavavalangangila mwashi mwangwanalele Umu niindila ya ku Damashiko na jo Umu anditangola namu nae, namomo mwashi mwavalangangidile ku Damashiko kwabila kujopa palina limwe Yesu.
Nadoni Saulu andílyunganianga na vakwoda na ashindapita avalanganga palina limwe Umu nkaja mu Yelusalemu pakajugulanga shinu.
Namomo ashindatangola na ashindataukananga na vayuda váshitangola shigalegu kanji vanavo vashindalambela dindila dyakummyaila.
Napanelo vanung'unumunu pavaanaladile nnugu awo vaníntwala kumuukanavo ku Shashaleya, ako kunnumudya kuka kwave ku Talashishi.
Bai liganisha lya ku Yudeya, lya ku Galileya na lya ku Shamaliya lindívanavo amani na lishindaliimiliyanga; linama mukunjopa Umu na mukumpambadyangigwa kwa Imumu Wanashwe, lyanavo lishindaanjadyeka.
Napanelo Patulu pashipita awanawananga kula kushinu momo andyálela kuka ndavalola vakwilimyanga váshipagwa pa Lida.
Koko ko, anínkodya munu jumo walina Eniyashi alagíle pagoli vyaka nane mwaa wakudidimanga madodo
kutwala Patulu kumwaulila doni, “Eniyashi! Yesu Klistu ankukuponia. Takatuka upindange litandiko lyako!” Eniyashi kutakatukinneu.
Bai vanu uti va pa Lida namu va ku Shalona vakamwone munu ajo, vanínshinjiulila Umu mitima vyave.
Napanelo panjini wa Yope andípagwa nkongwe jumo nkwóda walina Tabita, lina lyavashema mushigalegu Dolakashi, nae avele wavitendo vyambone na ashindavapwashela vamashikini.
Muwakati wowo nae andyúula mpaka kupela. Akapele vandímwinga medi na kuntwala kuka nammika mushumba shapashanya ulungu.

Napanelo pa Yope namu pa Lida hapalapanénge namene; nadoni, vakwoda pavaigwite kenga Patulu apali pa Lida vanavo vandívatumidya vanu vavili kuka nanjugwangila Patulu aide shipajelo aonane namu vanavo pa Yope.

Bai Patulu andyúka namu vanavo. Akawike, vaníntwala kumuukanavo mushumba shapashanya ulungu kutwala vanamwili uti kuntang'anedya valila na vannodya vyakulijalangila vyakuvilingananga vyakandyénge Dolakashi pavéle mumi.

Patulu napane akavaumadyanga vanu uti mushumba mo akaguguvala kushwali, akashiliuka kulola mili kutwala kushidoni, “Tabita, takatuka!” Bai Tabita andíng'amula mevo kunnola Patulu kutwala kutakatuka kwikala.
Nae kunkamula nkono ampwashela pakulota aimile kutwala kuvashema vanamwili pamo na vakwilimyanga kuvalodya Tabita mumi.
Shitendo ashi shindíigwinika pa Yope uti na vanu voe vanínkulupila Umu.
Bai andíikala maduva oe pa Yope namu munu jumo wakuushila magwogwe walina Simoni.
Napanelo pa Shashaleya andípagwa munu jumo walina Koluneli, nang'olo wavaing'ondo miya vamushipinga shavashishema shavaitaliya.
Munu aju pamo na vanu uti vapaing'ande yake vandyálala mitima na vashindanjopa Nnungu; nae ashindavapa lipwashalelo lyoe vamashikini na ashindashwali ngwengwe kwa Nnungu.
Muliduva limo, muwakati wasatisa yalyulo, mwindoti Nnungu anínnodya Koluneli njelo wake kutwala njelo jo kunshema, “Koluneli!”
Koluneli anínnola ndoo, anjopa kutwala kushidoni, “Da nyamani nang'olo?” Njelo kushidoni, “Kushwali kwako na lipwashalelo lyaunaumya uvapa vamashikini Nnungu inkunnagwela na hanalivaliva shinu.
Napavedoni vatumidye vanu ku Yope vakakushamele Simoni, munu ámanyika kwalina lya Patulu;
jojo jo avelé paing'ande imwe Simoni munu wakuushila magwogwe, ing'ande ivéle nanyenje imanga.”
Bai njelo áshitangola namu Koluneli akaume, Koluneli andívashema vatumika vake vavili vapaing'ande pake namu mwing'ondo wake jumo wakwalala ntima wamushipinga shavaing'ondo vake,
kuvavalangangila vinu uti vitandéke kutwala kuvatumidya ku Yope.
Palyamba lyake vàvandike panjini, muwakati waliduva pamuti Patulu kunjini ko kukwela paulungu kuka ndashwali.
Kanji ikankole indala, andílota apate shakulya; napanelo vankandyangidya shakulya asho, Nnungu andímupa indoti
kutwala nae kwona kuwa na kwona shinu mwalikuba likumene lyakukandapala kenga lyavakamulanidile mumapepe uti nsheshe lishulukila pai;
nkati mwake kupagwa kula likola lyavanyama vamadodo nsheshe na kula likola lyavanyama vakulyuta vapagwíte mushilambo na kula likola lyavyuni vyakuniania.
Kutwala nae kwigwa lidi líshishidoni, “Patulu, takatuka uvashinde uvamamene!”
Kanji Patulu kushidoni, “ Umu! Davo po mene; nangu tangu hangunava kulya shinu ata shimo shishapu kwali shidagwa.”
Lidi kutangola mwanda wambili liishidoni, “Haunone kuva shishapu shatadidye Nnungu kuva shakutakata!”
Shitendo ashi shikatandeke myanda mitatu, likuba vandyújidya kuwa.
Napanelo Patulu akuno alambela kumanya mana aindoti yapatile kwalakela kwa Nnungu, vanu vavatumile Koluneli vandyúdyangidya ing'ande imwe Simoni na vandíwika mpaka pannango.
Vanavo kushema kutwala kudya, “Da paing'ande apa apali njeni walina Simoni ámanyika kwalina lya Patulu?”
Patulu akumbukilanga indoti yapatile ailá, Imumu andímwaulila doni, “Wako, vanu vatatu vankukulambela pai po!
Takatuka ushuluke! Haunaambambidye kuka namu vanavo mwaa vovo vo, palyutu ali nivatumididye nangu apa.”
Patulu akashuluke andívaulila doni, “Munu wamunnambela jo, ni nangu apa. Da shana mwidilidilé nyamani?”

Vanavo kushidoni, “Wetu twalakela kwanang'olo wavaing'ondo walina Koluneli; nae ni munu waishaliya na wakunjopa Nnungu na ni munu waushuda wambone kwavenentete uti vayuda. Jojo jo, njelo wakwilimyanga andimwaulila akusheme uke kwing'ande yake ukamwaulile shauvenavo.”
Bai Patulu andívapwashalela vajeni vo paing'ande; palyamba lyake nae namu vanavo vandímalidya mwanda kutwala vanung'unumunu vanji va pa Yope kumpalakela.
Muliduva lyambili lyake, vanavo kuwika pa Shashaleya. Koluneli avalindila, andívalalika valikola pamo na vavagwe vapantima.
Patulu pawikile paing'ande, Koluneli andyúka ndampwashalela kutwala kuunama alipudya kumwe Patulu.
Patulu napane kuntakatuwa aashidoni, “Takatuka! Mwaa nangu momo nimunu kenga wako.”
Nae atangola namu Koluneli, andíinjila nng'ande kuvakodya vanu vàumbalanidile

kutwala kushidoni, “Mwenu mundimanya shana kenga nkati mulilamulo munkulaeka muyuda woewoe kulijalanianga mushipinga shavamidi kwali kulitenda shijeni muding'ande dyave. Kanji Nnungu aningwaulila haninansheme munu woewoe kuva nshapu kwali ndagwa.
Ni ashi shitadídye nangu mukangusheme kwida panikava na shinyadinyadi; napanelo munkuulula kungwaulila shamungushamadile?”
Koluneli kutwala kushidoni, “Mumaduva matatu apitíle nangu ngushindapagwa mukushwali nng'ande mwangu amu muwakati kenga wowau wasatisa. Bai kwashingangala andyáneka munu àgwete dinguvo dyakumalameta
kutwala kushidoni, ‘Koluneli, kushwali kwako ngwengwe Nnungu ankwigwa na lipwashalelo lyako lyaunaumya uvapa vamashikini hanalivaliva shinu.
Napavedoni vatumidye vanu ku Yope vakakushamele Simoni, munu ámanyika kwalina lya Patulu; jojo jo avelé paing'ande imwe Simoni munu wakuushila magwogwe, ing'ande ivéle nanyenje imanga.’
Nangu kuvatuminneu vanu kwida ndakushema na tundilambwalela mwaa wakuwika kwako. Napanelo wetu apa tundikadyania pamevo pake Nnungu pakulota twigwe uti vyakutumenge Umu utuvalangangile.”
Patulu kutwala kutunduvanga kutangola aashidoni, “Napanelo mwiu ninkumanya kenga Nnungu hanampambula munu
kanji muvenentete uti woewoe ánjopa Nnungu na kutandedya ishaliya, ajo ankukubaligwa namu nae.
Kwaupande walilove lyatumididye nae kwavanaishilaeli livalangánga ntenga wambone waamani kwaindila imwe Yesu Klistu àvele Umu wavanu uti,
mwemwe mmene mundimanya shana nyamani shitandéke Yudeya uti kutunduvangila ku Galileya ling'oto lyaubatisho wavalangenge Nshuwau,
mwashi mwampakidile mauta Yesu wa ku Nashaleti kwa Imumu Wanashwe na dimongo kutwala nae kuwena atandedya wambone apita avaponia vanu váshitawaligwa na Ndamoni mwaa Nnungu andípagwa namu nae.
Wetu apa tuvashuda wavinu vyatandile nae mushilambo uti shavayuda mpaka pa Yelusalemu. Jojo jo vanu vanímpedya kwaindila yakunkamalela panshalaba
kutwala Nnungu muliduva lyantatu kundyuwa na kunnodya
kanji i kwavanu uti ila kwetu wetu tuvashuda vátutandwele Nnungu tangu kala, wewe túlile na túkumbidile namu nae ling'oto lyakudyuka pakati pavakupela.
Nae wetu anditutuma tuvalangange ntenga kwavenentete na tumye ushuda kenga nae Nnungu andimupa madalaka akuva nkúukumu wavangumi na vapadíle.
Ajo vakulava uti vankumuumidya ushuda kenga kula munu ánkulupila nae ankupata kulivalivigwa kwamadambi kwaindila yalina lyake.”
Patulu akuno atangola, vanu uti váshimwigwilila muwakati wowo andívashulukila Imumu Wanashwe.
Kanji vakukulupila vaaléke namu Patulu ku Yope vàvele vayuda, vandíshanga pavagwene vamidi navanavo momo Nnungu avamiminila Imumu Wanashwe
mwaa vanavo vashindavaigwa vamidi avalá vatangola dinangodi dyakutikinikanga na vantumbyanga Nnungu. Patulu kutwala kushidoni,
“Da apali munu álota kuvaleya vanu ava havanabatishwe na medi ikava kenga navanavo vanimpata Imumu Wanashwe kenga mo mwatumpatidile wetu?”
Bai Patulu andílamulila vavabatishe palina limwe Yesu Klistu na vanavo vanínjugwa vaikanavo maduva akudyangangila.
Napanelo vamyombe pamo na vanung'unumunu ku Yudeya uti vandígwa doni, ata vamidi momo vandipwashalela lilove lya Nnungu.
Napavedoni Patulu paambweke kuka ku Yelusalemu, vakwoda vayuda vakumulígwe vanímpwatiyanga
vaashidoni, “Kumanya dashi wako kulitenda shijeni paing'ande yavanu vákakumuligwe na kulyanavo ndamu umo?”
Kanji Patulu kutwala kuvaigwiniya avapangila shana aashidoni,

“Muliduva limo nangu ngùpagwite mukushwali mulikaja lya Yope, Nnungu aníngupa indoti kutwala kwona shinu mwalikuba likumene lyakukandapala kenga lyavakamulanidile mmapepe uti nsheshe lyaloka kuwa lishulukila pepi na panguvéle nangu.
Panguladile shana nkati mwake, nangu kutwala kuvona vanyama vamadodo nsheshe, vanyama vakunundu, vanyama vakulyuta na kwona vyuni vyakuniania.
Muwakati wowo nangu kwigwa lidi lingwaulila doni, ‘Patulu! Takatuka uvashinde uvamamene!’
Kanji nangu kushidoni, ‘ Umu, davo po mene! Mwaa nangu nkanywa mwangu hangunava kupisha shinu shoeshoe shishapu kwali shidagwa.’
Lidi lyakwalakela kuwa kutangola mwanda wambili liishidoni, ‘Shatadidye Nnungu kuva shakutakata, haunasheme shishapu.’
Shitendo ashi shindítandeka myanda mitatu na kumwisho kwake, uti vandyújidya kuwa.
Kwashingangala, vanu vatatu vavatumile ku Shashaleya kungwidila nangu kuwika paing'ande yanishiikala.
Kutwala Imumu kungwaulila nguke namu vanavo pandikaambambidya; vanung'unumunu ava sita kuka pamo namu nangu ku Shashaleya mpaka paing'ande imwe Koluneli.
Koluneli kutwala kutuvalangangila mwamwanadile njelo wa Nnungu àimidile paing'ande pake amwaulila doni, ‘Ntumidye munu ku Yope akakushamele munu jumo walina Simoni ámanyika kwalina lya Patulu.
Nae andakuvalangangila ntenga ulóta kukutadya wako pamo na vanu uti vapaing'ande pako mwambolegwe.’
Nangu pangutunduvenge kutangola namu vanavo Imumu Wanashwe andívashulukila kenga momo mwatushulukidile wetu kunantandi.
Nangu kutwala kukumbukilinneu vyawile Umu doni, Nshuwau mwiu andibatisha na medi kanji mwenu mundabatishwa na Imumu Wanashwe.
Napanelo ikava kenga Nnungu andivapa vanavo inudyo yoyo yatupele wetu patunkulupidile Umu Yesu Klistu, kushi nangu nikandyulula kwimidya madengo ake Nnungu?”
Bai pavaigwite malove alo, vanavo vandídimikila na kumupa lishangelo Nnungu vaashidoni, “Kumbe mwiu! Ata vamidi Nnungu andivapa kulijugulanga madambi kuka mushingumi.”

Napanelo vakwoda vakajaikanange mwaa wakupapatigwa kuumilidíle ling'oto lyakumpedya Shiteva, vanji vandíwika mpaka ku Poiniki kutwala vanji mpaka ku Kupulu na vanji kavili mpaka ku Antiyokiya. Kanji mwavashipita mo, lilove lya Nnungu vashivavalangangila vayuda gweka bai.
Kanji vakwoda vanji va ku Kupulu na va ku Shilene vakawike pa Antiyokiya, vandítangonavo vagalegu vavavalangangila ntenga wambone umwe Umu Yesu.
Umu ashindapagwa na vanavo na voe vakulupidíle, vanínshinjiulila Umu mitima vyave.
Napanelo dyabali dya ku Antiyokiya dindíigwinika na liganisha, lyo lya pa Yelusalemu kutwala vanavo kuntumidya Balinaba koko.
Balinaba akawike kwanavo akone umonyo wa Nnungu pakati pave andípuwanga namene na ashindavanonowanga vanu uti pakulota vavenavo ntima wakukulupilika na kuvalaililila havanamwambukange Umu
mwaa Balinaba avele munu wambone, wakumuumbala Imumu Wanashwe na walikulupililo lyoe. Nadoni vanu voe vandílyunganianga namu Umu.
Napanelo Balinaba andyúka ku Talashishi nannambela Saulu.

Akamwone, aníntwala kumwidanavo pa Antiyokiya. Bai vanavo vandíikala pa Antiyokiya mpaka kumalila mwaka umo vavapundisha vakwoda voe vapaliganisha lyankaja amo. Napane pa Antiyokiya ni pavavashamíle vakwoda lina lya Vaklistu mumwanda utandi.
Mumaduva lolo, vandípagwa vakulava vaumíle pa Yelusalemu kuka ku Antiyokiya.
Napanelo pakati pave jumo walina Agabu alangalalegwa na Imumu, andímanyiya kenga mushilambo uti indaumilila indala yamadigida. Namwiu indala ayo yumilidile mumaduva amwe Kalaudiu.
Bai vanavo vandyámuwa kula nkwóda atumidye lipwashalelo kwodananavo shilinga shalyulula kwavanung'unumunu va ku Yudeya.
Bai vandítandedya vatumidya kwavanang'olo kwaindila imwe Balinaba namu Saulu.
Napanelo muwakati awo umu Elode andítunduvanga kuvapapata vanji vamuliganisha.
Nae anínshinda na lyambila Tiyagu nung'une Nshuwau
na akone kenga shitendo asho vayuda shinkuvanagwela, anínkamula Patulu momo. Avyo vitandeke mumaduva ashikukulu shamagung'u ákave nkukumuku.
Patulu akakamuligwe, Elode anínjela nkalaboshi kutwala kummikila vipinga nsheshe vyamabulisha váshipishania nsheshe-nsheshe vanshunga pakulota ling'oto lyashikukulu sha Pasaka amuukumu paumbala.
Bai Patulu àvele nkalaboshi, liganisha lishindashwali vanjugwa Nnungu na dimongo mwaa wake nae.

Napanelo Elode pashilota antwale akamuukumu, shilo shosho Patulu àlele shing'ati mabulisha mavili vàkamulidile mang'unyang'unya mavili avamuungile, pannango vàpagwite mabulisha váshishunga ikalaboshi,

mwe! Njelo wake Umu apalá pulumundu, nng'ande nkalaboshi mo uti do, ngwe; njelo kunting'inianga amwimulanga aashidoni, “Takatuka shipajelo!” Muwakati wowo Patulu mang'unyang'unya mmakono mo kulumukanga
kutwala njelo kushidoni, “Lyunge nkanda wako na ugwale makabasha ako!” Patulu kutandela momo. Njelo kavili kushidoni, “Gwala likoti lyako ungwode!”
Vauma, Patulu andímwoda kanji àkamanya kenga vyashintenda njelo vivele viu; nae ashona kenga avelé mwindoti.

Vakapite mautu mavili avakushunga, pavawikile pannango ukumene wavitali wavashuumila vauka kunjini, wanavo undíshimuka wene, vanavo kupita kuka vawena mwibalabala imo idikidiki kutwala muwakati wowo njelo kunnambaleka.

Patulu apalá kumwida ding'ano kutwala kushidoni, “Napanelo ninkumanya mwiu doni, Umu anintumidya njelo wake kwida nanguposha kumakono kwake Elode na kunguposha muvitendo uti vyavashilota kungutenda vayuda.”
Patulu pamanyite shana uti víshitandeka avilá andyúka mpaka paing'ande imwe Maliya anyoke Nshuwau, Nshuwau jo áshimanyika kwalina lya Malukushi. Popo po, vandíkadyania vanu voe vashwali.
Akakanyola nnango wakunnango ataa odi kutwala mwali ntumika wapaing'ande walina Loda kuka ndamwitika.
Mwali pamanyite kenga lidi alyo limwe Patulu, nae kwamwaa walipuwilo lyoe andíleka kushimula nnango kutwala kuujila kwavakwoda ndavaulila doni, “Mwenu Patulu panda apa!”
Vanavo kushidoni, “Unaigwa na kudulumbuka ko ni aku!” Nae kuka mushu aashidoni, “Mene mwenu, mwiu!” Vanavo, “Wako, ajo inkuululika kuva njelo wake.”
Kanji Patulu ashindauka mushu akanyola nnango. Vanavo vakashimule, pavangwene vandíshanga namene.

Patulu kung'aniang'anianga nkono kuvamaladya kutwala kuvavalangangila mwamuumididye Umu nkalaboshi kutwala kushidoni, “Tiyagu jo pamo na vanung'unumunu, vavalangangile.” Nae kutwala kuma kuka kulyutu linji.
Napanelo wiko paushwenge, mabulisha ding'ano dyave dindívatindinganianga namene mwaa havashimanya shintandéke Patulu.
Bai Elode andílamulila vannambele kanji havangwene. Nadoni nae andívalalyanga mabulisha avalá kutwala kulamulila kuvatanalanga kutwala kunyema ku Yudeya kuka ndaikala palikaja lya Shashaleya.

Napanelo Elode, ashindavavikila namene shitundi venentete va ku Tilu namu va ku Shidoni, vanavo kutwala kunga shipinga kuka nannola ling'oto lyakunshomba Balashitu, mmádengo nang'olo wapaing'ande imwe umu, vandíjugwa pakulota ipagwe amani mwaa shakulya shavashilya mmakaja ave shishaalakela kushilambo shake Elode.
Napanelo liduva lyankodyanio lyavikíle Elode likawike, andígwalangila dinguvo dyake dyashiumu kuka ndaikala pashiteng'u shashiumu kutwala kutangola na venentete.
Bai venentete vashindajunga vaashidoni, “Lidi ali halinava shinu lyamunu vila kanji lyannungu.”
Kutwala popo na popo, njelo wake Umu kunkanyola Elode mwaa hampéle lishangelo Nnungu kutwala kumulya vakoko mmunda kwishidyanneu ntima, kupela.
Napanelo lilove lya Nnungu lishindaandavala na vakwoda vashindaanjadyeka.
Bai Balinaba namu Saulu pavatandadidye shimadengo shave pa Yelusalemu vandyúma na mumwanda wave vaníntwala Nshuwau aijá áshimanyika kwalina lya Malukushi.

Napanelo paliganisha lya pa Antiyokiya vandípagwa vakulava na vamwalimu kenga ava: Balinaba, Shimiyau áshimanyika kwalina lya Wakudimba, Lushiu wa ku Shilene, Manaeni munu ákulumwike pamo namu umu Elode na kupagwa Saulu.
Muliduva limo vakwoda uti valipudya kumwe Umu na vàvele mukunga, Imumu Wanashwe andívaulila kushidoni, “Mwapule Balinaba namu Saulu vauke vakakole madengo anivashamadile.”
Bai vanavo pavamalidile kunga na kushwali, vandívavikila makono kutwala kuvatumidya vauke.
Napanelo vanavo vàtumigwe na Imumu Wanashwe, vandyálela mpaka pa Selushiya, apo kukwela mwingalava kuka mpaka pashitingi sha Kupulu.
Pavawikile pa Salamishi, vandívalanganga lilove lya Nnungu muvitala vyamikodyanio vyavayuda na Nshuwau Malukushi avele nkúpwashela wave.
Napane pavadingukenge shitingi asho mpaka pa Papu vanínkodya nkúlava jumo wakushang'apa mwavi muyuda walina Bali-Yesu.
Nae avele muje Shelishu Paulu gavana wapashitingi asho. Shelishu, munu wamang'amung'amu na walimanyilo lyoe, anínshema Balinaba namu Saulu mwaa ashindalota vammalangangile lilove lya Nnungu.
Kanji Elimashi mwavi jo, mwaa aku ni kuvalangangila kwalina lyake, ashindavavangedya vamyombe alambela antividyange gavana hanaliinjidyange mulikulupililo.
Napanelo Saulu áshimanyika momo kwalina lya Paulu, pamuumbele Imumu Wanashwe anínnola ndoo, mwavi jo kutwala kushidoni,
“Umwana umwe Ndamoni gwe! Ummongo waishaliya gwe! Umunu wakukubyaa ushwang'a na vitendo vyakunyata gwe! Da wako ulota kuleka duvani kudinguwanga dindila dyashalowa dyake Umu?

Bai ambi popa Umu andakupa shaushanga! Ambi popa undaputala na undatwala wakati paukona ata ng'ading'adi vela.” Mwenu, mwavi jo kundimbinneu kumevo, kutunduvanga kulidingula popo annambela wakunkamula nkono.
Bai gavana washitingi pagwene davo, andíshanga mapundisho ammalanganga Umu kutwala kukulupila.
Paulu na vavagwe vakaume pa Papu vandíkwela mwingalava kuka mpaka pa Palegi shilambo sha ku Pampiliya, napane Nshuwau Malukushi andívaleka kuujila ku Yelusalemu.
Vakaume pa Palegi vandyúka mpaka pa Antiyokiya ya ku Pishidiya kutwala muliduva lyakupumula vanavo kuka ndaikalanga pashitala shakulipudidya.
Vakainuke kushomya Lilamulo na Vakulava, vananangalaledi vashitala shakulipudidya vandítuma vavajugwe doni, “Mmanung'unumunu, likapagwa lilove lyakuvanonowanga venentete, tangola.”
Paulu kutakatuka kuvamaladyanga na makono kutwala kushidoni, “Mmanaishilaeli pamo na mmanji múnjopa Nnungu, ngwigwa!
Nnungu wavenentete ava vavanaishilaeli andívatandola vanakuluvetu na kuvatenda kuva venentete vakumene vanama kenga vamidi mushilambo sha Mishili kutwala kuvaumya kwankono wadimongo mushilambo asho.
Kutwala apo, andivapililila muvyaka kenga alubaini doni vàvele mushimbweshe
na paukile ndavamalidya venentete saba mushilambo sha ku Kanaani, ulongo wave andívapa kuva maleko.
Vinu avi uti vindítandeka muwakati wavyaka dimiya nsheshe na amusini. Kutwala apo, Nnungu andívapa vakulungwa vakuvalangalalela mpaka muwakati umwe nkúlava Samuwele.
Napanelo vanaishilaeli vakanjugwe umu wakuvalangalalela, Nnungu andívapa Saulu mwanagwe Kishi wamulikola lyavanabenjameni kutwala kuvalangalalela vyaka alubaini.

Pamuumidye Saulu, aníntandola Daudi ave umu wave. Jo Daudi aju, nae andímuumidya ushuda aashidoni, ‘Ndimwona Daudi mwanagwe Yeshe kuva munu kwakwodananavo ntima wangu; nae andatandedya malotelo angu uti.’
“Napanelo mo muudukulu wake Daudi kwodana na kulivikila kwake, Nnungu animpalakedya kwavanaishilaeli Mwamboli Yesu.
Kanji Yesu akanava kuumilila, shitandi Nshuwau Wakubatisha andipita avalaililila venentete uti vanaishilaeli vapate ubatisho wakulijugulanga madambi ave.

Napanelo Nshuwau àvele pepi na kumalila shimadengo shake, andívaudya vanu doni, ‘Da mwenu nangu mungwona kuva nyani? Nangu hangunava shinu aijá wamunnindila. Kanji ling'oto lyangu nangu, ankwida aijá wandikavaikidile nangu kumuulanga vilatu.’
“Mmanung'unumunu mmashipinga shaudukulu wake Abulaamu pamo na mwenu mmanji múnjopa Nnungu! Lilove lyakwambwalegwa aku, wavantumidididyé ni wetu.
Venentete va ku Yelusalemu pamo na vakutawala vave kwamwaa wakuntikinanga na ata mene kumanya vyavatangwele vakulava vishaméka kula liduva lyakupumula, vanavo vanditandedya pavaukile ndamuukumu.
Ata ikava kenga havangwene likosha lyakupalela, vanínjugwa Pilatu pakulota abyaigwe.
Napanelo vakatandedye uti avilá vyavaandike vimwámba nae, vanínshuluwa panshalaba kuka nammika mushonga
kanji jojo jo, Nnungu anindyuwa pakati pavakupela.
Akandyuwe, vavagwe vaalekenavo ku Galileya mpaka ku Yelusalemu, vandyónananavo mumaduva oe na vovo vankumya ushuda wake kwavanaishilaeli.
Nadoni wetu apa tundida nammalangangila ntenga wambone uvalánga kenga Nnungu uti avilá vyalivikile kwavanakuluvetu,
anditandedya kwetu wetu tuvadukuluvave pakundyuwa Yesu kenga mwavaandikidile mulibuku lya Dimu inamba yambili doni, “ ‘Wako apa umwanangu kutunduvangila nelo nangu nitatako.’
“Nnungu anindyuwa Yesu pakavele pakuujila kavili nae mukupela; shitendo ashi ni shatangwele Nnungu doni, “ ‘Ndamwing'a vyakulivikila vyakwilimyanga na vyakukulupilika vimwe Daudi.’
Namomo lipungu linji litédoni, “ ‘Haunneka Nkwílimyanga wako aunda.’
“Napanelo Daudi muwakati wake akatandedye malotelo ake Nnungu, andíjaa shingumi na vandyúka nanshika pavyonga pavalala vanakuluvake kutwala kunda
kanji aijá wandyuwidye Nnungu pakati pavakupela, haundile.

Nadoni mmanung'unumunu ikala mumanya doni, kwaindila yamunu jojo aju tunkummalangangila kulivalivigwa kwamadambi na muvinu uti vyo vyamukashiulula mwenu kuvalangiligwa ishaliya kwalilamulo limwe Musha
kwaindila yake nae kula munu ákulupila, ankuvalangiligwa ishaliya.
Nangu ninkushidoni, shonde lilaledye pakulota havinankodye avilá vyavatangwele vakulava doni,
“ ‘Ngwigwa mwenu mmadyeluelu! Shanga na jaikangila kushu ko! Mwaa shinu shangutenda muwakati wenu ashi, ata munu akammalangangila shana hamukulupila.’ ”
Bai Paulu namu Balinaba vauma pashitala shakulipudidya, venentete vandívajugwangila vaujile kavili mulyutu alyo muliduva linji lyakupumula vakaanjedye malove alo.
Kutwala nkodyanio paumalilike, vayuda voe pamo na vanu valiinjidyénge vandímwoda Paulu namu Balinaba váshitangola na vanavo vavashomba pakulota vauke mushu muumonyo wake Nnungu.
Napanelo muliduva lyakupumula lyatíke, vanu vakwinjipika vapalikaja alyo vandíkadyania pakulota vaigwe lilove lyake Umu.
Bai vayuda pavagwene imbumba yavanu vakadyénie indívaumbala ing'ou kutwala kuntaukanga Paulu na kumwabalanga.

Ata ikave davo Paulu namu Balinaba vandítangola pavakajugulanga shinu vaashidoni, “Indívaikila shitandi tuvalangange lilove lya Nnungu kwenu mwenu kanji kwodamwaa munkwita na munkulyapula mushingumi shíkamalilika, bai wetu mwanda au kwavamidi.
Mwaa Umu anditulaililila doni, “ ‘Ninkukuvika wako uve lilangadyo kwavamidi pakulota uukenavo ntenga wakwambola mushilambo uti.’ ”
Bai vamidi vakaigwe malove alo, vashindapuwanga namene na vashindaing'a lishangelo lilove lyake Umu; kutwala avalá vatandalégwe vapate shingumi shíkamalilika, vandíkulupila.
Nadoni lilove lyake Umu lishindavalangangika mulijimbo alyo uti.
Kanji vayuda vandívatumbilikanga vanang'olo pamo na vakongwe vakulipudya na vakwishimika vapalikaja alyo kutwala vanavo kutunduvanga kuvapapata vapaulu na vandívavinganga mulilanga alyo.
Bai vamyombe vandípumunanga litutunga mmadodo mwave kutwala vanavo kuma kuka pa Ikoniu.
Kanji vakwoda va ku Antiyokiya vandípuwanga namene na vandyúmbaligwa na Imumu Wanashwe.
Napanelo pa Ikoniu Paulu namu Balinaba vandíinjila mushitala shakulipudidya shavayuda na kwainamuna yavatangwele, imbumba yavayuda na yavagalegu indíkulupila.
Kutwala vayuda vákaitikidile lilove alyo vandivatubya vamidi pakulota vavapinge vanung'unumunu avo.

Napavedoni vandíikala maduva oe namene pa Ikoniu vammalanganga Umu pavakajugulanga shinu na Umu nae ashindaing'a ushuda kwalilove lyaumonyo wake kwaindila yakuvapa dimongo dyakutandela vimanyikilo na vyakutikinikanga.
Nadoni vanu vankaja amo vandíjavanikana; kupagwa shipinga shavayuda na kupagwa shipinga shaupande wavamyombe.
Bai vayuda, vamidi pamo na vakutawala vave, vandyúnganila kuvauvyauvyanga na kuvaamanga majanga vamyombe.
Napanelo Paulu namu Balinaba vakamanye nnugu awo, vandítilila ku Lishitala na ku Delebe makaja ashilambo sha ku Likaoniya na kutilila mumakaja anji ashitanono.
Vanavo mumakaja alo, vashindavalanganga ntenga wambone.
Napanelo pa Lishitala andípagwa munu jumo wakudidimanga madodo áshiikala vila, avele mmashikini tangu shing'ang'eng'e shake na ákashiwena.
Munu aju pashimwigwilila Paulu; Paulu pannodile ndoo, akamwone kuvanavo likulupililo lyakulota apone,
andítangola pashanya po, amwaulila doni, “Takatuka wimile!” Munu aijá kutakatukinneu na kutunduvanga kuwena.
Vanu vaumbalanidíle apo pavagwene shitendo ashi shatandile Paulu, vandíjunga vatangola mushitangodi shalikaoniya vaashidoni, “Vannungu vandijalukanga kuva mwavanu kutwala kushuluka kutwidila!”
Balinaba vashinshema Sheushi na Paulu kunshema Elimeshi mwaa nae ni ashiva nkutangola.

Napanelo nkúlangalalela-shadaka wake Sheushi, nnungu wavandangaléle ing'ande yake pashengo likaja, andívaukanavo vang'ombe na lidaka lyadinduva pashengo likaja mwaa nae pamo na imbumba yavanu vanji vashilota vavashindange vanyama avo, vatende shadaka shakulipudidya kumili kwave.
Kanji Balinaba namu Paulu, vamyombe ava pavaigwite shitendo asho, vandípapulanga dinguvo dyave, kulijela shing'ati imbumba vatangola pashanya po

vaashidoni, “Mwenu, mwaa shani munkutenda davo? Wetu apa, tuvanu túumbigwe kenga mwenu; apa wetu twidilé nammalangangila ntenga wambone pakulota muleke vinu vyamambinya avi, mushinjiulile mitima vyenu kwa Nnungu mumi ákandyenge kuwa na pai, imanga na vinu uti vipagwíte mumautu alo.
Muwakati wapanyuma, Nnungu andívaleka venentete uti vawene mwavalatela vo vene.

Kanji ata ikave davo, nae ngwengwe halakíle kulilodya kwavanavo; andilodya wambone wake kwaindila yakuntanyela imbula yakuwa, kumupa mapuno muwakati wake, kumupa shakulya shoe shamwikuta na kumuumbadya lipuwilo mmitima vyenu.”
Kanji ata vamyombe vakavatangalele malove alo pakulota vavalakeye kutenda shadaka shakulipudidya kumili kwavanavo pandíkamadyanga namene.

Napanelo mo nkaja mo, vandíwika vayuda vaantiyokiya ya ku Pishidiya na vaikoniu kutwala kuvatumbilikanga vanu vankaja amo; bai vandímwamanga majanga Paulu, kumuutanga kuka nanjaa kunyenje likaja vona kenga andipela.
Kanji vakwoda vakauke nantang'anedya Paulu, Paulu andítakatuka kuujila nkaja. Kutwala palyamba lyake nae namu Balinaba kuka pa Delebe.
Napanelo vanavo vakavalangange ntenga wambone pa Delebe vandítadya voe vave vakwoda. Kutwala apo, vandyújila pa Lishitala, kuma apo kuka mpaka pa Ikoniu na vandíwika pa Antiyokiya ya ku Pishidiya.

Mumakaja alo, vanavo vashindapita vavanonowanga vakwoda vavapa ntima pakulota vauke mushu mulikulupililo na vavamanyiya doni, “Indivaikila tupite mumauvilo oe kwambangidya twinjile muutawala wa Nnungu.”
Namomo mumaganisha uti avashipita, vashindavatandola vanang'olo; ling'oto lyakushwali na kunga vashindavavika vakwoda uti mmakono mwake Umu wavankulupidile.
Vakapite shilambo sha Pishidiya vandíwika ku Pampiliya.
Vakavalangange ntenga wa Nnungu pa Pelege vandyálalela pa Ataliya.
Pavaumile pa Ataliya vandíinjila mwingalava kuujila ku Antiyokiya ya ku Shiliya palikaja lyavavakamudídye kwaumonyo umwe Nnungu kwashimadengo asho shavamalidile.
Pavawikile, vandíshema liganisha kutwala kuvalanganga vyatandile Nnungu kwaindila yavanavo na mwavapalalele litala vamidi pakulota vavenavo likulupililo.
Bai vanavo vandíikala maduva oe namene nkaja amo pamo na vakwoda.

Napanelo vanu vanji vandyúma ku Yudeya kuka ku Antiyokiya kutwala kutunduvanga kuvapundisha vanung'unumunu vaashidoni, “Mwenu vakanankumula likumbi kenga mwalilatela lidyavalelo lyake Musha, mwiko hamwambolegwa.”

Bai ing'ano ai iníntadya Paulu namu Balinaba vapwatane yakudimba kumevo na vanu avo. Nadoni indyámuligwa pakulota Paulu namu Balinaba pamo na vanung'unumunu vanji vapaliganisha lya pa Antiyokiya vauke ku Yelusalemu vakakadyanie na vamyombe pamo na vanang'olo pakulota valalyange ing'ano ayo.

Napanelo liganisha likavatumidye, vanavo vandípitila ku Poiniki na ku Shamaliya vavavalanganga vamidi mwavashinjiulidile mitima vyave kwa Nnungu; bai vanung'unumunu vandípuwanga namene mwaa wadyabali adyo.
Bai vanavo pavawikile pa Yelusalemu, liganisha, vamyombe pamo na vanang'olo vandívapwashalela landa kutwala vapaulu kuvavalangangila vinu vyatandile Nnungu na vanavo.
Kanji vakukulupila vanji vaishama yamapalishayo vandíimila kutwala kutangola doni, “Vamidi indivavaikila vakumuligwe na tuvalamulile vaodedye Lilamulo lyake Musha.”
Bai vamyombe pamo na vanang'olo vandíkadyania pakulota valipundishe ing'ano ayo.

Napanelo ukaumilile ntau utwéte wakati woe, Patulu andítakatuka kutwala kushidoni, “Mmanung'unumunu, mwenu mundimanya shana doni tangu kala Nnungu aningutandola pakati penu pakulota dashi, kwaindila yaikanywa yangu vamidi vaigwe lilove lyantenga wambone na vakulupile.
Nnungu ámanyite mitima vyavanu, andivaumidya vanavo ushuda pakuvapa Imumu Wanashwe kenga mo mwatupalalele wetu.
Wetu namu vanavo Nnungu hatupambulanienge; nae andyushanianga ushapu mitima vyave kwaindila yalikulupililo.
Napanelo mwaa shani munkumwangonga Nnungu pakuvatika ligogo likumene vakwoda lyavakaulwile vanakuluvetu kulitika ata nawetu momo?
I davo, wetu tunkukulupila kenga kwaindila yaumonyo wake Umu Yesu, wetu tundyambolegwa kulingana kenga mo mwavaambwalagwidye vanavo.”
Nadoni vanu uti vakadyaniénge palyutu alyo vandímalalanga na vandímwigwilila Balinaba namu Paulu pavashivalanganga vimanyikilo na vyakutikinikanga vyatandile Nnungu kwavamidi kwaindila yavanavo.
Napanelo vanavo pavamalidile kutangola Tiyagu kushidoni, “Mmanung'unumunu, ngwigwa!
Mwenu mundigwa mwatangaladile Simoni Patulu pammalangenge Nnungu mwavatananidile vamidi tangu kala; nae andivatandola venentete pakati pave vave vake.
Shitendo ashi shinkwitikananga na malove avakulava avaandike doni,
“ ‘Ling'oto lyavinu avi ndauja kwida ndadenga kavili ing'ande igwíle imwe Daudi; ndakandyanga lidembe alyo, ndadenga kavili
kwambangidya vakwijalila pakati pavanu na vamidi vashamagwídye kwalina lyangu vannambele Umu, malove ala atangola Umu
ámanyiidye vinu avi tangu kunantandi.’
“Napavedoni kulalyanga kwangu ni aku, hatunavadingadinge vamidi vashinjiulíla mitima vyave kwa Nnungu
kanji tuvaandikile vila havanalitae ushapu kwavannungu vakushang'apa, havanalavalave, havanamamene dinyama dyavanyama vakuvapambilila na havanalye myadi.
Mwaa tangu kala lilamulo lyake Musha linkuvalangangigwa mmakaja uti na kula liduva lyakupumula linkushomegwa muvitala vyamikodyanio.”

Bai vamyombe, vanang'olo pamo na liganisha uti vandyámuwa kuvatandola vanu pakati pave vampalakele Paulu namu Balinaba ku Antiyokiya. Nadoni vandívatandola vananangalaledi ava pakati pavanung'unumunu: Yudashi áshimanyika kwalina lya Balishabashi namu Shilashi

kutwala kuvapa vaukenavo ibalugwa yavaandike doni, “Vamyombe pamo na vanang'olo vàvele vanung'unumunu, kwavanung'unumunu avalá vamidi vapágwa disemu uti dya ku Antiyokiya, ku Shiliya na ku Kilikiya, mumpate nandele.
“Wetu tundigwa kenga pakati petu vandyuma vanu bila lilamulo lyetu kwida nantindinganianga na vitangodi vyave mpaka kuntadya mmanu kummilinganianga makumbukililo.
Nadoni wetu uti kwaunapamo tundyona kuva shambone kuvatandola vanu vanji vavapalakedye kwenu vanung'unumunu vetu vakunagwaleka Balinaba namu Paulu
vanu vajawíle shingumi shave kwamwaa walina limwe Umu wetu Yesu Klistu.
Napavedoni tunintumidya Yudashi namu Shilashi vaide vammalangangile malove ankanywa kwa avilá vyatwandike.
Imumu Wanashwe pamo na wetu tundyona kuva shambone hatunantike mwenu ligogo ila mutandedye avi vivaikidíle:

Hamunalye vyakulya vyavavaumididye vannungu vakushang'apa, hamunalye myadi, hamunamamene dinyama dyavanyama vakuvapambilila na hamunalavalave. Vinu avyo mukatandedya ni shambone namene. “Bai apa ni pamwisho.”
Bai vanu vatumígwe avalá liganisha lindívalaila kutwala vanavo kuma kuka ku Antiyokiya. Pavawikile, vandíshema nkodyanio waliganisha kutwala kujaula ibalugwa kuvapa.
Vanung'unumunu pavashomidye, malove alo andívapa ntima shii na vandípuwangila namene
kutwala Yudashi namu Shilashi vo vene vàvele vakulava momo, vandítangola namene vavapa ntima shii na vavanonowanga vanung'unumunu.
Vanavo vakaikalange maduva avaikalenge pa Antiyokiya, vanung'unumunu vaantiyokiya vandílailananganavo kwaamani na vandívaleka vaujile kwa avalá vavatumidídye.
Napane Paulu namu Balinaba vandíikala pa Antiyokiya maduva avaikalenge vapundisha na vavalanganga lilove lyake Umu pamo na vanung'unumunu vanji.
Akapite maduva doni, Paulu andímwaulila Balinaba kushidoni, “Ambi apa tuke tuvalola vanung'unumunu mumakaja uti atupitile tuvalanganga ntenga wake Umu kwambangidya tuvamanye mwavanamila.”
Napanelo Balinaba ishinannagwela vauke shalumo namu Nshuwau áshimanyika kwalina lya Malukushi.
Kanji Paulu hashona kuva shambone vamuukenavo aijá e alyumadyénge ku Pampiliya na ákaukile na vanavo kushimadengo
kutwala kuumilila ntau wakujowa mpaka kuvatadya kwambukananga. Balinaba akantwala Malukushi kwinjila mwingalava kuka ku Kupulu.
Paulu kanji kuntwala Shilashi kuka ling'oto lyavanung'unumunu kunkamudya kwaumonyo umwe Umu
na ashindapita ku Shiliya namu ku Kilikiya anonowanga maganisha.

Nae andyúka mushu na shimwanda shake mpaka pa Delebe na pa Lishitala; napanelo palyutu alyo ashindanama nkwóda jumo walina Timoti; anyoke avele nkúkulupila walikola lyashiyuda kanji tatake avele mugalegu.
Jo Timoti aju, vashinammalanganga wambone vanung'unumunu va pa Lishitala na va pa Ikoniu.
Paulu inínnagwela antwale ave wakumpalakela. Akantwale nae anínkumula likumbi mwaa vayuda váshiikala ako vandímanya doni tatake Timoti avele mugalegu.
Napanelo mumakaja avashipita, vashindavapa vakwoda uwamushi wavaumidye vamyombe na vanang'olo ku Yelusalemu kwambangidya vatandedye.
Nadoni maganisha ashindaliimiliyanga nkati mulikulupililo na vanu vashindauka mushu vaanjadyeka.
Vanavo vandípita isemu ya ku Piligiya na ku Galata vakadivililigwa kwa Imumu Wanashwe kuvalanganga lilove ku Ashiya.
Pavawikile pa Mishiya, vandílingangila vauke ku Bitiniya kanji Imumu wake Yesu havalataléle vauke.
Napavedoni vanavo vandípita pa Mishiya kwalalela pa Tolowashi.
Napanelo shilo Paulu indímwidila indoti: munu wa ku Makedoniya àimidile anjugwangila doni, “Shonde, amboka wide kwetu ku Makedoniya utupwashele.”
Ling'oto lyakwona indoti ayo, tundílipanganiyangidyanneu kuka ku Makedoniya tumanya kenga Nnungu anditutuma tuke tukavavalangangile vamakedoniya ntenga wambone.
Kutwala wetu kuma pa Tolowashi kukwela mwingalava kuka shalowa mpaka pashitingi sha Shamotolaki; palyamba lyake wetu kuwika pa Neyapolishi.
Patumile apo tundyúka mpaka pa Pilipo likaja lya dishiklitu itandi yashitajili yalijimbo lya Makedoniya lyavashitawala valoma. Palikaja ali, wetu tundíikala maduva atwikalénge.

Napanelo muliduva lyakupumula, wetu tundyúma palikaja po kuka kulundi kushinu kwatushona kenga tundapata lyutu lyakushwalidya; wetu kwikalanga kutwala kutunduvanga kutangonavo vakongwe vakadyaniénge mulyutu alyo.

Pakati pavakongwe váshitwigwilila andípagwa nkongwe jumo áshilipudya kwa Nnungu walina Lidiya áshishumidyanga dinguvo dyakupapeka dyailangi yanshambalau na wakwalakela kulikaja lya Tiyatila. Umu napane andímuungula ntima pakulota kwigwa shana vyashitangola Paulu.

Ling'oto lyankongwe ajo kupata ubatisho pamo na vapaing'ande pake, andítujugwangila aashidoni, “Ikava kenga mwenu munkungwona kenga nangu ninkúkulupila wake Umu, tuke mukaikale kwing'ande kwangu.” Bai nae andítuulula kutuukanavo kwing'ande kwake.

Napane ive doni, wetu tuka kulyutu lyakushwalidya alilá, andítwidila mwali jumo ntumwa e avénavo lijini lyadyangele; jojo jo, ashindavapatiya malupulupu oe vanang'olo vake kwashimadengo shake shadyangele.
Nae amwoda Paulu namu wetu ashindakugwanga pashanya po aashidoni, “Vanu ava ni vatumika vake Nnungu Wapashanya-uti; vankummalangangila indila yakwambola.”

Malove ala nae andítangola mumaduva oe kutwala kumwisho kwake Paulu kunnyatila; akashiliuka kumwaulila lijini jo doni, “Palina limwe Yesu Klistu ninkukulamulila, kuma mumili mwamwali aju!” Lijini kuuminneu.

Napanelo vanang'olo vene mwali ntumwa aijá pavagwene kenga lilindilililo lyave lyamalupulupu linditimbikanga, vaníntwala Paulu na muje Shilashi kupita vavautanga mpaka kwavakutawala kushiwanja shikumene shamikodyanio
kutwala kuvalodya kwavananangalaledi valibengi vaashidoni, “Vanu ava vayuda na vovo vankutimbanga likaja lyetu.
Hainatoshe vankwidanavo mapundisho alaéka kwetu wetu tuvaloma kwitikila na kwodedya.”
Bai imbumba yavanu ikatunduvange kuvakanyalanga, vananangalaledi valibengi vandílamulila vavaulange dinguvo na vavashape.
Ling'oto lyakuvakoma namene, vandívatwala kuvagang'aledya nkalaboshi kutwala kumwaulila nanangalaledi waikalaboshi avalaledye namene.
Bai nanangalaledi waikalaboshi akapate malamulo alo, andívatwala kuka ndavajela kushumba shankati uti kutwala madodo kuvaungangila mulikukwa.
Napanelo ìvele kenga shilo shing'ati doni, Paulu namu Shilashi vashindashwali na vashindaimba dimu dyakuntumbyanga Nnungu akuno vakungwa vanji vavaigwilila.
Kwashingangala kuumilila shindangenda shakujowa mpaka ikalaboshi kundangenda uti, milango kushimukanginneu na vakungwa uti mang'unyang'unya kuungukanga.
Napanelo nanangalaledi waikalaboshi paimwike, akone milango vìvele mwandwa, andítwala lyambila pakulota alibyae mwaa ashona kenga vakungwa vanditipukanga.
Kanji Paulu andíkugwa namene aashidoni, “Haunalitende shakunyata! Wetu uti tupali.”
Bai nanangalaledi waikalaboshi andíshamela shenje kutwala kwinjila shipajelo nkalaboshi akuno atatamela kuka ndaunama mushu mwake Paulu namu Shilashi.
Nae kutwala kuvaumidya panda kuvaudya, “Mmanang'olo inguvaikidile ngutende nyamani ngwambolegwe?”
Vanavo kushidoni, “Nkulupile Umu Yesu, undaambwalegwa, wako pamo na ing'ande yako.”
Bai vanavo vanímmalangangila lilove lyake Umu nae pamo namu avalá uti vamwing'ande yake.
Mwisaa yoyo nae andívatwalinneu kuvaukanavo ndavaukanga vilonda na muwakati wowo andíbatishwa pamo na vanu vake uti.
Akabatishwe, andívatwalinneu vapaulu kuvaukanavo kwing'ande kwake ndavapa shakulya. Bai nae andípuwanga namene pamo na vapaing'ande pake uti mwaa wakunkulupila Nnungu.
Napanelo wiko paushwenge, vananangalaledi valibengi vandívatuma vadyoko vave vaashidoni, “Vaungule vanu avalá.”
Kutwala nanangalaledi waikalaboshi kumwaulila Paulu kushidoni, “Vananangalaledi valibengi vandilamulila mwenu muunguligwe. Nadoni umananga muke kwaamani!”

Kanji Paulu andívajang'ula vanavo kushidoni, “Aba! Vatushapilé paumbala na kutugang'aledya nkalaboshi pavakalalyanga shana mwaa wene na wewe tùvele tuvaloma! Napanelo valota vatuungule shipiipii? I mwanavo! Indivaikila vaide vo vene, vatuungule.”
Vadyoko kuja kuka ndavaulila vananangalaledi vave valibengi malove alo. Vanavo pavaigwite kenga vapaulu vavele venentete valoma, vandíjopa namene.
Bai vanavo vandída ndavajugwa samaani vapaulu na ling'oto lyakuvaungula nkalaboshi, vandívajugwangila vaume nkaja.
Vapaulu vakaume nkalaboshi vandyúka kwing'ande imwe Lidiya na paing'ande apo vandívakodya vanung'unumunu; bai vanavo vandívapa ntima shii vanung'unumunu avo kutwala kuma nkaja mu Pilipo mo kuka.
Vakapite pa Ampipolishi namu pa Apoloniya vandíwika pa Teshalonika; po pa Teshalonika po shindípagwa shitala shakulipudidya shavayuda.
Napanelo mudishumana nnatu mumaduva akupumula, Paulu kenga lidyavalelo lyake andyúka kushitala shakulipudidya ndataukananganavo vayuda atunduvangila mu Maandiko
avaulila na avalodya kenga Klistu inímmaikila auvauvange na adyuke pakati pavakupela na ashindatangola aashidoni, “Jo Yesu wanimmalanganga aju, ni Klistu wene.”
Bai vayuda vanji vandishambegwa kutwala kulyunganianga namu Paulu namu Shilashi; namomo indílyunganianga imbumba yavagalegu váshilipudya kwa Nnungu pamo na vakongwe voe vakwishimika.

Kanji vayuda vandívanavo ing'ou vakavatwalanga vakubanga vanji vapashakoni vakaunga shipinga shavo shaupuju kupita vataa upuju nkaja; vanavo vandyúka ndapajola ing'ande imwe Yashoni valota vankamule Paulu namu Shilashi vavaukenavo kuumbala.

Kanji kwodamwaa havavapatíle, vanavo vandímuutanga Yashoni pamo na vanung'unumunu vanji kuvaukanavo kwavananangalaledi vapalikaja alyo vajunga pashanya po vaashidoni, “Vanu ava vapíta vatindinganianga shilambo, nkaja amu momo vandiwika.
Vanu vovo Yashoni andivapwashalela paing'ande pake. Vovo vo vyavatangola uti vakutimbanga malamulo ake Shashali vatangola doni, apali umu junji wavanshema Yesu.”
Bai imbumba yavanu pamo na vananangalaledi vapalikaja pavaigwite malove alo, vindívanyanyamuka mitima.
Kanji Yashoni akavalipe njuluku washamana vanínneka auke pamo na vavagwe.
Palidimbile liduva vanung'unumunu vaníntwalinneu Paulu namu Shilashi kuvaukanavo ku Beleya. Pavawikile ako vandyúka kushitala shakulipudidya shavayuda.

Kanji vayuda vankaja amo vavele vakuligwa kuvapunda va ku Teshalonika; vanavo vandípwashalela ntenga na ntima wave uti na kula liduva vashindalalyanga Maandiko pakulota vamanye kenga munkulinganana na amulá mwatangalela Paulu.
Nadoni voe pakati pave vandíkulupila namomo pakati pavagalegu vakongwe vakwishimika na valume voe.
Kanji vayuda va ku Teshalonika vakamanye kenga Paulu ankuvalanganga lilove lya Nnungu pa Beleya momo, vandyúka koko ndavakang'ela venentete na kutaa upuju.
Muwakati wowo vanung'unumunnu vandímwaulila na vanímpanganiangidyanneu Paulu auke nanyenje imanga kanji Shilashi namu Timoti vandíikala mo nkaja mu Baleya.
Bai vanung'unumunu váshimpalakela Paulu vandímuukanavo mpaka pa Atena na ling'oto lyakupata lilamulo lyakukinneu ikaululika Shilashi namu Timoti kwanavo, vanavo vandyúma.
Paulu pashivalindila vanavo ku Atena, ntima wake ushinanshanona mwaa wakwona likaja lya Atena kuumbalanga mashinamu avannungu.
Napavedoni nae ashindataukananganavo vayuda na vanu vanji vakunjopa Nnungu mushitala shave shakulipudidya na kutaukananga na vanu vanji váshipita pashiwanja shamikodyanio.

Napanelo vakumanya vanji vaepikuli na vaestoiku vashindomba mwaa namu Paulu kutwala vanji kushidoni, “Munu álambukanga mwanambwe aju aamba nyamani?” Kutwala vanji kavili kushidoni, “Aju twona kenga avavalanganga vannungu vavilambo vinji.” Vandítangola davo mwaa Paulu ashimmalanganga Yesu na kuvalanganga kudyuka kwavakupela.
Nadoni vanavo vaníntwala kumpalakela kunguguvale ukumene pa Aliyopagu ndamuudyangidya doni, “Unkuulula kutwaulila mana amapundisho aambi autupa ala?
Mwaa wako unkutupa mapundisho akukamadyanga namene. Napanelo tulota tumanye mana ake.”
Napane vaatena uti na vanu vanji vakwaloka váshipagwa nkaja amo, hashipali shinji shavashitenda ila kuvalanganila na kwigwa vyaambi.
Napanelo Paulu andíimila pa Aliyopagu kutwala kushidoni, “Mmaatena! Nangu ninkumwona mwenu nkati mushinamidi shenu uti kuva mmanadini namene

mwaa pangupitile ngudingukanga nkaja amu ngulalyanga vyakulipudidya vyenu ndikodya namomo alutali yavaandike doni, ‘Kwannungu Ákamanyika.’ Napane aijá wamulipudya kwabila kummanya ni jojo wanimmalanganga.
Aju ni Nnungu ákandyenge shilambo na uti vipagwíte amo; jojo ávele Umu wakuwa na pai hananama muding'ande dyakushwalidya dyavadangile vanu
na ata hanatumikiligwa kwamakono ashimunu kenga shipali shimwóva mwaa nae ni ávapa vanu uti shingumi, imumu na uti vinu.
Kutunduvangila kumunu jumo andivakandyanga venentete uti pakulota vaname mushilambo uti; ni jojo ávapangidile kaladavo wakati wakunama na ávavikidile kaladavo mautu wakunama kula venentete
kwambangidya vannambele Nnungu; nakapanji vanampamangapamanga na kumwona ata ikava kenga nae havele kushu na kula munu pakati petu.
Ivelé kenga mwavatangaladile doni, “ ‘Nkati mwake tunkunama, tunkuwena na tunkuvanavo umunu wetu,’ kenga mwavatangaladile vanu venu vashilanga doni, “ ‘Nawetu momo ni udukulu wake nae.’

“Napanelo ikava kenga wetu ni udukulu wake Nnungu, haivaikidile tukumbukile kenga unnungu unkulinganana na lishinamu lyashaabu, lyashitali shavanakandyanga dyela kwali lyalijanga lyavadile munu kwamakumbukililo na ulanda wake mwene.
Kanji Nnungu pakavalangila wakati aulá waungamanya, ambi apa ankuvavalangangila vanu uti mumautu avanama valijugulange madambi ave
mwaa Nnungu andipanga liduva lyakuukumu shilambo kwaishaliya kwaindila yamunu jumo wantandwele mwene. Ing'ano ai andilodya umwiu kwauti pakundyuwa munu ajo pakati pavakupela.”
Napanelo vanavo pavamwigwite Paulu atangola ing'ano yakudyuka kwavakupela, vanji vandímwiludyanga kutwala vanji kushidoni, “Ing'ano ai tundakwigwilila kavili muwakati unji.”
Napavedoni Paulu andílyumadyanga pakati pave.
Kanji vanji vakalyunganiange namu nae, vandíkulupila: pakati pave, Dionishiu washipinga shavaliyopagu, nkongwe jumo walina Damalishi na vanu vanji.
Ling'oto lyavinu avi, Paulu andyúma pa Atena kuka ku Kolintu.

Pa Kolintu, Paulu andíkadyania na muyuda Akila munu wa ku Pontu àwikile mwaambi aalakela ku Italiya pamo namu Pilishila nkongwe ndyagwe mwaa Kalaudiu andívakumulanga vayuda uti pa Loma. Nae andívaukila
napanelo kwodamwaa shimadengo shave shivele shimo shosho shakukandyanga dyema, bai nae andíikala namu vanavo vakola pamo madengo ave.
Kula liduva lyakupumula Paulu ashindatangola muvitala vyamikodyanio alota avashombe vayuda pamo na vagalegu.
Napanelo Shilashi namu Timoti pavawikile vaalakela ku Makedoniya, Paulu ashindabanigwa kwalilove aumya ushuda kwavayuda kenga Klistu ni Yesu.

Kanji vanavo vakampinge na vakamwabalange, Paulu andípumunanga dinguvo dyake kutwala kushidoni, “Myadi vyenu vipagwe pamuti penu! Nangu hanguve likosha kwenu mwenu. Kutunduvangila ambi apa, mwanda kwavamidi.”
Bai Paulu andyúma pashitala shakulipudidya po kuka kwing'ande yamunu jumo walina Titu Yustu, munu wakunjopa Nnungu na ing'ande yake indíijamananga na shitala shakulipudidya.
Napane Klishipu nanangalaledi wapashitala shakulipudidya anínkulupila Umu pamo na vanu uti vapaing'ande pake. Namomo vakolintu voe vakaigwe vyashitangola, vandíkulupila na vandípata ubatisho.
Napanelo muliduva limo shilo, Umu andímwaulila Paulu mwindoti kushidoni, “Haunajope, kaleya kutangola, haunamalale
mwaa nangu ngupali namu wako na hapali munu álota kukwinjila pakulota akubyae mwaa nkaja amu ninkuvanavo vanu voe.”
Bai Paulu andíikala nkaja amo mwaka umo na myedi sita avapundisha lilove lya Nnungu.
Napanelo Galyu àvele gavana walijimbo lya Akaya, vayuda kwaunapamo vanínnyanyamalila Paulu na vaníntwala kumuukanavo kumwe gavana kushiwanja shamikodyanio
ndaashidoni, “Munu aju ankuvashomba vanu valipudye kwa Nnungu kanji kwaindila íkaitikananga na Lilamulo.”
Paulu alota ajang'ule, Galyu andívaulila vayuda kushidoni, “Mmayuda, ing'ano ai leka ìvele yakutenda kunyata kwali ukalau wakumamodya, ikandipagwa shaliya yakulota nimwigwilile
kanji kwodamwaa ing'ano yene ai yamalove, yamena na yalilamulo lyenu, aangangalanga mmene. Nangu hangutamwa kuva nkúukumu wamyaa avi.”
Nadoni nae andílamulila vavakumulange palyutu alyo.
Bai vanavo vanínkamula Shoshiteni nanangalaledi wapashitala shakulipudidya kunkoma, Galyu amwona kanji Galyu hashitanana ata padyoko.

Napanelo Paulu andíikala maduva oe pa Kolintu. Kutwala apo, andívalaila vanung'unumunu kuka ku Kenkeleya akakwele mwingalava auke ku Shiliya namu Pilishila pamo namu Akila. Kanji pa Kenkeleya, andíbubula ugwimbu wake mwaa andílivikila kwa Nnungu.
Pavawikile pa Epeshu, nae andívaleka kutwala kuka ndainjila mushitala shakulipudidya ndataukananganavo vayuda.
Bai vanavo vanínjugwa Paulu vaikanavo maduva akudyangangila kutwala nae kwita
kanji andívalaila aashidoni, “Nnungu akalota ndamwidila.” Kutwala apo, andíkwela mwingalava kuma pa Epeshu.
Pawikile pa Shashaleya, andyámbwakenneu kuka ndaudyanga liganisha ku Yelusalemu kutwala kwalalela ku Antiyokiya.
Akaikalange maduva aikalenge pa Antiyokiya, andyúma kupita awanawananga mmaganisha a ku Galata na a ku Piligiya avanonowanga vakwoda uti.
Napanelo ku Epeshu andíwika muyuda jumo walina Apolu wa ku Alishandaliya. Nae avele munu wakumanya kutangola na andímanya namene Maandiko.
Munu aju andípundishigwa shana mwindila yake Umu na atangola na ntima wake uti ashindapundisha pakakowa shinu avalanganga vimwámba Yesu ata ikava kenga amanyite vila ubatisho umwe Nshuwau.

Bai jojo jo, andítunduvanga kutangola pakajugulanga shinu pashitala shakulipudidya. Pilishila namu Akila vakamwigwe mwashitangalela, vaníntwala kumuukanavo kukaja kwave kuka nammalangangila kwankati indila yake Nnungu.

Napanelo Apolu pakumbukidile kwamboka imanga kuka ku Akaya, vanung'unumunu vanínnonowanga na vandyándika ibalugwa pakulota vakwoda vakwanavo, vampwashalele. Kuwika kwake Apolu ku Akaya nae andívapwashela namene avalá ve vakulupidíle kwaindila yaumonyo
mwaa ashindavataukanga kwadimongo vayuda paumbala alodya mumaandiko kenga Klistu ni Yesu.
Napanelo Apolu àvele pa Kolintu, Paulu andyámbwakanga mashinga kutwala kwalalela pa Epeshu. Popo po andívakodya vakwoda,
nae kutwala kuvaudya, “Mwenu pamukulupidile po, munimpata Imumu Wanashwe?” Vanavo do, “Wetu ing'ano yene ya Imumu Wanashwe tukwigwa gwegwe.”
Nae kuvaudya kavili, “Kanji napane mupatilé ubatisho shani?” Vanavo, “Tupatilé ubatisho umwe Nshuwau.”
Paulu kutwala kushidoni, “Nshuwau andívapa vanu ubatisho wakulijugulanga madambi avaulila vankulupile aijá áshaaloka panyuma pake, yani Yesu.”
Bai vanu ve vaigwíte malove alo, vandípata ubatisho palina limwe Umu Yesu.
Paulu akavavikile makono, andívashulukila Imumu Wanashwe na muwakati wowo vandítunduvanga kutangola dinangodi dyakutikinikanga na kulava.
Vanu avo uti vavele valume kenga kumi na mbili doni.
Paulu muwakati wamyedi mitatu, ashindauka kushitala shakulipudidya aombanga myaa na avashomba pakajugulanga shinu kwamwaa wautawala wa Nnungu.

Kanji vanu vanji vashindalitaukanga, havashilota kukulupila na vashindatangola kunyata Indila paumbala wavanu. Napavedoni Paulu andyúma pakati pave pamo na vakwoda kuka ndavapundisha kula liduva pashitala shimwe Tilanu.
Bai shimadengo asho Paulu andítenda muvyaka vivili mpaka vanu uti valijimbo lya Ashiya, vayuda namu vamidi kwigwa lilove lyake Umu.
Nadoni Nnungu ashindatandedya vyamakango vyakutikinikanga kwaindila imwe Paulu
mpaka vanu kutwala malesho pamo na dinguvo dye dikumbíle likalogwe limwe Paulu kuka ndavakwaa valwele kutwala vanavo vilwele vyo kupona na majini aukalau momo kuumananga mumili.

Napanelo vayuda vanji váshipita valaula majini aukalau, muliduva limo vandílingangila kukumulanga majini mumili vyavanu vatambulanga lina limwe Umu Yesu vaashidoni, “Palina limwe Yesu wanammalanganga Paulu, nangu ninkunnamulila, uumananga!”
Pakati pavanu vene váshitenda vinu avyo vandípagwa vana saba vamwe muyuda jumo walina Shikeva nkúlangalalela-shadaka nkumene.
Kanji lijini lyaukalau andívajang'ula doni, “Yesu nangu nimmanya na Paulu ninkumwigwanga; napane kushi mwenu po, mmakwashi?”
Bai munu walijini lyaukalau apalá leka avaulukile! Ni kutwala kuvatimba namene mpaka vanavo uti do, pwii, matakudavo na makana avo mumili.
Napanelo vanu uti váshinama pa Epeshu yani vayuda pamo na vamidi pavaigwite shitendo asho vandíjopa namene na vandímamodya kutumbyanga lina limwe Umu Yesu.
Vanu voe ve vankulupidíle Umu vashindalilodya paumbala valivalanganga ngala vitendo vyave vyakunyata.

Namomo vanu vanji váshitumila vitendo vyashaviavi, vandíkushania mabuku ave ashaviavi kutwala kushashola moto paumbala wavanu. Mabuku alo vakalalyange njuluku wake, undítimila shikonda shadimiliyoni dyoe namene.
Bai kwamwaa wavitendo avi, lilove limwe Umu lishindauka mushu lyandavala na lishindaavanavo dimongo.

Ling'oto lyavinu avyo, Paulu alangalalegwa na Imumu Wanashwe andyámuwa kuka ku Yelusalemu apitila ku Makedoniya na ku Akaya aashidoni, “Panguwika ku Yelusalemu nikaikalanga, ininguvaikila momo nguke ndikawike ku Loma.”
Napavedoni andívatuma vatumikamwagwe yani Timoti namu Elashitu vauke ku Makedoniya kutwala nae kwikala padyoko ku Ashiya.
Mumaduva lolo, pa Epeshu shindíbuka shititimbu shakudimba kumevo kwamwaa wa Indila.
Mwaa munu jumo nkwána walyava walina Demetiliu áshikandyanga mashinamu alinganianga ing'ande ya nnungu nkongwe walina Alitimishi na áshivapatiya vamadengo vake malupulupu oe,
andívashema vamadengo vake pamo na vanji vashimadengo shosho kuvaulila doni, “Mmavangu, mwenu munkumanya kenga mali etu ankwalakela mushimadengo ashi.

Mwenu munkwona na munkwigwa shana vinu vyapita atenda munu wavanshema Paulu akuno ku Epeshu na mpaka Ashiya yene ai uti. Nae andívashomba na andivashinjiulanga vanu atangola doni, ‘Vannungu vakuvakandyanga vanu vene havanava shinu vannungu vaiu.’

Napavedoni shipali shijoidyo i gweka yakuliuligwa nshulushu wetu kanji namomo ata yo ing'ande imwe nangangonda nnungu Alitimishi, vanu vandailudyanga na shimbili uti shannungu wene wavalipudya vanu uti ku Ashiya akuno na muvilambo vinji, shindamalilika.”
Bai vanu avo vakaigwe malove alo, shindívatindimbukanga shitundi kutwala kutunduvanga kujunga kwakudivana kumatu vaashidoni, “Nangangonda wa ku Epeshu ni Alitimishi bai.”

Muwakati ungwipi likaja uti lindíinjila mpulugu; venentete vanínkamula Gayu namu Alishitaliku vanu va ku Makedoniya váshipita vawena shalumo namu Paulu kupita vavautanga vavaukanavo kushiwanja shamishesho.
Napanelo Paulu andílota auke akalilodye kuumbala kanji vakwoda vanínneya.
Namomo vananangaleledi vanji vashilikali valijimbo lya Ashiya vavagwe Paulu navanavo vandítumidya ntenga vanjugwangila hanalyalaveke kuka kushiwanja shamishesho.
Bai panguguvale awo upagwite upuju gweka; vanji váshijunga vatangola ashi, vanji vatangola shinji na voe havamanyíte shavaukidile mulyutu alyo.

Vanji pavashivona vayuda vangang'alangila mushu Alishandele, vashikumbukila kenga ing'ano ayo yàke nae. Napanelo Alishandele andíng'aniang'anianga makono ajugwa vamalale pakulota alishililidye pamevo pave.
Kanji vakamwanalele kenga avele muyuda, iminga uti indíjunga kwaunapamo muwakati kenga wadisaa mbili iishidoni, “Nangangonda wa ku Epeshu ni Alitimishi bai!”

Napanelo nshadolo wapalikaja andívamaladya vakupujungula vo kutwala kushidoni, “Mmaepeshu, wakwashi apa átikinenge kenga likaja ali ni lishúnga ing'ande yannungu nangangonda Alitimishi na waing'ope yake igwíle kuwa?
Pakuva mundimanya kenga vinu avi hapali wakutauka, bai malalanga! Hamunatende vinu bila kukumbukila!
Vanu vamuviidinavo ava havaivite vyombo vyamwing'ande yannungu wetu na ata havanankupulu shinu nnungu ajo.
Ikava kenga Demetiliu pamo na vavagwe vankuvanavo mwaa na munu woewoe, mabengi avelé mwandwa na vagavana vakwangangola vapali; nadoni vanavo vauke vakakashali kwanavo.
Kanji mwenu apa shikapagwa shinji shamulota vaangangole, shindivaikila shangangaleke kunguguvale wenewene.
Ing'ano ai mwaivalalele nelo inkuululika tuvanu kushitakigwa vatutambudyanga kutaa upuju nkaja amu patukaulula kujang'ulanga mwaa haipali shaliya.”
Ling'oto lyakutangola davo, andílamulila nguguvale wapukanange.
Napanelo shititimbu ashilá shìmalilikenge, Paulu andívashema vakwoda kuvanonowanga kutwala kulilaila kuka ku Makedoniya.
Shilambo asho nae andípita awanawananga avananonowanga vakwoda kutwala kuwika ku Galashiya.

Ako nae andíikala myedi mitatu. Pashipanganikanga pakulota ainjile mwingalava auke ku Shiliya, andyánalela kenga vayuda vankupanga milugu vyakuntenda ing'ondo. Nadoni nae andyámuwa kuja apitila ku Makedoniya.
Mushimwanda asho andyódana namu Shopatulu wa ku Beleya mwanagwe Pilu, Alishitaliku namu Segundu vanu va ku Teshalonika, Gayu wa ku Delebe, Tikiku namu Tolopimo vanu va ku Ashiya namu Timoti.
Vanavo vandílangalela kuka ndatulinda pa Tolowashi.

Napanelo shikukulu shamagung'u ákave nkukumuku shikapite, wetu tundyúma pa Pilipo kukwela mwingalava kutwala mwanda wamaduva mwanu kuka ndakadyania na vavetu pa Tolowashi. Palikaja ali tundíikala maduva saba.
Muliduva litandi lyaishumana lyulo tuvakwoda tundíkadyania pakulota tulye pamo. Napanelo kwodamwaa Paulu ashindalota aume palyamba lyake, andyúka mushu atangola na vakwoda mpaka shilo shing'ati.
Mushumba shaigalopa shatuvéle dindípagwa dikalaboi dyoe dishikalela.

Napanelo nnemba jumo walina Eutiku andíikala palidilisha kutwala kwindila lwono akuno Paulu alapayanga kutangola. Bai andílala lwono lwakulikandangila na andígwa mwigalopa yantatu mo kugwilila pai; vaukilé nannakota wiu wakudidima.
Kutwala nanae Paulu kushuluka mpaka apalá pavéle nnemba, kutepa kunkumbatila kutwala kushidoni, “Hamunaushaushange mitima, aju apa mumi.”
Bai Paulu andíkwela kavili mwigalopa kutwala kumajanianga shakulya kutwala vanavo uti kulya. Kutwala apo, andítangola vila mpaka linyeiku kutwala kuma kuka.
Vakwoda avalá vaníntwala nnemba aijá àvele mumi. Shitendo ashi shindívapa ntima shii namene.
Napanelo wetu tundíinjila mwingalava kuka tulangalela mpaka pa Asho nannindila Paulu tuwenenavo shalumo mwingalava mwaa nae andípangila na andípakanila namu wetu auke mwanda wamadodo.
Patukadidye nae pa Asho, tunímpwashalela mwingalava kutwala tuvanu kumalidya mwanda kuka ku Mitileni.
Palyamba lyake tukaume pa Mitileni tundyúka vila mpaka pepi na pashitingi sha Kiu. Muliduva lyambili lyake tuvanu kuka mpaka pa Shamoshi kutwala ling'oto lyaliduva limo kuwika pa Miletu.

Paulu andyámuwa kupita umungu pa Epeshu kwambangidya mulijimbo alyo lya Ashiya hanatimatimange mwaa avele na ntima wakuwika shipajelo ku Yelusalemu na ata leka yùlulike awike liduva lya Pentekoste likanava kuwika.
Napanelo po pa Miletu, Paulu andívashema vanang'olo valiganisha va ku Epeshu.
Pavawikile nae andívaulila doni, “Mwenu mundimanya mwangunamidile nangu panguvéle namu mwenu kutunduvangila muliduva lyangu litandi lyanguluvete akuno ku Ashiya.
Mwenu mundimanya shana mwanintumikidile Umu na kulishapeya na shipalodi pamo na mauvilo oe angupatile kwamwaa wamilugu vyakunyata vyavayuda.
Mundimanya kenga hashipali shoeshoe shapaida shangupiyapiyenge; nimpundisha muumbala na muding'ande dyenu
ngumya ushuda kwavayuda na kwavamidi wakulijugulanga madambi kwa Nnungu na walikulupililo nkati mumwe Umu wetu Yesu.
