Napanelo lola, ninkuka ku Yelusalemu nguungigwa na Imumu Wanashwe panikamanya shilóta kungutandeka kwanavo.
Shangumanyite apa nidoni, Imumu Wanashwe ankumya ushuda mumakaja uti mwangupita kenga kungwa na kuvauvanga kunkungulindila.

Kanji navalangilila shinu shingumi shangu kuva shinu shamana kwangu nene nimwene pakulota ngudududile shitamba shangu na utumika wangukamudidye Umu Yesu yakutaa ushuda ntenga wambone waumonyo wake Nnungu.
“Napanelo lola, nangu apa ndimanya doni pakati penu mwenu wanimmalangangidile utawala, hapali ata jumo álota kwona kavili ing'ope yangu.
Napavedoni nelo apa ninkulyakikisha ngala kenga hanguve likosha kwamyadi vyenu
mwaa ndivalanganga panikapiyapiyanga malotelo uti a Nnungu.

Nadoni lishunge mwemwe mmene na shunga shipinga shavangandolo uti shankamudidye Imumu Wanashwe muve mmakulaledya vake kwambangidya mushunge liganisha lya Nnungu lyapatile kwaindila yamyadi vyake jo mwene.
Nangu ndimanya shana doni, ling'oto lyakuma nangu andaumilila mavinji akujowa pakati penu pavakapambedya likundi lyavangandolo.
Namomo pakati penu vandabuka vanu vatangola vinu vyakudinguwanga pakulota vavaute vakwoda vavode vanavo.
Napavedoni lilaledye mukumbukila doni, nangu muvyaka vitatu shilo na mui hangulakadile kunyuma kunnangalalela kula munu pakati penu ngulilidyanga.
“Napanelo nangu ninkunkamudya kwa Nnungu na kwalilove lyaumonyo wake lyulúla kunkulumuwa na kumupa maleko pakati pa avalá vailimyangígwa.
Hangung'unwike njuluku, shaabu kwali inguvo kwamunu woewoe.
Shasho! Mundimanya mwe, kenga makono lolo ala andikola madengo pakulota ngulyangangole nimwene na nivaangangole vavangu momo.

Kula shinu shangutandile, ninnodya mwenu kenga kwaindila yashimadengo shikumene shatutenda indituvaikila tuvapwashele vákalyulula tukumbukila malove atangwele jo mwene Umu Yesu aashidoni, ‘Wakwalaligwa ni aijá áing'a kuliko ápwashalela.’ ”
Pamalidile kutangola malove alo nae andíguguvala pamo na vakwoda vanji kutwala kushwali.
Bai vanavo vandílilanga namene na vandílailananganavo vatuwanidyanavo makono na vankumbatila.
Shinu shivatadídye vanavo vamamodye kuvanavo shipalodi shoe ni mwaa washitangodi shavatangaladile aashidoni, “Hamwona kavili ing'ope yangu.” Bai vanavo vanímpalakela mpaka kwingalava.
Ling'oto lyakulailananga namu vanavo, wetu tundíinjila mwingalava kuka shalowa mpaka pashitingi sha Koshi. Kutwala palyamba lyake tuvanu kuka mpaka pa Lodeshi, tukapite apo tundyúka mpaka pa Patala.
Pa Patala wetu kukodya ingalava yamboka yuka ku Poiniki, wetu kukwela kuka.
Patuwikile isemu íshaaneka Kupulu, wetu tundítukulidya kunshanda kutwala kulodya ku Shiliya kuka ndaimila panshiko wa pa Tilu palyutu líshiloteka vipakuligwe vinu mwingalava.
Napanelo popo po, tundívalambela vakwoda mpaka kuvakodya kutwala wetu kwikalanavo maduva etu saba. Vakwoda vovo vo, valangalalegwa na Imumu Wanashwe vandímwaulila Paulu hanaamboke kuka ku Yelusalemu.

Nkaja amo tukaikalange maduva etu alo, wetu tundyúma kulodya kwatushuka. Kutwala vakwoda na vadyavavo pamo na vanavavo kutupalakela kumalila likaja mpaka ndawika nanyenje imanga; koko ko, tundíguguvalanga kutwala kushwali.
Tukalailanange namu vanavo, wetu tundíinjila mwingalava yetu, vanavo kuujila kuding'ande dyave.
Patumalidile shimwanda shetu tuma pa Tilu, tundíwika pa Patolamaida. Apo, wetu tundívaudyanga vanung'unumunu na tundíikalanavo liduva limo twambanganavo myaa.
Palyamba lyake, tundyúma mpaka pa Shashaleya. Pakaja apo, wetu tundyúka ndawikila paing'ande yake nkúvalanganga-ntenga walina Pilipo munu wamushipinga shavanu saba.
Jo Pilipo aju andívanavo vanavake vakanava kulombwa nsheshe váshilava.
Napanelo mulyutu alyo tukaikalange maduva akudyanga, nkúlava Agabu kwaloka ku Yudeya.

Nae paidile ndakadyania namu wetu, andítwala nkanda wainguvo umwe Paulu kulyunga mmadodo na mmakono kutwala kushidoni, “Imumu Wanashwe atédoni, ‘Mwene nkanda au vayuda vandamunga ku Yelusalemu kutwala kunkamudya kwavamidi.’ ”
Bai wetu pamo na vanung'unumunu vene kaja ayo, patwigwite malove ala tushinannaililila Paulu hanaukenavo mushu shimwanda shakuka ku Yelusalemu.

Kanji Paulu kutwala kushidoni, “Mwaa shani mwenu munkulila na munkungutaa shipalodi shoe muntima mwangu? Mwaa nangu apa i ngukubalidyé gweka kungwa kanji ata yakupela kwamwaa walina limwe Umu Yesu, ndikubali momo.”
Napane pakuva haululíke kushambegwa, tundíshukulu tuushidoni, “Bai vitandeke kenga mo mwalatela Umu.”
Napanelo tukaikalange maduva etu atwikalenge, wetu tundílipanganiyanga kutwala kwamboka kuka ku Yelusalemu.

Mushimwanda shetu vakwoda vanji va pa Shashaleya vandítupalakela mpaka paing'ande pake Manashoni, palyutu lye livaikidíle tuwikile. Munu aju avele wa ku Kupulu na avele nkwóda wamushipinga shavakwoda vatandi.
Bai patuwikile pa Yelusalemu, vanung'unumunu vandítupwashalela na lipuwilo lyoe.
Palyamba lyake Paulu andyúka namu wetu nannola Tiyagu kutwala vanang'olo uti kwidananga.
Paulu akavaudyange, andívavalangangila kula shinu shantandalele Nnungu kwaindila yautumika wake pakati pavamidi.
Vanavo vakaigwe vyavavalangangidile, vandímupa lishangelo Nnungu na vandímwaulila Paulu kushidoni, “Nung'unumunu, unkwona makumi manga avayuda vakulupidíle. Vanavo vankuvanavo dukuduku kwa Lilamulo,

napane vandigwa kenga wako unkuvapundisha vayuda uti vanáma muvilambo vyavamidi vaambukange lilamulo lyake Musha uvapundisha havanavakumule likumbi vanavavo na unkuvaleya kwodedya yadi yave yashiyuda.
Napanelo tutandelé mwashi? Kwamwiu vanavo vandaigwa kenga wako undiwika nkaja amu.
Wako tenda vyatulota kukwaulila avi: apa vapali vanu nsheshe pakati petu valóta vantandele Nnungu vyavalivikile.

Napavedoni wako lyunganiange na vanavo utende pamo shimadengo shakulyushanianga ushapu na gwegwe ulipile njuluku shimadengo asho na ling'oto vanavo vandabubuligwa ugwimbo wave; nadoni, vanu uti vandamanya kenga uti vyavashiigwanga vakwamba wako ni vyaushwang'a mwaa valota kwona kenga nawako momo mpaka ambi unkwodedya Lilamulo lyake Musha.

Kanji kwaupande wavakukulupila vaumíle pakati pavamidi, wetu tundivaandikila ibalugwa yakuvamanyiya mwatwamulidile wetu tuushidoni, ‘Havanamamene inyama yavashindile vavaumidya shadaka vannungu vakushang'apa, havanalye myadi, havanamamene inyama yannyama wakumpambilila na ata havanalavalave.’ ”

Bai mwiu Paulu palyamba lyake andívatwala vanu avalá kuka ndalyushanianganavo ushapu; ling'oto andyúka ndainjila mwing'ande ya Nnungu ndavalanganga liduva lyakumalila vanu avo kulyushanianga ushapu na kuvalanganga shadaka shíshiloteka vantandele kula munu pakati pave.
Napanelo maduva saba akulyalaliya alota kumalilika, vayuda va ku Ashiya vakamwone Paulu mwing'ande ya Nnungu vanavo vandívakang'ela venentete na vanímwinjilinneu

vajunga vaashidoni, “Mmanaishilaeli, tupwashela! Munu aju ni jojo ápita avapundisha vanu uti kula kushinu vavavangedye vanaishilaeli; ankupundisha vapinge Lilamulo na vailudyange lyutu ali. Na hainatoshe avatwete vamidi kuvainjidya mwing'ande ya Nnungu nadoni anditaa ushapu lyutu ali lyakwilimyanga.”
She shivatadídye vatangole davo ivele mwaa vandímwona palikaja po àvele namu Tolopimu munu wa ku Epeshu nadoni vanavo vashona kenga Paulu munu ajo andiinjinavo mwing'ande ya Nnungu.

Napanelo nkaja mo shindíinjila shititimbu shakujowa namene. Dimbumba dyavanu dindyúka ditukuta vakankamule Paulu. Vakankamule vandípita vamuutanga kumumya mwing'ande ya Nnungu amulá na milango vandíshimanginneu.
Valingangila kummyaa, kuwika dyabali dishivalanganga kuumilila kwashititimbu pa Yelusalemu kwanang'olo nkumene wavaing'ondo wavaloma.
Nae apalá kuvatwalinneu vanang'olo vavaing'ondo vamwina mwake pamo na vaing'ondo kuka koko. Venentete pavangwene nang'olo nkumene wavaing'ondo aijá pamo na vaing'ondo vake, vandíleka yakunkoma Paulu.

Bai nang'olo nkumene wavaing'ondo aijá anímmandika Paulu kutwala kumwaulila kenga avele mmakono mwashilikali na andílamulila vamunge mang'unyang'unya mavili kutwala kudya, “Da munu aju nyani na atandilé nyamani?”

Kwamwaa washititimbu shuumilidíle pakati paimbumba vanji vajunganila ashi vanji kujunganila shinji, nang'olo nkumene wavaing'ondo hashipali shawakika shashigwa nadoni nae andílamulila vamuukenavo Paulu kulingongo lyavaing'ondo.
Pavawikile pavikada vyalingongo, vaing'ondo vanínnyanyulidya Paulu kushanya kwamwaa washitundi shavashimmikila venentete
váshipita vamwoda pepi-pepi vajunga vaashidoni, “Mmalidye!”

Napanelo Paulu valota vanjele mulingongo andímudya nang'olo nkumene wavaing'ondo kushidoni, “Inkuululika nangu kukumanyiya shinu shimo?” Nang'olo nkumene wavaing'ondo kushidoni, “Wako unátangola shigalegu?
Da wako hauvele mmishili aijá átandile mandamano akupinga shilikali mumaduva apitíle kutwala kuvatwala vakupinga-shilikali dyalupu nsheshe kuvaukanavo kushimbweshe?”
Paulu kutwala kushidoni, “Nangu nimuyuda nguvalakwidyé pa Talashishi likaja lyakwigwinika lya ku Kilikiya. Kanji napane ninkukujugwa ungupe litala lyakutangola na venentete.”

Nang'olo nkumene wavaing'ondo aijá kumupa litala kutwala Paulu kwimila pavikada apalá kunyanyula makono avamaladyanga venentete. Pavamalalenge do vii, nae andítunduvanga kutangola na vanavo mwinangodi yashibalaniya aashidoni,
“Mmanung'unumunu pamo na mmatatamunu, ngwigwa kulishililidya kwangu kwenu mwenu.”
Napanelo pavamwigwite atangola mushibalaniya, vandímamodya kulimaladya kutwala nae kushidoni,

“Nangu ni muyuda nguvalakwadidye nkaja mu Talashishi ya ku Kilikiya ngukulumukidile nkaja mo mu Yelusalemu amu ngushungigwe mmadodo mwake Gamaliyele ngupundishigwe kwodananavo kushinyigwa kwa Lilamulo lyavanyakala vetu na nguvanavo dukuduku kwa Nnungu kulingana kenga mo mwampagwidya mwenu nelo amu.
Nangu ndivapapata vanu váshoda Indila ai ata mpaka kuvabyaa nguvaunganga na nguvajela mudikalaboshi i gweka valume kanji namomo vakongwe.

Ata jo nkúlangalalela-shadaka nkumene ing'ano ai ankuulula kutaa ushuda pamo na nkodyanio wavanang'olo uti. Vovo ava vaningupa shitambulisho shakuka ndalodya kwavanung'unumunu va ku Damashiko pakulota ndivatwale vavé kwanavo ndivaidenavo na mang'unyang'unya pa Yelusalemu apa vavape shaushanga.
“Napanelo nguka kwanavo, panguwikile pepi na pa Damashiko, muwakati kenga waliduva pamuti doni, kwashingangala kungutang'anedya lilangadyo lyakushenga namene lyakwalakela kuwa
kutwala nangu kugwa kugwilila pai na kwigwa lidi liishidoni, ‘Saulu, wako Saulu! Mwaa shani unkungupapata?’
Nangu kudya, ‘Da wako nang'olo unyani?’ Nae kushidoni, ‘Nangu Yesu munashaleti, jo waumpapata wako jo.’
Napanelo avalá vanu vángwadanengenavo mushimwanda, lilangadyo lyo vandyóna kanji lidi lyamunu áshitangola namu nangu vanavo havaigwíte.
Nadoni nangu ndímudya, ‘ Umu, napanelo ngutende nyamani?’ Umu kushidoni, ‘Takatuka winjile nkaja mu Damashiko mo! Mo nkaja mo vandakumanyiya uti vikuvaikidíle utende.’
Napanelo kwodamwaa mevo angu andíbidikanga mwaa wakushenga kwalilangadyo, avalá vanguvénavo vaníngukamula nkono kuka nanguwisha nkaja mu Damashiko.
“Napanelo mo nkaja mo andípagwa munu jumo walina Ananiya, munu wakunjopa Nnungu na wakwigwilila lilamulo lyetu, wavashimuumidya ushuda wambone vayuda uti váshinanama nkaja mu Damashiko,
nae andída nangulola kutwala kungwimila pepi aashidoni, ‘Nung'unumunu Saulu, ujila kulola!’ Muwakati wowo nangu kulola na kumwanenneu.
Nae kavili kushidoni, ‘Nnungu wavanakuluvetu andikutandola pakulota umanye malotelo ake, andikutadya umwone aijá Waishaliya na umwigwe atangola jo mwene.
Nadoni wako undava unshuda wake pakulota uvavalangangile vanu uti vyaugwene na vyawigwite.
Napanelo ulinda nyamani kavili? Takatuka upate ubatisho, madambi ako alivalivigwe utambulanga lina lyake.’
“Napanelo nangu panguujidile ku Yelusalemu, nikauke kwing'ande ya Nnungu kukushwali, Nnungu aníngupa indoti.
Mwindoti yoyo nangu kumwona Umu angwaulila doni, ‘Uma shipajelo pa Yelusalemu apa mwaa venentete ava ushuda waulota kumya wako unguvalanganga nangu, havaitikila.’

Kanji nangu kushidoni, ‘ Umu vanavo vandimanya shana kenga nangu nishindapita ngutanela vitala vyakulipudidya, nivaunganga na nivashapa viboko vanu váshikukulupila wako, nivaukanavo ndavajela mudikalaboshi.
Namomo pavashimuumadyanga myadi Shiteva nshuda wako wako, nangu ndípagwa popo na ndyúngila nkono shitendo asho na ata makoti avalyulénge vanu váshikukula apo vammyaa, ngukamulidile nangu nimwene.’
Kanji Umu kushidoni, ‘Wako uma mwaa nangu ngulota kukutumidya kushu namene kwavamidi.’ ”
Mpaka apo vanu vashindamwigwilila, napane po patangwele lilove lyamwisho, vandíjunga vaashidoni, “Munu aju mwovye mushilambo amu! Haimmaikidile kunama.”
Vanavo vajunga na vashimwa vang'aniang'anianga makoti kushanya na vamwadilila dimbwe kushanya,
nang'olo nkumene wavaing'ondo andívalamulila vanu vake vanjele Paulu mulingongo lyavaing'ondo na vamuudyangidye kwaindila yakunshapa pakulota avalangange shitadíye imbumba injungile.

Napanelo Paulu pavashimunga dimbuu dyamagwogwe, andímudya nang'olo wavaing'ondo miya apagwíte mulyutu alyo kushidoni, “Da mwenu munkuvanavo lusha lwakunshapa mwenentete muloma viboko vakanava kulalyanga shana mwaa wake?”
Nang'olo wavaing'ondo paigwite malove ala, andyúka ndamudya nang'olo wake kushidoni, “Nang'olo, ulota kutenda nyamani? Munu jojo aju ni mwenentete muloma.”
Kutwala nang'olo nkumene wavaing'ondo aijá kumuukila ndamudya, “Kushidashi, wako ni umwentete muloma?” Paulu doni, “Elo!”

Nang'olo nkumene wavaing'ondo kushidoni, “Nangu pakulota ngupate wenentete washiloma uningutumbuka njuluku woe namene.” Kanji Paulu anínjang'ula aashidoni, “Bai nangu apa ninkuvanavo wenentete awo kwashivalekwelo shangu.”
Bai muwakati wowo avalá váshilota kumuudyangidya vandínyamanga na ata nang'olo nkumene wavaing'ondo aijá andíjopa mwaa Paulu vanímunga kwalilamulo lyake nae.

Napanelo palyamba lyake, nang'olo nkumene wavaing'ondo aijá alota amanye uwakika waing'ano yavashintambulanga Paulu vayuda, andílamulila vamuungule Paulu na upagwe nguguvale wavanang'olo vavakulangalalela-shadaka pamo na vanang'olo vanguguvale uti kutwala nae kuntwala Paulu kumwimidya shing'ati nguguvale.
Napanelo Paulu andívalola ndoo vanu uti vapagwíte panguguvale po kutwala kushidoni, “Mmanung'unumunu, mpaka nelo nangu ninkunama pamevo pake Nnungu mumakumbukililo ambone amuntima.”
Kanji Ananiya nkúlangalalela-shadaka nkumene andívalamulila vanu ve vammandíke Paulu vambwabwade pakanywa.

Paulu kutwala kumwaulila, “Bai nawako Nnungu andakubwabwada umunu wamalambi davo gwe! Wako apo wikelé pakulota unguukumu kwodana na mwalitangalela Lilamulo, napane mwaa shani unkupujungula Lilamulo ulamulila vangukome?”
Vanu vammandíke Paulu kushidoni, “Wako ulyalaveka kuntukananga nkúlangalalela nkumene wake Nnungu?”
Paulu doni, “Ji, mmanung'unumunu, hanishimanya kenga aju ni nkúlangalalela-shadaka nkumene! Na mwiu, lilove lya Nnungu litédoni, ‘Haunantukanange nkútawala wavenentete vako.’ ”

Napanelo Paulu kwodamwaa andímanya kenga panguguvale awo vanji vavele mapalishayo, vanji kuva mashadukayo, andítangola pashanya po aashidoni, “Mmanung'unumunu, nangu ni mpalishayo mwana wamapalishayo. Apa ninkuukumigwa kwamwaa walilindilililo lyakudyuka kwavakupela.”
Patangwele davo, mapalishayo na mashadukayo kundíbuka kupwatana kwakudimba kumevo kutwala pashinu apo imbumba kujavanikana vipinga vivili
mwaa mashadukayo kudyuka kwavakupela, kupagwa kwavanjelo vake Nnungu na kupagwa kwaimumu, havanakulupila shinu kanji mapalishayo uti avyo vankukulupila.

Bai ing'ano ai indítadya vanavo kupwatana kumamodya. Napanelo vamwalimu vanji vadishaliya, vashipinga shamapalishayo vandítakatuka kutwala kutunduvanga kutaukanga vaashidoni, “Wetu munu aju hatunamwona likosha. Da inkuululika imumu kwali njelo kutangola namu nae?”

Bai pashinu apo kupwatana kundyúka mushu kumamodya mpaka nang'olo nkumene wavaing'ondo kujopa mwaa wakwona kenga Paulu vananshapwalananga; nadoni andívalamulila vaing'ondo vake vavapoke Paulu vakanjele kavili mulingongo lyavaing'ondo.
Napanelo muliduva lyolyo shilo shake, Umu andímwimila Paulu pepi kutwala kumwaulila doni, “Lyunge ntima! Mwaa mo mwaumididye ushuda unguvalanganga nangu pa Yelusalemu apa, ku Loma undatandela momo.”
Napanelo wiko paulangele, vayuda vanji vandíkadyanianga kulya shemba kutwala kulilapa vatangola kenga havalya na havakumbila shinu shoeshoe vakanava kummalidya Paulu.
Vayuda valíle shemba asho vandíwikila shikonda shavanu vakupunda kenga alubaini doni.

Bai vanavo vandívaukila vanang'olo vavakulangalalela-shadaka pamo na vanang'olo ndavaulila doni, “Wetu apa tundililapa tukanatandedya itukodye ilana tutangola kenga hatulya patukanava kummalidya Paulu.

Nadoni mwenu apa kenga mmananangalaledi vanguguvale, tumidya ntenga kwanang'olo nkumene wavaing'ondo pakulota antumidye kwenu mulitenda kenga mulota kulalyanga shana myaa vyake. Wetu tuvelé tayali kummalidya ata akanava kuwika kwenu.”
Kanji ndukulugwe Paulu mwana wannumbugwe akaigwe nnugu awo, andyúka kulingongo lyavaing'ondo nammalangangila njombawake vinu avyo uti.
Paulu kutwala kunshema nang'olo jumo wavaing'ondo miya kumwaulila doni, “Ntwale nnemba aju umuukenavo kwanang'olo nkumene wavaing'ondo mwaa ankuvanavo ntenga wakummanyiya.”

Nang'olo wavaing'ondo aijá kuntwala ndyoko jo kumuukanavo kwanang'olo wake ndamwaulila doni, “Paleshi Paulu aníngushema kutwala kungujugwa nimpalakedye ndyoko kwako wako mwaa ankuvanavo ntenga wakukumanyiya.”
Nang'olo nkumene wavaing'ondo aijá anínkamula nkono ndyoko jo kutwala kumuukanavo kwagweka ndamuudyangidya, “Wako widilé na ntenga shani kwangu?”
Ndyoko kushidoni, “Vayuda vandilya shemba vakujugwe wako lunduno untwale Paulu umuukenavo kunguguvale valitenda kenga valota vaudyangidye shana myaa vyake.

Kanji wako haunalote kushambegwa na vanavo mwaa vapali vanu vakupunda shikonda shavanu kenga alubaini doni, valóta kuvandama vannindile Paulu vammalidye. Vovo vo vandililapa mwiu mwiu kenga havalya na havakumbila shinu shoeshoe pavakanava kummalidya Paulu. Muwakati au vanavo vandilipanganianga uti valindila lilamulo lyako bai.”
Bai nang'olo nkumene wavaing'ondo aijá anínnaila ndyoko auke amwaulila doni, “Haunammalangangile munu junji kenga uninguvalangangila nangu ntenga kenga au.”

Napavedoni nang'olo nkumene wavaing'ondo aijá andívashema vadyoko vake vavili pakati pavadyoko vake kuvamanyiya doni, “Vapanganiange vaing'ondo dimiya mbili, vaing'ondo vavapunda sabini na vaing'ondo vanji dimiya mbili vamikushi vauke ku Shashaleya satatu yashilo.
Vapanganiange momo vapalashi vakumpakila Paulu vakamwishe shana kwananangalaledi wamajimbo Pilishi.”
Nadoni nang'olo nkumene wavaing'ondo andyándika ibalugwa kenga mwaivalalele ai:
“Kalaudiu Lishiyashi kumwe wakwishimika nanangalaledi wamajimbo Pilishi, nandele.
Ninkukumanyiya doni, vayuda vanínkamula munu aju na vashilota kummyaa. Kanji nangu vakangumanyiye kenga munu jojo muloma, nindyúka koko na vaing'ondo vangu namposha.
Nikantwale kumuukanavo kulibengi lyavayuda ngulota ngwigwe myaa vyake vyavashintambulanga,
nindyona kenga vashintambulanga vinu vyodana na lilamulo lyave kanji hangugwene likosha lyakuntadya nae apele kwali aungwe.

Napanelo pavaukile nangumanyiya kenga vayuda vandipanga milugu vyakulota kummalidya, ndyamuwa kukupalakadyedya wako munu aju na avalá vavénavo mwaa namu nae ndivaulila vaide vaangangalange namu wako ako.”
Napanelo vaing'ondo kwodana na lilamulo lyavapatile kwananangalaledi wave, vaníntwala Paulu shilo-shilo mpaka palikaja lya Antipatilishi.
Palyamba lyake vaing'ondo váshiwena na madodo vandyújila kulingongo lyave kutwala kuvaleka vaing'ondo vavapunda vamuukanavo Paulu kulikaja lya Shashaleya.
Pavawikile nkaja amo vandítwala ibalugwa ailá kumwing'a nanangalaledi wamajimbo na kuntwala Paulu kunkamudya.
Bai nanangalaledi wamajimbo akashomye ibalugwa ailá andímudya Paulu lijimbo lyavalakwadidye. Napanelo akamanye kenga Paulu avele wa ku Kilikiya,
andímwaulila kushidoni, “Myaa vyako ndaudyangidya pavalota kwida vanu vakukashalídye vo.” Bai nae andílamulila vantwale Paulu akapagwe mmakono mwaishilikali kwing'ande ye ivéle imwe Elode.

Napanelo ling'oto lyamaduva mwanu nkúlangalalela-shadaka nkumene Ananiya andyúka ku Shashaleya na vanang'olo vanji pamo na nkúshililidya jumo walina Teletulu. Vakawike, vandímuukila nanangalaledi wamajimbo nankashalya Paulu.

Pavanshamile, Teletulu andítunduvanga kunkashalya aashidoni, “Wako wakwishimika Pilishi, kulangalalela kwako kunkutupa amani na mabadiliko autenda kwalimanyilo lyako ankwidanavo maikadi ambone kwavenentete ava.
Kwauti vinu vitandéka, kula pashinu tunkukulambwalela na mitima vyetu uti.
Napavedoni pakulota hatunakujaangile wakati wako, kwaupole wako ninkukujugwangila utwigwilile muwakati padyoko shatulota kutangola.
Tundyanalela kenga munu aju ni nantindingania wakujowa namene áidanavo shititimbu na kupwatananga pakati pavayuda mushilambo uti. Jojo aju ni nanangalaledi nkumene waishama yavanashaleti.
Hainatoshe jojo aju ashilota kunyatyanga ing'ande yetu ya Nnungu.
Napanelo wako umwene ukannalyanga munu aju undamwigwa shana shantunkashalidya wetu.”
Bai vayuda vanji vandyúngila nkono malove alo vatangola kenga vyatangwele munu ajo vivele uti vinu viu.

Napanelo nanangalaledi wamajimbo anínnola Paulu pakulota ajang'ule kutwala Paulu kushidoni, “Nangu ndimanya kenga wako ni unang'olo wavakutandwele tangu kala ùve unkúukumu pakati pavenentete ava. Napavedoni ninkuvanavo ntima ngùpagwite pamevo pako apa ngulishililidye panikajugulanga shinu.
Unkuulula kumanya do, tangu nguke ku Yelusalemu ndalipudya ninkuvanavo maduva kumi na mbili bai.
Ava havangukadidye ngutaukananga na munu woewoe mwing'ande ya Nnungu, ata havangukadidye ndivakang'ela venentete muvitala vyakulipudidya ata palyutu lyoelyoe lyankaja amo
na ata wakuulula kwakikisha pamevo pako avilá vyavangukashalya.
Kanji nangu shangulivalanganga kwako ni ashi: ni kwodananavo Indila yavashema vanavo ishama ilangadavo yangulipudya kwa Nnungu wavanakuluvetu ngukulupila uti vya mu Lilamulo na vya mu Vakulava
nguvanavo lilindilililo kwa Nnungu, lyo lyavavenavo vanavo lyakupagwa kudyuka kwavaishaliya na vaungave-ishaliya.
Ni ashi shingutádya nangu ngwengwe ngukukule pakulota nguvenavo makumbukililo ambone amuntima pamevo pa Nnungu na pavanu.
“Ling'oto lyakupita vyaka vyoe ngùvele muvilambo vinji, ni panguujite kwida pa Yelusalemu ngwidanavo lipwashalelo kwavakave pashinu muvenentetemwangu namomo ngutenda shadaka.
Panishitenda vinu avyo, vayuda va ku Ashiya kutwala kungukodya mwing'ande ya Nnungu kanji ngùlyushanienge kala ushapu; pashinu apo haipagwíte imbumba yavanu na haupagwíte upuju.
Ni vayuda avo vavaikidíle vaide apa vangukashalye nangu kwako wako ikava kenga vaningwona likosha.
Kwali vovo ava vavéle apa, vavalangange wakunyata shani wavangugwene panguguvale
tukaleka ali lyangutangwele nangu pashanya po ngwìmidile mushu mwave nguushidoni, ‘Ni kwamwaa wakukulupila kenga kupali kudyuka kwavakupela kungutadya nelo nguukumigwe namu wako.’ ”
Bai Pilishi, munu e avénavo limanyilo lyoe lyavinu vyámba Indila, andíimidya mwaa awo aashidoni, “Ing'ano ai ndalalyanga palota kwida Lishiyashi nang'olo nkumene wavaing'ondo.”
Kutwala apo, Pilishi anínnamulila nang'olo wavaing'ondo anjele Paulu nkalaboshi kanji amupe litala na apate lipwashalelo kwavavagwe.

Napanelo akapite maduva padyoko, nanangalaledi wamajimbo Pilishi andíwika pamo na ndyagwe walina Dulushila, nkongwe muyuda; bai vanavo vandítuma vavashamele Paulu na vandígwa vyashitangola Paulu avalanganga ing'ano yakunkulupila Yesu Klistu.

Kanji Paulu avalanganga ing'ano yaishaliya, yakulishunga, yaukumu ulóta kutandeka, Pilishi andíjopa namene na andímwaulila Paulu aashidoni, “Ambi unkuulula kuka! Mushu mo pangulota kuva na litala ndakushema,”
akuno alindila momo kenga njuluku undapatikananga kumwe Paulu, nadoni nae ngwengwe ashindatenda anshemashema aombanavo mwaa.
Napanelo ling'oto lyavyaka vivili Pilishi andyúma kutwala lyutu lyake kudiva Polikiu Pestu. Kanji Pilishi alota alodye litananilo kwavayuda, anínneka Paulu mukungwa.
Napanelo Pestu àwikile mulijimbo, akapite maduva matatu andyúma pa Shashaleya kuka ku Yelusalemu
kutwala vanang'olo vavakulangalalela-shadaka pamo na vanang'olo vavayuda kumuukila nankashali Paulu na kunjugwangila
valipambedya kumili kwake pakulota nae amuujidye ku Yelusalemu kanji vàvenavo milugu vyakummandamila shing'ati indila vammalidye.
Kanji Pestu kushidoni, “Paulu andauka mushu apagwa mukungwa ku Shashaleya na mumaduva akuvandika nangu ndauka koko.
Napanelo vananangalaledi venu vankuulula kuka namu nangu vakankashalye ikava kenga nae shipali shakoidye.”
Bai Pestu akaikalange namu vanavo maduva akuwika kenga nane kwali kumi doni, andyújila ku Shashaleya. Akawike, palyamba lyake andyúka ndaikala palibengi kutwala kutuma vakantwale Paulu.
Paulu pawikile, vayuda vakwalakela ku Yelusalemu vaníntang'anedya kutwala kunkashalya vantambudyanga vinu vyakunyata vyoe kanji vinu vyene uti kuva vyamadumba.
Kutwala Paulu kulishililidya aashidoni, “Nangu hashipali shangutagile; ata kwalilamulo lyavayuda, ata kwaing'ande ya Nnungu na ata hanintagadile Shashali.”
Kanji Pestu alota alodye litananilo kwavayuda, andímudya Paulu kushidoni, “Da ing'ano yako ai wako unkulota uukenavo ku Yelusalemu pakulota nangu nguke ndikakuukumile kwanavo?”
Paulu kushidoni, “Nangu panguvele apa nguvelé palibengi liitíka malamulo amwe Shashali, lyutu livaikidíle kunguukumila; wako undimanya shana kenga vayuda ava nangu hashipali shandivaanadile.

Ikava kenga shipali shakunyata shangutandile na shikapagwa shoeshoe shivaikidíle ngupele, nangu nguvelé tayali kupela. Kanji shikanapagwa, hanapagwe ata munu jumo wakulota kungukamudya kumakono kwavanu ava. Ngulota nguke kumwe Shashali.”
Bai Pestu ling'oto lyakutangonavo vanang'olo vapagwíte palibengi anínjang'ula Paulu aashidoni, “Kwoda ulota uke kumwe Shashali, bai ko kumwe Shashali ko, undauka.”
Napanelo akapite maduva padyoko, umu Agilipa namu Belenishe vandyúka ku Shashaleya ndamuudyanga nanangalaledi wave Pestu.
Bai kwodamwaa nkaja amo vandíikala maduva oe, Pestu anímmalangangila umu Agilipa ing'ano yake Paulu aashidoni, “Apali munu jumo apa wannakile Pilishi àungwidye.
Nangu nikauke ku Yelusalemu, vanang'olo vavakulangalalela-shadaka pamo na vanang'olo vavayuda vandída nangujugwa ngumye ukumu yamunu ajo.
“Nangu kuvajang'ula kenga mudishaliya dyashiloma halipali lilamulo lyakunkamudya munu vene vankashalídye munu ajo vakapali mulyutu lyolyo pakulota apate litala lyakujang'ula vyavantambula.
Napanelo vanavo vakawike namu nangu nkaja amu ing'ano ai hangutimyatimyenge mwaa palyamba lyake ndíshamenneu nguguvale kulibengi kutwala nangu kutuma vamwidenavo munu ajo.
Napanelo vakukashalya vakamalile kummalanganga, nangu hangugwene likosha ata limo likumene lyavammalangenge pakati pa alalá angushilindila nangu vammalangange.
Ila ing'ano yave ing'umene íshivavilinganianga ivele yaidini yave na ing'ano yamunu jumo ápadile wavanshema Yesu kanji Paulu jojo jo, ankummalanganga kenga mumi.
“Napanelo nangu ngushanga mwakumanyila shana myaa vyene, ndimudya ikava kenga ankulota auke ku Yelusalemu vakalalyange ing'ano yake yavashintambudyanga.
Kanji Paulu andíkanyilila ing'ano yake yuke kumwe Shashali akalalyange. Nadoni nangu ndílamulila aikale nkalaboshi alindila mpaka uwike wakati wakuntumidya kumwe Shashali.”
Bai Agilipa andímwaulila Pestu kushidoni, “Nanangu munu ajo ninkulota nimwigwe nimwene.” Pestu doni, “Undamwigwa lunduno.”

Palyamba lyake Agilipa namu Belenishe vandíwika mulyutu na shimbili shoe namene kutwala kwinjila mushumba shamikodyanio vàvele pamo na vananangalaledi vakumene vavaing'ondo na vanang'olo vankaja amo. Bai kwalilamulo limwe Pestu vaníntwala Paulu

kutwala nae kushidoni, “Umu Agilipa pamo na mwenu uti múpagwite namu wetu mulyutu ali, nnole munu aju! Munu aju, shipinga shavayuda uti vaningujugwa vajunganila ata ku Yelusalemu ata nkaja amu kenga munu aju, haimmaikidile aname.
Kanji nangu apa haningwene likosha lyatandile lyakuntadya apele. Nakavili kwodamwaa nae andijugwa ing'ano yake yuke ikawike kumwe umu nang'olo, nangu ndyamuwa kumpalakedya koko.

Kwaupande wangu nangu hanguvenavo shinu shakumanyika shalowa shakulota kumwandikila umu nang'olo wangu nimmalanganga munu aju; ni ashi shingutadídye nimwidenavo mushu mwavanu uti na mushu mwako wako Umu Agilipa pakulota ling'oto lyakunnalyanga nakapanji ndapata shoeshoe shakulota kwandika.
Mwaa shinkwaneka kuva shinu shakupuwanikanga kuntumidya nkungwa kwabila lyamba limmalangánga makosha ake.”
Napanelo Agilipa andímwaulila Paulu kushidoni, “Tendi ako livalangange!” Paulu kung'aniang'anianga makono kutwala kutunduvanga kulishililidya aashidoni,
“Umu Agilipa, ninkulyona kujaligwa mwaa wakupata litala lyakupagwa mushu mwako nelo pakulota ngulishililidye kwavinu uti vyavangutambulanga vayuda
kupunda namene mwaa wako undimanya kupindukila yadi yavayuda ava na migagolo vyave. Nadoni ninkukujugwa ungwigwilile shana na kulipililila.
“Vayuda uti vandimanya mwangunamidile nangu kutunduvangila shidyoko shangu shangupitile tangu kunantandi pakati pavenentetemwangu na pa Yelusalemu.
Vanavo nangu vaningumanya tangu kala na ata leka vàlotile, vakandyumya ushuda doni kwakwodananavo shipinga shishínya namene mwidini yetu nangu ndinama kenga mpalishayo.
Napanelo nangu ninkupagwa mulyutu ali nguukumigwa kwamwaa walilindilililo lyangu mukulivikila kwake Nnungu kwavanakuluvetu,
kulivikila aku makola kumi na mbili avakwetu vankuvanavo lilindilililo lyakupata pavalipudya shilo na mui bila kudabadabanga. Umu wako, ni kwamwaa walilindilililo ali lyavangukashalidya!
Mwaa shani mwenu munkwona kenga Nnungu kuvadyuwa vakupela ni shinu shíkaululika kukulupila?
Ata nangu momo nishindakumbukila kutumila dindila dyoedyoe divaikidíle pakulota ngutimbange ntenga umwe Yesu, munu wa ku Nashaleti.

Vinu avi nditenda nangu nimwene ku Yelusalemu. Ndivajela mudikalaboshi vakwilimyanga voe kwamadalaka avanang'olo vavakulangalalela-shadaka na vanji pavashumya lilamulo lyakuvatanola, nangu ngushindaungila nkono.

Dimindi dyoe nangu ndipita muvitala vyakulipudidya ndivapa shaushanga ndivakanyilidya pakulota vakupulu na mushitundi shangushivavikila, vaningutadya nguke ndikainjile muvilambo vinji vyavamidi ngupita ndivapapata.
“Ni ing'ano yoyo ingutadídye nangu ngutende mwanda wakuka ku Damashiko kwamadalaka na lilamulo lyavanang'olo vavakulangalalela-shadaka.

Napanelo nguka, muwakati waliduva pamuti, Umu Agilipa, nangu liníngutang'anedya lilangadyo lyakwaloka kuwa, lyakushenga kupunda liduva kutwala kungutang'anedya pamo na vavangu vanguvénavo mushimwanda.
Wetu pashinu apalá kugwangila pai kutwala nangu kwigwa lidi líshitangola mushibalaniya liishidoni, ‘Saulu, Saulu, mwaa shani unkungupapata? Shinkukamadyanga kwako kuvangedya ashilá shikukanyóla.’
Nangu kutwala kudya, ‘Da wako po nang'olo unyani?’ Umu kushidoni, ‘Nangu apa Yesu, jo waumpapata wako jo.
Kanji takatuka wimile. Nangu ndikuumililila pakulota uve untumika wangu na uve unshuda wavinu vyaugwene nelo kwalakela kwangu na vyangulota kukulodya
ndikuposha kumakono kwavakwenu na kwavamidi kwangulota kukutumidya

kwambangidya dashi, uvaungule mevo vashiliuke kushii vauke kulilangadyo, vaume mumadalaka amwe Shatwani vauke kumwe Nnungu pakulota vapate kulivalivigwa kwamadambi na vapate lyutu mushipinga sha avalá vailimyangígwa kwaindila yakungukulupila nangu.’
“Napavedoni Umu Agilipa, indoti yangupatile kwalakela kuwa, nditandedya mwaishilotéla.

Ndivavalangangila shitandi va ku Damashiko, kwatika ku Yelusalemu, disemu uti dya ku Yudeya namomo kwavamidi pakulota valijugulange madambi ave na vanshinjiulile Nnungu valodya vitendo kwodananavo kulijugulanga kwave.
Ni ing'ano ai yavangukamulidile vayuda mwing'ande ya Nnungu na kulota vangubyae.

Kanji kwalipwashalelo lya Nnungu ngupali mpaka nelo apa; ni ashi shingutádya ngupagwe apa ngumya ushuda kwavadyoko mpaka kwavanang'olo. Shanguvalanganga hashinapundana shinu na ashilá shavatangwele vakulava na shatangwele Musha kenga shindatandeka,
doni, Klistu inimmaikila auvauvange na àvele ntandi mukudyuka kwavakupela, andavalanganga lilangadyo kwavenentete vetu namomo kwavamidi.”
Bai Paulu pashitangola avi alishililidya, Pestu andítangola pashanya po aashidoni, “Wako Paulu unkudulumbuka! Mashomo ako oe lo, ankukudulumbuwa.”
Kanji Paulu kushidoni, “Nang'olo Pestu, nangu hangunadulumbuka shinu; ninkutangola na ding'ano dyangu na ninkutangola vinu viu.

Apa apali umu Agilipa ámanyite shana vinu vyene uti; ni ashi shingutádya nangu ngutangole na kulitamanga pamevo pake mwaa ninkuvanavo wakika kenga pakati pavinu avi uti hashipali ata shimo shimpundíle na hashipali ata shimo shitandéke shipiipii.
Umu Agilipa, da wako unkuvakulupila vakulava? Nangu ndimanya kenga unkuvakulupila.”
Agilipa kutwala kushidoni, “Da wako muwakati wo padyoko au ulota ungushombe nguve ninklistu!”
Paulu kushidoni, “Elo, nangu ninkunjugwa Nnungu pakulota patime hapanatime wako apa pamo na vanu uti vangwigwilíla ava vave kenga mo mwanguvalalele nangu kanji bila mang'unyang'unya.”
Bai andítakatuka umu, gavana namu Belenishe pamo na shipinga shave uti.
Pavashuma panguguvale, vashindapita vaulanila vaashidoni, “Munu aju hashipali shakunyata shatandile shakuntadya apele kwali aungwe.”
Agilipa kutwala kumwaulila Pestu doni, “Munu aju leka akajugwile auke kumwe Shashali, indívaikila kumuungula.”

Napanelo pavaukile ndaamuwa wetu twinjile mwingalava tuke ku Italiya, vanavo vaníntwala Paulu pamo na vakungwa vanji kunkamudya kumakono kwanang'olo wavaing'ondo miya walina Shulyu wamushipinga shavaitaliyani shimwe umu nang'olo.
Bai wetu tundíkwela mwingalava ya pa Adalamitiu ivéle tayali yuke kuviko vya ku Ashiya. Mushimwanda shosho tundípagwanavo Alishitaliku munu wa ku Teshalonika ya ku Makedoniya.
Palyamba lyake tuvanu kuwika panshiko wa ku Shidoni. Napanelo Shulyu pakuva ashinantanana Paulu, andímupa litala lyakuka ndavalola vabwadivake va pa Shidoni na vanshunge.
Tukaume pa Shidoni, tundíkwela mwingalava tulodya pepi na pa Kupulu mwaa imepo ishaaloka mushu mwetu.
Tundyúka mushu na shimwanda shetu tuwena mwimanga nkono wa ku Kilikiya na ku Pampiliya mpaka ndaimila panshiko wa Mila ya ku Likiya.
Panshiko awo nang'olo wavaing'ondo miya watuvénavo aijá mushimwanda shetu, andíkodya ingalava ya pa Alishandaliya íshuka ku Italiya, nae wetu kutwinjidya momo.

Shimwanda shetu shindíva shakukakavanga; nadoni tundítwala maduva oe tuvauvanga mpaka kuka ndawika pepi na pa Kinidu. Kanji kwodamwaa imepo haitulakile tuka shalowa, tundyúka nkono wakwina shitingi sha Kaleta tupita pepi na pa Shalamone.
Tundyúka shinyenjenyenje kanji na mauvilo makumene mpaka ndawika mulyutu lyavashema Mishiko Vyambone livéle pepi na njini wa Lasheya.
Napanelo ukatupitile wakati wetu na ata liduva lya Kulivalivigwa Madambi momo likapite, shindípagwa shijoidyo shikumene kuwena mwingalava; nadoni Paulu andívaduma

aashidoni, “Mmanang'olo, ninkwona kutunduvangila ambi apa shimwanda shetu shindava shashijoidyo na shaasala ing'umene namene nkati muvyombo vyatunyukete na ingalava. Hainatoshe ata wewe tuvene inkuululika kukatoka shingumi.”
Kanji nang'olo wavaing'ondo miya andíshambegwa na nkútukusha-ingalava pamo na mwene ingalava kuleka shatangwele Paulu.

Kanji kwodamwaa nshiko awo hauvéle shana pakulota vanu vaikale muwakati wakudidima imepo, bai vanu voe vandyóna kudyanga vaume panshiko awo valingangile kuka ndawika panshiko wa Poiniki uvéle mo mushitingi sha Kaleta pakulota tupagwe mulyutu alyo muwakati uti waimepo. Likaja alyo liladilé mevo nkono wakwina shilambo na nkono wakwalyuka liduva.

Bai indítunduvanga kupunga imepo íkavele yadimongo yakwalakela kwina shilambo kutwala vanavo kwona kenga mwavashikumbukilila vene amulá mundatandakela momo. Nadoni vanavo vandyúmya inanga mmedi mo kutwala kutunduvanga kutukusha ingalava nanyenje imanga ya ku Kaleta.
Kanji muwakati padyoko pashitingi po shindíwika shimbunga shakwalakela kunshanda kwake nkono wakwalakela liduva
kupita ikunga ingalava. Bai imepo indyútanga ingalava na haishululika kushinjiula; nadoni wetu tundítatakela na tundíleka ingalava yode yo imepo yo bai.
Napanelo shitingi shimo shavashema Kauda shindítushililidya padyoko kwaing'ano yaimepo kutwala patupitile kwina kwake pamo na vyakunanopa vyoe tundyúlula kuposha ingalava idikidiki.

Bai vakutukusha-ingalava vandípakila ingalava idikidiki yo na vandítava ingalava ing'umene na mididi vyakunanapedya. Napanelo kwodamwaa vashindajopa ingalava kuka ndambwatamila mudindunda dyadimbwe dyamwisemu yaimanga ya Shilite, vanavo vandíshuluwa ditanga kuleka ingalava yuka yene na imepo.
Napanelo shimbunga shishindauka mushu na palyamba lyake vandyúmadyanga vyombo vyavapakidíle mwingalava kujalangila mmedi.
Muliduva lyantatu vo vene vakutukusha-ingalava vandíjalangila mmedi vyombo vinji vyashimadengo vyamwingalava.
Maduva oe kupita patukona liduva na ata dinondo, imepo yadimongo yuka mushu ipunga namene mpaka lilindilililo uti lyakulota tuvanu kwambolegwa, kutujaika.

Napanelo kwodamwaa vandíikalanga maduva oe pavakalya shinu, Paulu andítakatuka pakati pave kutwala kushidoni, “Mwenu! Leka mùngwigwilidile nangu paninnaidye kuma ku Kaleta akulá, mauvilo ala na asala ai uti hamunapate.
Kanji napanelo ninkumwaulila doni, lyunge mitima mwaa hapali ata munu jumo álota kupela pakati penu ila ingalava ni ilóta kwalibika
mwaa shilo sho shanelo ashi aninguumililila njelo wake Nnungu, Nnungu jojo ángutandile nguve wake na wangulipudya nangu kwake
kutwala kungwaulila doni, ‘Paulu, haunajope! Wako indikuvaikila uke ukawike kumwe Shashali na lola, Nnungu andikukamudya vanu uti vapagwíte namu wako mwingalava.’
Napavedoni mwenu lyunge ntima mwaa ninkukulupila kenga Nnungu andatandedya avilá vyangwaulidile.
Napane kwamwaa waimepo ingalava indauka ndambwatamila pashitingi.”
Napanelo shilo shing'ati shaliduva lyakumi na nsheshe mawimbi atugang'ola mu Imanga ya Meditelaniu, vakutusha-ingalava vandílyona kenga vankuvandikila kumwangu.

Nadoni vanavo vandíjela mmedi shipimo shandidi wavaungangidíle shinu shakwidopa kutwala kwona shitamba shamakono ishilini kwakukadaleka kwake. Vakauke mushu vandípima kavili kutwala kwona kuva shitamba shamakono kumi na tano kwakukadaleka kwake.
Napane vajopa ingalava kuka ndalitumbula mumajanga, vandíjalangila dinanga nsheshe mmedi kunyuma ingalava vashwali wiku ulangale ambi.
Bai vakutukusha-ingalava valambela mwakutipukila vandítwala ingalava idikidiki kushuluwidya mmedi valivika kenga valota kuka ndaungangilanga dinanga mushu ingalava
kutwala Paulu kumwaulila nang'olo wavaing'ondo miya pamo na vaing'ondo vake kushidoni, “Vakutukusha-ingalava avalá vakaumananga mwingalava ing'umene amu, mwenu uti hapagwa wakushumba.”
Nadoni vaing'ondo vandílumulanga mididi víshilandendya ingalava idikidiki kutwala kuleka igwilila mmedi.
Kumatingatinga Paulu andívalaililila vanu uti valyange vyakulya atangola kushidoni, “Kwoda maduva kumi na nsheshe andipita mulijugulanga na pamukapamba yolo,
nangu ninkunjugwangila mulye shinu shoeshoe kwambangidya muve na dimongo mwaa apa hapali ata munu jumo álota kupata likwanda.”
Ling'oto lyakutangola malove ala, andítwala ligung'u kunnambwalela Nnungu kumeja kutwala kulya.
Bai vanavo uti vandílyunga mitima na vandítunduvanga kulyanga.
Mwingalava amo tundípagwa tuvanu dimiya mbili sabini na sita.
Ling'oto lyavanu uti kulyanga, vaníntwalanga ngano uti kunjalangila mmedi vapungula kwidopa kwaingalava.

Wiku ukashwe, vakutukusha-ingalava havamanyíte shilambo asho kanji vandyóna kushinu kushaaneka dimbwe nanyenje imanga kutwala vanavo mmitima vyave kulota ingalava yuke ikaimile popo ikava kenga ikandyululika.

Nadoni vandílumulanga mididi vyadinanga kuleka dinanga mmedi akuno vaungulanga ding'wau dyakunyuma dyakulangalalela ingalava pakulota dilangalalele ingalava. Nakavili vandíkwedya itanga idikidiki yakulilomo pakulota ingalava yuke ikashiye kunshanga.

Kanji ingalava indímbwatamila mwindunda yadimbwe yamwimanga kuleka ìkele popo paikating'ina ata padyoko. Kulilomo kundíinjila mudimbwe kutwala kunyuma kwake kutunduvanga kutumbukanga mwaa wamawimbi áshilikoma na dimongo.
Napanelo vaing'ondo vandípakanila vavabyange mapaleshi uti mwaa wakujopadavo vandaagwalela kuka ndawika kumwangu kutwala kutipukanga.

Kanji nang'olo wavaing'ondo kwodamwaa ashilota amwambole Paulu mushijoidyo asho, andívaleya shitendo asho. Nadoni andívalamulila vanu váshimanya kwagwalela valishushe vainjile mmedi pakulota vaagwele vauke kumwangu
kutwala vanji kuvalamulila vatwale dimbau kwali vipande vyadimbau vyaingalava vivapwashele kwagwela. Nadoni tuvanu uti tundípukangila kumwangu.
Napanelo tuvanu uti tukapukange mushijoidyo asho, patuwikile kumwangu tundímanya kenga shitingi asho vashishema Malita.
Bai vene shitingi asho vandílodya litananilo lyakujowa kwetu wetu. Vakatupwashalela na vakatumbulididya moto mwaa wakutunduvanga kutonya medi na mwaa wakutudidima imepo.
Napanelo Paulu andílakota itu yadinang'ene kutenda akang'ela moto kutwala mo muding'uni mo kuma nyoka walina jaa-ntela atukuta ntukuka kunnamatila Paulu mulyanda lyake.

Napanelo vene ikaja ayo pavagwene inyoka ìnamatidile mulyanda lyake Paulu, vandyáulanila shivenevene vaashidoni, “Munu aju patukamwambambidya ni shimalivanu. Mwaa lola, ata ikava kenga andipuka mmedi kanji jo mwene Ishaliya hanneka anama.”
Kanji Paulu anímpatulidya nyoka jo pamoto na hashipali shintandéke.

Napanelo vanu vapashitingi asho vashikumbukila kenga Paulu unammimba nkono kwali kupela shingangala. Kanji vakaikale wakati woe valindila, pavagwene kenga hashipali shimmilinganianga, vanavo dindívaida ding'ano dinji kutwala kutangola kenga Paulu avele nnungu.
Napanelo pepi na palyutu alyo, andípagwa mautu ake gavana washitingi asho walina Pubiliu. Nang'olo aju wetu andítushema na andítukalibisha paing'ande pake na tundíikanavo shana namene maduva matatu.
Napanelo tatake Pubiliu unímpwateka mili na kudalola myadi. Paulu paukile nannola, ling'oto lyakushwali anímmikila makono kutwala kumponia.
Shikatandeke shitendo asho, valwele uti vapashitingi asho vandímuukila Paulu navanavo vandípona momo.
Vanu avo vandítupa dinudyo dyoe namene na patuukile ndapanganikanga pakulota twinjile mwingalava vandítupa vinu vyoe vyakutupwashela mushimwanda shetu.

Ling'oto lyakwikala wetu pashitingi asho myedi mitatu, tundíinjila mwingalava ye ipagwíte mulyutu alyo muwakati uti wakudidima imepo. Ingalava yoyo ivele ya ku Alishandaliya na mushu mwake indívanavo mashinamu avannungu mamaa.
Tukawike panshiko wa Shilakusha, tundíikala maduva matatu.
Patuumile apo, tundyúka shalowa mpaka pa Legiu. Palyamba lyake kupunga imepo yakwalakela kwina shilambo kutwala muliduva lyake lyambili wetu kuwika panshiko wa Putiyoli.
Pa Putiyoli wetu kuvakodya vanung'unumunu, vovo vo kutujugwangila twikanavo ishumana imo. Kutwala apo, tundyúka ndawika ku Loma.

Napanelo vanung'unumunu váshiikala pa Loma vakapate dyabali dyakuwika kwetu, vandíida ndatushinga pashakoni sha pa Apiyo na pa Ding'ande Nnatu Dyavajeni. Paulu akavone vanung'unumunu avo, anínnambwalela Nnungu na ntima wake undímwikala shana.
Patuwikile nkaja mu Loma, Paulu andípata litala lyakunama paing'ande yagweka kutwala kummikila mwing'ondo jumo wakunnaledya.

Napanelo akapite maduva matatu, Paulu andívashamanga vanang'olo vavayuda kutwala vanavo pavaidanenge nae kuvaulila doni, “Mmanung'unumunu, nangu panikatenda shinu shakukowa kwavenentete vetu na kwashinamilo shavatulakadile vanakuluvetu, vayuda pa Yelusalemu vaningunga kutwala kungukamudya kumakono avaloma.
Valoma pavalalyenge myaa vyangu vashindalota vanguleke mwaa nkati mo havagwene likosha lyoelyoe lyakulota ngupalele.
Kanji vayuda ni kwita doni kutwala nanangu kujugwa mwaa wangu uwike akune kumwe Shashali pakulota alalyange ata ikava kenga nangu hanguvenavo mwaa woewoe wakuvakashalya venentetemwangu.
Ni ashi shitadídye ngujugwangile nimwone na ngwambange mwaa namu mwenu pakuva ni kwamwaa walilindilililo lyavanaishilaeli lyangunyukatila nangu mang'unyang'unya ala.”
Vanavo kutwala kushidoni, “Wetu hatupatile ata lyamba limo lyakwaloka ku Yudeya na pakati pavanung'unumunu vaidíle akuno hapali hatuvalangangidile shitendo shoeshoe shakunyata shako wako.
Nadoni tundilota tukwigwe wako umwene mwawonela. Mwaa tundimanya kenga kula kushinu vanu vankuvangedya ishama yawoda wako.”

Napane vakavike liduva lyakukadyania namu nae, vandímwidila vanu voe palyutu lyashiikala na nae kutunduvangila lyamba mpaka lyulo andívaigwiniya ataa ushuda yautawala wa Nnungu alingangila avashombe kwaing'ano imwe Yesu kutunduvangila mu Lilamulo lyake Musha namomo mu Vakulava.
Vanji napane vandívashambegwa na ashilá shitangaléke kanji vanji havakulupidíle.
Napavedoni vàpagwite mukutaukananga shivenevene, Paulu andívaulila vaumanange atangola lilove limo, “Imumu Wanashwe anditangola viu na vanakuluvenu kwaindila imwe nkúlava Ishaiya
patédoni, “ ‘Wena kwavenentete ava ukavaulile doni, Mundaigwilila matu ngambulii kanji hamumanya shitangaléka, Mundalola ndoo kanji hamumanya shinu shene.

Mwaa mitima vyavenentete ava vindinanopa; kumatu kwave vandidiva, mevo ave vandyunidya kwambangidya havanalole vamanye shinu shene, havanaigwilile vamanye shitangaléka na havanaitikile shitangaléka; leka vakatandile avyo vakandishinjiulila mitima vyave kwangu, kutwala nangu kuvaponia.’ ”
Paulu kavili kushidoni, “Ikala mumanya doni ntenga au wakwambola wake Nnungu undipalakalegwa kwavamidi na vanavo vandaigwilila.”
Bai Paulu andíikala vyaka vivili paing'ande yake yapangíle. Mulyutu lyolyo nae ashindavapwashalela vanu uti váshuka nannola
avalanganga utawala wa Nnungu na apundisha uti vimwámba Umu Yesu Klistu kwantima shii uti na kwabila kundingadinga shinu.
Paulu, ntumwa umwe Klistu Yesu áshamagwidye ave myombe na áapuligwidye kwantenga wambone wake Nnungu,
wo walivikidile tangu kala kwaindila yavakulava vake nkati mumaandiko akwilimyanga
umwámba mwanagwe, jojo jo, kwakwodananavo shimunu ávalakwadidye muudukulu umwe Daudi
na kwakwodananavo Imumu waukwilimyanga ápangigwidye kuva Mwana wa Nnungu nkati mudimongo kwaindila yakudyuka pakati pavakupela, Yesu Klistu Umu wetu.
Kwaindila yake nae tundipata umonyo na umyombe wakutadya pakati pavenentete uti kwigwilila kwalikulupililo kwamwaa walina lyake
na pakati pavanavo, munkupagwa namwenu momo múshamagwidye muve vamwe Yesu Klistu.

Kwenu mwenu uti múpagwa ku Loma, mwemwe mmakunagwaleka vake Nnungu na múshamagwidye muve mmakwilimyanga. Umonyo upagwe kwenu mwenu na amani yakwalakela kumwe Nnungu Tatagwetu na kumwe Umu Yesu Klistu.
Shinantandi ninkunnambwalela Nnungu wangu kwaindila imwe Yesu Klistu kwamwaa wenu mwenu uti mwaa likulupililo lyenu linkuvalangangigwa mushilambo uti.
Nnungu wanintumika na ntima wangu uti muntenga wambone wa Mwanagwe ni nshuda wangu mwashi mwanintambulangila mwenu ngwengwe
mukushwali kwangu ngujugwa doni, kwadindila dyoedyoe kwalilotelo lyake Nnungu ling'oto lyawakati woe ambi napane ndaulula kwida kwenu.
Ninkuvanavo mweshe wakwida nannola kwambangidya dashi nimwing'e shajo shoeshoe shaimumu pakulota shinnonowange.
Doni ni pakulota tupambadyangigwe kwaindila yalikulupililo lyakula munu, lyenu mwenu pamo na lyangu nangu.

Hangunalota shinu mmanung'unumunu mutikinange kenga myanda vyoe vyangupanganikenge ngwide kwenu kanji mpaka ambi apa shipali shingudingadínga. Shabaa yangu nikulota ngupune vyepo pakati penu kenga mwangupunilile pakati pavamidi vanji vo.
Ninkuvanavo udeni kwavamidi na kwavakamanyika, kwavakumanya na kwavajinga.
Nadoni ninkuvanavo dukuduku yakuvalanganga ntenga wambone momo kwenu mwenu múvele ku Loma.
Mwaa hangunona dyoni kwantenga wambone pakuva ni dimongo dyake Nnungu dyakwambola kwaupande wavanu uti vakulupíla; shitandi kwamuyuda ling'oto kwangalegu.
Mwaa mo muntenga mo inkulilodya ishaliya yake Nnungu kutunduvangila mulikulupililo kuka mulikulupililo kenga mwavaandikidile, “Waishaliya andanama kwalikulupililo.”
Mwaa doni apa, shitundi shake Nnungu shinkulilodya kutunduvangila kuwa shiidila ungave-Nnungu na ungave-shaliya wavanu vatitikidyánga umwiu kwaindila yakuvova ishaliya.
Mwaa ashilá shuulukíka kumanyika kwamwaa wa Nnungu shanavo shinkulilodya pakuva jo mwene Nnungu, andivalodya.

Doni, tangu kukandyangigwa shilambo mavalelo ake ákaaneka yani dimongo dyake díkamalilika na unnungu wake, vyanavo vyaneke ngala kwaindila ya vyo vinu vikandyangígwe. Naivedoni, kwavanavo hamupali mwakukanila.
Mwaa vàmmanyite avi Nnungu, havampele lishangelo kenga Nnungu na ata havannambwaladile kanji vanavo mmakumbukililo ave vandinyambikanga na mitima vyave vyaujinga vindyumbala shii.
Vanavo valivalanganga kuva vading'ano vanditadya kuva vajinga
kutwala kubadilisha lishangelo lyake Nnungu ákapela kwalishinamu lyalinganienge kenga munu ápela, vyuni, vanyama na vakoko vakulyuta.
Napavedoni Nnungu andivakamudya muditamaa dyammitima vyave vatandedye ushapu wakutadyania dyoni mumili mwave
pakuva vabadilishidyé umwiu wa Nnungu kwaushwang'a kutwala kulipudya na kutumikila viumbe pavakalipudídye Namumba átumbyangilika ngwengwe. Ame.
Kwamwaa au, Nnungu avakamudidyé muditamaa dyave dyadyoni, ata mpaka vo vakongwe vave vo, vandibadilisha kutenda wendi muvaikidíle kwakutandela munji múkavaikidile.

Namomo valume valeka kutenda wendi muvaikidíle kwankongwe, vanavo vandibyaikanga mumweshe wave washivanavene; nnume na nnumemwagwe vatandana vyadyoni kutwala kulipatila vo vene ukumu ivaikidíle kwamakosha ave.
Naivedoni pakuva vanavo havagwene mana yakummanya Nnungu, jo mwene Nnungu andivakamudya mumakumbukililo ave akunyata pakulota vatandedye ashilá shíkavaikidile kutenda.
Vandyumbaligwa ungave-shaliya uti; ushapu, lung'unuku na ukalau. Vaumbaligwidyé ing'ou, kubyaa, ing'ondo, kushang'apa na kung'wenya;
vanu vakung'wenya, vammangédya Nnungu, vákave ishima, vakulyona na vakulitumbyanga; vakubuwa vitendo vyaukalau, vákavaigwilila vatatamunu,
vajinga, vákakulupilika, vákanagwaledya na vákave shididi.
Ata ikava kenga vandimanya lilamulo lyaishaliya lyake Nnungu líishidoni, avalá vatandédya avyo indivavaikila vapele. Vanavo i gweka vankutenda kanji namomo vankuvaungila nkono avalá vaténda.
Napavedoni wako umunu úvaukumu vanji, hamupali mwakukanila mwaa paumuukumu junji po, unkulyukumu gwegwe umwene pakuva wako umwene úukumu po, vyovyo vyo unkutenda.
Tundimanya kenga ukumu yake Nnungu kwa avalá vaténda vinu avyo, inkwodananavo umwiu.
Napane wako umunu úvaukumu avalá vaténda nawako momo utenda vyovyo, wona kenga undapalanyoka ukumu ya Nnungu?
Kwali wona dashi, mali akutanana kwake, akulipililila na aupole, wako unkwiludyanga kwabila kumanya do, kutanana kwake Nnungu ni kukuukanavo mukulijugulanga?
Kanji kwoda mwaa waimbeve yako na kunanopa kwantima wako, bai unkulikungailila shitundi gwegwe umwene muliduva alilá lyashitundi pailota kulilodya ukumu yaishaliya yake Nnungu.
Nae anannipa kula munu kwodananavo matendo ake.
Kwa avalá valóta kunanopa nkati mukutandedya wambone, valambéla lishangelo, ishima na ungapela, andavapa shingumi shíkamalilika
kanji shitundi na shishimwashimwa kwa avalá vavénavo malotelo augweka vaíta umwiu kutwala kwigwilila ungave-shaliya.
Tabu na shaushanga vindapagwa kwakula munu átandedya ukalau; shitandi kwamuyuda ling'oto kwangalegu
kanji lishangelo, ishima na amani kwakula munu átandedya wambone; shitandi kwamuyuda ling'oto kwangalegu.
Mwaa kumwe Nnungu hakupali kupambula.
Mwaa doni, uti avalá vatéga bila lilamulo, bila lilamulo vandajaika na avalá vatéga mulilamulo, kwa lyo lilamulo lyo, vandaukumigwa.
Mwaa vaishaliya pamevo pake Nnungu havanava shinu avalá vaígwa lilamulo kanji avalá vatandédya lilamulo ni valóta kuvalangiligwa kuva ishaliya.
Doni, vamidi vákave lilamulo pavatandedya kulingananavo mavalelo ave ashilá shilamulilígwa mulilamulo, vanavo vankuva lilamulo kwavo vo vene ata ikava kenga havave lilamulo.
Vanavo vankulilodya doni shimadengo shalilamulo shindyandikigwa mmitima vyave; makumbukililo ave amuntima aumya pamo ushuda avakashalya na ata avashililidya
muliduva lyaukumu Nnungu vipii vyavanu kwaindila imwe Klistu Yesu kwodananavo ntenga wambone wangu.
Kushi wako úlishema kuva muyuda, únanapela mulilamulo na úlitamangila nkati mu Nnungu,
wako úmanyite shana malotelo ake Nnungu na úungila nkono shakwashi shivénavo mana makumene pakuva upundishigwidyé mulilamulo,
wako úlikulupidile gwegwe umwene kuva nanangalaledi wavakalola, lilangadyo lya avalá vavéle mushii,
wako nkúpundisha wavajinga, mwalimu wavadyoko pakuva wako undivanavo mulilamulo mo wakikisho walimanyilo na umwiu.
Kushi napane wako úvapundisha vanji, me haulipundisha gwegwe umwene? Wako úvalanganga uleya kwiva, me unkwiva?
Wako útangola uleya kulavalava, me unkulavalava? Wako úvanyatila vannungu, me unkwivanga muding'ande dyave?
Wako úlitamangila mulilamulo, paupujungula lilamulo po, unkunnyambiyanga Nnungu.
Mwaa kenga indyandikigwa, “Lina lya Nnungu vankukupulu pakati pavamidi kwamwaa wenu mwenu.”
Mwiu, kukumuligwa likumbi kunkuvanavo mana ikava kenga wako unkwigwilila lilamulo kanji ikava kenga wako ni nkúpujungula lilamulo, bai kukumuligwa kwako ko kunditadya kuva ungakumuligwe.
Napane aijá ákakumuligwe, ikava kenga midimu vyalilamulo andaigwilila, da ava shinu nae álota kuvalangiligwa kukumuligwa?
Aijá ákakumuligwe mumili kanji áigwilila lilamulo, andakuukumu wako úvenavo lilamulo lyandikígwe na shitendo shakukumuligwa kanji lilamulo lyo, upujungula.
Mwenu, hapali muyuda, muyuda vila kwapanda na kukumuligwa hakunava shinu kwapanda mili
kanji muyuda, muyuda muntima na kukumuligwa ni kwamuntima kwaindila ya Imumu i shaandikígwe. Litumbyangidyo lyake nae halinaalakela shinu kwavanu kanji kumwe Nnungu.
Napanelo muyuda ankuvanavo mana shani? Kwali kukumuligwa likumbi inkupagwa paida shani?
Oe! Ankupagwa kula upande! Shitandi vayuda vandikulupiligwa malove ake Nnungu.
Napanelo ilota kuva dashi ikava kenga vanji havakulupidíle? Da ungakulupila wave undatadya kuputanga kukulupilika kwake Nnungu?
Ata padyoko vela! Nneke Nnungu ave waumwiu ata ikava kenga kula munu ni wakushang'apa kenga indyandikigwa, “pakulota uvenavo ishaliya mumalove ako, na paukumu po, uteme.”
Kanji napane ikava kenga ungave-shaliya wetu unkulodya ishaliya yake Nnungu, tulota kwamba nyamani? Kwali tutangole do, Nnungu havenavo ishaliya patandedya shitundi shake? Ngutangola kenga nimunu.
Ata padyoko vela! Leka ìvele davo, Nnungu akaulwile dashi kuukumu shilambo?
Kanji ikava kenga kwaindila yakushang'apa kwangu umwiu wake Nnungu unkuumbaligwa kwalishangelo lyake mwaa shani nguukumigwe kenga ninkútega?
Kwali mwavataukangila vanji vyatutangola wetu avi, “Tutende wakunyata pakulota wide wambone.” Ukumu yave ni yashaliya.
Napane tuushidashi? Da wetu tuvayuda ni túvapunda vanu vanji? Mene, ata padyoko! Mwaa ndivalanganga tayali doni vayuda pamo namu vamidi uti vankupagwa mukutawaligwa na lidambi
kenga indyandikigwa, “Hapali waishaliya ata jumo,
hapali munu ámanya, na hapali ánnambela Nnungu.
Uti vandyashalanga, kwaunapamo vandilitenda vákave mana. Hapali átandedya wambone, kulamana na jumo vela.
Ding'alongo dyave ni makabuli avé mwandwa, dindimi dyave vankutumila mukushang'apa. Mudindomo dyave munkupagwa ishumu yanyoka,
ndikanywa dyave mundyumbala dilana na kukalala.
Madodo ave ankutukutila kukujaa myadi,
mudindila dyave mo, kubamola na madembe,
na indila ya amani havamanyite.
Hakupali kunjopa Nnungu pamevo pave.”
Napane wetu tundimanya kenga uti vitangóla mulilamulo vinkutangola kwa avalá vatawalígwa na lilamulo kwambangidya dashi, dikanywa uti dimalale na shilambo uti shikapagwe muukumu yake Nnungu
mwaa kwaindila yashimadengo shalilamulo hapali álota kuvalangiligwa kuva ishaliya pamevo pake pakuva kwaindila yalilamulo inkutadya lidambi limanyike.
Ambi napane ishaliya yake Nnungu indililodya yapukananga na lilamulo; ata lyo lyene lilamulo na vakulava vankumya ushuda wake,
doni, ishaliya yake Nnungu kwaindila yakunkulupila Yesu Klistu kwa avalá uti vankulupíla nae. Hakupali kuvilingananga
mwaa uti vanditega na kupalavalela lishangelo lyake Nnungu
vavalangiligwa kuva ishaliya muumonyo wake kenga inudyo kwaindila yakwambola kupagwíte nkati mumwe Klistu Yesu.
Nae jo, Nnungu andimumya kenga shadaka shakudimanga shitundi shake kwamyadi vyake kwaindila yalikulupililo kwambangidya dashi ililodye ishaliya yake mwaa kwaupole wake, andíleka madambi akunyuma
pakulota alodye ishaliya yake muwakati au na ave waishaliya namomo wakummalangilila ishaliya aijá ánkulupila Yesu.
Napane shakwashi shakulota kulitamangila? Hashipali! Kwalilamulo shani? Lilamulo lyashimadengo? Mene kanji kwalilamulo lyakukulupila.
Mwaa wetu tunkwakikisha kenga munu ankuvalangiligwa ishaliya kwalikulupililo lyapukanánga na shimadengo shalilamulo.
Kwali Nnungu jo ni wavayuda gweka? Da nae po hanava shinu momo Nnungu wavamidi? Elo, ni wavamidi momo
pakuva Nnungu avelé jumo bai na kwalikulupililo tu, nae andavavalangilila ishaliya vakumulígwe na vákakumuligwe.
Da doni po tunkuputanga lilamulo kwaindila yalikulupililo? Ata padyoko vela! Kanji lyanavo lyo, tunkunonowanga.
Napavedoni, tulota kutangola nyamani vyúkile ndaanalela Abulaamu nakulugwetu kwodananavo unalikola?
Mwaa ikava kenga Abulaamu aukilé ndavalangiligwa ishaliya kwamwaa washimadengo, bai nae ankuvanavo shakulitamangila kanji i pamevo pake Nnungu.
Maandiko ankushidashi? “Abulaamu anínkulupila Nnungu na likulupililo lyolyo lyo vanimmalangilila nae kuva ishaliya.”
Mwenu, aijá ákola madengo nshala haunavalangiligwa shinu kuva kenga inudyo kanji kenga aki yake.
Napane aijá ákakola madengo kanji ánkulupila aijá ámmalangilila ishaliya ákave Nnungu, bai likulupililo lyake vanimmalangilila kuva ishaliya.
Nimumo momo Daudi nanae ankutangola yakwalaligwa kwamunu wammalangilila Nnungu ishaliya yapukanánga na shimadengo,
“Vandyalaligwa avalá vitendo vyave vyaungave-lilamulo vilivalivígwe, na avalá madambi ave aputangígwe.
Andyalaligwa aijá wakammalangilila Umu madambi ake.”
Da kwalaligwa aku kunkuvaukila vakumulígwe gweka kwali namomo vákakumuligwe? Wetu tunkushidoni, likulupililo vanimmalangilila Abulaamu kuva ishaliya.
Napane vammalangilidilé dashi? Vammalangilidilé mukukumuligwa kwali muungakumuligwa? I mukukumuligwa kanji muungakumuligwa.

Shimanyikilo shakukumuligwa kwake nae shivele kenga namakong'o waishaliya yalikulupililo muungakumuligwa pakulota dashi, nae ave tatamunu wauti avalá vakulupíla muungakumuligwa kwambangidya navanavo momo vavalangiligwe ishaliya
na yadavo pakulota nae ave tatamunu wa avalá vakumulígwe i gweka vakumulígwe kanji namomo avalá vawéna mudyatuwa dyodyo dyalikulupililo limwe tatagwetu Abulaamu.
Mwaa hainava shinu kwaindila yalilamulo intadídye Abulaamu pamo na udukulu wake kupata kulivikila yakuva nae nkúpata-maleko ashilambo kanji kwaindila yaishaliya yalikulupililo.
Mwenu, ikava kenga vamulilamulo ni vakupata-maleko, bai likulupililo lyene lyo, halive mana na kulivikila kwene ko, kunditimbikanga.
Mwaa lyo lilamulo lyo, linkwidanavo shitundi kanji napane palikapagwite lilamulo, hakupali kupujungula.

Ni ashi shitádya kulivikila kunanapele mulikulupililo pakulota kwodanenavo umonyo kwambangidya dashi kuke bila kwambambidya muudukulu uti i gweka wamulilamulo kanji namomo aijá walikulupililo limwe Abulaamu, jo tatamunu wetu uti
kenga indyandikigwa, “Nangu ndikupangila wako uve tatamunu waimbumba yavenentete.” Nae ni tatagwetu pamevo pake aijá wankulupidile, Nnungu ávapa shingumi vapadíle na átadya vipagwe víkapagwite.
Ata ikava kenga lilindilililo halipagwíte, mulilindilililo Abulaamu andíkulupila kenga andava tatamunu waimbumba yavenentete kwodananavo mwavamwaulidíle, “Amu ni mwaulatela kuvalela udukulu wako.”
Nae hadabadabénge mulikulupililo paligwene mili wake kuwa àvenavo ulinga wavyaka kenga miya doni na pagwene kuwa kwalutumbo lumwe Shalaa.
Kwakulivikila kwake Nnungu, nae hambambidyenge nkati muungakulupila kanji andyuka ndalinanopya nkati mulikulupililo amupa Nnungu lishangelo
akulupila do, uti avilá vyalivikila Nnungu, vyovyo vyo ankuulula kutandedya.
Ni ashi shitádya vammalangilile kuva ishaliya.
Mwenu, malove ala akummalangilila nae kuva ishaliya haandikigwe kwaupande wake nae gweka
kanji ata kwaupande wetu wetu momo. Vandatuvalangilila wetu túnkulupila aijá ándyuwidye pakati pavakupela, Yesu Umu wetu.
Nae vaninkamudya kwamwaa wakupujungula kwetu na kundyuwa kwakutuvalangilila ishaliya.
Napavedoni pakuva tundivalangiligwa ishaliya kwalikulupililo, tunkuvanavo amani namu Nnungu kwaindila imwe Umu wetu Yesu Klistu.
Kwaindila yake nae namomo wetu tundipata litala lyakwinjila kwalikulupililo muumonyo au watupagwa na tunkulitamangila mulilindilililo lyalishangelo lyake Nnungu.
I gweka avyo kanji tunkulitamanga momo nkati mumauvilo tumanya kenga mauvilo ankwidanavo kulipililila,
kulipililila kunkwidanavo umana kutwala umana kwidanavo lilindilililo.
Mwenu, lilindilililo halinatutaa dyoni pakuva linagwaledyo lyake Nnungu lindimiminiligwa mmitima vyetu kwaindila ya Imumu Wanashwe wavatupele.
Doni, wetu tùdabadabenge avi, muwakati wowo wo, Klistu andipela kwamwaa wa avalá vákave Nnungu.
Pandikamadyanga namene munu kupela kwamwaa wamunu waishaliya kwali inkuululika munu kujaa shingumi shake kwamwaa wamunu wambone
kanji Nnungu kwetu wetu andilodya linagwaledyo lyake jo mwene, doni, wetu tùvele avi tuvakutega, Klistu andipela kwamwaa wetu wetu.
Pakuva ambi apa napane tundivalangiligwa ishaliya kwaindila yamyadi vyake, kupunda namene kwaindila yake nae tundaambwalegwa mushitundi.
Mwaa ikava kenga wetu patuvéle tuvammongo vanditutadya twigwanie namu Nnungu kwaindila yakupela kwa Mwanagwe, kupunda namene patwigwenie apa, tundaambwalegwa kwaindila yashingumi shake.
I gweka avyo, namomo tunkulitamangila Nnungu kwaindila imwe Umu wetu Yesu Klistu átutadidye ambi apa tupate kwigwania.
Napavedoni, kulingana kenga mo mwaliinjilidile lidambi mushilambo shapai kwaindila yamunu jumo na kupela kwaindila yalidambi, napane momo kupela kwandavala kwavanu uti mwaa uti vanditega.
Doni, lilamulo likanava kupagwa, mwiu lidambi lindípagwa mushilambo shapai kanji halishivalangiligwa lidambi pálikapagwite lilamulo.
Kanji napane kupela kunditawala kutunduvangila kumwe Adamu mpaka Musha, ata kuvatawala avalá vákatagile kulingana na kupujungula kumwe Adamu e avéle inamuna imwe aijá álota kwida.

Kanji napanelo hakunapagwa shinu kulinganianga inudyo na kupujungula mwaa ikava kenga vanu voe vandipela kwaindila yakupujungula kwamunu jumo, kupunda namene umonyo wake Nnungu na inudyo yo kwaindila yaumonyo wamunu jumo Yesu Klistu, indikumukanga kwavanu voe.

Hayululika napane kulinganianga inudyo na ashilá shaalakadíle mulidambi lyamunu jumo mwaa ukumu yodananavo kupujungula kwamwanda umo indiidanavo kuukumigwa kanji inudyo yodananavo kupujungula kwamyanda vyoe indiidanavo kuvalangiligwa ishaliya.

Napanelo ikava kenga kwamwaa wakupujungula kwamunu jumo kupela kunditawala kwaindila yamunu ajo, kupunda namene avalá vapáta kuumbaligwa kwaumonyo na inudyo yaishaliya, vanavo vandatawala mushingumi kwaindila yamunu jumo, Yesu Klistu.

Nadoni nimumo momo kwaindila yakupujungula kwamwanda umo, kwavanu uti kundyumilila kuukumigwa, namomo kwaindila yashitendo shimo shaishaliya, kwavanu uti kundyumilila kuvalangiligwa ishaliya iidanavo shingumi.
Mwaa nimumo momo kwaindila yaungaigwilila wamunu jumo, voe vanditadya kuva vakutega, namomo kwaindila yakwigwilila kwamunu jumo, voe vandatadya kuvalangiligwa ishaliya.
Mwenu, lilamulo lindida pakulota dashi, kupujungula kwanjadyeke. Napane po palyanjadyeke lidambi, umonyo undipakatika
kwambangidya kenga mo mwalitawalidile lidambi nkati mukupela, namomo umonyo utawale nkati mwishaliya iidanavo shingumi shíkamalilika kwaindila imwe Yesu Klistu Umu wetu.
Napanelo tuushidashi? Da tuke mushu tupagwa mulidambi kwambangidya umonyo wake Nnungu wanjadyeke?
Ata padyoko vela! Wetu túpadile kwalidambi tulota kuka dashi mushu tunama nkati mulidambi?
Kwali hamunamanya shinu kenga uti túpatile ubatisho nkati mumwe Klistu Yesu, da hatupatile ubatisho nkati mukupela kwake?

Napavedoni wetu tundishikigwa pamo namu nae kwaindila yaubatisho utuukanavo kukupela kwambangidya kenga mo mwavandyuwididye Klistu pakati pavakupela kwaindila yalishangelo lya Tatamunu, nawetu momo tuname mushingumi shaambi.
Doni, ikava kenga wetu tundyungana namu nae mukupela kulinganána na kupela kwake, mwiu nawetu momo tundaungana namu nae mukudyuka kulinganána na kudyuka kwake
tumanya kenga umunu wetu wakala undipambililigwa pamo namu nae pakulota dashi, mili walidambi utimbikange kwambangidya hatunatandegwe kavili vatumwa validambi
mwaa aijá ápadile vanimmalangilila ishaliya vàmuushidye mulidambi.
Napane ikava kenga tundipela pamo namu Klistu, tunkukulupila do, namu nae tundanama
tumanya kenga paukile ndadyuka Klistu pakati pavakupela, nae hapela kavili; kupela nae hakuntawala.
Mwaa kupela kwake nae, apadilé kwalidambi mwanda umo tu bai kanji shingumi shanama nae, anama kwa Nnungu.
Nadoni namwenu momo livalangile kuva mmakupela kwalidambi kanji mmakunama kwa Nnungu nkati mumwe Klistu Yesu.
Napavedoni hamunaleke lidambi lintawala mumili vyenu vipéla pakulota wo mili wo, hamunaigwilile ditamaa dyake.

Hamunajaule dimbande dyenu dyamili kwalidambi kenga vikalelo vyaungave-shaliya kanji lijaule kwa Nnungu kenga mmanu wavantwete mukupela kuka mushingumi na jaula dimbande dyenu kwa Nnungu kenga vikalelo vyaishaliya.
Mwenu, lidambi halintawala pakuva mwenu hamunatawaligwa shinu na lilamulo kanji munkutawaligwa na umonyo.
Napanelo shakwashi? Da tutege pakuva hatunatawaligwa shinu na lilamulo kanji tunkutawaligwa na umonyo? Ata padyoko vela!
Mwenu hamumanyite do, mukalijaula kwamunu kenga mmatumwa mmakwigwilila, mwiu mundava mmatumwa wamunu aju wamumwigwilila kwali kwalidambi liidanavo kupela kwali kwakwigwilila kwidanavo ishaliya.
Kanji napane lilambwalalelo live kwa Nnungu, mwemwe mwe muvéle mmatumwa validambi mundyuka ndaigwilila na mitima vyenu mpano wamapundisho alalá avankamudidye.
Mwenu mwàmbwalagwidye avi mulidambi, munditandegwa mmatumwa vaishaliya.

Ngutangola kenga nimunu kwamwaa wakudabadabanga kwenu kwashimunu. Kulingana kenga mo mwamujaulidile dimbande dyenu muushapu na muungave-lilamulo vyuka kupunda ungave-lilamulo napane ambi jaula dimbande dyenu kenga vatumwa vaishaliya vauka kukwilimyanga.
Doni, pamuvéle mmatumwa validambi, mwenu muvele muunaiti kwaishaliya.
Da mushipata vyepo shani wakati awo kwavinu vyamwanangila dyoni ambi apa? Mwaa kumwisho kwavinu avyo, kupela.
Kanji napane mwenu múukile ndaombolegwa mulidambi na kutandegwa mmatumwa vake Nnungu, vyepo vyamupata vyo vinkumuukanavo kukwilimyanga na kumwisho kwake ko, shingumi shíkamalilika.
Mwaa nshala walidambi ni kupela kanji inudyo ya Nnungu ni shingumi shíkamalilika nkati mumwe Klistu Yesu Umu wetu.
Kwali mmanung'unumunu hamumanyite do, ngutangola namu mwenu mmanu múmanyite shana lilamulo, da hamumanyite kenga lilamulo linkuntawala munu po panama mushingumi?
Mwenu, nkongwe álambwidye andyuungwa nkati mulilamulo ntwagwe àvele mushingumi kanji ntwagwe akapela, nkongwe ajo avelé muunaiti kwalilamulo lyashitamo.

Nadoni ikava kenga nae andalombwa na nnume junji ntwagwe àvele mushingumi, andavalangiligwa kuva nkúlavalava. Kanji napane ntwagwe akapela, nae avelé muunaiti kwa alilá lilamulo. Nae akalombwa na nnume junji, havalangiligwa shinu kuva nkúlavalava.

Nimumo momo mmanung'unumunu mwenu momo mundipela kwalilamulo kwaindila yamili umwe Klistu pakulota dashi, muve mmanu mmamunu junji aijá ádyukile pakati pavakupela kwambangidya tupe vyepo kumwe Nnungu.
Mwaa patushinama mumavalelo etu ashimunumunu, ditamaa dyalidambi dikang'alegwa na lilamulo dishindakola madengo mudimbande dyetu dyamumili kwambangidya tupe vyepo vituúkanavo kukupela.
Kanji napane vanditumya mulilamulo tùpadile kwa ashilá shíshitutenda kuva tuvatumwa pakulota tutumike kwainamuna yaambi ilangalalégwa na Imumu i kwainamuna yakala yalilamulo lyandikígwe.

Napane tuushidashi? Da lilamulo lyo, lidambi? Ata padyoko vela! Ila leka likapagwite lilamulo, hangunamanye lidambi ni nyamani. Mwenu, nangu hangunamanye nyamani kung'unuka leka lilamulo likatangwele doni, “Haunang'unuke!”
Napanelo lidambi likatakela litala kwaindila yalilamulo lindikang'ela nkati mwangu kula inamuna yalung'unuku mwaa palyapukananga na lilamulo, lyanavo livelé mukupela.
Nangu kala ngushinama ngwàpukanenge na lilamulo kanji palingwidilile lilamulo po, linditadya kudyuwangidya kavili lidambi kutwala nangu kupela.
Napanelo ndyuka ndona kenga lilamulo livikíke ling'e shingumi, lyo lyene linding'a kupela.
Mwaa lidambi likatakela litala kwaindila yalilamulo, lininguduwanga na kwaindila yalilamulo, liningubyaa.
Nadoni lilamulo ni lyakwilimyanga na shivéle mulilamulo ni shakwilimyanga, shaishaliya na shambone.

Napane, da shambone sho shindijalukanga kwangu nangu kuva kupela? Ata padyoko vela! Kanji lidambi pakulota lililodye kuva lidambi, kwaindila ya ashilá she shivéle shambone, lyanavo lindiidanavo kupela nkati mwangu kwambangidya kwaindila yalilamulo, lyanavo lililodye ngala kuva shinu shakutega kupunda apo.
Doni tundimanya kenga lilamulo lyàimumu ila nangu washimunumunu ngúshulushigwe mukutawaligwa na lidambi.
Hangunamanya shinu shangutenda mwaa ashilá shangulota, hangunatenda shinu kanji ashilá shanguvangedya, shosho ni shangutenda.
Napane ikava kenga ashilá shandikalota ninkutenda, bai ninkuungila nkono kenga lilamulo, lyambone.
Nadoni hangunava shinu nangu ngútenda kanji ni lidambi lipágwa nkati mwangu
mwaa ndimanya kenga hashipali shambone shipagwíte nkati mwangu yani mushimunu shangu. Doni, ashilá shililódya kuva shambone ninkulota ngutende kanji hangunaulula shinu kutenda
mwaa aulá wambone wangulota ngutende hangunatenda shinu kanji ukalau wandikalota ngutende ni au wanguukanavo mushu ngutenda.
Mwenu, ikava kenga shandikalota nangu ninkutenda, bai hangunava shinu nangu ngútenda kanji ni lidambi lipagwíte nkati mwangu.
Bai ndyanalela lilamulo ali: pangulota ngutandedye wambone, ukalau ngukadyedyanneu ùvele pepi namu nangu.
Mwenu, nkati muntima mwangu ninkupuwangila lilamulo lyake Nnungu

kanji mudimbande dyamumili mwangu ninkwona lilamulo linji litandána ing'ondo na alilá lilamulo lyamuding'anong'ano dyangu, lilamulo lyolyo lingutádya nguve nintumwa walilamulo lyalidambi livéle mudimbande dyamumili mwangu.
Ninkúva nangu mwenu! Nyani álota kunguposha na mili au wakupela?

Napane lilambwalalelo lipagwe kumwe Nnungu kwaindila imwe Umu wetu Yesu Klistu. Nadoni nene nimwene kwading'anong'ano dyangu ninkutumika lilamulo lyake Nnungu kanji kwashimunumunu, ninkutumika lilamulo lyalidambi.
Napavedoni ambi apa hakupali kuukumigwa kwa avalá vavéle nkati mumwe Klistu Yesu
mwaa nkati mumwe Klistu Yesu, lilamulo lya Imumu washingumi liningwambola mulilamulo lyalidambi na lyakupela.

Doni, ashilá shíkaulwile lilamulo kutandedya kwamwaa wakudabadabanga kwashimunumunu, Nnungu anditandedya pantumididye Mwanagwe kwaing'ope yashimunumunu yalidambi na kwaupande walidambi, nae andyukumu lidambi mushimunumunu
kwambangidya ishaliya ilotéka mulilamulo iwikile popo kwetu wetu túnama i kwashimunumunu kanji kwa Imumu.
Mwenu, avalá vanáma kwodananavo shimunumunu, vananapela ding'anong'ano dyave muvinu vyashimunumunu kanji avalá vanáma kwodananavo Imumu, ding'anong'ano dyave vananapela muvinu vya Imumu
mwaa ding'anong'ano dyashimunumunu ni kupela napane ding'anong'ano dya Imumu ni shingumi na amani.
Doni, ding'anong'ano dyashimunumunu ni umongo kwake Nnungu mwaa hadinalivika shinu mwina mwake lilamulo lyake Nnungu na ata hadinaulula kutandedya.
Avalá vapágwa mushimunumunu havaulula Nnungu jo, kunnagwela.
Mwenu napane hamupali mushimunumunu kanji muvelé mu Imumu ikava kenga mwiu Imumu wake Nnungu ankunama nkati mwenu. Mwenu, munu ákavenavo Imumu umwe Klistu, jojo jo hanava shinu umwe Klistu.
Napane ikava kenga Klistu ankupagwa nkati mwenu, kwaupande unji mili undipela kwamwaa walidambi kanji kwaupande unji Imumu ankwing'a shingumi kwamwaa waishaliya.

Na ikava kenga Imumu umwe aijá ándyuwidye Yesu pakati pavakupela ankupagwa nkati mwenu, jo ándyuwidye Klistu pakati pavakupela andaing'a momo shingumi mili vyenu vyakupela kwaindila ya Imumu wake ápagwa nkati mwenu.
Napavedoni mmanung'unumunu wetu tuvakudaigwa i kwashimunumunu pakulota tuname twodananavo shimunumunu
mwaa ikava kenga mwenu munkunama kwodananavo shimunumunu, mundapela kanji kwa Imumu mukatadya kupedya vitendo vyamili, mundanama.
Mwenu, uti avalá valangalalégwa kwa Imumu wake Nnungu ni vanavake Nnungu.
Doni, mwenu hamupatile imumu yautumwa muka kavili mukujopa kanji munimpata Imumu wamwanamunu; nkati mwake wetu tunkulila, “Aba, Atata.”
Jo mwene Imumu ankumya ushuda kwaimumu yetu kenga wetu ni tuvanavake Nnungu
na ikava kenga tuvanavake, bai ni tuvakupata-maleko, upande unji kumwe Nnungu na upande unji pamo namu Klistu ikava kenga mwiu tundáuvauvanga namu nae pakulota lishangelo tupate pamo namu nae.
Mwenu, nangu ninkuvalangila kenga mauvilo átupata muwakati au watuvele, havaikidile kulinganianga na lishangelo lilóta kulilodya nkati mwetu.
Doni, shuumbígwe uti shinkulindila na mweshe kulilodya kwavanavake Nnungu.
Mwaa shuumbígwe shindivikigwa mwina mambinya i kwamalotelo ake sho shene kanji kwamalotelo amwe aijá ávikile mwina, mukulindila
kenga ata sho shene shuumbígwe sho, shindaombolegwa muutumwa wakupagwa mukunda shiinjila muunaiti walishangelo lyavanavake Nnungu.
Mwenu, tunkumanya doni uti shuumbígwe mpaka ambi shinkukuta pamo mumauvilo akushuluwa
i gweka shanavo kanji nawetu momo túpatile vyepo vitandi vya Imumu, tunkukuta shintimatima tulindila na mweshe yakutandegwa kuva tuvanavake Nnungu, kwambolegwa kwamili vyetu.
Mwaa mulilindilililo ali wetu tundyambolegwa. Kanji napane lilindilililo lyanéka, halinava shinu lilindilililo. Da nyani ávenavo lilindilililo kwashinu shaona?
Napane pakuva tunkuvanavo lilindilililo lyashinu shatukona, tunkulindila na mweshe nkati muupole.
Nimumo momo Imumu inkutupwashela nkati mukudabadabanga kwetu mwaa hatunamanya shinu shakwashi shakushwalidya kanji jo mwene Imumu ankutujugwila wetu kwakukuta kúkaululika kuvalanganga.
Napane aijá álalyanga mitima, nae ankumanya ding'anong'ano dya Imumu pakuva Imumu ankuvajugwangila vakwilimyanga kwodananavo malotelo ake Nnungu.
Tundimanya napane kwa avalá vannagwalédya Nnungu ankuvatandela uti kwauwambone, vo vávashamile kwodananavo malotelo ake jo mwene.
Mwaa avalá vávamanyite kaladavo, namomo andivapangila kaladavo pakulota dashi valinganane na ing'ope ya Mwanagwe kwambangidya nae ave ntandi kuvalekwa pakati pavanung'unumunu voe.
Doni, avalá vávapangidile kaladavo, vovo vo andivashema na vo vávashamile vo, andivavalangilila ishaliya na vo vávavalangangilidile ishaliya vo, nae andivapa lishangelo.
Napane tuushidashi kwamwaa wavinu avi? Ikava kenga Nnungu ankupagwa upande wetu, nyani álota kutupinga?
Aijá ákammikidile shitete Mwanagwe kanji aninkamudya kwamwaa wetu uti, napane haulula kutupa vinu uti monyo pamo namu nae?
Da nyani álota kuvakashalya vakutandalegwa vake Nnungu? Ni jo mwene Nnungu ávavalangilila ishaliya.
Nyani álota kuvaukumu? Klistu Yesu ni ápadile, leka apo ni ádyukile, ni áikele kunkanakono wake Nnungu namomo nae ni átujugwangila.
Nyani álota kutwapukanianga na linagwaledyo limwe Klistu? Da ilota kuva tabu, kwali mauvilo, kwali kupapatigwa, kwali indala, kwali wou, kwali shijoidyo, kwali lyambila?
Kenga indyandikigwa, “Kwamwaa wako tunkubyaigwa shilo na mui; tunkuvalangiligwa kenga vangandolo vakuka ndavashinda.”
Kanji kwavinu avi uti tunkuva tuvakutema kupunda apo kwaindila imwe aijá átunagwaladidye.
Mwaa ninkuvanavo wakika kenga i kupela, i shingumi, i vanjelo, i vakutawala, i vyaambi apa, i vilóta kwida, i lyululilo,
i kushanya, i pai na ata kwali shiumbi shoeshoe shilóta kuulula kutwapukanianga na linagwaledyo lyake Nnungu lipagwíte nkati mumwe Klistu Yesu, Umu wetu.
Ninkutangola mwiu nkati mumwe Klistu hangunashang'apa shinu, makumbukililo angu amuntima aumya ushuda kwangu nangu nkati mu Imumu Wanashwe
kenga ninkuvanavo shipalodi shikumene na mauvilo ákamalilika muntima mwangu.
Mwaa ndikandilota ata nene nimwene ngupate dilana na ngwapukanangenavo Klistu kwamwaa wavanung'unumunu vàvele vakwetu kwashimunu.
Vanavo ni vanaishilaeli; vyavanavo ni kuva vanamunu, lishangelo, dimbodi, kupata kwalilamulo, kulipudya mwing'ande yake pamo na vyakulivikila.
Kwavanavo vanyakalamunu vàve na kwashimunu ni kwálakadile aijá Klistu, aijá ávele pashanya pavinu uti, Nnungu átumbyangilika ngwengwe! Ame.
Kanji napanelo i do lilove lyake Nnungu lindikoweka mwaa i uti udukulu umwe Ishilaeli ni vanaishilaeli,
na ata i pakuva udukulu umwe Abulaamu vanavo uti vankuva vanavake kanji, “Kwaindila imwe Ishaki vandashamegwa kuva udukulu wako.”
Kwashitangodi shinji, i vana vashimunu ni vanavake Nnungu kanji ni vana vakulivikila vavalangilígwa muudukulu
mwaa lilove lyakulivikila ni ali, “Muwakati wowo au mwakaluno ndaida kavili na Shalaa andavanavo mwana nnume.”
I avi gweka kanji Labeka momo paimite shitumbo shavana vavili na nnume jumo, tatagwetu Ishaki,
vana vo vakanava kuvalekwa na ata vakanava kutenda wambone kwali wakunyata, mwenu pakulota shabaa yake Nnungu yakutandola yuke mushu i kwamwaa washimadengo kanji kwamwaa umwe aijá áshema,
nae vandímwaulila, “Nang'olo anantumika ndyoko.”
Kenga indyandikigwa, “Yakobo ninnagwaledya kanji ninnyatila Ishau.”
Napane tuushidashi? Da Nnungu jo ni waungave-shaliya? Ata padyoko vela!
Mwaa nae animwaulila Musha doni, “Namwanangila shididi aijá waninnota nimwanangile shididi na nantanana aijá waninnota nintanane.”
Napavedoni, ashi shinkunanapela i kwa aijá álota kwali kwa aijá álikanyalidya kanji kwa aijá áanangila shididi, Nnungu.
Mwenu, Maandiko andimwaulila Palao, “Ni ashi shingutadídye ndikukwedye wako kwambangidya dashi nkati mwako ngulodye dimongo dyangu na pakulota livalangangigwe lina lyangu mushilambo uti.”
Napavedoni aijá wannota nae, ankumwanangila shididi na aijá wannota nae, ankunnanopya ntima.
Napane unangudya doni, “Mwaa shani Nnungu mpaka ambi ankutupa makosha? Da nyani álota kutaukanga malotelo ake?”
Leka apo, wako umunu unyani wakutaukananga namu Nnungu? Da inkuululika ashilá shavaumbile kutwala kumwaulila aijá áumbile doni, “Mwaa shani unguumbile doni?”
Da nkúmba havenavo aki yaulongo, mulikamu lyolyo kumba shombo shaishima kwali shíkave ishima?

Napane ilota kuva dashi ikava kenga Nnungu palota kulilodya shitundi na palota dimongo dyake dimanyike andilipililila kwaupole kwa avilá vyombo vyamushitundi shake vyapanganienge kwambangidya dashi vibamalegwe
pakulota uumbala walishangelo lyake umanyike kwavyombo avilá vyamushididi shake vyapanganienge kaladavo kwalishangelo,
ata mpaka wetu momo túshamagwidye i gweka pakati pavayuda kanji namomo pakati pavamidi.
Amu ni kenga mwatangaladile nkati mu Osheya: “Avalá vákavele venentete vangu, ndavashema ‘venentete vangu,’ na aijá ákavele wakunagwaleka, nanshema ‘wakunagwaleka’ ”
na “Apalá pavavaulidile doni, ‘Hamunava shinu mmenentete vangu,’ popo po, vandavashema ‘vanavake Nnungu mumi.’ ”
Namomo Ishaiya ankutangola pashanya po kwamwaa wavanaishilaeli, “Ata ikava kenga shikonda shavanaishilaeli shinkuva kenga dimbwe dyamwimanga, vakwijalila tu ni valóta kwambolegwa
mwaa Umu andatandedya ukumu yake uti mushilambo kwabila kutimatimanga.”
Kenga mwatangaladile Ishaiya kaladavo, “Leka Umu Wavaing'ondo akatulakadile udukulu, doni tùvele kenga Shodoma na tùlinganene kenga Gomola.”
Napane tuushidashi? Doni vamidi vákashivingilidya kuvalangiligwa ishaliya vandipata kuvalangiligwa ishaliya, ishaliya yoyo yalakéla kwaindila yalikulupililo
kanji vanaishilaeli váshoodedya lilamulo pakulota vavalangiligwe ishaliya, havapatile.
Mwaa wanyamani? Mwaa havashoodedya kwalikulupililo kanji vashoodedya kenga paikavéle kwashimadengo. Vanavo vandilikuvala mulijanga lyakulikuvala.
Kenga mwatangalela Maandiko, “Mwenu, nangu ninkuvika pa Shiyau lijanga lyakulikuvala lijanga lyo lyakutaa shitundi; aijá álota kukulupila, mwiko hatutala.”
Mmanung'unumunu, malotelo amuntima mwangu na kujugwa kwangu kwaninjugwa Nnungu ni kulota vanavo vaambwalegwe.
Mwenu, nangu ninkumya ushuda kwavanavo kenga vankuvanavo dukuduku kwa Nnungu kanji dukuduku yave hainava shinu yalimanyilo
mwaa vàvele mukutikinanga ishaliya yake Nnungu na valambela vabuni ishaliya yavo vo vene havalivikile mwina mwaishaliya ailá ya Nnungu.
Doni, mwisho walilamulo ni Klistu kwambangidya ipagwe ishaliya kwa aijá uti ákulupila.
Mwenu, Musha ankwandika kwaing'ano yaishaliya yalakéla mulilamulo, “Munu átandedya vinu avi, andanama kwaindila yavyanavo.”
Kanji ishaliya yalakéla mulikulupililo inkushidoni, “Haunatangole shintimatima, ‘Nyani álota kukwela kuwa?’ ” yani amwidenavo Klistu pai
kwali, “ ‘Nyani álota kushuluka kulitavaleva?’ ” yani amwidenavo Klistu pashanya
